item.text: (ka) @#/ ! /gsang sngags rgyud 'bum gyi skor bzhugs so/ /
(黃) 秘密經第一部
@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ many+dzu shrI dz+nyA na satwa s+ya pa ra mAR+tha nA ma sa~M gI ti/ bod skad du/
'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i don dam pa'i mtshan yang dag par brjod pa/ 'jam dpal
gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang / /gdul dka' 'dul ba rnams
kyi mchog /dpa' bo 'jig rten gsum las rgyal/ /rdo rje dbang phyug gsang ba'i rgyal/ /rnam rgyas
pad+ma dkar po'i spyan/ /pad+ma rab tu rgyas pa'i zhal/ /rang gi lag gis rdo rje mchog /yang dang yang du gsor
byed pa/ /khro gnyer ldan pa'i rlabs la sogs/ /lag na rdo rje mtha' yas pa/ /dpa' bo gdul dka'
'dul ba po/ /dpa' bo 'jigs rung gzugs can dang / /rdo rje rtse mo rab 'phro ba/ /rang gi lag gis
gsor byed pa/ /shes rab thabs dang snying rje che/ /'gro don byed pa rnams kyi mchog /dga' mgu
rangs pa'i bsam pa can/ /khro bo'i lus kyi gzugs ldan pa/ /sangs rgyas phrin las byed pa'i mgon/ /lus btud rnams dang lhan cig tu/ /mgon po bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs/ /rdzogs sangs

rgyas la phyag 'tshal te/ /thal mo sbyar ba byas gyur nas/ /spyan sngar 'dug ste 'di skad gsol/ /khyab bdag bdag la sman pa dang / /bdag don bdag la thugs brtse'i phyir/ /sgyu 'phrul dra bas mngon rdzogs pa'i/ /byang chub

ji ltar bdag thob mdzod/ /nyon mongs pas ni sems dkrugs shing / /mi shes 'dam du bying ba yi/ /sems can kun la sman pa dang / /bla med 'bras bu thob bya'i phyir/ /bcom ldan ston pa rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /'gro ba'i

bla ma bshad du gsol/ /dam tshig chen po de nyid mkhyen/ /dbang po bsam pa rig pa mchog /bcom ldan 'das kyi ye shes sku'i/ /gtsug tor chen po'i tshig gi bdag /'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' yi/ /ye shes sku ste rang byung

ba/ /don zab don ni rgya che zhing / /don chen mtshungs med rab zhi ba/ /thog ma par dang mthar dge ba/ /mtshan yang dag par brjod pa mchog /'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs/ /ma 'ongs rnams kyang gsung 'gyur la/ /

da ltar byung ba'i rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /gang yang yang yang gsungs pa gang / /rgyud chen rgyu 'phrul dra ba 'dir/ /rdo rje 'chang chen gsang sngags 'chang / /dpag med rnams kyis dgyes pa yis/ /gang yang yang dag rab gsungs pa/ /

bdag kyang 'di ni gzung bar bgyid/ /bsam pa brtan pos nges 'byung bar/ /mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas kun gyi/ /gsang 'dzin ji ltar bdag 'gyur bgyi/ /nyon mongs ma lus bsal ba dang / /mi shes ma lus spang ba'i phyir/ /sems can

rnams kyi bsam pa yi/ /khyad par ji bzhin rab bshad 'tshal/ /gsang dbang lag na rdo rje yis/ /de bzhin gshegs la de skad du/ /gsol btab thal mo sbyar byas te/ /lus btud nas ni spyan sngar 'dug /gsol ba 'debs pa'i tshigs su

bcad pa bcu drug go/ /de nas bcom ldan shAkya thub/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog /nyid kyi zhal nas ljags bzang dge/ /ring zhing yangs pa brkyang mdzad de/ /'jig rten gsum po snang byed cing / /bdud bzhi'i dgra rnams

'dul byed pa/ /'jig rten rnams kyi ngan song gsum/ /sbyong bar byed pa'i 'dzum bstan nas/ /tshangs pa'i gsung ni snyan pa yis/ /'jig rten gsum po kun bkang ste/ /lag na rdo rje stobs po che/ /gsang dbang la ni slar gsungs pa/ /

legs so dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang / /lag na rdo rje khyod legs so/ /'gro la phan pa'i don du khyod/ /snying rje che dang ldan gyur cing / /'jam dpal ye shes sku yi mtshan/ /yang dag brjod pa don che ba/ /dag par byed cing sdig sel ba/ /nga las mnyan par brtson

pa ni/ /gsang ba'i bdag po khyod legs so/ /de phyir 'di ni ngas bshad bya/ /khyod ni rtse gcig yid kyis nyon/ /bcom ldan de ni legs shes gsol/ /lan gyi gsung tshigs su bcad pa drug go/ /de nas bcom ldan shAkya thub/ /gsang sngags mtha' dag

rigs chen po/ /gsang sngags rig pa 'chang ba'i rigs/ /rigs gsum la ni rnam par gzigs/ /'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa'i rigs/ /'jig rten snang byed rigs chen dang / /phyag rgya chen po'i rigs mchog dang / /gtsug tor chen po'i rigs chen no/ /

rig drug la gzigs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gnyis so// //gsang sngags rgyal po drug ldan zhing / /gnyis su med par 'byung ba dang / /skye ba med pa'i chos can 'di/ /tshig gi bdag pos tshigs bcad gsungs/ /a A i I u U e ai o

au aM aHs+thi to hr-i di dz+nyA na murti ra ha~M bud+d+ho bud+d+hA nA~M t+r+yad+h+wa brtI nA~M/ oM badzra tIk+Sh+Na duHkha ts+tshe da pradz+nyA dz+nyA na murta ye/ dz+nyA na kA ya wA gI shwa ra a ra pa tsa nA ya te na maH sgyu 'phrul dra bas mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i rim pa tshigs su bcad pa gsum mo// //

'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas a yig byung / /a yig yig 'bru kun gyi mchog /don chen 'gyur med dam pa yin/ /srog chen po ste skye ba med/ /tshig tu brjod pa spangs pa ste/ /rjod pa kun gyi rgyu yi mchog /

tshig kun rab tu gsal bar byed/ /mchod pa chen po 'dod chags che/ /sems can thams cad dga' bar byed/ /mchod pa chen po zhe sdang che/ /nyon mongs kun gyi dgra che ba/ /mchod pa chen po gti mug che/ /gti mug blo ste gti mug sel/ /

mchod pa chen po khro ba che/ /khro ba chen po dgra che ba/ /mchod pa chen po chags pa che/ /chags pa thams cad sel bar byed/ /'dod pa chen po bde ba che/ /dga' ba chen po mgu ba che/ /gzugs che lus kyang che ba ste/ /kha dog che zhing lus bong che/ /ming yang che zhing rgya che ba/ /dkyil 'khor chen po yangs

pa yin/ /shes rab chen po'i mtshon 'chang ba/ /nyon mongs lcags kyu che ba'i mchog /grags chen snyan grags chen po ste/ /snang ba chen po gsal ba che/ /mkhas pa sgyu 'phrul chen po 'chang / /sgyu 'phrul chen po don grub pa/ /sgyu 'phrul chen po dga' bas dga'/ /sgyu 'phrul chen po mig

'phrul can/ /sbyin bdag chen po gtso bo ste/ /tshul khrims chen po 'chang ba'i mchog /bzod chen 'chang ba brtan pa ste/ /brtson 'grus chen po pha rol gnon/ /bsam gtan chen po ting 'dzin gnas/ /shes rab chen po lus 'chang ba/ /stobs po che la thabs che ba/ /smon lam ye

shes rgya mtsho ste/ /byams chen rang bzhin dpag tu med/ /snying rje chen po blo yi mchog /shes rab chen po blo chen ldan/ /thabs chen byed pa chen po ste/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po stobs dang ldan/ /shugs chen mgyogs pa chen po ste/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po cher grags pa/ /stobs

chen pha rol gnon pa po/ /srid pa'i ri bo chen po 'joms/ /mkhregs shing rdo rje chen po 'chang / /drag po chen po drag shul che/ /'jigs chen 'jigs par byed pa po/ /mgon po rigs mchog chen po ste/ /bla ma
gsang sngags che ba mchog /theg pa chen po'i tshul gnas pa/ /theg pa chen po'i tshul gyi mchog /rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshigs su bcad pa bcu bzhi'o// //

sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad che/ /thub pa chen po thub chen ldan/ /gsang sngags tshul chen las byung ba/ /gsang sngags tshul chen bdag nyid can/ /pha rol phyin bcu thob pa ste/ /pha rol phyin pa bcu la gnas/ /

pha rol phyin bcu dag pa ste/ /pha rol phyin pa bcu yi tshul/ /sa bcu'i dbang phyug mgon po ste/ /sa bcu la ni rab tu gnas/ /shes bcu rnam dag bdag nyid can/ /shes bcu rnam dag 'chang ba po/ /rnam pa bcu po

don bcu'i don/ /thub dbang stobs bcu khyab pa'i bdag /kun gyi don ni ma lus byed/ /rnam bcu dbang ldan che ba po/ /thog ma med pa spros med bdag /de bzhin nyid bdag dag pa'i bdag /yang dag smra zhing tshig

gzhan med/ /ji skad smra ba de bzhin byed/ /gnyis su med dang gnyis med smra/ /yang dag mtha' la rnam par gnas/ /bdag med seng ge'i sgra dang ldan/ /mu stegs ri dgas ngan 'jigs byed/ /kun tu 'gro ba'i

don yod bgrod/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i yid ltar mgyogs/ /rgyal ba dgra rgyal rnam par rgyal/ /'khor los bsgyur ba stobs po che/ /tshogs kyi slob dpon tshogs kyi gtso/ /tshogs rje tshogs bdag dbang dang ldan/ /

mthu chen gces pa 'dzin pa ste/ /tshul chen gzhan gyis 'dren pa min/ /tshig rje tshig bdag smra mkhas pa/ /tshig la dbang ba tshig mtha' yas/ /tshig bden bden par smra ba dang / /bden pa bzhi ni ston pa po/ /

phyir mi ldog pa phyir mi 'ong / /bse ru so so 'dren pa ste/ /nges 'byung sna tshogs nges 'byung ba/ /'byung ba chen po rgyu gcig pa/ /dge slong dgra bcom zag pa zad/ /'dod chags bral ba dbang po thul/ /
bde ba rnyed pa 'jigs med thob/ /bsil bar gyur pa gos pa med/ /rig pa dang ni rkang par ldan/ /bde gshegs 'jig rten rig pa mchog /bdag gir mi 'dzin ngar mi 'dzin/ /bden pa gnyis kyi tshul la
gnas/ /'khor ba'i pha rol mthar gnas pa/ /bya ba byas pa skam sar gnas/ /ye shes 'ba' zhig nges 'byung ba/ /shes rab mtshon chas rnam 'joms pa/ /dam chos chos rgyal gsal bar ldan/ /
'jig rten snang bar byed pa'i mchog /chos kyi dbang phyug chos kyi rgyal/ /legs pa'i lam ni ston pa po/ /don grub grub pa'i kun rtog ni/ /kun tu rtog pa thams cad spangs/ /rnam par mi rtog dbyings mi
zad/ /chos dbyings dam pa zad pa med/ /bsod nams ldan pa bsod nams tshogs/ /ye shes ye shes 'byung gnas che/ /ye shes ldan pa yod med shes/ /tshogs gnyis tshogs dang yang dag ldan/ /rtag par kun

rgyal rnal 'byor can/ /bsam gtan bsam bya blo yi bdag /so so rang rig mi g.yo ba/ /mchog gi dang po sku gsum 'chang / /sangs rgyas sku lnga'i bdag nyid can/ /khyab bdag ye shes lnga yi bdag /sangs rgyas lnga

bdag cod pan can/ /spyan lnga chags pa med pa 'chang / /sangs rgyas thams cad bskyed pa po/ /sangs rgyas sras po dam pa mchog /shes rab srid 'byung skye gnas te/ /chos kyi skye gnas srid mthar byed/ /gcig

pu sra mkhregs rdo rje'i bdag /'phral du bskyed pa 'gro ba'i bdag /nam mkha' las byung rang byung ba/ /shes rab ye shes me bo che/ /'od chen rnam par snang bar byed/ /ye shes snang ba lam me ba/ /'gro ba'i mar me
ye shes sgron/ /gzi brjid chen po 'od gsal ba/ /rig pa'i rgyal mchog sngags dbang po/ /gsang sngags rgyal po don chen byed/ /gtsug tor chen po rmad byung gtsug /nam mkha'i bdag po sna tshogs ston/ /

sangs rgyas kun bdag dngos po mchog /'gro ba dga' ba'i mig dang ldan/ /sna tshogs gzugs can bskyed pa po/ /mchod 'os rjed 'os drang srong che/ /rigs gsum 'chang ba gsang sngags ldan/ /dam tshig chen po

gsang sngags 'dzin/ /gtso bo dkon mchog gsum 'dzin pa/ /theg pa gsum mchog ston pa po/ /don yod zhags pa rnam par rgyal/ /'dzin pa chen po rdo rje zhags/ /rdo rje lcags kyu zhags pa che/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa

chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyi tshigs su bcad pa rkang pas dman pa nyi shu rtsa lnga'o// //rdo rje 'jigs byed 'jigs par byed/ /khro bo'i rgyal po gdong drug 'jigs/ /mig drug lag drug stobs dang ldan/ /keng rus mche ba gtsigs pa po/ /

ha la ha la gdong brgya pa/ /gshen rje mthar byed bgegs kyi rgyal/ /rdo rje shugs can 'jigs byed pa/ /rdo rje grags pa rdo rje'i snying / /sgyu 'phrul rdo rje gsus po che/ /rdo rje'i skye gnas rdo rje'i dbang / /rdo rje snying po mkha' 'dra ba/ /mi g.yo ral pa

gcig bsgyings pa/ /glang chen lpags pa rlon pa 'chang / /drag chen hA hA zhes sgrogs pa/ /hI hI zhes sgrogs 'jigs par byed/ /gad mo chen po gad rgyangs can/ /rdo rje gad mo cher sgrogs pa/ /rdo rje sems dpa' sems

dpa' che/ /rdo rje rgyal po bde ba che/ /rdo rje gtum po dga' ba che/ /rdo rje hU~M mdzad hU~M gi gzugs/ /rdo rje mda' yi mtshon 'chang ba/ /rdo rje ral gris gcod mdzad pa/ /rdo rje kun 'chang rdo rje can/ /rdo rje gcig pu g.yul

sel ba/ /rdo rje 'bar ba gtsig pa'i mig /mgo skyes rdo rje 'bar ba ste/ /rdo rje 'bebs pa 'bebs pa che/ /mig brgya pa ste rdo rje'i mig /rdo rje'i spu ni myug gu lus/ /rdo rje'i spu ni lus gcig pu/ /rdo rje rtse mo sen mos brtsams/ /

rdo rje snying po lpags pa mkhregs/ /rdo rje phreng thogs dpal dang ldan/ /rdo rje rgyan gyis brgyan pa ste/ /gad rgyangs hA hA nges par sgrogs/ /yi ge drug pa rdo rje'i sgra/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs ni sgra che ba/ /'jig rten gsum gcig

sgra chen po/ /nam mkha'i khams kyi mthar thug sgra/ /sgra dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog /me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi tshigs su bcad pa rkang pa dang bcas pa bcu'o// //yang dag bdag med de bzhin nyid/ /yang dag mtha'

ste yi ge med/ /stong nyid smra ba'i khyu mchog ste/ /zab cing rgya che'i sgra sgrogs pa/ /chos kyi dung ste sgra chen po/ /chos kyi gaN DI sgra bo che/ /rab tu mi gnas mya ngan 'das/ /phyogs bcu chos kyi rnga bo che/ /gzugs med
gzugs ldan dam pa ste/ /sna tshogs gzugs can yid rang bzhin/ /gzugs rnams thams cad snang ba'i dpal/ /gzugs brnyan ma lus 'chang ba po/ /snang ba med cing che bar grags/ /khams

gsum dbang phyug chen po ste/ /'phags lam shin tu mtho la gnas/ /chos kyi tog ni cher 'byung ba/ /'jig rten gsum po gcig gzhon lus/ /gnas brtan rgan po skye dgu'i bdag /sum bcu rtsa gnyis mtshan 'chang ba/ /
sdug gu 'jig rten gsum na mdzes/ /slob dpon 'jig rten yon tan shes/ /'jig rten slob dpon 'jigs pa med/ /mgon skyob 'jig rten gsum khyab pa/ /skyabs dang skyob pa bla na med/ /nam mkha' khyab par

longs spyod pa/ /thams cad mkhyen pa ye shes mtsho/ /ma rig sgo nga'i sbubs 'byed pa/ /srid pa'i dra ba 'joms pa po/ /nyon mongs ma lus zhi byed pa/ /'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i pha rol son/ /ye shes dbang bskur cod pan can/ /
yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyan/ /sdug bsngal gsum gyi sdug bsngal zhi/ /gsum mtha' mtha' yas grol gsum pa/ /sgrib pa thams cad nges par grol/ /mkha' ltar mnyam pa nyid la gnas/ /nyon mongs
dri ma kun las 'das/ /dus gsum dus med rtogs par gnas/ /sems can kun gyi klu chen po/ /yon tan thod can rnams kyi thod/ /lhag ma kun las rnam grol ba/ /nam mkha'i lam la rab gnas pa/ /
yid bzhin nor bu chen po 'chang / /khyab bdag rin chen kun gyi mchog /dpag bsam shing chen rgyas pa ste/ /bum pa bzang po che ba'i mchog /byed pa sems can kun don byed/ /phan 'dogs sems can
mnyes gshin pa/ /bzang ngan shes shing dus shes pa/ /khyab bdag dam shes dam tshig ldan/ /dus shes sems can dbang po shes/ /rnam grol gsum la mkhas pa po/ /yon tan ldan zhing yon tan shes/ /
chos shes rab zhi bkra shis 'byung / /bkra shis kun gyi bkra shis pa/ /grags pa dpal mo snyan pa dge/ /dbugs 'byin chen po dga' ston che/ /dga' ba chen po rol pa che/ /bkur sti rim gro phun sum
tshogs/ /rab tu dga' ba grags bdag dpal/ /mchog ldan mchog sbyin gtso bo ste/ /skyabs kyi dam pa skyabs su 'os/ /rab mchog 'jigs pa chen po'i dgra/ /'jigs pa ma lus sel ba po/ /gtsug

phud phud pu ral pa can/ /rol pa mgo reg cod pan ldan/ /gdong lnga gtsug phud lnga dang ldan/ /zur phud lnga dang ldan pa'i thod/ /mgo zlum brtul zhugs chen po 'chang / /tshangs par spyod pa brtul zhugs mchog /

dka' thub mthar phyin dka' thub che/ /khrus ldan go'u ta ma mchog /bram ze tshangs pa tshangs pa rig /tshangs par mya ngan 'das pa thob/ /grol ba thar pa rnam grol lus/ /rnam grol zhi ba zhi ba nyid/ /mya ngan
'das zhi mya ngan 'das/ /legs par nges 'byung mthar byed pa/ /bde dang sdug bsngal mthar byed gnas/ /'dod chags bral ba brtags pa zad/ /thub pa med pa dpe med pa/ /gsal min mi snang gos pa med/ /

cha med kun 'gro khyab pa po/ /phra mo sa bon zag pa med/ /rdul med rdul bral dri ma med/ /nyes pa spangs pa skyon med pa/ /shin du rab sad rnam sad bdag /thams cad ye shes kun rig mchog /rnam par shes
pa'i chos nyid 'das/ /ye shes gnyis med tshul 'chang ba/ /rnam par rtog med lhun gyis grub/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas las byed pa/ /sangs rgyas thog ma tha ma med/ /dang po'i sangs rgyas ris med pa/ /
ye shes mig gcig dri ma med/ /ye shes lus can de bzhin gshegs/ /tshig gi dbang phyug smra ba che/ /smra ba'i skyes mchog smra ba'i rgyal/ /smra ba'i dam pa mchog gi gnas/ /smra ba'i seng ge

thub pa med/ /kun du lta ba mchog tu dga'/ /gzi brjid phreng ldan blta na sdug /'od bzang 'bar ba dpal gyi be'u/ /snang ba gsal bar byed pa'i 'od/ /sman pa che mchog gtso bo ste/ /zug rngu 'byin pa bla na

med/ /sman rnams ma lus ljon pa'i shing / /nyon mongs nad kyi dgra che ba/ /sdug gu 'jig rten gsum gyi mchog /dpal ldan rgyu skar dkyil 'khor can/ /phyogs bcu nam mkha'i mthar thug pa/ /chos kyi rgyal mtshan

chen po bsgreng / /'gro ba'i gdugs gcig yangs pa ste/ /byams dang snying rje'i dkyil 'khor can/ /dpal ldan pad+ma gar dbang phyug /khyab bdag chen po rin chen gdugs/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rgyal po che/ /

sangs rgyas kun bdag dngos po 'dzin/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rnal 'byor che/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi bstan pa gcig /rdo rje rin chen dbang bskur dpal/ /rin chen kun bdag dbang phyug ste/ /'jig rten dbang phyug kun

gyi bdag /rdo rje kun 'chang mnga' bdag ste/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs che ba/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs la gnas/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi sku che ba/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi mtsho dang ldan/ /rdo rje nyi ma snang ba che/ /rdo rje zla ba dri

med 'od/ /chags bral dang po chags pa che/ /kha dog sna tshogs 'bar ba'i 'od/ /rdo rje skyil dkrung rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /sangs rgyas brjod pa'i chos 'dzin pa/ /dpal ldan sangs rgyas pad+ma skyes/ /kun mkhyen ye

shes mdzod 'dzin pa/ /rgyal po sgyu 'phrul sna tshogs 'chang / /che ba sangs rgyas rig pa 'chang / /rdo rje rnon po ral gri che/ /rnam par dag pa 'gyur med mchog /theg pa chen po sdug bsngal gcod/ /mtshon cha chen po

rdo rje chos/ /rdo rje zab mo dzi na dzig /rdo rje blo gros don bzhin rig /pha rol phyin pa kun rdzogs pa/ /sa rnams thams cad rnam par brgyan/ /rnam par dag pa bdag med chos/ /yang dag ye shes zla 'od bzang / /

sgyu 'phrul dra ba rnal 'byor che/ /rgyud kun gyi ni bdag po mchog /ma lus rdo rje dkyil dkrung ste/ /ye shes sku rnams ma lus 'chang / /kun tu bzang po blo gros bzang / /sa yi snying po 'gro ba 'dzin/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi

snying po che/ /sna tshogs sprul pa'i 'khor lo 'chang / /dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin mchog /dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin 'dzin/ /skye med chos te sna tshogs don/ /chos kun ngo bo nyid 'chang ba/ /skad cig gcig la shes rab ches/ /

chos kun khong du chud pa 'chang / /chos kun mngon par rtogs pa ste/ /thub pa blo mchog yang dag mtha'/ /mi g.yo rab tu dang ba'i bdag /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byang chub 'chang / /sangs rgyas kun gyi mngon
sum pa/ /ye shes me lce 'od rab gsal/ /so sor gzigs pa'i ye shes kyi tshigs su bcad pa bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis so// //'dod pa'i don grub dam pa ste/ /ngan song thams cad rnam sbyong ba/ /mgon po sems
can kun gyi mchog /sems can thams cad rab grol byed/ /nyon mongs g.yul du gcig dpa' ba/ /mi shes dgra yi dregs pa 'joms/ /blo ni sgeg 'chang dpal dang ldan/ /dpa' bo mi sdug gzugs 'chang ba/ /
lag pa'i dbyug pa brgya bskyod cing / /rkang pa bskyod pas gar byed pa/ /dpal ldan lag pa brgyas gang la/ /nam mkha' khyab par gar byed pa/ /rkang pa gcig gis mthil gnon pa/ /sa yi snying
po'i mthil la gnas/ /tshangs pa'i sgo nga'i rtse mo gnon/ /rkang mtheb sen mo la gnas pa/ /don gcig gnyis med chos kyi don/ /dam pa'i don de 'jig pa med/ /rnam rig sna tshogs rang bzhin don/ /

sems dang rnam shes rgyud dang ldan/ /dngos po ma lus don dga' ba/ /stong pa nyid dga' 'dod chags blo/ /srid pa'i 'dod chags la sogs 'das/ /srid pa gsum po dga' ba che/ /dag pa sprin dkar bzhin du dkar/ /
'od bzang ston ka'i zla ba'i 'od/ /nyi ma 'char ka'i dkyil 'khor mdzes/ /'dod chags chen po sen mo'i 'od/ /zur phud bzang po mthon ka'i mchog /skra mchog mthon ka chen po 'chang / /

nor bu chen po 'od chags dpal/ /sangs rgyas sprul pa'i rgyan dang ldan/ /'jig rten khams brgya kun bskyod pa/ /rdzu 'phrul rkang pa stobs chen ldan/ /de nyid dran pa chen po 'chang / /dran pa bzhi po ting 'dzin rgyal/ /
byang chub yan lag me tog dga'/ /de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mtsho/ /lam gyi yan lag brgyad tshul rig /yang dag sangs rgyas lam rig pa/ /sems can kun la shas cher chags/ /nam mkha' lta bur chags

pa med/ /sems can kun gyi yid las skyes/ /sems can kun gyi yid ltar mgyogs/ /sems can kun gyi dbang don shes/ /sems can kun gyi yid 'phrog pa/ /phung po lnga don de nyid shes/ /rnam dag phung po lnga 'chang
ba/ /thams cad nges 'byung mtha' la gnas/ /thams cad nges par 'byung ba mkhas/ /thams cad nges 'byung lam la gnas/ /thams cad nges 'byung ston pa po/ /yan lag bcu gnyis srid rtsa bton/ /dag pa rnam

pa bcu gnyis 'chang / /bden bzhi'i tshul gyi rnam pa can/ /shes pa brgyad po rtogs pa 'chang / /bde don rnam pa bcu gnyis ldan/ /de nyid rnam pa bcu drug rig /rnam pa nyi shus byang chub pa/ /rnam par sangs
rgyas kun rig mchog /dpag med sangs rgyas sprul pa yi/ /sku ni bye ba 'gyed pa po/ /skad cig thams cad mngon par rtogs/ /sems kyi skad cig don kun rig /theg pa sna tshogs thabs tshul gyis/ /

'gro ba'i don gyi rnam dbye can/ /theg pa gsum gyi nges 'byung ni/ /theg pa gcig gi 'bras bur gnas/ /nyon mongs khams rnams dag pa'i bdag /las kyi khams rnams zad byed pa/ /chu bo'i rgya mtsho kun las brgal/ /

sbyor ba'i dgon pa las byung ba/ /nyon mongs nye nyon kun nyon mongs/ /bag chags bcas pa rab spangs pa/ /snying rje chen po shes rab thabs/ /don yod 'gro ba'i don byed pa/ /'du shes thams cad rab spangs don/ /rnam
shes don ni 'gog pa 'chang / /sems can kun gyi yid kyi yul/ /sems can kun gyi yid gnas pa/ /sems can kun gyi yid nang gnas/ /de dag sems dang mnyam nyid son/ /sems can kun yid tshim par byed/ /sems

can kun gyi yid dga' ba/ /grub mtha' 'khrul pa ldan pa min/ /'khrul pa thams cad rnam par spangs/ /don gsum the tsom med pa'i blo/ /kun don yon tan gsum gyi bdag /dus gsum phung po lnga yi don/ /skad cig

thams cad rnam bsgom pa/ /skad cig gcig mngon rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin 'chang / /lus med sku ste sku yi mchog /sku ni bye ba rnam par 'gyed/ /gzugs rnams ma lus kun tu ston/ /nor bu chen

po rin chen tog /mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi tshigs su bcad pa nyi shu rtsa bzhi'o// //sangs rgyas kun gyis rtogs bya ba/ /sangs rgyas byang chub bla na med/ /gsang sngags skye gnas yi ge med/ /gsang sngags chen po

rigs gsum pa/ /gsang sngags don kun skyed pa po/ /thig le chen po yi ge med/ /stong pa chen po yi ge lnga/ /thig le stong pa yi ge drug /rnam pa thams cad rnam pa med/ /bcu drug phyed phyed thig le 'chang / /cha med cha ldan

las 'das pa/ /bsam gtan bzhi pa'i rtse mo 'chang / /bsam gtan yan lag kun shes shing / /ting 'dzin rigs dang rgyud rig pa/ /ting 'dzin sku ste sku yi mchog /longs spyod rdzogs sku kun gyi rgyal/ /sprul pa'i sku

ste sku yi mchog /sangs rgyas sprul pa'i rgyud 'chang ba/ /phyogs bcur sprul pa sna tshogs 'gyed/ /ji bzhin 'gro ba'i don byed pa/ /lha yi dbang po lha yi lha/ /lha min dbang po sbyin byed bdag /lha yi bla ma 'chi med
dbang / /rab 'joms rab 'joms dbang phyug go/ /srid pa'i dgon pa las brgal ba/ /ston pa gcig pu 'gro ba'i bla/ /'jig rten phyogs bcur rab grags pa/ /chos kyi sbyin bdag che ba po/ /byams pa'i go
cha chas pa ste/ /snying rje yi ni ya lad bgos/ /shes rab ral gri mda' gzhu thogs/ /nyon mongs mi shes g.yul ngo sel/ /dpa' bo bdud dgra bdud 'dul ba/ /bdud bzhi'i 'jigs pa mthar byed pa/ /

bdud dpung thams cad pham par byed/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten 'dren/ /mchod 'os bstod 'os phyag gi gnas/ /rtag tu rim gro bya ba'i 'os/ /bkur 'os rjed par bya ba'i 'os/ /phyag byar 'os pa bla ma'i mchog /
'jig rten gsum po gom gcig bgrod/ /mkha' ltar mtha' med rnam par gnon/ /gsum rig gtsang ma dag pa ste/ /mngon shes drug ldan rjes dran drug /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po

'jig rten 'das/ /shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i mtha'/ /shes rab kyi ni de nyid thob/ /bdag rig gzhan rig thams cad pa/ /kun la phan pa'i gang zag mchog /'jig rten dpe las 'das pa ste/ /shes dang shes bya'i

bdag po mchog /gtso bo chos kyi sbyin pa'i bdag /phyag rgya bzhi po'i don ston pa/ /'gro ba'i bsnyen bkur gnas kyi mchog /nges 'byung gsum po bgrod rnams kyi/ /don gyi dam pa rnam dag dpal/ /'jig rten gsum gyi

skal bzang che/ /dpal ldan 'byor pa kun byed pa/ /'jam dpal dpal dang ldan pa'i mchog /bya ba grub pa'i ye shes kyi tshigs su bcad pa bcwa lnga'o// //mchog sbyin rdo rje mchog khyod 'dud/ /yang dag mthar gyur khyod la 'dud/ /

stong nyid snying po khyod la 'dud/ /sangs rgyas byang chub khyod la 'dud/ /sangs rgyas chags pa khyod la 'dud/ /sangs rgyas 'dod la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /sangs rgyas dgyes pa khyod la 'dud/ /sangs rgyas rol la phyag 'tshal

'dud/ /sangs rgyas 'dzum pa khyod la 'dud/ /sangs rgyas snang ba phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /sangs rgyas gsung ba khyod la 'dud/ /sangs rgyas thugs la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /dngos med las byung khyod la 'dud/ /sangs rgyas 'byung ba khyod

la 'dud/ /nam mkha' las byung khyod la 'dud/ /ye shes las byung khyod la 'dud/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba khyod la 'dud/ /sangs rgyas gar mdzad khyod la 'dud/ /thams cad thams cad khyod la 'dud/ /ye shes sku khyod la 'dud do/ /

zhes pa de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i ye shes kyi bstod pa tshigs su bcad pa lnga'o// //lag na rdo rje rdo rje 'chang / /'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyi ye shes kyi sku dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi sku dang / 'jam dpal ye

shes sems dpa'i ma 'dres pa yongs su dag pa'i mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'o/ /khyod kyi bla na med pa'i dga' ba dang rab tu dang ba dang mgu ba chen po yang dag par bskyed pa'i don dang / sku dang gsungs dang thugs kyi gsang ba yongs su dag pa'i

phyir dang / yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang / yongs su ma dag pa'i sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa dang bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs pa dang / yongs su dag pa'i phyir dang / bla na med pa'i don lhag par ma rtogs pa lhag par

rtogs pa'i phyir dang / ma thob pa thob pa'i phyir dang / ji srid de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam pa'i chos kyi tshul yang dag par gzung ba'i don du yang bdag gis bstan pa dang / yang dag par rab tu bshad pa dang / rnam par

bkrol ba dang / rnam par phye ba dang / rab tu gsal bar byas pa dang / byin gyis brlabs pa'o/ /lag na rdo rje rdo rje 'chang / 'di ni ngas khyod kyi rgyud la sngags kyi chos nyid thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byin

gyis brlabs pa'o/ /'di ni 'khor lo dang po'i rjes su bsngags pa bcu gcig go/ /gzhan yang lag na rdo rje rdo rje 'chang / mtshan yang dag par brjod pa 'di ni shin tu yongs su dag pa/ yongs su byang ba thams cad

mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang bar gyur pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi byang chub pa'o/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi mngon par rtogs pa'o/ /

de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bla na med pa'o/ /bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi dbyings rtogs pa'o/ /rgyal ba rnams kyi bdud kyi stobs thams cad pham par byed pa'o/ /stobs bcu dang ldan pa thams cad kyi stobs

bcu'i stobs su gyur pa'o/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rnams kyi thams cad mkhyen pa'o/ /chos thams cad kyi lung ngo / /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yang dag par kun chub pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen

po thams cad kyi dri ma med pa shin tu yongs su dag pa bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs pa'o/ /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rab tu skye ba'o/ /lha dang mi thams cad kyi phun sum tshogs pa'i

zhing ngo / /theg pa chen po'i rab tu gnas pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i 'byung khung ngo / /'phags pa'i lam yang dag pa'i mthar thug pa'o/ /rnam par grol ba rnams kyi rtag pa'o/ /nges par 'byung ba'i lam gyi

bskyed pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung gi rgyun mi 'chad pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i rigs dang rgyud rab tu 'phel ba'o/ /pha rol gyi rgol ba thams cad kyi tshar gcod pa'o/ /mu stegs pa thams cad kyi

rnam par 'joms pa'o/ /bdud bzhi'i stobs dang dpung dang sde rnams kyi pham par byed pa'o/ /sems can thams cad kyi yang dag par sdud pa'o/ /nges par 'byung bas bgrod pa thams cad kyi 'phags pa'i lam yongs

su smin pa'o/ /tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi la gnas pa rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin to/ /sems rtse gcig pa rnams kyi bsam gtan no/ /lus dang ngag dang yid mngon par sbyor ba rnams kyi rnal 'byor ro/ /yang dag par sbyor ba thams

cad kyi kun du sbyor ba dang bral ba'o/ /nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi spong ba'o/ /sgrib pa thams cad kyi nye bar zhi ba'o/ /'ching ba thams cad kyi rnam par grol ba'o/ /lhag ma thams cad kyi thar pa'o/ /

sems nye bar 'phro ba thams cad kyi zhi ba'o/ /'byor pa thams cad kyi 'byung gnas so/ /rgud pa thams cad kyi rab tu 'joms pa'o/ /ngan song gi sgo thams cad kyi 'gebs pa'o/ /rnam par grol ba'i grong khyer gyi lam

dam pa'o/ /'khor ba'i 'khor lo yi rab tu mi 'jug pa'o/ /chos kyi 'khor lo yi rab tu bskor ba'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa'i gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan rab tu bsgreng pa'o/ /dam pa'i chos ston pa'i

lhag par gnas pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sngags kyi sgo'i spyad pa spyod pa rnams kyi myur du grub pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par sbyor ba rnams kyi sgom pa lhag par rtogs pa'o/ /gnyis su med pa so

sor rtogs pa sgom pa mngon par sbyor ba rnams kyi stong pa nyid so sor rtogs pa'o/ /pha rol tu phyin pa dang tshogs thams cad kyi bskyed pa'o/ /yongs su dag pa'i sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi yongs su rdzogs pa'o/ /

yang dag pa'i 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po rnams kyi so sor rtogs pa'o/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi po rnams kyi chos thams cad gcig pa'i so sor rtogs pa'o/ /mtshan yang dag par brjod pa 'di ni ji srid sangs rgyas kyi

yon tan thams cad kyi yongs su rdzogs pa'i bar ro/ /'di ni 'khor lo gnyis pa'i rjes su bsngags pa lnga bcu rtsa gnyis so// //gzhan yang lag na rdo rje rdo rje 'chang / mtshan yang dag par brjod pa 'di ni sems can

thams cad kyi lus dang ngag dang yid kyi kun tu spyad pa'i sdig pa ma lus pa rab tu zhi bar byed pa'o/ /sems can thams cad kyi ngan song thams cad rnam par sbyong ba'o/ /ngan 'gro thams cad zlog pa'o/ /las kyi sgrib pa thams cad

yang dag par gcod pa'o/ /mi khom pa brgyad du skye bar 'gyur ba thams cad kyi mi skye bar byed pa'o/ /'jigs pa chen po brgyad nye bar zhi bar byed pa'o/ /rmi lam ngan pa thams cad nges par sel bar byed pa'o/ /

mtshan ma ngan pa thams cad rnam par sel bar byed pa'o/ /ltas ngan pa dang bgegs thams cad nye bar zhi bar byed pa'o/ /bdud kyi dgra'i las thams cad thag ring du byed pa'o/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba dang bsod nams thams cad

nye bar 'phel bar byed pa'o/ /tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i yid la byed pa thams cad mi skye bar byed pa'o/ /rgyags pa dang nga rgyal dang dregs pa dang ngar 'dzin pa thams cad nges par 'joms par byed pa'o/ /sdug bsngal dang

yid mi bde ba thams cad mi skye bar byed pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying por gyur pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi gsang bar gyur pa'o/ /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang chen du gyur

pa'o/ /phyag rgya dang sngags thams cad du gyur pa'o/ /chos thams cad brjod du med par smra ba rnams kyi dran pa dang shes bzhin yang dag par skyed pa'o/ /bla na med pa'i shes rab dang yid gzhungs par byed pa'o/ /nad med pa dang

stobs dang dbang phyug phun sum tshogs par byed pa'o/ /dpal dang dge ba dang zhi ba dang / legs pa rab tu 'phel bar byed pa'o/ /grags pa dang snyan pa dang tshigs su bcad pa dang bstod pa rab tu gsal bar byed pa'o/ /

nad dang 'jigs pa chen po thams cad nye bar zhi bar byed pa'o/ /shin du dag pa rnams kyi shin du dag pa'o/ /shin du gtsang ba rnams kyi shin du gtsang ba'o/ /shin du 'byor ldan rnams kyi shin du 'byor ldan no/ /shin du

bkra shis pa rnams kyi shin du bkra shis pa'o/ /skyabs 'dod pa rnams kyi skyabs so/ /gnas med pa rnams kyi gnas so/ /skyob pa 'dod pa rnams kyi skyob pa'o/ /dpung gnyen med pa rnams kyi dpung gnyen no/ /

gling 'dod pa rnams kyi gling du gyur pa'o/ /rten med pa rnams kyi bla na med pa'i rten du gyur pa'o/ /srid pa'i rgya mtsho'i pha rol du 'gro ba rnams kyi grur gyur pa'o/ /nad thams cad nges par 'joms pa'i phyir sman pa'i rgyal po

chen por gyur pa'o/ /blang bar bya ba dang dor bar bya ba'i dngos po rnam par dbye ba'i phyir shes rab tu gyur pa'o/ /lta ba ngan pa'i mun pa'i smag rum thams cad bsal ba'i phyir ye shes kyi snang bar gyur pa'o/ /sems can

thams cad kyi bsam pa dang / 'dod pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir yid bzhin gyi nor bur gyur pa'o/ /'jam dpal gyi ye shes kyi sku rab tu thob pa'i phyir thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes su gyur pa'o/ /

spyan lnga rab tu thob pa'i phyir yongs su dag pa'i ye shes gzigs par gyur pa'o/ /zang zing dang mi 'jigs pa dang chos kyi sbyin pa rab tu gtong ba nyid kyis pha rol du phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa'o/ /

bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs dang ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs pa nyid kyis sa bcu rab tu thob par gyur pa'o/ /gnyis kyi chos dang bral ba'i phyir gnyis su med pa'i chos nyid do/ /lhag par sgro 'dogs pa dang bral

ba nyid kyi phyir de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin dang gzhan ma yin pa'i chos nyid do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi sku yongs su dag pa'i rang bzhin nyid kyis yang dag pa'i mtha'i rang bzhin nyid do/ /lta ba ngan

pa'i tshang tshing ma lus pa nges par sel ba nyid kyis rnam pa thams cad chen po stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin nyid do/ /mtshan yang dag par brjod pa 'di ni 'di ltar gnyis su med pa'i chos nyid kyi don dang ming yang dag par 'dzin pa rab

tu gsal bar byed pa nyid kyis chos thams cad brjod du med par gyur pa'o/ /'di ni 'khor lo gsum pa'i rjes su bsngags pa lnga bcu rtsa gnyis so// //gzhan yang lag na rdo rje rdo rje 'chang / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi
bu mo gang la la sngags kyi sgo'i spyad pa spyod pas/ bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i ye shes kyi sku/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi sku gnyis su med pa don dam

pa'i mtshan yang dag par brjod pa/ gtsug gi nor bu zhes bya ba 'di mtha' dag yongs su rdzogs pa/ ma tshang ba med pa/ dum bu ma yin pa/ tshigs su bcad pa dang / tshig dang yi ge 'di rnams nyid kyis nyi ma so sor

dus gsum du 'dzin par byed pa dang / brjod par byed pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin yid la byed pa dang / gzhan rnams la yang dus ji lta bar rgyas par ji lta ba bzhin rab tu gsal bar byed pa dang /

mtshan gyi don gzhan dang gzhan re re zhing yang 'jam dpal ye shes kyi sku mngon du byas te/ yid rtse gcig pas sgom par byed pa dang / lhag par mos pa dang / de kho na yid la byed pa dag gis kun nas sgo'i gnas pas
gnas pa dang / chos thams cad so sor rtogs pa dang / mchog tu gyur pa dang / rnyog pa med pa dang / shes rab kyis rjes su 'bigs pa dang / dad pas yang dag par bgrod pa de la ni/ dus gsum du dus med

par sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad yang dag par 'dus te/ yang dag par gshegs shing yang dag par byon nas chos thams cad kyi sgo rnams nye bar ston par 'gyur ro/ /bdag nyid bsgom pa nye bar

ston par byed do/ /sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis kyang lus dang ngag dang yid kyi rgyud la yang dag par byin gyis rlob par byed do/ /sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'

thams cad kyi rjes su 'dzin pas kyang rjes su 'dzin par byed do/ /chos thams cad la mi 'jigs pa'i spobs pa yang nye bar sgrub par byed do/ /dgra bcom pa dang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyang 'phags

pa'i chos la sdug pa'i bsam pa nyid kyis bdag gi dngos po yang nye bar ston par byed do/ /gdul dka' ba 'dul ba po rnams kyang khro bo'i rgyal po chen po dang / rdo rje 'chang chen po la sogs pa 'gro ba yongs su skyob par

gyur pa gzugs sna tshogs pa'i sprul pa'i sku rnams kyis mdangs dang stobs dang gzi brjid zil gyis mi gnon pa nyid dang / sngags dang phyag rgya dang mngon par rtogs pa dang dkyil 'khor rnams nye bar ston par byed do/ /

sngags dang rig pa'i rgyal po ma lus pa dang / bgegs dang log 'dren dang bdud dang dgra phyir rgol ba dang gzhan gyis mi thub pa chen po thams cad kyang / mtshan mo dang nyin mor bcas par skad cig so sor spyod lam

dang lam rnams su yang / bsrung ba dang bskyab pa dang / sbed pa byed do/ /tshangs pa dang dbang po dang / nye dbang po dang / drag po dang / sred med kyi bu dang / kun 'gyed gzhon nu dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / smin

drug gi bu dang / nag po chen po dang / dga' byed dbang phyug dang / gshen rje dang / chu lha dang / lus ngan dang / 'phrog ma dang / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten skyong ba gang yin pa de rnams thams cad kyang rtag par rgyun

du mtshan mo dang / nyin mor bcas pa 'gro ba dang / gnas pa dang nyal ba dang 'dug pa dang / gnyid log pa dang / gnyid sad pa dang / mnyam par bzhag pa dang / mnyam par ma bzhag pa dang / gcig pur gnas

pa dang / skye bo mang po'i nang du son pa dang / ji srid grong dang grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang na gnas pa dang / dbang po'i phur pa dang / sgo khang dang /

lam srang dang / srang dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo dang / grong khyer gyi bar dang / tshong khang gi nang du gnas pa dang / ji srid khang stong dang / ri dang dgon pa dang / chu klung dang / dur khrod dang / nags tshang tshing du nye bar

son pa dang / 'bags pa dang / ma 'bags pa dang / myos pa dang / rab tu myos pa na rtag tu thams cad kyi tshe rnam pa thams cad du mchog tu bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sbed pa byed par 'gyur ro/ /

nyin mo dang mtshan mo mchog tu bde legs su byed par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang gang lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang

mi ma yin pa rnams dang / gzhan yang gang gza' dang rgyu skar dang ma mo dang / tshogs kyi bdag po rnams dang / gang yang ma mo bdun po rnams dang / gang yang gnod sbyin mo dang srin mo dang sha za mo rnams te/ de rnams

thams cad lhan cig mthun par sde dang bcas pa/ 'khor dang bcas pa rnams kyis/ spyod lam dang lam rnams su yang mchog tu bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba byed par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang de'i lus la

mdangs dang stobs rab tu 'jug par byed do/ /nad med pa dang / stobs dang / tshe 'phel ba yang nye bar bsgrub par byed do/ /'di ni 'khor lo bzhi pa'i rjes su bsngags pa bcu dgu pa'o// //gzhan yang lag na rdo rje rdo rje 'chang /

mtshan yang dag par brjod pa gtsug gi nor bu zhes bya ba 'di ni nyi ma so sor ma nyam pa yang dag par blangs te/ mgrin par gnas pa lan gsum du kha ton du byed pa dang / glegs bam du chud pa klog par byed pa dang / rab tu
'don par byed pa dang / bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i gzugs la dmigs te/ de'i gzugs kyi rjes su sems par byed pa dang / de'i gzugs kyi rjes su bsam gtan byed pas de nyid sprul pa'i

gzugs kyi sku yis yun mi ring ba nyid las gdul bya'i dbang nye bar bzung nas mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sna tshogs pa'i sprul pa'i gzugs kyi sku dang / lhan cig gnas pa nam mkha'i

mthil na bzhugs pa rnams kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /sems dpa' chen po de'i skye ba ji ltar gyur kyang ngan 'gro dang / ngan song du ltung ba'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rig ngan du skye bar mi 'gyur ro/ /yul mtha' 'khob

kyi skye bor skye bar mi 'gyur ro/ /dbang po dman par mi 'gyur ro/ /dbang po ma tshang bar mi 'gyur ro/ /log par lta ba'i rigs su skye bar mi 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas mi bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su skye

bar mi 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang des bstan pa'i chos spong ba dang lkog tu gyur par mi 'gyur ro/ /lha tshe ring po rnams su skye bar mi 'gyur ro/ /mu ge dang nad dang mtshon gyi bskal pa rnams la skye bar mi 'gyur ro/ /

snying ma lnga'i dus rnams la skye bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po dang chom rkun dang dgra'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rgud pa dang dbul ba'i 'jigs pa thams cad 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /mi bsngags pa dang /

skur pa 'debs pa dang / smod pa dang / mi snyan pa dang / grags pa ngan pa'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /skye ba bzang po dang rigs dang rus phun sum tshogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /kun nas mdzes

par gyur pa dang / gzugs dang kha dog dang yang dag par ldan par 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten pa rnams kyi sdug pa dang / yid la 'bab pa dang / 'grogs na mchog tu bde ba dang / mthong na dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten pa

rnams kyi mdzes pa dang / skal pa bzang po dang ldan pa dang / tshig gzung bar bya bar 'gyur ro/ /gang dang gang du skye bar 'gyur ba de dang der skye ba dran par 'gyur ro/ /longs spyod che ba dang / 'khor mang ba dang / longs spyod

mi zad pa dang / 'khor mi zad par 'gyur ro/ /sems can thams cad kyi mchog tu gyur pa'i smon lam dang ye shes dang yang dag par ldan par 'gyur ro/ /rang bzhin gyis kyang pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi yon tan dang yang dag
par ldan par 'gyur ro/ /tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi la gnas par 'gyur ro/ /dran pa dang shes bzhin dang / thabs dang stobs dang smon lam dang ye shes dang yang dag par ldan par 'gyur ro/ /bstan bcos

thams cad la 'jigs pa med pa dang / smra mkhas par yang 'gyur ro/ /tshig gsal ba dang blun po ma yin pa dang / blo gsal bar 'gyur ro/ /mkhas pa dang le lo med pa dang / chog shes pa dang / don che ba dang /

sred pa med par 'gyur ro/ /sems can thams cad kyi mchog tu yid brtan par bya ba dang / slob dpon dang / bla ma bkur bar bya bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i sngon ma thos pa'i bzo dang rtsis dang shes pa dang / bstan

bcos thams cad kyang don dang gzhung las rab tu gsal bar yang dag par rtogs par 'gyur ro/ /shin du yongs su dag pa'i tshul khrims dang / 'tsho ba dang / kun du spyod pa spyod pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /legs

par rab tu 'byung ba dang / legs par bsnyen par rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / byang chub kyi sems rab tu brjed pa med par 'gyur ro/ /nyan thos dang dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi nges

pa dang / bgrod pa la gnas par nam yang mi 'gyur ro/ /'di ni 'khor lo lnga pa'i rjes su bsngags pa lnga bcu rtsa gcig go/ /lag na rdo rje rdo rje 'chang / de ltar yon tan dpag tu med pa dang yang dag par ldan par 'gyur ro/ /

rnam pa de lta bu'i yon tan dpag tu med pa gzhan rnams dang yang dag par ldan par 'gyur ro/ /lag na rdo rje rdo rje 'chang / don dam pa'i mtshan yang dag par brjod pa 'di yang dag par 'dzin pa'i skyes bu gang zag ni ring po mi
thogs par bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs legs par bsags te/ shin tu myur bar sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rnams yang dag par bsgrubs nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par

rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /bskal pa mang por yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' ba'i chos kyis sems can thams cad kyi bla na med pa'i chos ston pa po dang / phyogs bcur chos kyi rnga bo che lhag par gnas pa'i

chos kyi rgyal por 'gyur ro/ /'di ni 'khor lo drug pa'i rjes su bsngags pa dpag tu med pa'o/ /sar+b+ba d+har+m+mA b+hA ba swa b+hA wa bi shud+d+ha badzra a A a~M aHpra kr-I ti pa ri shud+d+haHsar+b+ba d+har+m+mA ya du ta sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta dz+nyA na

kA ya/ many+dzu shrI dz+nyA na pa ri shud+d+hi tA mu pA dA ye ti A AH sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta hri da ya ha ra ha ra oM hU~M hrIH b+ha ga bAn dz+nyA na murti/ bA gI shwa ra ma hA bA tsa/ sar+b+ba d+har+m+mA ga ga nA ma la su pa ri shud+d+ha/ d+har+m+mA d+hA tu dz+nyA na gar+b+ha AH
sngags dgod pa'o/ /de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang / /dga' zhing mgu nas thal mo sbyar/ /mgon po bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal nas/ /rnam mang mgon po gzhan
rnams dang / /gsang dbang lag na rdo rje de/ /khro bo'i rgyal por bcas rnams kyis/ /gsang bstod nas ni tshig 'di gsol/ /mgon po bdag cag rjes yi rang / /legs so legs so legs par gsungs/ /

bdag cag yang dag rdzogs pa yi/ /byang chub thob pa'i don chen mdzad/ /'gro ba mgon med rnams dang ni/ /rnam grol 'bras bu 'tshal ba yi/ /rnam dag legs pa'i lam 'di ni/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i tshul bstan

pa| /zab cing yangs la rgya che ba/ /don chen 'gro ba'i don byed pa/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi yul 'di ni/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyis bshad/ /'di ni yang dag par spro ba nye bar bsdu ba'i tshigs su bcad pa lnga'o// //

'phags pa rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud sgyu 'phrul dra ba stong phrag bcu drug pa ting nge 'dzin dra ba'i le'u las phyung ba/ bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i don dam pa'i mtshan yang dag par brjod pa/

bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas gsungs pa rdzogs s+ho// //thun mong dang thun mong ma yin pa'i gsung rab thams cad la dbang 'byor pa'i bdag nyid chen po bla ma dam pa chos kyi rgyal po'i bka' drin

gyis nye bar bskyangs pa/ sgra bsgyur gyi lo tsa ba dge slong blo gros brtan pas/ bsam gtan gling gi dben gnas su legs par bsgyur cing dag par byas pa'o/ /sngon gyi sgra bsgyur chen po de dag gis/ /rgyud 'di bsgyur cing kun

la grags lags mod/ /'on kyang sgra don gtsug lag ji bzhin du/ /rgyud 'di blo brtan gnyis pas legs par bsgyur/ /zab cing rgya che rdo rje theg pa yi/ /nges don ye shes don gnyer skyes bu dag /chos dang don la legs par
mi rton par/ /gang zag tshig 'bru'i rjes su ma 'brang zhig /ma~M ga la~M b+ha wa tu shu b+ha~M/ lan gcig zhus/

@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ se kod+de sha / bod skad du/ dbang mdor bstan pa/ dpal rdo rje
sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ / zla ba bzang pos gsol pa/ ston pa dbang bskur rnam bdun dang / /rnam
gsum de bzhin bla na med/ /'jig rten 'das pa'i dngos grub phyir/ /mdor bsdus pa yis bdag la gsungs/ /
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /nyon cig zla bzang dbang bskur don/ /rnam pa bdun dang rnam gsum
mchog /rtsa yi kun spyod rtsol ba ni/ /mdor bstan pa yis khyod la bshad/ /rgyud du mdor bstan rnam gsum dang / /
rgyas par bshad pa rnam gsum 'gyur/ /rab tu mdor bstan mdor bstan che/ /rab tu rgyas par bshad pa gzhan/ /
mdor bstan rgyas par bshad pa nyid/ /rgyud yang dag par bsdus par brjod/ /rab tu mdor bstan rgyas bshad pa/ /
dka' 'grel tshig ni 'byed pa'o/ /mdor bstan chen po rgyas bshad pa/ /'grel bshad thams cad don ston byed/ /
de ni mngon shes thob rnams kyis/ /bya yi mkhas rnams kyis min nyid/ /de ltar mtha' drug rnams kyis dag /rdo rje'i rnal 'byor rnam bzhi dang / /rdzogs pa'i
byang chub bzhi rnams dang / /phung khams skye mched rigs drug rnams/ /dag pa 'jig rten khams la sogs/ /le'u lnga yi gzhung rnams kyis/ /bden gnyis dang
po'i sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /dus kyi 'khor lo mngon brjod byed/ /dang por dbang bskur bdun po gang / /byis pa rnams ni gzhug pa'i phyir/ /rnam gsum 'jig rten
kun rdzob kyis/ /dam pa'i don gyis bzhi pa'o/ /bden pa gnyis kyi chos rnams kyi/ /rdo rje can bdag gis bstan pa/ /'jig rten kun rdzob bden pa dang / /dam pa'i
don gyi bden pas so/ /chu dang cod pan dar dpyangs dang / /rdo rje dril bu brtul zhugs che/ /ming dang rjes gnang yang dag ldan/ /dbang bskur rnam bdun mi yi bdag /
lus ngag sems ni legs dag pa/ /mngon par dbang bskur gnyis gnyis so/ /rjes gnang ye shes yang dag dag /gzhan pa khams sogs dag pa las/ /chu ni
khams kyi dag pa ste/ /cod pan phung po rnam sbyong byed/ /dar dpyangs pha rol phyin pa dag /rdo rje dril bu mi 'gyur che/ /sangs rgyas skad rgyun mi 'chad pa/ /
nyi zla gcig tu dag par byed/ /yul dang dbang po legs dag pa/ /'pho med rdo rje'i brtul zhugs 'gyur/ /ming ni byams sogs yang dag dag /rjes gnang
sangs rgyas nyid dag byed/ /dbang bskur bdun po 'di rnams ni/ /dkyil 'khor bzhengs nas sbyin par bya/ /bum pa gsang ba'i dbang bskur dang / /shes rab ye shes mngon
brjod pa/ /slar yang shes rab chen po nyid/ /de yi ye shes mngon rjod byed/ /'gyur dang 'gyur dang de nas 'dzag /de nas gzhan yang mi 'dzag pa'o/ /lus ngag sems ni
legs dag pas/ /dbang bskur gsum po rim pa yis/ /bzhi pa ye shes yang dag dag /lus ngag sems ni dag par byed/ /byis pa dar ma de nas rgan/ /bzhi pa skye dgu'i bdag po'o/ /
shes rab nu mar yan lag ni/ /reg pas byang chub sems 'pho'i bde/ /'o ma 'dzin pas dbang bskur ba/ /gang las bde thob de byis pa'o/ /yun ring gsang bar spros las
skyes/ /byang chub sems ni 'pho ba'i bde/ /gsang ba'i dbang bskur gsang ba ni/ /gang las bde thob de dar ma/ /yun ring gsang bar spros las skyes/ /rdo rje
rtse mor g.yo ba'i bde/ /shes rab ye shes dbang bskur ba/ /gang las g.yo ba'i bgrod de rgan/ /phyag rgya chen po rjes chags las/ /skyes pa g.yo med bde ba ni/ /
shes rab chen po'i dbang bskur ba/ /gang las g.yo med rtogs pa de/ /skye dgu'i bdag por rnam shes bya/ /skyob pa thams cad skyed mdzad pa/ /rdo rje
sems dpa' sems dpa' che/ /byang sems gnyis med mi 'gyur ba/ /'di ni dam tshig sems dpar 'gyur/ /rdo rje'i rnal 'byor rnam pa bzhi/ /dus kyi
'khor lo 'dir bshad pa/ /rnal 'byor pa yi thar ster byed/ /'di nyid kyi ni sgrub byed bya/ /rab gsal bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i/ /
du sogs mtshan ma de rnams kyi/ /shes rab gzugs brnyen nam mkha' mnyam/ /yod dang med las rnam par 'das/ /rang gi sems kyi rkyen gyi don/ /rdul phran
las skyes tshogs pa rnams/ /kun nas yongs su dor ba yis/ /du ba smig rgyu mkha' snang dang / /sgron ma 'bar ba zla nyi ma/ /mun can cha dang thig le che/ /
sna tshogs gzugs brnyan 'od gsal ba/ /bkab dang ma bkab mig dag gis/ /stong par 'di ni rjes brtags min/ /rmi lam bzhin du gzugs mthong
'gyur/ /rtag tu gzugs de bsgom par bya/ /dngos med gzugs la sgom pa de/ /rnal 'byor pa yi bsgom pa min/ /dngos po dngos med sems kyi min/ /
stong par ma brtags mthong phyir ro/ /ji ltar pra phab me long la/ /gzhon nu mas mthong dngos med skyes/ /de bzhin 'das dang ma 'ongs chos/ /mkha' la de
nyid rnal 'byor pas/ /'di las dngos po dngos med 'gyur/ /dngos po stong pa'i don mthong phyir/ /dngos po dngos med don yod pa/ /sgyu ma rmi lam mig 'phrul
bzhin/ /med pa'i chos can dag la chos/ /skye ba 'di ni rab tu mthong / /yid bzhin nor ltar mtha' yas pa'i/ /sems can bsam pa yongs rdzogs byed/ /
pra phab pa yi gzhon nu mas/ /ma mthong ba yi rkun po mthong / /nyi tshe ba yi mig dag gis/ /song nas sgrub pa po yis mthong / /gal te yod pa'i gzugs mthong na/ /
rang gi gdong pa cis mi mthong / /gal te med pa'i gzugs mthong na/ /ri bong rwa ni ji ltar min/ /gzhan gyi mig gis mi mthong zhing / /rang gi mig gis mthong min pa/ /
skye ba med pa mthong ba ni/ /gzhon nu ma yi bu ji bzhin/ /gzugs brnyan mthong na de nas ni/ /bar ma chad par srog rtsol bya/ /steng 'og rtsa gsum po rnams la/ /lus ngag
sems ni 'gog pa las/ /zla nyi sgra gcan bshang gci dang / /khu ba 'bab pa'i lam rnams su/ /chu me stong pa sa rlung dang / /ye shes khams rnams skyed rnams la/ /gang zhig zla nyi
mun can dang / /bshang gci khu ba 'bab ma rnams/ /srog dang thur sel rim pa yis/ /lus ngag sems kyi rtsa rnams so/ /zla ba thabs kyi sku yin te/ /nyin mor byed pa shes rab
gsung / /shes rab sku ni bshang ba'i rtsa/ /gci ba 'bab ma gtso bo'i gsung / /steng 'og thugs kyi rtsa gnyis dag /mun can khu ba 'bab ma'o/ /thabs kyi thugs ni
mun pa can/ /khu ba 'bab ma shes rab kyi/ /steng 'og rigs drug 'di rnams ni/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rnal 'byor las/ /shes rab thabs dngos yan lag gis/ /
lus can kun la yang dag gnas/ /'chi ltas lus ngag rtsa dag la/ /steng 'og lhag pa'i rlung rnams kyis/ /mun can khu ba 'bab ma la/ /skye ba dang ni 'chi ba gnas/ /
skye dang 'chi dang 'khrig pa yi/ /dus su khu ba 'bab pa'o/ /mun can ma yang steng du 'bab/ /nyi ma'i 'pho ba mnyam pa la/ /dus sbyor 'char ba'i mngon
mtshams su/ /dbu ma nas ni mnyam pa 'bab/ /rkang pa dang bcas lnga bcu drug /'byung dang 'jug pa'o mi yi bdag /bdun bcu rtsa lngas lhag pa yi/ /drug brgya nyin dang
mtshan la'o/ /drug brgya rnams kyis lhag pa yi/ /stong phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig po/ /'di yis dman pa gang de rnams/ /g.yon dang g.yas pa'i rtsar 'bab bo/ /phyogs
gsum dang bcas lo gsum rnams/ /lo brgya rnams las dbu ma'o/ /steng du g.yon g.yas zla nyi ma/ /brkyang ma lug dang ser skya gzhan/ /chu dang me yi rang bzhin
can/ /pad+ma rin chen 'dzin par 'dod/ /'og tu bshang gci 'bab pa dag /sa dang rlung gi rang bzhin can/ /dbu ma'i rtsa dang g.yon pa yang / /'khor lo ral gri
'dzin par 'dod/ /steng dang 'og tu dbu ma g.yas/ /sgra gcan khu ba rab 'bab pa/ /stong pa ye shes rang bzhin can/ /rdo rje rdo rje 'dzin par 'dod/ /zla ba'i lam gyis bshang
ba'i rtsa/ /nyi mas gci ba 'bab pa ste/ /skye 'chi mnyam pa chags pa la/ /sgra gcan khu ba rab tu 'bab/ /lte ba'i steng du kun 'dar ma/ /gang de yid bzang mun pa 'bab/ /
'og tu khu ba 'bab gang de/ /mkha' 'gro gdong dang dung can ma/ /lte ba'i chu skyes snying mgrin dang / /dpral ba gtsug tor 'dam skyes la/ /sa chu me rlung stong pa rnams/ /rab tu 'bab pa

sdud pa yis/ /'byung 'gyur de ni 'jug pa dag /bskyed pas 'jug ste sa la'o/ /lte ba nas ni lte ba'i dbus/ /a ba d+hU tIr 'gro dang 'ong / /lte gsang nor bu'i chu skyes la/ /lus ngag sems rnams 'bab pa ni/ /

'byung dang de ni 'jug pa dag /sdud dang skyed pa'i rang bzhin can/ /dung can skye bo thams cad kyi/ /thur sel rlung ni 'bab pa'o/ /'di rnams bud med bde ba las/ /khu ba khrag 'bab dus dag tu/ /shes rab
thabs dngos yan lag gis/ /steng du g.yas dang g.yon dag dang / /'og tu bshang gci 'bab pa dang / /rdul dang khu ba 'bab pa dag /rdul 'bab phyir de gtum mo ste/ /khu ba 'bab phyir mkha' 'gro gdong / /
steng du brjod dus bud med kyi/ /g.yung mo skyes bu'i kun 'dar ma'o/ /rnam shes la sogs dkyil 'khor lnga/ /rtag tu g.yon pa'i rtsa la'o/ /sa sogs g.yas pa'i rtsa la ste/ /dbus su drug pa 'bab pa'o/ /

lte ba'i pad+ma'i mdab ma la/ /dkyil 'khor drug bcu rnam rim bzhin/ /g.yon dang g.yas pa'i dus sbyor ni/ /lug sogs glang la sogs pa la/ /rtsa ba g.yon dang de nas g.yas/ /steng dang dbus su rim pas rlung / /
sa sogs dkyil 'khor re re zhing / /dbyug gus sna bug dag la 'o/ /rim pas chu tshod 'bab pa ni/ /drug bcu dang bcas sum brgya'i dbugs/ /brgya phrag bcwa brgyad dbugs de rnams/ /chu tshod lngar ni 'bab
pa'o/ /chu tshod drug bcu nyin mtshan du/ /lus la dkyil 'khor rnams shes pa'o/ /mdab ma'i dbus dang de nas shar/ /g.yas g.yon gzhan du rim pa yis/ /g.yon par rtag tu nam mkha' sogs/ /
g.yas par sa sogs gzhan las so/ /g.yon par rnam shes sogs 'byung ba/ /g.yas par sa sogs sdud pa'o/ /nub dang shar du 'dzin ma rlung / /phan tshun shes rab thabs yin te/ /'the bong ming med dag
gis ni/ /gang phyir kha la dbang bskur ba/ /g.yas dang g.yon du me dang chu/ /phan tshun shes rab thabs yin te/ /gung mo mdzub mo gnyis dag gis/ /gang phyir ral grir 'gyur ba'o/ /zla phyed rnam pa'i

phyag rgya ni/ /mche ba gri gug mthe chung ste/ /stong pa mi 'gyur steng 'og tu/ /phan tshun thabs dang shes rab po/ /dkyil 'khor bcu po yang dag sbyor/ /sor mo rnams ni phan tshun du/ /mgo bor lag mthil sbyar ba la/ /

gri gug dang bcas rtse gcig go/ /dbu ma'i rtsa la mnyam pa de/ /skyed dang sdud pa'i byed pa po/ /phung po khams dang rdo rje gsum/ /gcig nyid dbu mar son pa na'o/ /zla ba nyi ma'i rtsa 'gags na/ /bshang ba gci ba'i rtsa 'gag go/ /

sgra gcan rtsa ni 'gags pa na/ /'og tu khu ba 'bab 'gag 'gyur/ /skyed dang sdud pa'i byed pa can/ /'di rnams grol na grol bar 'gyur/ /srog dang thur sel lam gsum gyi/ /'di ni rtsa yi kun spyod do/ /g.yon pa

'am ni g.yas pa la/ /mtshan mo gcig dang de bzhin lngar/ /lhag pa'i rlung ni rab 'bab pa/ /de las lo gsum na 'chi'o/ /g.yas pa nyi ma'i 'chi ltas la/ /lnga dang phyogs tshes nyi shu dang / /de nyid gcig lhag
gzhan rim pas/ /nyin zhag sum bcu gsum rgyu na/ /gsum gnyis gcig lo zla ba ni/ /drug gsum zung zla nyin zhag tshes/ /phyogs lnga yon tan gnyis gcig gis/ /lus can rnams kyi tshe 'gro'o/ /rtsa ba nas

gcig lhag pa yis/ /g.yon par zla ba'i rgyu bar 'gyur/ /nyi zla nyin zhag zla ba dag /nyin zhag gsum rnams zla ba gsum/ /nyin la 'chi ltas zla bar dge/ /'phel 'grib de nas 'di dag la/ /dbu ma'i 'chi ba'i rgyu
ba ni/ /lo brgya yongs su rdzogs pa yis/ /mnyam dang mi mnyam nyin zhag rnams/ /skye bar skyes pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis/ /de rgyu g.yas dang g.yon la yang / /phyogs gnyis rnam par nyams pa las/ /

gzhan du 'chi bar mi 'gyur te/ /phyogs gnyis yang dag gnas pa na/ /g.yas dang g.yon pa'i kun spyod dang / /dkyil 'khor lnga rnams 'bab pa'i phyir/ /'chi ltas mtshan nyid shes nas ni/ /srog ni thig ler
gzhug par bya/ /a ba d+hU tI'i zhabs brten nas/ /mchog tu mi 'gyur bsgom par bya/ /rtag tu rdo rje bslang bar bya/ /zla nyi'i bgrod pa 'joms pa las/ /gzhan du kun 'dar yan lag la/ /srog gi rlung ni
'jug pa med/ /'og tu'ang dung can ma thur sel/ /de ma zhugs las 'chi ba'o/ /'chi ltas bslu ba rnal 'byor pa'i/ /'di ni dga' ba rnams kyis 'gyur/ /mgo bo'i pad+ma gtsug gtor las/ /khu ba 'ongs

pa dga' ba ste/ /mgrin pa snying khar mchog dga' bo/ /dga' bral dga' ba de nas 'gyur/ /sna tshogs dga' ba lte ba dang / /gsang ba'i pad+mar gang 'ongs pa'o/ /gsang gnas rdo rje nor bu'i bar/ /lhan cig
skyes dga' mi 'pho ba/ /rab gnas mya ngan 'das pa min/ /chags chen mi 'gyur khyab bdag po/ /'dod chags bral las 'pho med bde/ /de ni mya ngan 'das rab gnas/ /khu ba zla char gtsug tor du/ /

rdzogs pa gsang ba'i mtsho skyes la/ /bcu drug cha gang de nor bu'i/ /pad+mar rdo rje'i rtse mor gnas/ /de steng 'pho ba'i dus su 'gyur/ /nag po'i tshes gcig 'ongs pa na/ /'dod chags bral bas gnam stong la/ /

nyi ma mdzod spu'i gnas su 'gro/ /de yi cha shes bcu drug ma/ /gtsug tor pad+mar son pa'o/ /zla ba nyams pa zhes brjod de/ /chags pa'i bde la chags bral phyir/ /lus can thams cad 'chi ba na/ /zla ba bdud rtsi'i

'og du 'gro/ /steng du nyi ma rdul sgra gcan/ /rnam shes dngos po'i mtshan nyid la/ /de phyir zla ba bdud rtsi ni/ /steng du bgrod bya mi yi bdag /'og du nyi ma rdul sgra gcan/ /rnam shes 'gyur med bde ba la/ /sangs
rgyas kun gyi mdzod spu yi/ /pad+mar zla ba bdud rtsi nya/ /nyi rdul gnam stong gsang bar ste/ /gtsug tor nor bur de dag go/ /zhes pa ston pa'i rdo rje'i tshig /lus can kun gyi phyin ci log /rab gnas

mya ngan 'das pa min/ /khams rnams phyin ci log tu 'gyur/ /nor bur thugs dang gsang bar gsung / /lte bar sku ste bde chen las/ /chos dang longs spyod rdzogs sprul pa/ /'di rnams dag pa'i sku las spro/ /

thabs kyi 'og tu rgyal po'i dbang / /shes rab kyi ni steng du 'gyur/ /'di yi dpral bar sku rdo rje/ /mgrin snying lte ba'i 'dam skyes la/ /gsung thugs ye shes rdo rje rnams/ /sprul pa la sogs 'di rnams spro/ /

phung po khams rnams spro ba ni/ /sgrib pa med pa'i bde ba las/ /las kyi phyag rgya'i snyoms 'jug dang / /ye shes phyag rgya'i dmigs pa dang / /phyag rgya chen po gcig sbyor bas/ /mi 'gyur ba de 'phel bar
'gyur/ /'phel ba'i 'phel bar 'gyur ba med/ /nyams pa'i nyams pa nyid kyang med/ /nub pa de yi nub pa med/ /'char ba yi ni 'char ba med/ /rab tu gsal ba'i rab gsal med/ /bkab pa'i bkab

pa yang med do/ /skye ba'i skye bar 'gyur nyid med/ /'chi ba'i 'chi ba yang med do/ /grol ba'i grol bar 'gyur ba'ang med/ /mi gnas pa yi mi gnas med/ /dngos po med pa'i dngos med med/ /dngos po'i dngos

po nyid kyang med/ /'gyur ba'i 'gyur bar 'gyur ba'ang med/ /mi 'gyur ba'i yang mi 'gyur med/ /rang bzhin med pa'i chos rnams kyi/ /skye 'jig sgyu ma de bzhin no/ /'byung rnams 'jig par 'gyur min te/ /

rang bzhin nyid kyis skye mi 'gyur/ /sna tshogs 'di ni rang bzhin med/ /dngos po dngos med mtshan nyid gcig /rang gi shes rab la 'khyud sems/ /rdo rje nor bu'i pad+mar son/ /der son zla ba g.yo ba dang / /mi g.yo
ba dang mi 'gyur bsgom/ /lus ngag sems kyi rtsa rnams su/ /sku gsung thugs rnams bsgom pa ste/ /rdo rje gsum rnams legs bsdus pa/ /ye shes dung can mar bsgom pa'o/ /shes rab chags pas zhu ba yi/ /
thig le rim pas mgo bo las/ /rdzogs pa'i gnas su zhugs rnams kyang / /'ching ba dam pa'i don gyis so/ /ji ltar zla shar rim pa yis/ /cha rnams kyis ni rdzogs par 'gyur/ /grib ma nyams pa rdzogs pa

ste/ /zla ba chad dang rdzogs pa min/ /de bzhin ye shes shar rim pas/ /sa rnams kyis ni rdzogs par 'gyur/ /nyon mongs la sogs nyams pa rdzogs/ /ye shes chad dang rdzogs pa min/ /ji ltar ri bong mtshan
mas dbus/ /rdzogs par ri bong can mi gnas/ /de bzhin 'gyur med bde bar sems/ /'khor ba'i bag chags mtshan ma yis/ /skyed dang rab tu nyams pa'i phyogs/ /dkar po nag por rab tu gnas/ /
de dag dbus su rdzogs pa gang / /de ni rdzogs par mi gnas so/ /skad cig gcig mngon rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /rdzogs pa la ni g.yo mi 'gyur/ /gang tshe rdo rje nor bur sems/ /de ni skad cig thams cad
rdzogs/ /dkar po'i phyogs la 'di mi gnas/ /res 'ga' dkar min la mi 'gro/ /phyogs gnyis po yi dbus gnas pa/ /rdzogs pa la gnas gnyis su med/ /gtsug tor las ni shar ba de'i/ /rdo rje nor
bur rdzogs par 'gyur/ /de chags bral las cha nyams pa/ /rdo rje nas nyams la rab rdzogs/ /slar yang gtsug tor du shar ba/ /slar yang rdo rje nor bur rdzogs/ /de chags bral las cha nyams pa/ /

lus can ye shes nyams pa min/ /'di yi bde ba che rang bzhin/ /rdzogs pa'i sgra yis brjod par bya/ /dngos po bar ma gzhan thams cad/ /'byung dang bsdud pa'i rgyu yin no/ /srid las mya ngan 'das par 'gro/ /
de las slar yang srid par 'ong / /rang phyogs dag las zla bzhin dang / /bgrod pa dag las snang byed bzhin/ /rdzogs par mi g.yo ba 'di ni/ /sa rnams kyis ni yongs rdzogs nyid/ /nyi khri
brgyad gnyis brgya yi dbugs/ /'gyur med skad cig zos rnams kyis/ /phyogs gnyis yang dag gnon pa ni/ /sa rnams kyis ni yongs su rdzogs/ /bden don rnam pa bcu gnyis pa/ /rnam pa bcu drug
'gyur ba med/ /rnam pa bcu gnyis sa rnams kyis/ /rdzogs pa gnyis su med pa mchog /cha shes rnams kyis rdzogs pa'i sems/ /rnam pa bcu drug mi 'gyur ba/ /don gcig gnyis su med pa chos/ /
dam pa'i don te 'jig pa med/ /rdzogs pa'i gnas skabs son pa'i sems/ /kun nas rab tu rdzogs pa'o/ /chags bral dang po chags pa che/ /rdo rje lus med mi 'gyur che/ /yongs su rdzogs pa

phyogs gnyis kyi/ /bag chags rnams kyis ma 'khyud pa'o/ /ji ltar chu bo'i chu zhugs pa/ /de ni rgya mtshor chur mtshungs pa/ /de bzhin dngos po'i tshogs 'di de/ /'gyur ba med par 'gyur med mtshungs/ /

ji ltar khams kyi tshogs pa 'dis/ /zos pa las ni ro nyid 'gyur/ /sa bon rang bzhin sa bon gyis/ /'bras bu'i dus su nga rgyal spangs/ /de ltar dngos po'i tshogs pa yang / /mchog tu mi 'gyur zos pa yis/ /
mchog tu mi 'gyur ba nyid 'gyur/ /rnam pa thams cad rang bzhin 'dzin/ /mche ba'i tshor ba sdug bsngal ni/ /dug rdzogs gnas skabs gyur pa na/ /rma la rig min gzhan du min/ /yul dang dbang po'i sgo
rnams kyis/ /de bzhin rnal 'byor dam pa'i bde/ /sems rdzogs char gyur na rdo rje/ /nor bur rig min gzhan du min/ /yul rnams dbang po'i sgo rnams kyis/ /ji ltar ro chen lcags rnams kyi/ /
phyogs gcig yang dag gnas pa ni/ /lcags la drag po'i mes gdungs na/ /kun nas kun du 'bigs par byed/ /de bzhin nyid du 'gyur med bde/ /phyogs gcig yang dag gnas pa yang / /
sems la 'dod pa'i mes gdungs na/ /kun nas kun tu 'bigs par byed/ /ji ltar phug pa'i lcags rnams ni/ /'ga' zhig tu yang dri ma med/ /de bzhin du ni phug pa'i sems/ /'ga' zhig tu yang
bag chags med/ /lcags ni gser nyid du gyur pa/ /me yis dri ma med par 'gyur/ /de bzhin yang dang yang du sems/ /'dod chags me yis dri ma med/ /ji ltar nor bu che reg las/ /rdo ni rab tu
'bar bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin 'gyur med bde reg las/ /sems ni bde ba nyid du 'gyur/ /'dir ni mang po brjod pas ci/ /'jig rten kun rdzob bden pa yis/ /lcags rnams rab tu 'bigs byed pa/ /
ro yi mthu ni brtag bya min/ /ci zhig slar yang don dam pas/ /blo bur dri mas g.yogs pa yi/ /sems ni rab tu 'bigs byed pa/ /ye shes mthu ni brtag bya min/ /sems la blo bur dri ma med/ /
sems las yun ring dus can min/ /sems med par ni skye ba med/ /sems la mi zad gnas pa min/ /gal te 'di nyid blo bur ba/ /de tshe sngon du sems dri med/ /gang tshe sems las dus ring can/ /

de tshe de ni ci las skye/ /gal te sems med par skye na/ /de tshe nam mkha'i me tog mtshungs/ /gal te sems la rtag tu gnas/ /de tshe kun tu thar pa min/ /ji ltar zangs kyi dri ma ni/ /ro yi sbyor bas nyams
par 'gyur/ /de yi yod nyid nyams pa med/ /dri med nyid kyis yang dag gnas/ /de bzhin sems kyi dri ma ni/ /stong nyid sbyor bas rnam nyams 'gyur/ /de yi ye shes nyid nyams med/ /dri med nyid kyis
yang dag gnas/ /ji ltar bcud kyis phug pa'i lcags/ /lcags nyid du ni rjes 'gro min/ /de bzhin bde bas phug pa'i sems/ /sdug bsngal nyid du rjes 'gro min/ /chags bral las gzhan
sdig pa med/ /bde ba las gzhan bsod nams med/ /de phyir 'gyur med bde bar sems/ /mi bdag rtag tu gnas par bya/ /gzhon nu ma yi dga' ba ni/ /med par bde ba smra mi nus/ /lang tsho'i dga' ba
thob pa na/ /bde ba chen po rang gis rig /de bzhin ting 'dzin dang bral ba'i/ /bde ba smra bar nus ma yin/ /'gyur med ting 'dzin thob pa na/ /rnal 'byor pa yis rang rig 'gyur/ /'gyur med las
skyes bde rig pa/ /thams cad mkhyen la'ang the tsom za/ /de lta na yang yid bde min/ /chags bral nyid du mi bya'o/ /'phos pa las ni chags bral 'gyur/ /chags bral las ni sdug bsngal 'byung / /
sdug bsngal skyes bu'i khams zad byed/ /zad pa las ni 'chi bar brjod/ /shi las slar yang de rnams kyi/ /srid pa'o srid las slar 'chi 'pho/ /de ltar sems can gyi srid pa/ /chags bral las 'byung
gzhan du min/ /de phyir 'bad pa thams cad kyis/ /'pho ba'i chags pa rnam par spangs/ /gang gis 'gyur med bde bar 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor 'khor bar bcings pa yis/ /'dod ldan yang ni chags bral bar/ /
'dod pa'i bstan bcos su mi 'dod/ /bdag gis brjod pa'i rgyud du slar/ /rnal 'byor pa cis sdug bsngal 'dod/ /khu ba mi 'gyur rang bzhin gyis/ /mchog tu mi 'gyur bsgrub par bya/ /rten ni 'pho ba

thob pa na/ /brten pa'i 'dod chags bral ba nyid/ /rten dang brten pa legs rdzogs pa/ /ji srid 'gyur med nyid du 'gro/ /sems kyi 'gyur med nyid thob na/ /rten dang brten pa'i mtshan nyid med/ /'gyur med las byung
sku yi ni/ /mdzod spu'i 'khor lor son pa'i yang / /A li kA li mnyam sbyor ba/ /hU~M yig mi 'dod mi yi bdag /stong pa las byung gzugs brnyan rgyu/ /mi 'gyur las skyes bde ba 'bras/ /
rgyu ni 'bras bus rgyas btab pa/ /'bras bu'i rgyu yis rgyas btab pa'o/ /stong nyid gzugs brnyan 'dzin pa rgyu/ /snying rje 'gyur med 'dzin pa 'bras/ /stong nyid snying rje dbyer med
pa/ /byang chub sems ni mi 'pho ba'o/ /mya ngan 'das pa bral ba'i gzugs/ /'khor ba las 'das mi 'gyur ba/ /de dag sbyor ba gnyis med mchog /rtag dang chad las nges par
grol/ /dngos med las byung mtshan nyid phyir/ /gzugs ni dngos po med pa min/ /dngos po las byung mtshan nyid phyir/ /'gyur ba med pa dngos po min/ /dngos po dngos med yang dag sbyor/ /
rdo rje'i rnal 'byor gnyis med mchog /gzugs dang gzugs min rnam par grol/ /pra phab me long la bzhin no/ /gzugs ni srid par mi 'ong ste/ /'gyur med mya ngan 'das mi 'gro/ /
phan tshun 'khyud pas zhi ba ste/ /ma ning gi ni go 'phang mchog /shes rab rgyu las ma byung zhing / /shes rab rgyu las byung ba 'bras/ /shes rab rgyu las ma skyes phyir/ /shes rab las skyes rgyu
skyes min/ /shes rab ye shes bla na med/ /'bras bu rgyu yis gzhan dang gzhan/ /phan tshun du ni rgyas btab med/ /rgyu dang 'bras bu thams cad gang / /de ni brten cing 'brel bar 'byung / /
phan tshun rgya yis btab pa'i gzugs/ /skye min mya ngan 'das pa'ang min/ /shes rab kun nas mya ngan 'das/ /skye ba mchog tu 'gyur ba med/ /rgyu dang 'bras bu rnam nges grol/ /
phan tshun du ni rgyas btab med/ /ma skyes pa dang ma 'gags pa'i/ /shes bya gang zhig 'dir mthong ba/ /de ni rang sems gzhan ma yin/ /phyi yi shes bya
rnam 'byed phyir/ /de phyir bdag gis bdag nyid la/ /'gar yang rgyas gdab nus ma yin/ /ral gri chen po bdag nyid la/ /bdag nyid so yis gcod dam ci/ /mo sham bu mo dang 'grogs
pas/ /rmi lam du ni bde 'gyur ltar/ /nam mkha' las byung gzugs brnyan ni/ /bsten pas bdag la de bzhin no/ /shes rab ma yin thabs kyang min/ /'di ni lhan skyes shes rab bcas/ /
kun nas bde ba rdzogs pa las/ /sgrib pa thams cad spangs pa ste/ /nam mkha' bzhin du gos pa med/ /yul dang dbang po spangs pa ni/ /kun nas 'byung po kun la gnas/ /gcad du med pa
dbye ba spangs/ /rang byung rdo rje sems dpa' ni/ /don chen mchog tu mi 'gyur ba/ /'dod chags chen po sems dpa' che/ /sems can thams cad dga' bar byed/ /byang chub sems dpa' zhe
sdang che/ /nyon mongs zad pa dgra chen po/ /dam tshig sems dpa' gti mug che/ /gti mug blo ste gti mug sel/ /rdo rje'i rnal 'byor khro ba che/ /lha min khro bo dgra chen po/ /dus
kyi 'khor lo chags pa che/ /'pho ba'i chags pa sel bar byed/ /rdo rje mi phyed ces par brjod/ /'di ni don chen bcom ldan 'das/ /sems dpa' srid gsum gcig pa nyid/ /mchog
tu mi 'gyur brjod par bya/ /mchog tu mi 'gyur bde ba rdzogs/ /sa rnams yongs su rdzogs pa yis/ /'dod chags chen po sems dpa' che/ /sems can thams cad
dga' bar byed/ /byang chub la gnas sems dpa' ni/ /mi g.yo de phyir byang chub sems/ /nyon mongs la sogs zhe sdang tshogs/ /zhe sdang chen po dgra che ba/ /dam tshig zla ba
bdud rtsi yi/ /khu ba 'pho med de za ba/ /dam tshig sems dpa'o rigs pa 'dis/ /gti mug blo ste gti mug sel/ /rdo rje thams cad gcig pa nyid/ /shes rab sku dang mi 'gyur
bcas/ /khro bo chen po dgra chen po/ /khro bo'i gzugs can bdud rnams kyi'o/ /'gyur med bde ba che thabs las/ /nam yang sems can don mi 'dor/ /sems can grol nas chags
chen po/ /'gyur ba'i chags pa sel bar byed/ /'di rnams rnam pa drug du brjod/ /mi 'gyur ye shes tshor ba dang / /rnam shes gzugs dang 'du byed dang / /'du shes de rnams phung po'i
rigs/ /ye shes me dang nam mkha' sa/ /rlung chu rnams kyi rim pa bzhin/ /yid mig rna ba lus dang sna/ /lce rnams kyi yang de bzhin nyid/ /sgra ro chos kyi dbyings dang dri/ /reg bya kha
dog rnams kyi yang / /khro bo'i rgyal po gdong drug 'jigs/ /rigs drug rnams kyis yongs dag pa/ /lus dang gsang ba dbang po sems/ /rtag tu dkyil 'khor rnam pa gsum/ /
shes rab thabs kyi rdo rje gsum/ /rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du 'gyur/ /'di ni dbang gi sgrub thabs te/ /mchog tu mi 'gyur sgrub pa'i thabs/ /rtsa dang rigs dang yang dag
ldan/ /zla ba mdor bstan pa yis bshad/ /ces pa 'jig rten khams kyi le'ur le'ur lnga pa'i mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'i dbang gi sgrub thabs mdor bstan
pa rdzogs so// //'di ni kha che'i paN+Di ta so ma nA tha dang / bod kyi lo tsa ba 'bro dge slong shes rab grags pas/ bsgyur zhing zhus te gtan la phab pa
las/ slar yang sgra tshad pa rin chen rgyal mtshan gyis| dpal nA ro pa'i 'grel bshad dang mthun par bsgyur zhing zhus te dag par byas pa'o/ /

@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ pa ra ma A di bud+d+ha u d+d+h+r-i ta shrI kA la tsakra nA ma tan+t+ra rA dzA/ bod skad du/
mchog gi dang po'i sangs rgyas las phyung ba rgyud kyi rgyal po dpal dus kyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba/ dpal dus kyi 'khor
lo la phyag 'tshal lo/ /thams cad mkhyen pa ye shes sku dang nyin mor byed pa'i sku ste pad+ma'i 'dab ma rgyas pa'i
spyan/ /sangs rgyas seng ge'i khri la bzhugs pa lha mchog rnams kyis btud la rgyal po zla ba bzang po yis/ /
mgo bos rab tu phyag 'tshal lag pa'i pad+ma sbyar ba yan lag mchog la bzhag nas zhus pa ni/ /rnal 'byor dpal
ldan dus 'khor ka phreng ldan pa'i a 'dus la ste mi rnams dgrol ba'i du'o/ 1 /stong pa ye shes kyang ste thig le mchog
mchog rdo rje 'dzin pa sangs rgyas lha dang lha min yang / /phyi dang lus dang gzhan la yang ste rang bzhin rnams la
skyes bu nyi shu lnga pa'i bdag nyid dang / /lus la sna tshogs tshad dang srid pa gsum gyi bkod pa lha dang lha min
rnams kyi longs spyod dang / /dkyil 'khor dang ni dbang ste skabs gsum pa dang mi yi bla mas 'di dag yang dag bshad du gsol/ 2 /zla ba bzang po khyod la bdag mgu gang zhig khyod kyis dris pa 'di ni
rab mchog lha rnams dang / /mi dang srin po lha min klu dang chags bral thub mchog rigs rnams dag gis shes pa min pas so/ /mya ngan 'das pa la sogs 'dzin ma'i mthar thug tshig gi bgrod pa dang bcas

sbyor ba mtha' dag ni/ /lus dbus su ste dkyil 'khor dag dang dbang ni bshad par bya yis mi yi bdag po bzang po nyon/ 3 /dus kyis stong pa rnams las rlung dang 'bar byed chu dang 'dzin ma gling dang ri bo rgya

mtsho dang / /rgyu skar dang ni nyi zla skar ma gza' yi tshogs dang drang srong lha dang 'byung po klu rnams dang / /dud 'gro skye gnas rnam pa bzhi dang sna tshogs sa dang 'og tu mi rnams dang ni dmyal ba yang / /

stong pa'i dbus su yang dag 'byung ste chu la lan tshwa dang ni sgo nga'i dbus su sgong skyes bzhin/ 4 /lus dang ye shes nam mkha' dang ni rlung dang me dang chu dang sa dang brtan dang g.yo ba dang / /lha ni mthong
ba skyed min dag dang srid pa rnam bcur gsungs pa rdo rje yi ni lus dag las/ /sngags kyi skye gnas dag ni 'byung bar 'gyur zhing mi yi bdag po slar yang 'di nyid du grol te/ /de ltar gang gis yang
dag rig pa de ni phyugs min sems kyis kun tu rtog pa dag las grol/ 5 /g.yon gyi yan lag tu ni dkar po 'bar ba 'gro ba'i bdud rtsi'i cha dang g.yas su dmar po'i mdog /sgra gcan dus me

zla ba nyi ma ri bong can gyi bu dang sa skyes dkar po bla ma dang / /'jug rings dman pa char dang klog dang chu dang rtse mo can te 'bar ba rnams ni zung bdun po/ /'jig rten la ni gnas pa nyid de mun pa
med pa zung gcig dag ni mun pa'i mtha' la'o/ 6 /rgyab tu ser po yang ni skar ma lha gzhu sa ste de ni rnam bzhi gnyis kyi dbye bas so/ /srog ces bya ba gcig pu'i rlung ni rnam bcur 'gyur te

spyi bo rtsa ba dag dang mdun du'o/ /dbus kyi rdo rje'i steng du sa bon rang gi nus pa yon tan tshogs dang bcas pa 'og tu gnas/ /kun tu ye shes dang ni stong pa'o zhi ba gnas dang bcas pa dngos po kun gyis rnam

par grol/ 7 /a sogs sum bcu'i dbyangs gang ha ya ra wa lar ldan de dag zla ba'i cha dang nyin byed kyang / /ka sogs pa'i sde rnams dbyangs dang bcas pa nyin zhag stong drug me yi tshad kyis spyod par byed/ /
ha sogs dbyangs rnams dag kyang chu tshod lha mi gdongs can 'byung po'i skye gnas dag kyang sngags shes pa/ /a sogs ka sogs ldan pa dag las de ltar khams gsum dag ni nges par bskyed 'gyur mi yi bdag

8 /dbyangs ni ka tsa Ta pa tar ldan \u0f88\u0f90 la sogs pa yang dag sbyar ba rnams kyi skye ba'i gnas/ /mgrin rkan steng gi cha ni mkha' rlung bsreg bya las skyes mchu dang so ni chu dang sa dag go/ /a
sogs rnams ni gtsug tor 'khor lo snying mgrin mgo bo lte ba'i 'khor lo dag la rim pa ste/ /sna tshogs gnag dmar ri bong can dang gser 'dra phung po khams kyi lhag pa'i lha dang ldan pa la'o/
7 /rlung gi mtha' nas lhun po'i mtshams su dmyal ba gdengs can grong khyer la ni dpag tshad 'bum phrag gnyis/ /lhun po'i tshad ni 'bum phrag gcig ste gza' yi tshogs kyi gnas nas

stong phrag dag ni nyi shu lnga/ /mgrin pa'o gdong la lnga bcu brtan pa'i go 'phangs g.yo med dag la de bzhin nyid du nyi shu lnga/ /de yi phyi rol stong pa gcig pu srid pa gsum bral yon tan med cing de nyid kyis
dman pa'o/ 10 /rlung gi mtha' nas rlung gi mtshams dang brtan pa 'dzin ma'i bzhi la gling dang ri dang rgya mtsho rnams/ /bzhi phyed 'bum phrag gnyis te rtse mo can dang g.yo
ba'i dkyil 'khor dpag tshad dag ni 'bum phrag gnyis/ /dbus na lhun po gang gi steng du khyim gyi 'khor lo skar bcas nyin dang mtshan mor 'khor ba ste/ /cha drug la ni 'bum phrag gnyis gnyis
srid gsum mtha' dag dus kyi sbyor ba dag las rab tu skyes/ 11 /'jig rten khams kyi kun nas 'khor yug tu ni thad ka'i tshad kyi sum 'gyur du yang 'gyur ba ste/ /sa yi 'khor yug 'bum
phrag gsum dang chu me rlung rnams kyi ni drug dgu nyi ma rim pas so/ /mi yi dbang po phyi rol srid pa gsum gyi gnas la dpag tshad 'bum phrag gcig nyid gang yin pa/ /de ni sa yi sting gis
gnas su lus la rang rang dag gi tshad kyis yang dag khru gang ngo / 12 /phra rab brgyad rnams dag gis phra mo 'di gcig phra mo brgyad kyis skra yi rtse mo phra mo ste/ /'di rnams kyis ni ske
tshe shig dang nas te ltos 'gro nas kyis sor te sor mo nyi ma ni/ /zung gis khru bo khru bzhis gzhu ste 'dir ni stong phrag gnyis kyi gzhu yis rgyang grags dag tu 'gyur/ /rgyang grags bzhi
rnams dag gis dpag tshad de yis lha yul sa dang nam mkha' dag la tshad yin no/ 13 /dang por chos bzang bskal pa zung ni zung dang ldan pa dag ste tshangs dang 'jig rten 'das pa dang / /dpal gyi
bskal pa dkar po'i bskal pa yang ste shin du dbang gyur gnas nas 'dod pa bcu gcig go/ /gzugs med dag ni a sogs bzhi po ha 'khrig bral ba rnams te i la
sogs pa bcu drug gzugs/ /ha sogs la mtha' yang ni 'dod pa rnam bcur rab tu gsal te gsal byed gcig pa ka sa'o/ 14 /srid pa sum bcu rtsa
gcig dag gis 'dir ni srid gsum du 'gyur khams kyi dbye bas khams gsum mo/ /srid gsum ma lus 'di yang rdo rje gsum du 'gyur te a sogs ka sogs rab tu dbye bas so/ /rin chen snang nas

gseg ma'i chu ni dmyal bar nges par brjod de bye ma'i chu ni gnyis pa'o/ /'dam gyi chu dang mi bzad du ba dag dang me dang mun pa dang ni ngu 'bod bdun pa dang / 15 /lan tshwa chang dang chu dang 'o ma zho dang mar dang sbrang rtsi'i

rgya mtsho bdun te ri bo ni/ /'od sngon man+dar ri kha Ta dang nor bu'i 'od dang dro Na bsil ri rdo rje'o/ /gling ni zla ba 'od dkar dag dang rab mchog ku sha dang ni mi 'am ci dang khrung khrung dang / /drag po yang ni longs spyod sa ste

bdun pa 'dzam bu mi rnams gnas pa dag ni las kyi sa/ 16 /shar du rlung ni shin du zlum por 'gyur te mi yi bdag po lho ru me ni gru gsum mo/ /byang du chu ni phyed kyi zla ba dag dang nub tu gser mchog sa ni chu yi

gter gyi zur/ /ri rab lhun po stong pa'i rnam pa rdo rje mchog gi rang bzhin dkyil 'khor rnams kyi dbus su ste/ /sa yi steng du dpag tshad stong phrag rnams ni ri dang klu dang gza' dang phyogs rnams dag tu

'gyur/ 17 /lhun po yi ni steng gi rgya dang sa gzhi dag gi gnas la dpag tshad rnams kyi stong phrag ni/ /lnga bcu bcu drug dag go gcig ni rab mchog sa yi gzhi la khor yug dag gi yang dag ste/ /rwa ni lnga po rnams

dag steng dang sa gzhi dag gi gnas la phyogs kun du ni khor yug go/ /de yi phyi rol gling dang ri bo dag dang chu gter rnams te phyogs rnams kun du me dang rlung / 18 /chu gter drug po thams cad dag kyang zla ba

zla ba gcig gis dman pa'i stong phrag re re ste/ /gling rnams dang ni ri rgyud mchog rnams dag kyang de lta'i stong phrag stong phrag nyi shu rtsa lnga ni/ /'dzam bu'i gling gi yangs pa dag dang lan tshwa'i chu yi

gter ni 'bum phrag phyed kyi tshad yin te/ /srid pa gsum po 'dzin pa yi ni mtha' ma dag gi me dang rlung gi tshad dag de bzhin no/ 19/ tshangs pa'i gnas su dus kyi 'khor lo rgyal ba mchog bcas lha yi tshogs
kyis yang dag bstod pa ste/ /lhun po la ni tshig mda'i tshogs dang sa gzhi'i 'og na gnas pa klu rnams dag ni rigs lnga'o/ /dpal ldan lhun po'i phyogs rnams kun du sa yi dkyil 'khor la son gnas rnams

kun dang nye ba'i gnas/ /zhing dang 'dun pa dag dang 'dus pa can dang ro khang gnas ni me dang rlung gi mtshams kyi mthar/ 20 /shar du brgya byin mer ni me lha gshen rje bden bral nub phyogs su ni gshen rje srin po chu/ /

rlung dang nor sbyin 'phrog byed phyogs su rlung dang gnod sbyin drag po steng gi cha dang 'og tu yang / /tshangs dang khyab 'jug mtshon ldan 'khor gyi skye bo dang bcas rang rang phyogs ni bsrung zhing skyong ba ste/ /de dag dbus su dus

kyi 'khor lo rgyal ba mchog gi skyed mdzad gzhom du med pa rdo rje'i sku/ 21 /lhun po'i rgyab kyi phyogs rnams su ni sa gzhi dag la lha min rnams kyis rgyal bar dka' ba 'khor/ /gang du chos ni rnam par nyams shing rtsod

dus 'jug pa de dang der ni rab tu bgrod par byed/ /kla klo rnams kyang g.yul du bcom ste rang gi chos la dgod pa byas nas mdun du rnam par rgyu/ /rdzogs ldan gsum ldan gnyis ldan dag dang rtsod dus gzhan ni dus kyi

sbyor ba dag gis 'byung bar 'gyur/ 22 /dum bu gang du stobs ldan 'khor lo can de rab tu zhugs pa der ni rdzogs ldan dus bgrod de/ /rgyal po'i rgyab tu gsum ldan rtsod pa'i dus kyang mdun dag tu ste gnyis kyi bar du

gnyis ldan no/ /dus rnams dag gi lo yi tshad ni stong phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig ro brgya dag dang bcas pa ste/ /re re dag gi tshad ni dus dang mda' yis bsgyur ba'i mi rnams dag gi lo brgya gang yin pa'o/ 23 /phra dbugs d+h+ru

dang chu tshod nyin zhag d+h+ru dang dus bzhi dag ni stong phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig dang / /drug brgya rnams ni rim pas lus skyes phra dang mi dang 'byung po lha dang lha min rnams dang ni/ /nus dang gtso bo'i nyin zhag gcig gi tshad de sa gzhi dag

la dus bzhi nus pa'i tshad du 'jug /dum bu dum bur zhi ba'i go 'phang 'khor lo can bgrod nyin zhag gcig la nyi ma bcu gnyis so/ 24 /phyogs dang zla ba mtha' dag dang ni dus dang dus bzhi dang ni me dus bgrod

pa rnam pa gnyis/ /rgyal po lo ni mtha' dag rjes su nyin zhag dus sbyor chu tshod dag dang chu yi srang rnams te/ /'di rnams de ltar bgrod pa lus skyes phra dang mi dang 'byung po lha dang lha min rnams dang ni/ /nus dang

gtso bo'i zhag re la ste srid pa gsum gyi gnas dang lus kyi dbus su de bzhin no/ 25 /lo 'di nas ni drug brgya'i lo yis gsal bar mi bdag grags pa sham b+ha la zhes bya bar 'byung / /de nas klu yi lo brgya rnams

kyis nges par ma kha'i yul du kla klo'i chos dag rab tu 'jug /de yi dus su 'dzin ma la ni nyung ngu'i byed pa gsal bar mi rnams dag gis rig par bya/ /mtha' dag sa gzhi la ni grub pa'i mtha' rnams rnam par

nyams pa dus kyi sbyor ba la 'byung 'gyur/ 26 /me mkha' rgya mtsho rnams la rab byung la sogs 'das pa rnams bsres kla klo'i lor ni rab tu grub/ /kla klo'i dbang po'i lo ni lag pa gdengs can zla bas dman pa'i

lhag ma dag kyang nyi mas bsgyur/ /nag pa la sogs zla ba bsres te 'og tu dus kyis bsgyur ba mkha' me zla bas rnam par dbye/ /rnyed pa steng du bsres pa dag ni mi yi bdag po zla ba'i tshogs pa rnam par dag
par 'gyur/ 27 /zla ba gnas gsum gyur pa'i dbus ma'i phung po dag la gang gnas lag pa rtse mo can gyis bsgyur/ /rtsa ba dag la drug gi chas rnyed de yang bu lon du 'gyur dbus ma la ni sbyang

bar bya/ /steng 'og dag las mig dang sum bcu'i nor ni bsres pa gsel bar bya ste drug bcu'i cha dag gis/ /rnyed pa steng du rab bsres thub pa mchog rnams dag gis bcad pa'i lhag ma dag ni gza' ru 'gyur/ 28 /

gnas gnyis nyi zla bsres pa dag las dus dang nyi mas thob la 'byung ba bsres pa mtha' dag ni/ /de yi steng gi phung por sbyin te dang po lag pas bsgyur la'o brgyad dang gnyis kyis phye ba tshogs/ /gnas gsum

dbu ma dag ni dbang phyug gis bsgyur 'og ma dgu dang yon tan rnams kyis cha thob par/ /gnyis bsres dman pa'i dbu mar chu tshod dag gis thob pa nor te steng gi phung por gnyis kyis ni/ 29 /bsgyur nas byin la skar

mas bgos lhag mi bdag nyi ma'i skar ma la sogs longs spyod dag tu 'gyur/ /gza' la gza' ni rab sbyin mi bdag nyis 'gyur chu tshod rnams te 'og tu tshogs dag la yang gnyis/ /skar ma gnyis dang chu tshod

drag po nor du rab gsal nyi ma'i longs spyod dag la rab tu sbyin/ /'di dag zla ba'i nges par 'gyur te slar yang zla ba zla ba dag la rab tu sbyin par gsungs/ 30 /tshes rnams sbyin dang dor dang slar yang sbyin pa dag ni

gza' dang chu tshod rkang pa rnams su ste/ /tshogs kyi cha la chu gter zla bas mnyam dang mi mnyam thob pa dag la sbyin dor rkang pa'i don/ /stong la stong pa rnam dag bcu gsum zla ba'i rkang par lnga ste mig dang nyi ma dag la

phyogs/ /bcu gcig me la tshes zhes bya ste bcu dang chu gter rkang par nyi shur gcig gis dman pa'o/ 31 /lnga dang bug par nyi shu rtsa gnyis dus dang nor la rgyal ba bdun par nyi shu rtsa lnga ste/ /de la nyi ma'i rab tu dbye
