mongs pa las klu ru 'gyur te slar yang dgu pa dag pa'i chos la ma dad gang / /sgyu yi byams pa dang ni ming sogs bral ba bde ba ster la rtog pa phyogs dang drag po'o/ /dag pa'i sems can dag la skyon brjod pa las nyi ma

dam tshig thob pa gtong ba las kyang gzhan/ /bud med thams cad la smod nges par ma nur 'gyur te rdo rje'i theg par gnas pa rnams la'o/ 103 /klu dang bzhi yi nor bu gser gyi bum pa dag gam rgyal po sa yi rang bzhin rin

chen bcas/ /sman dang dri dang ldan pa'i rgyal dang rnam rgyal bum pa dag gis gdan gyi dbus su khrus byas te/ /klu dag gis ni dpal ldan cod pan bcings ste nor 'dab pad+mar bzhi yis dar dpyangs bcing bar bya/ /

phyag rgya la ni dpal ldan bum pa yis te 'dir ni pad+ma dang bral re khA lnga po spangs/ 104 /dang por chu dag la ni dge bsnyen nyid du 'gyur te bum pa la yang dge tshul dag tu 'gyur/ /gsang ba'i dbang la dge slong dang ni gong ma'i byed pa la

yang gnas brtan zhes par 'gyur ba ste/ /phyag rgya dar dpyangs cod pan dag dang rdo rje mchod phyir thogs ni bla ma mchog gis sbyin par bya/ /de dag slob dpon slad du rang gi rgyal ba'i rigs kyi dbang gis phyag rgya rnam par

dag pa nyid/ 105 /steng du bla re bkod cing sa yi mthil gyi gnas dag tu yang ri mo gsum ni kun nas so/ /de rnams thur du nor bu gser gyi bum pa chur bcas skud pa dang ldan pad+ma'i kha rnams so/ /dung sogs gser

gyi snod dang yang na dngul gyi rang bzhin dag tu dri yi chu ni bsgrub par bya/ /snying por gser gyi rang bzhin gsal ba'i gdan dag rab tu bkod de de la khrus ni brtsam par bya/ 106 /me tog sogs dang dri yi til mar nyi ma

me yis smin pa dag gis lha la byug pa bya/ /phye ma rnams kyis dril phyis byas nas sbrang rtsi mar dang zho dang 'o ma chu yis bkru bar bya/ /don grub rnams dang mar me dag dang rnam mang 'bras bu mchog gis 'di la
la nges par byabs nas ni/ /de yi gnas nas bskyod par bya ste sku yang dmar po'i gos dag gis ni yang dag g.yogs pa'o/ 107 /dpal ldan dkyil 'khor mthar ni mnyam pa'i sa yi

gnas la rgyal ba'i cha yis re khA lnga byas te/ /dbus su pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa rang rigs phyogs su gnas pa'i mtshan ma lnga yis brgyan pa'o/ /de yi dbus su gzhag par bya ba zhal gyi pad+ma nub tu phyogs pa'i lha

dang lha mo 'am/ /mchod rten sogs dang glegs bam dag gam thang sku zhes pa'ang de bzhin de la mngon phyogs sngags pa'o/ 108 /rgyal ba mchog dang bcas pa sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje stong pa'i rang bzhin dag tu

byas nas ni/ /phyi nas sngar brjod sbyor ba dag gis zla nyi rdo rje las skyes dus kyi 'khor lo bsgom par bya/ /rig pa'i lha mo sogs dang sangs rgyas A li kA li'i rigs skyes rang rang sa bon gyis bskyed rnams/ /

snying mgrin lte ba gsang ba mgo dang gtsug tor 'khor lo dag la rigs kyi dbang gis bsgom par bya/ 109 /de ltar nges pa nyid du bsgom par bya ste slar yang mtha' dag lha rnams dag gi lus la yang / /khro bo'i

rgyal po dag gis srid med srid mnyam ye shes sems dpa' bkug ste gzhug pa dag dang ni/ /bcing dang mnyes pa dang ni ro mnyam byed pa dag kyang lha rnams kyi ni rang gi lus la bya/ /de nas slob dpon nyid

kyis zhal ni rab tu gsal bar byas pa'i lha la phyag dag 'tshal bar bya/ 110 /a sogs ka sogs dag las lha dang lha mo rnams kyi rang rigs yon tan la gnas sa bon gang / /rang gi sa bon de ni snying gi dbus

su zla nyi kha sbyor la gnas sku gsung thugs ldan par/ /mtha' dag lus la gnas pa'i sum bcu rtsa gnyis mtshan gyi yan lag dpe byad mkha' dang brgyad kyis te/ /yi ge rnams kyis phye ba de nyid rab gsal 'dab ma

'dab mar glegs bam rnams la bsgom par bya/ 111 /mchod rten snying por dpal ldan 'khor lo rdo rje nor bu pad+ma dag dang byang du ral gri nyid/ /bgrang phreng la ni hU~M gi yi ge nor bu yongs su bgrang ba rnams ni mtshan dang dpe

byed rnams/ /dril bu'i sku la dbyangs ni gsum gyis bsgyur ba'i bcu rnams dag dang ka sogs sde rnams rdo rje la/ /de dag kho na mchod phyir thogs la bcu yis bsgyur ba nor gyi dpe byad rnams ni stod g.yogs la/ 112 /

ka sogs sde pa dbyangs dang bcas pa mkha' ro yon tan rnams ni pus 'khyud dag la bsgom par bya/ /ha~M haHdpal ldan rna cha la ste a~M aHzhes pa zung ni mgul rgyan ska rags dag la'o/ /de bzhin du yang a yig

zung ni gdu bu dag la 'gyur te rkang gdub dag la ha hA yang / /mtha' dag lus la gnas pa stong pa'i rnam pa lnga po dag ni thal ba dag la bsgom par bya/ 113 /rang lus ye shes rnam pa dag las rdo rje gsum dang

bcas pa'i phung po khams la sogs pa kun/ /lha rnams kyi ni rang gi snying ka'i pad+mar rang rang sa bon dag gi rim pas dgod par bya/ /sa bon bkod na rab tu gnas par 'gyur te mi yi bdag po mchod rten sku gzugs

sogs la'o/ /nye bar bsdu ba'i dus su lag pa'i rdo rje dag gis rang gi lus la sa bon gzhug par bya/ 114 /'di dang dang po ru yang ri mor bris pa'i thang sku rnams kyi me long la ni khrus su 'gyur/ /phyi nas dri dang spos

dang shin tu dri bzang me tog rnams dang klu dang rol mo dag dang ni/ /gar dang rnam mang mchog gi gos dang rnga yab dang ni gdugs rnams dag gis lha la mchod par bya/ /de ltar rab gnas byas nas rnam mang mchog gi

ro rnams dag gis dge 'dun mchod ston rab tu sbyin/ 115 /khron pa rdzing dang mtshe 'ur phyogs dang phyogs bral du ni klu yi rgyal po nor rnams dgod par bya/ /chu gter bdun po rang gi sa bon gyis te sbrang rtsi chu dang ldan pa'i
dri lnga gzhug par bya/ /sbyin sreg mthar ni rdzing bu la sogs dag la chu lha dkar po phyag na zhags pa bsgom par bya/ /skyed mod tshal du shing gcig dpag bsam ljon pa mtha' dag shing la gnas

par dbang ni bskur nas so/ 116 /cod pan dar dpyangs dag dang do shal gdu bu dang ni de bzhin rna cha ska rags la sogs pa/ /slob dpon la ni rab tu sbyin byar 'gyur te mi yi bdag po yon yang bdag nyid nus pas so/ /
sbyin bdag gis ni bsod nams slad du mtha' dag tshogs kyi rigs la gzhan don don du gnyer bya ste/ /bsod nams 'di yis rnam gsum srid pa la gnas sems can rnams ni bla med byang chub thob par shog 117 /

ji srid phyogs kyi lo ni gcig pu rnam pa bcu ru 'gyur te blta ba dang ni reg par bya/ /de nas 'khyud par bya ste ro dang bcas pa'i chu gter g.yo ba la sogs rnams ni bsten par bya/ /lo ni nyi shu yan chad phyag rgya

mchog tu 'jigs byed ma ste khro bo 'byung po lha min cha/ /dbang gi don du drug dang bzhi ste bde mnyam 'bras bu ster ba gzhan ni bsgom pa'i don du'o/ 118 /dpal ldan shes rab nu ma la yang dang por reg pa gang yin bum

pa'i dbang ni de nyid do/ /gsang ba dag las ri bong 'dzin pa myang ba dang ni blta ba dag gis gsang ba'i dbang du 'gyur/ /shes rab ye shes dbang la mtha' dag rgyal ba'i rigs kyi yan lag zhal gyi sbyang ba

byas nas ni/ /rgyal ba dag kyang 'dir ni bla mas dpang por byas nas slob ma la ni phyag rgya sbyin par bya/ 119 /rgyan rnams thams cad dang ldan zhun ma'i gser dang mtshungs shing bcu gnyis lo lon mdzes ma'i bu mo ni/ /

khrag dang ldan la shes rab thabs kyi bdag nyid dag gis rang gi rdo rje nor bus 'dod spyad nas/ /sa bon dang bcas rdo rje dag kyang slob ma dag par shes nas kha ru 'phang ba byas nas ni/ /phyi nas rang gi phyag rgya sbyin bya

de nas slar yang gzhan ni du ba'i lam sogs ldan pa'o/ 120 /skra dang rnam par 'phrul pa'i sems ldan g.yo sgyu gzhan dbang 'gro ma nad dang ldan dang bu skyes ma/ /khro khengs nor la sred dang mi bden rtsod pa la dga' rang gi

yan lag dman dang rnam dag min/ /shes rab 'di dag dbang la shin tu mkhas pa'i bla ma dag gis spang bar bya'o mi yi dbang / /sngar brjod sangs rgyas la gus bla ma'i dam tshig 'dzin ma rnams ni phyag 'tshal ba

dang mchod par bya/ 121 /'dod pa skyod par byed pa 'gro ba rang gi yid la'o gang ba dag ni gang ba nyid du 'gyur/ /gang ba yan lag mchog dag las ni ri bong 'dzin pa khu bar byas nas thig le bzang po 'dzag /
oT+Tas bkug pa mchog gi bde ba rang bzhin gyis ster thig le grol ba dag ni gsum gyi mthar/ /blta dang reg dang 'grogs la 'dzag pa'i bde ba 'di dag dga' ba'i dbye ba la sogs dag gis so/ 122 /'dod pa

dga' bar byed de dang po dag kyang mi rnams kyi ni mig gis blta ba dag la'o/ /phyi nas gang ba rab tu sbyar ba la ste slar yang mchog gi dga' ba nyid do rang lus la/ /'bar ba thig le 'dzag pa dang ni dga' ba yang ste

khyad par dga' ba rdo rjes pad+ma la/ /oT+Ta thig le gsum gyi mtha' ru 'gyur ba la gnas lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba rdo rje byed/ 123 /'dod dang dga' ba dang ni 'dar dang 'gyur med dag dang bzhi po yis ni sbyor ba
de gcig ste/ /gang ba dang ni nus dang skye ba dag dang mchog gi dga' ba nyid ni gnyis par nges par 'gyur/ /'bar ba dang ni thig le brgyal ba dag dang slar yang khyad par dga' ba nyid ni gsum pa'o/ /

oT+Ta dang ni nA da dag dang gnyid dang lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba nyid ni bzhi par 'gyur/ 124 /sems kyi bsam pa yis ni ma ru 'gyur te reg pa dang ni blta ba dag gis sring mo'o/ /rdo rje zhugs pas bu mo byed pa
dang bcas shin tu dga' bas tsha mo dag ni de bzhin nyid/ /thig le lhung na chung ma gzhan gyi rigs la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor mar ni 'dod chags nyams las so/ /'di dag rnal 'byor phyag rgya drug

ste sa chu sreg za rlung dang mkha' dang chad pa'i dngos rnams so/ 125 /chu skyes la ni rdo rje rab zhugs rtse mo can la rlung dang thig le mi lhung gsum pa'o/ /'di dag rnal 'byor gsum gyis rab tu gsal zhing nges
par sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi phyag rgya ste/ /chags dang chags bral mthar gyur dang po mchog bde'i gter ni rnal 'byor rnams kyis rtogs bya bzhi pa'o/ /phyag rgya rnams las de ni legs pa'i

ma ru 'gyur te rnam bcu dpal ldan bla ma'i zhal 'di'o/ 126 /shes rab yum ni mchog gi yum ste srid gsum skyed ma spyan la sogs pa rnams ni sring mo'o/ /rdo rje drug ni tsha mo rnams te phyugs kyi skye bo
'jigs ster caR+tsi ka sogs yang tsha mo/ /'khor lo la gnas dus kun du ni rang rigs sa la gnas rnams rnal 'byor pa yis bsten par bya/ /zhing dang gnas dang dur khrod skye bo dang bcas skye bo

med par nam yang dor bar mi bya'o/ 127 /dpal ldan rdo rje can ni dpal ldan yab ste srid gsum skyed mdzad sangs rgyas thams cad ming po'o/ /spyan la sogs pa ming po'i bu ste gzhan ni rnam mang yang tsha
rnams dang yang tsha'i bu rnams so/ /'khor lo la gnas rang rigs sar gnas rab dga' rnams ni rnal 'byor ma rnams dag gis bsten par bya/ /zhing dang gnas dang dur khrod skye bo dang bcas skye bo med par
nam yang dor bar mi bya'o/ 128 /bud med zla ba'i bzhin dang ut+pal ming can mchog gi dri yis rjes su byugs pa gang su dag /bsod nams dag gi rgyu ru dag pa gsum gyis slob dpon la ni rdo rje'i mchod pa

'bul byed na/ /sa gzhi sbyin dang glang po rta dang shing rta du ma'i bu mo rab tu sbyin las bsod nams gang / /bsod nams de dag thams cad de las 'gyur te mi bdag mkha' gnas zla ba nyi ma'i mtshams su'o/ 129 /
sgrol ma dmangs mo rnam pa bzhi ru sa yi steng du 'gyur te gos dkar mo ni rgyal rigs ma/ /sa ni rje'u rigs ma rnams rnam gsum mA ma kI ni gnyis skyes skye bo'i rigs skyes rnam bdun 'gyur/ /

sgra zhes bya ba 'khar ba mkhan mo nges par ro yi rdo rje chang 'tshong gzugs kyi rdo rje ma/ /yang dag nges par gser mkhan mar 'gyur mi yi bdag po 'dzin ma dag la dri yi rdo rje ni/ 130 /phreng ba mkhan du

rab tu grags te rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis reg bya rdo rje thags mkhan ma/ /rdo rje'i mtha' can chos kyi dbyings ni nor bu mkhan mor 'gyur bar 'jig rten du ni rab tu grags/ /tsA muN+Di ni sha 'tshong mar

'gyur rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis khyab 'jug ma ni rdza mkhan ma/ /phag mo khur ba mkhan du nges 'gyur gdong drug ma ni smad 'tshong ma ste dbang mo tshim bu ma/ 131 /tshangs ma nya ba mor 'gyur sa gzhi'i
gnas dag tu yang dbang phyug ma ni gar mkhan ma ru 'gyur/ /dpal mo zla ba gang ba'i zhal ni brgyad pa tshos mkhan mar yang 'gyur te 'byung po'i skye gnas so/ /rmugs byed ma ni rgya skyegs mkhan mor
'gyur te mi bdag rengs byed ma ni srin bal mkhan mo'o/ /khengs ma zhes bya til mar 'tshir ma rab che shin du stobs ni lcags mkhan mo ste bzhi pa'o/ 132 /'od zer can ni ko lpags mkhan mar rab

'gyur khro gnyer can ni shing mkhan ma dag de bzhin nyid/ /dpal ldan tsun+dA 'breg mkhan ma ste sa yi srid pa la gnas lcags sgrog ma ni smyug ma mkhan/ /drag spyan ma ni khron pa byed mar 'gyur te bcu pa 'od
ma'i gar ma shin du sngon mo'o/ /khro bo'i cha shas khro bo las skyes bud med bcu po rnams ni rnal 'byor pa yis mchod par bya/ 133 /dpal ldan khyi gdong ma ni kla klo mar 'gyur mi yi bdag po phag

gdong ma ni 'phyag pa mo/ /lce spyang gdong ma gtum mo dag dang sa yi gzhi yi gnas la stag gdong ma ni stag gzig ma/ /bya rog gdong ma bsnyon thabs ma ste rab tu gsal zhing nges par bya rgod gdong ma ro sreg

ma/ /mkha' lding gdong ma dpal ldan b+hil+lIr 'gyur te brgyad pa 'ug pa'i gdong ma dag kyang ri khrod ma/ 134 /sum bcu rtsa drug rigs kyi dbye bas sa gzhi'i gnas su rnal 'byor ma rnams dag gi rigs rnams te/ /

zhing dang gnas dang nye ba'i gnas dang yul dang grong mchog dpal ldan nags su yang dag gnas pa ni/ /rmongs rnams 'ching bar byed cing rab mchog sa yi steng du rnal 'byor pa rnams dag la dngos grub ster/ /bzhi dang

drug dang de bzhin brgyad dang bcu dang bcas pa'i nor dang gcig pu gcig ni rim pas so/ 135 /bzhi ni sangs rgyas dbye ba rnams te slar yang dus ni byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu dbye ba rnams/ /khro bo rnams ni phyogs
kyi rab dbye sa steng gnas su yi dags dbye ba rnams ni de bzhin brgyad/ /lha min dag kyang brgyad kyi dbye ba gdengs can srid par gnas rnams rnal 'byor pa yis rig par bya/ /gcig pu gcig ni sna
tshogs gtso bo srid gsum gnas su dpal ldan rigs rnams dag gi khyab byed do/ 136 /sa 'og rnams su gtum mo brgyad de mi yi 'jig rten phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor la ni khro skyes rnams/ /yi dags
zhes bya yi dags 'jig rten du ste lha mchog gnas su sgra yi rdo rje la sogs drug /tshangs pa'i yul sar dpal ldan bzhi ste rab mchog zhi ba'i grong du khams gsum dag gi yum gcig ma/ /rab tu khros pa'i

zhal rnams sna tshogs yang dag sdud byed dgyes pa rnams ni skyong bar byed pa nyid/ 137 /bu mo rgan mo dar ma rnams dang lus ni dri ma dang bcas bram ze mo dang rgyal rigs mo/ /rje'u mo dmangs mo mthar skyes rnams sam

mig dang lag pa dang bral sna mchu sna ni chad ma rnams/ /mtha' dag byang chub rgyu ru shes rab thabs kyis mchod par gyi ste rgyal po slob dpon snying rje dang / /bcas pa'i thugs ldan dri ma dag dang rnam par bral

zhing byang chub spyod la rjes su zhon pas so/ 138 /dang por bud med gsang ba'i phyag rgyar 'gyur te dam tshig la ni dpal ldan skyes pa mchog phyag rgya/ /rtsed mo'i yan lag las kyi phyag rgyar 'gyur te dbang po gnyis

kyi bde mnyam dag gis chos phyag rgya/ /pho nya mo rnams dag gi dri lnga lus dang pad+ma la gnas de dag rnams kyi rigs lnga ste/ /rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis bla rtsi dang ni pad+ma gcin dang sha dang rul pa'i dri

rnams so/ 139/ dpal ldan bzang mo pad+ma can du nges 'gyur chu la rgyu ma sna tshogs ma dang glang chen ma/ /dpal ldan sgrol ma gos dkar zhes byar 'gyur te rigs kyi dbang gis mA ma kI dang spyan ma yang / /rnal

'byor pa ni seng ge ri dgas rta ru 'gyur te khyu mchog glang po rigs kyi dbye ba las/ /mi bskyod pa dang don yod grub pa dri med nor bu'i phyag dang phyag na pad+ma 'khor lo can/ 140 /yan lag phra ldan skra rnams phra zhing rkang

lag 'jam la mnyes gshin dpal ldan shin du bzang mo'o/ /cung zad phra ba dang ldan ring zhing mig ni g.yo ba med la skra ni 'khyog pa pad+ma can/ /ngo tsha med cing 'dod pa drag la rtsod mang la dga' skra ni shin du chung ba dung

can ma/ /ring zhing yan lag thams cad rdzogs la nges par yang ba'i yul dang skra ni ring ba sna tshogs ma/ 141 /sbom zhing thung la yan lag brtan ldan shin du sra ba'i yul dang skra ni sbom pa glang chen ma/ /pho nya mo rnams dag
pa'i rigs ni 'ga' zhig dag tu 'dir 'gyur dus kun tu ni 'dres pa'i rigs/ /seng ge dag kyang 'brog na gnas shing yul dang rnam bral 'jigs pa med la gtong ba'i ngang tshul can/ /ri dgas
mgyogs 'gro dang ldan 'gyur zhing yang ba'i yul dang skrags pa'i sems te shin tu 'jigs pa'o/ 142 /rta ni nges par 'dod la srid par 'gyur te gzhan dbang gcin gyi dri dang gzhan don gnyer ba'o/ /khyu

mchog rings pa'i mig dang dman par 'gro ldan rang bzhin yon tan blun po nya yi dri ru 'gyur/ /glang chen 'dod ldan nges par dal bar 'gro bar 'gyur te rul pa'i dri dang shin du rmongs pa'o/ /sum bcu rtsa drug
dbye bas phye ba sa yi steng gi gnas su rigs kyi dri yi rang bzhin no/ 143 /mchod pa'i don du 'dod pa'i bstan bcos yon tan mang po'i gnas ni rnal 'byor pa yis rig par bya/ /shin du dga' ba

byas kyang rnal 'byor pa la rnal 'byor ma yis ma tshim dngos grub sbyin mi 'gyur/ /mdzes ma lha mo dang ni sha za mo dang mi mo dang ni srin mo klu mo dag tu 'gyur/ /mdzes ma dpal ldan chos kyi dbyings su

'gyur te yon tan dbang gis lha mo sgra yi rdo rje ma/ 144 /sha za mo ni dri yi rdo rjer 'gyur te mi mo dag kyang gzugs kyi rdo rje mi yi dbang / /gdug pa srin mo gang yin de ni nges par ro yi rdo rje klu mo reg bya
rdo rje ma/ /mdzes ma sems can phan pa byed ma brtul zhugs nges pa la dga' sdom dang bsam gtan ngang tshul can/ /lha mo longs spyod la ni rjes chags 'gyur te dri ma ldan zhing lhag ma la chags sha
za mo/ 145 /mi mo 'dod la rjes su chags ma srin mo mi yi khrag la dga' zhing gsod pa'i sems ma ste/ /klu mo dag kyang 'o ma'i zas can rab mchog sa yi steng du rnal 'byor pa yis mchod par bya/ /
de bzhin gzhan du rang bzhin rnams ni rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis rnal 'byor pa yis rig par bya/ /sa yi steng gi gnas su mkha' spyod sa spyod rnams ni sum bcu rtsa drug dbye bas phye ba'o/ 146 /

chang ni shes rab rang bzhin sbrang rtsi dang bcas bu ram las skyes 'bras las skyes sam shing skyes te/ /phyag rgya dang bral gang zhig 'thung byed de ni yul can du 'gyur bdud kyi tshogs kyis bskor ba'o/ /

de phyir shes rab lhag ldan sdig pa'i dri ma 'phrog cing sngags pa rnams la dngos grub sbyin par 'gyur/ /phyag rgya gang su rung ba 'dir ni dam tshig rnam par bral ba btung ba'i slad du rab tu bya/ 147 /
rgyal po ri bong mtshan ma gcig pu thams cad dus su bsten pa 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa 'phrog byed na/ /shes rab chos 'byung la gnas nyin mor byed pa dang bcas rnal 'byor ldan pa dag ni smos ci dgos/ /

mi bskyod don yod grub pa rgyal ba mchog bcas khyi dang rta dang ba lang glang po dang ldan pa/ /nyon mongs rnams kyi rdo rje dbyug pa phyugs kyi skye bo 'jigs sbyin brgyad pa gzhan ni shin tu drag 148 /khyi rta ba lang glang

po lug dang ra dang ri dgas bong bu phag dang rnga mo 'di dag phyogs/ /kum b+hI ra dang 'gron bu ku lI ra dang nya dang ma ka ra dang sbal pa rus sbal dung / /bse dang stag dang dom dang ne'u le dang bcas 'bri dang lce spyang

dang ni sram dang byi la dang / /'brog dgon khyi dang seng ge dang bcas nor dang bcu ste 'di ni 'byung po skyes dang khro bo skyes/ 149 /go d+hA byi ba shA li dzA ta spre'u dang ni ri bong gzungs mo i Shu rtsangs pa brgyad/ /

khengs ldan 'dab chags dang ni ne tsho khu byug dag dang ri skyegs rab tu gsal bar chu yi gter/ /lA ba phug ron gzhan ni bya dkar zhes bya tsa Ta ka dang ngur pa dang ni ngang pa dang / /dpal ldan khrung khrung khu byug mig
dang ra dza ki dang b+ha ga ba tI ti ti ri dang bzhad/ 150 /chu la 'jug pa dang ni chu skyar ro dang bcas pa'i nor rnams rim pa yis ni rig par bya/ /bya rog bya rgod 'ug pa ri dgas dgra dang gtsug

pud can dang bya gag b+he tra g+hA ra dang / /hor pa ljon shing dgra ni gzhan te bcu po khro bo las skyes khro bo yi ni rigs su 'gyur/ /mig sngon dpal ldan tsa ko ra dang a nI la dang gu da mu kha bug ki rkang steng
nyal/ 151 /b+he ruN+Da dang a~M` ba rI ka brgyad pa mchog gi 'dab chags su 'gyur mi yi bdag po kye/ /sum bcu rtsa drug rigs kyi dbye bas sa yi srid pa la gnas sa spyod mkha' la spyod rnams kyi/ /
rigs su gyur pa'i dam tshig mtha' dag rnams ni mchod pa'i dus su rnal 'byor pa yis bza' bar bya/ /rmongs pas gti mug dag las gal te spangs na mi yi bdag po myur du nyams par rab tu 'gyur/ 152 /

so dang skra dang lpags pa la sogs sha bcas chu rgyus dang bcas rus pa snying dang pad+ma dang / /shig dang ba spu srin bu dag dang rab mchog mi yi bdag po glo ba rgyu ma chu so dang / /bad kan mkhris pa chu dang rnag dang

sna tshogs lus la gnas pa khrag dang rngul dang tshil bu dang / /mchi ma dag dang mchil ma snabs dang dri chu chu ser zhag dang kha dog dri dang bshang ba dang / 153 /lce dang mig dang rna ba sna dang ri bong can bcas nyin byed rnams

kyis lha rnams mchod par bya/ /sum bcu rtsa drug yi ge rnams ni rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis byang chub phyogs kyi chos rnams kyang / /sum bcu rtsa drug khams kyi dbye ba mtha' dag lus la gnas pa'i rigs dang

mtshan ma phyag rgya dang / /sum bcu rtsa drug rnal 'byor rgyud ni sa gzhi dag la gnas rnams 'dir ni rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi/ 154 /chu dang mchod yon dri dang spos dang me tog dang ni 'bras bu ma nyams pa dang mar

me dang / /lha bshos dag dang 'dir ni na bzar 'gyur te bcu po rnams ni 'khor lo 'dus pa dag la yang / /khu ba gcin dang rkang dang bshang ba dag dang sha dang mchin pa dag dang mkhris pa khrag dang ni/ /rgyu ma

lpags pa rnams ni rgyal po rnam pa bcu ru 'gyur te 'khor lo 'dus pa dag la yang / 155 /rdo rje dang ni ral gri mda' dang pad+ma 'dab ma brgya pa lnga pa 'khor lo'i mtshan ma ste/ /rgyud mangs dang ni me long snod du 'gyur te mi yi

bdag po me tog phreng ba dag dang gos/ /drug pa chos 'byung nges par lag pa'i mthil du 'gyur te sgra yi rdo rje la sogs mtshan ma'o/ /de bzhin gri gug la sogs bum pa zhes dang de bzhin du ni bcu gzar gos ni

ser po dang / 156 /khab bam yang na tho ba rab tu gsal zhing nges pa dag tu nya yi rgya dang rtse gsum ste/ /dpal mo'i mtshan ma brgyad pa rdo bar 'gyur te mi yi bdag po 'byung po las skyes rnams kyi'o/ /rmugs

byed la sogs rnams kyi dmar snod nyin mor byed pa dang mtshungs dar gyi srin bu ku sha dang / /chu gri dang ni mthil lham dag dang spu gri zhes bya de bzhin shing lham dag dang gdugs dang ni/ 157 /tog tse dang ni 'od ma'i

dbyug pa khro skyes rnams kyi rang gi mtshan ma bcu ru rab tu 'gyur/ /ba lang rwa dang kham phor rgyud ldan 'phang dang sha yi gsal shing lag pa'i mthil du 'gyur ba ste/ /rgyud dmangs nye ba'i yan lag dang ni mda' dang
gtsug pud can gyi mjug ma 'dir ni brgyad par 'gyur/ /sum bcu rtsa drug mtshan ma'i dbye ba rab mchog sa yi steng du rnal 'byor pa yis mchod par bya/ 158 /slar yang dmangs rigs la sogs mtshan mar

'gyur te yon tan dbang gis ut+pa la 'am thong gshol lo/ /rgyal rigs ma yi rin chen dar dpyangs su 'gyur mi yi bdag po smyug gu rin chen phreng ba ni/ /rje rigs ma yi de bzhin du ste de bzhin chu na rgyu ba dang bcas

zangs snod gnyis skyes ma'i/ /yum gyi mtshan ma rnam pa bzhi ste Da ma ru dang rnga chen cod pan nyid dang bgrang phreng ngo / 159 /bshang ba gci ba dang ni khrag dang sha dang bcas pa lha mo rnams ni

bzhi por 'gyur ba ste/ /rna ba sna dang mig dang lce dang bshang lam dang ni b+ha ga sgra yi rdo rje la sogs drug /rnag dang bad kan dang ni shig dang srin bu chu ser zhag dang ba spu skra dang brgyad po yang / /rgyu ma

mkhris pa rus pa rkang dang sna tshogs lus la gnas pa mchin pa dang ni glo ba dang / 160/ rtsa dang lpags pa rnams dang snying dang tshil bu ldan pa dag ni bcu ru 'gyur ro mi yi dbang / /rna ba dang ni sna dang mig dang
kha dang bshang lam dbus dang b+ha ga dag dang mchan khung sogs/ /lus kyi yan lag brgyad la gnas pa'i dri ma mi yi bdag po lha min mo rnams brgyad du 'gyur/ /sen mo dang bcas so dang yan lag

bcu gnyis thon pa rnal 'byor ma rnams brgyad pa brgyad du 'gyur/ 161 /bshang ba gci ba khrag dang sha ni sna tshogs lus la gnas pa gnas kyi dbye ba dag la bzhi/ /rna ba sna dang mig dang lce dang bshang
lam dag dang b+ha ga zhing gi dbye ba la yang drug /rnag la sogs pa skra yi bar ni sa yi steng gi gnas su tshan do ha yi dbye ba brgyad/ /rgyu ma la sogs tshil gyi bar ni phyogs shes bya ba mi bdag

'dus pa'i rab tu dbye ba rnams/ 162 /rna ba la sogs yan lag brgyad kyi lus la nges par rnam mang dri ma dur khrod rab dbye rnams/ /dus me zla ba nyi ma sgra gcan rab tu gsal zhing nges par gnas kyi dbye

ba dag la bzhi/ /sa skyes zla skyes sngags pa pa sangs spen pa gdengs can rnams ni zhing gi dbye ba la yang drug /sa dang chu dang me dang rlung rnams dang ni sa skyes chu skyes me skyes rlung las skyes pa dag 163 /brgyad ni

tshan do ha yi dbye ba rnams te slar yang de bzhin ro drug dri dang kha dog dang / /reg bya sgra ni de bzhin nyid du rab tu gsal bar 'dus pa bcu yi rab tu dbye ba rnams/ /sa dang chu dang me dang rlung ni zad pa dag
kyang mdun dang g.yon dang g.yas dang rgyab tu ste/ /kha dog la sogs bzhi po rnams ni phyogs bral dag tu thim pa dur khrod brgyad kyi dbye ba rnams/ 164 /gnas ni sgrol ma la sogs khyim ste gsal

bar sgra yi rdo rje la sogs de bzhin zhing du brjod/ /tshan do ha ni tsartsi ka la sogs par rab tu 'gyur te mi bdag 'dus pa rmugs byed sogs/ /dur khrod khyi gdong ma la sogs pa mchog gi sar gnas rtsa ba'i
gnas dang gsang bar bcas pa ni/ /yum gyi khyim rnams gnyis te de dag rab tu gsal bar sa la mthar skyes ma dang mthar skyes ma/ 165 /gnas ni bud med gsang ba'i pad+mar rab 'gyur dam tshig dag la

rdo rje nyid ni nye ba'i gnas/ /zhing dang tshan do ha dang 'dus pa dag dang dur khrod sa gzhi de bzhin de ltar mtha' dag go/ /gnas ni g.yon gyi yan lag dag dang mdun te gzhan dang de bzhin g.yas pa dag
kyang nye ba'i gnas/ /de ltar zhing la sogs pa thams cad lag pa rkang pa la gnas sor mo'i mtha' yi mtshams su'o/ 166 /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang lha mo chu gter du 'gyur dus kyi 'khor lor

rab tu grags/ /shes rab byang chub yan lag yum ste gzhan pa dag kyang sgra yi rdo rje ma la sogs pa drug /chu gter yang dag spong ba rnams dang gzhan pa chu gter rdzu 'phrul rkang pa rnams te brgyad du 'gyur/ /

khro bo lnga ni stobs rnams dag ste rab tu gsal zhing nges par dbang po rnams ni lnga nyid do/ 167 /yang dag yan lag brgyad kyi lam ni mi yi bdag po lha min dag las skyes pa brgyad du 'gyur/ /sum bcu rtsa bdun rab tu

dbye bas srid pa gsum gyi gnas su byang chub phyogs kyi chos rnams te/ /de dag mtha' dag rnal 'byor ma rnams sa yi steng gi gnas su rnal 'byor pa yis rig par bya/ /de ltar gnas la sogs pa thams cad mi yi bdag po phyi

dang lus la yang ni de bzhin 'gyur/ 168 /sangs rgyas pa dang zhi ba pa 'am gcer bu skal ldan zhes dang de bzhin gtsang gnas bram ze 'am/ /thod pa can dang skra 'bal dang ni gos dkar dag dang zhing skyong rigs can dang ni thub pa dang / /smyon pa'i

gzugs can dag dang sdig pa med pa'i sems ldan mkhas pa dang ni grags pa nyid 'gyur te/ /rnal 'byor pa ni dngos grub don slad mtha' dag yon tan gter te de nyid thob pa mi yi dbang / 169 /mthe bo dang ni mdzub mo dag dang slar yang de bzhin

du ni gung mo dang ni ming med dang / /de yi mthar ni nges par mthe'u chung mtha' dag yon tan gter du rnal 'byor pa yis rig par bya/ /phyag rgya'i don du ming gi dbye bar 'gyur te yon tan dbang gis sor mo rnams kyi rim pas so/ /bcing ba

brjod na rdo rje bcing bar 'gyur te nges par khu tshur bcing ba la yang de bzhin no/ 170 /khu tshur brla yi steng du rdo rje gdan la gnas pa rgyal ba'i bdag po'i rdo rje'i phyag rgyar 'gyur/ /skyil dkrung la ni lag pa g.yon par 'gyur te g.yas pa pus mo'i phyogs nas sa

la son gyur pa/ /sa la reg pa mi bskyod phyag rgya slar yang lag pa g.yas pa mchog sbyin phyag na rin chen gyi/ /g.yon gyi steng du lag pa g.yas pa gan rgyal mnyam par gnas pa phyag na pad+ma dag gir 'gyur/ 171 /g.yon pa skyil dkrung steng du gzhan pa

lag pa'i mthil na 'jigs pa med pa phyag na ral gri yi/ /g.yas kyi khu tshur g.yas min la ste nges par slar yang gzhan gyi mdzub mo khu tshur bcings pa la/ /gsal bar snying kar son pa rnam par snang mdzad phyag rgya gzhan pa chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya

ni/ /mdzub mo mthe bo sbyar ba gdu bu bzhin du gyur pa dang ni gung mo la sogs brkyang pa'o/ 172 /lag pa g.yon la shin du gang ba'i dri med ri bong 'dzin pa g.yas la rdo rje nyi ma ste/ /nyi ma zla ba sbyar ba la gnas 'jigs byed rdo rje khro bo las skyes rtse mo lnga pa ni/ /bsgoms nas

yan lag la ni rig bya cod pan dang bcas mgo nas brtsams te rkang pa'i mtha' nyid du'o/ /'di ni rgyal po dus kyi 'khor lo'i dpal ldan mchog gi phyag rgya sdig pa'i dri ma 'phrog pa'o/ 173 /gang zhig cung zad gzung bar

bya ba'i dngos po sa skyes chu skyes mngal skyes drod gsher skyes sogs dang / /bza' ba btung ba brtson 'grus dang bcas bla ma dang ni zhabs dag la yang phyag rgyas reg par bya/ /gang gang bya ba nye bar sbyor bar 'gyur ba yon

tan dbang gis de la de ni sbyar bar bya/ /sa la sogs la dkyil 'khor don dang rkang pa bgrod pa la yang rnal 'byor pa yis bsnun par bya/ 174 /lag pa dag gis rdo rje bcings pa yis ni nges par khro bo'i mgon po chen po'i phyag rgyar

'gyur/ /mdzub mo thog mtha' bcings shing khu tshur bcings pas gtso bo srid pa gsum las rnam par rgyal ba yi/ /mtshan ma'i rnam pa dag kyang lhag ma rnams te rab gsal nges par lha dang lha mo rnams kyi 'o/ /

lag pa dag gis rdo rje bcings la g.yo ba'i gdengs ka'i rnam pa gdengs can rnams kyi phyag rgyar 'gyur/ 175 /mthe bo dag dang mthe'u chung sbyar ba pad+ma'i 'dab ma dang mtshungs gung mo dag ni brkyang ba dang / /mdzub mo gnyis ni

zla ba phyed pa ming med 'og tu bskum pa rang gi lag mthil son gyur pa/ /phyag rgya 'di ni rdo rje can gyi rdo rje rtse mo lnga par 'gyur te bstan par bya ba'o/ /rtsibs kyi rnam pa sor mo rnams te lag pa gnyi ga'i mthil du mthe bo la sogs

mtha' dag rnams/ 176 /lag pa gnyis ni rdo rje bcings pa rdo rjer 'gyur te rdo rje khu tshur dag gis dril bur bcas/ /khu tshur phyed pa mdzub mo dang ni gung mo mda' dang mtshungs pa dag kyang ral gri rnon por 'gyur/ /mdzub mo la sogs

rtse gsum slar yang bkram pa dag ste khu tshur phyed pa yis ni rtse gsum la/ /dpal ldan gri gug khu tshur bcings shing dpal ldan mthe'u chung zla ba phyed pa 'jigs pa byed par 'gyur/ 177 /rna ba'i steng du khu tshur
bcings shing mthe bong gung mo'i steng du 'gyur te mda' yi mchog la'o/ /khu tshur bcings shing mdzub mo shin du 'khyog par 'gyur ro mi bdag de bzhin nyid du lcags kyu la'o/ /rtsa bar 'dzub mo

ming med du 'gyur mda' dang mtshungs pa'i steng du gung mo yang ni mdung la ste/ /thad kar khu tshur dbyug pa la 'o lag mthil shin du mnyam la mthe bo brkyang ba dgra sta la/ 178 /steng du khu tshur gnyis dang mdzub mor 'gyur te

lha min bdag po glang chen lpags pa dag la'o/ /mche ba la ni lag pa gnyi ga'i mthil du khu tshur bcings shing mthe'u chung zla ba phyed pa'o/ /khe Ta ka la dpung pa g.yon pa rab tu brkyang zhing lag pa'i mthil ni steng du

son par 'gyur/ /kha T+wA~M ga la khu tshur bug par 'gyur te nges pa nyid du phrag par mthe'u chung brkyang ba'o/ 179/ sor mo bug pa med pa'i lag pa pad 'dab lta bu steng du byas pa dpal ldan thod pa la/ /gzhu la

lag pa gan brkyal khu tshur du 'gyur nges par dpung pa g.yon pa rab tu brkyang ba'o/ /gung mo dag ni mdzub mo 'khyog po kun du brten par 'gyur te nges par rdo rje zhags pa la/ /rin chen la ni sbyar ba'i sor mor 'gyur

te mi bdag de dag rnam par phye ba pad+ma la/ 180 /chu na rgyu ba la ni mdzub mo mthe bo sbyar bar 'gyur te mthe bo'i 'og tu khu tshur ro/ /me long la ni shin du mnyam pa'i lag mthil sor mo bug med dang bcas mngon du phyogs

par 'gyur/ /mthe bo la ni mdzub mo la sogs steng du 'khyog po rim par yongs su bkod pa lcags sgrog la'o/ /mgo bo la ni mthe bo la sogs bzhi po gdong dang mtshungs shing 'og tu mthe'u chung bskum pa'o/ 181/ cod

pan la ni lag pa dag gis dung gis phyag rgya mdzub mo gnyis po sbyar ba nyid du 'gyur/ /lag mthil dag gi rgyab tu sor mo lnga po rnams ni gcig tu sbyar ba dag kyang rna rgyan la/ /lag pa'i rgyab tu sor mo rnams ni rim par

yongs su bkod cing bcings pa mgul pa'i rgyan la ste/ /lag pa gnyi ga'i sor mo gsum ni phan tshun sbyar cing thog mtha' bskum pa dag ni ske rags la/ 182 /khu tshur bcings nas mthe bong dag dang gung mo gnyis po zlum skor lta

bur byas pa rkang gdub la/ /de bzhin du ni dpung rgyan zung dang gdu bu la yang mdzub mo phan tshun sbyar ba dag tu 'gyur/ /mthe bo mkha' 'gro ma rnams dag gi mchog gi rigs su 'gyur te mdzub mo gsang ba pa rnams kyis/ /

dri za rnams dang gdengs can rnams kyi gung mo ming med dag ni rim par yongs su bkod pa'o/ 183 /'byung po rnams kyi dpal ldan mthe'u chung rab mchog lag pa'i mthil ni srin po rnams kyi rigs su 'gyur/ /grub pa

rnams kyi khu tshur bcings pa mchog gi rigs kyi mtshams ni lha rnams dag gi'o/ /lag pa gnyi ka'i mthil du sor mo lnga po phyed 'khyog rigs kyi phyag rgya sder mo can rnams kyi/ /khu tshur bcings las mdzub mo gnyis

po phyed 'khyog nges par mgo bor son pa rwa can rnams kyi'o/ 184 /mi mnyam lag pa'i mthil la mthe'u chung phan tshun bcings shing gshog pa sbyar ba sgong skyes rnams kyi ste/ /sor mo lnga po rtse mo 'khyog pa gdengs can

rnams kyi rigs kyi phyag rgya khyad par 'phags par 'gyur/ /nyin zhag so so'i gtor ma la ni mdzub mo'i mtha' rnams rab brkyang gzhan pa 'og tu sbyar byas pa/ /'bar ba dag la mthe bo sbyar te mchog gi lag

mthil dag gi mdzub mo brkyang ba gzhan pa'o/ 185 /mdzub mo bstan na legs par 'ongs sam dag kyang nges par brjod par 'gyur te rnal 'byor pa la yang / /gnyis kyis shin du legs par 'ongs dang skal bzangs dge ba mthe

bo bcings pas rab tu brjod par 'gyur/ /sor mo'i se gol rdebs pa khyod ni 'di ru sngags pa mchog ces nges par brjod par 'gyur ba ste/ /mthe bo dang ni ming med dag gis dam tshig bcas pa'i chang gis khyod ni tshim
par byed pa'o/ 186 /sor mo thams cad rtse mo brkyang bas skal bzangs legs par 'ongs pa brjod 'gyur rnal 'byor pa la yang / /g.yon gyi yan lag reg pas rtag tu khyod ni bdag gi gnyen

gcig pu dag rab tu gsal bar byed/ /skye gnas dag la rig pas gtso bo mchu dang nu ma zung dang nges par sen mo 'debs pas kyang / /sor mo phan tshun bcings shing gung mo dang ni mthe bo brkyang bas dam tshig rjod par byed pa

yin/ 187 /mchu dang smin ma mig dag yo zhing mgo la 'phrug par byed na shin du rmongs pa rjod par byed/ /mche ba'i dbus su mthe chung dang ni snying ka kha ru mdzub mo 'jigs pa rab tu gsal bar byed/ /mthe bo khu tshur

bcings pa dang ni lag pa rkang pa sa la rdebs na nga yis bza' bar bya/ /lce la reg na zos pa dang ni lto dang so la bsnun pa dag gis ma zos pa nyid do/ 188 /lag pa'i rgyab kyis sod cig nges par rab tu brjod de mngon du phyogs pas

'dug cig 'dug cig go/ /byin pa brla la nyed na skal bzangs khyod ni de ring kho na ngal so nges par rjod par byed/ /rkang pa rab tu rkyong bas gnyid dang pus mo zung dag rkyong ba bdag la shin du dga' ba gyis/ /yan lag

kun la reg par byed cing kha ru lag pa gnas pa bdag la 'dus pa med pa'o/ 189 /phan tshun lag pa bcings pas bdag gi khyim du de ring 'khor lo 'dus pa dag ni rjod par byed/ /mthe bo ming med rtse mo dag gis rnam

mang dam tshig rnams kyis ji ltar 'dod par mchod par bya/ /rkang pa la ni 'phrug par byed na de bzhin du ni phyi rol 'dus pa dag la 'gro ba yang / /mdzub mo phan tshun bcings na rdo rje'i grogs po khyod ni di ring

'jigs pa 'phrog par byed pa'o/ 190 /skra ni rang gi so yis gcod na mi yi phyugs khyod 'dir ni ltung bar bya ba brjod par byed/ /so ni phan tshun 'dar bar byed na khyod kyi sha ni 'di dag bdag gis di ring bza'

bar bya/ /lce mchu g.yo bar byed na khyod kyi lus las khrag ni btung bar bya'o nges par brjod par byed/ /mchu la so ni 'debs par byed na khyod kyi rgyu ma lto bar gnas 'di bdag gis bza' bar bya/ 191 /

sgeg pa'i sbyor ba yis ni sgeg par 'gyur te mi yi bdag po bzhad po'i sbyor bas bzhad pa'o/ /gar gyi sbyor ba yis ni gar du 'gyur te rnam pa mang po'i rol mo'i sbyor bas rol mo'o/ /glu yi sbyor ba yis ni glu ste mchog

gi yon tan rnam mang dri yi sbyor ba dag gis dri/ /phreng ba'i sbyor ba yis ni phreng bar 'gyur te yon tan dbang gis spos kyi sbyor ba dag gis spos/ 192/ mar me'i rnam pas mar me nges par mun pa bcom pa

dang ni snod kyi phyag rgya bdud rtsir 'gyur/ /zhes pa de ltar phyag rgya thams cad slar yang de nas lnga yi dbye bas rnam par phye ba ste/ /gzhan pa phyag rgya mtha' yas rnams kyang mtha' dag lus la gnas pa rnal

'byor pa yis rig par bya/ /gang gang dngos po'i rang bzhin du 'gyur sa yi steng du de yi rang bzhin dag kyang phyag rgya rnams/ 193 /pho nya mo ni 'phred la lta bas khyod ni gang zhig nas 'ongs skal ba bzang la brjod par byed/ /

mgo bor lag bzhag de yi phyogs su nges par bltas pa rnal 'byor pa yis lan ni smras par 'gyur/ /steng du lta bas khyod ni dge 'am sa yi steng du gnas pas khyod ni 'dug la ngal so cig /yon por lta bas khyod

song chags pa'i lta bas pho nya mo ni shin du dga' ba brjod par byed/ 194 /zhi ba'i lta bas bdag gi grogs po khro gnyer khro bo'i lta bas 'jigs pa rab tu gsal bar byed/ /skra la lta bas bdag ni ma rungs par brjod

bskal bzangs la ni rang gi rang bzhin zur gyis so/ /mdzod spur lta bas bdag mchog rnal 'byor ma ni sna la lta bas yon tan rab tu gsal bar byed/ /mchu la lta bas skal ba bzangs ste nu ma zung la lta na bdag ni phyag
rgya bzang mor brjod/ 195 /snying kar lta bas bsgoms pa'i bdag nyid lag pa zung la lta na bdag ni rab tu gtum mor brjod/ /phrag par lta bas bdag ni nus ma sen mo dang bcas lag pa'i mthil la lta

na srin mo'o/ /rgyab tu lta na lag 'gro ma ste lte bar lta bas mi yi dbang po bdag ni dam tshig can/ /gsang bar lta bas bdag ni dag pa brla la lta bas bdag ni shin du dga' la gdul bar dka'/ 196/ pus mor lta

bas bdag ni grub pa nges par rjod byed rkang par lta bas rdzu 'phrul sbyin pa mo/ /rkang pa'i mthe bo nges par lta na bdag ni srid par rdo rje'i sku ste dpa' mo gcig pu dang / /sor mo kun gyi rtse mor lta bas srid pa gsum gyi gnas

su kun du 'gro ma sna tshogs yum/ /pho nya mo rnams lta stangs nyid ni sa yi steng gi gnas su rnal 'byor pa yis rig par bya/ 197 /drug cha lus kyi nang nas lag pa rkang pa lus dag gi ni yan lag mchog kyang sbyin pa ste/ /

las kyi dbang po rnams kyi ngag dang dbang po rnams kyi nang na yon tan dang bcas yid dag kyang / /khams kyi cha shas khams kyi nang na rkang gnyis pa dang phyugs kyi tshogs kyi de nyid cha yis gzhan/ /mchog gi phyag rgya rjes su

rig pa slob dpon la ni rab tu phul na bde ba'i gnas su 'gro/ 198 /sems can gang dag rnam gsum srid par gnas rnams 'jig rten khams las ye shes rdo rje lcags kyu yis/ /bkug ste de dag mtha' dag mchog gi

snying rjes dkyil 'khor du ni sangs rgyas rnams dang rdo rje yi/ /bdud rtsi mngon par dbang bskur nas ni dri med ri bong can lus rdo rje can gyi lam thob pa/ /dri ma rnam par bral zhing byang chub spyod la rjes su gnas rnams rang gi

gnas su gtang bar bya/ 199 /rdzas rnams med pa'i mngon par dbang bskur rgyal ba'i bdag po'i bka' yis kun spangs la ni sbyin par bya/ /de bzhin du ba la sogs lam dang mtha' dag yon tan gter ni rtsi yi rnal 'byor ldan

pa ste/ /bsten pa'i don du lag pa'i phyag rgya rang gi snying gi dbang son skyon rnams kun las rnam par grol/ /gzhan rnams la ni rgyal ba mchog gi snying po yum gyi mchod pa rnam dman sbyin pa nyid mi bya/ 200 /dbang gi mthar

ni dpal ldan bum pa rnams kyi 'jam zhing lus la bde ster stod kor gos zung dag /dpal ldan rnal 'byor ma rnams dag la sbyin bya gzhan yang de bzhin stod kor dang ni gos zung dag /sgo na gnas pa rnams la rab sbyin mtha' dag

yon tan rigs la bdag nyid nus pas de bzhin gzhan/ /mthar ni sbyin sreg byas nas rang gi snying ka'i pad+mar ye shes sems dpa' rab tu gzhug bya ste/ 201 /'jig rten pa rnams rang gi gnas su mtha' dag rdul tshon dag kyang

dag pa'i klung la spyan drang bya/ /tAm bU la dang dri spos me tog 'bras bur bcas dang ras yug dag ni gzhon nu ma rnams la/ /byin nas slob dpon slob mar bcas pas mtha' dag tshogs kyi rigs ni ji ltar 'dod par mchod byas te/

slob ma la ni gnang ba rab byin rab mchog tshogs kyi rigs ni rang rang gnas su gshegs su gsol/ 202 /dgra dang seng ge glang chen dbang po me dang lto 'phye'i bdag po chom rkun zhags pas 'ching ba dang / /chu gter

'khrugs pa dang ni sha za 'chi ba'i 'jigs byed nad dang dbang po'i nye bar 'tshe ba dang / /dbul dang bud med bral dang mi bdag 'khrug pa'i 'jigs pa dang ni rdo rje ltung dang don nyams pa/ /gang zhig rnal 'byor ma rnams
zhabs ni nyin zhag so sor dran byed de la rab tu nyams par 'gyur/ 203 /dpal dang po'i sangs rgyas chen po las phyung ba'i dpal dus kyi 'khor lo las mngon par dbang bskur ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// //

rgyal ba skyed mdzad bdag gis dbang bskur bdun po rnams dang bum pa dang ni gsang ba'i dbang dag dang / /shes rab ye shes dbang bskur srid pa'i 'jigs pa 'joms pa rnal 'byor dag gis bgrod bya bzhi pa thob/ /slar yang

rgyal ba mchog dang bcas pa sna tshogs gtso bo'i sgrub thabs yang dag par ni bdag zhu'o/ /zla ba bzang po'i tshigs gsan nas ni rgyal ba'i bdag pos rdo rje can dag gi yang sgrub thabs gsungs/ 1 /zla ba'i

sku dang zung gi zhabs te me yi mgrin pa chu gter dpal ldan zhal ni sna tshogs mdog /phrag pa drug dang nyi ma'i dpung pa rgyal ba'i phyag gi pad+ma stong pa drug dang me yi tshigs/ /zhabs dag gis ni zla ba nyi ma bsreg za'i dkyil

'khor dag la bdud dang drag po skrag bzhin pa/ /rol pas mnan pa'i srid med srid pa mnyam pa dus kyi 'khor lo gcig pu de ni bsgrub par bya/ 2 /bskyed mos tshal lam ri bo dang ni rgyal ba mchog gi gnas dang lha yi gnas ni

stong pa dang / /grub pa'i gnas dang dur khrod dang ni mtsho dang bzang po'i gnas dang de bzhin nyid du sbas pa'i sa/ /gang du sems ni rab tu tshim par 'gyur ba der ni bsgrub par bya'o mi yi bdag po kye/ /nges par 'jam pa'i

mal bstan dag dang gdan la nye bar 'dug nas sngar brjod bsrung ba byas nas ni/ 3 /dang por snying kar zla ba'i dbus su de nyid 'od zer sna tshogs rnams ni phyogs bcur bsgom par bya/ /kha la sogs pa dag pa byas nas slar

yang nam mkha' dag la spros pa'i rgyal ba rnams la ni/ /mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs byas nas sdig pa rnam pa mang po bsags pa dag ni bshags byas te/ /sgrub pa po yis lus dang ngag dang sems rnams dag pa yis ni gsum

la skyabs su 'gro ba bya/ 4 /rdzogs sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang 'phags pa'i tshogs kyis rnam mang dge ba gang byas pa/ /de dag mtha' dag la ni sdig pa rnam grol byang chub spyod la rjes su gnas pas rjes yi

rang / /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun srid pa'i 'jigs 'phrog la yang byang chub bar du bdag ni skyabs su mchi/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas su bdag gyur cig ces 'dir ni smon lam sems can don gyi slad du bdag bgyid do/ /

stong pa dngos po'i ngo bo'i rang bzhin 'gro ba mtha' dag 'di ni dngos po dag gis rnam par dman/ /de las sangs rgyas byang chub med cing gzhan phan snying rje dag dang mtshan ma'i dam bca' med pa ste/ /mtha' dag de ltar shes

nas de lta na yang mi yi bdag po sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ni/ /dpag med yon tan dkyil 'khor dbang po dkyil 'khor la ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bsgom par bya/ 6 /chu yis me ni rnam par nyams pa dang por 'dir ni lus

kyi dbus su sdom brtson dag gis bya/ /phyi nas 'dzin ma dag ni chu ru 'gyur te lan tshwa bzhin du chu yi dbus su rab tu zhugs/ /rlung ni chu bo de dag bskams nas nam mkha' la ni snang ba min par myur du 'gro bar 'gyur/ /

sems ni me dang mun pa'i mtha' ma yul dang rnam par bral ba dbus kyi sa la gzhag par bya/ 7 /stong pa rlung me chu dang sa dang lha yi ri bo chu skyes zla ba nyi ma me rnams ni/ /khang pa brtsegs pa kun nas dri med 'od zer 'phro ba 'am ni

rdo rje las skyes gur dag go/ /de yi dbus su rdo rje'i sa la nor bu'i 'od zer tshogs kyis dkyil 'khor rnam par 'phro ba ste/ /yig ye shes las skyes rgyal ba mchog gi pad+ma zla ba dang ni nyi ma dag gi gdan/ 8 /phyi rol du ni gsung

gi dkyil 'khor nor bu pad+ma 'di ni zla ba nyi mas rnam par dman/ /phyi rol phyogs dang zur gyi char ni nyin mor byed pa'i pad+ma sgo yi dbus su shing rta rnams/ /nyi ma'i sgo rnams su ni rgyal po nor bu gser gyi rang bzhin rta

babs rnams dang dur khrod dang / /snying por brgyad gnyis ka ba rdo rje'i rang bzhin shin du longs spyod rdzogs pa'i 'khor lo rgyal ba yi/ 9 /zla ba nyi ma la yang a sogs ka sogs rdo rje dang bcas me long la sogs lnga

rnams kyis/ /'od zer lnga rnams 'gyed par byed cing dri ma med pa'i zer 'phro dus kyi 'khor lo bsgom par bya/ /rdo rje'i rgyan dang ldan pa'i lus dang rgyal ba'i phyag gi pad+ma nyi ma'i dpung pa dus kyi zhal/ /mgrin pa gsum dang nyi ma'i

spyan te rnam par rgyas pa'i zhal yang mche ba phyed ni brtsigs pa'o/ 10 /dpal ldan oM yig las skyes rgyal ba'i bdag po'i pad+mar zla ba nyi ma me yi steng du ni/ /drag po lus med gnyis kyi snying kar

rgyal ba'i dbang po shin du rol pa'i zhabs ni g.yas brkyang stabs/ /g.yas pa dmar po'i mchog gi zhabs kyi 'og tu bdud de dkar po g.yon par yang ni drag po'o/ /dbus dang g.yas dang g.yas min mgrin pa dag kyang

bung ba nyi ma dang mtshungs zla ba dag gi mdog 11 /phrag pa sngon po dang ni dmar dang ri bong 'dzin pa ltar dkar g.yas pa dang ni g.yon du yang / /g.yas dang g.yas min dpung pa gnyis gnyis dag ni gnag dang nyi ma'i lus dang zla ba'i

mdog rnams te/ /de bzhin nges par mtshon cha dag dang bcas pa'i phyag rnams dag kyang brgyad gsum gyis ni rim pas so/ /phyag gi pad+ma ri bong can la tshigs gsum sor mo lnga po rnams ni kha dog lnga rnams 'phro/ 12 /gnag dang dmar

dang dkar ba'i rab mchog phyag gi mthil du mtshon cha'i tshogs ni yang dag gnas pa yang / /rdo rje ral gri dag dang rtse gsum pa dang srid pa 'jigs byed gri gug dang ni me yi mda'/ /de nas rdo rje lcags kyu nges par sgra dang bcas

pa'i Da ma ru dang tho ba 'khor lo nyid/ /mdung dang dbyug pa dgra sta rnams ni rdo rje can kyi nyi ma'i phyag gi pad+ma g.yas la'o/ 13 /dril bu phub dang kha T+wA~M ga ni rnam par rgyas pa'i kha dang khrag gis gang ba'i thod pa dang / /gzhu

dang zhags pa rin chen pad+ma chu na rgyu ba dag dang me long dang ni lcags sgrog dang / /tshangs pa'i mgo bo pad+mas brgyan pa rig byed gdong ldan gang yin rgyal ba'i g.yon gyi phyag na'o/ /bdud dang drag po'i lha mo dag ni zhabs kyi

mthil la 'dzin cing gdong ni dman pa dag tu byed/ 14 /gser mdog rig byed zhal ldan nor gyi phyag gi pad+mas 'khyud pa dag ni sna tshogs yum yin te/ /g.yas na gri gug lcags kyu nges par sgra dang bcas pa'i Da ma ru dang

bgrang phreng rim pas so/ /g.yon na thod pa zhags pa dang ni 'dab ma brgya pa'i pad+ma mchog gi rin chen de bzhin nyid/ /g.yon brkyang nyi ma'i spyan dang rgyal ba'i bdag po'i cod pan phyag rgya rnams kyis rgya yis btab pa'o/

15 /'dab brgyad la ni lha mo brgyad rnams nor gyi phyag gi pad+ma rig byed zhal dang nyi ma'i spyan/ /de dag rnams las bzhi ni sbrul gyi rnga yab 'dzin te zur du rgyal ba'i zhal gyi dbye bas so/ /dbang ldan bden bral dang ni rtse

mo can dang rlung gi zur du chos kyi dung dang gaN+D-I dang / /de bzhin yid bzhin nor bur 'gyur te nges par de bzhin du ni dpag bsam shing du rim pas 'gyur/ 16 /nag mo yis ni dang po'i phyag gi mthil na spos kyi snod dang gnyis

pa dag na bsil ba'i snod/ /dmar po sbyar ba gsum pa na ste myos byed dang bcas ri bong 'dzin pa g.yas kyi phyag bzhi na/ /g.yon na dril bu pad+ma lha yi shing gi me tog dang ni me tog phreng ba rim pas so/ /dmar mo'i

g.yas na mar me do shal dag dang cod pan dang bcas gdu bu rnams te phyag g.yon na/ 17 /gos dang ske rags dang ni dri ma med pa'i 'od zer 'phro ba'i rna rgyan dang ni rkang gdub bo/ /ser mo'i g.yas kyi phyag na dung dang gling bu nor bu

dang bcas Da ma ru ni rim pas te/ /g.yon na rgyud mangs dang ni rnga dang sil sil rab tu sgrogs pa'i 'khar ba dag dang zangs dung ngo / /'o ma chu dang sman dang chang dang bdud rtsi ro dang 'bras bu zan gyi snod ni dkar mo yi/ 18 /phyogs

kyi pad+mar chu gter sangs rgyas rnams ni nges par spyan dgu me yi zhal dang dus kyi phyag /zur du sgrol ma la sogs lha mo rnams dang slar yang de dag mtshams brgyad du ni bum pa brgyad/ /lha dang lha mo gnag dang dmar dang

ser ba dang ni ri bong 'dzin pa lta bur dkar ba ste/ /nag po dkar po zla ba'i steng du yang na phyogs bral du gnas dmar po ser po nyi ma'i ste/ 19 /mkha' snying la sogs rtsig pa la ni phyogs dang phyogs bral du gnas reg bya

rdo rje ma la sogs/ /shar dang phyogs gzhan gyi ni g.yas dang g.yas min pad+ma dag la kun tu bzang po de bzhin nyid/ /dpal ldan phyag na rdo rje nges par sgra yi rdo rje ma dang chos kyi dbyings ni rim pas so/ /

rmugs byed rengs byed khengs byed dag ste shin du stobs shes gang yin sgo skyong de ni shar du'o/ 20 /shes rab phang par thabs ni ri bong 'dzin pa'i pad+ma la ste lha rnams kyi yang lha mo'o/ /gnyis po dag ni rang gi phyag gi chu skyes rang rang

mtshan mas mtshan pa dag gis phan tshun 'khyud/ /mtshan ma gang zhig gang gi g.yas kyi dang po'i phyag mthil na ste de yi phyag rgya chu skyes dman/ /shes rab thabs kyis 'khor lo mchog gi bde bar gnas pa pad+ma dang ni rdo rje'i

gdan gyis bzhugs/ 21 /nag po rnams kyi g.yas kyi phyag na ral gri gri gug dag dang srid pa 'jigs byed rtse gsum ste/ /g.yon pa'i phyag gi mthil du phub dang thod pa dag dang kha T+wA~M ga ni dkar po nyid du 'gyur/ /mda' dang rdo rje

lcags kyu sgra dang bcas pa'i Da ma ru ni g.yas kyi phyag na rim pa yis/ /gzhu dang zhags pa dag dang dri med 'phro ba'i nor bu dmar po rnams kyi g.yon na de bzhin nyid/ 22 /ser po rnams kyi g.yas kyi phyag na 'khor lo dbyug pa dang

ni 'jigs byed rdo rje rim pas te/ /g.yon du dpal ldan dung dang lcags sgrogs dang ni nges par sgra dang bcas pa'i rdo rje dril bur 'gyur/ /ri bong 'dzin pa lta bur dkar ba rnams kyi g.yas na dpal ldan tho ba mdung dang rtse

gsum ste/ /g.yon na pad+ma dkar po 'dab ma brgya dang ldan pa dag dang me long dang ni bgrang phreng ngo / 23 /ljang gu rnams kyi g.yas su rdo rje gri gug dang ni dgra star rim pas rab tu 'gyur ba ste/ /g.yon du dril bu dang ni thod pa

mtha' dag yon tan gter dang tshangs pa'i gdong pa de nyid do/ /lha mo sngon mo rnams dag gi yang rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis de bzhin du ni rig par bya/ /gnag dang dmar dang dkar dang mchog gi gser dang mtshungs pa shar gyi sa la

sogs pa'i lha mo rnams/ 24 /du ba la sogs lha mo brgyad po dor nas rgyal ba'i bdag po'i pad+ma dag la res 'ga' ni/ /dpal ldan 'khor lo snying po'i dbus su mi yi bdag po nyi shu lnga yi bdag nyid du yang 'gyur/ /rang gi

sems kyi nus pa shes nas bcom ldan 'di yang rnal 'byor pa rnams dag gis bsgom par bya/ /dbang gi don du dkyil 'khor dag ni rigs kyi dbang gis phyi yi 'khor lo rab tu dman par 'gyur/ 25 /phyi rol du ni brgyad pa

brgyad kyis pad 'dab brgyad po rnams la phyogs brgyad lha mo rnams dang ni/ /tsartsi ka sogs rnal 'byor ma rnams zla ba nyi ma dang bral rig byed phyag dang spyan gsum ma/ /shar gyi pad+mar tsartsi ka ste mer ni mkha' 'gro'i bdag pos

'gro ma phag mo gdong drug ma/ /gshen rje bden bral zur dag tu ste chu bcas rlung du rdo rje lag dang chu gter gdong ma'o/ 26 /drag mo dpal mo byang dang dbang ldan du ste mtshon cha dang bcas thabs kyi sku la 'khyud pa'o/ /brgyad pa brgyad kyi rnal 'byor ma gang pad+ma'i

'dab ma la gnas gtso mo'i kha dog zhal rnams so/ /shar la sogs par dang po'i phyag gi mthil na gri gug dang ni rtse gsum 'khor lo be con dang / /dbyug pa ral gri dang ni mdung thung lcags kyu dag ni g.yas kyi phyag gi pad+ma zung la'o/ 27 /

rdo rje mda' dang pad+ma dang ni dri med glog mtshungs tshangs pa'i dbyug pa dag dang rtse gsum dang / /sna tshogs rin chen gyis bcings sgra dang bcas pa'i Da ma ru dang pad+ma nyid dang bgrang phreng ste/ /g.yon na thod pa dang ni kha T+wA~M ga dang pad+ma dung dang

lcags sgrog dag dang phub dang ni/ /nges par rin po che dang zhags pa sgra ni rab tu sgrogs pa'i rdo rje dril bu gzhu dag dang / 28 /spyi blugs snod dang kha T+wA~M ga dang sbrul dang de nas chu las skyes dang rin po che nyid de/ /pad+ma

nor 'dab la ni brgyad pa brgyad kyi rnal 'byor ma yi phyag gi mtshon cha de bzhin no/ /'jigs ma drag mo dus kyi mche ba me 'bar gdong ma rlung gi shugs ma dang ni rab gtum ma/ /drag spyan ma dang sna chen rnams tsartsi ka yi pad+ma nor 'dab la ni

phyogs rnams su/ 29 /g.yang mo sgyu ma grags dpal rab mchog rnam par rgyal ma dpal ldan rgyal ma dpal ldan rgyal byed ma/ /brgyad pa dpal ldan 'khor lo can ma nor 'dab pad+ma la ni khyab 'jug ma yi phyogs

kyi char/ /keng rus ma dang dus kyi mtshan mo rab tu khros pa'i gdong ma dus kyi lce dang gtsig ma dang / /nag mo 'jigs rung gzugs ngan ma rnams nor 'dab pad+ma la ste phag mo'i 'dab ma'i lha mo la'o/ 30 /pad+ma lus med gzhon nu

ma dang ri dgas bdag pos 'gro ma rin chen phreng ba mig bzang ma/ /rul ma bzang mo gang na gtso mo mchog gi rma byas 'gro ma'i chu skyes 'dab la rgyal po kye/ /rdo rje 'od dang rdo rje lus dang mchog gi gser ldan urba sI dang bkra ba'i ri

mo dang / /ram+b+ha zug med shin tu sgrol ma pad+ma nor 'dab rdo rje lag ma lhag pa'i lha can la'o/ 31 /sA bi trI dang pad+ma'i mig dang nges par chu skyes can ma blo dang ngag gi dbang phyug ma/ /gA ya tri dang glog nyid dran ma dag kyang pad+ma rig

byed gdong ni lhag pa'i lha can la/ /gau rI gang+ga dang ni rtag ma shin du mchog tu myur ma to ta lA dang mtshon byed ma/ /dmar ser nag mo brgyad ni de bzhin gang na drag mo gtso mo'i pad+ma nor gyi 'dab ma la'o/ 32 /dpal ldan dkar

mo zla ba'i ri mo ri bong 'dzin pa'i gdong ma ngang pa'i mdog dang 'dzin ma dang / /pad+ma'i dbang mo skar mig dri med ri bong 'dzin ma dbang ldan pad+ma dag la mtshan mar bcas/ /de yi phyi rol nyi ma'i pad+ma la ni lha min g.yo dang gshen rje me

dang gdong drug dang / /gnod sbyin brgya byin chu gter gdong dang phyugs bdag rgya mtsho dpal ldan tshogs kyi dbang po khyab 'jug go/ 33 /ral gri gri gug ljon shing dbang po lha yi shing gi me tog dbyug pa ral gri shak+ti dang / /

dbyug pa shak+ti dag dang mdung dang nor bu dang ni be con rdo rje nyid dang me yi mda'/ /khab dang bgrang phreng dag ni phyag gi mthil du 'gyur te rtse gsum pa dang mda' dang zhags pa dang / /rin chen dgra sta rdo rje dang ni 'khor

lo dbyug pa 'phrog byed dag gi g.yas kyi phyag tu 'gyur/ 34 /g.yon du phub dang thod pa dkar po min pa'i nor bu dang ni ut+pa la dang lcags sgrog dang / /zhags pa chu skyes spyi blugs dag ni nges par g.yon gyi phyag tu rim pas

'gyur ro mi yi bdag /rin chen me long dang ni de bzhin ne'u le dang bcas chu skyes rdo rje dril bu gzhu dang ni/ /pad+ma dang ni spyi blugs sbrul dang gzhu dang de bzhin klu yi zhags pa dag dang rin chen dang / 35 /zhags pa rin po

che dang pad+ma skye ba lnga pa'i dung ni lha min dgra bo dag gir 'gyur/ /pad+ma'i 'dab ma dag la nag pa sogs kyi nor lag tshes rnams lte ba la ni rdzogs pa gnyis/ /mchog gi zla ba'i cha rnams thams cad stong dus 'jig rten dag tu lo yi

sbyor bas rig par bya/ /sgor ni lha mo shing rta la gnas ral gri rdo rje 'dzin dang lcags kyu dang bcas mda' yi phyag 36 /dpal ldan 'khor lo dbyug pa'i phyag dang rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis tho ba dang ni mdung gi phyag /dpal

ldan gri gug rdo rje'i phyag dang nges par phyag na dgra sta phyag na rtse gsum g.yas na ste/ /g.yon gyi phyag na phub dang sbrul te rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis zhags pa dang ni gzhu yi phyag /dpal ldan dung dang rin chen phyag dang pad+ma ri

bong 'dzin pa me long phyag kyang de bzhin no/ 37 /dpal ldan dril bu thod pa'i phyag dang nges par phyag na lag 'gro nyid dang kha T+wA~M ga yi phyag /'od zer can la sogs pa zhal gcig dus kyi phyag gi pad+ma rnams ni rim pas rig par bya/ /

ka ba'i 'og tu klu brgyad rnams kyang bum pa rdo rje'i phyag dang pad+ma nor bu dag gi phyag /rlung la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor la ni pad+ma karko Ta sogs dus kyi phyag gi pad+ma rnams/ 38 /khyi gdong phag gdong ma dang lce spyang gdong ma nges par g.yo ba'i

dkyil 'khor la ni phyogs rnams su/ /stag gdong ma ni byang du gnas te dur khrod sa bzhi la gnas gri gug dang ni thod pa'i phyag /bya rog gdong dang bya rgod gdong dang mkha' 'gro bdag po'i gdong dang 'ug gdong ma ni zur du'o/

rdo rje mig dang shin tu sngon mo sa 'og nam mkha' la gnas 'byung po'i skye gnas g.yo ba'i mthar/ 39 /yi dags dmar dang mkha' 'gro'i dbang po ma he rma bya glang po ngang pa glang dang gdong lnga pa/ /rim pas tsA

muN+Da la sogs pa'i pad+ma'i gdan du rab 'gyur phyogs dang phyogs bral rnams su'o/ /lha min la sogs rnams kyi de bzhin nor bdag rtse mo can dang chu gter rlung dang tshogs kyi ni/ /glang po'i dbang po dang ni lug dang chu

srin zhes dang ri dgas dang ni byi ba rim pas so/ 40 /b+he ruN+Da dang khrung khrung mig sngon bshang lam gdong ni bya rog gdong la sogs pa'i zur du ste/ /bse dang dom dang seng ge g.yag ni khyi gdong ma la sogs pa yi ste phyogs su rab tu

'gyur ro/ /rdo rje mig gi rkang pa brgyad pa sa yi shing rta la gnas mkha' la sngon mo'i shing rta yi/ /mkhar bgrod khro ba dang bcas kha dog lnga pa lus rgyas mig gsum ldan pa a ni la zhes pa/ 41 /'od zer can dang tsun+dA

lcags sgrog ma dang khro gnyer can gyi shing rta rnams la phag dang ni/ /rta dang glang po seng ge bdun gyi grangs su 'gyur te lha dang gshen rje chu dang byang du'o/ /shar du dri dang phreng ba ma de gshen rje chu la gnas pa spos ma mar me sgeg mo dang / /

bzhad ma'o gar ma rol mo ma ni nor sbyin sa gzhi la ste mkha' la klu ma 'dod ma'o/ 42 /snying por brgyad ni kha khyer la ste mkha' dang 'og na gnas pa rta babs 'og tu nges par sbyar/ /gzungs ma rnams ni snam bu la ste

gdengs can rigs dang bcas pa'i phyir 'dod ma rnams kha khyer la/ /dbye ba dang ni bskyod pa 'dod mar 'gyur te mi yi bdag po de bzhin rgyas dang rengs 'dod ma/ /lha mo sgrol ma la sogs dag pa yis te srid gsum

skyed ma gsod pa dang ni skyed 'dod ma/ 43 /rol mo 'dod ma dang ni rgyan 'dod mar 'gyur mi yi bdag po zas 'dod ma dang de bzhin nyid/ /dri 'dod ma dang gos ni 'dod mar 'gyur te nges par 'khrig pa 'dod ma dag ni drug pa'o/ /

lus la 'phrug 'dod ma dang kha na gnas pa'i mchil ma 'dor dang lus kyi dri ma 'dod ma dang / /gar 'dod ma dang stan 'dod ma dang chu dang mal stan dag la rkyal dang bsnyes par 'dod ma dang / 44 /tsA muN+Da sogs brgyad kyi

bya ba rnams te de bzhin sa la khro skyes rnams kyi 'dod ma yang / /kun du gdung dang 'chang 'dod ma dang nges par 'jam por smra ba dang ni skems dang skrod 'dod ma/ /reg dang dgug pa dag dang 'ching dang mi yi bdag po

phur bu 'debs dang rgyug pa 'dod mar 'gyur/ /yan lag thams cad bskyod par 'dod ma rab tu gsal zhing nges par bshang gci zag par 'dod ma dang / 45 /sems can rnams la slu 'dod ma dang nges par rtsod pa mang po lnga

pa lhag ma za ba dang / /g.yul 'dod ma dang sbrul 'ching ma dang byis pa khro bar 'dod ma rnams ni lha min rigs la 'gyur/ /sum bcu rtsa bdun phyir 'dod ma rnams slar yang de nas phyi rol dkyil 'khor dag gi kha khyer la/ /

nyin zhag so so'i dus su gang zhig cung zad sems can bya ba rnal 'byor ma yi bya ba 'dir/ 46 /zhes pa de ltar rdo rje can gyis srid pa gsum po mtha' dag rnams kyang dkyil 'khor rnam par gsungs/ /phyi dang lus dang gzhan

la yang ni spro dang sdud pa dag la dngos po'i skye ba yang dag gnas/ /de la rtag pa mkha' yi rdo rje rnam gsum srid pa la gnas mi rtag nyid du 'gyur ma yin/ /'byung po'i tshogs ni rtag pa min par 'gyur te mi yi bdag

po mig 'phrul ji bzhin nyid du'o/ 47 /rtag dang mi rtag mthong ste de lta na yang blun po'i blo can sems ni dag pa'i don slad du/ /sgrub thabs dag ni brjod par bya ste snying por gyur pa 'ga' yang 'dir ni bsgrub par

bya ba med/ /gang zhig bsgrub bya sgrub pa po de 'khrul pa zhes pa rdo rje can gyi sgrub thabs mtha' dag gang / /de phyir rgyal po rang sems dri ma rnam par bral ba dag ni dkyil 'khor dbang por rab tu bya/ 48 /dpal ldan

rdo rje can ni thugs kyi rdo rjer 'gyur te mi bdag dkyil 'khor sku yi rdo rje'o/ /lha rnams 'khor lo A li kA li'i rigs skyes gsungs gi rdo rje zla ba nyi ma'i steng du'o/ /rtsa ba sdong bu dag ni a yig 'dab ma dang ni de

bzhin ge sar rnams kyang u yig go/ /dbus su dpal ldan lte ba dang ni zla ba nyi ma rnam gnyis rkang pa'i gnas dag ma yig go/ 49 /ho yig thog ma tha ma'i snying po bde mnyam 'bras bu ster ba sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ste/ /de ni shes rab

chags pas zhu ba khyab bdag rdo rje can yang ri bong 'dzin pa bzhin bltas nas/ /lha mo rnams kyis klu dag mdzad de bcom ldan khyod ni sems can kun la phan par mdzad pa po/ /bdag cag bsrungs shig lha mi'i bla ma rdo rje ldan pa

'dod pa don gnyer rnams la 'dod pa mdzod/ 50 /rdo rje can des glu dag gsan nas srid pa gsum po mtha' dag rnams kyang mig 'phrul lta bur ni/ /gzigs nas skyed pa mdzad de dri ma med pa'i 'od zer 'phro ba rang

gi mtshan ma spros byas nas/ /rdo rje'i rgyan dang ldan zhing rgyal ba'i bdag po'i cod pan shes rab kyis ni 'khyud par gyur pa yang / /shes rab thabs kyis rgyal po slar yang dkyil 'khor ma lus pa ni rab tu spro ba dag kyang ngo / 51 /

'od zer sngon po 'jigs pa'i sku ste rab tu bzhad pa'i zhal dang mche ba phyed ni gtsigs pa dang / /sgra drag sgrogs byed nyi ma'i spyan dang gnyis lhags rgyal ba'i phyag ste rig byed zhal dang zhabs gnyis pa/ /shes rab thabs la rab byung

mtshon cha rnams dang bcas pa rkang pa brgyad pa'i shing rta dag la gnas/ /rgyal ba'i dgra ni 'joms par byed pa rdo rje shugs te ye shes 'khor lo'i slad du bskul bar bya/ 52 /dri med 'od zer 'phro ba ye shes 'khor lo'i dbang phyug dag ni lte

bar lcags kyus bsnun byas shing / /phyag rnams rang gi rdo rje gdengs can dag gis de bzhin rab bcings mtshon cha rnams kyis 'jigs byas te/ /mtha' dag bsgrub byar byas shing 'khor lo bzang po bskyod par byas nas 'di ni slar

yang 'gro ba ste/ /gzhug dang bcing dang mnyes pa dang ni ro mnyam byed pa dag ni rmugs byed la sogs rnams kyis byed/ 53 /rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor dag la sems ni nam mkha' dang bcas snying po'i pad+mar me yi steng du 'gyur/ /

shar du dpal ldan nag mo 'bar ma mchog gi pad 'dab la ni lho ru dmar mo 'bar ma ste/ /byang du dpal ldan dkar mo 'bar mar 'gyur te rigs kyi dbang gis nub tu ser mo 'bar ma'o/ /mer ni du ba da nu'i bu yi phyogs su smig rgyu ma dang dbang ldan

phyogs su mkha' snang ma/ 54 /rlung du dpal ldan mar me ma ste nor bu dang ni shing dang chos kyi gaN+Di dag dang dung / /me dang rlung dang lha min dang ni 'phrog byed phyogs su de bzhin par gyi zur gyi cha la'o/ /shar du 'du byed dang ni sa dag nges par pad+ma la gnas

lho ru tshor ba chu dag go/ /byang du 'du shes dang ni me ru 'gyur te nub tu yang ni rlung dang bcas pa'i gzugs nyid do/ 55 /me yi phyogs su rlung dang gzugs su 'gyur te lha min bdag por me dang 'du shes gnyis po'o/ /dbang ldan du ni chu

dang tshor ba dag ste rlung du 'dzin ma 'du byed phung por ldan pa'o/ /lha mo sangs rgyas par rnamasu ni le tshe brgyad kyi gnas su bdud rtsi'i ro yi bum pa rnams/ /slar yang 'phar ma phyi ma la ni shar du sna dang dri ste lho ru mig dang gzugs dag

go/ 56 /byang du lce dang ro ru 'gyur te chur ni de bzhin nyid du lus dang reg bya dag tu 'gyur/ /sa 'og tu ni rna ba sgra ru 'gyur te rigs kyi dbang gis lho yi sgo yi g.yon du'o/ /nam mkha' la ni nges par sems dang chos kyi dbyingasu

'gyur te shar gyi sgo yi g.yon du'o/ /dang por thabs ni drug po dag kyang rgyal ba'i dbang gis dkyil 'khor gyi ni lhag pa'i lha ru 'gyur/ 57 /phyi nas shes rab la sogs drug ni rab tu gsal bar bdag po rang rang pad+ma'i gdan la'o/ /shar

gyi sgor ni rab gtum ral gri 'dzin pa shin tu stobs te de yi phyag rgya rengs byed ma'o/ /g.yas su rmugs byed dang ni nga rgyal mar 'gyur nor sbyin du yang khengs byed dang ni rmugs byed ma/ /chu ru rengs byed dang ni mtha' yas brtson 'grus

mar 'gyur sgo yi dbus na gnas pa'i pad+ma la'o/ 58 /dbyug sngon 'od zer can dang mi g.yo zhes dang khro gnyer can ma brtson 'grus mtha' yas lcags sgrog ma/ /'dod pa tsun+dA shing rta la gnas lha dang nor sbyin gzhan dang lho

yi sgo yi dbus su ste/ /gnod mdzes drag spyan ma ni 'og tu 'gyur zhing mkha' la gtsug tor dang ni shin du sngon mo nyid/ /shar gyi sgo yi steng dang gzhan du yang ni nges par 'gyur te gnyis po dag gi shing rta yang / 59 /gsung las skyes

pa'i dkyil 'khor la ni nor gyi phyogs su 'byung po las skyes rnams kyi gdan du 'gyur/ /shar du tsA muN+Da dang dbang por 'gyur te rtse mo can du khyab 'jug ma dang rig byed gdong / /gshin rjer phag mo drag por 'gyur te lha min bdag por

gdong drug ma dang bgegs kyi mgon po'o/ /nub tu dbang mo bden bral du 'gyur rlung du nges par dus kyi gdong ma dang ni khyab 'jug nyid/ 60 /gnod sbyin du ni drag mo gshin rjer 'gyur te phyugs kyi bdag por dpal mo nyid dang gdong drug pa/ /phyi rol gyi ni

dbang po'i sgo yi g.yas su lha min bdag dang de yi phyag rgya srin mor 'gyur/ /mer ni rlung dang rab gtum ma ste me dang chu lha mo yang lho yi sgo yi g.yas su'o/ /lha min bdag por dpal ldan gdong drug pa dang dpal mor 'gyur te nub tu dbang po rlung lha mo/

61 /rlung du tshangs pa dang ni glog mar 'gyur te nor sbyin du yang rgya mtsho dang ni phag mo'o/ /dbang ldan du ni tshogs kyi dbang po gzhon nu ma ste nor sbyin gshin rje'i sgo yi g.yon gyi char/ /drag po dus te khyab 'jug dang ni nor sbyin zhes pa lho

dang nub kyi sgo yi g.yon du'o/ /de dag rnams kyi phyag rgyar rab grags ri sras gshen rje ma dang dpal mo nor gyi dbang mor 'gyur/ 62 /phyi rol du ni lha dang gshen rje nor sbyin nub kyi kha khyer dag la klu rnams mtha' dag ste/ /pad+ma dang ni stobs

kyi rgyu dag g.yo ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nor rgyas bu dang dung skyong ni/ /me la gnas pa dag ste chu yi steng du rigs ldan mtha' yas klur ni rab tu grags par 'gyur/ /de bzhin sa yi dkyil 'khor la gnas rigs kyi dbang gis

'jog po dang ni pad+ma chen por 'gyur/ 63 /de rnams shes rab rab gtum ma rnams dur khrod sa la gnas pa khyi gdong ma la sogs pa ste/ /de rnams thabs ni pad+ma la sogs gzhan gyi rigs kyi dbang gis bde ba dam pa'i don du 'gyur/ /shar

gyi 'khor lor rtse mos 'bigs pa'i dur khrod du ni g.yo ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas khyi gdong ma/ /gshen rje dag tu nges par ro ni bsreg par phag gi gdong ma byang du rul pa dang bcas par/ 64 /stag gdong ma ste chu ru rnag gi drir ni de bzhin nyid du lce spyang

dag gi gdong mar 'gyur/ /me dang lha min bdag por lhag ma dang ni mi bzad g.yul du bya rog gdong ma bya rgod bcas/ /rlung du sbrul gyis zos par mkha' 'gro'i bdag po'i gdong ma dbang ldan du yang byis pa shi bar ni/ /'khor lo la gnas 'ug gdong

ma ste sa yi dkyil 'khor la gnas zla nyi dag kyang bsgom par bya/ 65 /g.yon brkyang ba ni yum gyir 'gyur te mnyam pa'i stabs ni 'dab ma dag gi lha mo'i tshogs kyi'o/ /bcu dang nor gyi tshogs dag gi ni g.yon brkyang sa ga lha min mo rnams kyi yang

zlum po'o/ /g.yon brkyang dag la gnas pa rnams kyi snyoms par 'jug pa g.yas brkyang stabs su nges par 'gyur ba ste/ /sa ga la ni sa ga nyid ces bya bar 'gyur zhing nges par zlum po la yang zlum po'o/ 66 /dkyil 'khor du yang lhag ma'i lha

rnams rab tu gsal zhing nges par rdo rje gdan gyis gnas pa ste/ /rang rigs phyogs gnas lha mo rnams ni rang rang pad+ma zla ba'i steng du pad+ma'i gdan gyis gnas/ /gdengs can rigs dang bcas pa rang rang phyogs kyi bzhon par gnas pa'i lha

rnams rdo rje gdan gyis gnas/ /lha rnams 'dab mar lha mo rnams ni rol pa'i stabs te 'byung po las skyes rnams kyi de bzhin nyid/ 67 /g.yas pa bskum pa dag kyang sa gzhi la ni nges par bkod cing rkang pa g.yon pa brkyang ba dag /

phyed dang bcas pa'i khru gnyis pa ste mi yi bdag po de ni g.yon pa brkyang ba'i stabs su 'gyur/ /g.yon pa'i sbyor ba yis ni g.yas brkyang du 'gyur rkang pa zung ni mnyam pa dag kyang mnyam pa'i stabs/ /yon tan dbang gis pus mo zung

ni rab tu brkyang ba dag las sa ga dang ni zlum por 'gyur/ 68 /cung zad pus mo phyed ni 'khyog pa rol bar 'gyur te lhag ma dag ni rab tu grags pa nyid/ /slar yang rnal 'byor pa yis b+ha ra ta las shes par bya ste rdo rje gar gyi slad

du'o/ /cod pan dag la phan tshun rdo rje yi ni rdo rjer 'gyur te sangs rgyas lnga rnams re 'ga' na/ /gzugs kyi steng du mi bskyod pa ste gsal bar pad+ma 'dzin pa'i rnam par snang mdzad nyid du 'gyur/ 69 /rin chen dbang po'i chu skyes 'dzin dang don

yod grub pa'i cod pan la ni rab mchog nor bu'i phyag /drug gi cod pan ral ba zhes byar 'gyur te yon tan dbang gis lhag ma'i 'khor lo yi yang gzhan/ /sa las 'khor lo rab tu skye bar 'gyur te chu las pad+ma dang ni me las nor bu'o/ /

rlung las ral gri dang ni stong pa dag las rdo rjer 'gyur te 'gyur med las ni gri gug go/ 70 /gos dang bdud rtsi'i snod du 'gyur te nges par me long dang bcas phreng ba dang ni rgyud mangs dang / /drug pa chos 'byung nges par sa dang chu dang sreg za rlung

dang nam mkha'i zhi ba dag las so/ /phub dang mdung dang mda' dang dgra sta dang ni Da ma ru dag mtshan ma lnga ste de bzhin du/ /dbyug pa zhags pa lcags kyu dag dang nges par de bzhin tho ba dang ni rtse gsum dag du 'gyur/ 71 /gzhu dang

ut+pa la dang slar yang de bzhin mgo bo dang ni kha T+wA~M ga dang dril bu dang / /de bzhin lcags sgrog la sogs chu na rgyu ba thod pa stag lpags dang ni glang po'i lpags pa ste/ /'dir ni lhag ma nye ba'i mtshan ma sa dang chu dang sreg za

rlung dang nam mkha' las skyes pa/ /de dag rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis shes par bya ba nyid de lha dang lha mo rnams kyi'o/ 72 /gang zhig li la sogs pa sum bcu'i dbyangs ni sa chu sreg za rlung dang nam mkha' las skyes pa/ /

thung ngu ring po'i rab dbye rnams kyis rim par yongs bkod nges par pad+ma la gnas zla ba dang / /nyi ma'i gdan la gnas pa de dag mtha' dag 'khor lo la sogs mtshan ma rnams kyi rang gi sngags/ /gang zhig kho nar mtshan ma drug

par gyur pa der ni yon tan dbang gis gzhom du med par 'gyur/ 73 /nA da dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpar 'gyur te mi yi bdag po thugs kyi rdo rje a yig go/ /a yig thung ngu ral gri ldan par 'gyur te slar yang ri yig dag ni phyag na

rin chen no/ /u yig thung ngu snang ba mtha' yas su 'gyur slar yang 'dir ni li yig rnam par snang mdzad do/ /bsam pa'i rab tu dbye bas dbyangs kyi tshogs pa ring po mtha' dag rgyal ba drug gi rim pas so/ 74 /dpal ldan yum ni gzhom

du med pa zhes par 'gyur te de bzhin A yig las skyes nam mkha'i khams/ /rlung dang me dang chu dang sa rnams la ni I rI U lI thams cad rim pas gnas par 'gyur/ /mchog gi rgyal ba'i bdag po sna tshogs yum ni bde ba'i don du

phan tshun lus dang bsam pa ste/ /mi bskyod stong pa'i khams dang phyag gi pad+ma ral gri dang ni spyan ma lus dang bsam pa'o/ 75 /rin chen dbang po mA mA kI dang gsal bar pad 'dzin gos dkar mo ni lus dang bsam pa ste/ /de bzhin

'khor lo can dang sgrol ma rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis thung dang ring ba'i dbyangs kyis so/ /a~M yig kun tu bzang por 'gyur te yon tan dbang gis a yig dag kyang phyag na rdo rje'o/ /e yig thung ngu nam mkha'i snying po

ar yig dag kyang de bzhin yang dag sa yi snying por 'gyur/ 76 /o yig 'jig rten mgon po al yang de bzhin 'dir ni rnam par sel bar 'gyur te lus la'o/ /A yig chos kyi dbyings su 'gyur te nges par de bzhin AH

yig las skyes sgra yi rdo rje ma/ /ai yig reg bya rdo rje ma ste lus kyi dbye bas Ar yig las skyes ro yi rdo rje ma/ /au yig gzugs kyi rdo rje mar 'gyur nges par de bzhin Al yig las skyes dri yi rdo rje ma/ 77 /dpal ldan

bzang po chos kyi dbyings dang phyag na rdo rje dang ni sgra yi rdo rje ma dag zung / /nam mkha' snying po dri yi rdo rje ma dang 'jig rten mgon po ro yi rdo rje ma dag zung / /sa'i snying po gzugs kyi rdo rje ma dang reg bya rnam par sel ba dag ni zung du 'gyur/ /

de ltar rigs ni drug po rnam dag rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis yang dag par ni rig par bya/ 78 /ha~M yig gtsug tor 'khor lo can 'gyur lus kyi dbang gis 'dir ni haHyig shin du sngon mo'o/ /ha yig thung ngu

gnod mdzes su 'gyur nges par de bzhin ring po las skyes drag po'i mig ma'o/ /ya~M lAHrim pas rab tu gsal bar shin tu stobs dang rengs byed ma ste gnyis po dag kyang zung / /ra~M wA~MHrmugs byed nga rgyal ma ste wa~M dang rAH

rA: zhes pa ni khengs byed rmugs byed mar 'gyur ro/ 79 /la~M yAHrengs byed shin du brtson 'grus mar 'gyur ya wa ra la dbyug pa sngon po mi g.yo ba/ /'dod pa dang ni mtha' yas brtson 'grus su 'gyur lus kyi dbang gis lha mo rnams kyi ring

po ste/ /yA wA rA lA de bzhin glang po rta dang seng ge dang ni phag gi shin rta dag la 'gyur/ /dbyug sngon 'od zer can dang mi g.yo zhes dang khro gnyer can ma brtson 'grus mtha' yas lcags sgrog ma/ 80 /'dod pa tsun+dA zung du 'gyur te mi bdag

dkyil 'khor la ni bde ba dam pa'i don du'o/ /a yig dag dang a~M dang rnam par bcad pa ha~M dang haHdang ha hA las skyes nus ma brgyad/ /bum pa rnams la de bzhin ha yig rlung dang me dang chu dang sa yi dbyangs kyis phye bar 'gyur/ /

o~M` hU~M ho AHdung dang dri med yon tan nor bu dang ni rkang 'thung chos kyi gaN+DI 'o/ 81 /ha yig tsA muN+Da ste ha~M dang haHzhes bya ba 'dir ni dbang phyug ma dang phag mo'o/ /hA dang k+Sha k+ShA k+ShA~M k+ShaHdbang mo mkha' 'gro'i bdag pos 'gro ma tshangs

ma dpal mo gzhon nu ma/ /hI hrI hU h+lI rgyab tu pad+ma mchog gi 'dab ma la ste thung ngu'i dbyangs rnams mdun du'o/ /k+ShI k+Shi k+ShU k+Sh+lI de bzhin nyid de rab tu gsal zhing nges par thung ngu'i dbyangs rnams de bzhin no/ 82 /shar dang g.yas dang

g.yas min chu dang me dang lha min dbang ldan dang ni rlung gi pad+ma la/ /'dab ma drug la ya sogs dbyangs drug gis phye thung ngu ring po rnams ni rim par yongs bkod pa/ /hi k+Shi la sogs la mtha' thams cad nor ni gdengs

can gyis bsgyur lha mo rnams kyi 'dab ma la/ /rigs kyi dbang gis mngon phyogs tsA muN+Da la sogs pa'i thabs su 'gyur te sngags kyi dbye bas so/ 83 /ta~M na brgya byin chu gter gdong ste pa~M ma: zhes pa rgya mtsho dang ni dpal ldan

tshogs kyi dbang / /Ta~M NaHme dang gzhon nu dag ste tsa~M dang nyaHzhes bya ba srin po'i dbang po dag dang rlung / /ka~M ngaHkhyab 'jug dus te 'phrog byed ces dang nor sbyin dag kyang sa~M dang 'dir ni th+kaHnyid do/ /tsa sogs sde pa dbyangs dang bcas

pa rnams ni lha yi pad+ma'i 'dab mar lha mo rnams kyir 'gyur/ 84 /nag pa'i zla ba sogs kyi tshes rnams dus kyi nges pa'i dbang gis stong pa drug dang me yi grangs/ /de nyid la zhon ha yig rlung me chu dang sa rnams dag la shar la sogs pa'i klu rnams

kyi/ /sde bdun brtsegs pa la gnas k+Sha ya ra wa lar ldan dur khrod du ni lha min mo rnams kyi/ /shes rab thabs kyi lus dang bsam pas rigs kyi dbang las 'dir ni gang zhig dbus su mngon phyogs 'gyur/ 85 /dpal ldan rdo rje can

dang kun bzangs rigs kyi dbang gis rdo rje 'dzin pa phyag na rdo rjer 'gyur/ /don yod grub dang nam mkha'i snying po dri med nor bu'i phyag dang sa yi snying po yang dag go/ /phyag na 'khor lo rnam par sel bar 'gyur te rigs kyi dbang gis 'od dpag

med dang 'jig rten mgon/ /dpal ldan yum dang chos kyi dbyings te sgra yi rdo rje ma dang rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma/ 86 /dpal ldan sgrol ma reg bya rdo rje ma ste rigs kyi dbye bas gos dkar ro yi rdo rje ma/ /mA ma kI dang gzugs shes grags

par 'gyur te rigs kyi dbang gis spyan ma dri yi rdo rje ma/ /khro bo'i dbang po rdo rje shugs dang rgyal ba'i bdag por 'gyur te kun du bzang po de nyid do/ /gtsug tor mi bskyod pa nyid 'dir ni slar yang shin du stobs dang don yod grub par rab tu grags/ 87 /

rmugs byed dang ni phyag na rin chen du 'gyur rigs kyi dbang gis khengs byed dang ni 'od dpag med/ /rengs byed dang ni rnam par snang mdzad du 'gyur stobs ldan phyag na rdo rje dag dang gnod mdzes so/ /mkha' snying dang ni dbyug pa sngon po rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis

sa yi snying po 'dod pa'o/ /rnam par sel dang shin du brtson 'grus su 'gyur rigs kyi dbang gis 'jig rten mgon po mi g.yo ba/ 88 /yum dang khro bo'i dbang po'i phyag rgyar 'gyur te rigs kyi dbang gis chos kyi dbyings ni de bzhin nyid/ /

stong par grags pa shin du sngon mo rlung me chu dang sa la sogs pa mtha' yas brtson 'grus dang / /rmugs byed ma dang khengs ma rengs byed mar ni rim pas rab tu gsal zhing nges par rab tu grags/ /drag spyan sgra yi rdo rje mar 'gyur rigs kyi dbang gis lcags

sgrog ma dang reg bya rdo rje ma/ 89 /'od zer can dang dri yi rdo rjer rab tu 'gyur te khro gnyer can dang tsun+dAr rab grags pa/ /rigs kyi dbye bas nges par ro yi rdo rje ma dang gzugs kyi rdo rjer rim pas shes par bya/ /'dir ni rengs byed dus mthar byed pa nyid

de slar yang shin du stobs dang bgegs dgrar rab tu grags/ /rmugs byed shes rab mthar byed dag tu rab tu 'gyur te de bzhin khengs byed dang ni pad+ma'i dgra/ 90 /rlung me chu sa tsA muN+Da dang phag mo dbang phyug ma dang de bzhin dbang mo bzhi pa ste/ /dri dang gzugs

dang ro dang reg bya zhes pa g.yo ba 'phrog byed lha min mer ni gnas pa yang / /tshangs pa dang ni rnam par snang mdzad du 'gyur rigs kyi dbang gis rgya mtsho dag dang 'od dpag med/ /me dang dpal ldan phyag na rin chen du 'gyur rlung dang don yod grub pa dag

ni de bzhin nyid/ 91 /mi bskyod pa dang lha min dgra bor 'gyur te rgyal ba'i bdag po dang ni bde byed rab tu grags/ /rnam par sel ba gang de brgya byin du 'gyur 'jig rten mgon po tshogs kyi bdag po de bzhin nyid/ /sa yi snying po gdong drug par 'gyur

dpal ldan mkha' snying da nu'i bdag por rab tu grags pa yin/ /dpal ldan phyag na rdo rje dus su 'gyur te drug pa kun du bzang po nor gyi bdag po'o/ 92/ rig ma drug dang phyag rgya drug ni rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis de rnams rang rang phyag rgya

ste/ /phyag rgya rig ma la sogs nyi ma lha yi mchog gi bdag rnams dkar po nag po rdzogs pa'o/ /de dag rnams kyi pad 'dab la ni nor lag tshes te mchu yi zla ba la sogs gang de rnams/ /zla ba drug ni snga ma drug du 'gyur te rigs kyi dbang gis lha mo

rnams kyi phyi ma yang / 93 /klu brgyad gang de bum pa rnams te khyab bdag pad+ma'i 'dab la nus ma de rnams rab gtum ma/ /dpal ldan du ba bya rog gdong mar 'gyur te rigs kyi dbang gis bya rgod gdong ma smig rgyu ma/ /mkha' snang ma ni 'ug pa'i gdong ma

dpal ldan mar me mkha' 'gro'i bdag po'i gdong ma rab tu grags/ /nag mo 'bar ma khyi gdong ma ste dmar mo 'bar ma shin tu rnam 'gyur bzhin ldan phag gdong ma/ 94 /dkar mo 'bar ma stag gi gdong mar 'gyur te rigs kyi dbang gis ser mo 'bar ma lce spyang

ma/ /de bzhin sgeg mo la sogs thams cad rab tu gsal ba rnam bcu sna tshogs yum ni lhag ma'o/ /lha mo sangs rgyas rig ma shing dang bcas shing bum pa dang bcas rgyal ba yi ni dag pa'i sku/ /khro bo'i dbang po byang chub sems dpa' nges par ro yi rdo rje

ma ni chos kyi sku de nyid/ 95 /rnal 'byor ma rnams longs spyod sku ste rab mchog shing rta la gnas lha ni nyi mar rab grags pa/ /klu ni brgyad po rnams dang rab gtum ma rnams 'khor dang bcas pa sangs rgyas kyi ni sprul pa'i sku/ /de bzhin slar yang rgyal

ba'i sku ni dbye ba gnyis su 'gyur te phyi rol dag dang nang na yang / /mngal nas skyes pa ji lta ba nyid de bzhin kho na dkyil 'khor la ni nges par rab tu 'gyur/ 96 /ston pa lha mo sogs dang bum pa lhan skyes rgyal ba'i sku ste dkyil 'khor snying po'i dbus su'o/ /

sangs rgyas la sogs chos kyi sku ste nges par ro yi rdo rje ma sogs longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku/ /khro bo sprul pa'i sku ru 'gyur te yon tan dbang gis dkyil 'khor gyi ni snying por yang dag gnas/ /phyi rol du ni tsA muN+Da la sogs pa lha mo brgyad po 'khor dang

bcas pa dag pa'i sku/ 97 /lha la sogs pa chos kyi sku ste mtha' dag gdengs can rigs kyang 'dir ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku/ /gtum mo rnams ni sprul pa'i skur 'gyur mi yi bdag po sems can kun gyi don gyi slad du'o/ /sku yi rdo rje lhan cig

skyes pa'i sku ni zung du 'gyur te gzugs ni rdzogs pa'i slad du'o/ /gsung gi rdo rje dang ni chos kyi sku yang zung du 'gyur te chos nyid bstan pa'i don du'o/ 98 /thugs dang longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku yang zung du 'gyur te sems can kun
gyi don ni byed pa po/ /ye shes dang ni sprul pa'i sku dag zung du 'gyur te srog chags rnams la thar pa ster ba nyid/ /shes rab thabs kyi lus dang bsam pa mnyam dang mi mnyam rigs ni nyi zla ka sog

a sogs dang / /rnam gsum srid pa la gnas ye shes rnam shes dbye ba dag gis rnal 'byor pa yis rig par bya/ 99 /rdo rje swA hA'i mtha' ldan dag gis mgo dang mgrin pa snying ka lte ba gsang ba spyi bor te/ /

'di dag gis ni byin brlabs yan lag rab mchog rgyal ba'i bdag po lha mo rnams kyis bkru bar bya/ /stong pa chos kyi dbyings dang rdo rje gsum gyi dus dang ye shes mchod pa rjes su chags pa la/ /skyabs su 'gro ba

gsum nas sgrub pa po yis ta da swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85 haM brjod par bya/ 100 /bum pa rnams dang du ba la sogs brgyad po rnams kyis snying kar chos kyi 'khor lor rab tu 'gyur/ /rig ma rnams dang sangs rgyas nyid kyis mgo
bor rtsibs bcu drug pa lhan cig skyes par rab tu grags/ /byang chub sems dpa' la sogs nyis 'gyur mi bdag rnams kyis mgrin par longs spyod rdzogs pa'i 'khor lor 'gyur/ /'jigs ma
la sogs nor ni gdengs can dag gis bsgyur ba rnams kyis lte bar sprul pa'i 'khor lor 'gyur/ 101 /lag pa rkang pa'i tshigs la lha rnams kyi ni las kyi 'khor lo dgu bcu dus kyis bsnun pa ste/ /klu dang
gtum mo mi yi bdag po rnams kyis sor mo'i tshigs kyi mtshams la bya ba zhes byar 'gyur/ /dus kyi dag pas dpal ldan rdo rje can 'gyur mi bdag lo dang zla ba la sogs dbye bas so/ /thugs kyi rnam pa nyi
ma ma yin nyin zhag so so'i dbang gis sna tshogs yum ni rnam par dag 102 /rlung gi dag pas du ba la sogs rang gi snying ka'i pad+mar rtsa yi 'khor lo la gnas rnams/ /nyon mongs rnams kyis drag po

chung mar bcas pa khyab bdag zhabs kyi 'og tu bdud kyi tshogs kyi bdud/ /dung dang gaN+DI ma Ni ljon pa zhes pa dag kyang de bzhin sku yi rdo rje la sogs kyis/ /bum pa brgyad ni bdud rtsi'i yan lag gis te
rgyal dang rnam rgyal bum pa byang chub sems sogs kyis/ 103 /'du byed don yod grub pa tshor ba dri med nor bu'i phyag dang 'du shes snang ba mtha' yas te/ /gzugs ni 'khor lo can no ri bong can dang
stobs khrag bshang ba gci ba rnam par dag pa'o/ /lha mo drug ni khams rnams kyis te yul dang yul can rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' phyag rgyar bcas/ /khro bo lnga ni stobs rnams kyis te nges

par slar yang gzhan pa lnga ni dbang po gzhan rnams kyis/ 104 /tsA muN+Da sogs thun brgyad kyis te pad+ma'i 'dab mar gnas rnams nyi ma'i dus sbyor chu tshod kyis/ /lha min la sogs nyi ma'i zla bas pad+ma'i
'dab mar gnas rnams chu tshod dbugs kyi grangs kyis so/ /gsang bar mi bdag nyis 'gyur chu tshod rnams kyis klu rnams dang ni gtum mo rnams kyang rnam par dag /de bzhin 'dod ma la sogs de dag rang
bzhin yon tan dbang gis lus kyi bya bas rnam par dag 105 /skra rnams kyis ni grub pa mtha' dag ba spu rnams kyis dur khrod sa gzhi la gnas 'byung po'i tshogs/ /de nyid rnams kyis gtso bo'i mtshon
