cha rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis khams kyis phyi yi phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rjes nang gi phyag rgya rdo rje 'dzin pa'i thugs kar zla ba'i steng du yang dag gnas pa'o/ /dpal ldan rdo rje can dang sna tshogs yum ni
rnam gsum srid gnas 'gyur med ye shes dbye ba las/ 106/ dpal ldan dag pa las ni chos skur 'gyur te chos las nges par longs spyod rdzogs sku bzang po'o/ /longs spyod las ni sprul
pa'i sku ru 'gyur te rgyal ba'i bdag po'i sems can kun don byed pa po/ /bzhi pa'i gnas skabs shin du gnyid log nges par slar yang gzhan dang lus kyi dbye bas sad pa ste/ /de ltar lus kyi rab
tu dbye bas srog chags rnams kyi lus la yid ni rnam pa bzhi ru gnas/ 107 /sprul par yid ni longs spyod byed pa po ru rab tu 'gyur te lus dang ngag gi dbang pos so/ /longs spyod rdzogs la ma mthong

sems par 'gyur te yon tan dbang gis chos kyi sku la gnyid kyang ngo / /dag pa la ni bde bar rab 'gyur 'dir ni nyin mtshan dus su thig le grol ba gsum gyi mthar/ /de phyir de ni nyin mtshan dus su rnal 'byor
pa yis bsgom par bya ste 'gyur med don du'o/ 108 /g.yon du srog ni rab tu rgyu bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du ni g.yas pa bskum pa gang yin pa/ /de ni g.yon brkyang stabs te mnyam pa'i stabs dang

gzhan pa g.yas brkyang me dang nyi ma'i rgyu ba las/ /sa ga dang ni zlum po nyid dang mchog gi rol pa'i stabs dang pad+ma dang ni rdo rje'i gdan/ /nam mkha' sogs la rab tu rgyu ba mnyam dang mi mnyam bgrod pa dag

la srog rlung rnam pa lnga/ 109 /gtum mo lte ba'i 'khor lo dgu yis bsnun pa'i lag 'gro tsartsi ka sogs lhag pa'i lha dang ldan/ /ho yig ye shes snying po la ni dri med klog dang mtshungs pa'i ye shes me
ni rab rgyas pa/ /lte bar rnam par snang mdzad la sogs bsreg cing mi yi bdag po spyan ma mig la sogs pa rnams/ /thams cad bsregs nas mgo bor zla ba bzang las thig le'i gzugs ni 'dzag pa

gang de rdo rje can/ 110 /shes rab chos 'byung dag la gnas pa mtha' dag slar yang spro ba byas te nges par thig le yis/ /sna tshogs rgyan dang ldan zhing me long dag la gnas pa lta bu'i ye shes 'khor lo rang byung ba/ /

'dod pa dang ni gzugs dang gzugs med srid pa rnam pa gsum po dag kyang rim pas sbyangs byas te/ /phyi nas ye shes me lce dag gis srid pa gsum po mtha' dag dus gcig tu ni dgug par bya/ 111 /zla ba nyi ma
a sogs ka sogs rnams kyis rnam gsum bgrod gnas sku yi rdo rje sogs bzlas pa/ /so sor sdud pa la sogs drug gis gser bzang pad+ma la ni sku gsung thugs kyi rnal 'byor te/ /dga' ba la sogs rnams

kyis rdo rje chu skyes dag la ro mnyam gyur pas bsgom pa rdo rje gsum/ /shes rab pad+mar sems kyi thig le dag la lhan skyes bde ba'i dbang gis bsgom pa gzhom med 'gyur/ 112 /bdud rtsi lnga la sogs dang

chu gter rdo rje rnams dang sngags kyi bzlas pa sogs kyis bsnyen pa ste/ /so sor sdud pa sogs dang rdo rje pad+ma las skyes bdud rtsi yis ni nye ba'i sgrub par 'gyur/ /dga' ba la sogs rnams kyis rdo rje gsum

dang chu skyes ro mnyam gyur pa bsgom pa sgrub par 'gyur/ /shes rab sbyar la gang tshe 'pho med phra mo'i rnal 'byor dag las nges par sgrub pa chen por 'gyur/ 113 /dang por stong nyid byang chub nges par slar yang de

nas zla ba thig le dag ni yang dag 'dzin/ /de nas gzugs dag bskyed cing rab mchog ro yi rigs rnams dag gis yi ge dgod pa nyid yin te/ /'di ni spyi yi bsnyen pa chu yi gter gyi rdo rje rnams kyis sgrub pa
dag ni 'bring po yang / /'di la thabs ni rnam bzhir 'gyur te dman dang brtan pa bsgrub pa'i yan lag dag de bzhin nyid/ 114 /so sor sdud pa rgyal ba'i dbang por 'gyur zhing rnam pa bcu ste bsam gtan

mi bskyod pa nyid do/ /srog rtsol dag kyang ral gri can no slar yang rnam pa bcu ste 'dzin pa phyag na rin chen no/ /gdol pa mo la rjes su dran pa pad+ma 'dzin par 'gyur te dpal ldan ting 'dzin 'khor lo can/ /
re re dbye ba lnga rnams kyis te slar yang gang las a sogs ka sogs rnams kyis phye ba'o/ 115 /so sor sdud pa lus la yul dang yul can bcu po rnams ni rab tu 'jug pa med pa'o/ /bsam gtan dag

kyang shes rab rtog dang dpyod pa dga' dang g.yo med bde ba rtse gcig sems pa'o/ /srog gi rtsol ba dag kyang lam ni gnyis po bsgyel zhing dbu mar srog ni zhugs pa dag tu 'gyur/ /thig ler srog ni rab tu

zhugs shing gnyis ka'i bgrod pa bcom ste rtse gcig sems pa 'dzin pa'o/ 116 /gtum mo'i snang bar gang zhig gyur pa nges par lus dang nam mkha' la yang rjes su dran par 'gyur/ /shes rab thabs kyi bdag nyid

kyis ni 'gyur med bde ba'i dbang gis ye shes gzugs la ting nge 'dzin/ /'di dag dman pa la sogs dbye ba rnams kyis sna tshogs gtso bo'i sgrub thabs rnam pa gsum du 'gyur/ /phyag rgya gsum dang gnas skabs
gsum ni rnam gsum bgrod pa'i dbang gi las dang kun rtog mchog rnams so/ 117 /so sor sdud pas rnal 'byor pa ni yul dang rnam par bral ba sngags rnams kun gyis byin gyis rlob/ /mngon par shes pa
lnga ni thob par 'gyur te mi yi bdag po bsam gtan sbyor bas dag pa'o/ /srog gi rtsol bas dag pa ri bong can dang nyi ma dang bral byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis mchod/ /bdud dang nyon mongs
la sogs nyams shing stobs bcu la ni 'jug par 'gyur te 'dzin pa'i stobs kyis so/ 118 /rjes su dran pa legs par dag pa dri med 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dag kyang ye shes gzugs las so/ /de nas
ting nge 'dzin gyis dag pa nyin zhag 'ga' zhig dag gis ye shes lus ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /so sor sdud pa la sogs rnams kyis gal te sngags pa rnams kyi 'dod pa grub par ma gyur na/ /nAd goms
pas btsan thabs chu skyes su gnas rdo rje nor bur thig le bkag nas bsgrub par bya/ 119 /bsnyen pa la ni dang po'i rnal 'byor rnam bcu mkha' la 'khor lo can gyi khro bo'i lta bas so/ /bgegs mthar

byed pa'i lta ba bdud rtsi'i lam du son pa yis kyang nye ba'i sgrub la yan lag drug /shes rab la spros zla ba thig le rdo rje nor bur gnas pa'i 'gyur med gsum ni sgrub pa la/ /bde ba ma nyams gcig pu zhi
ba'i lhan skyes ye shes rnal 'byor 'dir sgrub pa chen po la/ 120/ srog gi rtsol ba kun nas bde mnyam 'bras bu ster ba ji srid mgo yi bar du 'dod pa ste/ /de las steng du 'dod pa ma yin 'chi ba'i

'jigs pa byed pa phung po nges par 'jig pa'i rgyu/ /gtsug tor sgo ni phug nas 'gro na mchog gi bde ba'i go 'phang dag la nges par sbyar bar bya/ /phung po med kyang rnal 'byor pa ni bde mnyam 'jug ste 'on

kyang 'jig rten du ni grags pa min/ 121 /dbus su srog ni rab tu zhugs pa sna tshogs yum la yul dang rnam par bral ba'i 'khyud pa ste/ /pad+mar zhugs pa'i rang gi rdo rje spro ba dag kyang de bzhin zla nyi'i dbus
su rab zhugs pa/ /bde ba sa bon ma lhung ba la rab dga'i dga' bar gnas pa rnal 'byor rnams kyi rnal 'byor 'di/ /phyag rgya'i dngos grub don slad khyab bdag gi ni dpal ldan gsang ba las kyang mchog

tu gsang ba'o/ 122 /gtsug tor du ni rdo rje rtse mo lnga par 'gyur te phyi rol rtse mo dag ni nyis 'gyur gyi/ /rdo rje chos kyi 'khor lor 'gyur zhing nyis 'gyur gzhan ma dang ni de yi nyis 'gyur dag kyang gzhan/ /de yi

yang ni nyis 'gyur gzhan du 'gyur te lhan skyes longs spyod rdzogs dang sprul pa'i 'khor lor ro/ /de yi snying por rtse mo gcig pa bde mnyam 'bras ster gsang ba'i pad+ma'i khongs su gnas pa'o/ 123 /rnal 'byor

pa yis nyin dang mtshan mor srog gcod pa dag bya ba de ni srog nyams par gsungs te/ /sgra ni gang zhig zhal gyis dman pa dag kyang snying la gyur pa de ni brdzun du smra ba nyid/ /gang zhig thams cad mkhyen
pa'i ye shes sa ni 'dzin pa dag kyang rnal 'byor pa yis brku bar gsungs/ /thig le ma lhung ba las bde bar 'gyur ba chags bral min las gzhan gyi bud med bsten pa'o/ 124 /srog gi rtsol ba'i

me yis ri bong can ni zhu ba dag kyang btung ba chang ni 'thung ba'o/ /mthe bo'i tshigs nas gtsug tor dag tu nya yi mthar ni rang sems 'gro ste tshes kyi dbang gis so/ /gtsug tor nas ni sor mo rnams su slar yang 'di
ni 'gro ste nag po'i phyogs kyi mtha' ru'o/ /rnal 'byor pa rnams spyod pa gang de nyin zhag so so'i dus su 'dod pa'i dngos grub rab ster ba/ 125 /bsam dang 'dod dang lus la rims dang kha mchog pad+ma

skam dang zas la rab tu mi 'jug dang / /'dar dang smyo dang rab tu rmongs par 'gyur dang yid ni rnam par 'khrul dang drag tu brgyal ba dag /rdo rje can gyi du ba la sogs rab gsal rnam pa bcu ste srog chags
lus la 'jig rten du/ /rab tu gsal zhing nges pa de rnams yid srub gnas skabs su zhig rgyal ba 'dod pa de ni su/ 126 /nyin dang mtshan mor thig le dag las dkar po'i rgyun 'bab gang zhig
mA ma kI de chang ma yin/ /go ku la sogs mig la sogs pa nyin zhag so sor spro ste sha gzhan res 'ga' dag kyang min/ /rang rigs sa la gnas pa'i lha rnams dag gis dag pa'i lus la
bdud rtsi lnga rnams bsnyen pa ste/ /stong par sems ni rab tu zhugs pas ro mnyam byed pa 'khrig pa de ni skye gnas la ma yin/ 127 /nor ni gtong ba sbyin pa yid dang bud med 'grogs pa
las kyang 'pho ba med pa tshul khrims te/ /bzod pa sgra la sogs pa mi 'jug pa ste rlung gi gnyi ga'i bgrod pa 'jig pa brtson 'grus nyid/ /bsam gtan shes rab dag kyang lhan skyes bde la gnas

pa'i sems dang kun du 'gro ba kun gyi skad/ /de las sems can don dang rdzu 'phrul srid pa mthar byed mi skye 'thob ste gzhan pa bzhi rnams so/ 128 /gcig pu'i sku ni nus pa dang ldan gnas dgu dang bcas

nyi shu lnga yi bdag nyid la sogs pa/ /bsgoms na phyag rgya la sogs grub pa rnams su nges par nyin zhag 'ga' zhig dag gis yang dag 'gyur/ /rengs pa dang ni zhi dang dbang dang srid pa 'jig pa dag ni zhal gyi dbye ba
rnams kyis byed/ /'byung ba rnams kyi dkyil 'khor la gnas lha min lag 'gro'i rigs 'di bsgoms pa yis ni bsgrub par bya/ 129 /dkar po yis ni zhi dang rgyas pa byed de rang gi yid la dmar po yis ni

dgug dang dbang / /ser pos rengs dang rmongs pa dag ste nag po'i sprin dang mtshungs pas gsad pa dang ni skrad pa'o/ /bsgom dang bzlas pa de bzhin nyid du rang gi yid la byed de sku gsung thugs dang rdo rje
ni/ /'byung ba rnams kyi dkyil 'khor la gnas srid pa gsum po mtha' dag las kyi dbye bas bsgrub par bya/ 130 /phyogs ni lhag pa las byung bung ba dang ni gser dang mtshungs pa g.yas dang cig shos
dag gis ni/ /phung po'i bdud lta glang chen lpags pa dag kyang ma lus bshus te rkang pa zung zhig dag nas 'dzin/ /lha min dbang po'i khrag gi thod pa rab mchog phyag mthil na ste 'chi bdag bdud kyi
gdong gi phyag /nyon mongs bdud ni zhabs kyis bsgyel ba gnyis lhag rgyal ba'i phyag ni gzhan gyi don du bsgom par bya/ 131 /de la yum ni zhal gcig zung gi phyag gi pad+ma dag la gri gug dpal ldan
thod pa ste/ /nyi ma las ni zla bas rang gi rgyu ba bcu gnyis lhag pa'i gcig rgyu bgrod pa'i dbang gis so/ /de phyir lus kyi rab tu dbye bas rgyal ba'i bdag por 'gyur te sna tshogs yum ni de bzhin
nyid/ /shes rab thabs kyi lus dang bsam pa bde mnyam 'bras ster zla ba nyi ma'i rab tu rgyu bas so/ 132 /gcig la sogs pa mtha' yas zhal te phyag dang zhabs mang du ma'i kha dog mun pa dag gi
mthar/ /shes rab thabs kyi bdag nyid nges par bde mnyam ster te rtsa ni zla ba nyi ma 'gog pa las/ /sa la sogs pa rnams ni kun nas 'bigs byed dri med nor bu dang mtshungs stong pa gcig pu ste/ /

thog ma med cing mtha' med dbus kyang med la yul med yul ni bsgrubs pa dus kyi 'khor lo'o/ 133 /khro bo'i dbang po rdo rje shugs ni gnyis lhag rgyal ba'i phyag dang rig byed zhal dang zhabs gnyis pa/ /

dmar ser spyan dang dbu skra dmar ser rgyal ba'i bdag po'i cod pan mche ba rnon po gtsigs pa ste/ /sbrul gyi rgyan dang rab mchog stag gi lpags pa'i sham thabs dang ni gtso bo'i bzhin du mtshon cha'i phyag /
spyi bor mtha' dag rgyal ba'i rigs kyi thod pa kha dog lnga rnams dag gis phreng ba nges par bcings/ 134 /dri med 'od zer 'phro ba sna tshogs chu skyes nyi ma'i steng du dkyil 'khor sna tshogs mdog
la ni/ /zhabs gnyis dag gis 'byung po'i mgon po lhag pa'i stobs kyis mnan cing g.yas brkyang stabs kyis yang dag gnas/ /'byung po rnams dang lha min gdengs can lha rnams skrag
par byed cing ye shes sems dpa' gcig gyur pa/ /bsgoms na zla ba gcig nyid kho nas dur khrod sa la gnas pa 'byung po'i tshogs ni bsgrub par bya/ 135 /klu rnams chu skyes 'dab brgyad la ste rgyal
dang rnam rgyal dag ni nyi ma'i steng du bsgyel byas nas/ /zhabs dag gis ni gdengs can bdag po zung dang pad+ma'i 'dab mar gnas pa rnams kyi mjug ma yi/ /rtse mo thams cad mnan nas sprin gyi
rigs ni lto ba dag nas nges par kun du spro byed pa/ /de ltar khro bo'i dbang po bsgoms pas nyin zhag 'ga' zhig dag gis sprin gyi tshogs ni bsgrub par bya/ 136 /zhes pa la sogs mi yi bdag

po lha rnams dang ni lha mo rnams kyi sgrub thabs so so ru/ /dkyil 'khor 'dir ni rang gi rgyal ba'i rigs kyi dbang gis las kyi dbye ba mtha' dag rnams kyi 'gyur/ /rengs dang zhi ba dag dang dbang dang gzhan

nor 'phrog dang gsad pa dang ni bskrad pa dag la yang / /sum bcu rtsa drug rnal 'byor ma rnams 'gyur te slar yang bzlas dang sbyin sreg rang gi sa bon gyis/ 137 /zhi ba la ni bsam gtan dag kyang zhi ba ri bong
'dzin pa ltar dkar lha ni zhi ba'i gzugs/ /drag po la yang bsam gtan drag po dang ni sprin nag dang mtshungs lha rnams drag po nyid kyi gzugs/ /dbang du bya la bsam gtan chags pa dang bcas
nyin mor byed pa'i sku ste lha ni chags pa'i gzugs/ /rengs pa la ni bsam gtan rmongs pa dang bcas mchog gi gser dang mtshungs pa'i lha rnams rengs pa'i gzugs/ 138 /zhi dang rgyas
pa dag kyang sras bcas rgyal ba'i rigs dang rgyal po lha mo rnams kyis 'grub par 'gyur/ /dbye dang bskrad pa dag kyang rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis khro bo las skyes rnams kyis 'grub par 'gyur/ /
dbang sogs 'byung skyes rnams kyis rab gsal lha min rigs la phur bus gdab pa'ang lha min mo rnams kyis/ /yum dag gis ni las rnams thams cad gnyi ga'i rdo rje'i rigs la gsad pa dang ni
gso ba yang / 139 /dang por dpal ldan dus kyi 'khor lo dang ni srid gsum skyed ma 'bad pa yis ni bsgrub par bya/ /de nas sa gzhi'i gnas dag tu ni gang zhig zhi ba la sogs las rnams

dag kyang bsgrub par bya/ /pha dang ma yis rnam par dman pa'i bu ni yod pa min par dus kun du ni 'jig rten grags/ /de phyir bde mnyam 'bras ster gnyis po bsgrub par bya ste rnam pa gzhan du las ni 'grub pa

min/ 140 /gtso bo'i thugs khar pad+ma'i dbus su ri bong can dang nyi ma me yi steng du rdo rje ni/ /hUM yig ye shes las skyes 'jig dus sprin dang mtshungs pa rtse lnga 'od zer dang bcas dgod par bya/ /de yi
dbus su dzaHyi lcags kyu'i 'od zer rnams kyis srid pa gsum po mtha' dag bkang byas nas/ /rnam gsum srid pa la gnas ye shes 'khor lo bkug nas rdo rje'i lam du rab tu gzhug bya ste/ 141 /thams cad

zla ba zhu ba dang mtshungs rang gi rdo rje'i kha nas yum gyi pad+mar spro bar bya/ /de ni nyi mar rab tu zhugs pa ro mnyam dag tu 'gyur te a sogs ka sogs rab ldan pa/ /de yi dbus su zhi ba la sogs las kyi ye

shes sa bon du 'gyur rigs kyi dbang gis so/ /de yis rdzogs pa'i lha mo 'am ni lha yang rnal 'byor pa la 'bras bu ster ba nyid du 'gyur/ 142 /dzaHhUM ba~M hoHrim pas lcags kyu zhes dang rdo rje dang ni rdo rje

zhags pa dril bu ste/ / \u0f00 AHhUM hoHde bzhin du gsungs zla ba nyi ma rdo rje de bzhin nyid du 'gyur med do/ /I rI U lI de bzhin nyid du rab gsal ya ra wa la rlung me chu dang sa rnams so/ /haHhUM haM nyi ma

dang ni rdo rje zla ba dag dang gri gug tu yang de bzhin gsungs/ 143 /zla ba nyi ma'i dbus su A li kA li dang bcas chu yi sa bon bdag nyid chu skyes te/ /de las rdzogs pa'i lha mo zla ba'i mdog can zhal gcig

ma ste zung gi phyag gi pad+ma can/ /glang chen dkar po la zhon phyag na chu skyes dkar dang mi 'jigs pa dang gos ni dkar po dang / /dkar ba'i rgyan dang ldan zhing rab tu bzhad pa'i zhal ni bsgoms nas bsgrub bya'i khyim du
bskul bar bya/ 144 /de nas bsgrub bya bzung nas slar yang khyab bdag dkyil 'khor du ni yang dag rab tu gzhug par bya'o/ /gtso bo'i bka' ni rab tu thob nas spyan ma la sogs rab dgyes rnams kyis bdud
rtsi'i bum pa yis/ /bsgrub bya de ni bkru bar byed cing rab mchog rnam pa bcu yi nus ma rnams kyis mchod par byed/ /gzugs la sogs pa rnams kyis gso bar byed cing rab gsal sgeg mo la sogs
bcu yis tshim par byed/ 145 /'byung por grags pa rnams kyis 'jigs pa med byed rab mchog rnam bcu khro skyes rnams kyis skyong bar byed/ /klu mo rnams kyis 'o dag byed cing 'chi med na chung

bcu gnyis rnams kyis 'khyud pa dag tu byed/ /gtum mo rnams kyis bsrung ba byed de mtha' dag sa gzhi dag la zhi rgyas don gyi slad du'o/ /de ltar bsgrub bya yi ni mchog gi bde ba byed pa thams cad rnal

'byor pa yis bsgom par bya/ 146 /zla ba nyi ma'i dbus su hrIHste ut+pal kha ma bye ba'i mda' nyid dang ni i k+Shu'i gzhu/ /de las rdzogs pa nyi ma ltar gsal phyag ni gnyi gas gzhu dang mda' ni rna ba'i

bar du bkang / /pad+ma dang ni ri bong 'dzin par g.yon brkyang rta la zhon pa bsgrub bya'i khyim du bskul bar bya/ /bsgrub bya yi ni snying kha lte ba gsang ba dag dang mgo dang kha la mda' yis bsnun byas
shing / 147 /mgrin par gzhu yis bcings nas de yis bskyod pa dag kyang dkyil 'khor du ni khrid par byed pa ste/ /gtum mo rnams kyis gos dang bral ba byas shing klu mo rnams kyis kyang ni
nges par bkri ba byas/ /lha mo rnams kyis spyo bar byed cing khro skyes rnams kyis gtun shing dbyug par bcas pa dag gis bsnun/ /'byung po rnams kyis 'jigs par byed cing
sgeg mo la sogs rnams kyis kyang ni sen mo rnon po 'debs/ 148 /rdo rje ma rnams kyis ni blo gros nyams byas sa dang chu dang sreg za rlung rnams dag gis bcings/ /nus ma rnams kyis gos bral
rgyags pa mtha' dag bcom zhing gtso bo yi ni zhabs la ltung bar byas/ /de ltar dbang du byas nas slar yang khyab bdag dag gis tshim par byas te der ni bsgrub par bya/ /de bzhin zhags pa
lcags kyu dag gis khams gsum po nas dgug pa'i las ni rnam pa mang por 'gyur/ 149 /nyi ma zla ba'i dbus su sprin nag dang mtshungs hU~M` yig ring po las skyes ral gri bsgoms byas nas/ /de las

byung ba bung ba'i mdog can phyag gi pad+ma ral gri dang ni sdigs mdzub zhags pa'i phyag /rnga mo'i steng du g.yon pa brkyang zhing rab tu khros pa'i zhal ni bsgrub bya'i khyim du bskul bar bya/ /bsgrub
bya zhags pas bcing ba byas nas khros pa'i zhal gyis dkyil 'khor gyi ni sgo ru khrid byas te/ 150 /yaHyig las skyes rnga mo mgyogs pa rlung ltar bgrod pa de la gtso bo'i gsung gis bsgrub bya ni/ /
zhon pa rtse mo can dang g.yo ba'i dkyil 'khor ji srid nyid du rang bzhin gyis ni bskul bar bya/ /de ltar lha yi bdag po dag kyang nges par bskrad par 'gyur na mi rnams dag ni smos ci dgos/ /dbye ba
la yang rnga mos dman zhing rtsod mang byas pa dag ni g.yas dang g.yon du bkri bar bya/ 151 /nyi zla'i dbus su laHzhes bya ba yongs gyur 'khor lo bzang po kha dog ser po bsgoms byas nas/ /

de las byung ba zhal gcig pa ste mchog gi gser dang mtshungs pa phyag na lcags sgrog 'khor lo can/ /rus sbal la ni lha min gdan gyis gnas shing shin tu dal 'gro bsgrub bya'i khyim du bskul bar bya/ /bsgrub
bya 'khor los 'jigs par byas nas sa la rab tu bsgyel te lcags sgrog gis ni rkang pa bcings/ 152 /dkyil 'khor du ni kun du khrid cing rgyal ba'i bdag po'i bka' yis 'dzin ma la ni bsgyel byas nas/ /
de yi steng du bsgrub bya'i lus la lhun po mchog gi gser gyi rang bzhin dgod bya rengs la ste/ /phur bus gdab pa'i don du tshigs drug la ni rdo rje'i rang bzhin phur bu rnams kyis gdab par bya/ /
rmongs pa la yang sbrul rnams kyis ni kun du za bar byed cing sa la 'gyel bar bsgom par bya/ 153 /nyi ma zla ba'i dbus su dri med glog dang mtshungs pa'i gri gug gyi rang bzhin bsgoms byas nas/ /

de las byung ba'i rab tu gtum mo 'jig dus sprin dang mtshungs pa phyag na gri gug thod pa can/ /rta yi dgra yi steng du g.yon pa brkyang zhing gos dang bral bar bsgrub bya'i khyim du bskul bar bya/ /bsgrub bya'i skra
rnams dag las myur du bzung zhing de yis dkyil 'khor du ni gos kyis dman pa yang / 154 /kun du khrid de dpal ldan dur khrod dag tu rgyal ba'i bdag po'i bka' yis bya rgod bya rog dang / /lce spyang
rnams kyis bsgrub bya'i yan lag kun las khrag 'thungs sha dang de bzhin du ni khams kun zos/ /de ltar ma lus pa ni rab mchog sa yi gzhi la bsgom par bya ste gsad pa dag la'o/ /bsam gtan

'di yis brgya byin dag kyang gshin rje'i grong khyer 'gro na mngal nas skyes pa smos ci dgos/ 155 /zhi dang rgyas pa la yang rigs kyi dbang gis chu yi sa bon las ni bsam gtan dkar por 'gyur/ /dbang dang
dgug pa la yang dmar po lus ni bsreg par byed pa me yi sa bon bdag nyid do/ /dbye ba dang ni bskrad pa la yang 'jig dus sprin dang mtshungs pa rlung gi sa bon bdag nyid do/ /rengs pa rnams ni
phur bus gdab pa sogs la gser zhun dang mtshungs sa yi sa bon rang bzhin no/ 156/ stong pa'i sa bon las ni sngon po'i mdog dang ljang kur 'gyur te gsad dang gso ba dag la'o/ /sa yi zad par

kun nas chu yi gter du 'gro ba la ste rlung gi zad par char pa ni/ /nyams pa'i don te me yi zad par dag kyang sa yi dkyil 'khor bzhu ba'i don te me dag kyang / /nyams pa'i don du chu yi zad par du 'gyur

stong pa'i zad par mkha' la 'gro dang snang min la/ 157 /glang po'i bdag po gzhom pa la ni me yi sa bon nyid las gdong lnga pa yi bsam gtan 'gyur/ /klu yi dbang po gzhom pa la ni mkha' lding dkar po chu

yi sa bon bdag nyid can du 'gyur/ /bse dang seng ge dag la rkang brgyad 'jig dus sprin dang mtshungs pa rlung gi sa bon bdag nyid can/ /rta yi dgra la bse zhes grags pa sa yi rigs kyi dbang gis lha min
gzhom la khro bo skyes/ 158/ khyab bdag gi ni dpal ldan sngags dang sangs rgyas gzugs kyang rnal 'byor pa yis dang por bsgrub par bya/ /phyi nas nyi ma'i dbye ba rnams kyis gnas pa yon tan
dpag tu med pa'i las rnams 'grub par 'gyur/ /sngags dang gzugs brnyan ma grub par ni srid gsum gnas su ci yang 'grub par 'gyur ba nyid ma yin/ /de phyir rgyal po rang sems dri ma rnam
par bral ba dag la sngags dang gzugs ni bsgrub par bya/ 159 /dpa' bo g.yul gyi dus su lhung bar gyur pa zhes pa 'am ni de bzhin chom rkun spyangs pa dag /brgyad dang 'byung po'i mtshan mo mi yi

bdag po ro bsreg sar ni bum pa brgyad kyis bkru bar bya/ /dri dang spos dang mar me dang ni rnam mang kha zas me tog dmar po rnams kyis rab mchod nas/ /mgo dang snying ka dang ni spyi bo lte ba la sogs su

yang rdo rje dgod pa rab byas te/ 160 /thab khung zur gsum du ni rdul tshon dmar pos snying po'i pad+ma gang zhig mtshan mar bcas pa dang / /'dab mar rgyal rnams mtshan ma phyogs su phyogs bral du ni de bzhin lha mo
rnams kyi rang mtshan ma/ /phyi rol re khA gsum la phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor du ni de bzhin khro bo'i mtshan ma rnams byas nas/ /de yi g.yas min du ni yi dags lag pad ral gri dkyil 'khor las ni g.yas

su rkang pa'o/ 161 /sngar brjod ma mo'i skyon las rgyal ba'i bdag po'i rdo rje rnams kyis bdag nyid bsrung ba rab byas nas/ /sngags pas thab kyi g.yas su khrag dang bcas pa'i sha rnams dag gis sbyin sreg nyid ni

rab byed pa/ /de yi sngags ni oM hrA+oM phaT kyi mtha' ste bcu yis bsgyur ba'i brgyar ni sbyin sreg bya/ /rdo rje dkyil dkrung bcas nas 'chi med ri bo bzhin du g.yo ba med pa nyid du mtshan mo phyed/ 162 /sbyin sreg rdzogs

na ro 'dzin ral gri lta bur 'khyug cing 'bar la mche ba rnon po mig gsum pa/ /gang zhig sgra sgrogs sa yang rkang pas rnam par 'gems shing sgrub pa po ni 'jigs par byed pa de/ /thab kyi mtha' ru gnas nas ka ha ka ha dgod

par byed cing 'jigs pa'i lus kyis gar byed de/ /de mthong nas ni 'jigs pa'i sngags pa sems nyams skad cig gis ni gshin rje'i grong khyer 'gro bar 'gyur/ 163 /ro bsreg gnas su sngags pas dngos grub rgyur ni lha min dbang

po las kyang 'jigs par mi bya ste/ /g.yo ba med pa'i sems mthong nas ni slar yang bsgrubs pa'i 'byung po'i mgon po 'di skad smra bar 'gyur/ /dpa' bo bzang po khyod kyis bdag ni grub po mtha' dag smros shig da ni bdag gis ci

zhig bgyi/ /de skad brjod na sgrub pa po yis gzhan gyi don du rang yid la 'dod don du gnyer bar bya/ 164 /ral gri reg pa bcud kyi dbang po bdud rtsi'i 'bras bu'i ri lu ro tsa na dang mig sman dang / /rkang pa byug dang shing lham dag

dang 'jig rten pa yi dngos grub brgyad po khyod kyis bdag la stsol/ /dbye dang bskrad pa dang ni srid pa gzhom pa nyid dang rengs pa dang ni dgug pa dag dang dbang / /bdag gi dngos grub thams cad mdzod cig de yis slar yang 'di dag thams

cad bdag gis bgyi'o smra/ 165 /'byung po'i dbang po bsgrubs nas mi yi bdag po sgrub pa po ni sa 'og dag dang bar snang dang / /lha yi mchog gi khang pa dang ni lhun po'i rtse dang rgya mtsho'i pha rol gang yin der 'gro ste/ /de la zhon pa phyag na ral

gri thogs pas sa yi steng gi gnas su 'jig rten bya ba byed/ /de phyir sems can don gyi slad du mchog gi snying rje yis ni lha min dbang po bsgrub par bya/ 166 /ming gi dang po thugs kyi rdo rjer 'gyur te mi yi bdag po lha dang lha mo rnams

kyi'o/ /gsung gi rdo rje ming gi yi ge thams cad de las lhag pa dag kyang sku yi rdo rje ste/ /de las yan lag so so'i sngags ni rnam pa mang por 'gyur te klags pas grub pa brgya lam na/ /bsgom bya mchod bya bzlas bya rang gi

rgyal ba'i rigs kyi dbang gis thugs gsung sku yi dbye bas so/ 167 /so sor sngags kyi rigs ni nges par bye ba bzlas par rab tu 'gyur te rab tu grags pa'o/ /sbyin sreg de las bcu yi cha shas rang bzhin yon tan dbang

gis grub par 'gyur ba ji srid nyid/ /phyi nas zhi ba la sogs rnams la 'bras bu ster bar rab 'gyur rnam pa gzhan du 'grub mi 'gyur/ /bsam gtan dang bcas bzlas dang sbyin sreg brtul zhugs nges ldan rnams

kyi sngags kyi skye gnas bsgrub par bya/ 168 /grub pa lcags gsum gyis bcings mkha' la 'gro ba'i sha yi ri lus bus mkha' la spyod pa nyid dag ste/ /khyi dang rta la sogs pa'i sgron ma rnams kyis lus la bkres

skom la sogs nad rnams 'phrog par byed/ /de dag rnams kyi mig dang mkhris pa rnams kyis mi mchog rnams kyi mig sman sa ni rab 'byed dang / /mi snang ba dang dbang du bya ba na chung yid 'phrog dpal ldan dur khrod

du ni bsgrubs pa'o/ 169 /nag po'i brgyad kyi mtshan mo dag gam yang na ma nu'i nyin zhag la ni dkyil 'khor bzhengs byas nas/ /bsrung ba dag kyang kun nas byas te de yi dbus su sha yi ri lu bu dag gam mig sman ni/ /byas nas

shin du dri bzangs me tog rnams kyis yang dag mchod de sngags kyi bzlas pa rab tu bya/ /ji srid mkha' la nyi ma bzhin du 'od zer 'phro ba'i bar te de nas blangs la gzung bar bya/ 170 /'tsho bar pho nya de ni 'tsho la nam mkha'i

phyogs su gnas na sos zin 'chi ba thob par 'gyur/ /pho nya'i dri ba mi mnyam pa gang nges par bde ba'i 'bras ster mnyam pa 'chi ba ster bar brjod/ /pho nya sbrul la sogs pa'i ming dag rab tu brjod na de las sos zin

'chi ba thob par 'gyur/ /gal te srog ni rab tu 'jug la dris na dge bar 'gyur te 'byung ba la ni dge min 'gyur/ 171 /pho nya'i rkang pa g.yon pa mdun na na chung mar brjod g.yas pa mdun du yin na skyes pa'o/ /lag pas rang

gi yan lag dag la gang du reg pa'i phyogs 'dir mi de so yis zin pa ste/ /mig dang kha ni rab tu gdangs pa dag dang rna ba'i rtsa bar nag po yang ni 'chi bar brjod/ /gal te snying ka'i pad+ma dkar por sgra ni cung zad gyur na de ni

rab tu bsdu bar bya/ 172 /dang por bsrung ba'i cho ga so yis zin pa dang ni bdag nyid la yang bde ba byed par 'gyur/ /sa chu me rlung de bzhin nam mkha' dag kyang mthe bo la sogs la ni nges par sbyar bar bya/ /la

la sogs pa ha yi mtha' rnams rim pas brla dang lto ba snying ka kha nang dpral ba la/ /hu~M k+Shu~M h+ya h+yA la sogs klu bcu mi mnyam mnyam pa thung ngu ring po'i rab tu dbye ba yis/ 173 /g.yon gyi lus la sa bon thung ngu rna ba

mgrin pa la gnas mchan khung dku dang brla phyogs la/ /g.yas kyi lus la gdengs can rnams kyi ring po nyid du rab 'gyur spro dang bsdu ba'i dbye bas so/ /rgyal ba zhes grags sor mo shin tu mnyam pa'i 'dam

bu sbrul gyi sa bon ldan pas bsrung byas nas/ /hu~M k+Shu~M ldan pas snying kar shin du bsnun na myur du so yis zin pa bskyod par byed par 'gyur/ 174 /sa yi sa bon dpral ba la ste mkha' skyes rkang par gnas pas myur du rengs par

byed par 'gyur/ /spyi bor chu dang rtse mo can ni lto bar rab tu bcug na dug ni med pa nyid du 'gyur/ /dpral bar rlung gi sa bon dang ni snying kar rtse mo can gyis nges par dug ni 'pho ba ste/ /spyi bor stong pa rab tu zhugs shing sa ni

rkang par gnas pas nges par dug ni gcod par byed/ 175 /dpral bar thig le dkar po yis ni rnam pa gsum gyi dug kyang nges par dug ni med par byed/ /dmar pos bskyod cing nag po'i sprin dang mtshungs pas 'jug pa dang ni kha dog ser pos

rengs par byed/ /tsha ba gsum po sbyar ba'i sdong bu srog ni rab tu 'bab par dug med byed la sbyar bya ste/ /yang na kha ni rnam par phye ba'i lce'u chung la sor mo yis ni Ta ga Na sbyar bya/ 176/ dzA tI badzri gzhon nu tshwa ba

gsum dang lan tshwa lang+ga lI dang de ba dA li dang / /brah+mI k+ShA ro a shwa gan+d+ha nyin mor byed pa dang bcas ban d+ha karko Ta ki dang / /bshang ba sha dang khu ba khrag ni mnyam pa dag kyang mi bskyod pas btags ri lu byas pa ni/ /sna ru bkod pas

'byung po 'am ni 'byung po rims dang brtan dang ltos 'gro'i dug ni nges par 'joms/ 177 /nyi ma la sogs gza' bdun dag ni nyin dang mtshan mo'i dus te bdun gyi cha yi mtha' ru ni/ /spen pa nyi ma'i dbus su stong pa rigs

ldan ma dag 'chi gzugs chu tshod phyed ni rab tu rgyu/ /de la klu dang rtse bar mi bya rnam pa gsum po dag gi dug kyang bza' bar mi bya ste/ /de nyid la ni sbrul gyi sos zin 'byung pos btab dang mtshon gyis phug pa gshin rje'i grong

khyer 'gro/ 178 /nyi ma gung dang mtshan mo phyed la nyin mtshan dus su rtag tu rgyu ba'i rab tu dbye ba dang / /tho rangs dag dang nyi ma nub pa la yang de bzhin du ni 'chi ba'i dus kyi chu tshod de/ /thun 'tshams dbus su stong pa chu gter dag

la rigs ldan dus kyis sos zin chu tshod gcig rab rgyu/ /'di dag sgra gcan gdong pa rnams su nyin zhag so so'i dus su yang dag par ni rig par bya/ 179 /nyi ma la ni mtha' yas longs spyod nyin dang mtshan mo'i dus su nyin

mo'i dang po'i cha la'o/ /phyi nas lhag ma can te 'dir ni lto 'phye rnams dag gza' bdun rab tu dbye bas 'char bar 'gyur/ /mkha' dus mkha' dang bug pa mkha' mda' mkha' dus mkha' nor mkha' ri mkha' me dag gi chu tshod

rnams/ /nyi ma la sogs las kyang gdengs can nor rnams dag gi longs spyod longs spyod dbye bas dug tu 'gyur/ 180 /mtha' yas rigs ldan zhes pa bram ze kha ba'i mdog ste nor rgyas bu dang dung skyong rgyal rigs dmar/ /pad+ma chen

po dang ni de bzhin nyid du 'jog po rje rigs mchog gi gser dang mtshungs pa'o/ /stobs kyi rgyu dang pad+ma dmangs rigs sprin nag dang mtshungs mthar skyes dag ni kha dog sna tshogs so/ /de dag rnams kyi skye gnas dag kyang chu dang rtse mo

can dang 'dzin ma rlung dang nam mkha'i khams/ 181 /mkha' lding zhes pa rkang pa nas ni dpyi mthar ser po de bzhin lte ba'i mtshams su kha ba'i mdog /mgrin pa'i bar du kha dog dmar po sprin nag dang mtshungs smin ma'i 'khri shing ji

srid nyid du ste/ /de phyir nges par kha dog sna tshogs gdengs can rigs dang bcas pa de nyid lnga yis rgyas btab pa/ /bsgoms na de yi phyag rgyas gdengs can dug dang 'byung po'i nad la sogs pa dag kyang nges par 'phrog 182 /

rang gi snying ka'i pad+ma dag la nyi ma'i steng du k+ShiM gyi yi ge 'dab chags mgon po ni/ /klu yi rgyan dang ldan zhing mtha' dag rigs kyi dbang gis kha dog lnga rnams 'phro ba bsgom par bya/ /de nas 'dab chags mgon po'i sngag

ni dang por oM yig dag dang pak+Shi swA hA'i mtha' can te/ /de ni bye ba phrag gcig bzlas nas gdengs can rigs dang bcas pa'i 'dab chags mgon po bsgrub par bya/ 183 /mkha' lding grub na gdengs can dbang po rnams dang

gdengs can bdag po'i bu rnams mngag gzhug nyid du 'gyur/ /rab mchog sa yi steng du 'byung po gnod sbyin gdon rnams dag dang mkha' 'gro ma dang ma mo rnams/ /sngags kyis dgug par rab tu 'gyur te gdon gyi tshogs pa mtha' dag dus kyi

sos zin brjod par byed/ /de phyir sems can don gyi slad du dang por mi rnams kyis ni mkha' lding dbang po bsgrub par bya/ 184 /rig byed dang ni 'dab brgyad nyid dang mi yi bdag po so dang chu gter drug dang gnyis skyes la/ /snying por bsgrub bya

rang gi phyogs su dang por a~M a zung ste i la sogs pa 'dab brgyad la/ /e ya la sogs bcu drug la ste ka sogs gsum gyis bsgyur ba'i bcu dang ha k+Sha gnyis skyes la/ /thun mtshams 'dab ma rnams la bsgrub bya tshes kyis bsgyur ba'i

dus la la mtha' dbyangs dang bcas pa rnams/ 185 /a sogs dbyangs ni re re dag gis chu srin bum pa'i dbang las ring po thung ngu dag kyang lnga/ /phyi rol 'dab ma sum bcu gnyis la bdag gi snying po badzra tIk+Sh+Na la sogs yi ge rnams/ /

de dag rnams kyi phyi rol du yang zhi sogs las la wa ya ra la dkyil 'khor rnams nyid do/ /snying por yi ge yan lag mchog dang rtse mo can dang g.yo bar rkang pa dbang dang dgug pa la/ 186 /zhi ba sogs la snying por rkang pa dang ni me dang

rlung du mgo bo sngags pas bri bar bya/ /zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa srid pa gzhom pa dag dang bskrad dang dgug dang dbang du bya ba dang / /rengs pa dang bcas rmongs pa dag kyang srid pa gsum gyi gnas su 'khor lo 'di ni byed de 'dir/ /sngags brjod

bzlas pa sbyin sreg rnams kyis dang por badzra tIk+Sh+Na la sogs sngags chen bsgrub par bya/ 187 /rtsibs brgyad la ni phyogs dang phyogs bral du gnas bcu gnyis rtsibs dang bcu drug rtsibs la bar du yang / /bsgrub bya zur rnams

su ste dbus su rab 'gyur ya ma rA dza sa do me ru Na las yo/ /de nas snying po'i rtsibs kyi dbus nas da ni ra ya k+She ts+tsha de nas mthar ni ni ru 'gyur/ /de yi phyi rol oM hrIM Sh+TIM dang bi kr-i tA na na las rnam gnyis hU~M dang phaT du 'gyur/ 188/ re mig nas ni re mig

bar la 'gyur te mi yi bdag po bsgrub bya'i ming dang sngags 'di'o/ /dbye dang gsad dang dbang la ya ma rA ni rab tu 'gyur te k+She da me do sa tsa sogs/ /rengs dang dgug dang rmongs pa dang ni stobs ni byed pa dag dang zhi ba dang ni bskrad pa la/ /der ni snying po

dag nas ya yig 'gro ste yon tan dbang gis phyi rol thams cad snga ma bzhin/ 189 /yi ge rnams kyi yan lag mchog las mdun du dbyangs kyis 'khyud pa dag ni ma ru rab tu 'gyur/ /yi ge rnams kyis sde mtha'i yi ge rdo rje rigs kyi

dbang gis lnga pa ha~M dang sa~M du gsungs/ /thig le gnyis kyis dbyangs mchog sbyar ba la ni 'di yang bdag gis shes rab yi ge u ru 'gyur/ /ma~M muHha~M huHsa~M suHmany+dzuHnyid ni pad+ma nor 'dab la ste nyi ma'i 'dab ma la/ 190 /phyi rol

du shrI badzra g+ho ShaHsa dang ldan pa'i man+ta b+ha dra hU~M dang phaT du 'gyur/ /bsgrub bya 'dir ni lte ba la ste che ge mo yang mdzod cig dpal ldan zhi ba sogs la bskul/ /de bzhin sngar brjod 'khor lo rnams dag la yang rtag tu bsgrub bya'i ming ni

bri bar bya bar 'gyur/ /'di dag thams cad bdag gis drin las rgyal ba'i bdag po'i bka' yis mi rnams kyis ni 'grub par 'gyur/ 191 /sgra ni gang zhig snying ka'i phyogs na yod pa mi mchog rnams kyi rna ba'i bu gas thos gyur pa/ /

de la mi yis sems ni gcig tu gyur par sbyar ba dag kyang ro ni mnyam par 'gyur ba ste/ /'jig rten kun du sgra ni gang zhig srid par skyes pas brjod pa de dang de ni de bzhin thos/ /khyab bdag gi ni rnam shes nyid dang ring du thos pa

dag kyang rnal 'byor pa yis bsgom par bya/ 192 /dkyil dkrung bcing ba byas nas phan tshun so dag reg pa min par kha ni rnam par phye ba yis/ /phyi rol rlung dag bkug ste de dang bdud rtsir bcas pa lte ba'i dbus su rab tu bcug pa

yis/ /kun du gdung ba dang ni bkres dang skom pa 'phrog cing mchog gi lus la dug kyang yang dag 'gog /dpral bar thig le dkar po dbyangs kyis yongs su bskor ba bdud rtsi spro bar byed pa yis kyang ngo / 193 /kha yang

bkab ste sna yi bug pa gnyis ka dag nas phyi rol dag gi rlung ni ma lus pa/ /srog gi shugs kyis bkug ste dri ma med pa'i glog dang mtshungs pa thur sel rlung dang sbyar byas pa/ /dus kyis goms pa'i sbyor ba dag las zla ba nyi ma me

yi dbus su ro ni mnyam par 'gyur/ /lus la zas la sogs pa dang ni bkres dang skom pa 'phrog ste 'chi ba med pa nyid kyang ster/ 194 /nyi ma las ni gzhan du phyogs te nyi 'od la gnas rang gi grib ma brtan pa'i mig gis blta/ /

phyi nas nam mkha' dag la mngon par brtags na ro mnyam skyes bu du ba'i kha dog mthong bar 'gyur/ /zla ba drug tu goms pa'i sbyor ba dag las sa la gnas pa'i gter ni sa yi bu gar mthong / /yang na shing gi grib ma rab tu zhugs

te nam mkha'i mthil du thig le'i phreng ba bsgoms pas so/ 195 /nus ma gang zhig lte ba'i dbus nas gzhan gyi gnas su bcu gnyis mtha' dang cha yi mthar 'gro ba/ /de ni lte bar 'gog pa dang bcas dri med glog dang mtshungs

pa dbyug pa'i gzugs can langs pa yang / /'khor lo nas ni 'khor lo'i bar du nges par dman zhing rol pa'i bgrod pas dbu ma'i rtsa la bskyod/ /ji srid gtsug tor bug par btsan thabs nyid kyis phyi rol gyi

ni lpags pa dag la khab bzhin reg 196 /de yi dus su thur du sel ba mchog gi btsan thabs nyid kyis steng gi lam du bskul bar bya/ /zung gi rlung dag 'gags pa na ni gtsug tor phug nas mchog gi grong khyer

dag tu 'gro bar 'gyur/ /de ltar yid la rdo rje rab tu sad pas yul dang bcas pa mkha' la spyod pa nyid du 'gyur/ /mngon shes lnga yi rang bzhin du 'gyur slar yang 'di ni rnal 'byor pa rnams dag gi sna tshogs

yum/ 197 /phyag rgya sgyu ma'i rjes su 'thun pa yid dang nam mkha' la ni me long dag la gzugs bzhin te/ /'jig rten gsum po snang bar byed cing dri med glog dang mtshungs pa'i 'od zer du ma 'phro bar byed/ /phyi dang lus la

dbyer med yul dang rnam par bral ba snang ba tsam ni mkha' la gnas pa yi/ /sems dang sems byung la ni bdag gis 'khyud de 'gro ba du ma'i gzugs kyis de ni gcig pu'o/ 198 /snying ni rnyog pa dang bcas las kyi phyag

rgya 'di dag brtags pa'i ye shes phyag rgya gtang bya ste/ /yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub slad du rgyal ba mchog gi skyed ma mchog gi phyag rgya gos pa med/ /rnam par 'gyur ba med cing mkha' mnyam mun bcom khyab

byed rnal 'byor dag gis bgrod bya brtsegs par gnas/ /ye shes gzi brjid srid pa'i dri ma 'phrog cing dus kyi 'khor lo rjes su rig pa bsgom par bya/ 199 /srid gsum phra rab gzugs min 'dir ni rnam par shes pa de

bzhin rnam par shes pa nyid med de/ /sangs rgyas shes rab gang du'ang gnas pa ma yin zhes pa'i tshig ni sangs rgyas pa rnams ston par 'gyur/ /gang gis 'gyur med dang bral mi rnams kyis ni stong pa nyid de bzung nas stong par lta

byed pa/ /des na gtso bos gang zhig 'pho med lhan skyes lus kyi bde ba dag ni sngags kyi theg par bstan/ 200 /ba lang bse rta glang po'i mgon song mchod sbyin dus su lus kyi yul la khyod kyi dbang po ni/ /bde bar
bzung bgyi gang de yul dang yul can rnams ni ye shes sbyor ba dag la 'gog pa ste/ /bslab ldan rnams kyi ba lang lpags par so ma bal+li'i btung ba khrag dang bcas par gyur pa gang / /de ni spyi bo'i

zla ba'i bdud rtsi b+ha ga'i rdul la gnas shing kun tu 'gro ba dga' ba'i gzugs/ 201 /tshangs pa srog chags rnams kyi lus dang 'phrog byed ngag ste khyab 'jug kyang yid de dag rig byed gsum/ /\u0f00 yig de dag yi ge gsum
ste zla nyi bsreg za de dag rnams dang yon tan rtsa gsum mo/ /rigs can lus kyi rigs la gzhan pa yul dang yon tan la gnas srid srung nA da'i gzugs can te/ /de yi dbus su gzhom med gang de yul dang

rnam par bral zhing yon tan med pa'i 'gyur med do/ 202 /rig byed mtha' las gsang ba 'di dag tshangs pa yis ni rnal 'byor pa rnams dag la sngon brjod de/ /dus kyi shes pa rab nyams thub pa rnams kyis 'dir ni srog chags rnams la

gsod pa dag kyang bstan/ /mi rnams mtho ris don du de la rab tu 'jug ste dmyal ba ngan pa'i 'bras bu ster bar 'gyur/ /sol ba 'o ma'i rgyun gyis mngon par bkrus pa 'dir ni zla ba'i mdog tu 'gar yang 'gyur ma yin/ 203 /

sbyor ba med pa'i rig byed tshig ni dam tshig rnam par bral ba dag gis bslus pa'i mi rnams gang / /de rnams gzhan gyi bu ni mi skyed don du nyin mtshan dus su rang gi bud med bsrung byas nas/ /bu yis byin pa dag kyang yi dags kyi ni

'jig rten du song pha yi sbyin par 'gyur ro lo/ /des na bde mnyam 'bras bu ster ba 'dod pa'i sbyin pa 'di ni gdug pa'i bram ze rnams kyis sbas/ 204/ gal te rigs kyi rta yis rgod ma bzang mo la ni rta mchog skyes bu gzhan

du gyur pa na/ /dpal yang 'di yi mthu las slar yang 'gyur te bdag po yi ni rnyed pa dag kyang cis ma yin/ /gang gis chags pa can rnams nyin zhag so so'i dus su rang rang bud med dag ni srung bar byed/ /

shi bar gyur na khyod su khyod kyi rang gi bud med su ste kye ma mi dge'i las kyis bcings/ 205/ ba lang sbyin dang sa gzhi sbyin pa de bzhin gzhan yang mi yi 'jig rten du ni longs spyod ster/ /sman dang kha zas sbyin pa dag ni mtha'

dag nad 'phrog bkres pa dag ni skom pa dag kyang 'phrog /'dod pa'i sbyin pa thams cad du ni bde mnyam 'bras ster 'khor lo'i dus su smos kyang ci zhig dgos/ /yid 'ong chung ma sring mo skal bzang bu mo rnams kyang gsang

ba sbyin pa la ni rab sbyin bya/ 206 /smad 'tshong dam pa rnams kyi las kyi phyag rgyar 'gyur zhing gsang ba'i mi mo gzhan gyi bud med dam tshig ste/ /rang dbang chos kyi phyag rgya yul ni mang po la dga' rang gi chung ma ye shes phyag rgya

'o/ /smad 'tshong dam pa bcu gnyis lo lon mchog gi bde ba la dga' gzhan gyi bud med bcu drug lo/ /rang dbang lo ni nyi shu lon pa bu mo dang bcas rang gi chung ma sum bcu'i lo ru 'gyur/ 207 /sngon tshe sangs rgyas

rnams kyi 'dzin ma dang ni glang chen rta dang shing rta du ma gser gyi khur/ /sangs rgyas nyid kyi slad du byin zhing slar yang mgo dang khrag dang sha rnams dag kyang rab tu byin/ /'di rnams kyis ni bzhed pa'i sangs rgyas nyid du

ma gyur de nas 'dod pa'i sbyin pa rab tu byin/ /gsang ba'i sbyin pa de yis skyes bu rnams ni rgyal ba skyed byed rigs la sangs rgyas nyid du 'khrungs/ 208 /zangs ma yis ni gser dang mtshungs shing mching bu dum bus lha yi cod

pan nor bu dag dang mtshungs/ /smad 'tshongs dam pa'i 'dod pa'i sbyin pas 'chi med rigs kyi bu mo lpags pa dum bu gla rtsi ste/ /bung bu yis ni rigs kyi rta dang ra yis rab mchog glang chen bdag po gal te rnyed pa na/ /

chung ma'i sbyin pas rgyal ba skyed mdzad rigs la lha mo de la 'di ni rnyed pa cis ma yin/ 209 /byams pa'i gnas la sbyin pa dag ni bde mnyam 'bras ster ma yin sems can mtshungs pa'i mthu las te/ /ltos pa
dang bcas gnas la de bzhin rab mchog rgyal ba'i rigs la sems can bdud kyi rang bzhin phyir/ /snying rje dga' dang bcas pa'i gnas ni zung la gzhan gyi don du bde bar gshegs pa pa rnams kyis/ /rab tu

byin na dman pa nyid dang mchog nyid phyir na tshogs gnyis rab rdzogs mi zad bde 'bras ster/ 210 /gang la rigs ni tshad mar gyur pa de la mi yi bdag po rig byed dag ni tshad mar 'gyur/ /gang la rig byed tshad mar gyur pa

de la nges par sa gzhi'i gnas su mchod sbyin tshad ma ste/ /gang la mchod sbyin tshad ma de la rnam mang phyugs dang mi rnams dag la 'tshe ba tshad mar 'gyur/ /gang la 'tshe ba tshad mar gyur pa de la dmyal ba'i 'jigs pa byed

pa'i sdig pa tshad ma'o/ 211 /gnas ni 'dzin pa'i don du bcom ldan 'das kyis dpal ldan gtsug lag khang gi rab gnas bzhed par gsungs/ /de la sman dang kha zas sbyin pa nad ni zhi bar byed pa sbyin pa po yis sbyin no zer/ /sbyin

pa med na gtsug lag khang 'di sa yi steng gi gnas su dud 'gro rnams kyi gnas sa ste/ /gang du dge 'dun gcig ni 'dzin par gyur pa der ni mi yi bdag po chos dang sangs rgyas kyang / 212 /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la ni mi rnams thar pa'i

slad du skyabs su nye bar 'gro ba ste/ /'dir ni sangs rgyas gtsug lag khang na gnas pa 'di dang yi ge bris pa'i glegs bam chos nyid dang / /dge 'dun ngur smrig 'dzin pa mchog gi khyab bdag bde ba skye ba 'bum phrag rnams kyis ster ba

min/ /slob dpon dag ni sangs rgyas nyid de rab mchog sa yi gzhi la chos ni de yi bstan pa'o/ 213 /dge 'dun gang zhig der gnas rab tu dga' ba'i snying dang sems can kun la rjes su brtse ba ste/ /de 'dir rnam bzhi rnam pa gnyis

gsungs 'dir ni slar yang nyan thos pa dang bla na med pa'o/ /dge slong rnams dang dge slong ma dang slar yang 'dir ni dge bsnyen chen po dag dang dge bsnyen ma/ /rnal 'byor ma dang rnal 'byor pa rnams lhan skyes bde ba la dga' dge bsnyen

ma dang dge bsnyen yang / 214 /bsod nams ye shes don gyi slad du rtag par mchog tu 'dod pa'i sbyin pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyang / /nyan thos rnams la mchod ston la sogs rnal 'byor pa la mchog gi bde byed 'dod pa'i sbyin pa

yang / /sbyin pa po gang rab tu dga' ba'i snying dang dus kun du ni chags pa'i sems kyis sbyin byed pa/ /de dag bsod nams ye shes rdzogs te mchog gi bde ba'i gnas su skye ba 'di la 'gro bar 'gyur/ 215 /

slob dpon dang ni rgyal ba la yang mkhas pa min pa'i nyan thos gang dag gsal bar smod byed pa/ /de dag bgegs kyi mgon pos bsad de mchog tu 'jigs pa byed pa'i mnar med du ni myur du 'gro/ /gang la rab mchog

rgyal ba'i bdag pos sngags kyi mthu rnams kyis ni rang nyid byin gyis brlab pa mdzad/ /mi rnams dag las dge slong su zhig brtul zhugs nges pa'i gnas la de dang tshangs par spyod pa mtshungs/ 216 /mchog gi bde

ba la dga' dge slong dag gam kun du rgyu dang gcer bu mgo zlum rol pa can/ /thos dang klog pa la dga' mkhas pa lam nyams thams cad byed po dang ni bdag tu zhen pa dang / /'dir ni rtag tu rang gzhan bu dang chung

mar zhen dang bza' dang bza' ba min par zhen pa dang / /rigs dang rigs ni min pa la dga' snod dang snod min dag tu zhen pas dka' ba byed pa'o/ 217 /sangs rgyas zhing ni sangs rgyas dang bcas bde mnyam 'bras ster

lus dang ngag dang yid dang chags pa ste/ /'di dag kun du bor nas sdig pa'i blo yis khyab bdag gzhan pa dag kyang yang dag tshol byed de/ /zhing dang 'jug ngogs yul gzhan dag tu brtul zhugs nges pa brgya dang bsnyung

gnas ri las mchong ba dang / /g.yul dang nyi ma gza' yis zin la yul gyi bde 'dod du ma'i mtshon dang me la mchong bas so/ 218 /bdud rnams dag gis khrag ni btung ba'i slad du 'di dag mtha' dag sngon gyi tshe yang

bkod pa ste/ /'jug ngogs bsnyung gnas dag gis shi bar gyur dang g.yul du bsnun pa nyid dang ba lang nyi ma ni/ /grol ba'i don dang khyim dang nor gyi yul dang bram ze'i bya ba dag la shi ba mtho ris so/ /

de yi phyir na rang dang gzhan gyi lus ni bde ba mnyam pa'i gnas 'di bsrung bar bya ba yin/ 219 /gang zhig rgyud kyi rgyal po las ni rgyal ba mchog gi spyod pa thos shing dbang ni blangs nas kyang / /slar yang phrag dog byed na de ni
dmyal ba brgyad pa ji srid nyid du rab tu 'jug 'gyur te/ /gang la khab rtse'i sa la mi dge'i 'bras bu'i dbang gis dmyal ba rnams ni kun du rgyu bar byed/ /de phyir mi rnams sems la phrag dog

yod kyi bar du dbang ni blang bar bya bar mi 'gyur ro/ 220 /rgyal ba skyed mdzad rigs la sbyin pa tshul khrims rab tu rdzogs dang bzod pa brtson 'grus rdzogs pa dang / /bsam gtan shes rab dang ni thabs dang smon lam dag dang

stobs dang ye shes rdzogs pa chung ma yi/ /sbyin pa 'di yis myur du rab tu dga' ba'i yid can rnal 'byor pa yi skye ba 'di la ste/ /gang zhig rmongs pa'i mi de rnams kyis de la rjes su 'ching ba byas nas dmyal bar nye bar 'gro/

221 /sa dang dpal 'byor slad du shin du g.yo ba'i snying ldan sdar ma yis ni ral gri rnon po dag /bzung ste kun nas 'thab mo pa yis dkrigs pa'i yan lag bzhi ldan g.yul du rab tu zhugs pa na/ /glang chen tshogs pa mthong

nas 'jigs pa de yi lag pa'i mthil nas ral gri dag ni lhung gyur pa/ /de la ral gri'i skyon du 'gyur ba ma yin ji lta de bzhin nyid du sngags kyi rigs kyi'o/ 222 /sngags dang dpa' bo'i rim pa yis kyang lha min gdengs can lha rnams
drag po'i sa la bsgrub par bya/ /rang byin brlab pas lha mo dam tshig rigs la gnas rnams bsam gtan bzlas pa sbyin sreg dag gis kyang / /dag pa'i rim pas dbang ste sngags pa yis ni rgyun chad med par

dga' ba chen po'i sems kyis so/ /ye shes yid bzhin nor bur gang zhig rab tu gyur pa de las kyang ni rgyal ba'i lam 'di'o/ 223 /me ni dngul chu'i dgra nyid yin te me dang rnam par bral na nam yang dngul chu 'ching ba med/ /

ma bcings na ni gser byed med de gsar dang bral na smra po rnams la longs spyod med pa nyid/ /de bzhin bud med sbyor ba bral na rtag tu rnal 'byor pa rnams dag gi sems ni 'ching mi 'gyur/ /bcings pa med na lus 'bigs med de

ma phug lus kyis 'dir ni lhan skyes bde ba ster ba min/ 224 /skyed mos tshal lam ri bo dag ni skye bo ri dgas bral bar zhi ba'i sngags rnams bsgrub par bya/ /drag po rnams ni drag po'i dur khrod du ste lha mchog gnas su

rengs pa dang ni rmongs pa yang / /dbang dang dgug pa sngags pas mchog gi sa la bde ba phyag rgya kun dang rab tu sbyor ba la/ /gnas gzhan dang ni skye gnas gzhan du mi rnams kyi ni skye ba 'bum phrag gis kyang 'grub mi 'gyur/

225 /khyim dang grong du bgrang phreng dag gis nyin dang mtshan mo'i dus su sngags kyi bzlas pa byas nas ni/ /ngal zhing rmongs te chags pa dang bral slar yang 'di ni sngags kyi dngos grub med pa brjod par byed/ /gnas dang stong pa

dus dang mchog gi mtshan mo la gnas yang dag par ni shes pa min pa nyid/ /rkang pa'i sor mo rnams kyi nad la spyi bor sman rnams kyis ni rab tu byug pa byed pa bzhin/ 226 /bsam gtan dang ni sngags kyi bzlas pa byed

pa dag dang dkyil 'khor chen po rnams dang gdan rnams dang / /sbyin sreg sngags kyi rab gnas rdul tshon la ni rgyal ba'i rigs rnams spyan drangs bskul ba med par yang / /bud med sbyor ba rnam par spangs nas

rab mchog khyab bdag bde ba phyag rgya'i dngos grub ster bar byed/ /de phyir de ni nyin zhag so so'i dus su rnal 'byor pa yis thar pa'i slad du bsgom par bya/ 227 /rang gi sems ni brgyal dang gnyid la rab tu zhugs

pa mi yi bdag po rang bzhin med par 'gyur/ /sad la rang bzhin dang bcas gsal bar byed de de dag srog chags rnams kyi thar pa'i lam ma yin/ /dngos dang dngos med kyis phye sems kyi rdo rje rnal 'byor pa rnams dag la

bde mnyam ster ba min/ /gang zhig mkha' yi shes rab la 'khyud lhan skyes bde bar gnas pa'i rang sems de ni thar pa ster/ 228 /AH hu~M ho rim par gnas pas dang por 'dir ni rtag tu chang ni sbyangs nas rtogs

par bya/ /rab tu 'bar bar byas te ri bong can ni zhu ba bzhin du rim pas bsgom par byas nas ni/ /snod de nas ni thig le dag gis lag pad ri bong can gyi ming med rtse mos sa dag la/ /phyi rol tu ni zur
gsum byas nas de yi dbus su nyin mor byed pa dang mtshungs zlum po'o/ 229 /de yi dbus su 'di yi ye shes 'khor lo srid gsum gnas pa dag kyang sngags pas bsgoms byas nas/ /mthe bo dang ni ming med dag

gis nyin zhag so so'i dus su tshim par byed pa la sogs bya/ /yul dang grong gi bdag po rnams la thog mar 'dir ni gtor ma dang po dbus mtha'i ming gis te/ /'phrog ma la ni chang bu gnyis dang slar yang sngags pas khro bo'i

rgyal po la ni gtor ma'o/ 230 /pho nya mo rnams dag la zas kyi phud ni sa steng rnams su bdag po rdo rje rnams kyis sbyin/ /'byung po rnams la zos pa'i lhag ma slar yang dge ba'i don du sbyin pa'i tshigs bcad 'di bklag go/ /

mgo dang mgrin pa snying ka lte gsang gtsug tor du ni rang gi rdo rje rnams kyis yan lag dgod/ /gnyi ga'i rigs la gnas pa'i yan lag sgo rnams kyis ni gnyid kyi dus dang mchod dang 'khrig pa la/ 231 /lha yi dmigs

pa gang yin mngon sum dang ni rjes su dpag pa rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur ba ste/ /mngon sum dag ni de nyid sbyor bas mkha' la skar ma bzhin du du ma longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku/ /mngon sum min na rjes su dpag pa shi ba'i lus

bzhin de nyid min pa yis ni brtags pa gang / /de ni ri mo sogs la blta bya yongs su ma smin blo can rnal 'byor rnams kyi bsgom pa'i don/ 232 /gzugs sam yang na dkyil 'khor dag kyang dang por bris sku la ni de nyid

min pas bsgom par bya/ /nam mkha' la ni de nyid sbyor ba dag gis rang sems ma tshang med pa mtha' dag mthong gyur pa/ /lo yi phyed dang lo gcig bla ma'i nges pa'i dbang gis ji srid nyid du brtan par 'gyur gyi bar/ /de nas

phyag rgya'i sbyor bas nyin zhag 'ga' zhig dag gis 'gyur ba med pa nyid du rab tu 'gyur/ 233 /rgyud kyi rgyal po thams cad las ni nges par rdo rje'i tshig 'di rnal 'byor pa rnams dag la gsungs/ /byis pa rnams ni smin par

byed pa'i don du mchog gi snying rje dag gis sna tshogs gtso bos sbas/ /de phyir de ni dbye ba byas nas nyin zhag so so'i dus su rnal 'byor pa yis bsgom par bya/ /phyag rgya'i dngos grub don slad rgyal ba mchog gi skyed mdzad

gzhom du med pa dus kyi 'khor lo'o/ 234 /dpal dang po'i sangs rgyas chen po las phyung ba dpal dus kyi 'khor lo las/ bsgrub thabs kyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // gtso bo'i sgrub thabs rgyal ba mchog dang bcas pa

gang zhig khyod kyis gsungs pa dag ni cung zad shes/ /slar yang bdag ni nyan par 'tshal lo lha mi'i bla ma khams kyi dbye ba rnams kyi dkyil 'khor dang / /sangs rgyas rnams dang rnal 'byor ma rnams dag gi rigs drug A li

kA li dag la gnas pa nyid/ /zla ba bzang po'i tshig dag gsan nas rgyal ba'i bdag pos khams kyi dbye bas dkyil 'khor la sogs gsungs/ 1 /ka ba rnams dang rdo rje phreng ba sa yi dkyil 'khor rtsig pa nyid ni rus pa rnams

kyis mdzod/ /sha khrag chu dang bshang ba rnams kyis lha dang gshen rje nor sbyin gzhan du rdul tshon gdab pa ste/ /mkhris pa bad kan gyis ni nyi ma ri bong can yang de bzhin chu rgyus rnams kyis chu skyes rnams/ /ra ba lnga yi re khA

sa dang chu dang sreg za rlung dang nam mkha' las skyes rnams kyis so/ 2 /dus kyi rtsa yis gtso bo'i chu skyes g.yo ba me yi dkyil 'khor la sogs lpag pa la sogs kyis/ /nyi ma'i sgo rnams bug pa rnams kyis nor bu'i rang bzhin

bkod pa so yi phreng bas de bzhin nyid/ /dur khrod brgyad du 'khor lo g.yo ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas rnams ni sor mo rnams kyi sen mo yis/ /ba spu rnams kyis rdo rje me lce dkyil 'khor gyi ni mtha' ru phyogs dang phyogs bral
dag la gnas/ 3 /de ltar nges par sku yi rdo rje mchog gi yon tan rnam mang dkyil 'khor gyi ni rnam par gsungs/ /gsung gi rdo rje a sogs ka sogs lha yi rnam pa nyid ni mtha' dag rgyal ba'i

rigs rnams kyis/ /stong pa drug gi thugs kyi rdo rje rnam pa gsum gyi srid pa la gnas gtso bo'i rnam pa nyid/ /de bzhin du ni ye shes rdo rje srid pa'i 'jigs pa 'joms pa sna tshogs yum gyi rang bzhin no/ 4 /sde pa

ka la sogs pa drug po rim pas yongs su bkod pa rnams kyi rigs ni rim pa yis/ /rdo rje ral gri rin chen 'khor lo chu skyes de bzhin gri gug nyid ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ste/ /slar yang sde pa re re la yang mtha' dag rgyal

ba mchog gi dbye ba lnga rnams dag gis dbye/ /so sor yi ge'i dbye ba sa dang chu dang sreg za rlung dang nam mkha'i dngos po dag las so/ 5 /dang por stong pa'i rab tu dbye bdag kyang nga nya Na ma na dang dang dang po'i dbyangs/ /

rlung gi dbye ba i yig g+ha dz+ha D+ha b+ha d+ha sha rnams te me yi dbye ba r-i la sogs/ /chu yi dbye bas u yig wa kha tsha Tha pha tha wa ste sa yi dbye ba l-i la sogs/ /de ltar mchog gi rgyal ba'i rigs ni rnam pa lnga yi ka la sogs

pa'i sde rnams rnam par phye/ 6 /gtsug tor stong pa lnga ste rigs gsum dag kyang de bzhin sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rdo rje'o/ /a sogs phyag rgya'i rigs te ha ya ra wa la dang ldan pa'i ka sogs sde pa mtha' dag rnams/ /

'jig rten snang byed dbyangs dang bcas pa'i ha ya ra wa lar ldan 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa'o/ /rig sngags 'chang gi dbang po mtha' dag tu 'gyur ka sogs sde pa brtsegs pa la gnas brgyad rnams so/ 7 /ka sogs yi

ge sum bcu ha ya ra wa lar ldan k+Sha dang bcas pa sum bcu rtsa drug nyid/ /dbyangs kyi rnam par 'gyur bas phye ba ro yis bsgyur ba'i ro ni 'khor lo'i mgon po rnams su 'gyur/ /sku ni gcig pa nges par gcig gi 'khor

dang bcas pa gnyis ni shes rab dag gis 'khyud par 'gyur/ /lnga yi bdag nyid lnga yis 'gyur te 'khor dang bcas pa dgu ni 'khor lo'i mgon po dgu bdag nyid/ 8 /dbyangs kyi grangs kyi bdag nyid bcu gsum dgu dang

phyogs rnams kyis kyang sum bcu rtsa drug bdag nyid de/ /ya la sogs pa rnams kyis sgo skyong mtha' dag tshogs kyi rigs ni lhag ma'i dbyangs rnams nyid kyis so/ /khro bo drug tu ha sogs kyis 'gyur rang rigs phyogs

su gnas rnams rlung gi dbyangs sogs dbye ba yis/ /so sor yi ge'i dbye ba rnams kyis ro yis bsgyur ba'i ro ni rnal 'byor ma dang rnal 'byor rgyud/ 9 /de bzhin yi ge so so ro yis bsgyur ba'i ro yi dkyil 'khor la ni dkyil 'khor

dbang po ste/ /phung po 'byung ba dbang po la sogs dbyangs kyi dbye bas mtha' dag tshogs kyi rigs ni sbyang bar bya/ /stong pa gzhom med la sogs mtha' dag rgyal ba'i rigs rnams kyis ni lha rnams brgya yis gdab pa ste/ /

gtsug tor nas ni chu skyes mtha' ru mi mnyam mnyam pa'i rigs la 'khor lo'i dbus kyi gdan la'o/ 10/ rdo rje rnams kyis zhal gyi dbye bar 'gyur te rgyal ba'i bdag po'i phyag rnams dbyangs kyi dbye ba yis/ /de nyid rnams

kyis phyag rgya'i rab tu dbye ba gzhan yang de bzhin sku yi rdo rje la sogs kyis/ /sum bcu rtsa drug rnal 'byor rgyud ni dpag med yon tan yi ge du ma'i rab tu dbye ba can/ /yi ge so so'i ming can mnyam dang mi mnyam rigs la lha mo

dang ni lha rnams dag gi'o/ 11 /sa bon gcig pu dpa' bo gcig pa rdul la ro mnyam pa ni shes rab dag gis 'khyud par 'gyur/ /phung po rnams kyis lnga yi bdag nyid sa yi khams sogs rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs pa

dgu pa yang / /bshang lam la sogs dang ni mig la sogs pas yongs bskor 'di ni nyi shu rtsa lnga'i bdag nyid kyang / /de bzhin so ni rab tu skyes pa slar yang so rnams dag gis dbang phyug mtha' yas 'khor lo can/ 12 /

dag par yang dag dag pa'i chu las ri bong 'dzin pa ltar dkar pad+ma'i mtshan ma 'od dpag med/ /nga rgyal 'jig rten dbang phyug rta yi shing rtas 'gro ma mA ma kI dang gzugs kyi rdo rje ma/ /drag mo chu gter

tshogs kyi dbang po gnyis skyes gdengs can dang ni stag gdong ma dang 'ug par bcas/ /'di dag dpal ldan g.yon gyi zhal nas mchog gi snying rje yis ni rdo rje can gyis spros pa'o/ 13 /chos la yang dag dag pa'i rlung las

phyag gi pad+ma ral gri don yod grub pa sgrol ma dang / /mkha' yi snying po reg bya rdo rje ma dang shin tu stobs bcas tsartsi ka dang lcags sgrog ma/ /bden bral dang ni rlung zhes bya dang dmangs rigs klu dang de bzhin khyi
gdong ma dang bya rog bcas/ /de dag nges par byams pa'i thugs kyis srid pa gsum gyi bdag pos shar gyi zhal nas spros pa'o/ 14 /longs spyod rdzogs par dag pa'i me las nyi ma 'char ka dang mtshungs

rin chen 'dzin dang gos dkar mo/ /sa yi snying po rmugs byed dang ni ro mchog rdo rje ma dang phag mo gdong drug me yi lha/ /gdeng can dbang po rgyal rigs gnyis dang rab gsal khro gnyer can dang phag gdong ma dang
bya rgod bcas/ /'di dag dpal ldan g.yas kyi zhal nas mchog gi dga' ba yis ni sna tshogs gtso bos spros pa'o/ 15 /lte bar yang dag dag pa'i sa las mchog gi gser dang mtshungs pa'i thub pa phyag na

'khor lo dang / /spyan ma dang ni rnam par sel ba rab mchog mi yi bdag po rengs byed dri yi rdo rje ma/ /'od zer can dang dbang mo brgya byin dus kyi gdong pa dang bcas rje rigs klu la sogs pa kun/ /gtso bo

yis ni btang snyoms dag gis nub kyi zhal nas skye bo kun la phan rnams spros pa'o/ 16 /gtsug tor dag pa'i stong pa las ni phyag na mchog gi rdo rje mi bskyod dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma/ /gtsug tor dang ni chos kyi dbyings te nam

mkha'i yon tan dbang gis phyag na rdo rje la sogs gzhan/ /gsang bar dag pa las ni mtha' dag bde mnyam ster rnams sgra yi rdo rje ma la sogs pa yang / /steng dang 'og tu yon tan mang po'i gnas rnams srog chags

rnams kyi thar pa'i rgyu ru spros pa'o/ 17 /phyogs kyi 'dab mar spyan ma la sogs phyogs bral 'dab ma la gnas khrag gis gang ba'i thod pa ste/ /nyi ma'i steng du g.yon brkyang u ma dang bcas dbang phyug mnan zhing

'jig pa'i dus kyi sprin dang mtshungs/ /thod pa rnams kyis phreng ba bcings shing chu yi gter gyi zhal dang nyi ma'i phyag ldan he ru ka /phyag rgya sbrul dang stag gi lpags pa mi bzad glang po'i bdag po'i lpags pa rlon pa bshus pa

'dzin/ 18 /gnag dang dmar dang dri med ri bong can lus lha mo rnams kyi phyi rol du ni 'khor lo gsum/ /rdo rje drug ni khro bo las skyes phyag gnyis zla zhal rnams dang de bzhin 'byung po skyes rnams kyis/ /sgor ni gtum

mo ro la gnas shing phyag na gri gug thod pa phyogs bral du yang nges par ro/ /dpa' bo rnams kyis rig byed phyag na rdo rje Da ma ru dang dril bu rdo rje kha T+wA~M ga 19 /dpal ldan lhun po'i phyogs brgyad du ni sa chu'i dkyil 'khor

dag la gnas dang nye ba'i gnas kun te/ /zhing dang tshan do ha dang 'dus pa can dang dur khrod sa ni me dang rlung gi dbus su yang / /de bzhin yul dang grong khyer la ni phyogs dang phyogs bral du gnas lha rnams rig par bya ba ste/ /

shes rab rgyud kyi mngon par brjod pa srid pa gsum gyi bla mas shar gyi zhal nas spros pa'o/ 20 /snying por 'khor lo cha dgu pa ste dkyil 'khor las ni phyed kyi cha shas zla nyi pad+ma la/ /rdo rje ka ba'i phreng ba dag gis spras pa

yang ni phung po khams kyi lhag pa'i lha chen po/ /phyi rol du ni ra ba'i rtsig pa dag la yul dang yul can zla ba nyi ma'i gdan la gnas/ /sgo skyong rnams ni nyi ma la gnas gzhan pa tshogs kyi rigs ni kha khyer dag la kun

nas so/ 21 /'di la sogs pa la ni de bzhin rnal 'byor rgyud kyang 'dus pa rnam pa drug tu gsungs pa ste/ /zur du khro bo rnams dang logs su yul dang yul can dza~M b+ha la ni phyag na so ba bsnams/ /ngag dang

rkang lag bshang lam b+ha ga nyi ma ri bong can rnams dus kyi rtsa yi rang bzhin te/ /shes rab dang ni thabs rnams mtha' dag zhal gsum ro yi phyag ldan g.yas kyi zhal nas spros pa'o/ 22 /snying por 'khor lo chu gter zung du 'gyur te mi yi bdag po dkyil

'khor las ni gsum gyi cha/ /phung po khams rnams lhag pa'i lha nyid slar yang 'phar ma gzhan la sgra yi rdo rje la sogs brgyad/ /phyi rol du gnas dkyil 'khor la ni phyogs bcur bkod pa nyi ma la gnas khro bo'i tshogs rnams te/ /der ni

ra ba'i rtsig pa dag la dus la chu gter gyis bsnun byang chub sems dpa' mtha' dag rnams/ 23 /sgyu 'phrul dra ba dbye ba gsum ste zhal gsum ro yi phyag ni lha yi sku yi dbye ba las/ /rtog pa la sogs gang yin mtha' dag blun po'i snying gi

dbang gis g.yon gyi zhal nas spros pa'o/ /rnal 'byor rjesu rig pa'i rgyud dang 'dir ni nyis 'gyur sdom pa chen po mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi/ /'khor lo drug dang rigs drug mi bdag dur khrod sa rnams kyis ni nub kyi zhal nas spros

pa'o/ 24 /thig ni drug dang bug pa'i cha shas g.yo ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas rnams kyis dkyil 'khor thig btab nas/ /snying po las ni drug drug cha rnams kyis te pad+ma'i 'dab ma phyed kyis lte bar ldan pa yang / /gri gug 'khor

lo chu skyes rin chen ral gri mchog gi rdo rje'i phreng ba gnyis gnyis cha rnams kyis/ /nyi ma rnams kyis sgo dang sgo khyud dus dang ro rnams kyis kyang kha khyer dang ni do shal sa/ 25 /gsum gyis kyang ni ra ba lnga yi re khA rtse mo can gyis do

shal rtsa bar snam bu'o/ /nyi ma rnams kyis logs dang 'gram ste sum 'gyur nyin byed rnams kyis ka ba'i steng du rta babs so/ /phyogs dang phyogs bral dag tu sgo ni brgyad rnams bya ste dkyil 'khor chen po 'di ni zlum po'o/ /

dbus su chu skyes sna tshogs mdog ste lte ba la ni nyi ma ri bong can dag sbyar ba'i gdan/ 26 /'khor lo dang ni phreng ba sngon po sa ni ljang gu dag dang sa gzhi nag po 'khor lo ser/ /sa gzhi dmar la 'khor lo dkar dang sa ni dkar po phreng bar

bcas pa'i 'khor lo dmar po dang / /sa ni ser po sngon po dag dang 'khor lo dkar po min pa dang ni ljang ku'i mdog tu 'gyur/ /cha drug gis ni mtshon gyi sa ste skyed byed zhal gyi dbang gis sgo yi 'khor lo de bzhin no/ 27 /phyi rol du ni

brgyad gnyis dur khrod rnams te rigs kyi dbang gis de bzhin snying po'i lha mo brgyad/ /'dab ma la ni thod pa bdud rtsi'i ro dang ldan pa brgyad de 'dab ma brgyad la lha mo rnams/ /phyir ni sgeg mo la sogs lha mo phyogs dang phyogs bral du gnas

de bzhin klu yi rgyal po brgyad/ /de yi phyi rol du ni sa chu me dang g.yo ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid dang rdo rje'i phreng ba'o/ 28 /ring po thung ngu'i dbyangs rnams kyis kyang sa ta pa Ta tsa ka sa sogs stong sogs yi ge rnams/ /rlung sogs rtsibs rnams

la ni nyi ma'i rgyu ba'i dbang gis ring po sa sogs khams kyi rang bzhin rnams/ /steng sogs rtsibs la zla ba'i rgyu ba'i dbang gis thung ngu rang rang 'khor lo'i rtsibs kyi steng du'o/ /sgo dang sgo yi bar du ha k+Sha dang ldan nam mkha'i mthil

na gnas pa'i sde par bcas pa rnams/ 29 /mkha' 'gro ma rnams thung ba'i dngos po ri bong 'dzin pa'i zhal dang phyag ni gri gug thod pa can/ /g.yas pa brkyang zhing rang rang snod rnams kyis ni lha min khrag 'thung skra grol gos dang

bral ba ste/ /rkang pa rked pa dpral ba dang ni rna ba mgrin pa lag par g.yer ka sogs dang rus pa'i rgya/ /mgo dang rked pa'i ngos la thod pa'i dum bu rgyal ba rnams kyi kha dog lnga yi phreng ba'o/ 30 /mkha' 'gro zhal gnyis phyag na rdo rje

mchog dang Da ma ru dang rdo rje kha T+wA~M ga dril bu/ /mgrin pa dpal ldan mgo phreng mgo bor cod pan la yang rdo rje dar dpyangs dang ni nor bu'o/ /dpaldan mgul rgyan rkang la rkang gdub dang ni phyag la phyag gdub ska rags dag dang rna rgyan te/ /rdzogs

pa'i thod pa rnams kyi phreng ba mche ba can gyi mtha' dag lus la gnas dang thal ba'i rgya/ 31 /gtso bo'i dbu la thod pa rnams kyis phreng ba mgrin par gdong brgya rnams kyis mgo yi phreng ba'o/ /zla phyed rdo rje'i cod pan

la ste rang gi rked dang phyag gnas stag lpags glang po'i lpags pa'o/ /zla nyi bsreg za'i dkyil 'khor la ni zhabs kyi rtsa bar bdud dang dbang ldan lus la thal ba ste/ /phyag rgya klu yi dbang po dang ldan 'jig dus rtse mo can mtshungs mkha' 'gro

ma la 'o dag byed/ 32/ phyogs kyi 'dab mar mkha' 'gro rnams kyi lag pa Da ma ru dang rdo rje kha T+wA~M ga nyid de/ /bshang gci khrag dang mi sha rnams kyis phyogs bral 'dab ma la gnas khu ba'i snod kyang phyag na'o/ /de bzhin du ni lha mo brgyad kyang

kun nas gnyi ga bde la snyoms par zhugs pa'i 'khor lo'o/ /ser dang dkar po dmar po'i mdog dang nag po ljang ku'i lus dang sngon po'i mdog rnams rang phyogs su/ 33 /rgyal ba skyed mdzad rigs la gtso bo'i kha dog mtshan ma rnams ni sngar

bzhin spyan gsum dag gi tshogs/ /phan tshun du ni 'khyud pa dag kyang rang gzhan rigs kyi dbang gis rig par bya ste kun nas so/ /sbyin pa sogs dang phung po 'byung ba yul dang yul can gzhan yang dbang po lnga la sogs pa dang / /phyogs

sa phyogs kyi stobs dang dpal ldan rgyal sras dbang rnams kyis kyang lha mo rnam par sbyang bar bya/ 34 /lhun po'i phyogs su dbye ba brgyad kyi phyogs dang phyogs bral du gnas gnas dang nye ba'i gnas kun dang / /zhing dang tshan do ha dang 'dus pa dur khrod

sa dang khyim ni rlung gi phyed kyi mtshams su ste/ /'di dag sangs rgyas sa ni nyi ma phra mo lus skyes mi dang 'byung po lha dang lha min dang / /nus dang gtso bo nyin gcig rigs ldan ma ni rnam par rgyu ste nyi zla'i rab tu rgyu ba las/ 35 /

rgyab tu lha mo dbang byed thim pa zhes 'dir mdun du de nyid lnga yi rang bzhin rnams kyis te/ /rlung dang dbang ldan lha min me dang 'og dang mkha' dang lha dang gshen rje gnod sbyin nub tu yang / /gtsug tor snying ka'i phyogs dang mgrin pa

mgo bo la gnas lte ba dang ni gsang ba'i 'khor lo la/ /'khor lo rtsibs brgyad 'og dang steng du nyin zhag so so'i chu srin nas ni dus sbyor gnyis gnyis bar/ 36 /gtso bo'i chu skyes rdo rje kun dang 'gyur med thig le rnams kyis rdo rje nor bu la gnas

pa/ /kun nas dga' ba thams cad rdo rje can gyi bde ba mnyam pa'i gnas te dus ni thams cad do/ /zla ba zhu ba bla ma'i zhal de ru ni gang zhig zhugs pa dus kyi 'khor lo de nyid de/ /bdud rnams kyi ni dus su gsungs shing 'chi ba'i 'jigs

byed mkha' 'gro ma yi 'khor lo 'di dag go/ 37 /shes rab thabs kyi yi ge dag gis gnyi ga'i rigs kyi dbang las mkha' 'gro ma dang mkha' 'gro'i ming / /rdo rje gsum po rkang pa gzhan dang bcas pas thog ma dbus dang mtha' mar phye ba bzlas bya ste/ /

srog gis byin gyis brlabs pa gang zhig gnyi ga'i bgrod pa'i dbang gis rang rang las kyi rjes mthun pa'o/ /ro yi 'gro rnams la gnas mkha' 'gro ma dang rdo rje mkha' 'gro rnams ni myur du 'grub par 'gyur/ 38 /dbugs rnams gang dag skye ba'i

dus su dbu ma la ni rkang pa dang bcas ro dang mdar gyur pa/ /de brgyad rnams kyis 'khor lor 'gyur te 'og dang mkha' yi dbang gis sgo yi dbus gnas lha mo rnams/ /rkang pa gcig gis bskyed pa srid pa gsum gyi yum ste phyag na gri gug

dang ni thod pa can/ /bdud rtsi bde ba'i cha yis 'khyud pa nyi ma zla ba'i steng du g.yas brkyang dus kyi 'khor lo'o/ 39 /lnga gsum me lce yul dang yon tan dbang gis zla ba nyi ma'i gdan rnams chu gter rkang pa las/ /gza' bdun

dang ni rdzogs pa nyi ma nyin mor byed dang ri bong can gyi gdan ni gzhan pa rnams/ /nag po dkar po'i rdzogs pa nyi ma nyin mor byed dang ri bong can gyi gdan ni gzhan rnams dang / /'di nyid la ni ri bo'i gza' rnams mnyam dang mi mnyam gnas

la nyi ma zla ba'i gdan rnams so/ 40 /zla ba nyi ma'i rkang pa rtsibs rnams dang ni pad+ma'i 'dab ma sgo bzhi zur gyi ro rnams te/ /slar yang rkang pa nyis 'gyur de dag rnams ni nyin mor byed dang ri bong can gyi gdan rnams nyid/ /rdzogs pa gza'

dang nyi ma'i rkang pa mnyam dang mi mnyam gnas la chu gter rkang pa gdan rnams te/ /nyi ma 'am ni gang ba'i zla ba la 'gyur rigs kyi dbang gis gtso bo yang na kha sbyor la/ 41 /rlung la reg bya'i zhal gcig dang ni yon tan gzhan gyis

dbang gis rgyas gdab zhal ni gnyis pa'o/ /rtse mo can la gzugs dang reg bya'i zhal ni gnyis su 'gyur te rgyas gdab zhal ni gsum pa'o/ /chu la zhal yang reg bya dang ni gzugs dang ro yi zhal te rgyas gdab zhal ni bzhi pa'o/ /sa la dri la sogs

pa reg bya'i mtha' yi yon tan zhal te rgyas gdab zhal ni lnga pa'o/ 42 /nam mkha' la ni zhal yang stong pa rnam pa lnga ste rgya yis gdab pa'i zhal ni drug pa'o/ /de bzhin du ni ye shes khams la 'gyur te yon tan dbang las stong pa drug gi zhal rnams

so/ /gcig ni bzhi la bsres pa bde mnyam 'bras bu ster ba dag ste gnyis dang gsum ni bsres pa lnga/ /shes rab thabs ni zhal bcu yon tan rnam pa gsum gyi dbang gis zhal ni bcu gnyis rnam pa bzhi/ 43 /thun mtshams dbye bas rnam

pa bzhi ste rnam pa gsum gyi zhal yang dus sbyor dbye bas kha dog gsum/ /dus sbyor phyed pa phyag gi dbye ba mi mnyam mnyam pa 'khyud pa dag kyang lus dang sems la ni/ /thun mtshams cha shas snga phyi las te zhal gsum ro yi phyag ni 'khyud pa dbu

ma'i cha shas la/ /shes rab sbyor dang snyoms par zhugs pa dag kyang dgod pa la sogs rnams ni thun gyi mngon mtshams la'o/ 44 /shes rab yan lag dmar dang ser po la ni nges par dus kyi 'khor lo'i bsam pa rab tu 'jug /rdo rje can gyi g.yon

mdun yan lag dkar dang sprin nag mtshungs pa dag la shes rab bsam pa'o/ /mchog gi lus la shes rab bsam pas phye ba g.yon dang mdun gyi yan lag dag ni zhi bar 'gyur/ /drag po g.yas dang rgyab kyi yan lag mchog gi rgyal ba'i

bdag po'i bsam pas phye ba de bzhin nyid/ 45 /shes rab kyis phye rgyal ba dag gi rab mchog tshogs kyi rigs ni gnyis kyi rang bzhin nyid du 'gyur/ /shes rab kyi ni gtso bos phye ba nges par phyogs bral du yang rnal 'byor ma yi tshogs nyid de/ /

g.yas dang g.yas min nyi ma dang ni ri bong can gyi sku dag zung ste shar dang nub nyid kyang / /nag po ser po dag ste sngon po ljang gu dag kyang de bzhin mkha' dang sa 'og yang dag gnas/ 46 /dkar po rnams kyi shes rab dmar mo dmar po rnams kyi ri bong 'dzin pa

ltar dkar de bzhin nyid/ /ser po rnams kyi kha dog nag mo dkar min rigs rnams kyi yang mchog gi gser dang mtshungs pa'o/ /sngon po rnams kyi kha dog sna tshogs slar yang ljang ku rnams kyi sngon mo rnams su de bzhin gsungs/ /de bzhin nges par

lha mo rnams kyi rang rigs phyogs su gnas pa'i lha rnams dag tu rig par bya/ 47 /shes rab rgyud ni shar nas slar yang rnal 'byor rjes su rig pa nyid ni nub kyi zhal nas so/ /g.yas kyi zhal nas rgyal ba'i bdag pos rnal 'byor rgyud gsungs g.yon gyi

zhal nas bya ba la sogs so/ /shar nas rnal 'byor spyod pa nyid de slar yang nub kyi zhal nas nges par dbu ma mtha' dag go/ /mdo sde pa ni g.yas kyi zhal nas gsungs te dkar po'i zhal nas dag pa'i bye brag smra ba'o/ 48 /nub kyi zhal nas nges brjod

rig byed dang ni rgyal ba'i dbang pos g.yon gyi zhal nas mchod sbyin gsungs/ /g.yas kyi zhal nas snyan tshig rig byed mchog gi sreg bya'i rigs la srid srung shar gyi zhal nas so/ /shar gyi zhal nas rigs can rgyud de slar yang nub kyi zhal nas mkha'

lding dang ni 'byung po'i rgyud/ /g.yon gyi zhal nas zhi ba'i mtha' ste nyi ma 'char ka dang mtshungs g.yas pa nas ni khyab 'jug chos/ 49 /rgyab nas 'phral la ldog pa mchog tu dkar ba'i zhal nas g.yon gyi lha dang rab tu gnas pa ste/ /g.yas

nas rig pa drag po min dang slar yang rlung gi zhal nas rlung skyes tshangs pa zhi ba dag /stong pa'i zhal nas stong pa dbang phyug dag ni srid gsum bdag pos 'jig rten pa yi don du spros/ /rdzogs ldan gsum ldan gnyis ldan dang ni gzhan pa rtsod

dus rgyab kyi zhal la sogs pa'i dbye ba las/ 50 /de bzhin dpa' bo'i rim pa sogs dang nyi ma'i bgrod pa'i dbang gis thun mtshams bzhi po nyid dag dang / /kha zas dag ni g.yas kyi zhal nas mchog tu 'jigs pa dag kyang rgyab kyi zhal nas

spros pa ste/ /mdun gyi zhal nas 'khrig pa nyid do mchog tu dkar ba'i zhal nas rgyal po rmi lam dag dang gnyid/ /rgyab nas rje rigs gnyis skyes mi yi bdag po dang ni de bzhin dmangs rigs dag kyang rim pas 'gyur/ 51 /

rgyal ba'i bdag pos mdun nas thams cad yod par smra ba gsungs te g.yas nas mang pos bkur ba'o/ /rgyab kyi zhal nas gnas brtan pa ste slar yang dge 'dun phal chen pa ni g.yon gyi zhal nas so/ /mdun gyi zhal nas mi rnams dang ni slar

yang rgyab kyi zhal nas dud 'gro rnams ni nges par spros/ /g.yas kyi zhal nas 'byung po lha rnams mchog tu dkar ba'i zhal nas dmyal ba rnams dang lha min rnams/ 52 /mdun gyi zhal nas spros pa dag kyang snying ka'i 'khor lo nas 'gyur rgyab zhal

lte ba'i 'khor lo nas/ /g.yas kyi zhal nas longs spyod rdzogs pa nas 'gyur kun tu g.yon gyi zhal nas lhan cig skyes pa nas/ /'khor lo rnams kyi zhal gyi dbus nas lus la dngos po spro ba dang ni sdud pa nyid du 'gyur/ /
'jig rten gsum po mtha' dag rnams kyang rgyal ba skyed byed zhal gyi dbye ba rnams kyis yang dag go/ 53 /dpal ldan zla ba zla ba chu

shel rnam par rtog pa med pa'i rang bzhin las ni chu 'byung ba/ /de bzhin 'jig rten du ni rgyal ba'i bdag po'i phung po la brten thams cad mkhyen pa'i chos 'dzag ste/ /chu ni sa bon khams la kun tu brten nas ro mnyam 'gyur ba ji bzhin nyid

du chos dag ni/ /sems can rnams kyi dag pa'i sems kyis rnam pa mang por 'gyur te sngon gyi las kyi mthu las so/ 54 /srid gsum gnas na sems can don gyi byed po dang ni yid bzhin nor bu la yang bsam pa med/ /sems la gnas

te mi dge 'bras bu'i dbang gis sdig pa'i las can sems can rnams kyis mi mthong ste/ /yid bzhin nor bu'i skyon min mi dge ba dang dge ba'i 'bras bu sems can thams cad rab tu spyod/ /sems ni dag na mi de yang ni rgyal

ba'i dbang por 'gyur te rgyal ba gzhan gyis ci zhig bya/ 55/ gang gis myu gu 'di skyed skyed par byed pa de ni dngos po skyes nas rnam par nyams par 'gyur/ /nyams pa de yis skyes par rab tu 'gyur te slar yang sa bon rgyal po dag gis

skyed byed do/ /snga ma gang de gzhan gyi dngos las shi ba zhes pa'i tshig ste rang gi ngo bos skyes pa min/ /gang gis stong pa nas ni sa la 'ongs pa bde ba'i skad cig de yis stobs bcu 'gro bar 'gyur/ 56 /bde nas bde la rjes chags skad

cig 'dir ni lhan skyes dngos po gzhan la rjes su chags pa min/ /phung po gang dag de yis bskyed rnams slar yang bde ba'i skad cig de yis skyed par byed pa ste/ /dag pa las chos de las gzhan te slar yang de las gzhan dang de las

rnam par dag pa'o/ /dag pa'i sa la sa bon btab pa las ni rtsa ba rnams dang lo ma me tog 'bras bu bzhin/ 57 /sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang ro dang mchog gi ro ste phra rab dag ni rnam pa drug /dri la sogs pa re res dman zhing yul dang rnam par

bral ba mtha' ma ye shes blta bya rnams/ /'dod pa gzugs dang gzugs med rnams ni zung dang zung dang ri bong can te mtha' ma chos kyi dbyings/ /rnam pa kun ldan de dag kun nas rtag tu 'pho med bde ba lhan skyes rten du gyur pa'o/ 58 /

slar yang sa sogs khams la phan tshun du ni gtso bo'i dngos po dag la chud pa'i dngos rnams gnas/ /phan tshun phung po 'byung ba dang ni yul dang yul can rnams dang phan tshun bdud dang ma rig pa/ /phan tshun rjes chags lnga ni ro yi 'gro rnams la

gnas sdug bsngal dang ni bde ba'i skad cig gi/ /rnam pa thams cad pa rnams kun nas gzhan gyi yon tan mi dga' mi phyed rdo rje yang dag gnas/ 59 /de dag rnams kyis dus kyi 'khor lo rdzu 'phrul rab tu gsal byed chen po du ma sprul pa'i sku/ /

rdo rje 'bar ba 'phro ba rnams kyis 'dod pa'i khams na gnas pa lha min dang ni mi rnams dang / /longs spyod rdzogs pas gzugs can rnams dang mkha' la rgyal ba'i sras sogs dgra bcom rnams la chos sku yis/ /stong pa'i cha yis srid

gsum mtha' dag stong pa'i zad par rlung rnams kyis ni rlung gi zad par te/ 60/ me yi cha shas rnams kyis me yi zad par chu yang 'gro la spros pa'i chu yi cha rnams kyis/ /'dzin ma'i cha shas rnams kyis sa yi zad par tshogs

pa'i yul rnams kyis ni dngos po'i rang bzhin kun/ /kun nas nam mkha' dag dang mtshungs pa gcig gi bdag nyid 'di ni dag pa'i sa la ston par byed/ /de ltar sangs rgyas skur 'gyur bde ba gcig pu'i rang bzhin phyir na 'chi bar yang ni mi 'gyur ro/

61 /de gcig pu las rnam pa lnga ste mtha' dag rgyal ba mchog rnams kyis ni mngon rdzogs byang chub 'di/ /rnam pa nyi shu'i rang bzhin dang ni slar yang de nas sgyu 'phrul du ma'i rang gi ngo bo'o/ /de yi skad cig gcig ni bde mnyam 'bras bu ster bar

'gyur te las gzhan gyi ni rang bzhin min/ /'dir thabs 'pho med skad cig gang yin 'dir ni lhan skyes chos kyi dbyings su rab tu zhugs pa la'o/ 62 /mtha' yas sangs rgyas zhing rnams dang ni dpag med yon tan rnams dang nam mkha' la sogs

khams rnams dang / /gnas dang skye dang nyams pa rnam gsum zhes pa'i srid pa dang ni 'gro ba drug tu sems can kun/ /sangs rgyas khro bo lha sogs rnams dang snying rje'i thugs ldan byang chub sems dpa' btsun mor bcas rnams te/ /'di

dag rnams ni srid pa gsum gyis phyag byas rgyal ba bde 'byung gcig pu'i 'khor lo gcig yin no/ 63 /spu dang lpags pa sha khrag ro dang bcas pa dag kyang de bzhin rus pa dang ni rkang dang rtsa/ /de dag rnams la srog sogs rlung ste kun nas rlung gi dbus su

nyi ma zla ba'i bgrod pa'o/ /zla ba'i dbus su dri med nor bu bzhin du dngos po kun gyis 'khyud pa'i rnam par shes pa ste/ /de ni dngos dang dngos med gnyis med nyid dang mchog gi bdud rtsi'i go 'phang khyab byed gzhom med do/ 64 /spu la sogs

pa zla ba'i mtha' ni mtha' dag lus la gnas rnams gang zhig sa bcur gsungs pa rnams/ /sde pa drug dang la sogs gzhan rnams de dag dus kun rnal 'byor rnams la bde mnyam 'bras bu ster/ /de phyir bla ma'i zhabs la gnas pa'i rnal

'byor pa rnams kyis ni thar pa'i slad du btsal bar bya/ /lus las ma gtogs gang zhig khyab byed thar pa ster ba'i sangs rgyas gzhan ni 'ga' yang yod pa min/ 65 /sems can rnams ni sangs rgyas yin te sangs rgyas chen po gzhan

'dir 'jig rten khams na yod ma yin/ /de rnams mnyes par byas pas dpag med srid pa gcod par byed de rnam par mi rtog pa las so/ /rnal 'byor pa ni 'khu bar byed na dmyal ba ngu 'bod la sogs chen po'i mtha' ru 'gro bar 'gyur/ /de phyir

sems ni dag pa na yang mkhas dang mi mkhas skye bo rnams la 'gal ba mi bya'o/ 66 /sems can dag dang 'grogs pa thob nas mi yi bdag po dag pa'i byams pa la sogs sems su 'gyur/ /mi dge'i yon tan dang ldan 'khor ba pa ni drug po rnams kyi

zhe sdang chags sogs sems su 'gyur/ /dus kun du ni byang chub sems kyang 'gro ba dang ni 'gro bar 'dod pa rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur/ /thar par 'jug pas dman zhing smon pa rnam par spangs pa dag ni thams cad dus su bdud kyi sems/ 67 /srid pa

gsum gyi gnas su bdud rnams zhi ba min pa dang ni byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba byed/ /bdud kyi dbang po rdzu 'phrul gyis dman mchog tu 'jigs byed yin te ston pa gcig pu rdzu 'phrul ldan/ /bdud rnams kyi ni bdud kyi blo dang skyob pa

rnams kyi bde ba'i blo gros gzhan gyi snying la 'jug /de phyir sangs rgyas mthu rnams kyis ni srid pa gsum po mtha' dag mtha' yas dus su 'jug par 'gyur/ 68 /rgyal ba rnams kyis 'jig rten khams la tshad gsungs gang yin de yang

mi rnams ye shes nyid ma yin/ /sangs rgyas rnams la lhan skyes lus kyi dbang gis khru ni gcig dang du ma dag gi tshad med de/ /las kyi sar ni srog chags rnams la sems can rjes 'thun tshad dag rtag tu rab tu gsal bar byed/ /gal te tshad

'di bdag gi 'dod pa brjod na lha rnams kyis 'di med pa pa zhes brjod par 'gyur/ 69 /gang gi rgyal ba'i dbang po bskyed cing nyin zhag so so'i dbang las gang gis mngal nas nges par 'byung / /skad cig gang gis 'gyur ba dag dang rnam par bral

ba grub cing g.yo ba g.yo ba med gyur pa/ /sangs rgyas bya ba de spangs nas ni bde mnyam dang bral stong pa gzhan dag gang zhig sgom byed pa/ /de yi bskal pa bye ba du ma rnams kyis sangs rgyas nyid dang lhan skyes

bde ba dag kyang ring / 70 /nim pa'i shing las rgun 'brum min te dug las bdud rtsi dang ni tshangs pa'i shing las 'dam skyes dang / /stong pa las ni myang 'das bde ba mi dge'i dbang las dge ba srog chags gsod las grub pa rnams/ /mchod

sbyin dag las phyugs rnams mtho ris mchog tu zhi ba'i go 'phangs dbang po rnams ni 'gog las min/ /rig byed las ni kun mkhyen gsung dang 'gyur med bde ba g.yo med 'gyur ba ma dag sems las min/ 71 /sems can rnams kyi sdig pa'i sems

ni mi yi bdag po bdud kyi tshogs kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ /bsod nams ye shes rjes chags bde ster dag kyang rtag tu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis byin brlabs pa'o/ /gang phyir bde ba'i dam tshig dbang gis bdud

dang nyon mongs bcom nas mya ngan 'das par 'gro byed pa/ /de phyir bdud rnams nyi ma so so'i dus su de dag rnams la du ma yis ni bgegs rnams byed/ 72 /rgyal ba'i lhan skyes bde ba 'di ni 'phel ba'i don slad dang por las kyi

phyag rgya bsten par bya/ /de nas nyi ma'i gzugs ni lus dang gdong dang rkang pa gtsug tor yan lag thams cad rdzogs pa ste/ /glog gi dbyug pa'i rjes 'thun 'pho med bde ba skyed par byed ma mtshan nyid yan lag rab tu rdzogs/ /

rdo rje rnams kyis rab tu snang bar byed ma srid gsum gnas lus chos kyi dbyings ni de nas 'gyur/ 73 /'gyur ba med pa'i bde ba'i 'bras ster phyag rgya bzhi po 'di rnams grong dang 'brog dgon dur khrod dang / /mi gtsang ba dang

gtsang ba'i gnas dang khyim dang lha yi khang pa thams cad du ni dus kun tu/ /shin du dga' ba'i dga' ba la gnas 'jig rten lam las rab grol rigs dang rigs min mngon spyod cing / /lus stobs bde ster bza' ba btung ba la sogs

longs spyod dang ldan rnal 'byor rnams kyis bsgom par bya/ 74/ rlung ni yang dag phrad pa rnams kyis glog gi me yi rtse mos spyi bo'i zla ba zhu bar byed/ /thig le gang gang zhu ba 'di nas mgrin pa snying ka la son lte ba gsang ba dag la

'gog /thig le las ni g.yo ba'i khu ba rdo rje nor bu la gnas rgyal mtshan rtse la 'gog pa gang / /de ni shes rab ye shes skad cig gal te thig le'i phreng ba 'pho ba med pas bde ster na'o/ 75 /de phyir g.yo med bde ba'i skad cig lhan

cig skyes pa 'dir ni chos kyi dbyings kyis ster byed do/ /srog gis ro yi 'gro ba rnams la gnas pa thams cad bkug cing nyon mongs bdud rnams bcom byas nas/ /rdzu 'phrul kun mkhyen sa dang srid gsum bla ma nyid ni rnal 'byor rnams kyi
