skye ba 'di la ste/ /gal te lam du rab zhugs shi bar 'gyur na de tshe de yi 'dzin pas skye ba gzhan la'o/ 76 /gang zhig yon tan med cing dngos chung yul dang rnam bral de ni sku yi phyag rgya rnam pa gnyis/ /de nas chags pa rjes chags dang ni

yon tan gter gzhan dag kyang gsung gi rang bzhin rnam pa gnyis/ /gnag dang dkar la rjes chags yul gyi yon tan la dga' thugs kyi phyag rgya rnam pa gnyis 'gyur te/ /brgyad dang gnyis dang lnga dang lnga dang gsal bar mkha' dus dang ni

stong pa rig byed dag gi lo/ 77 /rin chen dbang po mi 'byung bar du rgyal ba mchog skyed ma ni rnal 'byor pa yis bsrung bar bya/ /rin chen dbang po rab tu 'byung ba'i dus su mtha' dag yon tan gter gyi dkyil 'khor bzhengs byas nas/ /sangs rgyas

byin brlabs sngags rnams kyis ni gsang ba'i pad+mar bde mnyam sngags dang bcas pa spro bya ste/ /gsang bar bsrung ba rab tu byas nas rdo rje nor bu la gnas byang chub sems ni myang bar bya/ 78 /de la gang zhig bu ru gyur pa rgyal ba skyed byed sras

po de ni 'jam pa'i rdo rje nyid/ /shes rab lhag pa las ni 'ga' zhig tshe na bu mor 'gyur te nges par sangs rgyas yum du 'gyur/ /de nas gzhan ma me tog gsum gyi pad+ma dkar 'dzin dza~M b+ha la dang phyag na rdo rje ste/ /me tog brgyad kyis

gzhan brgyad phyogs dang phyogs bral du gnas rdzu 'phrul tshad ldan khro bo'i rgyal po rnams/ 79 /zla ba de la chus gang rab tu byung ba de ni slar yang 'jam dbyangs rab tu skyed pa ste/ /lo ni nyi shu dag gi bar du so so'i rdul la byang

chub sems dpa' snying stobs chen po ste/ /de nas stong pa dang ni rig byed par du cung zad snying stobs cha shas dman par rab tu 'gyur/ /slar yang lo ni nyi shu'i bar du de bas kyang ni snying stobs chung zhing brtson 'grus chung ba'o/ 80 /

de nas skye gnas la ni rdul med yul ni rab tu bcom pa'o de nyams pa las dbang ma yin/ /'on kyang sa bon nyams pa la ni shes rab dbang bskur rgyal ba'i dbang po'i gsung gis sbyin par bya/ /de dag rnams kyi sa chu me rlung nam mkha'i

yon tan rgyal ba'i yan lag dag gis btsal bar bya/ /byang chub sems kyi bsnyen pa 'di ni sems can don gyi byed pa mo ste 'bras bu mang por 'gyur/ 81 /gang zhig khrag ni 'thung byed rab mchog lha mi rnams kyi sbrang bu de ni bdud rtsi gcig pu

ste/ /skyugs pa snying ka gsang ba'i kha nas rdo rje nor bu la gnas chu skyes nang du rab zhugs min/ /bshang ba gci ba khrag dang sha ni mchog tu ro mnyam skyugs pa'i dbus su rab tu zhugs pa ste/ /'di dag rnams ni ye shes

bdud rtsi srid pa gsum gyi bla ma yis kyang rgyud rnams kun tu bstan/ 82 /shes rab chos 'byung la ni gang zhig lhung ba'i bde ba dag kyang rab tu 'bad pas bsrung bar bya/ /de yis sems can gang dag su zhig byung ba de ni rgyal ba'i rigs la

byang chub sems dpa' nyid/ /de phyir de ni nyin zhag so so'i dus su bdud kyi pho nya srin po rnams kyis za ru 'jug /shes rab me tog dang ldan zos pa zhi ba bde ba'i 'bras bu ster bar ston du 'jug par byed/ 83 /mchog gi bde ba

la gnas rdo rje ma 'khums nyid kyi bar du chu skyes las ni dbyung mi bya/ /gang tshe 'dod pa grub pa de yi tshe na 'di ni sangs rgyas byin gyis brlabs par rab tu 'gyur/ /rdo rje chu skyes dag nas gzhug bya rang gi rdo rje'i snying kar ye shes

'khor lo rab bcug ste/ /'di yis 'od zer rnams kyis gnyi ga'i lus ni gang bar byas nas rnam pa thams cad pa nyid byed/ 84 /gal te 'di ni grub par ma gyur rdo rje nor bu la ni yang dag gnas pa bza' bar bya/ /shes rab kyi ni chos 'byung

gnas la mtha' dag rgyal ba'i rigs ni bsrung ba'i don du bgod par bya/ /shes rab ldan pa la 'o de nas gcig pu la ste slar yang gsung ni rab gsungs sangs rgyas sku/ /gang su 'di ni nyams la mngon par dga' byed g.yon can de ni rdo rje can gyis gsod

par byed/ 85 /srid pa gsum gyi bdag pos drag po'i las kyi rang bzhin du ma'i sngags rnams rab tu gsungs pa gang / /de dag thams cad bdud kyi phyogs nyams 'jigs pa skyed byed srog chags rnams la nam yang ma yin no/ /gang zhig

dran pa rnams kyi byed po g.yul gyi yul la dga' zhing gsod byed gzhan yang mu stegs pa/ /de rnams la ni mchog gi rgyal sras rnams kyis srog chags bsrung pa'i don du de dag sbyar bar bya/ 86 /mkha' 'gro rdo rje sngon rnams phyugs

kyi skye bo gsod la sangs rgyas pa yis gsol ba gdab mi bya/ /sems can rnams ni bsrung ba'i don du srid pa gsum gyi bla mas 'jig rten khams su spros pa ste/ /de phyir de rnams nyin zhag so so'i dus su srung bar byed cing sgrub

pa po la sdang bar byed/ /bsgrub bya dag ni las kyi mthu yis shi bar gyur na 'di ni sgrub pa po yi bdud yin no/ 87 /skyes bu rnams kyi sems ni kun nas mi dge'i 'bras bu'i dbang gis phran tshigs rig pa la rjes chags/ /rig

pa 'di yis srid pa gsum po mtha' dag skad cig gis ni bdag gi dbang du byed pa'o/ /zhes pa'i bsam pa brkam chags sems kyi ye shes sbyin pa rnam par spangs nas dmyal bar rab tu 'jug /rgyab tu rdzas dang rang gi khyim thab

gzhan gyi dbang 'gyur kye ma ngan pa'i chos la rab tu 'jug 88 /shes rab ma yin thabs kyang min pa 'di ni lhan cig skyes pa'i sku ste chos kyi skur gyur pa/ /shes rab thabs kyi rang bzhin nges par mun pa dang bral ye shes dang ni

rnam shes dbye ba las/ /'di ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ste sgra brnyan lta bu sems can du ma'i don ni byed pa po/ /sems can rnams ni smin pa'i slad du slar yang 'di ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi sprul pa'i sku ru 'gyur/ /

89 /rdo rje sems dpa' gcig pu 'di ni dus mtha'i sprin dang mtshungs pa he ru kar ni byung bar gyur/ /gdug pa rnams ni smin pa'i don te de yang dam tshig rgyal ba rmongs pa rnams ni bde ba'i don/ /rin chen dbang po bsdug

bsngal ldan pa rnams kyi de yang pad 'dzin chags can rnams kyi chags pa'i slad/ /bgegs rnams dag ni gzhom pa'i don du phyag gi pad+ma ral gri don yod grub par byung bar gyur/ 90 /zhe sdang las ni sna tshogs yum gang dus

mtha'i rtse mo can mtshungs de ni mkha' 'gro mar byung gyur/ /gti mug dag las spyan ma zhes bya mchog gi snying rje mA ma kI ni nga rgyal rgyu las so/ /chags las de ni gos dkar zhes bya mtha' dag yon tan gter te sgrol ma yang ni phrag dog

las/ /sna tshogs gzugs can gnyis po 'di dag yul dang yul can gzhan rnams thams cad du yang byung bar gyur/ 91 /phung po lnga yi rang bzhin rnams kyis rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga rnams la bzhugs pa brtse ba yis/ /nges pa rnam

par ma bsgrubs bsod nams min pa bsags pa'i sems can rnams ni smin pa'i don du ste/ /gtsang ma'i gnas la sogs par bcom ldan gang zhig rnam par bzhugs pa nyan thos rnams kyi slad du'o/ /gang zhig e wa~M yi ge la

gnas mchog gi nges pa can rnams mchog la dgod pa'i don du'o/ 92 /sems can rnams ni smin pa'i slad du sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi dbye ba rnams kyis dus kun tu/ /nges par rdo rje can gyi bzhugs pa rnam gsum phyi dang nang dang

gzhan du yang ni rab tu 'gyur/ /phyi rol sna tshogs phyogs su 'gyur te mchog gi lus la srog gi rlung ni rab tu rgyu ba'o/ /khyab bdag gi ni sa sogs dkyil 'khor dag la rab gyur gang de rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga la/ 93 /

sgra la sogs la gang zhig rang sems 'gro ste yul med la yang gzhan ni de bzhin kho na'o/ /gang zhig e wa~M yi ge la gnas mchog tu bde ba'i gnas la sku gsung thugs ni zhugs pa'o/ /gcig pu rdo rje can ni dbye ba gsum ste

yul dang yul can khams rnams kyis kyang bskor ba'o/ /dus gsum gnas gsum du bzhugs srid pa gsum du'ang gnas pa sems can du ma'i don gyi slad du'o/ 94 /rgyud rnams dag las 'di skad bdag gis thos shes gsungs pa

gang de 'di ltar bdag gis shes pa ste/ /rdo rje can ni zla ba zhu las rdo rje gang zhig spyi mgrin snying ka'i chu skyes lte gsang dang / /bud med rnams kyi b+ha gar de ni thig le grol ba gsum gyis mchog gi pad+ma la gnas pa/ /de 'dir sangs rgyas

zhing du rab tu zhugs pa bcom ldan 'das su rnal 'byor rnams kyis rig par bya/ 95 /skye ba snga mar rang gi snying gis bskyed pa'i zhi dang chags pa la sogs dngos po rnams kyi ni/ /bags chags stobs kyis 'khor lor gnas pa gcig

ni du mar mthong ste smon lam yon tan dbang gis so/ /don gcig du ma'i skad ni rang rang dngos po rnams kyis srog chags rnams kyi snying la rab tu 'jug /gnas can rnams kyi bsod nams slad du 'khor lo la gnas bsod snyoms la

ni rnam par rgyu ru gshegs/ 96 /dud 'gro yi dags lha min rnams dang lto 'phye lha dang mi ni 'phags pa bod la sogs rnams la/ /byung dang 'byung 'gyur da ltar byung ba rnam pa gsum dang rtag tu bden pa'i chos ni gsung byed cing / /rang rang

skad gzhan dag gis srid pa gsum po ma tshang med pa lam la yang dag 'god byed pa/ /'di ni bde mnyam 'bras bu ster ba thams cad mkhyen pa'i gsung ste lha yi skad kyang ma yin no/ 97 /sangs rgyas rnams kyi'ang rtogs bya min pa dpag

med yon tan dang ldan sangs rgyas sprul pa sgyu ma ni/ /srid pa gsum gyi gnas su bdag nyid ston par byed de brgya byin gzhu ni ji bzhin nyid du'o/ /sna tshogs dngos rnams kyis phye rgyal ba dang bcas lha mi rnams kyi rang rang sems la rab

zhugs pa/ /'di ni ma skyes chos te chu la nam mkha' bzhin du 'dir ni skye bar 'khrul pa ster ba'o/ 98 /rgyal ba'i sku yi rdo rje yul dang yul can rnams kyi bgrod bya min pa rnam pa thams cad pa/ /gsung gi

rdo rje sems can thams cad rang snying skad rnams dag gis chos ni go bar byed pa'o/ /rdo rje can gyi thugs kyi rdo rje sems can rnams kyi sems kyi rang bzhin mtha' dag sa la gnas/ /dri med nor bu lta bu dngos po rnams kyi 'dzin byed gang yin

de nyid ye shes rdo rje'o/ 99/ sbyin pa la sogs bde mnyam 'bras ster drug dang bzhi rnams nus ma bcu po de dag rnams su gsungs/ /de dag rnams kyi thabs ni dag pa mchog gi rnam bcu sems kyis gang ba'i bum pa de dag rnams/ /bdud

dang nyon mongs nyams pa 'dod pa zhes dang 'phrog byed rdo rje'i tshogs ni ljon pa la sogs rnams/ /phyag rgya drug rnams stong pa drug ste srid gsum skyed par byed pa ye shes rnam shes gcig pu'o/ 100/ 'khor lo srid gsum kun nas dang ba zhes

pa bde ba rin chen 'di yi chags pa nyid dag ni/ /pad+ma nyon mongs zad pa ral gri rdo rje dag kyang ye shes sku chen rnam par mi phyed pa'o/ /mi shes gcod pa gri gug mchog gi rigs drug rnams te 'di dag rnams kyis bskyed pa gang yin pa/ /

phung po khams dang dbang po la sogs mkha' bzhin ro mnyam de dag rnams kyang de bzhin rig par bya/ 101/ gang du nges par rigs kyi gzugs ni nyams pa nyid du gyur pa de ni chen po'i gzugs su gsungs/ /gang du 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal

nyams pa nyid du gyur pa de ni tshor ba chen por gsungs pa ste/ /gang du 'khor ba'i 'du shes nyams pa nyid du gyur pa de ni rdo rje'i 'du shes chen po'o/ /gang du 'khor ba 'phel ba nyams pa nyid du gyur pa dag ni rdo rje'i 'du byed kho na'o/ 102 /

gang du gnyid la sogs pa'i gnas skabs nyams pa nyid du gyur pa de yang rnam par shes par gsungs/ /gang du shes pa min pa'i dngos po nyams pa nyid du gyur pa de ni thub pa'i ye shes nyid/ /'di dag rnam par snang mdzad la

sogs mchog gi rgyal ba mchog ni rnam pa drug ste rigs drug rnams/ /gzhan gyi khams drug dbye ba rnams te sa dang me dang chu dang rlung dang nam mkha' zhi ba rnams/ 103 /gang du gti mug mtha' dag nyams pa nyid du gyur pa spyan ma yin te de ni

'dzin ma'o/ /gang du nga rgyal mtha' dag nyams pa nyid du gyur pa mA ma kI ste de ni chu nyid do/ /gang du chags pa mtha' dag nyams pa nyid du gyur pa gos dkar mo ste de ni me yin no/ /gang du phrag dog mtha' dag nyams pa nyid du gyur pa sgrol ma

yin te de ni rlung yang ngo / 104 /gang du zhe sdang mtha' dag nyams pa nyid du gyur pa rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma ste mkha'/ /gang du ser sna thams cad nyams pa nyid du gyur pa sna tshogs yum ste de ni 'gyur med do/ /mthong dang ma mthong gzugs ni

yid dang nam mkha' la yang lta bar byed pa gang yin de ni mig /ring nas sgra ni rab tu gsal ba bzhin du thos pa 'di ni rgyal ba'i rna ba chen po'o/ 105 /mchog gi bde ba byed pa'i dri ni thams cad 'dzin pa de ni khyab bdag gi yang sna bzang po/ /rang gis

zla ba'i bdud rtsi bde ster dag kyang rtag tu myang bar byed pa gang yin de ni lce/ /rdo rje'i reg bya kun nas 'phrog pa gang yin de ni rtag tu rdo rje lus kyi dbang po ste/ /thabs dang shes rab rab tu 'grogs las bde mnyam la 'jug yid gang yin pa de ni

'di yi chos/ 106 /dbye ba drug gis phye ba'i yul dang yul can 'di dag byang chub sems dpa' btsun mor bcas pa rnams/ /gzugs la gzugs la sogs pa 'di dag rgyal ba mchog gi yul rnams rnam pa drug ste kun nas ni/ /dang zhing

ma skyes ma 'gags mchog gi bde byed gos pa med cing ye shes kyis ni rtogs bya ste/ /khams gsum dag tu gzhan gyis gzung bya dang ni mtha' dag 'gro ba'i dbang po'i sgo yis rtogs bya min/ 107/ ye shes dgug par byed pa 'dir

ni slar yang shin tu stobs te de ni gzhug pa rmugs byed kyis/ /rengs byed de ni bcing ba nges par mchog gi bde ba'i dbang gis khengs byed kyis ni mnyes pa yang / /ye shes 'khor lo dag la 'khor lo ro ni mnyam par byed pa rdo rje

shugs kyis byed pa ste/ /de bzhin khro bo'i lha mo rnams ni rab gsal nges par rnal 'byor ma yi rgyud kyi sku la'o/ 108 /srid pa gsum gyi gnas su bdud rnams dag la bsnun pa nges par dbyug pa sngon pos byed

pa ste/ /bcing ba khro bo mi g.yo dus mtha'i nyi ma dang mtshungs mtha' yas brtson 'grus kyis ni phur bus gdab/ /'dod pas de yis brtson 'grus nyams pas sa gzhi la gnas rengs par byed pa gnod mdzes nyid kyis so/ /

gtsug tor gyis ni rdzu 'phrul nyams pa rab tu gsal zhing nges par sngar bzhin khro bo'i lha mo rnams/ 109 /yi dags rnams ni smin pa'i don du de nas tsartsi ka la sogs pa spros par gyur pa ste/ /skye bo rnams ni bsrung ba'i don du dbang po

la sogs lha rnams de bzhin phyogs dang phyogs bral du/ /klu rnams smin par bya ba'i don du gdengs can rigs ni mtha' dag rdo rje can gyis nges par spros/ /lha min rnams ni smin par bya ba'i don du khyi yi gdong ma chen mo la sogs rnams

kyang spros/ 110 /gzhan gang cung zad spros pa yod pa dag kyang khyab bdag dkyil 'khor la ni 'byung po las skyes mthar/ /sems can kun gyi don du mchog gi yon tan rnam mang 'di dag rang gi lus la rig par bya/ /de bzhin rgyud dang sngags

ni rnam mang rigs la gnas rnams rnal 'byor ma dang rnal 'byor dbye ba ste/ /'di ni dbang bskur rnam pa gnyis kyang bu yi yon tan dbang gis 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa'o/ 111/ gang zhig shes rab kyi ni nu ma la reg gzhan pa bdud rtsi

myang dang 'khyud pa gang yin dang / /shes rab dang 'grogs byang chub sems ni zhu ba dag la bzhi pa'i skad cig bdud rtsi rtogs pa gang / /de dag thams cad nges par 'jig rten pa ste mchog gi snying rje yis ni lam gyi rgyu ru bstan/ /

'jig rten 'das pa'i dbang gang mchog gi rgyal ba'i bdag po'i phyag rgya mchog la rjes su sbyor ba'o/ 112 /sems kyi snang ba tsam ste rang gi yid las skyes pa me long gi ni gzugs brnyan lta bu nyid/ /gang zhig mtha' dag rgyal ba'i

sras dang sangs rgyas rnams kyis bsten pa rnal 'byor dbang pos bsten bya ste/ /ye shes me lce rab tu rgyas pa de ni bdud tshogs yul dang bcas pa mtha' dag sreg byed cing / /lus la chags pa la sogs kyang ste rnal 'byor rnams la lo

yi sbyor bas bde mnyam ster bar byed/ 113 /shes rab ye shes dag ni sems dang de yi snang ba dag kyang rnam pa bcu po nyid du 'gyur/ /dbang ni dri med ri bong can mtshungs me long gzugs brnyan lta bu 'di la zhugs pa gang yin pa/ /

de las mya ngan 'das pa'i bde ba 'pho med lhan cig skyes pa 'gyur med nyid ni bzhi pa ste/ /sangs rgyas zhal 'di gang gi snying dang kha la gnas par gyur pa de ni dpal ldan bla ma'o/ 114 /nam mkhar kun nas zhen pa'i sems dang mig ni mi

'dzum rdo rje'i lam du rab tu zhugs pa yis/ /stong pa las ni du ba smig rgyu rab gsal dri ma med pa'i mkha' snang nyid dang mar me dang / /'bar ba dang ni zla ba nyi ma rdo rje rnams dang mchog gi cha dang thig le mthong bar 'gyur/ /de yi

dbus su sangs rgyas gzugs ni yul dang rnam par bral ba du ma longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku/ 115 /nam mkha' chu 'dzin bral ba dag ni rnal 'byor pa yis bgrad pa'i mig gis blta bar bya ba ste/ /re khA nag po dri med 'od zer 'phro

ba dus kyi rtsa la mthong bar gyur gyi bar du'o/ /de la kun mkhyen gzugs ni chu la nyi ma lta bu gos pa med pa kha dog sna tshogs te/ /rnam pa kun ldan rang sems yul dang rnam par brol ba dag go sems ni gzhan pa min pa nyid/

116 /gzugs ni mthong bar gyur na nyin zhag so so'i dus su srog gi rlung ni 'gog par rab bya ste/ /'od zer 'khor lo rang gi lus la yongs su bskor cing 'khor bar byed pa mthong gi bar du'o/ /zla ba drug gi sdom brtson rnams kyi

reg byas dman pa'i bde ba mnyam pa lam gyi sems su 'gyur/ /chags dang chags bral mtha' thog la gnas skad cig ma yang khyab bdag gi ni dbugs kyi grangs 'phel lo/ 117 /oT+TA 'bar ba'i bar dang khyad par dga' ba

lhan skyes dag dang ye shes rnam shes dag gi dbus/ /gnyid dang gnyid yur mtshams su rdo rje pad+ma dag gi gnyis gnyis sbyor ba la ni bde ba gang / /de yi 'phel ba rab tu bya ste bla ma'i nges pa'i dbang gis 'phel 'gyur 'di la

ngo mtshar med/ /nyon mongs bdud rnams bcom nas rgyal ba'i bdag por 'jug ste lo yi sbyor bas rnal 'byor bzang po'o/ 118 /sa yis rnam pa sra ba min zhing zhu ba chu lus khu ba min te gsher ba nyid min phyir/ /me yi rnam pa me yin g.yo ba rlung

gi lus ni gang zhig g.yo ba min pas rlung ma yin/ /stong pa'i rnam pa yin yang blta bya dkar dang ljang dang kha dog sna tshogs chen po kha dog min/ /rnam pa thams cad pa yang blta bya min te rang snying dri ma nyon mongs bdud kyi mthu las so/ /

119 /nA da thig le cha dang ye shes bdud rtsi'i gnas su son pa lu gu rgyud du bcings pa'i rtsa/ /srog dang thur sel lam gsum rnams te rdo rje dang bcas pad+ma rdo rje chu skyes ldan pa nyid/ /rlung gnyis yang dag phrad pa'i dbus su yul rnams

yul can rnams ni 'byung dang rab tu 'jug pa ste/ /du ba la sogs rnams kyi mtshan ma 'dzin pa dag kyang gang zhig 'di dag thams cad gsang bar bya/ 120 /dbu mar srog ni rab gzhug nyi ma dang bcas ri bong can gyi bgrod pa g.yas dang

g.yon la bcing / /phyag rgya rab tu 'grogs la sems dang mchog gi bde ba la gnas rdo rje yang dag bslang ba yang / /pad+mar rdo rje'i sgra 'am rang gi lag pa'i chu skyes dag gis gsor ba bde ba'i slad du ste/ /sa bon gtong ba min

pa'i bde ba de ni 'chi ba'i 'jigs 'phrog 'di ni dpal ldan bla ma'i zhal/ 121 /sa ni chu la rab tu 'jug cing chu yang 'bar byed la ste gtsang bar byed pa rlung la'o/ /rlung ni stong pa la ste stong pa nges par mtshan ma rnam pa bcu ru 'gyur zhing mtshan

ma ni/ /rnam pa thams cad pa ru 'gyur te mi zad mchog gi bde ba gzhom du med pa ye shes sku/ /ye shes las ni rdzu 'phrul dngos grub tu 'gyur mi bdag skyes bu rnams kyi skye ba 'di nyid la'o/ 122 /'dod pa sprul pa'i skur ni nges par rab tu

'gyur te rdzogs pa dag ni de yi gsung nyid do/ /'bar ba sprul pa'i thugs te 'di yi mchog gi bde ba byed pa'i ye shes dag ni oT+TA nyid/ /dga' ba longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ste mchog dga' dang bcas khyad par dga' ba rim pas

'di yi ni/ /gsung dang thugs so lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba nyid kyang bde 'byung 'di yi ye shes rdo rjer 'gyur/ 123 /'dar ba nyid ni srid pa gsum gyis btud pa chos kyi sku ste 'byung ba de yi gsung du 'gyur/ /gnyid yur gnyid ni chos

kyi thugs te gnyid ni 'di yi srid pa'i 'jigs 'joms ye shes kho na'o/ /yi ge nyid ni dag pa'i sku ste dbyangs dang bral ba'i cha dang thig le nA da rim pa yis/ /bde 'byung dag pa'i sku yi gsung dang thugs dang ye shes rdo rje rnam gsum

srid par gnas pa'o/ 124 /sad pa dang ni rmi lam rang bzhin slar yang gzhan pa 'di ni gnyid dang bzhi pa'i rang bzhin ni/ /lus la gnas dang dbugs la zhen pa yul rnams rnam par dpyod cing g.yo med sems la zhen pa ste/ /

ye shes la gnas bud med rab tu 'grogs las byang chub sems ni zhu ba la yang skad cig 'gyur/ /sprul pa la sogs dag gi sems kyi rdo rje rnam pa bzhir ni rim pas nges par rab tu 'gyur/ 125 /de ltar sems ni rnam bzhi srid pa

gsum la gnas pa'i srog chags rnams kyi thig le'i dbus su ste/ /rnal 'byor dbang po rnams kyi bde mnyam 'bras ster khyab byed dag ni thar pa'i slad du bsrung bar bya/ /thig le btang na rnal 'byor rnams kyi skye ba'i sa bon

mchog gi bde ba song la thar pa gang / /de phyir 'khor ba'i bde ba'i skad cig 'dir ni sdom brtson rnams kyis thams cad dus su dor bar bya/ 126 /gang phyir a sogs ka sogs ri bong can dang nyin byed gcig nyid rdo rje can gyi gdan min

zhing / /hU~M yig nyid kyis mtshan ma dang ni yongs su gyur pa gzhan pa kha dog gzugs dag mi 'dod de/ /'gyur med dag gis bskyed cing 'gyur ba nyams par gyur pa mchog gi dbang po dag dang ldan pa ni/ /rnam pa kun ldan thig

le mtha' dag rgyal ba'i bdag po sna tshogs sgyu ma 'dzin pa 'di la'o/ 127 /l-i sogs dbyangs brgyad gang dag yul gyi yon tan du 'gyur dbyangs phyed kyis ni rnam par dman pa rnams/ /phan tshun dbye bas phye ba rkang pa dang bcas

ro dang mda' rnams dbu ma'i dbugs ni 'bab pa ste/ /dus sbyor gnyis pa la ni yul gyi yon tan dbang gis ring po phan tshun dbye bas phye ba rnams/ /slar yang thun mtshams gsum pa la ni shin tu ring po yul gyi yon tan dbu ma'i dbugs rnams

'bab/ 128 /de ltar thun mtshams bzhi la mda' dang bcas pa'i ri bo ro rnams dbu ma yi ni dbugs kyi dbyangs/ /ka la sogs pa'i yi ge sum bcu sum bcu'i rab tu dbye bas rab tu gsal bar dgu brgya nyid/ /dbyangs drug gi ni dbye bas

phye ba mkha' mkha' dus dang mda' rnams dus sbyor gsum gyi rtsa gsum la/ /de bzhin ring pos rab tu phye rnams phyi ma'i nyin mo'i bgrod par dus sbyor gsum gyi rtsa gsum la/ 129 /slar yang dbyangs drug dag gis phye ba rnams ni mtshan

mo'i dus su dus sbyor gsum gyi rtsa gsum la/ /de bzhin ring pos rab tu phye rnams phyi ma'i mtshan mo'i bgrod par dus sbyor gsum gyi rtsa gsum la/ /nyin zhag so so'i dus su dbugs ni 'byung dang 'jug pa mkha' mkha' drug dang zla ba

mig rnams 'bab/ /snga ma stong pa rnams bsdus nas ni mnyam dang mi mnyam bgrod par dbu ma dag la sbyar bar bya/ 130 /phyi rol du ni gang zhig chu tshod brgyad pa'i phyed gyur sgra gcan longs spyod dag las gzhan du gnas/ /de ni rang gi lus

la dbugs phyed nges par mun pa dang bral 'jig rten thams cad snang ba ste/ /snga ma phyed ni mun pa dang bcas srid pa gsum po mtha' dag stong pa dag tu thim pa'o/ /de phyir de ni phug nas dus kyi 'khor lo rnal 'byor ldan pa gcig pu mun pa bral

bar 'jug 131 /zla ba dman zhing nyi mar lhag gang khyab bdag mchog gi cha de 'dir ni thun 'tshams bzhi la ste/ /thun dang thun la nyin dang mtshan mo'i dbang gis bgrod cing dus sbyor phyed pa'i rab tu dbye ba yis/ /sum bcu rtsa drug dus

kyi pho nya nyis 'gyur mi bdag gzhan rnams tshes ni brgyad gnyis dbye ba la/ /gza' rnams kyi yang brgyad kyi dbye ba la ste slar yang gzhan rnams du ma tshigs kyi phyogs la'o/ 132 /rig byed dus kyi dbugs kyi lhag ma sred gsum bskyed par

mdzad ma mkha' 'gro ma ni sna tshogs gzugs/ /zla ba'i dbus su dman pa gang de mchog gi rgyal ba'i bdag po'i rang gi phyag rgya rnam gnyis 'gyur/ /gang zhig nyi ma la gnas de ni brgyad dbye phyogs dang phyogs bral 'dab mar thun tshod longs spyod

mtha'/ /lhag ma 'khor lo'i lha mo mchog tu 'jigs par byed pa gzhan rnams mtha' dag phyi dang lus la'o/ 133 /spen par bug pa mun can nyin zhag ces bya lha yi bla ma'i phyed bcas mig dang mig gi grangs/ /phyed bcas drug dang rig byed du 'gyur

de rnams mchog gi rgyal ba'i bdag po'i thugs rdo rje las skyes/ /sa skyes stong pa sprul zla nyi ma gza' lag pa sangs mjug rings la yang stong pa sbrul mkha' gcig /mkha' mig mig dang gcig tu gyur pa de rnams mchog gi khyab

bdag gi ni dag pa'i gsung las byung / 134 /gang zhig zla ba'i dus kyi longs spyod mkha' mkha' ro me de rnams sku yi rdo rje dag las byung / /mtha' dag gcig tu gyur pa ro drug sbrul dang dus rnams dag ste phyed kyi chu tshod de bzhin nyid/ /mkha'

'gro dus kyi gzugs can mtha' dag lus la gnas shing srog chags rnams kyi srog ni 'phrog byed ma/ /de phyir nyin zhag so so'i dus su rang gi lam ni dgag par byas nas de rnams bsgrub par bya/ 135 /ji srid gza' rnams dag gi

longs spyod rang gzhan bgrod pa la gnas dbugs rngub dbugs 'byung rgyu ba las/ /de srid dus kyi pho nya khyab byed ma gang khams gsum du ni mchog dag ster bar 'gyur ram ci/ /pho nya phra mo rab tu rgyu ba bla ma'i gsung la gnas pa byang

chub sems dang 'gyur med la/ /sdig bral rnal 'byor ldan pa rnams kyis shes par bya ste gzhan du 'dod chags sems kyi ma yin no/ 136 /nyi ma dang ni zla ba'i rkang pa rnams la gnyi ga'i bgrod pa'i dbang gis sred pas bsnun pa rnams/ /

yan lag rnams kyis bgos pa'o lhag ma'i rkang pa de ni sgra gcan 'jug pa la yang mjug rings za/ /thun mtshams kun dang thun brgyad nyin zhag so so'i dus su srog chags rnams kyi yan lag bcu gnyis rnams/ /

dus sbyor re re la ni dbugs rnams dag kyang nyis 'gyur dgu brgya'i srog rnams 'bab par yan lag gsungs/ 137 /yan lag gnyis gnyis rnams la thog ma'i nyin zhag dbang gis dang po ma rig yan lag bcu gnyis bar/ /

de phyir dus la sogs pas yan lag rnams te gzhan ni dgu pa sngar bzhin gang yin de rnams so/ /de ltar rnam pa lnga po rnams kyis dus su yang ni kun nas zla ba gnyis gnyis dag las 'gyur/ /gang du zla ba'i cha gcig nyams pa

nyid du gyur pa dang po'i zla ba de nyid kho na'o/ 138 /zla ba drug dang dus gsum gyis ni 'dzin par 'gyur te rten cing 'brel ba yan lag bcu gnyis kyis/ /drug pa nyi ma'i dus kyi dbye ba rkang pa'i bgrod pa'i dbang gis zla ba'i dbus su

rab tu zhugs/ /reg pa'i yan lag dbus der sgra gcan gyis ni zla ba nyi ma dag gi rkang pa de 'dzin no/ /nyin dang mtshan mo'i dus su sgra gcan dag gis bltas pa'i sman rnams gang yin de dag grub pa ster/ 139 /

sa skyes khu ba gza' lag zla ba nyi ma gza' lag pa sangs sa skyes sngags pa nyi skyes spen/ /sngags pa lug la sogs pa'i khyim la nyin zhag so so'i dus su zhing can rnams te dus kun tu/ /zhi la zla nyi'i khyim ste gza' lag

pa sangs skyes sngags pa nyi skyes khyim ni rgyas pa dang / /dbang dang dgug pa 'bral dang gsad pa dag la rab 'gyur gal te 'dir ni zhing can gyur na'o/ 140/ zhi la dkar po'i zhal te dang por rgyas pa la ni dkar dang ser mtshungs thun tshod

lag pa las/ /reng pa ser po me yi thun la'o rmongs la gser dang nyi mtshungs chu gter la ste dgug pa la/ /dmar po lnga pa dag las 'gyur te dbang la nyi ma chu gter dang mtshungs drug pa'i thun la'o/ /gsad la nag po'i

zhal te ri bo la'o bskrad la gnag dang dkar 'dir sbrul la mtshan mo'i mthar/ 141 /sa chu me rlung ri bong can dang nyi ma lha ste 'di rnams srog ni longs spyod byed po min/ /'di rnams srog ni longs spyod po yang mi dge 'bras bu'i

dbang gis bdag ni longs spyod sems par byed/ /sred pa sdug bsngal rjes chags 'byung po'i tshogs ni gza' dang lag 'gro lha rnams dag la don gnyer byed/ /gang gi drin gyis thar par rab tu 'gyur ba yid kyis zhi ba de ni byed pa ma yin

no/ 142 /dang po'i dbugs ni yon tan med pa'i bdag nyid rnam gsum yon tan dbang gis de yang gsum grangs 'gyur/ /de yang yul gyi yon tan dbang gis tshes shes bya bar 'gyur te de rnams slar yang sum 'gyur ni/ /'byung ba chu

gter grangs 'gyur slar yang de nas rgyu ba'i dbye ba rnams kyis bsnun pa de dag rnams/ /chu tshod phyed kyi dbugs kyi grangs rnams dag ste slar yang nyis 'gyur chu tshod dbugs kyi grangs rnams so/ 143 /gnyis gsum chu gter mda' dus ri brgyad

gza' dang bcu rnams kyis ni dus kyi rtsa 'di 'phel ba ste/ /de nas sde yi rab dbye rnams kyis rnam gnyis lam la gnas pa dus kyi rtsa ni 'jig rten gsum/ /kun nas gang bar byed do bde mnyam 'bras bu ster ba zla ba nyi ma'i

rab tu rgyu ba las/ /ji srid rig byed sbrul dang me ste nges par phyag na gri gug thod pa can du rab tu 'gyur/ 144 /'khor lo mda' dang chu gter grangs ni yul dang yon tan dbang gis sku gsung thugs kyi rab dbye yis/ /

gtso bo srung bar byed de bde mnyam 'bras bu ster ba du ba la sogs lha mo brgyad rnams so/ /de ltar nyi ma la gnas gtso bo mchog gi ri bong can gyi cha yis 'khyud pa sna tshogs gzugs/ /lha mo sangs rgyas 'chi med rnams dang

yul dang yul can sgra gcan zla ba nyi mas phyag 'os pa'o/ 145 /gtso bo yi ni phra mo'i ngo bo mchog gi yon tan yul te nang dang phyi rol phyag rgya gang / /de rnams khams gsum du ni mchog tu 'jigs byed khro bo'i sems las

rab skyes mkha' 'gro ma rnams so/ /gtso bo'i dbang po gang dag rnams dang rnam gsum srid pa la gnas sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ste/ /de rnams rang gi yul bcas yon tan gyis 'khyud bkra shis la sogs rdo rje mkha' 'gro 'di

rnams so/ 146 /gzugs dang sgra dang ro dang dri dang gzhan pa dag kyang de nas reg bya du ba rdul dang ni/ /snying stobs sems la rim pas rab tu gsal bar yang ni de bzhin sgra gcan gyis kyang 'khyud pa ste/ /de dag rnams kyi dal rkang drug

dang myur 'khyog la sogs rgyu ba las ni rnam mang bgrod pa 'di/ /brgyad po rnams kyi rkang pa drug la yul dang yon tan brgyad rnams yang dag gnas pa 'khor lo'i tshul/ 147 /dang po'i dbugs ni dbye ba brgyad de yul dang yon tan la gnas

kun nas du ba la sogs pa/ /mkha' 'gro ma rnams dag gis bskor zhing rnam gsum bgrod pa'i dbang gis 'khyam ste 'gro ba drug tu gnas/ /de yi dbus su dus kyi 'khor lo bdud rtsi 'phro ba'i cha yis 'khyud par gyur pa dag pa'i sku/ /gang zhig

dbugs ni bcad nas rgyal ba'i sku la 'jug pa de nyid dus kyi 'khor lo'o/ 148/ dbugs ni bcad pa'i mtha' ru rnam gsum bgrod pa 'di dang rnam pa drug kyang yod pa ma yin te/ /thig le bkab par gyur na kun nas mchog gi khyab bdag

bde ba mtha' yas dus su 'jug par 'gyur/ /'khor ba dag gi bde ba spangs nas mchog gi bla ma'i zhal ni rnal 'byor pa yis bsgom par bya/ /spyod pa sgeg pa'i gzugs dang mchog tu 'jigs pa byed la rnal 'byor ma rnams dgyes pa

ma yin no/ 149/ gtso bo'i dbugs la gza' yi tshogs kyi rkang pa mtha' dag dus kyi sbyor ba dag gis thim 'gyur te/ /dbugs ni mkha' mkha' nam mkha' mkha' mig me dang chu gter song na thams cad stong par skul bar byed/ /lo 'di

rnams kyis phyi rol du ni mchog gi khyab bdag rkang pa spro dang sdud pa'i ngo bo la/ /rang rang tshad kyis rgyal ba'i bdag po'i rkang pa dbugs kyi dbus su 'gro dang gnas pa shes par bya/ 150 /stong pa la ni spen pa 'jug pa rang gi nyin zhag bgrod pa'i

dbang gis dus kyi mthar 'gyur te/ /stong pa nam mkha' mkha' mtsho chu gter zla ba'i nyin zhag longs spyod lhag ma rnams kyis nam gru'o/ /rang gi bgrod pa 'gro ba'i nyin zhag mkha' mkha' nam mkha' mkha' mtsho mig

gis der ni sgra gcan 'jug /rang gi bgrod par 'gro ba'i nyin zhag mkha' mkha' nam mkha' mkha' dus dus kyi lha yi blun po 'jug 151 /nam mkha' mkha' dang stong pa mkha' brgyad sbrul dang mig gi nyin zhag rnams kyis bkra

shis 'jug pa ste/ /mkha' mkha' nam mkha' mkha' mig me dang chu gter grangs kyi nyin zhag rnams kyis nyi ma la sogs 'jug /mkha' mkha' nam mkha' mkha' mtsho brgyad dang zla ba mda' yi nyin zhag rnams kyis zla ba

der 'jug ste/ /de yi dus su rgyal po 'gro ba dag ni rang rang tshad kyis rnam par nyams par rab tu 'gyur/ 152 /de nas zla ba nyi ma shar ba la yang rtsa yi kun du spyod pa 'di ni rab tu 'gyur/ /gcig gnyis gsum dang chu gter mda' dang

ro dang ri bo nor rnams 'phel bar gyur pa gsang ba'i rtsa/ /bug pa zhes bya sgo yi rtsar 'gyur bcu pa phra mo'i rtsa ni slar yang steng gi lam du'o/ /de ni sde yis phye ba yon tan dang bcas yul dang bcas pa 'khor lo'i rtsa rnams dag tu

'gyur/ 153 /gtsug tor snying ka'i phyogs dang mgo bo ri bong can gnas mgrin pa'i phyogs te nyi ma'i rgyu ba dang / /lte bar 'khor lo'i rtsa ni dus dang lag 'gro mi bdag sum bcu rtsa gnyis de yi nyis 'gyur rnams/ /zla ba'i rkang

pa rnams kyis tha dad ma yin mtha' dag nyi rkang bsres pa yis kyang tha mi dad/ /brgya dang brgyad bcu rtsa gcig gang zhig lag rkang la gnas tshigs kyi rtsa ni gnyis kyi dbye ba rnams/ 154 /gtsug tor snying ka'i phyogs dang ri bong

can dang nyi ma'i rkang pa mgrin pa'i 'khor lor lhag ma rnams/ /brgyad bcu rtsa gcig mtha' ma rab gsal rnam bcu gang yin de dag zhi dang drag po'i gza' rnams te/ /de dag rnams kyi thog mtha'i cha ni khyab bdag zhabs

la gnas pa dus kyi rtsa yis longs spyod cing / /gza' yi mtha' yang srid pa gsum gyi skyed ma rdo rje sku yi mkha' 'gro ma yis longs spyod do/ 155 /dang por gang zhig stong pa'i ngo bo yul dang yon tan la gnas

de yi rang bzhin dag tu 'gyur/ /khams dang phung po rnams la rab zhugs slar yang mig la sogs pa'i dbang po rnams la mnyam pa ste/ /sad dang rmi lam la sogs la zhugs mchog gi bde mnyam gzhom du med par yang dag

rab zhugs pa/ /rig ma sangs rgyas yum de rdo rje yi ni tshigs la gnas pa rnal 'byor pa yis btsal bar bya/ 156 /gtso bo'i sku yi mthu las rnal 'byor pa rnams dag gi mchog gi lus la lha yi spyan du 'gyur/ /

de yi gsung gi mthu las rna ba de yi thugs las gzhan gyi snying la gnas pa shes par 'gyur/ /shes rab sku yi mthu las rnam gsum srid pa la gnas sngon gyi skye ba rjes su dran par 'gyur/ /shes rab kyi ni gsung gi mthu las

mkha' mnyam thams cad dus su kun 'gro'i rdzu 'phrul du rab 'gyur/ 157 /shes rab ye shes rang bzhin las ni gang zhig bde mnyam thams cad dus su gzhom du med par 'gyur/ /lha yi spyan gyi mthu las mig gis ma mthong

ba dang srid pa rnam pa gsum yang mthong bar 'gyur/ /lha yi rna ba dag gi mthu las srog chags kyis brjod snying dang kha yi sgra ni thos par 'gyur/ /de bzhin sku gsung thugs kyi sbyor ba dag las mi yi bdag po reg bya la

sogs thams cad 'gyur/ 158/ rtsa ni gang zhig thur sel dbus su rnam gsum lam gnas gci ba bshang ba khu ba 'bab pa rnams/ /srog ni de dag rnams kyi rab tu rgyu ba rnam pa dgu ru 'gyur te mtha' ma sangs rgyas zhal/ /

rna ba sna dang mig la rnam gnyis shes par 'gyur te lce'u chung ni lce dang bcas pa dang / /thig le gtsug tor bug par 'gyur te bcu pa shes pa min pa rnams la brgya yis btab pa gang / 159 /srog dang thur sel 'gags

par gyur na ri bong 'dzin pa bskyod pa nyi ma'i gzugs su rab tu 'gyur/ /rdo rje pad+mas rab tu sad na slar yang 'di ni nyi ma'i gzugs kyi me lces zhu bar byed/ /rlung dang zla ba nyi ma 'gags par gyur na rnam par shes pa dang ni ye shes

gcig tu 'gyur/ /de ltar de ltar dang ni de bzhin de ltar rnam gsum du 'gyur gzhan ni cung zad yod ma yin/ 160/ zla ba nyi ma'i gzugs ni zos na mkha' la nyin mo dang ni mtshan mo nam yang min pa nyid/ /thun mtshams de ni lus kyi dbus su rnal

'byor rnams kyi dus kun bdud rtsi'i go 'phang la gnas pa'o/ /phyogs zad zla ba mkha' la gnas pa nyi ma'i gzugs la ro ni mnyam par 'gyur ba ji lta bar/ /srog dang thur sel zad par gyur na gsal bar yang ni lus la dngos grub dus su

de 'gag go/ 161 /zla ba nyi ma'i rgyu ba nyams shing lam ni gnyi ga yi yang srog gi rlung ni chen po 'gag /chu skyes rdo rje rab tu sad cing ri bong can zhu nyi ma'i gzugs chen la ni rab tu zhugs/ /dngos dang dngos med gcig gyur rnam gsum srid pa la

gnas gzhom med legs par rab tu rtogs gyur pa/ /de yi dus su rnal 'byor pa ste gang la gnyis ni cung zad med pa mchog gi go 'phang 'gro/ 162 /khro bo sangs rgyas lha mo dang bcas nges par ro yi rdo rje rnams dang sa yi snying po sogs/ /

rab tu dga' ba'i thugs rnams rnal 'byor pa la grub pa'i dus su nam mkha' la ni mngon sum 'gyur/ /de yi 'dod pa'i dngos grub ri bong can gyi zhag gi tho rangs dang ni mtshan mo phyed la 'gyur/ /rin po che 'am me tog char ni mchog gyur

dus kyis sbyor bas sa yi steng du 'bab par 'gyur/ 163 /lus ni dang zhing rdul phran nyams pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs mtshan la sogs pa rnams kyis rab rdzogs 'gyur/ /sna tshogs 'jig rten gsum po nyid ni dang zhing sgrib pa rnam par

bral ba rmi lam bzhin du snang / /skad ni kun nas chad pa med cing du ma'i skad gzhan dag gis gzhan gyi snying la 'jug pa ste/ /sems ni dam pa'i bde bas gang zhig mi g.yo thams cad dus su lhan cig skyes pas 'khyud pa'o/ 164/ sa las chu dang rtse mo can dang rlung gi rdul phran

phye nas chu yi khams la 'jug par byed/ /chu las sa me rlung phye rtse mo can la rtse mo can las sa dang chu dang rlung phye ste/ /rlung la'o rlung las sa dang chu dang rtse mo can dag phye nas las kyi rlung yang stong pa la/ /

rnam gsum srid pa'i dbang gis gang zhig las kyi rlung gis bsnun pa gzhan rnams zhing gzhan dag tu 'gro/ 165/ sangs rgyas zhing ni ma lus las can min par srid gsum skyed par mdzad pas rnam par gzigs nas ni/ /

gnyi ga ro mnyam dag pa'i rdul la sangs rgyas thams cad byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bskor ba ste/ /so so re re'i ro yi rdul la gnyi ga'i rigs kyi dbang gis rdo rje'i sras po rnams kyis bskor/ /sa la sogs pa'i rdul la

ma lus rigs la gnas pa mtha' yas mi g.yo sogs la rab zhugs rnams/ 166 /de dag rnams dang thabs cig rdo rje sems dpa' 'chags pa'i dus kyi bar du mkha' la rnam par bzhugs/ /yang dag 'dzin par byed pas sa

dang chu dang sreg za rlung dang stong pa'i rang bzhin rdul phran 'dzin/ /srub par byed pas tha dad rdul phran mtha' dag gcig tu gyur gyi bar du srub par byed pa ste/ /slar yang de dag rnams ni phan tshun sbyor bar 'gyur te gtso bo'i

dngos la chung ngu'i dngos rnams so/ 167 /dbyibs kyi rlung ni chen po thams cad dag gis sangs rgyas zhing rnams mtha' dag rnam par 'god par byed/ /'jig rten khams ni so so dag la slar yang khor yug ri bo chen po dag ni kun

nas so/ /de yi dbus su las kyi sa ni chen po dag gi rang bzhin 'jig rten khams su rab tu 'gyur/ /lhag ma longs spyod rang bzhin yul gyi bde ba byed pa rin chen kun gyis rab tu gang ba rnams/ 168/ mtha' dag ri

yi bdag po'i shar ni dag pa'i in+t+ra nI la lho ni pad+ma rA ga ste/ /nub ni karke ta na ser po byang ni ri bong 'dzin pa ltar dkar zla ba chu shel lo/ /dbus ni ljang ku de yi snying por de yi nang du chud pa 'dir ni dkyil 'khor chen po

ste/ /dang por thugs kyi rang bzhin de nas dbus ma las ni nyis 'gyur dag kyang gsung gi rang bzhin no/ 169 /de nas gzhan ni nyis 'gyur dag ste mda' la bcu yis bsgyur bar gyur pa'i dpag tshad stong phrag go/ /de yi phyi
rol dus rnams dag gis 'khor lo'i ngo bo de nas 'jig rten khams kyi rang bzhin no/ /'khor lo drug dang rigs drug gis te rig byed 'bum gyis rlung gi dkyil 'khor la gnas dkyil 'khor ro/ /brgyad gnyis ka

ba mi bdag ri bong can gyi cha yis khang pa brtsegs pa zlum po skye gnas gzugs/ 170 /rgyal ba'i bdag po'i gtsug tor nas ni mdzod spu'i dbus su phyed dang bcas pa nyi ma'i sor du 'gyur/ /de nas mgrin pa'i chu

skyes de bzhin snying ka dang ni de nas lte gsang chu skyes de bzhin no/ /zhabs kyi 'og dang rje ngar brla dang dpyi yang ma nu de nyid de nyid rig byed rnams kyis te/ /brang phyed phyed bcas nyi mas rang dpung dpung lag rnams ni mkha' mig

rgyal po nyi ma'i tshad kyis so/ 171 /nyi shu 'ga' zhig lhag pa'i brgya phrag gang zhig dus dang dgu yis mi rnams kyi ni 'jig rten tshad/ /rig byed phyed dang bcas pa'i bzhi dang chu gter chu gter phyed dang bcas pa'i rig byed rig byed

kyis/ /gtsug tor mgo bo 'og tu 'gyur te rgyal ba'i bdag po'i dpal ldan dpral ba dag dang shangs dang ni/ /shangs kyi 'og tu ko sko'i mtha' dang de nas mgrin pa dag ste mgrin pa'i rtsa ba'i chu skyes dbus/

172 /de nas snying ka lte ba gsang bar mi yi bdag po phyed bcas nyi ma rnams kyis rim pas 'gyur/ /gsang ba'i chu skyes lte ba'i rtsa bar rdo rje dag kyang thub pa yis ni steng gi gtsug tor nyid/ /mdzod spu

gsang ba'i chu skyes dbus su khu ba'i thig le mi 'gyur bde ba skyed byed gnas pa gang / /dpal ldan rdo rje'i sa 'di gnyi ga'i rigs kyi dbang gis sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo dag la'o/ 173 /phyed bcas nyi ma

nyi shu rtsa lnga de las nyis 'gyur dag kyang thugs gsung sku yi 'khor lo ste/ /thugs kyi phyed ni sor drug rkang pa dang bcas snying ka la gnas lhan skyes ye shes 'khor lo'o/ /gsum po dag las sgo rnams bya ste nor bu

'i rang bzhin gyis spras dkyil 'khor rnams las brgyad cha 'o/ /'gro dang 'ong bas steng dang 'og tu sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi 'khor lo nyis 'gyur dag tu 'gyur/ 174 /lhun por gnas pa la yang rgyal ba'i bdag po'i sor mo phyed ni dpag

tshad stong phrag dag tu 'gyur/ /de bzhin lha yi ri bo dag ni lus kyi tshad du 'gyur te rgyar ni phyed kyi tshad yin no/ /de yi steng du rdo rje'i rnam pa brtsegs pa cha gsum pa ste de yi yang ni phyed du 'gyur/ /de bzhin 'og tu 'dzin ma chu dang me

dang rlung dang me lce dang bcas rdo rje phreng ba'o/ 175 /phyed bcas nyi mas rgyal ba'i bdag po'i thugs kyi 'khor lor 'gyur te lte ba mgrin pa'i chu skyes dbus/ /gsung gi 'khor lo sku yi 'khor lo rdo rje nor bu'i gnas nas steng du mdzod

spu phyed kyi mtshams/ /sgo khyud mthar ni dpal ldan 'gram par 'gyur te mi bdag dpral ba'i steng du gtsug tor dag gi mtshams/ /phyed bcas nyi ma rnams kyis sa chu me rlung dkyil 'khor me lce dang bcas rdo rje phreng ba'o/ 176 /steng

dang 'og tu sangs rgyas sku 'di mnyam par 'gyur te sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi 'khor lo'o/ /kun nas rlung gis bgrod pa'i dbang gis thad ka'i tshad kyis gsum rnams kyis sam de bzhin drug rnams kyis/ /rtsibs brgyad mtshan ma dang ni

rgyal ba'i bdag po'i rkang pa dang bcas sor mo drug gis 'khor lor 'gyur/ /sgo brgyad rnams kyis bskor zhing rang gi lag mthil sen mo rnams kyis dpal ldan dur khrod brtag par bya/ 177 /steng 'og zhal dang gsang bar gnyis

dang chu gter tshad kyis bcom ldan 'das ma'i dkyil 'khor dag tu 'gyur/ /pad+ma phyed la snying po'i dbus nas gsum rnams kyis kyang de nas phreng ba dang bcas 'khor lo drug /sgo la sogs pa dag dang 'gram par 'khor lo kun nas lnga cha dag

gis nges par rab tu 'gyur/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i sku ni mchod rten gzugs 'di kun nas shes rab ma yin thabs kyang ma yin no/ 178 /lhun po'i phyi rol du ni 'og gi sa gzhi'i gnas la dngos grub brgyad po yang dag gnas pa ste/ /

shar du ral grir 'gyur te ro yi dbang po bdud rtsi'i 'bras bu ri lu mig sman ro tsa na/ /lho ru dpal ldan rkang mgyogs mi zad mtha' dag gter ni dkyil 'khor dag gi me yi zur du'o/ /dbus su mchod phyir thogs pa dag ste lha dang mi yi bla ma'i

tshangs pa'i dbyangs ni de nyid do/ 179 /nor bu gtsug tor dpral ba mgrin pa snying ka'i gnas dang lte ba gsang ba la yang rdo rje ni/ /gcig gnyis chu gter mda' dang klu yi dbang po dgu bcas nyin byed sor rnams dag gis rim pas so/ /

dbus dang steng 'og gsum gyi cha ste zum pa dang ni rnam par gyes pa zhi dang drag po la/ /dril bu dag kyang de bzhin cha gsum steng ni rdo rje dang mtshungs pa lang kha dang pad+ma'i gzugs/ 180 /khyon ni de yi sum cha zhal dang bcas

pa'i lte ba 'dab ma dag kyang de yi sum cha las/ /rwa ni khyon dang mtshungs pa phyogs dang phyogs bral du ste rwa yi zlum po dag ni bzhi cha'o/ /phyi rol rwa yi sum cha 'og ste steng du ba da rI yi tsher ma'i rnam pa sbyor ba'o/ /dril bu'i

zhal rnams de bzhin 'dab ma rdo rje yang ngo ba lang kha la sogs pa de bzhin nyid/ 181 /gsang ba'i chu skyes mdzod spu'i mtha' yi cha yis mchog gi rgyal ba'i bdag po'i mchod rten dpangs kyi tshad/ /de yi phyed kyis gdan gyi rgya

ste sa gzhi shin du mnyam pa de yi sum chas phyogs cha rnams/ /phyed dang gnyis mthar phyir byung chu skyes snying kar son pa'i dkyil 'khor gdan gyi tshad kyis zlum po'o/ /pad+ma'i mtha' las cha dman gzhi dang mnyam pa brang ste

de yi phyogs cha yis kyang mgrin pa'o/ 182/ gdan gyi phyed kyi cha yis gdong ste sa bzhin shin tu mnyam pa de yi sum chas phyogs cha rnams/ /gsang ba'i chu skyes dag las phyed bcas nyi mas dpangs su shin tu mnyam
pa'i gdan gyi tshad 'gyur te/ /gdan nas pad+ma'i mngon mtshams snying kar son pa'i dkyil 'khor mtha' dang de nas mgrin pa'i rtsa ba'o/ /de nas gdong gi mthar ni de bzhin chu gter dus dang phyed

bcas rig byed rnams kyis dum bu gsum/ 183 /gdan las rig byed dag gis pad+ma snying kar son pa'i dkyil 'khor mgrin pa'i tshad kyang de bzhin te/ /phyed bcas brgyad kyis gdong pa'i tshad dang de yi steng du gdugs

kyi phreng bar 'gyur ro mi yi dbang / /mdzod spu'i mtshams nas dpral ba dag dang mgo bo de nas 'dir ni gtsug tor dag gi mthar thug 'di/ /de ltar nges par 'jig rten khams ni mtha' dag rgyal ba'i sku ste 'khor

lo mchod rten rang bzhin no/ 184 /gser ni sa yi khams su 'gyur te dngul ni chu dang zangs ma dag kyang me yi khams yin no/ /lcags ni rlung ste zha nye dkar nag 'di ni stong pa dag dang 'dres pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin no/ /

rin chen ser po sa ru 'gyur zhing dkar po chu dang rin chen dmar po yang ni me yin te/ /nag po rlung ngo sngon po dang ni ljang ku de yang de bzhin 'dres pa'i khams las byung ba'o/ 185 /lan tshwa sa dang mngar ba chu ru rab tu 'gyur

zhing tsha ba me dang kha ba rlung yin te/ /skyur dang bska ba'i ro ni 'dres pa dag go slar yang zhing gi rdo rnams dag gi skye gnas dang / /sman rnams rnam pa drug gi ro dang mchog gi ro ste khams rnams gzhan pa

nor bu'i dbang po rnams/ /sa la sna tshogs reg pa rnams dang mtha' dag nad ni 'phrog pa nyid kyi chu rnams yang dag go/ 186 /sa yis zug gzer 'phrog par byed cing dug kyang chu yi khams kyis 'phrog par byed
de me yis ni/ /'byung po rlung gis rengs pa nam mkha' yis kyang gdug pa'i lta ba rab tu lhung ba 'phrog par byed/ /ye shes kyis ni thams cad 'phrog ste de bzhin mi bdag rnams kyi lus la gnas pa'i nor

bus kyang / /chu dang ro dang nor bu reg pa sngags dang sman rnams dag gi mthu rnams thams cad bsam mi khyab/ 187 /bcom ldan ye shes 'khor lo'i rang bzhin can ni kun nas sangs rgyas zhing du rab tu 'jug 'gyur zhing / /

slar yang thams cad tshogs pa'i sbyor ba dag las 'bras bu'i dbang gis sems can rab tu 'jug par 'gyur/ /rang gi nyin bgrod dbang gis yan lag bcu gnyis de dag rnams kyis zla ba lhun po rdzogs pa 'dir/ /mchod

rten rnam pa steng du brtsegs pa rdo rje'i rang bzhin mi bdag de yi snying po'i dkyil 'khor ro/ 188/ phyi rol du ni rgyu skar 'khor lo rnams te las kyi sa la sa gzhi la gnas mi rnams so/ /longs spyod sa la gling drug bdud rtsi'i 'bras

bu'i ro yi kha zas can gzhan lha la sogs pa rnams/ /rwa la rjes su gnas pa brgyad rnams lha yi bdag po me dang dus dang lha min chu gter rlung / /gnod sbyin dang ni drag po 'og dang steng du 'khor dang bcas pa khyab 'jug

nyid dang chu gter gdong / 189/ 'dir ni chu srin rnam shes dang ni stong pa'i khams te bum pa dag ni 'du byed nyid dang rlung / /nya dang lug dang glang dang 'khrig pa tshor ba me ru rab tu 'gyur te 'du shes chu dang ni/ /gzugs

dang sa dang 'gyur med dag dang lhan cig skyes pa karka Ta la sogs pa'i khyim rnams so/ /'di rnams mtshan ma rdo rje la sogs ka tsa Ta pa ta sa ring po thung ngu lhag pa'i lha/ 190 /lug dang 'khrig pa karka Tar ni zla ba

dkar po nyi ma seng ge bu mo srang rnams su/ /sa skyes sngags pa sgra gcan rnams te gza' lag spen pa gdengs can sdig pa gzhu yi thog mthar ro/ /de ltar sa la sogs pa'i khams ni kun nas phan tshun sbyor bar

'gyur ro mi yi bdag po kye/ /'gro ba 'di ni sems can rnams kyi las kyi rang bzhin du 'gyur rin chen kun gyis rab tu gang / 191 /gang dag sa la dpag bsam shing dang ro dang mchog gi ro dang sman dang ro yi dbang po gzhan/ /

mtha' dag nad 'phrog rdul phran rnams kyis rab tu bskyed pa de rnams sems can rnams kyis mi mthong ste/ /gang zhig phal pa'i rtsa dang shing dang chu dang rdul dang rdo ba dang ni lcags rnams mthong bar 'gyur/ /

yi dags rnams kyis chu ni me chen dmyal bar song ba'i mi rnams dag gis kun nas gcod 'bigs so/ 192 /'di rnams sgrol ba'i slad du sras dang bcas pa rgyal ba'i bdag po las kyi sar ni rab zhugs te/ /mngal ni

rab tu bzung ba mdzad cing mchog gi thugs rje dag gis byang chub bskyed pa mdzad nas ni/ /nyon mongs dang ni bdud rnams bcom nas sa yi steng gi gnas su chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor te/ /sprul pa sgyu ma mdzad nas

slar yang bcom ldan 'das ni dag pa'i sku can de nyid kho na'o/ 193 /de phyir rgyal ba'i dag po'i sku ni skyes shing ma nyams srid pa gsum po la yang gnas pa ste/ /bcom ldan de yis thams cad dus su sems can don ni mi
'dor las kyis bcings pa ma yin no/ /de ltar 'jig rten dbang phyug bdag ni srid pa gsum gyi gnas su las kyi sar gnas nyi ma kye/ /sems can rnams la lam ni sbyin byed dmyal ba'i 'jigs 'phrog lha

gzhan dag ni nam yang ma yin no/ 194 /gang dag chos la mngon 'joms rang lus gzhan gyi lus dang rang gi bud med dag la rjes su chags/ /shi bar gyur na bu yi me yi sbyin sreg dang ni gnyen gyi bsod nams

dag las mtho ris te/ /mchod sbyin la ni phyugs rnams 'tshe dang g.yul du shi bar gyur na mtho ris 'jig rten dag tu 'jug /'jug ngogs lus po lhung las mchog gi go 'phang 'gro ba de rnams thar pa ster ba'i chos ma

yin/ 195 /de nyid lam ni rnam par spangs nas 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa 'phrog pa khyod kyi ma gang pha ni gang / /mchog gi bu dang bu mo spun zla chung ma sring mo rnams dang rje bo gnyen gyi sde ni gang / /bdag

gis byin gyis brlabs pa'i drang srong 'di rnams 'khor lo'i dbus 'dir gang gis thar bar 'gro 'gyur ba/ /de yis nyi ma khyod kyis thub pa rnams ni bdag gi tshig las rigs gcig dag la 'jug par mdzod/ 196/ gal

te lus la dbyug pa bsnun pas sdug bsngal 'gyur na de la dbyug pa dag ni nyes pa can/ /dbyug pa 'di ni ma yin lag pas rab tu bskul te 'dir ni nyes pa mtha' dag lag pa yi/ /'di ni ma yin sems kyis bskul te

sems kyang 'dir ni gdug pa chen po khro ba'i me yis so/ /de phyir khro ba'i me 'di 'gro ba'i dgra bo bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis gsod par 'gyur/ 197 /chags las sdang sogs skyon te rab mchog lha mi

rnams kyi rang 'dod chung ma gzhan dang 'grogs las so/ /de ni rtsa nas dbyung slad mtha' dag rgyal sras rnams kyis de ni 'dod pa'i sbyin la rab tu byin/ /de phyir sbyin la rjes su chags pa bde mnyam 'bras bu ster ba bsod nams

dag gi tshogs 'di ni/ /'jig rten gsum gyi gnyen du gyur cing thams cad dus su skye bo rnams kyi dmyal ba'i 'jigs pa 'phrog 198 /chags pa gang gis sems can rnams ni nyams par gyur pa de yis skyob pa rnams ni grol

ba ste/ /sems can rnams kyis nyin zhag so so'i dus su gang zhig srung byed de ni skyob rnams ster bar byed/ /sems can rnams kyis rang snying la gnas bde ba gang zhig gtong byed de ni rgyal rnams srung bar mdzad/ /

des na rgyal ba mchog gi spyod pa 'di ni lha klu lha min rnams kyis bya ba dka' bar 'gyur/ 199 /sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang nam mkha' yon tan yid dang blo dang ngar 'dzin srog dang ni/ /gzugs la sogs dang mig la sogs
pa yul dang yul can rnams dang las kyi dbang po lnga rnams te/ /phyugs dang bcas pa mi yi lus la khyab byed 'di rnams dag las rigs ni thu bo gzhon nu gang / /mi bdag dang bcas mi yi bla ma rigs dregs

nga rgyal can khyod gang gis rigs ni thu bo yin/ 200 /sreg bya sa dang dri ma med pa chu ru rab tu 'gyur te tut+tha ka ni mi nyid do/ /rlung dang nam mkha' 'dres pa'i khams ni g.yo ba dang bcas ri bong can dang mtshal ni

bdun pa yang / /kA k+Shi kA shi sa dang mu zi mnyam dang mkha' rlung me dang chu ni ldong ros pa bla ste/ /btsag ni sa 'o lan tshwa gang zhig ze tshwa rgya mtsho skyes dang rgyam tshwa nag po thab kyi tshwa/ 201 /'di rnams sa sogs

khams te slar yang 'dir ni nA ba sA ra ya bak+Sha ra sad+dza dang / /tsha la kA tsa las skyes de rnams mkha' dang rlung me chu dang sa rnams dag gi rang bzhin no/ /rdo yi chu ni sa ru 'gyur te ri bong can gyi chu ni chu dang me yi chu ni me/ /

rlung dang stong pa'i rang bzhin dag gi dug gi chu dang gzhan pa gri gug gsum gyi rang bzhin no/ 202 /gla sgang ser po sa yi khams te shak+tu ka dang rwa can nag po chu dang me dang rlung / /nag po brtsegs pa stong pa zhes bya gzhan pa nye

ba'i dug ni rnam pa lnga po rig par bya/ /rdo dang srog gi ngo bo rnam pa sna tshogs 'bras bu dang mtshungs mgo dang dung la sogs pa'i gzugs/ /de dag rnams kyi lcags ni rnam drug lhang tsher skyes dang de bzhin lha dang khab

len rnam pa bzhi/ 203 /ro ni grub dang grub pa ma yin rnam pa gnyis su 'dir 'gyur 'bugs byed dang ni 'bugs byed min/ /grub pa lcags ni 'bugs par byed de slar yang de ni zos pas lus kyang 'bugs par byed

pa'o/ /gang zhig 'bugs byed min pa'i dngul chu ro de bskol ba dang ni bsgyur bar gyur pa dag gis kyang / /lcags ni 'bugs shing rjes su 'bugs te mtha' dag nang 'phrog rus pa'i lcags ni rnam par spangs nas

so/ 204 /dang por du ba'i rang bzhin dag gis 'gro ste me la gnas shing bskol ba de ni rim pa yis/ /sgra dang rab tu 'phar ba yis te de yang 'dar ba dang ni 'dar med nyid du rab tu 'gyur/ /sgra ldan 'phar ldan 'bugs
par byed pa ma yin de yang 'dab ma 'bugs byed 'dar dang bcas pa ste/ /'dar ba med pa mdung gis 'bugs byed rnam gsum 'dir yang sgyur byed rnams kyis bsgyur bar gyur pa'o/ 205 /mchog gi sman gyi

stobs kyis stobs dang ldan par rab tu 'gyur te lcags rnams thams cad bzhu ba'o/ /su zhig de rnams med na sa yi steng gi gnas su 'di yi bcing ba dag ni gang zhig byed/ /bcings na mkha' la spyod pa nyid

du 'gyur zhing de bzhin zos na 'chi ba dag kyang nyams par 'gyur/ /ye shes med na sa bdag rnams kyis ro yi dbang po 'di ni rab tu 'bad pas bsgrub par bya/ 206 /de dag rnams kyi rdzas ni du ma glu dang rol mo'i mngon par sbyor

ba la yang 'god par 'gyur/ /gang zhig chud zos de ni mi bdag ro yi yul la ma bsregs chos kyi bya ba la ma byin/ /gang zhig rdzas ni sdig pa'i slad du zad par byed pa de yis de ni sdig pa dag gis bcings/ /de phyir

byang chub sems dpa' sems can dag gi don gyi slad du ma lus pa ni zad par mdzad/ 207 /gang zhig byugs pas 'phral la zangs kyi 'dab ma'i dri ma 'phrog par byed pa dag ni sman yin te/ /mtha' dag nang 'phrog lcags

rigs 'ju bar byed pa de ni skal ldan rnams kyi sa la mthong bar 'gyur/ /gzhan dag rnams kyis 'di yi bcing bar rab tu 'gyur ba gang de nges par lo dus par dang ni/ /bdug dang dgod pa'i sbyor ba rnams kyis de ni stong phrag gcig

'bugs dag las lhag par mi 'gyur ro/ 208 /sman rnams thams cad shin tu tsha ba'i ro rnams dag dang 'gyur byed sde dang skyur ba'i sde rnams dang / /bslang bar gyur pa'i rtsab mo dag gis rtag tu mnye dang bdug par

yang ni rab tu 'gyur ba ste/ /dngul chu rnams ni dngul du bya ba la yang me tog btab pa rnams kyis sa bon dag pa'o/ /gnyis sbyor tsha la 'ching bu byi ba rta sen dug rnams kyis so snum gyis bran pas 'jam pa

nyid/ 209 /glang po mi yi chu ni lan bdun blugs pa dag gis chu shing tsi tra la sogs thal ba dang / /'gyur byed kun dang tsha ba rnams dang slar yang nye ba'i ro ni sbyangs pa de rnams sbru bar bya/ /yang nas yang du me

yi tsha ba dag gis slar yang lan brgyar sbru bar bya zhing bskam par bya/ /de bzhin dung gi phye ma brgya phrag sbyar bar gyur pa 'di ni mu zi dag gis bsres pa yang / 210 /lcags rnams zhu bar byed pa'i don du bi Da 'di ni dngul chu dag gi

brgyad kyi cha shas 'gyur/ /khyogs kyi bdug pa mtshan mo brgyad de ro yi snying kar gnas pa zhu bar gyur pa ji srid nyid/ /drag por bskol bas dri ma med pa 'di ni mnyes shing bzhus pas stobs dang ldan par rab tu

'gyur/ /lcags gcig zhu bar gyur na nyi ma ri bong can gyi lus kyis lcags rnams thams cad kha sgyur byed/ 211 /khyab byed sgyur ba de yang chen po dang bcas zha nye gsha' tshe spra tshil bcas pas 'jug pa ste/ /

de ltar gang zhig dngul chu'i las ni 'chad par 'gyur ba dag gis nyin zhag so sor byed pa na/ /dus gzhan dag gis 'ching ste gsal bar lci zhing sra ba nyid dang skyon rnams kun las rab tu grol/ /de yi mchog gi lus

la nad dang 'chi ba dang ni dbul ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad 'phrogs par byed/ 212 /khru phyed gser gyi pad+ma nor gyi 'dab ldan dag la lte bar snying po'i dbus su rdo rje ste/ /lha dang gshen rje nor sbyin dag tu dag pa'i

in+t+ra nI la pad+ma rA ga chu shel lo/ /nub tu rin chen karke ta ste me dang lha min 'phrog byed du ni rnon po zangs dang dngul/ /rlung gi 'dab ma dag la gser dang gser gyi lhang tsher dag las skyes pa'i gdan ni lte ba la/ /

213 /snying por de steng gser las skyes pa'i dza~M b+ha la ni phyag gnyis ne'u le dang bcas mchog sbyin pa/ /'dab ma rnams la gser las skyes pa 'am dngul las skyes pa'i lha mo brgyad de chu skyes mchog sbyin

phyag /cod pan sangs rgyas rin chen dbang po nor bu mchog sbyin phyag ste gnod sbyin mo rnams de bzhin nyid/ /ha sogs thung ngu ring po phyogs dang phyogs bral 'dab ma rnams la yi ge brgyad rnams rim pas

so/ 214 /dri dang me tog rnams kyis nyin zhag so so'i dus su thun gsum zla ba'i snod du mchod byas nas/ /dzaM swA hA'i mthar ste dbus su b+ha la dang bcas dza len+d+rA ya zhes pa sngags 'di yis/ /rgyal po rab dga'i yid

kyis gser 'gyur mkhan rnams dag gis srung ba'i don du chu ni rab sbyin bya/ /de ltar bsrung ba'i mthu yis 'byung po'i mgon dang klu yi mgon pos ro ni 'phrog par mi 'gyur ro/ 215 /so phag 'gyur byed skyur ba'i sde rnams

dag gis nyi ma bcu ru ro ni mnye zhing bdug par bya/ /de nas slar yang snyigs ma dag la gnas pa phye nas bsre bar bya ste thams cad dus su'o/ /slar yang gal te snyigs las de ni ma phyed ro ni 'chi ste de yang de la bzhu bar

bya/ /dngul chu rang gi skye gnas za na de ni slar yang gzhan gyi skye gnas thams cad rab tu za/ 216 /zha nye rnon po ra gan zangs dang lhang tsher skyes sam gzhan pa zhing las skyes pa rnam dag pa/ /mnyam pa gcig

tu bsregs pa'o dngul gyi bya ba la ni lhang tsher dkar po las skyes gsha' tshe mnyam/ /dang por drug bcu'i cha shas zas ni 'ju bar 'gyur zhing de nas cha re bskyed pas 'phel bar bya/ /rkang pa'i cha shas ji srid

nyid du rab tu 'gyur te de las lhag par rab tu sbyin mi bya/ 217/ phyogs gcig gis ni nyis 'gyur 'ju bar 'gyur te slar yang 'di ni de bzhin sa bon rnam par dag /de ltar gnyis gsum brgyad 'gyur 'ju bar 'gyur

te slar yang zhu ba 'di ni bi Da mchog rnams kyis/ /ma zhu na ni ro la ji srid mtshan mo brgyad kyi bar du 'khor lo'i dugs su rab tu 'gyur/ /reg pa mchog gi sman rnams dag gis me la gnas pa lhang tsher
lcags ni kha med 'ju bar 'gyur/ 218/ lhang tsher dag las lcags ni brgyad 'gyur stobs su 'gyur te de ni zhu ba na yang brgyad 'gyur ro/ /de yis sa bon la yang brgyad 'gyur yin te slar

yang de las rdo rje rin chen brgyad 'gyur ro/ /de ltar lcags dang rin chen rnams dang nye ba'i ro rnams ji srid khol bar gyur gyi bar/ /me yi nang du bskol bar bya ste de nas de ni 'bum phrag du ma 'bugs par rab

tu 'gyur/ 219/ reg rdo sman dag med na mchog gi bi Da mnye ba dag dang dug rnams kyis kyang 'ju bar 'gyur/ /'dar ba med pa ji srid nyid de de nas sgyur byed gser ni mnyam pa dag tu rab tu 'gyur/ /slar yang gzhan ni

gnyis dang sum 'gyur gser bzhu'i khu ba 'bru mar dngul chu dag la blugs pas so/ /rdzas kyi don du zha nye brgyad cha gser zhun khu ba dag la rab tu 'bad nas blugs par bya/ 220 /gser dngul bya ba dag la gser

rnon sbrul zangs zha nye mtshal dang ldong ros mu zi dag gis dang / /gsha' tshe zla ba de bzhin lhang tsher skyes kyang ba bla dang ni sreg bya dag gis bsad byas nas/ /mnyam pa'i 'gyur byed dug dang lan tshwa nye
ba'i ro rnams dag dang lcags dang mnyam pa'i dngul chu ni/ /mkhris pa skyur po dag gis nyin zhag bcu ru mnyes nas de ni rdo ba'i dbus su blugs byas te/ 221 /sa yi nang du zla ba drug tu steng du
me dang bcas pas thams cad dus su bdugs gyur pa/ /dngul chu de ni bcu drug cha yis dbyangs kyis drangs pa 'bugs par byed par rab tu 'gyur te slar/ /zangs dang zla ba gser mnyam dge
ba'i gser 'di gser 'gyur mkhan rnams dag gi sdug bsngal 'joms pa ste/ /dngul ni brgyad kyi cha shas byin na dag pa'i zangs ni phug pa dngul du yang ni 'gyur ba yin/ 222 /'dzin ma la ni rdo ba gang

dag 'bras bu'i lus dang mtshungs shing dung dang mgo la sogs pa'i gzugs/ /de yi skye gnas de rnams la byin mar dang sbrang rtsi dang bcas drag po'i rlung gis bzhu bar bya/ /de nas slar yang btags pa dang ni tsha la

'gyur byed sde tshan rnams kyis dag par byas nas ni/ /lcags kyi skye gnas de ni shes nas nyis 'gyur dag kyang ro la gser 'gyur mkhan gyis bzhu bar bya/ 223 /nyin zhag bdun du snod ni dag par 'gyur te 'bras

bu gsum po ro mnyam bskol ba'i chu dang ni/ /sman gyis bsad pa'i lcags kyi phye ma mar dang sbrang rtsi dag dang bcas pa dngul chu dang bcas dang / /ba yi 'o ma gsar pa rnying pa sA li zan ni lo ma skyur pos dman zhing lan tshwa

dang / /rnam bral nya dang 'bru mar sogs las grol ba zos pa dag gis phyogs kyi nang du mi rnams kyi'o/ 224/ stong phrag 'bugs pa brgya yis bsgyur ba'i brgya dang bye ba 'bugs pa ji srid par yang shes byas nas/ /

nyin zhag so so'i dus su bza' bar bya ste yungs kar cha las mtha' ma skye tshe cha shas so/ /khang bzangs dang ni sa yi khang pa grang ba rlung dang tshad pa dag dang bral bar rab tu 'gyur/ /'bring po 'di ni zla ba

drug gis lha yi lus po skra dkar gnyer ma dag dang bral bar byed/ 225/ karko TI dang de ba dA lI tsha gsum bri ha ti dang nim pa kI rA ta tig ta/ /bskol ba 'thungs te slar yang ma zhu ba la nyin zhag gsum du bsnyung

bar gnas pa rab tu bya/ /de bzhin zla ba'i chu la sogs pa me dang dug gi chu dang rdo dang b+hal+le ta yi chu/ /ngan pa'i dri dang sa dang rdo ba dug gi sha dang brtag pa gzhan rnams la yang sngags pas so/ 226 /gang zhig zos

na drag tu rgyal ba ster byed dug dang mtshungs pa de rnams mtha' dag sman yin te/ /phye mar byas nas de ni cung zad mar dang sbrang rtsi dang bcas bza' bar bya ste de bzhin nyid/ /gsal bar mi phyugs sems can rnams
kyis gang zhig za bar byed pa de ni grub ster sman ma yin/ /de dag rnams la 'chi ster mchog tu 'jigs byed gang yin de ni rnal 'byor rnams la bdud rtsir 'gyur/ 227 /daN+Dot+pa la sA l-i piR+Na

chu skyes sA ri dag gi rang lus 'dab ma'i khu ba yis/ /ro dang mu zi mnyam pa khab len snod du lcags kyis nyin zhag gsum dag tu yang mnyes byas nas/ /gang zhig zla ba drug tu nyin zhag so so'i dus su Ta~M ka'i rkang pa'i

tshad ni za byed pa/ /de ni mdze la sogs pa'i nad las grol zhing skra dkar gnyer ma dang bral brgyad gnyis lo lon dbyibs/ 228 /pok+kA Na dang bar snang shak+tu kI ra'i mchu yis rab g.yo dngul chu dag kyang gsad par bya/ /

sman gzhan dag gis gsad pa la ni dmar ring lhang tsher skyes dang gser dang khab len mnyam pa dag /gcig tu byas nas srog bcas dri ma rnam bral dngul chu dag la srang drug gis ni gong bu ste/ /sngar brjod khab len snod du chur khu

dag gis bskol bar gyur pa gnyer ma dang ni skra dkar 'phrog 229 /zla ba drug dang gnyis gcig zla ba mi bdag dang bcas nyin zhag bcu dang zhag bdun zhag gsum dang / /zhag dang skad cig gcig gis 'di yi mthu dag las ni lus la

dngos grub tu yang rab tu 'gyur/ /thun mong ba dang 'bring po 'jigs pa dag dang rnam par bral ba mchog ni ye shes grub pa ste/ /mchog sman skyes bu'i rang gis byas pa'i dge dbang las te skye ba gcig gi rjes 'bugs dag

las min/ 230 /gang la 'khri shing ljon pa gzhan gyi dngos dang nyin zhag so so'i dus su dud 'gro rnam par rtsod/ /ral gri dag la pad+ma'i skud pa'i sdong bu mi yi snum gyi mar mes gter ni gsal bar byed/ /der ni nyin zhag

so so'i dus su 'byung po'i bdag po dag gi sngags kyi bzlas pa rab tu bya/ /ji srid brko ba'i mtshan mar gyur gyi bar te de nas sngags pa rnams la rdzas kyi dngos grub bo/ 231 /dang por rgyal ba'i bdag po'i rdo rjes byin gyis

brlabs pa skye gnas drug gi sngags rnams bsgrub par bya/ /gnod sbyin mo rnams bsgrubs nas slar yang sa gzhi la ni zhing du smra ba rnams kyang bsgrub par bya/ /klu mo rnams ni bsgrub pa byas nas bdud rtsi'i 'bras bu'i

ro dang sman de rnams ni bsgrub par bya/ /mkha' 'gro ma rnams bsgrub pa byas nas mchog tu 'jigs par byed pa'i lha min rnams kyang bsgrub par bya/ 232 /klu la sogs rnams bsgrub pa byas nas rab mchog lha dang mi rnams rnal

'byor pa yis bsgrub par bya/ /du ba la sogs bsgrub pa byas nas 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa byed pa'i dbu ma dag ni bsgrub par bya/ /srog la sogs rnams bsgrub pa byas nas ri bong 'dzin pa zhu ba'i thig le rnams ni bsgrub par

bya/ /dam pa'i bde ba bsgrubs nas lhan cig skyes pa rgyal ba'i sku ni kun tu 'gro ba bsgrub par bya/ 233 /sems can rnams la 'chi ster gang de grub pa'i sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs pa mtha' dag bdud rtsi ste/ /'dod

pa'i dngos grub gang zhig bgrod bya min pa de yang srid gsum gnas su bsam gtan bgrod bya'o/ /ye shes gang zhig rnyed dka' dag kyang rdo rje pad+mar bde bas byin brlabs rnyed pa sla ba nyid/ /de lta de ltar rdo rje can

te srog chags rnams la thams cad dus su bde mnyam ster gyur cig 234 /sgra gcan me dang zla ba nyi ma bzhi por brjod de sa chu sreg za rlung dang stong pa gang / /lnga po dag go gza' yi tshogs pa cig shos

dag ni drug po lhun po 'di yi phyogs rnams su/ /gling rnams dag ni bzhi por rab tu 'gyur te yul rnams dag ni lnga por phyi rol dag tu gsungs/ /snying stobs la sogs yon tan rnams ni gsum po gzhan pa 'di'o

lus kyi dbus su de bzhin nyid/ 235 /pad+mar rnam shes dga' ba khrag dang bdud rtsi zhes pa dang por bzhi po dag go de las ni/ /gang zhig rus pa la sogs mtha' dag rnams kyang lnga po de nas mig la sogs pa drug po ste/ /
lag pa rkang pa dag ni bzhi po lag pa rkang pa la gnas sor mo rnams ni lnga po'o/ /de rnams tshigs ni gsum po gang zhig 'dir ni rim pa mtha' dag rigs 'di la ni rig par bya/ 236 /sa 'dzin de nyid rab

dbye rnams dang ro yis bsgyur ba'i ro dang nyi ma nyi shu zhes pa dang / /dbye ba drug bcu mi rnams dag gi mtha' dag lus la gnas pa bug pa drug dang zla ba'i grangs/ /de dag thams cad bsdus pa sum 'gyur dgu ru 'gyur te lnga bcu

rtsa bzhi srog gi rgyu ba dang / /gza' rnams dag gi rgyu ba gang de slar yang cig shos rnams kyis rnal 'byor ma yi rgyu bar brjod/ 237 /ye shes nam mkha' gnyis dang slar yang gzhan pa 'di ni theg pa dag dang dkon mchog

gsum po yang / /nyon mongs bdud dang gnas rnams dang ni slar yang nges par rdzu 'phrul rkang pa zag pa rnams dag dang / /mi 'jigs pa dang bden pa rnams dang slar yang de bzhin dran pa nye bar gzhag pa yang dag par/ /

bsdu ba bzhi yi mtha' rnams rgyal ba'i bdag po'i rdo rje rnams kyis rnal 'byor pa yis bsgom par bya/ 238 /mngon shes lnga dang stobs dang lta ba rnams dang rab mchog rgyal ba'i bdag po dag gi spyan lnga dang / /de bzhin

phung po dbang po dran pa zhes pa drug dang byang chub yan lag bdun dang mchod pa ni/ /bdun te lam gyi yan lag brgyad rnams so sor legs 'jug gzugs can rnam par thar pa brgyad rnams dang / /bug pa zhes bya yan lag

dgu ni gsung rab mchog ste sa rnams dag ni phyogs kyi tshad yin no/ 239 /sangs rgyas rnams kyi phyogs kyi stobs dang gsal bar dbang bcu dang ni yan lag bcu gnyis rten 'brel dag /skye ba dang ni 'gog pa dag

go de bzhin nyis 'gyur dgu ni ma 'dres pa'i sangs rgyas chos/ /rab mchog rgyal ba'i bdag po'i mtshan ni sum bcu rtsa gnyis dag dang dpe byad rnams kyang brgyad bcu ste/ /khyab bdag mchog gi go 'phang 'di dag mtha' dag

sngags pa yis ni lus la bsgom par bya ba yin/ 240 /zla ba'i rang bzhin gcig ste zung dang lag pa mig dang 'khrig pa phyogs dang bgrod pa dag ni gnyis/ /'jig rten dus dang yon tan me ni gsum mo chu gter dus

dang rig byed dag ni bzhi ru brjod/ /mda' dang 'byung ba dbang po rnams ni nges par lnga ru rab tu 'gyur te ro dang dus ni drug /gza' dang ri bo thub pa zhes pa bdun gyi grangs te de bzhin glu dang nor ni brgyad yin no/ /

241 /rtsa dang bug pa gza' dang gter yang dgu ste phyogs ni bcu dang dbang phyug dag ni bcu gcig go/ /nyi ma lus med ma nu srid pa gang dang tshes dang mi bdag bcu gnyis nas ni re re 'phel/ /nyes pa 'di dag bcwa

brgyad yin te rgyal ba mchog ni ma lus de rnams nyi shu rtsa bzhi'o/ /de nyid ces grags nyi shu rtsa lnga yin te gnyis skyes ces pa sum bcu rtsa gnyis nyid du 'gyur/ 242 /rgyud kyi rgyal po thams cad dag tu nges par rdo rje'i tshigs

ni rdo rje can gyis sbas pa ste/ /dang po'i sangs rgyas su ni srog chags rnams kyi thar pa'i slad du ma lus pa yang mngon sum gsungs/ /de phyir 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa dag las mtha' dag ma tshang med pa'i rgyu ni bla

ma ste/ /dpal ldan rgyud ni dang po'i sangs rgyas mtha' dag rgyal ba'i bdag po'i mngon par brjod pa zla ba bzang / 243 /gang la thog mtha' dbus med gnas dang 'chi dang srid pa dang ni sgra dang dri dang ro dag dang / /reg bya gzugs

dang sems med rang bzhin dang ni skyes bu med cing 'ching dang grol dang byed po med/ /sa bon dang ni gsal ba'i dus med mtha' dag srid par sdug bsngal bde ba nyid kyi rang bzhin med/ /mya ngan 'das pa mtshan ma med cing byed

pa rnam bral yon tan med pa de la phyag 'tshal lo/ 244 /dus dang sna tshogs la sogs rdo rje skyes bu dpe zla med cing thams cad du 'gro spros pa med/ /brtsegs pa la gnas rna ba sna dang kha dang mig dang mgo ste
thams cad nas ni phyag dang zhabs/ /'byung ba'i mtha' ste 'byung po'i mgon po srid pa gsum po mchog 'dzin rgyu rnams dag gi rgyur gyur pa/ /rig pa la sogs rnal 'byor dag gi bgrod bya mchog bde'i

go 'phangs dus kyi 'khor lo la phyag 'tshal/ 245 /spro byed nus pa'i ngo bo glog gi me dang mtshungs shing nyi ma bcu gnyis dag gi gzi brjid can/ /ye shes rdo rje'i snang ba mchog gi go 'phangs bgrod byed rnam par bcad pa de

la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dkar po 'jig rten gsum gyi mgon po ri bong 'dzin pa las 'dzag 'jig rten spyi bor yang dag gnas/ /bdud rtsi 'chi ba sel zhing srid pa'i 'jigs pa 'joms par byed pa thig le'i gzugs la phyag 'tshal

lo/ 246 /sems tsam sngags kyi ngo bo lha yis yongs su bskor ba sdug bsngal dang ni bde ba'i rang bzhin te/ /dam pa rnams la zhi ba'i gzugs ni rang gis byas pa'i nyams myong mi bzad rnams la mi bzad pa/ /gang gis las

gang rab byas rang gi sems la cho ga bzhin du de yi 'bras bu de skyed pa/ /'jig rten dbang po sna tshogs gzugs can srid gsum skyed mdzad rdo rje sems dpa' la yang phyag 'tshal lo/ 247/ gcig dang du ma dag kyang gcig cing

mnyam dang mi mnyam mnyam pa g.yas dang g.yon dang mdun dang rgyab/ /steng 'og kun nas dkar ljang sna tshogs kha dog chen po gcig gi gzugs te thung ngu ring po dang / /shin tu ring po yon tan med ces yon tan dang bcas

bud med skyes pa 'ang skyes pa bud med min/ /gang zhig kun gyi rten gcig b+ha ga bzang mo mchog gi b+ha ga khyod la 'dud de khyod la 'dud/ 248 /gang zhig mi yi 'jig rten dag na dpal ldan bla ma rdo rje 'dzin pa sdig bral de bdag
ste/ /de la gnod pa byas pas srog chags rnams ni nges par dmyal bar 'gyur te 'di la ngo mtshar med/ /de mnyes pa yis bdag ni mgu ste de la khro ba'i me yis khros pa zhes pa chen po'o/ /de nyid sems

can rnams la thar pa bde mnyam 'bras ster bu rnams dag gi phyag 'os mchod 'os so/ 249 /sdig can gang yin gang zhig dpal ldan bla ma'i zhabs pad bzang po dag la dus gsum phyag mi byed/ /mi shes gang yin

gang zhig rnam mang me tog rnams kyis dus gsum du ni maN+Dal mi byed pa/ /myur du mnar med 'gro ba gang yin gang zhig bde mnyam ster byed bla ma skyo ba skyed pa po/ /shes rab ye shes thob pa gang yin ma nyams

gang zhig mchog gi bla ma'i zhabs ni mi spong ba/ 250 /nyams pa gang yin gang zhig rtsa gsum dag la gnas pa'i rlung ni mtha' yas dus su bsad pa'o/ /dpa' bo gang yin gang zhig mnyam dang mi mnyam lam la

srog dang thur sel rlung ni gsod byed pa'o/ /sbyin bdag gang yin gang zhig dpal ldan bla mar rang lus bu dang chung ma la sogs tha~Md ster/ /ma rabs gang yin gang zhig slu byed rang gi snying gi sdig pas drangs pa'i

sems dang g.yo sgyu can/ 251 /dpal ldan dpal gyi chos kyi 'khor lo lha yi mchog gis btud pa'i gdan ni kha dog sna tshogs pa/ /de la sangs rgyas lha dang mi yi bla ma nye bar bzhugs pas zla ba'i zhu ba rtogs pa

na/ /sems can don gyi slad du mi yi bdag po rgyud kyi rgyal po dang po'i sangs rgyas gsungs pa gang / /de yang da lta bdag gis de rnams A l-i kA l-i nyung ngu'i rgyud du bkod do nyi ma kye/ 252 /sangs rgyas

kyis ni gsungs pa dag las dus kyi 'khor lo bdag gis phreng 'dzin sdeb sbyor bcings pas brjod/ /pad+ma dkar po rdo rje 'dzin pa khyod kyis 'di ni sngags pa rnams la bstan pa nyid du mdzod/ /ji ltar nyi ma dang bcas thub pa'i

rigs ni shes rab ye shes thob pa 'di las byung gyur pa/ /rnam gsum srid pa la gnas sems can rnams ni dus kyi 'khor lo'i drin las de bzhin 'gyur bar shog 253 /nyi ma khyod dam mi dbang phyi mar gyur pa'i srid par
dus kyi 'khor lo'i rnal 'byor gcig las ni/ /tshangs pa'i rigs 'di las skyes mi yi bdag po grags pa bdag ni 'jam dbyangs bdag gi dga' ma ni/ /dpal ldan sgrol ma pad dkar can ni yon tan

kun ster 'jig rten mgon po chu skyes mtshan ma can/ /ut+pal sdong bu yis ni rang gzhan la gnas srid pa thams cad don ni ji lta bzhin du ltos/ 254 /ut+pal sdong bu yis ni rang gzhan la gnas srid pa thams cad don

ni ji lta bzhin mthong nas/ /thub pa'i dbang po rnams dang lhan cig nyi mas cod pan bcas pa'i mgo dang lag pa dag gis ni/ /rigs ldan zhabs kyi pad+mar phyag dag 'tshal nas smras pa ston pa gcig pu mchog gi thugs

rje yis/ /thub pa'i rigs ni 'jigs rung 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal dag las phyung nas ye shes lam la gzhag par mdzod/ 255 /khyod ni rgan yang gzhon nu mtha' dag rgyal ba'i sras po yin yang thog mar dang po'i sangs rgyas

khyod/ /bud med sbyor zhing tshangs par spyod ldan mchog gi thugs rje dag gis 'jig rten gnyen te gshin rje'i dgra/ /khyod ni zhi yang rdo rje bzang po 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa 'phrog pa khyod ni rtag tu bdud kyi bdud/ /khyod

ni grol yang srid pa 'dir ni 'gro ba smin pa'i don du grags pa khyod ni rab tu 'jug 256 /tshangs pa'i rigs las nyi ma bdag ni thub pa'i rigs kyis btud par gyur pa zhabs kyi rtsa bar lhung / /sems can rnams kyi thar pa'i slad du
dus kyi 'khor lo mtha' dag sa la rab tu gsal bar bya/ /rigs ldan rigs la khyod ni nyi ma sa bdag gis btud dpal ldan grags pa dpal ldan ka lA par/ /khyod kyi zhabs kyi pad+ma dag la 'jigs rung 'khor

bas 'jigs pa dag ni skyabs su lhag par mchi/ 257 /sa ga'i zla ba'i nya la mtshan mo'i dus ni 'das shing nyin par rab tu ma zhugs pa dag la/ /thub pa'i skye bo dang bcas nyi ma sna tshogs gtso bos byin gyis
brlabs pas phyag rgya'i dngos grub thob/ /sems can rnams kyi thar pa'i slad du bdag gi thugs kyi rdo rje mtha' dag sa la gnas pa bzhin/ /dus kyi 'khor lo'i mthu las sems can nyid rnams dag gi rnam

gsum srid pa dag la gnas gyur cig 258 /sems can kun don mdzad pa po yis mchog gi thugs rje dag gis rgyud kyi don ni bstan mdzad nas/ /sras po pad+ma dkar po rab mchog yon tan dag gi gter la gnang ba bstsal

ba nges par ni/ /dang por khyod kyis rgyud kyi rgyal po mtha' dag ma tshang med pa glegs bam dag la gnas pa dang / /de nas rang gi 'dod pas 'grel bshad byas nas gzhan gyi gnas su bgrod par bya'o 'jig rten gnyen/ /

257 /gang dag steng na bdud kyi phyogs gnas lha ma yin rnams mchog tu 'jigs byed byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ /mi yi 'jig rten dag na phyogs dang phyogs bral du gnas khro bo'i rgyal po btsun mor bcas pa
rnams/ /gang dag sa 'og dag na gdengs can dbang po gdon tshogs mi dge thams cad dus su 'ching byed pa/ /de dag thams cad nyin zhag so so'i dus su mi shes 'jig rten kun nas skyong bar byed gyur cig

260 /rgyud ni dpal ldan dus kyi 'khor lo shin tu bsdus pa ma lus rdo rje sems dpa' lhag pa'i lha/ /thabs dang shes rab gcig sbyor rgyal ba'i bdag po'i rdo rje dag gis de nyid rnam pa bcu drug pa/ /sems
can rnams kyi thar pa'i slad du rgyal ba'i bdag pos gsungs shing bdag gis kyang ni bstan pa gang / /bsod nams de yis sems can thams cad 'gyur med mchog gi bde bar gyur cig de la 'dud gyur cig 261 /
dang po'i sangs rgyas stong phrag bcu gnyis pa las phyung ba dpal dus kyi 'khor lo las ye shes kyi le'u ste lnga pa'o// //mchog gi dang po'i sangs rgyas las phyung ba/ rgyud kyi rgyal po dpal dus kyi
'khor lo zhes bya ba rdzogs so// //kha che'i paN+Di ta so ma nA tha dang / bod kyi lo tsa ba 'bro dge slong shes rab grags kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa las/ dus phyis yon tan

phul du byung ba dpag tu med pas sbas pa'i bla ma dam pa chos kyi rgyal po'i bka' lung dang / dpon chen shAkya bzang po'i gsung bzhin du/ mkhas pa chen po zhang ston mdo sde dpal dang / dus kyi 'khor lo'i

tshul khong du chud pa'i dge slong tshul khrims dar gyis don gyi cha la legs par dpyad cing bskul te/ legs par sbyar ba'i skad kyis brda sprod pa'i bstan bcos rig pa'i dge slong shong ston gyis/ dpal sa skya'i
gtsug lag khang chen por yul dbus kyi rgya dpe gnyis la gtugs shing legs par bcos te gtan la phab pa'o/ /gang gis thugs dgongs rnam par dag pa yis/ /'di la bskul zhing 'thun
rkyen bsgrubs pa dang / /bdag gis 'bad las bsod nams gang thob des/ /kun gyis 'di rtogs sangs rgyas sar gnas shog / //
This is a blank page with blank image

@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ shrI kA la tsakra tan+t+rot+ta ra tan+t+ra hr-i da ya nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i rgyud phyi ma rgyud kyi snying po zhes bya ba/ 'jam pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di ltar
chos dbyings dkyil 'khor dri med 'jam dpal gyis ni dge dang mi dge bas/ /sangs rgyas pa dang mu stegs pa dag lha dang dmyal ba nyid ces gang thos pa/ /rgyal mchog pho brang sham b+ha lar grags ka lA

pa ru ngag gi dbang phyug seng ge yi/ /gdan bzhugs rgyal pos rgyud kyi rgyal po slar yang thub pa rnams la gsal bar bstan/ /byung gyur zhes sogs bden te lha mchog bla ma khyab 'jug lha yi dbang po dang / /
zla ba nyi ma sgra gcan me lha sa stengs lha yul nam mkha' bsod nams sdig las byung / /mi rnams pha rol srid par yi dags dmyal ba gang zhig bkag pa sha yi dam tshig can/ /rig byed pa dang thod pa can

gyi rgyud kyi sdig pa'i bya ba de ni brdzun pa ste/ /gang du gcan chen bdun sogs dge dang mi dge'i dbang gis bram ze rnams kyang der skyes la/ /sngar gyi lus po spangs nas lus gzhan sar pa 'dzin par 'gyur/ /thub pa

shed bu'i tshig las srog chags rnams kyi gsod byed za ba'i mthar thug brgyad du 'gyur/ /sha zos pa las bram ze rnams kyang lha las sa stengs 'dir lhung de ni bden pa ste/ /bzang po tshangs pa dbang phyug khyab 'jug

rnams kyi rig byed zhi ches khyab 'jug ches bla ma/ /sha yi kha zas bkag la sha yi dam tshig can la rnal 'byor rgyud/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bcwa lnga sogs par bde gshegs dam tshig can la sangs rgyas
byang chub ni/ /sangs rgyas pa yis kun nas sha mi bza' zhing bdag gi ba yi bsrung mi bya/ /srog chags rnams la srog chags 'du shes bsod pa'i yid kyis nye bar brtsams pas 'dir nyams pa/ /

yan lag lnga yis srog gcod 'gyur gyi nam mkha' tsam ni srog chags rnams kyi byed po min/ /srog gcod lus dang ngag dang yid kyi rgyu rnams gsum gyis 'grub la de la longs spyod cing / /skyed byed bdag nyid sems

kyi rgyal po srog chags rnams ni las longs spyod pas 'jig par 'gyur/ /seng ge sbrul dang ne le stag dang bya rog skye gnas yan lag lnga yis srog gcod 'gyur/ /rgyal po dang ni skye dgu rnams ni byed dam

byed du 'jug dang yi rang gsum gyis 'gyur/ /dge slong snying rje med pas lce la sha yi ro myong ro la rjes su tshol byed cing / /bdag nyid gsod pa la sogs skyon gyis dge slong rnams dang dge tshul yang ni dmyal

bar 'gro/ /dge slong nad pa sman pas sha bstan na yang bya khra rnams kyis gsad pa dang / /pha yi ched du bsad dang mchod sbyin thog dang me dang chu dang ma zhu'i skyon gyis shi ba rnams/ /sbyor ba 'di rnams med par gyur na

gang du de tshe bza' bar gsungs pa rnams/ /dge slong rnams la sha gang de ni stobs bcu ldan pas nad 'joms phyir yin 'chi bslu min/ /sha la sogs pa zos na nges par sa yi 'og tu lus chen rnams su 'gyur/ /

srog chags yi dags la sogs skye gnas dka' thub khyim pa rgyal po nges par rang khyim du/ /gzhan gyi khyim dang chung ma longs spyod dang ni bu mo gnyen 'dun tshogs dang rang khyim rnams/ /shi ba rnams kyi

lus ni gang yin chung ma bu dang bu mo gnyen 'dun tshogs ni gang / /'dir ni rdo la gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg bya nyid ni rnam par blta/ /tho yor ka lA pa dang rang gzhan bral ba rdo yi tho yor phung por 'gyur/ /
sa steng gnas su srog chags rnams kyi rig pa nyams pa'i lus la'ang yod pa nyid/ /srog chags rnams kyi srog rgyu ba ni rang gzhan rnams 'brel legs par sad las shes/ /saM b+ha la yi nyi ma'i shing
rta la sogs phung po khams dang dbang po 'gro ba rnams/ /'gro ba'i gzugs kyi khams la sogs pa phung po thams cad rdul phran rnams kyi rnam 'gyur te/ /longs spyod byed pa rnam par rig pa tsam

ste rang gzhan bral zhing rtog med de rnams kyis/ /longs spyod byed min srog chags rnams kyi snang byed gang gis mun pa bral nas sad par 'gyur/ /zla ba nyi ma sgra gcan me dang mun pa gcig tu snang bar byed pa yang / /

sa sogs dri sogs mig lta stso dang gzhu dang char pa glog dang rlung stso drug pa gnyis/ /de ni lus la phung po drug dang yul dang yul can de yi bya ba drug pa gnyis/ /de rnams longs spyod byed pa srog chags phung po gnyid

log gyur 'dir snang kyis rab bslang ba/ /phyi yi bdag dang nang gi bdag dang gsum pa mchog gi bdag rnams bzhi pa las rab byung / /sprul sku longs sku dang ni de bzhin chos kyi sku rnams bzhi po las ni rab tu byung / /

khong stong min zhing gcig pu mchog gyur 'byung ba las gyur tsam gyi gsum stso thim par 'gyur/ /de bzhi gsum stso gcig pu mchog gyur chos kyi dbyings su nges par thim par 'gyur/ /phung po khams dang dbang
po'i yan lag skye mched mun pa stug po snang ba 'od kyi mdog /rnam par shes pa srog gi de nyid srid gsum 'gro bar rtogs pa'i mtha' yas byang chub chos/ /dri rnams nam mkha'i me tog bzhin du yod min
mkha' tsam rdul phran chos kyi dbyings la gnas/ /gang phyir 'gro ba 'di rnams bdag dang gsum la sogs pa sangs rgyas sku gsum pa/ /yan lag nang nas nyon mongs ma rig par 'gyur slar yang len pa
dang ni srid pa yang / /las ni 'du byed srid pa 'gyur la 'dir ni gsum po zung bcas rgyu chos sdug bsngal ni/ /rnam shes la sogs rnam pa lngar 'gyur de bzhin bcu gcig pa dang bcu gnyis pa yang
yin/ /gsum las zung la zung las dpag tu med pa'i srid par chos bdun 'bras bu'i yan lag rnams/ /shing las me tog me tog las kyang 'bras bzhin gang zhig 'gro ba'i nyon mongs pa las las/ /de las

sdug bsngal sdug bsngal de las nyon mongs mtha' yas 'khor lo ma lus rgyu las byung / /chos rnams 'gag pa med pa nam mkha' tsam las 'byung ba'ang med pa nyid las de yi phyir/ /srog chags srog gi rdul phran

phung por bcas shing 'gro ba gzhan du rtag min mi rtag min/ /sbyin pa la sogs gang zhig dge bcur ldan pa stong zhing byang chub phyogs kyi stong pa nyid/ /gang zhig de dag byed pa por 'gyur rgyal mchog sras bcas

srog chags rnams kyi bdud kyi ris/ /de las phung po rnams las de las slar yang srid gzhan 'pho min phung po'i mtshams sbyor ni/ /mar me kha thon rgya dang dri med chu dang sgra dang nyi ma chu shel sa bon skyur/ /gang du

rgyal ba rnams kyi chos sku dkar po'i chos kyi tshogs las byung ngo zhes bya bden/ /chos las longs spyod rdzogs sku mtshan dang dpe byad ldan pa ma lus sgra yi tshogs rnams te/ /phung po sprul pa'i sku la mchog tu

'gyur med bde ba chos sku min zhing de yi phyir/ /gang zhig sku yi mtshan nyid 'dir ni sangs rgyas pa yi slob dpon klu yis gang gsungs pa/ /gang zhig gcig min du ma min la bdag gzhan la phan phun tshogs

chen po'i rten gyur pa/ /dngos min dngos po med min nam mkha' bzhin du ro mnyam rnam par dpyad dka'i rang bzhin nyid/ /gos med rnam par 'gyur med zhi ba mtshungs pa med pa mnyam zhing khyab pa spros pa med/ /
