dpe med so so rang gis rig bya rgyal ba rnams kyi chos kyi sku la bdag phyag 'tshal/ /gang zhig 'jig rten las 'das bsam mi khyab pa legs spyad 'bras bu bdag nyid phun sum tshogs/ /blo ldan chen por
gyur pa mnyes pa'i rgyur gyur 'khor gyi dbus su sna tshogs gsung mdzad cing / /'jig rten kun la khyab pa rgyun mi 'chad pa rgya che'i dam chos sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs/ /longs spyod rdzogs

sku chos kyi rgyal po chen por gnas pa de la 'dir ni bdag phyag 'tshal/ /gang zhig sems can rnams kyi smin pa'i rgyur gyur la lar me bzhin gsal bar snang ba dang / /slar yang la lar mngon par byang chub chos kyi 'khor
lo rab tu zhi ba gang mthong ba/ /rnam pa du ma 'gro ba'i gzugs kyi thabs kyis 'jug cing srid pa gsum gyi 'jigs pa 'joms/ /phyogs bcu'i rjes su 'jug pa don chen thub pa rnams kyi sprul pa'i
sku la phyag 'tshal lo/ /khams gsum spyod pa las grol mkha' dang mnyam par gyur pa dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin nyid/ /dag cing zhi la rnam dben mchog tu zhi la rang bzhin rnal 'byor nyid kyis
rtogs bya ba/ /rtogs dka' brtag par dka' la zhi ba mi mnyam mnyam par khyab cing mtshan ma med pa nyid/ /mi mnyam pa yi bde ba rnam par mi rtog sku gcig rgyal ba rnams kyi sku la phyag 'tshal
lo/ /sangs rgyas zhing khams mtha' yas rdul phran yon tan las byung ma lus 'jig rten khams rnams su/ /zla ba nyi ma la sogs skye gnas lha yul sa stengs nam mkha' rdo rje btsun mo'i mthar/ /
bud med skye gnas chos kyi dbyings su bde 'gro ngan 'gro dus kun du ni rnam par bzhugs/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas srog chags phung po yul gyi yon tan ldan pa bsod nams sdig pa'i mthus/ /khu ba

khrag dag rig ma'i b+ha ga'i pad mar chud cing srog gi rlung dang rtsol ba'i rlung / /de ni ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin can du 'gyur ba'i skyes bu rig ma yang dag ldan/ /yul gyi yon tan las byung de la longs
spyod pa'i gzugs sku ma yin khams la rab brten pa/ /skyes pa bud med ma ning lha klu khyab 'jug rgyal ba thub pa rang las mthu las byung / /gang gi de nyid de nyid lnga dang rigs gsum go 'phang yang
ni gcig tu gsang ba yi/ /zhal brgya rig 'dzin dbang po sa la sogs dang yul dang yul can bdag po chos kyi dbyings/ /zhal brgya pa de rgyu las gnyis skyes lag pa rkang pa'i yan lag sor mo'i
tshigs rnams la/ /de las tshor ba gsum la sogs pa nub par 'gyur ba sgra bzhin myur du 'gro bar 'gyur/ /gang zhig lnga dang gsum las yul dang yul can dri dang lus la sogs pa 'byung bar
'gyur/ /sa la sogs pa lnga dang zla ba nyi ma mun pa rnams kyis khams rnams rgyas btab de yis de/ /gcig gi du ma'i khams la gnyis skyes lag pa rkang pa'i sor mo'i tshogs rnams gang zhig du/ /

thams cad zla ba'i rgyu las mchog gi rigs brgya rgyas btab skyes pa dang ni bud med dag /rten gyi 'byung ba'i tshogs ni rang bzhin yon tan yang ni 'jig med rdul gyi phung po ste/ /srog gi rgyu ni dbyangs
yig la sogs rang bzhin yang ni 'jig pa med pa'i srog gi khams/ /khu ba'i rten ni zla ba nyi ma yang ni rdul yin las ni srog chags phung po yi/ /de yi thabs kyis sad par byas pas bsod
nams sdig pa'i mthu las 'bras bu sa gzhan du/ /rang gi las kyi phung po lngar longs spyod cing slar yang sogs gzhan du 'ang slar yang sogs par byed/ /de yi dkar po'i bsam gtan bstod pa nges pa

brgya yi las kyi phung po zad pa min/ /gcer bu pa ni las kyi phung po rnam par 'jig 'gyur sreg byed me ni 'ba' zhig gis/ /dkar po'i bsam gtan dgra bcom sngags dang bstod pa nges pa brgya phrag sems dang lus ngag las/ /
pad ma khyab byed snying po ze 'bru'i dbang phyug dgra bcom thig le bzang po sgom par byed/ /de dbus lus po sbas pa rtse mo brgya phrag 'bar ba kun nas gsal bar byed pa can/ /lha rnams gsang
ba'i mdzod gyur mchog gi go 'phang 'di ni brgya byin rgyal po mchod 'os pa/ /yon tan 'di ni sreg blugs za bas ma lus las kyi phung po sreg par 'gyur bar mthong / /gang zhig gnod pa'i bsam gtan la
zhugs gyur pas nyin dang mtshan du de yi sdig 'phel 'gyur/ /gang zhig gnod pa'i bsam gtan las ldog gyur pas nyin dang mtshan du de yi sdig nyams 'gyur/ /gang zhig drag po'i bsam gtan

la zhugs gyur pas nyin dang mtshan du de yi sdig pa 'phel/ /gang zhig drag po bsam gtan las ni ldog par gyur pas nyin dang mtshan du de yi sdig pa nyams/ /gang zhig chos kyi bsam gtan la zhugs gyur pas nyin
dang mtshan du de yi sdig pa nyams/ /gang zhig chos kyi bsam gtan las ldog gyur pas nyin dang mtshan du de yi sdig pa 'phel/ /gang zhig dkar po'i bsam gtan la zhugs gyur pas nyin dang mtshan du de yi
sdig pa nyams/ /gang zhig dkar po'i bsam gtan las ldog gyur pas nyin dang mtshan du de'i sdig pa 'phel/ /gang zhig nyin dang mtshan du 'tshe ba la zhugs gyur pa de rnams sdig pa 'phel bar 'gyur/ /

gang zhig nyin dang mtshan du 'tshe ba ldog par gyur pa de rnams kyi ni bsod nams 'phel/ /de bzhin sha dang chang dang gzhan gyi nor 'phrog pa dang 'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang / /'dod chags zhe sdang gti

mug rnams dang nges par khro ba nga rgyal 'dod pa rnams kyis 'gyur/ /gang zhig sbyin pa la zhugs gyur pas nyin dang mtshan du de yi bsod nams 'phel bar 'gyur/ /gang zhig sbyin pa las ldog gyur pas nyin

dang mtshan du de yi sdig pa 'phel bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin tshul khrims bzod pa nyin dang mtshan du 'gyur la rdo rje'i brtson 'grus de bzhin du/ /shes rab thabs dang smon lam stobs kyi sbyor bar ldan zhing stong nyid ye shes rdo rje

rnams/ /dngos dang dngos med byed po bsgribs dang nam mkha' 'phrog par byed pa dang ni mchog gi bdag /nam mkha' byed na byed po gnas min 'dir ni gang zhig stong nyid stong nyid smra ba rnams kyi tshig /sems can

rnams kyi byed por ma byas bsod nams sdig pa dus rnams kun tu rnam par 'phel/ /rgyal ba stobs bcu ldan pa ye shes can dang lha rnams longs ma spyad par 'jig pa min/ /so sor sdud la sogs pa drug po stobs
bcu'i stobs dang ldan pas stong nyid bsgom par gsungs/ /mtshan mo du ba la sogs sbyor bas slar yang nyin mo nam mkha' mar me la sogs pas/ /so sor sdud pas rnal 'byor pa yis dus gsum dngos po nam

mkha'i dkyil du son par mthong / /bsam gtan gyis kyang de la shin tu sems brtan byas pas phyi rol dngos po rnam par spong / /srog rtsol gyis ni srog gi rlung dag nyi zla'i rgyu ba bral nas mun par rgyu bar byed/ /

dbugs kyi 'byung 'jug bral zhing slar yang 'dzin pa'i yan lag gis ni thig le 'dzin par byed/ /rjes su dran pas rang gi gzugs las zla ba bzhin du nam mkha' 'od mang 'phro bar byed/ /ting nge 'dzin gyis khu
ba rdo rje nas brtsams mgo bo dri med bde bas rab gang 'gyur/ /nam mkhar bltas pas gti mug rnam par 'jig par 'gyur te sna tshogs stong pa nyid mthong bas/ /nang gi bdag nyid bltas pas 'dod chags
'jig par 'gyur te srog gi rlung dag bkag pas so/ /yan lag med par bltas pas zhe sdang 'jig par 'gyur te khu ba dri med bde ba yis/ /sna rtser blta pas nga rgyal 'jig par 'gyur te gzhom du med pa
tshangs pa'i gsung las so/ /srog dang rtsol ba bkag pas sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan dri ma bral ba'i dkyil 'khor yang dag pa/ /gsang ba lte ba snying ga mgrin pa mgo bo rdo rje rnams su rim bzhin

sa zung re/ /khu ba gyen du song zhing khrag kyang 'og tu 'gro la tshangs dbyangs gzhom du med pa las/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje gsum dang dri ma bral ba gang gis ston pa sangs rgyas nyid/ /khyi la sogs pa'i sha yi

mig dang rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis lha la sogs pa'i lha yi spyan/ /rang rgyal nyan thos dag gis gzhan gyi sems rtogs shes pa sangs rgyas spyan te gsum pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dri ma bral

ba rnam dag bzhi pa shes rab spyan du 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi thams cad gzigs pa dri ma gsum dang bral ba lnga pa ye shes spyan/ /rgyu 'thun dga' ba khu ba rdo rje yang ste de 'dzin pas na nges par rdo rje 'dzin/ /

pa yis/ /lus kyi sa bon khu ba 'pho ste 'khor lo lte ba'i 'khor lo'i bde ba gang / /mtshon bya de nyid mtshon bzhin pa yi snying ga sgra bcas bde ba mgon po 'khor ba 'jig /gang gis mgrin par de rig g.yo

med bde ba 'dzin pa de ni tshor byed rin chen 'dzin/ /gang gis mgo bor zla ba 'dzin pa 'di ni khu ba dri bral bde ba shes rab 'dzin/ /gtsug tor tshangs pa'i bu gar 'gyur med mchog gi bde ba dga' ba bcu drug rab gang

ba/ /gang gis shes rab rang bzhin med pa mchog gi zla ba cha shas bcu drug rdzogs pa'i mtha'/ /de ni dpag med gang gi rig pa mgo bor rdo rje dang bcas drug pa rdo rje sems/ /snang ba ye shes khams su 'gyur

te gang zhig spyi bor 'gyur med rdo rje skyes bu la/ /dri bral sa yi thig le mgo bo'i skyes bu de ni chu dang nyi ma 'grib pa yang / /sgra gcan me dang rnam smin snying ga sgra bcas bde ba rlung dang lte ba mjug rings te/ /

gsang ba'i 'khor lor mun can bcom pa'i bde ba stong pa can ni stong pa can ni stong pa mun pa'i khams/ /gang zhig mig la sogs pa yul can drug po lha mo rnams las sa snying la sogs gang / /gzugs kyi phung po la
sogs gang zhig yul drug rnams kyang lha ru rtags pa de rnams kyis/ /dag pa'i dbang po la sogs yul can drug po gang zhig gnod mdzes rgyal po sogs/ /de rnams khu ba mi 'pho la sogs yul drug

rnams kyang sngon po la sogs de rnams so/ /gang zhig khro bo gshen rje gshed ni zla ba dang bcas srogs rlung rab tu bcom gyur pa/ /nyi ma dang bcas srog rlung rab tu bcom 'gyur gang zhig khro bo pad+ma mthar byed do/ /

sgra gcan dang bcas srog rlung rab tu bcom pas gang zhig khro bo bgegs mthar byed pa ste/ /mjug rings dang bcas srog rlung nges par bcom pa gang zhig khro bo shes rab mthar byed do/ /srog rlung 'gags pas phyag gnyis

dgyes rdor zhi ba 'dir ni nga rgyal 'jom pa rdo rje sems/ /srog rlung bkag pas phyag bzhi pa yi dgyes rdor byin za zhe sdang 'joms pa byang chub sems/ /dgyes pa'i rdo rje 'dod chags 'joms pa zhal gsum phyag drug dbang
phyug sems dpa' chen por 'gyur/ /zhal brgyad pa la zhabs bzhi gti mug 'joms pa tshangs pa bde ba dang bcas dam tshig sems/ /lte bar srog rlung bkag pas dri ma gsum bral rdo rje sems dpa'

de ni sangs rgyas nyid/ /snying gar bkag pa dri ma gsum bral byang chub sems dpa' rang rgyal de ni sangs rgyas nyid/ /mgrin par nyi ma de bzhin dri ma gsum bral sems dpa' chen po nyan thos nyid du 'gyur/ /
dpral bar rlung gi dbang po 'gags pas bde ba dang bcas dam tshig sems dpa' ston pa'i sras/ /lte ba'i 'khor lor mi 'gyur mchog gi bde ba gang zhig khro bo'i dbang po'i rtsa bzhi dang / /sum bcu rtsa
gnyis dang ldan ro la ro yis bsgyur ba gang zhig bde mchog 'khor lo gsum/ /lag pa rkang pa'i rus pa'i dum bu brgyad dang lag mthil sor tshigs dum bu rnams/ /'khor lo drug gi rtsa rnams 'dir ni nyis

'gyur bde mchog chen po'i rnal 'byor ma rnams la/ /gtsug tor rtsa bzhi rnams su 'pho ba rnam par bral dang de bzhin chos kyi 'khor lo brgyad/ /mgrin pa sum bcu rtsa gnyis rnams su 'gyur te drug bcu rtsa bzhi lte ba'i

'khor lo ru/ /gang zhig zla ba'i cha yis gang ba mgo bo dkar po de 'dir gsang bar dkar po'i cha/ /'khor lo'i rtsa rnams yang ni mchog tu mi 'gyur bde ba dus kyi 'khor lo lhag pa'i lha/ /dus ni drug bcus lhag dang

bcas pa'i brgya phrag gsum ste tshigs mtshams rnams kyang rdo rje'i sku/ /rgyu skar rnams kyi dbyu gu nam mkha' lag pa rgyal po de yang dang po'i sangs rgyas gsungs/ /zla ba'i cha shas sum bcu nam mkha' nam mkha'

gdengs can zla ba'i rtsa ni zla bzang ngo / /rtsa dang ba spu gang zhig ma lus lus la gnas pa rdo rje myu gu'i ming can te/ /rdo rje chu dang bshang ba khrag rnams lus kyi stong pa nyid kyis lce yis ldag par 'gyur/ /byams pa'i tshems kyis

gdong dang lag pa rkang pa'i sha rnams zos pas des na drag po la/ /mngon shes lnga yi zhal chen yul gyi phyugs kyi tshogs rnams zos pas des na seng ge ste/ /bsod nams ye shes tshul khrims dam pa dri ma gsum bral dus
kyi 'khor lo spyan gsum pa/ /dpal ldan 'dus par sku rnams gang zhig yul dang yul can srog chags las kyi mthu las byung / /der ni 'ga' zhig khams rnams de dag lha ru rtag tu bdud kyi ris la gsal bar

mdzad/ /rtsa dang sha dang rus pa khu ba khrag rnams rdul phran 'dus pas lha rnams kyi ni gnas/ /srog chags so so sangs rgyas lha yul bar snang sa steng rang rang gnas su gtso bor gnas/ /mdor byas brdzun gyi rim

pas 'gyur la yul dang yul can sgrub byed rdo rje'i bzlas pa yin/ /rang byin brlabs pas srog rlung ri bong can du bzhi pa 'dir ni mngon par byang chub 'dod/ /'dir ni lnga pa zung 'jug rim pa mchog tu gyur pa dpal ldan gsang

ba 'dus par yang / /bdud rnams yang dag gzung phyir srid pa gsum gyi bla mas lha yi bskyed pa'i rim pa gsungs/ /gang zhig byang chub sems dpa' dge ba bcu yi lam dang sbyin dang tshul khrims sogs las skyes/ /

skyes pa skye bar 'dod par 'gyur gyi yid tsam min la brtags par dang ni bdag kyang ngo / /bdud kyi tshig 'di dag ni rang gi yid la byed cing de 'dra'i khyab pa'i rang bzhin gyi/ /bsam gtan rje bo 'ga' yang yod min lha yul sa stengs

bsod nams tshul khrims rnam par dman/ /stobs bcu mchog dang ldan pas rdzogs pa'i lha dag chos kyi dbyings la yang dag gnas pa ste/ /bsten par bya yi lcags kyu rdo rje mda' gzhu dril bu ral gri zhags pas
bsgrub pa yin/ /bkug cing 'dir ni bzhugs dang mchog tu 'jigs par gyur pa brdungs zhing lag pa bcing ba yi/ /bsam gtan 'dis ni dge ba rnam par bral nas bdud rnams shi nas dag 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur/ /

sangs rgyas pa yi lha rnams dri ma gsum dang bral zhing sems can kun gyi don mdzad pa/ /de ni shin tu dri zhim me tog dri dang spos dang mar me dang ni lha bshos dang / /gsang sngags bzlas dang bstod pa nges pa brgya yis

bsten bya sgrub pa po la rab dgyes nas/ /sa 'og 'jig rten lha yul sa steng bar snang rnams su grub pa'i rig pa 'dzin pa ster/ /zla ba nyi ma'i rtsa dag bkag cing nyin mtshan dus su srog gi gsang sngags gang zhig ni/ /

zla ba gcig la namakha' 'kha' dang stong pa brang 'gro dus ro mun pa dbyer med bzlas/ /steng dang 'og gnyis 'dzin pas lam gsum bral bas srog rlung gang bas rlung dag khyer bzhin pas/ /grub par 'gyur te ri bong
'dzin pa lta bu nam mkha' 'gro bas rig pa 'dzin pa ste/ /bsod nams don du byang chub sems dpa' thugs rjes rgyal srid chung ma bdag gi sha yang gtong / /ye shes don du dus gsum dngos po stong pa'i

gzugs brnyan mi g.yo dri bral klog byed cing / /tshul khrims don du khu ba rdo rje mgo bor khyer la mgo nas tshangs pa'i bu ga ru/ /bsod nams ye shes tshul khrims yang dag dri ma rnam par bral nas rdo rje sems dpar 'gyur/ /

shin tu skyon can skye bo gang zhig rgyal srid sems kyis ster ba len pas longs mi spyod/ /yon tan ma lus ldan pa'i chung ma sems kyis byin yang gang zhig len pas longs spyod min/ /sha dag sems kyis byin yang gang zhig

sha yi dam tshig can gyis len pas longs spyod min/ /de yis byang chub sems dpa' gal te stobs bcu ldan pa de tshe dman rigs cis mi 'gyur/ /byams pas dka' thub mchog ni tho rangs dus su chang 'tshong khyim du

'gro/ /nyin phyed dus su mchog gi thugs rjes nya yi don du nya pa rnams kyi tshong 'dus su/ /rgongs kyi dus su bud med la 'jug phyir du dga' bas bran mo rnams kyi khyim du 'gro/ /chang nya bud med rnams kyis dri ma

gsum bral a ba d+hU ti dmangs rigs cis ma yin/ /gang dag dngos po du mar gyur pa ser skya ba ni gcig pa nyid dam 'cha' la/ /gang gi bsgrub bya med pa nyid la brtan g.yo'i 'gro ba yod pa nyid du dam 'cha' ba/ /

gang tshe gtan tshigs bsgrub bya dang mtshungs gyur pa de tshe sgrub pa po yis bsgrub bya min/ /gal te bsgrub bya gzhan la gtan tshigs kyang gzhan gyur pa de tshe de yi dam bcas nyams/ /sgra rnams rtag par dam bcas

nam mkha' lta bur byas pa'i lus med par grub de bzhin du/ /sgra rnams mi rtag dam bcas bum pa lta bur byas te shin tu rtsol bas byung ba'i phyir/ /nam mkha'i las ni rtag par grub kyang khyod kyi kha las sgra rnams

mi rtag nges par grub/ /gzugs dang reg bya dri dang ro yi yul rnams bzhin du lnga pa sgra yang cis ma yin/ /de ni gang gis thog mar rtogs pas sa steng bar snang khams su sgra des slar yang ni/ /rna bas sgra rnams

rab tu rtogs par 'gyur ba de ni sgra rnams rtag pa nyid yin lo/ /gang gis thog mar don rtogs gyur pas sa steng bar snang khams su slar yang de tshul gyis/ /rna bas don rnams nges par rtogs par gyur pas
de ci gzugs rnams rtag pa nyid yin nam/ /rtag pa gsal bya gcig tu yon tan ma lus rang bzhin sgra zhig rna ba'i bug par gnas/ /mgrin pa nas brjod gsal byed sgra yi tshogs rnams slar yang rtag par
gyur pa ma yin la/ /gang zhig brjod pa gcig gis nyan byed rna ba'i bug par sgra yi ku cor 'gyur min nam/ /rtag par mngon par gsal bya de ltar 'gyur gyi gzhan la ltos pas nus pa'ang min/ /

dngos po'i byed po'i rgyu ni slar yang mun pa gsal bar byed pa gzhan na gnas pas ni/ /rtag par mngon par gsal bar byas pa gang zhig rgyu yis bskyed pa 'dir ni byis pa ste/ /byas pa dang ni gzhan pa gang dag
chos mi mthun pas grub pas 'gyur ba nyid ma yin/ /chos mi mthun pa de phyir byas pa rnams ni yod par 'gyur la gcig shos de med do/ /gang zhig mngon par gsal bya'i rgyur gyur mngon par gsal byed de ni
ci yis rgyu ma yin/ /mun par thim par gyur pa gang dag de yis mngon par gsal byas de yis 'bras bu cis ma yin/ /sgra dang don dag gal te gcig par gyur na de tshe don nyams pa ni sgra nyams 'gyur/ /

spyi dang gsal ba de bzhin 'gyur te nam mkha' tsam dang gzhan pa nyid dang gcig pa nyid/ /stong pa sgra dang ldan par gyur na de tshe 'jig rten gsum po sgra med 'gyur/ /gang gis nam mkha' yod pa nyid na brtan

dang g.yo ba'i 'gro ba des na med pa nyid/ /gal te nam mkha' dang ni 'byung ba'i tshogs kyi rgyu dag chos mi mthun las grub 'gyur na/ /de yi rgyu las sgra dang sgra min dman par nges par sgrub pa po la nges

par 'gyur/ /nam mkha' sa stengs dag tu gza' dang rgyu skar dag dang byol song dang ni mi rnams dang / /lha dang srin po rnams dang rang gi rigs kyi dam tshig can gyi yi dags lha min klu/ /sngags kyi yi ge rnams

kyi rang bzhin yon tan dbang las dbyibs dang kha dog rang bzhin gyi/ /don gcig du ma'i sgra yis kha cig tu yang don rnams mang po de ni sgra gcig gis/ /dngos med stong pa'i rgyu las brtan dang g.yo ba'i dngos po rgyu las grub pas

na/ /dpe ni nam mkha'i me tog dang ni sa dang shing dang me tog de der rang rang grub/ /mo sham bu mo nam mkha' tsam las skyes pa nam mkhar 'gyur la bu ldan las skyes pa/ /bu ni 'gro ba ma lus par 'gyur shin tu phra ba'i rdul phran phung po'i

sa bon las/ /sa dang chu dang me rnams lha yi de nyid khyad par rnams ni phyi dang tha dad min/ /gal te lhan gcig rab tu 'jig par gyur na de tshe tha dad gzugs dang lhan cig tu/ /sa dang chu dang me rnams lha yi de nyid gcig pa nyid du rab tu 'jig pa

min/ /srog chags so so'i lus ni 'jig pa rnam par bral ba'i 'byung po'i tshogs kyi lha rnams te/ /sa dang chu dang byin za rlung dang nam mkha' sbyor bas gang zhig rnam lnga'i bdag nyid lus/ /lus can rnams la yon tan bral ba'i lha rnams

rnam lnga der ni mthong min yod ces grags/ /srog chags rnams ni sngon gyi lus po spangs nas slar yang lus gzhan bsam pa 'dzin par 'gyur/ /gang zhig sa la sogs pa'i lha rnams de yi sngon gyi lus po zhig pas rab 'jig 'gyur/ /

srog chags gzugs gzhan glog gi phreng ba chen po bzhin du rab tu rgya chen gzugs can te/ /sprin bor nas ni bar snang dag la phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rnams su mgyogs pa'i shugs kyis 'gro/ /srog chags srog dang lhan

cig bems po'i lus dang bral ba tshor ba la sogs rab ldan pa/ /srid pa sum bcu rtsa gcig rnamasu dge dang mi dge'i dbang gis gcig pu kho na 'gro/ /gcig min rnam pa lnga po yul dang bral ba nang gi bdag dang mchog gi bdag nyid

ni/ /nam mkha' las 'das mi gsal min zhing mi gsal 'bras bu med min nus pa dman pa min/ /sems las 'dod pas rang bzhin skyes bu 'byung ba min zhing srog rlung med na sems med la/ /srog chags sems dang lhan cig bde

'gro ngan 'gro dag tu las kyi 'brel bas 'jug /phan tshun ltos phyir rig pa dang ni bems po dag dang rgyu dang 'bras bu nyid dag dang / /phan tshun ltos phyir gang tshe 'byung ba'i tshogs rnams yongasu gyur par rab tu 'byung ba nas/ /ther zug

pa yang 'gyur ba nyid pas de tshe 'byung ba'i tshogs rnams 'gyur bar nges pa yin/ /thams cad 'gyur med rtag pa'i rang bzhin 'gyur yang gang zhig rtag pa nyid ni 'gyur ba med/ /ther zug pa dang ther zug dman pa'i skyes bu khyab bdag

gis ni srid sgrub la bshad de/ /phan tshun ltos phyir rigs pa dang ni rigs dag kyang ni rgyu dang 'bras bu nyid du 'gyur/ /phan tshun ltos phyir byas pa min dang byas pa dag kyang rgyu dang 'bras bu nyid du 'gyur/ /phan tshun ltos phyir byas pa dag dang

byas pa yang ni rgyu dang 'bras bu nyid du 'gyur/ /thams cad rnam par rig pa tsam ste sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang nam mkha'i khams/ /gzugs dang reg bya dri dang sgra dang bcas pa'i bde ba rdul phran phung por gyur pa min/ /rnam par shes

las 'bras bu'i dngos po rang 'byung ba las min zhing med dang 'dren mas min/ /sa bon las ni myu gu la sogs bzhin du 'gyur gyi rang las min zhing rgyu med min/ /rkang dang rus pa chu ba sha dang khu khrag tshil bu lpags pa rdul phran phung po

min/ /rnam par rig pa tsam zhig spangs nas slar yang srid pa gzhan du rnam rig tsam zhig 'gro/ /der ni lus len slar yang srid pa gzhan du rnam rig tsam po de nyid de/ /'dod chags gnyid log gyur na rang gzhan bral ba rnam rig tsam po

rnam par nyams/ /gal te 'gro ba rnam rig tsam du gyur na 'dir ni don gzhan rnam par rig tsam du/ /de 'gyur gal te 'gro ba rnam rig tsam na de tshe gnyis med min te de gnyis phyir/ /gang zhig 'di yi ma rig glo bur

ba ste lhan skyes gyur pa de ni rnam rig min/ /sngon du rnam rig rnam par dag par lhan skyes bems po yang ni rig par rnam dag 'gyur/ /bems po ma lus rnam par rig pa tsam du 'gro bas sad pa'i tshe na rab tu rtogs pas grub/ /de yi

rnam rig mi snang bar 'gyur yang na rang gnas tshangs pa dbang phyug la sogs 'gyur/ /bye brag grub na ser skya'i 'dod par 'gyur te sa bon nang na myu gu sogs/ /gcig phyir 'bras bu yod par smra bar 'gyur te rgya la rtag pa cung zad yod ma

yin/ /thog mar phra rab rdul gyi phung po 'gro ba'i cha med gang gi rdul phran nam mkha' la/ /phra rab rdul rnams 'dus pa'i 'gro ba las kyang 'gro ba srid pa rdul phran phung po min/ /rdul phran bral te nam mkhar gnas pa las gzhan 'gro ba rnams kyi rnam

par 'jig pa min/ /gal te lus po rdul phran phung por gyur pa de tshe su yi lus po 'jig par 'gyur/ /'byung ba brtags pa med las gzhan du rdul phran bral min gang gi rdul phran de rdul kyang / /sdud dang skyed pa bral bas nam mkha'i dkyil la

gnas te rlung dang ldan dang mi ldan pas/ /phra rab rdul rnams cha shas drug la slar yang cha shas drug ste slar yang gang gi cha shas drug /de yi cha shas phra rab cha yis nam mkha'i khams 'di gang bar cis mi 'grub/ /dngul chu nor bu'i rdul

phran cha bcas cha med tshad med dag gis bsgrub byar gyur pa min/ /cha dang bcas na zangs ma 'bigs min rdo yang min la rdul phran phung po cha med min/ /dngul chus zangs ma reg cing gnyis skyes nor bus rdo ba lha yi rin po cher

'gyur la/ /rnam par shes pa rnam rtog drug gis nye bar nyams pa rdul phran phung po'i rnam 'gyur min/ /phyi rol sngon po'i gzugs ni gang zhig rdul phran phung por de yi tshad mas grub pa yin/ /rnam par shes pa'i bag chags

dag las nam mkha'i dkyil du rmi lam dang mtshungs mthong zhes grags/ /gang phyir dmus long mig med yid kyis de ni mig dang ldan zhing ma yin de phyir min/ /mig gi rnam shes khams las mig dang bcas pas phyi rol gzugs las yin

gyi bag chags min/ /gang zhig sgra rnams ma lus rna bar thos pa de yang 'on pa rnams kyis thos ma yin/ /sna nad bcas pas gang zhig dri yi rdul phran 'dus pa min zhing nad med pas de 'dzin/ /lce yi nad can ro mi myong la de nyid

la yang nad med lce yis myong bar byed/ /rnam par shes pa skye mched bcu gnyis rnam par bral ba tshad mas bsgrub par bya ba min/ /rdul phran 'dus pa'i 'gro bas kyang ni 'gro ba mthong nas mi shes pa yis tshad ma yi/ /drag po dang ni tshangs pa'ang seng

ges kyang ni shes pa rnam par rig pa tsam du byas/ /rdul phran rnams kyi bral ba mthong nas thim par 'gyur ram bsdus sam yang na 'gag par 'gyur/ /skye ba med cing 'gag pa med la mang po 'dus sam 'dus pa min par rab tu byung / /

'di ni thub pas nam mkha'i tshad ma byas la rgyal ba rnams kyi stong pa nyid kyi yang / /rang rgyal rnams dang nyan thos lha dang lha min klu dang bdag lta bur yi rgyal sras rnams/ /gza' dang rgyu skar rnams dang nam mkha' sa steng dag tu skyes pa bud

med drang srong rnams/ /khro bo rnams dang srin po sha yi dam tshig can gyi stag gzig byol song dmyal ba rnams/ /gang zhig rnam par mi rtog dang ldan rang gzhan bral ba stong nyid dus gsum ngo bo nyid/ /rnam pa thams cad rdul phran

gyis stong nam mkha'i dkyil ltar son pa'i rmi lam sgyu ma bzhin/ /gang zhig thams cad mkhyen pa gzigs pa dri ma gsum bral rnam par mi rtog de ma yin/ /gang gis de rtogs sems la dri med dri mar ldan pa mkhyen pa nyid ni sangs

rgyas te/ /gang zhig sbyin pa la sogs lam dang dge bcu lam dang byang chub phyogs sogs chos rnams dang / /byams pa la sogs gnas dang rang bzhin bral ba stong pa la sogs rnam par thar pa dang / /tshul khrims la
sogs gang zhig yul dang bral ba'i rnam pa kun du mi rtog pa/ /de rnams byed po gang zhig stobs bcu'i stobs ldan nyan thos rnams dang byang chub sems dpa' min/ /gang zhig gzugs sogs khams

drug de ni yul drug kyang ste rdul phran phung po'i rnam 'gyur ro/ /phyi rol sngon po'i gzugs la sogs pa'i yul can rang lus sa dang dri la sogs pa drug /stong pa snang dang mun pa sa gsum gnas su rnam pa
kun nas rnam par mi rtog pa/ /snang bas rab tu sad pa rab rib rnam par bral ba 'gro drug gnas pa'i srog chags yin/ /'phags pa'i yul gyi rgyal po bde gshegs dam tshig can la sangs rgyas

lam ston mdzad pa po/ /klu sgrub rdo rje can kyang srid pa gsum gyi bla mas chos kyi dbyings su lung bstan cing / /nyams pa rnams kyi gos sngon can la sha yi dam tshig can gyi ston pa byang chub rdo rje ste/ /ye

shes mtha' can nag po'i ming can gzhan yang ma d+hu ma ti srin po'i dbang po 'byung / /ye shes ming can rdo rje dril bu lag gdub dag kyang de bzhin thod par chang 'thung zhing / /kha T+wAM ga dang rus pa'i rgyan cha chang snod

cang te'u ster ba nag po'i ming can no/ /slob ma rnams la gos sngon dang ni kun tu rgyug pa ster ba na bza' sngon po can/ /sha yi dam tshig can gyi thod pa can la rdo rje'i phyag rgya ster ba byang chub rdo rje'o/ /gos
sngon can ni rta mchog bdag po dpal ldan ha la sogs pa'i ming can gyis bsnun 'gyur/ /ye shes rdo rje'i skyon gyis slob dpon rab tu 'khrugs pas mig gnyis sa la ltung bar 'gyur/ /rab tu khros

pa'i kha can thod pa can gyi pho nya gzhon nus nag po'i khrag 'thung byed/ /sha yi dam tshig can gyi spyod pa 'gal ba de dag sangs rgyas pa rnams spong mi 'gyur/ /mchog gi thugs rje can gyi 'jigs byed kyis

bstan thod pa can gyis rgyal po las 'doms pa/ /gang gi ming gis rnam rtog yid kyis thugs rje min zhing sems can phung po byams pa min/ /de rnams bzang po'i thabs ni sna tshogs sha yi kha zas gzhan gyi
nor 'phrog 'dod pa ni/ /log par g.yem pa dge ba rnam par bral bas skye ba 'di nyid la ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /skyes bus mtho ris gnyis skyes 'jigs byed la sogs phyugs kyi sha yi mchod pa'i mchod

sbyin gyis/ /de thos sangs rgyas lam ni seng ge 'phrog byed kyis bshad tshangs pa'i chos ni rnam par spangs/ /khro bo'i dbang po srin po'i dbang po gnyis skyes phyugs kyi sha yis rgyal pos mchod par 'gyur/ /

gang yang rung ba blo gros dman pa dge ba rnam bral de ni bdud kyis slus par 'gyur/ /khro bo dbang po srin po'i dbang po'i sha yi dam tshig can gyi rgyal pos mchod par 'gyur/ /mtho ris dbang phyug 'dod
phyir gnyis skyes phyugs kyi sha dang khrag gis bsgos pa'i mgo bo yis/ /nges par mnar med dmyal ba rtag tu'ang sdug bsngal dmyal ba pa la ster bar 'gro bar 'gyur/ /gang las bskal pa'i rgyal po
stong phrag sum bcu rtsa drug rnams kyis nges par 'thon par 'gyur/ /bdud kyis sha yi dam tshig can gyi yi dags mkha' 'gro rnams la sgyu ma byed 'gyur zhing / /sems can bslu phyir kha cig tu ni 'jigs

pa min par bdag nyid gzugs ni ston par byed/ /lha rnams sha yi dam tshig can gyi lha ma yin rnams zad par bya phyir sgyu ma byed/ /sems can rnams ni bskyang phyir kha gcig tu yang bdag gzugs 'jigs sar mi byed ston par

byed/ /long ba brlag phyir 'jig pa'i dus kyi me lha'i 'jigs byed dus ni me lha rab tu byung / /bde byed kyis bsad lha ma yin te khrag kyang srin po rnams kyis mthungs par 'gyur/ /nya dang rus sbal phag rgod mi yi seng ge
lha ma yin rnams brlag phyir khyab 'jug skyes/ /nya dang de bzhin ri dgas la sogs 'o ma nags tshal dgon pa khyab 'jug gis mi bza'/ /sa gsum bla mas yi dags mkha' 'gro
rnams ni smin phyir he ru ka yi gzugs su byas/ /mtshan mo rgyu ba'i bdag pos rA ma na yi chung ma dbrog phyir gnas 'jog gzugs su byas/ /'jigs sde med pas skyab seng bu rnams sha yi dam

tshig can gyis bram ze'i gzugs kyis bcings/ /kir mi ri yis sha yi ched du sum bcu'i stobs can srin po'i rigs kyi chos byed cing / /lha dang klu yi dbang po dam tshig 'dir ni rgyal po chen po rig par byos/ /

lha bshos 'bras chan khu ba zho dang 'o ma mar dang bcas pa 'o thug sha kar rnams/ /khro bo rnams dang srin po rnams la phyugs kyi sha yi gtor ma 'bras chen khrag dang chang / /sangs rgyas rnams la snying po lnga dang bu ram zhor bcas

'bras chen lhung bzed dka' thub la/ /khrus bcas sbrang rtsi mar sar za zhing tsan dan me tog dag gis mgon por bcas pa mchod/ /gang gis chang sogs mchod pa de dang de yis lha dang 'jigs byed dam ni he ru ka

la min/ /srin po'i dbang po mtshan mo rgyu ba'i dam tshig dpal ldan rgyal po zla ba seng ges spyad/ /mdung can ma dang dri ba ti dang 'di dag rigs skyes bud med min te khro mo lnga lnga yang / /gzhan yang thod pa can gyi chang snod

nang gi chu yis gtsang sbra an tra la sogs yul/ /sin d+hu'i yul na pa glang sha za kha ba can ri gnyis skyes rgyal po'i mi rnams chang 'thung zhing / /gA re la sogs na ma he d+hu sha ma kha bar bar mi se ren rta glang sha /de dzid

stag dang mi sha za la po skar yul du bong bu rnga mo khyi yi sha /bram ze la sogs rnams kyis sha mi bza' ba yul 'khor chen po kar+Na ra yi yul/ /nyin dang mtshan gyi dus su dmangs rigs la sogs khyim du chang 'thung bkag la

rigs skyes 'thung / /bud med rnams kyi dbang po skyes pas mo rtags 'jib par byed cing gnyis skyes kyi bshad kyi/ /khrus dang gtsang sbra mi byed 'dir ni chags pa spyod pa pi ra'i yul la sogs pa rnams/ /pha dag

shi na ma dag bu yi chung mar bag mar len pa nges par kho na'i yul/ /rug mer spun zla'i tsha mor len la ma khar yang ni spun zla'i bu mo rang gi bus/ /so ra me dang tsam pa ka la sogs par tsha mo'i bu mo dang ni tsha mo'ang

yin/ /spun zla'i bu mo chung mar len pa yul 'khor chen po kar na ta la sogs par ro/ /ma yi tsha mo chung mar len pa la la yang ste khol mo len pa ra ra'i yul/ /bod na khrus dang gtsang sbra med la ba ru
ku lan ta re go stan rigs ngan yul/ /skyes pa'i bka' yis gdengs can dbang po nyin dang mtshan gyi dus su chu yi char 'bebs byed/ /gal te yul chos spyod pas grub par gyur na de tshe rig byed ngag dag

bden pa min/ /sha yi dam tshig can gyi sha za'i lus can phru gu sha dag spong bar 'gyur ba yin/ /gang zhig rig byed byed pa drang srong mchog gi dka' thub can gyi rig byed ngag de gnyis/ /mtho ris don du mi dang ba lang
gsod cing b+ha gar dkrugs pa zhi ba'i btung / /zhi ba'i rig byed ngag de dag gis sems sun 'byin pa rab tu mkhas pa rnams/ /ba lang lpags pa'i zhi ba'i btung ba b+ha ga mchog tu dkrugs pa rta yi
pho rtags bcad pa la/ /khu ba khrag gis rnam par bsgos pa sbrang dang mar du bcas pa lce yis ldag par byed/ /de lta'i sha za'i spyod pas gal te mchod sbyin rig byed ngag gis gnyis skyes rnams

kyis grub/ /nges pa dang ldan zhi ba'i sems dang snying rje ldan pa'i daN Di mtho ris rnam par nyams/ /pha la sogs pa'i don du 'tshe ba byed cing khyim pa mchod sbyin dus su phyugs dag gsod/ /dka' thub
rnams ni 'tshe ba spong zhing dka' thub nges par brdung zhing gong ma goms sogs yod/ /daN Di dka' thub rnams kyis mtho ris mchod sbyin 'gegs par 'gyur te de yang gang gis phyir/ /shes par

grol bas de phyir sna tshogs phyugs dag gsod pa gnyis skyes rnams ni ngu 'bod 'gro/ /lha la sogs pa mchod pa nyid pas gal te sha zos pa las nyes pa mi skyes na/ /bcu gnyis pa dang nya dang bcu bzhi klu yi tshes

dang nyi ma 'pho ba'i dus dag tu/ /khyab 'jug la sogs mchod phyir 'di rnams nyi mar bram ze rnams kyis ci phyir sha mi bza'/ /pha la gnas su sha dang rnam par bral ba'i chang bu ci phyir ster byed mkhas pa rnams/ /
'tsho ba'i pha dang ma dag gang zhig shi bar gyur na sngon gyi rigs rgyud rnam par spangs/ /bsod nams sdig pa'i mthu yis mtho ris ngan song dag tu rab tu skye la lus bsregs nas/ /gnas dang gnas su

rus pa'i dum bu 'jog cing chang bu dag kyang ster byed su zhig ni/ /su zhig ma yin su zhig pha yin de ni lus dang bral nas skye gnas gzhan zhugs pa/ /bram ze la sogs mchod pas gal te de yis pha ma mchod
par rig byed las grub na/ /bram ze la sogs ma zhu ba yis de tshe shi ba la yang ma zhus gnod par 'gyur/ /gang gis pha dag yi dags skye dge'i dbang gis yi dags skyes nas dad pa'i kha zas slong / /nges

pa'i bu yis rab tu byin pa'i chang bu len par gyur la chu yang len par byed/ /tshangs pa la sogs gtso bo nyi ma lha mchog bdag gi nyi ma de ni ci yis bza'/ /sems can rnams la sdug bsngal ster ba 'chi ba'i 'jigs

bskyed lha rnams ci yis zhi bar 'gyur/ /zla ba lha min dbang po'i gtso bo phebs bcas gtso bo ci zhig zla ba bza' de ni/ /sems can rnams la bde ba ster zhing mchog tu 'jigs pa 'joms pa ci yis lha ma yin rnams kyi/ /

gang zhig mtho ris lha rnams mi dang phyugs kyi sha yis bram ze rnams kyis mchod bya ba/ /gang zhig yi dags sa yi khor yug rtogs par yod pa de rnams gnyis skyes spyod yul min/ /sa la sogs pa lha yi de nyid
nye bar zhig par gyur pa dbang po'i spyod yul min/ /tshangs gzugs sna tshogs nam mkha' tsam yang seng ge dbang phyug gtso bo tshangs pa de nyid de/ /yi dags la sogs rlung gi lus po rang bzhin yon tan

dbang las rags pa'i kha dog dman/ /sa dang chu dang me yi lus can sa dang bar snang dag tu kha dogs rags sogs ldan/ /rlung gi reg bya'i lus can sa dang chu dang me rnams mig gis gzung bya'i kha dog gzugs/ /dri ni

sna yis gzung bya 'dir ni lce yis ro myong dag pa'i rna bas sgra rnams so/ /rig byed tshig las gal te rlung gi gzugs ma grub cing rig byed rtog ge'i tshad ma yis/ /gzugs med de yis sa dang bar snang dag tu de tshe 'byung ba'i

tshogs rnams bskyod pa min/ /mo sham bu dang mtshungs pa nam mkha' tsam la nam mkha'i rgyu tsam yon tan med pa gang / /gzhan dag gzugs can bzhi ste sa dang chu dang byin za rlung rnams ro yi dbang po gnyis/ /bram ze sogs kyis
mthong gyur khyim ni mun pa can du mtshan mo mar me med na yang / /byi ba la sogs phyogs dang mtshams su son pa'i gzugs kyi dngos po ma lus snang bar 'gyur/ /srin po dang ni yi dags la sogs tshogs pa

mtshan mo'i dus su lha rnams ma lus kyang / /bram ze la sogs rnams kyis de ni mthong zhing nyi ma shar na skar ma ma lus kyang / /bya rog srin bya lce spyang khyi rnams ma lus 'byung dang 'byung 'gyur byung ba ma lus
ston/ /de bzhin lhag ma'i chang bus bsgrubs pa'i theb brang dag gis skyes bu rnams la yang / /byol song rnams ni gang du rang gi sems la bab pa'i sa phyogs der ni gnas 'cha' la/ /de dag shes pa
bram ze rnams la srid pa gang las mig gi gzung bya'i rgyu gzhan min/ /lha mo gzhon nu ma la zhugs na byung dang 'byung 'gyur 'byung ba ma lus ston par byed/ /bram ze shi nas yi dags gyur pas

rmongs pa'i lus la zhugs nas rig byed 'don par byed/ /sbyin bdag srin por gyur na khyim du bong ba so phag rus pa'i dum bu 'phen par byed/ /blo dang ldan pa'i dpyod pa can rnams nye bar nyams par 'gyur ba'i yi

dgas spyod la ltos/ /mun pa bsal ba min par gyur la mun las khwa ta de yi bshang ba las byung ba/ /mya ngan med skyes khyab 'jug 'phrog byed skyed byed des na mes po khwa da mchod par 'os/ /ba glang rgyab

dang ra yi kha dang gnyis skyes bong bu'i rkang pa bud med b+ha gar phyag byed cing / /khams rnams stong la gnyis pa mar dang sbrang rtsir bcas pa lngag pa gang zhig bram ze rnams/ /sgra med yi ge med las nam mkha' 'gyur te

nam mkha' rlung gi rten du gyur pa las/ /rlung las me la me las chu yin chu las sa la 'bras bu'i kha zas rnams/ /zas dang chu dag zos dang 'thungs las rdul phran yon tan rang bzhin g.yo ba'i lus 'di dag /bsod

nams sdig pa'i mthu yis bde 'gro rnams dang ngan 'gro'i srog chags phung po rab tu 'byung / /mo sham bu yi thu bo mchog las mchog gyur mchog gang rdul phran 'bum gyi cha ltar phra/ /nam mkha' las ni mchog gi bdag nyid

yul dang bral zhing yon tan med pa nam mkha'i rtags/ /rtags kyi gnas ni sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang nam mkha'i dngos po de rnams so/ /gang yang 'di dag kun nas thim zhing nam mkha' sa stengs dag tu zhi ba'i grub mthar

ldan/ /gang zhig de yi nus pa b+ha ga zhes bya rnam gsum lam ldan sgur mo 'jigs byed ma/ /de ni nam mkha' las 'das nam mkha'i dbang phyug mchog gi mchog gyur rtsa bcings 'khyil pa can/ /nam mkha'i mtha' can
thig le'i phreng ba mgo nas bshang lam par du ba thag dang mtshungs ma/ /mchu 'phyangs skam pa'i mig can gnas dang 'jigs pa skyed byed za byed rnams kyi za byed ma/ /gsal dang mi gsal gcig ma rig ma
rigs min gzhan yang gcig tu mkha' spyod 'khor lo ma/ /rig ma'i 'khor lo'i dbang phyug rigs dang rigs min gyur pa'i thar pa ster ba'i dbang gis 'bigs/ /mi gsal bya rog rwa yis gzhu la

'dir ni rang gi yon tan rus sbal spu yis byas/ /nam mkha'i me tog lcags mda'i mda' gzhu gang dag 'bigs pa des ni rgyal po dbang bskur 'gyur/ /gal te skye dang 'jig rgyu sgyu ma chen mo byed dam he ru kar

'gyur na/ /sangs rgyas pa dang mu stegs pa dag khyab 'jug 'am ni rtag pa'i sgyu ma ji ltar min/ /'di ni thub pa'i tshig las srog chags srog ni rdul phran byed dam byed du 'jug pa med/ /sems can rnams kyi bsod nams

sdig las bde dang sdug bsngal rang bzhin 'bras bu 'byin par 'gyur/ /gang zhig srin po yi dags mkha' 'gro bdud kyi rigs kyi sha yi dam tshig can gyis bsgrubs/ /grub pa'i tshig gis skyi bo gzhan gyis de rnams

nges par 'bebs par byed/ /stag la sogs pa 'ges la chu la me 'bar glang chen rengs byed mtshon cha sogs kyis min/ /sngags kyi the brang la sogs rnams kyi sa yi khor yug gtogs par rje bo'i bya ba byed/ /

byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten dbang phyug lha min lha klu rnams ni sangs rgyas pas sgrub na/ /gang gis grub pa'i ngag gis de rnams sa yi steng du 'dod pa'i dngos grub skye bo rnams la ster/ /skal ba ngan dang nad kyi sdug
bsngal 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa byed pa thams cad 'joms par byed/ /seng ge la sogs 'jigs pa rab tu dang ba'i yid kyis zhi ba la sogs byed par 'gyur/ /byang chub don du gcig tu sbyin pa la sogs lam ni dge
bcu ldan las gzhan ma gsungs/ /dbu ma'i dga' ba gcig pu b+ha ga dkrugs pa dang ldan grub 'gyur lam gzhan gyis ma yin/ /bde gshegs dam tshig can gyi rdzogs pa'i byang chub rdo rje'i sa

gzhi byang chub shing las gzhan du min/ /sha yi dam tshig can gyi grub pa 'byung ba yi dags sa gzhir shing gcig las ni gzhan du min/ /bde gshegs dam tshig can gyi byang chub lha las gshegs nas chos kyi 'khor lo

bskor la 'jug /sha yi dam tshig can gyi grub pa'i yi dags 'jug pas phran tshegs las la rab tu 'jug /sangs rgyas lhas 'jug pa na bde gshegs dam tshig can la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar ston/ /grub pa'i

yi dags 'jug pa sha yi dam tshig can gyi ma mo'i 'khor lo la ston byed/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis stobs bcu bskyed par mdzad pa bya rgod phung po las gzhan ri la min/ /grub pa rnams kyis yi dags rigs bskyed

ston pa 'jigs byed ri las ri gzhan la ma yin/ /dpal ldan 'bras phung chos kyi dbyings su stobs bcu'i stobs mnga' sangs rgyas pa'i rgyud rnams bstan/ /zhing gi drag po'i dur khrod dag tu phyugs kyi skye bo stobs can

thod pa can rgyud ston/ /rgyal po'i rgyal srid lha khang sa steng sa las 'byung ba de rjes lha yi rgyal srid do/ /gsal bar mgon po'i 'khor lo legs par bzhag par gyur las thar par rab tu 'byung bar gyur/ /rgyal po srog gcod

pa las dmyal bar rab tu 'jug par 'gyur gyi gzhan du sangs rgyas bka' ma yin/ /rgyal po bram ze la sogs gsod pas mtho ris 'jug gi gzhan du grub pa'i tshig ma yin/ /sha yi kha zas longs spyod byed pas slar

yang srid pa gzhan du lha min rigs su skye/ /sha yi kha zas longs spyod byed pas slar yang sdig gzhan lha yi rigs su 'di skye'o/ /mgo zlum dang ni yugs sa mngon spyod byed pas slar yang bong bu nyid du rab tu 'gro/ /mgo
zlum dang ni yugs sa mngon spyod byed pas slar yang srid gzhan 'jigs byed nyid du 'gro/ /sems can phan pa byas pas bsod nams nyid la gnod pas sdig par bde bar gshegs pa nyid kyis gsungs/ /
sems can gnod pa byas pas bsod nams nyid la phan pas sdig par nam mkha' tsam pos ston/ /sangs rgyas rnams dang 'jigs byed skyes pa bud med gdengs can rnams kyi bstan pa lha rten gang / /g.yul
du zhugs pa'i stag gzigs rnams kyi rta yi tshogs kyi sa ni de rnams ma lus 'jig par byed/ /de rnams rigs gcig gzhan gyi nor mi len cing bden par smra dang gtsang sbra rab tu 'jug /gzhon nu gzhan

gyi chung ma spong zhing dka' thub nges pa dang ldan rang gi chung ma bsten/ /khrus byas gang zhig 'dod pa'i sgra gcan mtshan mo so so'i dus su nyin gung phyed yol dang / /srod dang thun gsum dag dang nyi ma ri la shar bar

gyur nas lan lnga phyag byed cing / /sa steng lha yul dag tu stag gzig mu stegs dag la mun can dbang pos gcig tu skyob/ /drag po'i g.yul ngor pha ltar skyob par byed cing bu dang bran bzhin 'gyur la rgyal po
ni/ /rgyal rigs 'thab mo mun pas gnyis skyes phyugs kyi sha yis 'jigs byed la sogs mchod nas su/ /sna tshogs sems can gnod pa byed cing gzhan gyi nor 'phrog pa yis gdung rgyud 'chad pa 'byung / /

grub pa bya Di dbang po sbyin pa mi phyugs zhabs dang dum bu zhes bya thod pa can/ /dge slong klu sgrub zhes bya yon tan ma lus 'byung khungs sems can kun la phan 'dogs pa/ /slob dpon blo brtan zhes bya gcod

byed chu yis grub pa stong phrag bcu dang bcas pa rnams/ /gzhan yang de ltar rab tu grags kyang kye ma de lta na yang dam par gyur pa rmongs pa yod/ /dge 'dun lam gyis grub par gyur pa 'phags pa lha dang lwa ba'i na
bza' rta dbyangs dang / /phyogs kyi glang po gzhan la phan pa'i bsam pa btsun pa zla ba pad ma'i myu gu zhes/ /pang go sa la rtog pa'i rgyal po ma lus nag po rgyal po in dra b+hU ti dang / /de bzhin

gzhan dang de rnams mthong yang mi bdag 'jigs byed 'phrogs byed sogs kyis byin gyis brlabs/ /sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang nam mkha' mkha' tsam gdong lnga pa la yan lag drug /de yi dbyangs yig ring dang thung

bas 'gyur gyis gzhan la dbyangs yig yon tan la sogs min/ /nyi ma gang du tshangs pa'i sa bon nye bar 'jigs par 'gyur ba des na dus phyi mar/ /sa gzhi skyong ba mchod na 'dir ni g.yul ngor kla klo dang ni mu stegs

'jigs par 'gyur/ /thung dang ring dang lnga rnams rang bzhin yon tan mtshungs pa dbyangs/ /ga yig yon tan la sogs min/ /a sogs ma ning dbyangs yig stobs bcu mnga' bas gsung ste nyi ma 'thab mo zad phyir ro/ /

ring dang thung ba mtshungs pa gang du a ko ka ni ring po phyugs bdag tshig las 'gyur/ /de phyir ma ning yod la i ko ya Na tsa mi byed po'i phyogs nas nges par bskyod/ /thog mar lo nas nam mkha' mkha' dang gzhan yang

zla ba tsin tsi yi ni dbang phyug 'byung / /de yi bka' yis yi dags dbang bsgyur dus la ko sogs grogs ldan sgur mor byin brlabs pa/ /phyi nas sa steng son pa'i gnas dang zhing gi lha gang drug bcu rtsa brgyad kla klo yi/ /

mgon po ma d+hu ma ti bu dang bu mo spun zla skyes pa rnams kyis 'jig par byed/ /der ni bcwa brgyad lo la brgya yis brgya la bsgyur bas ma kha la sogs 'phags pa'i yul/ /kla klo rnams dang lha gang mun can nyi mar

rtog pa gang de nga'i yis brlag par bya/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun rnams la skyabs gsum cho gas skye dgu rnams ni der bzhag nas/ /bde ba bkod de ka lA pa nas lha gnas dga' ldan mchog tu nyi ma 'gro bar bya/ /

nam mkha' mkha' dang dus dang dbang po mig gis dus kyi dus su son pa'i lo yi tshad/ /slar yang skye bo rnams ni kla klo 'jug ste ji srid bcwa brgyad lo la bsgyur dang bcas pa'i bar/ /yang nas yang du nga yis rtsod

pa'i dus der byung nas de rnams gzhig par bya ba nyid/ /ji srid sa dang chu dang me rlung nam mkha'i yon tan nam mkha' nyi zla skar ma rnams/ /phyogs skyong phyogs kyi gdon dang phyogs lho nam mkha' sa gzhir yi

dgas bram ze ba glang sogs/ /sa 'og klu dang lha min rnams ni sa yi bdag pos zhi ba'i don du 'di rnams mchod/ /don kun grub phyir rtag tu rgyal po mi dang bcas pas sangs rgyas pa dang rgyal ba rnams/ /

sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang stong pa nyi mar bcas pa mchod rdzas rnams kyis mchod/ /slob dpon mchog la gzhol bas bsrung ba lnga po rab tu dri zhim me tog rnams kyis mchod/ /sngon du khrus byas gos sngon snga dro

gso sbyong blangs pas nyin dang mtshan du nges par gdon/ /klog mkhan bzhi dang lnga pa gang zhig zhi bar byed pas nyin dang mtshan du bya bar 'gyur/ /slar yang de la bsrung bar bya zhing nyi ma bcu ru zhi dang rgyas pa dag

kyang bya/ /zho dang 'bras chan nyi mar rta dang glang po'i lto dang 'bras chan 'o ma zla ba la/ /'bras chen la sogs mig dmar gza' lhag me tog bcud dang bcas pa 'bras chan gza' lhag la/ /'bras chen ser po bu

ram sogs kyi gtor ma lha yi bla ma 'o thug sha kar gyis/ /pa wa sangs la zan dron mar nag bcas pas spen pa'i nyi ma bdun par de bskyon la/ /nyi ma slar yang phyogs dang glang po rnams kyi gtor ma bya zhing khur ba 'bras chen gyis/ /

glang po rta mchog rnams kyi zhi dang rgyas pa'i don du sbyin sreg nyi ma la sogs bzar/ /'bru dang mar sar so ma dUr ba mda' yi yam shing brgya dang 'o ma'i mchod yon btung / /sbyin sreg rjes la dung phor gang ba'i zhi ba'i chu yis
rta dang glang po khrus bya 'o/ /yi dags la sogs gtor ma sran chan sha dang chang rnams nyin mtshan dus su sbyin par 'gyur/ /srin po la sogs yungs kar dang ni rdo rje phur bus phyogs mtshams gtogs

par phur bus gdag /slob dpon gyis ni bsrung ba lnga yi cho gas rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa bsrung bar bya/ /gang dang gang gis yul mtha'i bar gyi skye dgu nyin dang mtshan du zhi dang rgyas 'gyur ba/ /thog mar
dbus su bsgrub bya'i ming dag rang bzhin yon tan dbang las pad ma lnga yis bskor/ /gang zhig rang bzhin yon tan dbang las sa dag kha sbyar zur brgyad de bzhin phyi rol tu/ /gang zhig zur rnams dar

dpyangs bcing ba phyogs dang phyogs mtshams de las rdo rje phreng bar 'gyur/ /rgyal chen phyogs kyi zur la ma lus yon tan rang bzhin ri yi rgyal po phyogs dang mtshams rnams su/ /de nang zlum po'i snam bu phyogs

dang mtshams su de la snod dang rtse mo'i phyed du 'gyur/ /pad ma'i ge sar cha la 'dir ni dgra sta lcags kyu zhags pa dang ni dung nyid do/ /chu skyes 'dab mar bsrung 'khor gang zhig snying po yang ni de bzhin gnyis pa gsum

par de/ /de ltar pad ma gnyis la gyur te nye ba'i snying po chu skyes 'dab ma chen por rnam gnyis der/ /klu rnams zung gi bar du phyogs dang mtshams kyi 'dab mar bar du de bzhin lha dang lha min dang / /gnod sbyin rnams
dang gza' dang ma lus 'jigs pa 'joms pa'i ma mo rdo rje mkha' 'gro rnams/ /bsrung 'khor 'dis ni thams cad bsrung bar 'gyur te khrag dang gi wang la sogs rnams kyis bri/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas dang
ma lus rgyal sras rnams kyis bsrung ba lnga sogs bsrung 'khor gsungs pa yin/ /bud med bu 'dod pa las bu dang rgyal po dgra dang g.yul 'gyed pa rnams rgyal bar 'gyur/ /nad pa nad las grol bar 'gyur te
sa yi steng du dbul po rnams kyis nor rnyed 'gyur/ /skyes pa bud med rnams kyis 'bras bu ster bar gyur pa sngon gyi bsod nams mthus yis so/ /bsod nams sems can rnams la phan btags dge bcu'i lam gyis

mchod las nam mkha' sogs las min/ /bram ze gang zhig chang 'thung 'gyur dang gcer bu pa 'am ral pa can nam dbyug gu can/ /dge tshul dang ni tshogs dpon dge slong dge ba rnam par bral ba grub mtha'i spyod pa

nyams/ /sum bcu'i dam tshig can gyi mi yi dbang pos de rnams yul nas bskrad par bya/ /gang phyir de dag rnams kyis dge dang mi dge'i las byas drug bcu'i cha shas rgyal po yin/ /yugs sa mo rnams gang zhig

'khrig pa spyad nas ngan pa dmyal ba'i 'bras ster me la btso bar byed/ /gang du yul na bdud ris de yod mi gdug dpung bcas der ni nam yang grub ma yin/ /rgyal po sa yi steng du rgyal srid dang ni dgra dag 'joms dang

nor rnyed bsod nams kyis/ /bskal pa bzang dang tshe dang grags pa dpal ldan lha yul sa steng grub pa'i rig pa 'dzin/ /sa stengs ma lus mi yi rgyal po sbyin las byung ba tshul khrims dang bcas lha rgyal po/ /

bzod pa tshul khrims skyong la nyin dang mtshan du rtsod pa las ni sbyin pa 'phel bar 'gyur/ /skyes bu bsam gtan la gnas mchog tu rang bzhin rnam par bral ba shes rab kyis thabs 'phel/ /shes rab thabs

kyi mthu las smon lam dang yang stobs dang stong nyid ye shes rdo rje'o/ /chos kyi dbyings su gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams dang gal te 'khor bar byon pa ma yin no/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'

yul dang yul can lhan cig nam mkha'i khams rnams su/ /de ni brdzun gyi tshig la de bzhin bcom ldan rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha gar bzhugs zhes pa/ /'dod chags la sogs skyon spangs dri ma gsum dang rnam bral rdo
rje sems dpa' las gzhan min/ /tshangs pa la sogs lha rnams sa stengs dmyal ba'i dmyal bas 'dir ni zhi ba la sogs kyi/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis ma lus tshe yi tshad rnams rang rang grub
mtha'i chos su gsal bar byas/ /tshangs pa la sogs bsod nams longs spyod mthar ni lha yul sa stengs dag nas lhung bar 'gyur/ /srin pos byin brlabs rnams kyis de la thar pa 'dod pa de ni nam

mkha'i shing 'bras bzhin/ /byis pa rnams la rang rang ma yis brdzun tshig 'jam pa snyan pas bdag nyid drung du khrid par byed/ /chang ba stong pa ston cing bdag gi lag la ril bu yod pa long zhig bu zhes brjod/ /
rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bdud kyi lag nas shin tu snyan pa'i tshig gis bdag nyid drung du khrid/ /nam mkha' tsam zhig ston cig bdag gi rigs kyi mya ngan 'das pa long zhig bu zhes gsung / /sems
can rnams kyi bsam pa'i dbang las rgyal bas srin po rnams la gso sbyong gsal bar mdzad/ /de rnams de yis sangs rgyas nyid na thub pa'i bka' yi gsang sngags theg pa bden ma yin/ /gang zhig bskal
pa dpag med byams dang dge bcu'i lam dang sbyin dang tshul khrims rab rdzogs pas/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' stobs bcu ldan pas sangs rgyas byang chub lung bstan to/ /mo sham bu ni
lus med ma lus yon tan rang bzhin gang zhig rdul phran 'dus pa rnams/ /srog ni nam mkha'i me tog min te gong du rags pa'i lus la zhugs nas klog cing dgod/ /srog chags bya rog rwa min bsod

nams sdig pa'i dbang gis gang zhig 'gro ba rnams su 'khor/ /srog chags gang zhig rdul phran phung po'i lus ni sa stengs 'chi ba'i tshe na mi ltung med/ /rgyud kyi rgyal por stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pas

sangs rgyas pa yi gang zhig lam bstan pa/ /rgyal ba stobs bcu ldan dang ston pa'i sras dang sangs rgyas pa yi lha klu dri za lha min dang / /khro bo srin po sha yi dam tshig can dang stag gzig rnams dang mu stegs spyod pa
rnams/ /de kun saM b+ha la zhes bya ba rgyal mchog bzhugs gnas der ni nyi ma bdag gis bsten/ /dpal ldan 'bras phung chos kyi dbyingasu stobs bcu mnga' bas gang zhig bdud rnams btul mdzad pa/ /de kun
saM b+ha la yi dpal ldan ka lA pa yi bskyed mos tshal gyi dus 'khor gyi/ /don chen gser gyi dkyil 'khor khang pa'i sgo yi phyi rol thub pa nyi ma'i shing rtas dris/ /dpal ldan 'jam dbyangs rin
chen seng ge'i khri la bzhugs pa stobs bcu mnga' ba'i mdzad spyod gsungs/ /dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i rgyud phyi ma rgyud kyi snying po rdzogs so// //shAkya'i dge slong d+harma grags kyis bsgyur

ba'o/ /ye d+harmA he tu pra b+ha bA he tun+te na te/ te Shany+tsa yo ni ro d+ha e bam+bA dI ma hA shra ma NaH/ /sarba pA pa s+yA ka ra Na~M/ ku sha la s+yo pa sam+pa da~M/ swa tsi t+ta~M pa ri da ma nu/ me tad+pu d+d+hA nu shA sa na/
@#/ /rgya gar skad du/ shrI kA la tsakra gar+b+ha nA ma tan tra/ bod skad du/ dpal dus kyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi snying po/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /thams cad
mkhyen pa'i ye shes sku/ /nyin mor byed pa'i 'od lta bu/ /pad ma'i 'dab ma 'dra ba'i spyan/ /sangs rgyas seng ge'i gdan la bzhugs/ /lha yi mchog gis phyag byas pa/ /spyi bos gtugs te phyag

'tshal lo/ /rgyal po zla ba bzang pos zhus/ /yan lag pad ma sbyar ba ni/ /yan lag mchog la bzhag byas te/ /dus kyi 'khor lo'i sbyor ba ni/ /rtsod pa dag gi dus kyi ni/ /mi rnams grol ba'i rgyu ru'o/ /
so sor sdud pa rnam pa bcu/ /rgyal ba yi ni dbang por 'gyur/ /de bzhin bsam gtan mi skyod pa/ /srog dang rtsol ba ral gri can/ /slar la yang ni rnam pa bcu/ /gzung ba rin chen
phyag rgya can/ /g.yung mo rjes su dran pa ni/ /pad ma 'dzin pa ru ni 'gyur/ /dpal gyi ting 'dzin 'khor lo can/ /re re yang ni lnga ru dbye/ /slar la yang ni gang dbye ba/ /a la sogs dang ka
la sogs/ /so sor sdud pa yul dang ni/ /yul can rnam pa bcu po rnams/ /lus la 'jug pa med pa'o/ /shes rab rtog dang dpyod pa'o/ /dga' ba mi g.yo bde ba dang / /bsam gtan sems ni rtse
gcig pa'o/ /srog dang rtsol ba gnyis kyi lam/ /mi 'khrug pa ru 'gyur ba ni/ /dbu mar srog ni 'jug pa'o/ /thig le ru ni srog 'jug cing / /gnyis ka 'gro dang 'ong ba dag /gzung ba yid ni sems
gcig pa/ /gtum mo yi ni snang ba gang / /lus la nges par gsal 'gyur ba/ /nam mkha' de ni rjes dran 'gyur/ /shes rab thabs kyi bdag nyid kyi/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i bden dbang gis/ /ye shes
sku ni ting 'dzin te/ /'di ni chu sogs dbye ba yis/ /gsum du yang ni 'gyur ba yin/ /sna tshogs bdag po'i sgrub thabs so/ /phyag rgya gsum dang tshad ni gsum/ /rnam pa gsum gyi srid dbang gis/ /
las dang kun rtog bzang po yi/ /so sor sdud pa rnal 'byor pa/ /yul du rnam par bral ba dang / /sngags kun gyis ni byin gyis brlabs/ /bsam gtan sbyor ba dag pa yis/ /mngon shes lnga ni thob par
'gyur/ /srog dang rtsol ba dag pas ni/ /zla ba nyi ma dag pas bral/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis mchod/ /gzung ba yi ni stobs kyis ni/ /nyon mongs la sogs bdud 'joms shing / /
stobs bcu la ni 'jug par 'gyur/ /dri med 'od 'phro dkyil 'khor te/ /gzhan yang ye shes sku las so/ /de phyir dag pa ting 'dzin gyis/ /nyi ma cung zad tsam gyis ni/ /ye shes sku ni 'grub par
'gyur/ /so sor sdud la sogs pa yis/ /gal te gzir bar de 'gyur na/ /sngags pa rnams kyis 'dod mi 'grub/ /sgra la goms pa yan lag ma'i/ /pad song rdo rje nor bu yi/ /thig le bsgrub pa

song bar bya/ /bsnyen pa dang po sbyor ba ni/ /nam mkha' ru ni rnam pa bcu/ /'khor lo can ni khro lta ba'o/ /bgegs ni mthar byed kyi lta ba/ /bdud rtsi lam du song ba yang / /nye ba'i bsnyen pa yan lag drug /
shes rab las 'phros zla thig le/ /gzhan yang rdo rje nor bu ste/ /yi ge gsum ni bsgrub par 'gyur/ /bde ba ma nyams gcig zhi ba/ /lhan cig skyes pa ru ni 'gyur/ /sgrub chen ye shes sbyor ba'o/ /
srog dang rtsol ba kun nas ni/ /mgo bo'i bar ni phan pa ste/ /mnyam pa'i bde ba 'bras ster ba/ /de las steng ni mi phan pa/ /'chi ba'i 'jig pa byed pa'o/ /sems can nges par klog pa'i rgyu/ /
gtsug tor sgo ni phug nas su/ /mchog tu bde ba'i go 'phang du/ /'di ni sbyar ba bya ba nyid/ /phung po med pa'i rnal 'byor ma/ /mnyam pa'i bde ba la bzhugs mod/ /'on kyang 'jig rten grags pa med/ /

dbus su srog dang 'jug pa ni/ /yul dang rnam par bral ba nyid/ /sna tshogs yum gyis 'khyud pa'o/ /pad mar 'jug pa'i rang rdo rje/ /spro ba yang ni de bzhin te/ /rdo rje dbus su gzhag par bya/ /sa bon ma lhung ba

bde ba/ /shin tu chags pa'i chags par song / /rnal 'byor pa yi 'byor pa nyid/ /mchog tu yang ni khyab pa'i bdag /dpal ni gsang las gsang ba po/ /gtsug tor du ni rtse lnga pa'o/ /rdo rje yi ni 'gyur ba yin/ /phyi
yi rtse mo nyis 'gyur du/ /'gyur ba chos kyi dkyil 'khor ro/ /de ni gnyis su 'dres pa dang / /de ni gzhan yang nyis 'gyur ro/ /de yi yang ni gzhan nyis 'gyur/ /lhan cig skyes dang longs spyod
rdzogs/ /sprul pa yi ni 'khor lor ro/ /de yi nang du rtse gcig go/ /mnyam pa'i bde ba'i 'bras ster ba/ /gsang ba'i pad ma'i nang gsang ba'o/ /rnal 'byor pa dang srog gcod pa/ /nyin dang mtshan du

phye ba ni/ /de ni srog 'jigs pa ru gsungs/ /sgra gang kha dang bral ba ni/ /snying la yod par rab 'gyur ba/ /de ni brdzun du smra ba nyid/ /kun mkhyen gyi ni ye shes sar/ /'dzin par yang ni dbye ba gang / /
rnal 'byor pa la de gsungaso/ /bde ba'i thig le ma lhung ba/ /gzhan gyi bud med du ni 'gyur/ /bsten pa chags bral min pa'o/ /srog dang rtsol ba'i me yis ni/ /ri bong can la zhu ba yi/ /btung ba chang
gi btung ba'o/ /mthe bo'i tshigs nas gtsug tor du/ /tshes kyi dbang gis 'gro ba ni/ /nya mthar thug par rang gi sems/ /gtsug tor gnas nas mthe bo ru/ /yang ni 'dir ni 'gro 'gyur te/ /nag po'i phyogs

kyi mthar thug par/ /rnal 'byor ma spyod pa des ni/ /nyi ma re re'i dus su ni/ /'dod pa'i dngos grub rab tu ster/ /spyod dang 'dod pas lus tsha na/ /mchog gi kha yi pad ma las/ /tshig mi 'byung dang gnyid log dang / /

'gul dang na pa lkug pa dang / /yid ni 'khrug dang brgyal ba ni/ /du ba la sogs rdo rje can/ /de rnams gsal ba rnam pa bcu/ /srog can lus kyi gnas skabs so/ /'jig rten 'dod pa'i gnas skabs ni/ /nges pa

kho nas gsal ba las/ /su zhig rgyal ba su 'dod pa/ /thig le dkar po'i rgyun ni gang / /nyin dang mtshan mor ltung ba ni/ /mA ma kI ni de chad do/ /go ku la sogs mig la sogs/ /nyi ma re re bzhin spro bas/ /sha gzhan
re 'ga' yang ma yin/ /bdud rtsi lnga rnams bsten pa ni/ /rang gi rigs kyi sar song ba/ /lha rnams dag pa'i lus las so/ /stong pa'i sems de rtsod pa yis/ /lhan cig skyes pa khyab bde bas/ /
de ni skye gnas 'khrigs pa med/ /nor gyi sbyin pa btang ba dang / /bud med sbyor la yid kyis ni/ /mi 'dzag pa ni tshul khrims so/ /bzod pa sgra sogs mi 'jug pa/ /gnyi gar 'gro ba'i le lo ni/ /
rnam par 'jig pa brtson 'grus so/ /bsam gtan shes rab sems dang ni/ /bde ba lhan cig par song ba/ /kun 'gro thams cad brjod pa'o/ /sems can don du de rdzu 'phrul/ /srid pa don ni
med byed pa/ /thob pa gzhan ni bzhi pa'o/ /lus gcig la ni nus ldan pa/ /cha dgu dang ni lhan cig pa/ /nyi shu rtsa lnga bdag nyid sogs/ /bsam gtan phyag rgya'i gnyis dag
nyid/ /cung zad tsam gyi nyi ma yis/ /dngos grub yang dag 'byung bar 'gyur/ /zhi ba dbang dang rengs pa dang / /srid pa 'jig par byed pa ni/ /zhal gyi dbye bas phye ba nyid/ /'byung ba
rnams kyi dkyil 'khor gnas/ /lha min lag 'gro dag gi rigs/ /'di bsgoms nas ni bsgrub par bya/ /dpal dam pa dang po'i sangs rgyas stong phrag bcu gnyis pa las gsungs pa dpal dus kyi

'khor lo zhes bya ba las thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa/ sbyor ba yan lag drug pa'i sgrub thabs bkol ba'i dum bu'o/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrI b+ha dra bo d+hi'i zhal snga nas dang / bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba gyi
jo ban de zla ba'i 'od zer gyis 'bro dge slong gi phyir bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o/ /
@#/ /rgya gar skad du/ sha ka pra kri ya/ bod skad du/ dbang gi rab tu byed pa/ thugs rje chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo/ / phab pa btang ba'i phyi nas mgo bo dang ni snying ga

spyi gtsug rnams dang lte ba mgrin pa dang / /gsang ba rnams su bsrung ba rgyal ba rnams kyis rang gi rigs gyur rnams la rang gi rdor gsum gyis/ /slob ma rnams kyi lus la gos ser skon zhing mig rnams bkab
nas dkyil 'khor 'dir ni gzhug par bya/ /kun rdzob don du rab mchog lam nas gshegs nyid rnams la brtul zhugs rnams ni sbyin bya rtag pa ru/ /bsad dang mi bden pa dang gzhan gyi bud med rnams spangs de

bzhin gzhan nor chang 'thung dag kyang ste/ /'khor ba'i rdo rje zhags pa rang gi dge ba 'joms par byed pa sdig pa lnga po 'di nyid rnams/ /gang zhig gang gi dus su byung ba'i lha dang mi yi bla ma de yi ming gis rab tu sbyin

byas pa'i/ /sna tshogs gtso bo'i bka' stsal 'di yis srid pa'i 'jigs pa 'joms pas khyed rnams kyis kyang skyang bar gyis/ /rgyan 'gyed kha na ma tho bcas pa'i zas dang tshig ngan klog dang 'byung po lha min

chos rnams dang / /ba lang byis pa bud med skyes pa rnams dang lha dang mi rnams bla ma lnga ni gsad mi bya/ /grogs dang rje bo dang ni lha dang mi yi bla ma dge 'dun dbugs 'byin rnams la 'khu ba dang / /dbang po rnams
kyis yongs su chags rnams min te srid pa'i bdag po'i brtul zhugs nyi shu rtsa lnga'o/ /dpal ldan sngags kyi mngon par bsngags pa lag pa'i pad+ma kha sbyar du ni me tog gcig byin te/ /dang por

lan gsum bskor te lag pa'i pad+ma kha sbyar gnas pa'i me tog dkyil 'khor du ni dor/ /gnas gyur gang du me tog bzang po lhung ba de nyid de yi rigs su nges so mi bdag kye/ /phyi nas dbang bdun rnams dang rnam gsum 'dir ni ji lta

ba bzhin bla med yang dag rab tu sbyin/ /klu rnams kyis sam bzhis te rgyal ba rnam rgyal bcas pa'i bum pa nor bu gser gyi bum pa'am/ /sa las byung ba rnams su rin chen sman ldan dang ni dri ldan rnams kyis lha mo rnams kyis

khrus bya'o/ /sangs rgyas rab dbye rnams kyis dbu rgyan spyan te mchog gi bla mas nus ma rnams kyis dar dpyangs nyid/ /rdo rje dril bus nyi ma zla ba nyid de brtul zhugs kyis kyang yul dang dbang po spyad par bya/ /ming

gis khro bo rnams dang byams sogs dang ni rgyal ba'i bdag po'i rjes gnang phyi mor bcas pa sbyin/ /rdo rje dang ni dril bu rab tu byin nas mchog gi snying rjes dag pa'i chos rnams bstan par bya/ /rdo rje'i rigs su

nges pa srog gcod pa dang ral gri la mi bden pa yi ngag brjod par bya ba dang / /rin chen du ni gzhan nor 'phrog dang mchog gi pad+ma'i rigs nyid du yang gzhan gyi bud med 'phrog /'khor lor chang dang mar me sangs rgyas

rnams dang yul rnams mtha' dag shin tu bstan par bya'o/ /gri gug tu ni gdol pa mo la sogs pa bud med mtha' dag mkha' yi pad+ma smad mi bya/ /sems can rnams kyi don du nor dang lus bcas sbyin bya 'di ni
khyod kyis bsrung bar bya ba min/ /rigs kyi bu rnams gzhan du bskal pa grangs med pas kyang sangs rgyas min par rgyal bas gsungs par nges/ /chu yis sgrol ma la sogs lha mo rnams dang dbu rgyan
rgyal ba rnams te dar dpyangs nus ma rnams/ /rdo rje dril bus nyi zla dag dang brtul zhugs yul sogs rnams dang ming gis byams pa sogs su sbyor/ /rjes gnang rdzogs pa'i byang chub dpal ldan srid pa'i
'jigs pa 'joms pa dus kyi 'khor lo rjes khyab pa/ /de ltar dbang bdun rnams kyis sdig pa'i dri ma 'joms pas dkyil 'khor nyid du yang dag rab tu sbyin/ /dbang bdun rnams kyis dbang rnams bskur na dge
ba'i dbang gis sa bdun dbang phyug nyid du 'gyur ba'o/ /phyis ni phyir mi ldog la sogs pa nges par rab tu 'jug pa bum pa dang ni gsang ba'i dbang / /shes rab ye shes dbang rnams bskur bas srid

pa'i 'jigs pa 'joms pa'i 'jam dbyangs nyid du 'gyur ba'o/ /'gro ba g.yo sgyu'i dbang gis rtsa ba'i ltung ba byung na 'di nyid la yang dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal 'gyur/ /rtsa ba'i ltung ba byung na dbang bdun la gnas yon

tan can gyis bzlas pas rnam par dag par 'gyur/ /gal te bum pa dang ni gsang bar brtul zhugs nges pa'i dbang ste gong mar dag pa yod ma yin/ /gang zhig la ni rtsa ba'i ltung ba byung na dag par bya ba'i don du dkyil 'khor

'dir 'jug bya/ /rjes gnang thob nas tshogs kyi rigs su 'gro na rgan pa zhes pa las ni gzhon pa'o/ /rtsa ba'i ltung ba bu rnams kyis te dpal ldan bla ma'i thugs sun phyung ba ri bong 'dzin par 'gyur/ /de yi bka'

las 'das pa gzhan te de bzhin du ni spun la khro ba gsum par nges par 'gyur/ /byams pa spangs pas bzhi par 'gyur te gzhan yang byang chub sems nyid rab tu spangs pa las ni mda'/ /grub mtha' smod pa drug pa nyid

de gzhan yang ma yin skye bo rnams la gsang ba byin pa ri/ /phung po nyon mongs pa las klu ru 'gyur te gzhan yang dag pa'i chos la ma dad dgu pa'o/ /sgyu yi byams pa phyogs te ming sogs bral ba bde ba ster la
rtog pa gang yin drag po'o/ /dag pa'i sems can rnams la rab tu skyon brjod nyi mar 'gyur te dam tshig rnyed pa spangs na gzhan/ /bud med thams cad la smod nges par ma nur 'gyur te rdo rje theg pa la
gnas rnams kyi'o/ /phyogs ni lo ni gcig nas rnam pa bcu yi bar du lta dang rig par bya ba yin pa ste/ /de nas 'khyud bya rnams ni rgya mtsho rnams dang ro bcas bstan par bya ba g.yo ba la sogs pa/ /

nyi shu'i lo yi 'og ma'i phyag rgya rnams ni mchog tu 'jigs byed khro bo 'byung po lha min rigs/ /dbang gi don du drug dang gsum gyis bde mnyam 'bras ster ba dang gzhan ni bsgom pa'i don du'o/ /gang zhig dang por yang

yang ni dpal ldan shes rab nu mar reg pa de nyid bum pa'i dbang du brjod/ /ri bong 'dzin pa myangs dang gsang ba mthong bar byas pas gsang ba'i dbang du rab tu 'gyur ba'o/ /mtha' dag rgyal ba'i rigs kyis yan lag kha

rnams sbyang bar bya ste shes rab ye shes dbang sbyin bya/ /rgyal ba dpang por byas te slob ma'i don du phyag rgya sbyin dang gzhan yang bla ma la yang 'dir/ /rgyan rnams thams cad ldan pa'i gser zhun dang ni mtshungs pa'i lo nyid

bcu gnyis ma ste bu mo mdzes/ /thabs dang shes rab bdag nyid ldan pas rang gi rdo rje nor bus spyad bya nyid ni chags bcas la/ /slob ma dag pa shes nas rdo rje sa bon bcas pa khar ni yang dag gzhugs par bya ba nyid/ /

phyis ni rang gi phyag rgya bu la byin nas de nas gzhan yang du ba'i lam la sogs ldan yang / /skrag dang 'khrul pa'i sems dang g.yo dang gzhan gyi dbang du 'gro ba dang ni nang ldan bu btsas dang / /khro ldan khengs shing 'dod la

chags dang brdzun dang rtsod pa la dga' yan lag nyams dang ma dag pa/ /de lta bu rnams shes rab ye shes dbang du shin tu 'bad de bla mas spang bya mi dbang po/ /slar gsungs sangs rgyas bla ma dag la gus ldan dam tshig 'dzin la

phyag 'tshal ba dang mchod par bya/ /'gro ba rnams kyi rang gi yid nyid 'dod chags kyis ni 'khrugs par byed dang gang bar 'gyur ba nyid/ /yan lag mchog la gang ba las ni 'bar bas ri bong 'dzin pa zhu nas yang dag 'dzag

pa nyid/ /oD+Da dgug par rab tu byas pas mchog gi bde ba ster ba thig le thar pa gsum gyi thar/ /snang reg 'dus dang 'gyur dang bde ba rnams te dga' ba'i dbye ba la sogs pa yis de ltar ro/ /dang por yang ni mi rnams
kun gyis mig gis bltas pa 'di yis 'dod chags 'khrugs pa dga' ba ste/ /phyi nas gang ba rang gis lus la rab tu 'dus pa mchog tu dga' ba nyid du 'gyur ba'o/ /'bar ba yang dag rol pas rdo rje las ni pad

mar thig le 'dzag pa khyad par dga' ba'o/ /oD+Da rdo rje las ni thig le gsum gyi mtha' ru bde ba 'gyur byed lhan cig skyes dga'o/ /'dod dang dga' dang g.yo ba dang ni mi 'gyur ba ste bzhi rnams kyis ni de yi sbyor ba gcig /gang ba nus

pa dang ni skye ba nges par yin te mchog tu dga' ba nyid rnams gnyis pa'o/ /'bar ba dang ni thig le dag dang yur ba dang ste khyad par dga' ba nyid rnams gsum pa'o/ /oD+Da dang ni sgra tsam nyid de gnyid dang lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba nyid rnams

bzhi pa'o/ /sems kyis bsam par bya ba ma ste reg par bya zhing 'khyud pa yis ni sring mor 'gyur ba'o/ /rdo rje rab tu zhugs pa bu mor brjod de byed bcas shin tu bde ba de bzhin tsha mo'o/ /thig le ltung ba chung mar 'gyur te chags

bral gzhan gyi rigs su gyur pa'i rnal 'byor ma nyid do/ /de ltar rnal 'byor phyag rgya drug ni sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang nam mkha' chad pa'i dngos/ /chu skyes su ni rdo rje rab zhugs pa dang mer ni rlung dang thig le ma lhung rim pa ste/ /

de ltar rnal 'byor gsum gyi rab tu gsal bar nges par sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi phyag rgya'o/ /chags dang chags bral mtha' dang sngon du bde ba dam pa'i gter ni sbyor bas go cha bzhi pa'o/ /phyag rgya rnams la yum gyi mchog

gyur rnam pa bcu po de ni dpal ldan bla ma'i zhal 'di'o/ /rnam pa bdun dang rnam pa gsum ste bcu po 'di ni 'jig rten kun rdzob kyi dbang ste/ /de ltar de bzhin yang bzhi pa zhes gsungs pas so/ /bzhi pa ni gsum pa shes rab
ye shes ma yin te/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dbang bzhi pa zhes smos pa'i phyir dang / de bzhin yang zhes gsungs pas so/ /'dir bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang zhig shes rab kyi ni nu mar reg

pa nyid dang gzhan yang bdud rtsi myong dang 'khyud pa'o/ /shes rab dang ni 'dus pas byang chub sems nyid zhu ba skad cig ma bzhir bdud rtsir gyur pa gang / /de rnams thams cad 'jig rten pa yi lam gyi rgyu ru snying rje mchog gis

nges par bstan pa'o/ /gang zhig 'jig rten las 'das dbang ni rgyal ba'i bdag po dam pa'i phyag rgya bzang dang rjes 'dus pa/ /las kyi phyag rgya dri ma dang bcas sems g.yeng byed de ye shes phyag rgya rnam par rtog yin

pas/ /yang dag spangs te rdzogs pa'i byang chub rgyur ni rgyal mchog skyed byed phyag rgya bzang po bsgom pa ni/ /gos pa med cing mi 'gyur mun 'joms kun la khyab pa mkha' mtshungs rnal 'byor pa yi go bya ba/ /lus

la gnas pa'i ye shes gzi brjid srid pa'i dri ma 'joms pa dus kyi 'khor los rjes khyab pas/ /sems kyi snang ba tsam ste rang gi yid las skyes pa me long gi ni gzugs brnyan lta bur nges/ /ma lus rgyal sras rnams

dang sangs rgyas rnams kyis bsten pa rnal 'byor dbang po rnams kyis bstan byas na/ /ye shes snang ba de nyid rab tu shar bas bdud dpung yul dang bcas pa mtha' dag bsregs pa dang / /chags pa la sogs rnams kyis rnal 'byor pa

rnams lus la lo gcig sbyor bas bde mnyam ster bar byed/ /shes rab ye shes zhes pa sems kyi snang ba nyid de de yang rnam pa bcu ru 'gyur ba'o/ /dbang 'dir zhugs pa gang zhig dri ma med pa'i ri bong can mtshungs me long gzugs brnyan

lta bur nges/ /de nas bde ba 'dzag pa med pa lhan cig skyes pa 'gyur med bzhi pa mya ngan 'das par reg /des na sangs rgyas zhal ni gang gi thugs dang zhal la gnas pa de nyid dpal ldan bla ma'o/ /nam mkhar chags pa'i sems kyi mig mi

'dzums pa dang ni rdo rje'i lam du zhugs rnams kyis/ /stong pa las ni du ba smig rgyu rab tu gsal ba dri med srin bu me khyer mar me dang / /'bar dang nyi ma zla ba rdo rje rnams kyang gzhan yang mchog gi cha dang thig le nyid rnams so/ /de yi dbus

su sangs rgyas sku ni yul dang rnam par bral ba longs spyod rdzogs sku du ma'o/ /chu 'dzin bral ba'i mkha' la snang ba rnal 'byor rtse gcig gnas pa'i lta bas lta bar bya ba ni/ /ji srid nges par ri mo nag po dri med 'od

zer 'phro ba mthong ba dus kyi rtsa yis so/ /der ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i sku ni chu nang nyi ma bzhin du rnyog pa med pa sna tshogs mdog /yul dang rnam par bral ba'i rnam pa ma lus rang gi sems te gzhan gyi sems nyid ma yin no/ /sku

mthong gyur nas nyin zhag so so'i dus su srog gi rlung nyid rab tu dgag par byas pa dang / /brtul zhugs can rnams lam gyi sems ni zla ba drug gis reg bya bral nas bde mnyam 'gyur ba'o/ /ji srid nges par rang gi lus la 'od zer

'khor los yongs su 'khor bar byed pa mthong ba'i bar/ /chags dang chags bral mtha' dang dang por song ba'i skad cig ma nas khyab bdag dbugs kyi grangs 'phel lo/ /mtha' dang 'bar ba'i dbus kyang khyad par dang ni lhan cig

skyes dang ye shes dang ni rnam shes dang / /gnyid dang brgyal ba'i dbus su gnas pa'i rdo rje pad+ma dag gis gnyis sbyor bde ba gang yin pa/ /de yis 'phal bar rab tu bya ba bla ma'i nges pa'i stobs kyis 'di nyid 'phel bar the tshom med/ /

bdud dang nyon mongs 'joms shing rgyal ba'i bdag po la gnas rnal 'byor pa yis lo gcig sbyor ba yis/ /sa yi rnam par snang yang sra ba min dang chu yi gzugs su snang yang chu min gsher ba med pa'i phyir/ /me yi rnam par

snang yang me min rlung gi gzugs su snang yang g.yo ba med pas rlung ma yin/ /stong pa'i rnam pa yin yang mthong ste dkar dang sngo ba la sogs mthong yang sna tshogs kha dog min/ /rnam pa kun ldan yin yang mi mthong rang sems dri ma

nyon mongs dang ni bdud kyi mthu stobs kyis/ /sgra tsam thig le cha dang ye shes rnams ni bdud rtsi gnas su 'gro dang lcags sgrog bcings pa'i rtsa/ /srog dang thur sel lam gsum rnams nas rdo rje pad mar dang ni pad+ma rdo rje ldan pa yis/ /

dbus su rlung dag 'gro ba 'jug pa yang dag 'dus pa yul dang yul can med par 'gyur ba dang / /du ba la sogs mtshan ma rnams ni gang zhig gzung dang 'di rnams 'dzin pa thams cad gsang ba chen po'o/ /dbus su srog gzhug pa ni

nyi ma dang bcas zla bar gyur pa g.yas dang g.yon pa bcing ba dang / /phyag rgya dang ni sbyor ba'i sems kyis mchog tu bde gyur pa dang rdo rje yang dag sad pa dang / /bde ba dam pa'i don du pad mar rdo rje bskyod dam rang gi lag pa'i pad mas

gsor ba yis/ /sa bon ma btang bde ba de ni 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa 'joms pa dpal ldan bla ma'i zhal nyid do/ /sa ni chu la 'jug 'gyur chu yang me la de bzhin me ni rlung la 'jug par 'gyur ba'o/ /rlung ni stong pa la ste stong pa

mtshan ma rnam pa bcur 'gyur mtshan ma rnam pa kun ldan du/ /rnam pa kun ldan mi 'gyur bde ba dam pa gzhom du med pa ye shes sku ru 'gyur ba'o/ /mi yi bdag po ye shes las ni rdzu 'phrul dngos grub 'gyur ro skyes bu rnams

kyi skye ba 'dir/ /'dod pas sprul pa'i sku ru nges par 'gyur te gang ba rdzogs pa gsung du rab tu 'gyur ba'o/ /'bar ba sprul pa'i thugs te oD+Da las ni mchog tu bde bar mdzad pa'i ye shes shes su brjod/ /dga' ba longs

spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ste mchog dga' khyad par dga' dang bcas pa dag gi rim pa yis/ /gsung dang thugs te lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba sogs las ye shes rdo rje la sogs 'byung bar byed/ /g.yo ba nges par chos kyi sku ste srid

gsum phyag byas pa dang 'byung bar 'gyur ba de yi gsung / /nyid ni nges par chos kyi thugs ta dur+ya de yi ye shes nyid yin srid pa'i 'jigs pa 'joms/ /yi ge nges par dag pa'i sku ste dbyangs dang bral ba'i cha dang thig le sgra tsam

rim pa yis/ /gsung dang thugs dang ye shes rdo rje srid pa rnam gsum la gnas dag pa'i sku ru skyed par byed/ /sad dang rmi lam rang bzhin dag dang gzhan yang de bzhin gnyid log pa dang tur+ya'i rang bzhin rnams/ /lus gnas pa dang

dbugs nyid thim pa rnam par rgyu dang yul las bskyod pa med pa'i sems thim pa/ /ye shes gnas kyang bud med dang ni rab 'dus pa las byang chub sems zhu gyur pa'i skad cig ni/ /sprul pa la sogs rim pas thugs

kyi rdo rje rnam pa bzhi ru nges par rab tu 'gyur ba yi/ /de ltar sems ni rnam pa bzhi rnams srid pa rnam gsum gyur pa'i srog chags rnams kyi thig le'i dbus/ /khyab byed bde mnyam 'bras ster thar pa'i rgyu ru rnal 'byor dbang po

rnams kyis bsrung bar bya ba ni/ /rnal 'byor rnams la mchog gi bde ba bskyed par sa bon thig le btang na thar par ga la 'gyur/ /de phyir 'khor ba'i bde ba skad cig ma 'di brtul zhugs can rnams kyis ni rgyun du spong bar bya/ /

dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i tshigs su bcad pa sum bcu lhag pa'i stong phrag gcig pa las mdor bsdus pa dbang rab tu byed pa rdzogs s+ho// //rgya gar gyi paN Ti ta mkhas pa chen po sa man ta shrI dang / lo ts+tsha ba dge slong chos rab kyis

bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o/ / @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ shrI sarba bud+d+ha sa ma yo ga DA ki nI dzA la sam+ba ra nA ma ut+ta ra tan+t+ra/ bod skad du/ dpal sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro ma sgyu ma bde ba'i

mchog ces bya ba'i rgyud bla ma/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sems dpa' sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog /gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na/ /thams cad bdag nyid rtag

tu bzhugs/ /'di ni rang byung bcom ldan 'das/ /gcig pu rab tu phye ba'i lha/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog /chags med chags brang bral ba min/ /dbu mar yang ni mi

dmigs so/ /bud med kun gyi sgyu ma'i rgya/ /'di ni gnyis med theg pa'i mchog /sgyu ma dag ni thams cad pas/ /bud med sgyu ma khyad par che/ /ngo bo nyid kyi mthu dag gis/ /rang bzhin gyis ni de 'grub pa'o/ /'jig

rten gsum 'dir bud med 'dis/ /gus par byed pa dag tu 'gyur/ /rnyed dang bde dang dga' kun gyis/ /ngan par spyod pa'ang 'grub par 'gyur/ /rang gi ngo bo yongs bsgyur na/ /bud med kun gyi sgyu mas 'grub/ /ngo mtshar
sgyu ma'i phyag rgya 'di/ /mkha' 'gro ma zhes brdar bstan to/ /DA ni nam mkhar 'gro ba zhes/ /khams las mngon du brtags pa ste/ /nam mkha' kun du spyod 'grub pa/ /mkha' 'gro ma zhes rab tu grags/ /
thams cad ma lus phyag rgya yi/ /thams cad ma lus bde mchog gis/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /mkha' 'gro ma zhes rab tu grags/ /de ni nam mkha' 'gro ba zhes/ /sangs rgyas khams las rnam

par brtags/ /kun tu 'gro bar grub pa ni/ /sangs rgyas kun dag mkha' 'gro ma'o/ /sams zhes bya ba bde bar bshad/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi bde chen yin/ /sgyu ma thams cad rab sbyor ba/ /mchog tu bde bas bde

ba'i mchog /kun du kun nas thams cad ni/ /bdag nyid rtag tu rnam pa kun/ /sangs rgyas la sogs brten g.yo kun/ /kun gyi dngos por bdag gyur to/ /sems dang sems dpa'i ting 'dzin dang / /byang chub spyod pa sna

tshogs nyid/ /de bzhin bdud dang bdud las rgyal/ /de ni byang chub sangs rgyas yin/ /rdo rje rdo rje 'dzin nyid dang / /de bzhin pad+mo pad mo 'chang / /nor bu nor bu 'dzin nyid dang / /de dag gi yang rigs yin no/ /de nyid 'dod chags 'dod

chags bral/ /'dod pa dang ni grol ba'ang yin/ /dus gsum srid gsum mchog gsum dang / /'jig rten gsum dang khams gsum dang / /rnam pa sna tshogs tha dad pa'i/ /gnas pa thams cad de nyid do/ /'gro ba dag

ni ma lus kun/ /thams cad du ni 'di 'gyur ro/ /de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog /chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i/ /dngos po thams cad de yin te/ /nam mkha' kun gyi
skyabs na dpal/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog go/ /bskal pa bye ba grangs med par/ /sangs rgyas thams cad ma

thob pa/ /phyag rgya'i cho ga gang dag gis/ /tshe 'di nyid kyis thob 'gyur ba/ /de nyid bdag gis brtag par bya/ /sangs rgyas kun bdag bde ba'i mchog /bdag nyid shin tu bsgrubs pa las/ /sangs rgyas kun bdag
bde mchog go/ /rnal 'byor yang dag ma yin sems/ /lha la dmigs par byed pa dag /rnal 'byor gzugs brnyan rang bzhin te/ /lugs ma la sogs rnal 'byor skye/ /yang dag mchog sems rnal 'byor pa/ /

lha la dmigs par byed pa dag /rang gi dam tshig bdag sbyor ba/ /mi 'gyur dam pa 'grub par 'gyur/ /gzugs brnyan lugs la sogs pa la/ /rnal 'byor skye bar mi 'gyur gyi/ /byang chub sems la rab brtson na/ /

de las rnal 'byor lhag 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems ni rdo rje ste/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid yin/ /de bas thams cad bdag sbyor bas/ /sangs rgyas thams cad thob par 'gyur/ /bdag nyid sangs rgyas thams

cad dang / /dpa' bo thams cad bdag yin no/ /de bas bdag nyid lhar sbyor bas/ /bdag nyid rab tu bsgrub par bya/ /de yis sangs rgyas thams cad dang / /dpa' bo rnams kyang thams cad dang / /rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad

du/ /tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa'as de skad gsungs so/ /sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro sgyu ma'i bde mchog las de kho na nyid snang ba dam pa'i

yul la 'jug pa ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i rtog pa ste dang po'o// // 'di ni rnal 'byor bcom ldan 'das/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog /
rdo rje sems dpa' bdag sbyor bas/ /dbab pa thams cad rab tu 'grub/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /rnal 'byor dbang phyug bde ba che/ /bde bas bde ba nyid kyis ni/ /sangs rgyas bde ba

kun 'thob bo/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /rnal 'byor dbang phyug bde chen po/ /'di la khrus dang sdom mi dgos/ /dka' thub dka' ba spyad mi dgos/ /dka' thub sdom pa med pa dang / /bde ba dang

ni dga' bas 'grub/ /de bas ji ltar 'dod spyod cing / /kun za de bzhin thams cad spyod/ /spyad pa ji ltar 'dod par byed/ /g.yo ba dag kyang ci gar byed/ /langs pa dang ni 'dug pa 'am/ /'chag gam ji ltar gnas

kyang rung / /rgod dam rab tu smra yang rung / /gang ni ji ltar spyod kyang rung / /dkyil 'khor du yang zhugs pa 'am/ /sgrib pa kun dang ldan pa'ang rung / /rang gi lhar ni bdag sbyor na/ /bsod nams chung yang 'grub par 'gyur/ /

de nyid rnal 'byor 'di yas ni/ /thams cad sgrub par byed pa na/ /ngan zos ngan spyod thams cad kyis/ /nyes pa dag tu yong mi 'gyur/ /bskal pa bye bar mi thob pa/ /sangs rgyas dam pa thams cad de/ /phyag rgya'i
cho ga gang dag gis / /bsgrubs na kun tu thob 'gyur ba/ /bdag nyid grub par byed pa'i mchog /'di ni bdag gis brtag par bya/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog /
rdo rje sems dpar bdag sbyor ba/ /cha lugs ji bzhin bsgyur pa yis/ /thams cad sna tshogs phyag rgya'i bdag /bsod nams chung yang 'grub par 'gyur/ /rgya 'di bsgrub pa tsam gyis ni/ /sangs rgyas
thams cad byin gyis rlob/ /shin tu byin gyis brlabs na ni/ /sangs rgyas thams cad 'du bar 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor bas/ /sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas kun dang
mnyam pa'i phyir/ /sangs rgyas thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /gang gis ldan pa 'di mthong zhing / /rnam pa kun du mchod byed na/ /de yis sangs rgyas thams cad kyang / /mthong zhing mchod pa

byas par 'gyur/ /'di dang sangs rgyas thams cad la/ /mthong ba dang ni reg pa yis/ /dkyil 'khor dag tu ma zhugs pa'ang / /bden pa dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur/ /mthong ba dang ni reg pa dang / /thos pa dang
ni dran pa yis/ /sdig pa kun las rnam grol zhing / /sangs rgyas dngos grub thams cad 'grub/ /'di dang sangs rgyas thams cad la/ /rnal 'byor thams cad mnyam sbyor bas/ /bud med dag kyang rnams grol
zhing / /sangs rgyas byang chub reg par 'gyur/ /kun tu kun nas thams cad ni/ /bdag nyid rnams pa thams cad du/ /sangs rgyas thams cad dngos grub par/ /de yi bdag nyid mthong bar 'gyur/ /'di ni bdag
nyid kun gnas pas/ /mchod pa'i sprin chen thams cad kyi/ /bkod pa rab 'byam tshogs dag gis/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa mdzad/ /thams cad bdag nyid sbyor mchod dpal/ /rdo rje sems dpa' mchog
gyur pa/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin te/ /bde ba'i mchog ni thob par 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor kun la nyer sbyor bas/ /dpal ni bzhir 'gyur 'grub par 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor kun ni bcom ldan 'das/ /

rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /de yi nye bar sbyor ba ni/ /khams gsum ma lus thams cad do/ /rnal 'byor kun gyi longs spyod kyis/ /ji ltar bde bar bsten byed cing / /rang gi lha yi rnal 'byor gyis/ /

bdag nyid rab tu mchod par bya/ /rjes su sbyor bas mchod byed cing / /rnal 'byor kun gyi bde ba dag /bdag nyid kun du myang byed na/ /shin tu sbyor bas 'grub par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid kyi/ /

ra sa ya na bde ba 'dis/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i dpal tshe dang / /lang tsho nad med bde mchog 'grub/ /kun du kun nas thams cad du/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog /
rtag tu de ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas de skad gsungs so/ /sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog las dpal dpal rdo rje
sems dpa' kun tu sbyor ba'i rtog pa ste gnyis pa'o// // 'di ni rnal 'byor bcom ldan 'das/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma
bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor pa/ /dpal ldan rang gi dam tshig bde/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /rnal 'byor dbang phyug bde ba che/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor
