thig les mgo nas mnan pa dang / /rlung mtshams phyi rol gang yin pa/ /o yig tshe drag sbyor bar bya/ /bden bral mtshams kyi phyi rol du/ /sgra yig u ni sbyor ba ste/ /me mtshams 'dabs
mar gang yin pa/ /byang gi dang por de bzhin yang / /bden bral phyi rol pa bzung nas/ /byang gis dang po pa yang yin/ /dbus nas dbus ma bzungs nas su/ /'od kyi gong bu mtha' ru 'gyur/ /
de nas thig le sbyin byas nas/ /rdo rje sems dpa' 'grub par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das chags pa chen po rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /lho nas dbu ma gang yin pa/ /tsheg drag dang ni ldan par bya/ /
dbus nas dbu ma de bzhin du/ /lho nas dbu ma yang yin no/ /me mtshams 'dab ma dang ldan pa/ /rtag tu brjod par 'gyur ba yin/ /byang nas dbu ma bzung nas su/ /me mtshams dang ni shin tu sbyor/ /
sgra yig a dang sbyar nas su/ /rtag par zhi bar 'gyur ba yin/ /me mtshams phyi rol bzung nas su/ /nub kyi dang po ldan par bya/ /sgra yig i dang sbyar nas su/ /'od kyi gong bu lnga pa yin/ /
bden bral phyi rol gnas pa la/ /sgra yig a dang ldan par bya/ /de bzhin dbang ldan 'dab ma dang / /sgra yig i ni sbyor ba'o/ /shar gyi dang po pa dang ni/ /de nas dbu ma'i tha ma dang / /nub
kyi dang po pa bzung nas/ /a med rtag tu 'gyur bar bya/ /de dag bzlas pa byas pa yis/ /mda' ru rab tu grub pa yin/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /rlung mtshams
phyi rol pa bzung nas/ /sgra yig u ni sbyor bar bya/ /thig le nga ro gnon nas su/ /de nas dbus nas dbu ma'o/ /lho nas dbu ma bzung nas su/ /me 'tshams pa dang sbyor bar bya/ /shar nas
dang po bzung nas su/ /sgra yig e dang ldan par bya/ /bden bral 'dab mar gnas pa gang / /sgra yig e ni sbyor bar bya'o/ /shar gyi dang po bzung nas su/ /sgra yig e ni sbyor ba'o/ /bden bral
'dab mar gnas pa la/ /sgra yig e ni sbyor ba'o/ /rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung nas/ /sgra yig u ni sbyor bar bya/ /thig le nga ros mnyam sbyor na/ /bskal bzang bskal bzang 'gyur ba
yin/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /de bzhin gnyis pa dpa' bo ma/ /kun du bzang mo gsum pa ste/ /bzhi pa zad med snon ma'o/ /dpa' mo sangs rgyas
sku ldan ma/ /de bzhin gzungs ma zhal mdzes ma/ /sprin chen ma ni bdun pa ste/ /brgyad pa nam mkha'i spyan ma'o/ /gling bu la sogs bsdus pa dang / /sgo srungs ma
sogs yang bsdus te/ /me tog ma sogs bsdus pa ni/ /dang po'i dkyil 'khor la bskyed 'dod/ /ces bcom ldan 'das 'dod chags chen po dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs te/ de bzhin
gshegs pas dkyil 'khor la sngags 'byung ba'i tshogs kyi phyag rgya shes pa'o/ /o yig thig le dang ldan pa/ /yi ge e yis ldan pa yi/ /rlung mtshams phyi rol gnas pa dang / /me mtshams

'dab ma gnas pa nyid/ /sgra yig u dang sbyor bar bya/ /shar las dang po de bzhin du/ /dbus las dbu ma yang yin te/ /me mtshams 'dab ma dang ldan pa'i/ /lho las dbu ma 'gyur byas te/ /bden bral phyi rol pa
bzung nas/ /dbus las tha ma pa yang bzung / /dbang ldan 'dab mar gnas pa nyid/ /yi ge e dang mnyam ldan pa'i/ /rlung mtshams phyi rol gnas pa la/ /tsheg drag gis ni mnyam par ldan/ /de ni bcu
par yongs grags te/ /bden bral phyi rol gnas pa la/ /me mtshams 'dab ma can dang ldan/ /dbus las dbu ma 'gyur nas su/ /byang las dbu ma de bzhin te/ /sgra yig u ni sbyor bar bya/ /me
mtshams phyi rol pa de bzhin/ /nub las dang po pa dang ldan/ /bden bral phyi rol pa la yang / /dbu ma'i mtha' yang de yin te/ /dbang ldan 'dab mar gnas pa nyid/ /yi ge u dang mnyam ldan pa'i/ /
dbus las tha ma pa 'gyur nas/ /me mtshams 'dab ma dang ldan pa/ /byang las dbu ma 'gyur byas te/ /'dren pa a yig dang lhan cig /dbus las dang po bzung nas su/ /me mtshams stan
dang ldan par bya/ /dbus las bzhi pa gang yin pa/ /thig le dang ni yang dag ldan/ /lho las dbu ma de bzhin du/ /shar las dang po pa yang yin/ /rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung nas/ /
thig le u yig ldan par bya/ /dbus las gnyis pa gang yin pa/ /nub kyi dang po a med par/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /rlung mtshams phyi rol
bzung nas su/ /thig le u yig dang ldan ste/ /dbus las dbu ma de bzhin du/ /me mtshams stan dang ldan pa yi/ /lho las dbu ma pa 'gyur te/ /shar las gsungs pa gang yin pa/ /
sgra yig u dang ldan par bya/ /rlung mtshams phyi rol gnas pa la/ /sgra yig e yis brgyan pa ste/ /dbang ldan 'dab ma'i gdan can ni/ /lnga par yongs su grags pa ste/ /bden bral
phyi rol gnas pa la/ /sgra yig i dang sbyor bar bya/ /byang las bzhi pa gang yin pa/ /sgra yig i dang sbyor bar bya/ /dbus las dang po bzung nas su/ /me mtshams 'dab ma can
dang 'dra/ /dbus las tha ma yang yin te/ /dbang ldan 'dab mar gnas pa la/ /sgra yig o ni sbyor bar bya/ /shar las gsum pa gang yin pa/ /sgra yig o ni sbyor bar bya/ /
dbang ldan phyi rol gnas pa gang / /dbus las dbu ma dang ldan te/ /me mtshams 'dab mar gnas pa la/ /sgra yig i ni sbyor bar bya/ /rlung mtshams phyi rol gnas pa ni/ /me
mtshams gdan dang ldan pa ste/ /tsheg drag yi ge i ldan pa/ /dang po yongs su grags pa'o/ /rlung mtshams phyi rol gnas pa la/ /thig le yi ge u sbyor te/ /mkhas pas lan gnyis
brjod par bya/ /dbus las dbus ma yang bzung ste/ /lho las dbu ma de bzhin la/ /me mtshams 'dab ma can dang ldan/ /lho las dang po bzung nas su/ /thig le dang ni mnyam
por ldan/ /nub nas dbu ma bzung nas su/ /yi ge e dang mnyam ldan bya/ /dbang ldan phyi rol gang yin pa/ /dbus las dbu ma dang ldan te/ /me mtshams 'dab mar gnas pa la/ /
sgra yig i ni sbyor bar bya/ /shar las gnyis pa gang yin pa/ /nub las dang po bzung nas su/ /dbus nas dbu ma ldan pa ste/ /thig le a yig ldan par bya/ /bcu par yongs su
grags pa ste/ /shar las gsum pa gang yin pa/ /sgra yig i dang sbyor bar bya/ /dbus la tha mar gzung nas su/ /rlung mtshams phyi rol pa la yang / /yi ge i dang ldan par bya/ /
dbus nas dbu ma gzung nas su/ /lho las gsum pa 'gyur byas te/ /me mtshams gdan ni sbyor byas nas/ /shar nas dang po bzung nas su/ /yi ge a yig ldan pa yi/ /
dbus las dang po 'gyur byas te/ /bden bral 'dab mar gnas pa la/ /sgra yig e dang sbyor ba yi/ /dbus las tha ma yang yin te/ /shar nas dang po bzung nas su/ /sgra yig u
yis sbyor bar bya/ /me mtshams 'dab mar gnas pa la/ /sgra yig u dang sbyor ba ste/ /bden bral 'dab mar gnas pa la/ /sgra yig u yis brgyan byas te/ /me mtshams 'dab mar
gnas pa yang / /sgra yig u dang sbyor bar bya/ /bden bral 'dab mar gnas pa la/ /sgra yig u yis brgyan pa ste/ /bden bral 'dab mar gnas pa ni/ /gnyis brtsegs yi ge u dang
ldan/ /rlung mtshams phyi rol gnas pa la/ /byang las tha ma ldan byas te/ /tsheg drag mnyam por ldan pa la/ /sgra yig i dang sbyor bar bya/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs
so/ /rlungs mtshams phyi rol pa bzung nas/ /thig le u yis sbyor bar bya/ /dbus las dbu ma bzung ba dang / /me mtshams stan dang ldan pa yi/ /lho nas dbu mar 'gyur bar bya/ /byang las
tha ma bzung nas su/ /sgra yig a ni sbyor bar bya/ /me mtshams 'dab mar gnas pa la/ /sgra yig a yis brgyan par bya/ /dbang ldan 'dab mar gnas pa la/ /sgra yig i dang ldan pa yi/ /
nub kyi tha mar 'gyur bar bya/ /lho yi dbu ma de bzhin du/ /lho las bzhi pa gang yin 'byor/ /tsheg drag yi ge i ldan pa/ /'dus pa gsungs pa yin pa'o/ /rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung nas/ /thig
le u yis sbyor bar bya/ /dbus las dbu ma de bzhin yang / /me mtshams stan dang ldan pa yi/ /lho yi dbu ma 'gyur bar bya/ /dbus las dang po bzung nas su/ /sgra yig gnyis pa ldan pa yi/ /
byang gi dang po yang yin te/ /shar las dang po bzung ba la/ /sgra yig e ni sbyor bar bya/ /lho las dbu ma de bzhin du/ /tsheg drag yi ger ldan pa'o/ /zhes rdo rje rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi'o/ /
rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung nas/ /thig le u yig sbyor byas te/ /dbus las dbu ma bzung ba dang / /me mtshams stan dang ldan pa yi/ /lho las u ma 'gyur bar bya/ /dbu las dang po bzung

ba la/ /me mtshams stan dang ldan par bya/ /rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung nas/ /de 'og me mtshams pa yin te/ /nub kyi tha ma de bzhin du/ /sgra yig i dang sbyor bar bya/ /dbus las tha ma yang yin te/ /nub
las dang po bzung nas su/ /a yig med par gyur pa'o/ /rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung nas/ /thig le u yis sbyor bar bya/ /dbus las dbu ma de bzhin te/ /me mtshams stan dang ldan pa
yi| |lho las dbu mar gyur par bya/ /dbus nas dbu ma bzung nas su/ /thig le yis ni brgyan par bya/ /de bzhin dbus nas dbu ma yang / /lho nas dbu ma de bzhin te/ /me yi mtshams pa mnyam par
ldan/ /yi ge a yis gdu bar bya/ /nub nas tha ma bzung nas su/ /sgra yig o ni sbyor bar bya/ /bden bral phyi rol pa bzung nas/ /dbu ma'i tha ma dang ldan par/ /me mtshams lan gnyis
brjod nas su/ /nub nas dang por ldan 'gyur bya/ /rtag tu a med brgyad pa ni/ /rdo rje kha T+wAM 'dzin ma yin/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung
nas/ /tsheg drag o ni sbyor bar bya/ /dbus nas dbu ma de bzhin du/ /me mtshams pas ni ldan pa yin/ /lho nas dbu mar 'gyur ba'o/ /shar nas dang po bzung nas su/ /sgra yig a ni sbyor bar bya/ /

dbus nas tha mar bzung nas su/ /sgra yig e ni sbyor bar bya/ /dbang ldan phyi rol pa bzung nas/ /dbus las dbu ma gzung bar bya/ /me mtshams 'dab ma la gnas pa/ /sgra yig i ni sbyor bar bya/ /byang nas
dang po bzung nas su/ /yi ge a dang ldan par bya/ /me mtshams 'dab ma sbyor nas su/ /thig le nga ros bsdu bar bya/ /sna tshogs pad+ma lha mo che/ /rdo rje sems sogs lha yi yin/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das

dpal bde ba chen po rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /rdo rje mtshon cha dang / rdo rje rol ma dang / rdo rje dran ma dang / rdo rje snying po ma dag rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i lha mo bzhi yin no/ /o yig thig le dang ldan par/ /
e yig thig le yang dag ldan/ /dbus la tha ma bzung ba dang / /yi ge u dang ldan par bya/ /byang nas de bzhin bzhi pa'o/ /dbus nas dbu ma bzung nas su/ /lho nas dbu ma de bzhin du/ /me mtshams 'dab ma
dang sbyar nas/ /sgra yig i dang a bsdu bya'o/ /shar nas bzhi pa gang yin pa/ /thig le u dang ldan bya ste/ /nan tan du ni lan gnyis bzla/ /rtag tu dang po'i 'gyur ba yin/ /o yig thig le
dang ldan pa/ /dbu ma las ni dbu ma yang / /me mtshams 'dab ma dang ldan pa'i/ /lho nas dbu mar 'gyur bar bya/ /dbus nas tha ma bzung byas te/ /sgra yig e dang sbyor bar bya/ /shar las bzhi

pa gang yin pa/ /sgra yig u dang sbyor ba'o/ /bden bral 'dab ma la gnas pa/ /sgra yig u dang sbyor ba ste/ /nan tan lan gnyis bzlas pa'o/ /dbus las bzhi pa gang yin pa/ /u yig me mtshams pa dang ldan/ /

thig le nga ro gnyis pa'o/ /o yig thig le dang ldan pa'o/ /rlung mtshams phyi rol la gnas pa/ /tsheg drag dang ni mnyam por ldan/ /dbang ldan phyi rol la gnas dang / /me mtshams 'dab ma can de bzhin/ /byang nas
gsum pa gang yin pa/ /dbus las dbu mar gyur par bya/ /lho nas dbu ma pa la yang / /me mtshams 'dab ma can dang ldan/ /sgra yig i dang ldan sbyor ba/ /e yig thig le dang ldan pa/ /lan gnyis gsum
ni brjod byas te/ /lha mo gsum po kho na'o/ /sngags 'byung bar ni grags pa yin/ /o yig thig le dang ldan par/ /shar nas gnyis pa gang yin pa/ /zla tshes thig le gtsug gi zhal/ /
dbus nas dbu ma de bzhin du/ /lho nas dbu ma pa la yang / /me mtshams 'dab ma can sbyor dang / /dus rnams thams cad sbyor bar bya/ /dbang ldan phyi rol pa de bzhin/ /

sgra yig e ni sbyor bar bya/ /de nyid phyi rol pha bzung nas/ /sgra yig i dang ldan byas te/ /me mtshams 'dab ma gnas pa yi/ /sgra yig i yis brgyan par bya/ /rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung nas/ /thig le u

yig sbyor byas te/ /lan gnyis gsum du brjod pa'o/ /de ni dpag bsam shing sogs lha/ /rdo rje snying po ma dang / rdo rje sred med kyi bu mo dang / rdo rje gar gyi dbang phyug ma dang / 'dod pa'i lha mo rnams shes pa lha mo

bzhi yin no/ /o yig thig le dang ldan pa/ /yi ge a yis sbyor bar bya/ /rlung mtshams phyi rol la gnas pa/ /me mtshams 'dab ma can de bzhin/ /yi ge e yis mnyam ldan pa'i/ /byang nas dang por 'gyur byas te/ /
dbus las dbu ma de bzhin du/ /me mtshams 'dab ma can sbyor ba'i/ /lho yi dbu ma pa yang de/ /yi ge e yis mnyam ldan bya/ /dbus las dbu ma ldan 'gyur dang / /bden bral 'dab ma la gnas pa/ /

sgra yig i ni sbyor byas te/ /bden bral phyi rol la gnas pa/ /sgra yig i ni sbyor byas te/ /byang nas tha ma gang yin pa/ /sgra yig a ni sbyor bar bya/ /byang nas dang po gang yin pa/ /me mtshams pa yi gdan

dang ldan/ /nub nas dang po gang yin pa/ /rtag par a med 'gyur bar bya/ /gdod ma tha ma med pa'i mchog /lha mo rdo rje pi wang ma'o/ /rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung nas/ /sgra yig e ni sbyor bar bya/ /
me mtshams 'dab ma gnas pa nyid/ /sgra yig i dang ldan byas te/ /byang nas dang por 'gyur bar bya/ /dbus nas dbu ma bzung nas su/ /lho nas dbu ma gzung bar bya/ /me mtshams 'dab ma dang sbyor nas/ /
bsdu bar bya ba yang yin te/ /shar nas gsum pa gang yin pa/ /sgra yig e ni sbyor bar bya/ /byang nas dang po bzung nas su/ /sgra yig e ni sbyor byas te/ /nga ro bzhi po dang ldan pa/ /rtag par lan
gsum brjod bya'o/ /rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung nas/ /sgra yig e ni sbyor bar bya/ /me mtshams 'dab ma pa la yang / /sgra yig e ni sbyor bar bya/ /byang nas dang po 'gyur bar bya/ /dbus nas dbu ma

bzung nas su/ /me mtshams 'dab ma can lhan cig /lho nas dbu ma 'gyur byas te/ /rlung mtshams phyi rol la gnas pa/ /sgra yig a ni sbyor bar bya/ /de bzhin bden bral phyi pa la/ /sgra yig e ni sbyor ba'i

phyir/ /rlung mtshams phyi rol pa nyid ni/ /lan gnyis ched du brjod par bya/ /dbus nas dbu ma bzung nas su/ /thig le e yig sbyor bar bya/ /mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog la/ /rnga chen lha mor grags pa yin/ /

rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung nas/ /sgra yig i ni sbyor bar bya/ /me mtshams 'dab ma gnas pa yang / /byang nas dang po pa bzung ste/ /sgra yig i ni ldan par bya/ /dbus las dbu ma de bzhin du/ /me mtshams

'dab ma dang sbyor ba'i/ /lho nas dbu ma pa dang yang / /byang nas mtha' ma bzung byas te/ /me mtshams 'dab ma ldan byas nas/ /sgra yig i ni sbyor bar bya/ /byang nas dang po bzung byas te/ /dbang ldan 'dab ma can

sbyor nas/ /de tshe de ni yang brjod de/ /de bzhin dbus las dbu ma yang / /sgra yig e ni sbyor bar bya/ /dbus las dang po de bzhin du/ /de ni lan gnyis brjod par bya/ /lho nas bzhi pa bzung nas su/ /nga ro a

yig ldan par bya/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor la/ /rdza rnga ma zhes grags pa yin/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /gling bu ma dang pi bang kun/ /rnga chen de bzhin rdza rnga
kun/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor la/ /grwa yi lha mos mchod 'grub pa'o/ /a yig dang po byas nas su/ /dbus nas dbu ma pa la yang / /me mtshams 'dab ma can ldan par/ /lho nas
dbu ma 'gyur bar bya/ /dbus las dang po de bzhin du/ /sgra yig u ni sbyor bar bya/ /me mtshams phyi rol pa bzung nas/ /dbus las dang po yang yin te/ /e yig dang ni mnyam por ldan/ /dbus

nas me rtog ma phyung ngo / /a yig dang por byas nas su/ /dbus las dbu ma pa yang ste/ /me mtshams 'dab ma dang ldan pa'i/ /lho nas dbu ma yang yin te/ /byang las bzhi pa gang yin pa/ /sgra yig u dang
sbyor bar bya/ /dbus las dang po bzung nas su/ /rdo rje spos me rnam grags so/ /a yig dang po byas nas su/ /dbus las dbu ma pa yang ste/ /me mtshams 'dab ma can ldan pa'i/ /lho las dbu mar
'gyur par bya/ /yi ge a las mnyam ldan te/ /bden bral 'dab ma gnas pa la/ /sgra yig o ni sbyor bar bya/ /shar gyi dang po de bzhin du/ /e yig ldan par gsungs pa'o/ /a yig dang po byas nas
su/ /dbus las dbu ma de bzhin yang / /me mtshams 'dab ma dang ldan par/ /lho las dbu ma 'gyur byas te/ /shar gyi gsum pa de la yang / /thig le dang ni sbyor bar bya/ /byang nas bzhi pa gang yin pa/ /

yi ge e yig lhan cig 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems pas rdo rje me tog ma dang / rdo rje bdug spos ma dang rdo rje mar me ma dang / /rdo rje dri chab ma zhes bya ba phyi'i lha mo bzhi gsungs so/ /o yig thig
le dang ldan par/ /dbus las dbu ma pa yang ste/ /me mtshams 'dab ma dang lhan cig /lho las dbu ma 'gyur ba ste/ /a yig thig le mnyam gnon par/ /rtag par brjod par bya ba ste/ /shar las dang po
bzung nas su/ /sgra yig u ni sbyor bar bya/ /dbang ldan phyi rol pa bzung nas/ /sgra yig i ni sbyor bar bya/ /tsheg drag mnyam por ldan pa ni/ /lho las dbu mar 'gyur ba'o/ /zhes bcom
ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /o yig thig le dang ldan par/ /dbus las dbu ma 'gyur byas te/ /me mtshams pa dang mnyam ldan pa'i/ /lho las dbu ma pa yang ste/ /dbus las dang

po bzung nas su/ /sgra yig a ni sbyor bar bya/ /dbang ldan phyi rol pa bzung nas/ /sgra yig a ni sbyor bar bya/ /rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung nas/ /thig le u yig sbyor ba'o/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal
don yod shin tu dga' ba'i sems dpas gsungs so/ /o yig thig le dang ldan par/ /dbus las dbu ma 'gyur ba byas/ /me mtshams 'dab ma can ldan zhing / /lho las dbu ma 'gyur bar bya/ /dbang ldan

phyi rol pa bzung nas/ /thig le nga ros brgyan byas te/ /shar gyi dbang po bzung nas su/ /sgra yig thig e dang mnyam ldan zhing / /bden bral mdab ma can du 'gyur/ /dpral bar thig les brgyan pa'o/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das
dpal rdo rje sems dpa' gsungs so/ /o yig thig le dang ldan par/ /dbus las dbu ma pa yin te/ /me mtshams 'dab ma can lhan cig /lho nas dbu ma 'gyur bar bya/ /shar las bzhi pa gang yin pa/ /

thig le nga ros rnam par brgyan/ /nub las dang po bzung nas su/ /sgra yig e ni sbyor bar bya/ /rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung nas/ /tsheg drag dang ni mnyam ldan zhing / /o yig lhan cig 'gyur ba'o/ /zhes bcom ldan

'das bde ba chen po dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /rta 'grin 'phang mtho'i lcags kyu ma dang / phag mgo mche zhags ma dang / nyi zla lcags sgrog ma dang / shi ba gso ba'i dril bu ma zhes bya ba sgo srungs ma bzhi

gsungs pa ste/ dpal rdo rje dpa'i dkyil 'khor la sngags kyi tshogs kyi phyag rgya shes pa'o/ /o yig thig le dang ldan par/ /dbus las bzhi pa gang yin pa/ /tsheg drag u yig ldan pa ste/ /shar las gnyis pa can pa yang / /

thig le nga ro gnon pa ni/ /thub chen rnam snang mdzad kyi'o/ /o yig thig le dang ldan par/ /dbus las dbu ma yang yin te/ /me mtshams 'dab ma dang ldan pa'i/ /lho las dbu ma 'gyur byas te/ /bden bral phyi rol

pa bzung nas/ /byang nas dang po pa yang ste/ /dbus nas dbu ma pa ldan pa/ /dbang ldan phyi rol la gnas pa/ /thig le dang ni ldan pa'o/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /o yig thig

le dang ldan par/ /dbus las dbu ma yang yin te/ /me mtshams 'dab ma dang lhan cig /lho las dbu ma 'gyur byas te/ /me mtshams 'dab ma can de bzhin/ /byang las dang por 'gyur byas te/ /byang las tha ma dang ldan
pa/ /mjug tu me mtshams 'dab ma can/ /zla tshes thig le gtsug gi zhal/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems pas gsungs so/ /o yig thig le dang ldan par/ /dbus las dbu ma par 'gyur te/ /

me mtshams 'dab ma can lhan cig /lho las dbu ma yang yin te/ /byang nas bzhi pa gang yin pa/ /dbus las dbu ma pa yang ste/ /me mtshams pa yi mgo gnon bya/ /dbus las tha ma gang yin pa/ /zla tshes thig le
gtsug gi zhal/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /o yig thig le dang ldan par/ /dbus las dbu ma 'gyur byas te/ /me mtshams 'dab ma dang ldan pa'i/ /lho las dbu ma 'gyur
byas te/ /shar las dang po bzung nas su/ /me mtshams can gyis gnon pa yi/ /dbus las dbu ma pa yang 'dod/ /byang las gnyis pa gang yin pa/ /zla tshes thig le gtsug gi zhal/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal

rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung ste/ /thig le nga ro ldan par bya'o/ /bden bral phyi rol pa bzung ste/ /dbus las dbu ma dang ldan pa'i/ /byang las dang po 'gyur bar bya/ /dbus las
dbu ma de bzhin du/ /i yig me mtshams ldan pa ste/ /lho las dbu ma 'gyur bar bya'o/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /lho las gnyis pa gang yin pa/ /thig le e yig sbyar

bar bya/ /dbus las dbu ma de bzhin du/ /me mtshams 'dab ma ldan pa yi/ /lho las dbu ma 'gyur byas shing / /me mtshams 'dab mar gnas pa nyid/ /byang las dang po de bzhin du/ /byang las tha ma dang 'byor pa/ /
sgra yig e dang sbyor ba'o/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal don yod shin du dga' ba'i rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /byang nas dang po bzung nas su/ /thig le me mtshams yang dag ldan/ /dbus las
dbu ma de bzhin du/ /me mtshams pa dang ldan pa la/ /lho las dbu ma 'gyur bar bya/ /dbus las dang po bzung nas su/ /byang las dbu ma yang yin te/ /dbus las tha ma dang ldan la/ /yi ge lhan cig 'gyur
ba'o/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /byang las bzhi pa gang yin pa/ /thig le nga ro ldan par bya/ /dbus las dbu ma de bzhin du/ /sgra yig i ni sbyar byas te/ /dbang ldan

phyi rol pa bzung nas/ /dbus las dbu ma dang ldan pa'i/ /de bzhin dbus las dbu ma yang / /i yig me mtshams dang ldan pa'i/ /lho las dbu ma pa 'gyur ro/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po rdo rje sems dpas

gsungs so/ /dang po sangs rgyas dbyangs ma dang / /dbang ldan phyi rol can nyid la/ /sgra yig u dang sbyor bar bya/ /bden bral 'dab mar gnas pa yang / /sgra yig a ni sbyor bar bya/ /shar las gsum pa gang yin pa/ /

e yig me mtshams pa dang ldan/ /dbus las bzhi pa gang yin pa/ /thig le i yig ldan par bya/ /byang las dbu ma phul nas su/ /de nas dbus nas tha ma ste/ /nub kyi dang po rtag tu ni/ /i yig med par brjod
par bya/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung nas/ /thig le u yig sbyor bar bya/ /dbus las dbu ma de bzhin du/ /me mtshams stan dang ldan pa

yi/ /lho las dbu ma 'gyur bar bya/ /shar las dang po gang yin pa/ /sgra yig e yis brgyan pa ste/ /dbang ldan phyi rol gang yin pa/ /sgra yig e ni sbyor bar bya/ /lho las dang po gang yin pa/ /gnyis pa ru ni sbyor

byas la/ /thig le e yig ldan par bya/ /de yang drug par 'gyur ba ste/ /byang las dbu ma de bzhin du/ /dbu ma'i tha ma yang yin te/ /nub las dang po rtag tu ni/ /a yig med par 'gyur ba'o/ /zhes bcom ldan
'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung nas/ /thig le u yig ldan par bya/ /dbus las dbu ma bzung ba dang / /me mtshams stan dang ldan pa yi/ /lho las dbu ma 'gyur byas

te/ /yi ge a dang ldan par bya/ /dbus las tha ma bzung nas su/ /bden bral 'dab mar gnas pa yang / /dbus las dang po bzung nas su/ /sgra yig a ni sbyor bar bya/ /dbang ldan phyi rol pa nyid la/ /sgra yig

e dang sbyor bar bya/ /dbus las tha ma bzung nas su/ /nub las dang po yang bzung ste/ /a yig med par byas pa ni/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi grags pa'o/ /gau rI tsau rI pra mo ha/ /be tA lI zhes bya ba bzhi/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor ma dag yin/ /

puk+ka sI dang tsaN Ta lI/ /g+has ma khrag 'thung 'dra ba bzhi/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dag yin/ /rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung nas/ /sgra yig e dang ldan par bya/ /dbus las dbu ma de bzhin te/ /me mtshams 'dab ma stan

ldan pa'i/ /lho las dbu ma 'gyur bar bya/ /me mtshams 'dab mar gnas pa nyid/ /sgra yig i dang ldan pa yi/ /byang las dang po 'gyur bar bya/ /dbus las dang po de bzhin du/ /thig le yang dag ldan pa'o/ /zhes

bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/ /dbus las dbu ma de bzhin du/ /thig le nga ro yang dag ldan/ /dbus las tha ma bzung ba dang / /yi ge a dang ldan pa yi/ /rlung mtshams phyi rol gnas par 'gyur/ /

me mtshams 'dab mar gnas pa nyid/ /byang las dang po yang yin te/ /dbus las dbu ma pa yang bzung / /e yig me mtshams dang ldan pa'i/ /lho nas dbu ma 'gyur bar bya/ /rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung nas/ /
tsheg drag o yig sbyor bas so/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal bde ba chen po rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /o yig thig le dang ldan pa'i/ /dbus las dbu ma yang yin te/ /me mtshams 'dab ma can

ldan pa'i/ /dbus las dbu ma 'gyur ba'o/ /o yig dang ni ldan pa yi/ /bden bral 'dab mar gnas de bzhin/ /lho las dang po de bzhin du/ /yi ge i yig ldan pa yi/ /byang las tha ma yang yin te/ /dbang ldan 'dab
mar gnas pa la/ /zla tshes thig le gtsug gi zhal/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal thogs pa med pa'i shin du dga' ba'i rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /me mtshams 'dab mar gnas pa la/ /zla tshes thig le gtsug

gi zhal/ /dbus las tha ma yang de bzhin/ /sgra yig a dang sbyor ba yi/ /rlung mtshams phyi rol par 'gyur te/ /dbang ldan phyi rol gnas nyid la/ /me mtshams stan dang ldan pa ste/ /sgra yig o dang sbyor bar bya/ /
bzhi par yongasu grags pa yin/ /dbus las dbu ma pa nyid dang / /me mtshams stan dang ldan pa yi/ /sgra yig i dang sbyor nas su/ /lho las dbu ma 'gyur bar bya/ /rlung mtshams phyi rol gnas pa yang / /
sgra yig i dang sbyor byas te/ /tsheg drag lhan cig 'dod pa'o/ /de dag mda' rnon 'dzin ma la sogs pa grwa'i srin mo la sogs bzhi rnams kyi'o/ /me tog ma sogs 'dus pa dang / /sgo
srungs ma sogs 'dus pa ste/ /rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor tshul gyis ni/ /ji bzhin yang dag 'byung ba'o/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal thogs pa med pa'i shin tu dga' ba'i rgyal po rdo rje sems dpas gsungs te/
rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma yi dkyil 'khor la/ sngags 'byung ba'i tshogs kyi phyag rgya shes pa'o/ /o yig thig le dang ldan par/ /dbus las dbu ma bzung byas te/ /bden bral phyi rol pa la sogs/ /dbus las

bzhi pa gang yin pa/ /sgra yig a dang sbyor bar bya/ /dbus las dbu ma bzung ba dang / /dbang ldan phyi rol gnas pa la/ /sgra yig u dang sbyor bar bya/ /byang las bzhi pa gang yin pa/ /rtseg mar de bzhin lci bar 'dod/ /

dbus las dang po bzung ba dang / /byang nas dbu ma yang yin te/ /dbus las tha ma dang sbyor ba/ /brgyad par yongs su grags pa yin/ /byang nas tha mar de bzhin du/ /o yig me mtshams dang ldan pa/ /byang nas

dang po yang yin te/ /dbus las dbu ma dang sbyor te/ /dbang ldan phyi rol gnas pa yang / /me mtshams 'dab ma bzung nas su/ /rlung mtshams phyi rol gnas pa la/ /me mtshams pa stan ldan byas te/ /tsheg drag i
yis sbyor bas so/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /o yig thig le dang ldan par/ /bden bral phyi rol gnas pa yang / /me mtshams pa yin non pa yi/ /dbus las dbu ma 'gyur

bar bya/ /byang las dang po bzung nas su/ /sgra yig a dang ldan pa yis/ /byang nas gnyis pa gang yin pa/ /shar las gsum pa gang yin dang / /byang nas dang po yang yin te/ /dbus las dang po bzung nas su/ /

byang nas dbu ma pa la yang / /dbus las tha ma dang sbyor te/ /yi ge i dang gcig par 'dod/ /lho nas dbu ma bzung nas su/ /tsheg drag lci ba kho na'o/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/ /

rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung nas/ /thig le u yig sbyor bar bya/ /dbus las dbu ma pa bzung ba/ /me mtshams pa stan ldan pa yi/ /lho las dbu ma 'gyur bar bya/ /dbus las dang po bzung nas su/ /byang nas dbu ma pa

la yang / /dbus las tha ma dang sbyor la/ /sgra yig i dang ldan par bya'o/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/ /rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung nas/ /sgra yig e dang sbyor bar bya/ /dbus las

dang po bzung ba dang / /byang nas dbu ma pa yi yang / /dbus las tha ma pa sbyor la/ /sgra yig i dang ldan par bya/ /de ni lan gnyis brjod byas te/ /dbus las dbu ma 'gyur ba la/ /thig le nga ro ldan byas la/ /
de ni drug por yongs grags so/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung nas/ /tsheg drag o yig sbyor bar bya/ /dbus las dang po bzung nas ni/ /

byang las dbu ma dang ldan pa'i/ /dbus kyi tha ma bzung ba dang / /nub las tha ma bzung ba la/ /sgra yig e ni sbyor bar bya/ /me yi 'dab mar gnas pa la/ /sgra yig a dang sbyor bar bya/ /lho las dbu ma bzung nas su/ /

thig le nga ro ldan par bya/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das shin tu dga' ba'i rdo rje sems dpas rnam par gzigs ma dang / sgrol ma dang sa 'dzin ma dang khro gnyer ma zhes pa'i pad ma'i gtso mo'i lha mo bzhis gsungs pa'o/ /

rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung nas/ /thig le u yig sbyor bar bya/ /dbus las dang po bzung ba dang / /byang nas dbu ma gang yin pa/ /dbus las tha ma dang sbyor te/ /de ni rtag par lci bar 'gyur/ /lho las dang po
bzung nas su/ /thig le dang ni mnyam por ldan/ /nub nas dbu ma pa nyid la/ /i yig dang ni ldan par bya/ /dbang ldan phyi rol pa bzung nas/ /dbus las dbu ma dang sbyor bya/ /me mtshams 'dab mar
gnas pa nyid/ /sgra yig u yis rnam par brgyan/ /rlung mtshams phyi rol pa la yang / /yi ge u dang mnyam ldan la/ /thig le nga ro yang dag ldan/ /dbus las gnyis pa gang yin pa/ /a med nub kyi
dang po'o/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/ /rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung nas/ /sgra yig e ni sbyor bar bya/ /dbus las tha ma bzung ba dang / /sgra yig e dang ldan pa yi/ /
rlung mtshams phyi rol pa 'gyur te/ /dbus las dbu ma pa nyid la/ /sgra yig i ni sbyor bar bya/ /dbang ldan phyi rol pa la yang / /dbus las dbu ma dang ldan bya/ /dbus las dang po bzung ba dang / /

byang nas dbu ma pa la yang / /dbus las tha ma dang sbyar te/ /de ni rtag lci la gyur pa/ /de bzhin dbus las tha ma yang / /sgra yig u dang sbyor bar bya/ /e yig me mtshams can ldan pa'i/ /byang las dang po

'gyur bar bya/ /bden bral phyi rol pa bzung la/ /sgra yig i ni sbyor bar bya/ /byang las bzhi pa gang yin pa/ /dbang ldan 'dab ma can gyi stan/ /rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung nas/ /thig le u yig sbyor bar
bya/ /dbu ma'i gnyis pa gang yin pa/ /nub kyi dbang po 'gyur bar bya/ /de la a yig med ces pa/ /bdag gis thams cad du ni bshad/ /ces bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /

rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung nas/ /me mtshams pa yi stan dang ldan/ /tsheg drag i yig ldan pa ni/ /dang po par ni yongs su grags/ /dbus las dang po bzung ba dang / /byang nas dbu ma yang yin la/ /dbus las tha ma dang sbyor
te/ /sgra yig i dang sbyor ba yi/ /mkhas pas lan gnyis brjod par bya/ /rlung mtshams phyi rol pa la yang / /thig le u yig gis brgyan te/ /tha mar yig ge a la yang / /thig le dang ni ldan par
bya/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung nas/ /tsheg drag o yig sbyor bar bya/ /dbus las dang po bzung ba dang / /byang las dbu ma pa la yang / /
dbus las tha ma dang sbyar te/ /sgra yig a yis brgyan par bya/ /dbus las dbu ma pa nyid la/ /sgra yig i dang sbyor bar bya/ /dbus las dbu ma nyid la yang / /dbang ldan phyi rol pa bzung nas/ /
dbus las dbu ma dang sbyar te/ /sgra yig a dang ldan pa ni/ /rtag par lci bar gyur pa yin/ /shar las dang po bzung nas ni/ /me mtshams pa yi gdan dang ldan/ /dbus las tha ma bzung ba la/ /
sgra yig a dang sbyor bar bya/ /shar las dang po bzung nas su/ /me mtshams pa yi gdan dang ldan/ /dbus las tha ma pa yang yin/ /rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung la/ /thig le u yig sbyor bar

bya/ /lho nas dbu ma de bzhin du/ /tsheg drag lci ba can ldan no/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje 'dzin pas pad ma'i na bza' dang / rdo rje pad ma'i dbang phyug ma dang / pad ma gar gyi dbang phyug ma

dang / sna tshogs pad ma zhes bya ba pad ma rigs kyi lha mo bzhi yis gsungs so/ /gling bu ma tshogs 'dus pa dang / /sgo srungs ma tshogs 'dus pa ste/ /me tog ma tshogs 'dus pa yang / /pad mas mtshan ma
'dzin par zad/ /dang po'i dkyil 'khor tshul gyis ni/ /ji bzhin yang dag 'byung ba'o/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs te/ dpal pad ma gar gyi dbang phyug gi dkyil 'khor la sngags

byung ba'i tshogs kyi phyag rgya shes pa'o/ /o yig thig le dang ldan par/ /sgra yig i dang ldan pa'o/ /bden bral phyi rol pa la yang / /byang las bzhi pa gang yin pa/ /dbang ldan 'dab ma can dang ldan/ /
dbus las bzhi pa gang yin pa/ /tsheg drag u yig sbyor bar bya/ /bden bral phyi rol pa bzung nas/ /sgra yig i yis brgyan pa ste/ /byang las bzhi pa gang yin pa/ /dbang ldan 'dab
ma can dang ldan/ /dbus las bzhi pa gang yin pa/ /sgra yig u dang sbyor bar bya/ /de bzhin dbus las dbu ma la/ /tsheg drag dang ni mnyam por ldan/ /bden bral phyi rol pa bzung nas/ /sgra yig

i dang sbyor bar bya/ /byang las bzhi pa gang yin pa/ /dbang ldan 'dab ma can dang ldan/ /bden bral phyi rol pa bzung nas/ /tsheg drag mnyam por ldan pa yi/ /dbus las tha ma pa dang ldan/ /de bzhin bden bral

phyi rol pa/ /sgra yig i dang sbyor bar bya/ /byang las bzhi pa gang yin pa/ /dbang ldan 'dab ma can dang ldan/ /dbus las bzhi pa gang yin pa/ /yi ge a dang mnyam ldan pa'i/ /rlung mtshams phyi rol pa
'gyur bya/ /de bzhin dbus las dbu ma yang / /me mtshams pa yi stan ldan pa'i/ /lho las dbu ma 'gyur bar bya/ /me mtshams 'dab ma de bzhin dang / /byang las dang po sbyor ba yis/ /byang las tha
ma 'gyur bar bya/ /dbus las dbu ma de bzhin du/ /lan gnyis par ni brjod par bya/ /de bzhin nub kyi dang po yang / /lan gnyis par ni brjod par bya/ /me mtshams pa yi stan ldan pa/ /byang las
dang po 'gyur bar bya/ /thig le a yig ldan pa yi/ /nor chen rdo rje nyi ma yin/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/ /dbus las dbu ma bzung nas su/ /me mtshams 'dab ma'i
stan ldan pa'i/ /lho las dbu ma 'gyur bar bya/ /bden bral phyi rol gnas pa dang / /dbus las dbu ma sbyor ba dang / /tsheg drag mnyam por ldan pa yi/ /lho las dbu ma 'gyur bar bya/ /me mtshams 'dab
ma can de bzhin/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /dbus las dbu ma de bzhin du/ /me mtshams pa yi stan ldan pa'i/ /lho las dbu ma 'gyur bar bya/ /me mtshams 'dab ma

can de bzhin/ /byang las dang po sbyor ba yi/ /byang las tha ma 'gyur bar bya/ /rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung la/ /thig le u yig sbyor ba'o/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /dbus las
dbu ma bzung ba dang / /me mtshams pa yi stan ldan pa'i/ /lho las dbu ma 'gyur bar bya/ /byang las bzhi pa gang yin dang / /me mtshams 'og tu ldan pa yi/ /dbus las tha ma 'byung bar bya/ /dbus las
dbu ma de bzhin du/ /thig le dang ni mnyam ldan no/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /dbus las dbu ma de bzhin du/ /me mtshams pa yi gdan sbyor ba'i/ /lho las dbu
ma 'gyur bar bya/ /shar las dang po bzung ba dang / /me mtshams pa yi mgor sbyor ba'i/ /dbus las tha ma 'gyur bar bya/ /rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung nas/ /tsheg drag e yig sbyor ba'o/ /zhes bcom
ldan 'das dpal rdo rje 'dzin pas dbang bskur ma dang / mdzod gter ma dang / rgyal mtshan mchog ma dang / mchod chen mo zhes bya ba lha mo bzhis gsungs so/ /o yig thig le dang ldan pa/ /i yig me
mtshams can ldan pa'i/ /dbus las dang po 'gyur bar bya/ /yi ge e dang mnyam ldan pa'i/ /byang las dang po yang yin te/ /dbus las dbu ma de bzhin dang / /e yig me mtshams can ldan pa'i/ /lho las dbu

ma 'gyur bar bya/ /nub nas tha ma bzung nas su/ /dbus las dbu ma yang yin te/ /sgra yig i dang sbyor bar bya/ /dbus las tha ma bzung nas su/ /nub kyi dang po de bzhin te/ /rtag par a med 'gyur ba'o/ /
zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/ /o yig thig le dang ldan par/ /dbus las dbu ma yang yin te/ /me mtshams pa yi stan ldan pa'i/ /lho las dbu ma 'gyur bar bya/ /
i yig me mtshams pa ldan pa'i/ /dbus las dang po 'gyur bar bya/ /yi ge e dang mnyam ldan pa'i/ /byang las dang po yang yin te/ /me mtshams pa yi stan ldan pa'i/ /rlung mtshams phyi rol la gnas pa/ /

tsheg drag yi ge i dang sbyar/ /de ni 'gyur bar the tshom med/ /ces bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /o yig thig le dang ldan dang / /thig le e yig ldan pa yi/ /lho las dang po 'gyur bar

bya/ /yi ge a dang mnyam ldan pa'i/ /de nas byang gi dang po ste/ /dbus las tha ma de bzhin du/ /i yig dang ni sbyor ba yi/ /nub kyi tha ma 'gyur bar bya/ /tsheg drag o yig dang ldan pa'i/ /rlung mtshams phyi rol
par gyur pa'o/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /o yig thig le dang ldan pa/ /dbus las dbu ma yang yin te/ /me mtshams pa yi stan ldan pa'i/ /lho las dbu ma 'gyur
bar bya/ /dbus las tha ma de bzhin du/ /yi ge e dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /me mtshams phyi rol par 'gyur te/ /de bzhin dbus nas tha ma dang / /yi ge a dang mnyam ldan pa'i/ /rlung mtshams phyi rol
'gyur bar bya/ /thig le u yig dang ldan pa'i/ /me mtshams phyi rol par 'gyur ro/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas mda' gzhu 'dzin ma dang / rdo rje kha T+wA~M ma dang / rdo rje nyi ma
mo dang / rdo rje bsreg bya zab mo zhes bya ba'i rdo rje nyi ma'i lha mo bzhis gsungs so/ /gling bu ma sogs 'dus pa dang / /sgo bsrungs ma sogs 'du ba ste/ /me tog ma sogs 'dus nas kyang / /
rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor la bskyed 'dod/ /ces bcom ldan 'das dpal bde ba chen po rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /rdo rje nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor las/ sngags 'byung ba'i tshogs kyi phyag rgya shes pa'o/ /
o yig thig le dang ldan pa/ /de bzhin bden bral phyi rol pa/ /thig le u yig sbyor bar bya/ /dbus las bzhi pa gang yin dang / /yi ge i dang mnyam ldan pa'i/ /byang gi tha mar 'gyur bar bya/ /yi ge
u yig dang ldan pa'i/ /bden bral phyi rol pa yin te/ /dbus las bzhi pa gang yin dang / /thig le u yig dang ldan pa'i/ /rlung mtshams phyi rol pa 'gyur te/ /rta mchog rgyal po chen po yis/ /
thams cad dus su bzla bar bya/ /las rnams thams cad 'grub pa ni/ /'joms pa las grub dran las dga'/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /o yig thig
le dang ldan par/ /de bzhin dbus las dbu ma pa/ /sgra yig i dang sbyor bar bya/ /dbang ldan phyi rol de bzhin te/ /dbus las dbu ma dang ldan bya/ /dbus las dbu ma de bzhin te/ /me mtshams pa yi
stan ldan pa'i/ /lho las dbu ma yang yin te/ /byang las bzhi pa gang yin dang / /me mtshams pa yi mnyam gnon pa'i/ /dbus las tha ma 'gyur ldan bya/ /lho las dbu ma yang yin te/ /tsheg drag
i yig ldan pa ni/ /sna tshogs pad mo zhes su grags/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /o yig thig le dang ldan par/ /i yig dang ni mnyam ldan pa'i/ /dbus las
dbu ma yang yin te/ /dbang ldan phyi rol pa bzung nas/ /dbus las dbu ma ldan par bya/ /dbus las dbu ma de bzhin te/ /me mtshams pa yi stan ldan pa'i/ /lho las dbu ma 'gyur bar bya/ /

bden bral phyi rol bzung ba dang / /dbus las dbu ma ldan pa yi/ /byang las dang po 'gyur bar bya/ /tshig drag dang ni mnyam ldan pa'i/ /rlung mtshams phyi rol pa yang yin/ /rta yi rgyal po dkyil 'khor
la/ /sna tshogs rdo rje zhes grags so/ /gang dang gang gi dbus la ni/ /rta mchog 'di ni bzhag bya na/ /de nyid de'i dkyil 'khor yin/ /yul 'khor thams cad 'dul ba'o/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das thogs
med shin tu dga' ba dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs te/ rta mchog gi dkyil 'khor la sngags 'byung ba'i tshogs kyi phyag rgya shes pa'o/ /sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha'

'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog las sngags 'byung ba'i rtog pa ste nyi shu pa'o// // de la ji ltar shin tu dga' ba nyid yin zhe na/ skyon med rtag pa gtan du ni/ /'dod chags thams cad rjes chags phyir/ /de nyid
gsang ba bcom ldan 'das/ /'dod chags chen po dga' ba che zhes/ /ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po yin zhe na/ gtan du dga' ba kun gyi mchog /gdod nas grol ba de bzhin gshegs/ /kun

du bzang po kun gyi bdag /byang chub sems mchog cho ga'o/ /de ji ltar bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i gtso bo yin zhe na/ dngos grub chen po kun gyi mchog /dbang phyug che mchog phyag rgya yis/ /

rdo rje dbang chen thugs khar bsgyur/ /rdo rje snying po gtso bo'i gtso/ /dam pa'i dang po skyes bu'o/ /de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi sems nyid yin zhe na/ bsam med rgya chen zab pa ni/ /dngos grub
thams cad zad med bde/ /kun gyi dri ma med pa ni/ /byang chub sems bdag bstan pa yin/ /de nas de'i yongasu las kyi khyad par ni/ /sems brtan nyid kyis sems dpa' ste/ /ting 'dzin sems dpa' bsgom

pa'o/ /rnam par shes pa sems dpa' te/ /rdo rje nyid yin rdo rje las/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa 'byung ba'o/ /rdo rje rdo rje zhes gsungs ni/ /nyon cig rdo rje gang gsungs pa/ /zla ba 'dra bar yang dag blo/ /rdo rje zhes su
rnam par bshad/ /de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po yin zhe na/ ting 'dzin la sogs rnams bzhi yis/ /gang gi bskyed pa yod bsgoms na/ /bsgoms na thams cad bdag nyid du/ /tshe 'di
nyid la 'grub par 'gyur/ /sems dpa'i byin gyis brlabs sbyor yang / /rang byin brlab 'di grub mchog ste/ /de nyid nyin re grub pa ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' nyid thob bo/ /de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kun

du bzang po'i spyod pa yin zhe na/ gsungs pa/ snying stobs rdul dang mun pa yang / /ci phyir sems can don du 'gyur/ /de phyir kun du bzang po yi/ /ci bzhin byang sems spyod ces 'gro/ /de la ci ltar bcom ldan
'das bdud dang bdud las rgyal ba yin zhe na/ sems de kho na bdud yin te/ /sems de kho na de bzhin gshegs/ /rang sems 'dul ba'i don du ni/ /bdag ni bdud nyid nye bar 'gro/ /de la ji ltar bcom ldan
'das/ /mngon par byang chub dang sangs rgyas yin zhe na/ rang sems so sor 'bigs pa ni/ /byang chub sems mchog rdo rje nyid/ /de nyid de las de sangs rgyas/ /rang byin brlabs mchog bsgoms

phyir ro/ /de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gtum mo mthar byed dang / phyag na rdo rje yin zhe na/ /dbyer med so sor 'bigs pa ni/ /sdang ba thams cad nges par gnon/ /sangs rgyas kun dngos rdo rje ni/ /

byang chub sems rnams brtan pa yin/ /brtan pa thams cad 'grub don du/ /rgyal ba bdag gis kun bzang gi/ /phyag la phyag mtshan de byin te/ /des de phyag na rdo rje yin/ /de la ji ltar dang po'i rigs 'byung ba
yin zhe na/ ma ni shes rab pha rol phyin/ /pha ni thabs la mkhas pa ste/ /'dul phyir rdo rje sems dpa' ni/ /skye ba bdag ni rigs yin no/ /de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das 'dod pa'i thar pa yin zhe na/

dngos grub thams cad rjes chags phyir/ /'dod chags chen po bcom ldan 'das/ /kun grub zad med bde ba yin/ /bde ba chen po zhes 'dod do/ /gsang ba khrag 'thung zhes bya ste/ /phyag rgya chen po 'grub pa'i

phyir/ /mchog ni pad+ma 'dzin rgyal po/ /dam tshig dam pa shes ldan phyir/ /dgyes pa dam pa nyi ma ste/ /sbyin pa la sogs mchog sgrub phyir/ /thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs/ /rdo rje rta mchog las

nyid phyir/ /sangs rgyas kun dngos sems dpa' ste/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas phyir rnam snang mdzad/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal chen po/ /ye shes rdo rje 'dzin mchog phyir/ /de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das rnam pa gsum
nyid yin zhe na/ 'jig rten gsum dag mtha' yas phyir/ /'dul phyir srid gsum mchog gsum bdag /thams cad nyid phyir dkon mchog gsum/ /'jig rten gsum bdag khams gsum yin/ /de la ji ltar bcom
ldan 'das thams cad nyid yin zhe na/ sems can bsod nams cher 'phags phyir/ /mi g.yo thams cad kho na bdag /sems 'du 'bral phyir g.yo ba ste/ /kun byed thams cad kho na'i phyir/ /mkha' 'gro ma bdag

lha mor gsungs/ /thams cad mdzad pas skal pa bzang / /rnam par rtog pa skal ngan par/ /brda yis mtshan mar gsungs pa'o/ /de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das dang po'i snying po dbyangs 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rgyu

yin zhe na/ /gtan du srid pa yang dag 'grub/ /dbang phyug chen po 'grub don du/ /dpa' bo'i dngos grub kun don du/ /bskal pa'i dang po bcom ldan gsungs/ /'dod chags chen po'i phyir bcom ldan/ /dam pa zad med shin tu

dga'/ /gsang nyid phyir na snying po'i dbyangs/ /hU~M yig dam pa zad med pa'o/ /de la ji ltar nye ba'i snying po de nyid kyi ye shes yin zhe na/ dkyil 'khor dag ni dman pa dang / /dam tshig dag ni spangs pa dang / /de nyid gsang ba mi

shes pas/ /rdo rje sems dpa' 'grub pa min/ /'dod pa bcom ldan sems dpa' ste/ /de kho na ni 'dod chags yang / /rdo rje phyag na rdo rje ni/ /chags bral de dang 'grub pa min/ /ling ga 'greng bar rang 'byung ste/ /

brla yi steng du bzhugs byas nas/ /ling ga mchod rten byin brlabs te/ /rdo rje dbyings ni rang bdag 'gyur/ /ling ga 'greng bar rang byung ste/ /brla yi steng du bzhugs nas su/ /ling ga rdo rjer byin brlabs te/ khrag

'thung zhes bdag sngon skye'o/ /ling ga 'greng bar rang byung ste/ /brla yi steng du bzhugs nas su/ /ling ga pad+mar byin brlabs te/ /dag pa'i chos bdag sngon skye'o/ /ling ga 'greng bar rang byung ste/ /brla yi steng du bzhugs

nas su/ /ling ga rin chen byin brlabs te/ /rdo rje nyi mar bdag sngon bskyed/ /ling ga 'greng bar rang byung ste/ /brla yi steng du bzhugs nas su/ /ling ga sna tshogs byin brlabs te/ /rta mchog dag ni sngon skye'o/ /b+ha gar
ling ga bcug byas te/ /der ni khams yig bsgom par bya/ /rnam par snang mdzad gzugs dag 'ong / /sku gnyis ldan pa spro bar bya/ /b+ha gar ling ga bcug nas su/ /de la hU~M yig bsgom par bya/ /shin du

dga' 'dra'i gzugs dag ni/ /sku gnyis ldan pa'i spro bya'o/ /b+ha gar ling ga bcug nas su/ /de la hrI yig bsgom par bya/ /khrag 'thung 'dra ba'i gzugs dag ni/ /sku gnyis ldan par spro bya'o/ /b+ha gar ling ga

bcug nas su/ /de la b+ha yig bsgom par bya/ /pad+ma 'dzin 'dra'i gzugs dag ni/ /sku gnyis ldan pa spro bya'o/ /b+ha gar ling ga bcug nas su/ /de la tra~M yig bsgom par bya/ /nyi ma 'dra ba'i gzugs dag yod/ /
sku gnyis ldan pa spro bya'o/ /b+ha gar ling ga bcug nas su/ /de la hU~M yig bsgom par bya/ /hU~M mdzad 'dra ba'i gzugs dag ni/ /sku gnyis ldan par spro bya'o/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems

dpas gsungaso/ /de nyid gsang ba gsang chen yang / /snying po yongasu grags pa yin/ /snying pos rjesu 'grub pa ni/ /nye ba'i snying por yongs gragaso/ /sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha'

'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog las gsang ba bsgrub pa'i rtog pa ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o// // de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po dang / rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig gi rgyud yin zhe na/ kun 'grub zad med bde

ba ni/ /de ni rdo rje 'grub pa ste/ /don yod dam tshig 'da' dka' yin/ /de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das dkyil 'khor gyi don yin zhe na/ ji ltar gnas su gang 'khor ro/ /de ltar sde dang 'gro ba bzhin/ /'khor dang
yang dag 'jug 'gyur ba/ /de 'dra'i dkyil 'khor skyed mchog yin/ /de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das rnam smin gyi rgyu yin zhe na/ rdo rje sems dpa' sogs lha yi/ /dkyil 'khor mngon sum mthong ba las/ /
ci 'dra brtag pa'i bsod nams su/ /phyi ni de bzhin bri bya'o/ /de la ji ltar thig gdab pa'i cho ga shes pa yin zhe na/ mkhas pas dkyil 'khor bri bya na/ /mtshams kun mnyam por 'dren par bya/ /shar

dang nub dang byang sogs phyogs/ /thig skud bzhi pa re'u mig brgyad/ /dkyil 'khor zlum po sangs rgyas kyi/ /rdo rje can gyi zla gam bzhin/ /pad ma pad+ma'i tshul yin te/ /rin chen tshul ni rin chen gyi/ /
sna tshogs kyi ni zlum por gsungs/ /ci ltar 'dod pa ci bde bas/ /nang gi dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa/ /re'u mig brgyad par 'dod pa'o/ /phyi yi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /nang gi dkyil 'khor du ni

'dod/ /re'u mig brgyad kyi dbus gnas pas/ /gtso bo'i dkyil 'khor 'dod pa yin/ /zhes dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungaso/ /de la ji ltar rtog pa'i dngos grub dam pa yin zhe na/ ji ltar bden par dkyil 'khor bdag /

gang gis rtogs par nus pa ni/ /gang gis yi dam lhar sbyor bas/ /grub pa'i dkyil 'khor ldog pa yin/ /bris sku bris pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /rang sems bris par sbyor ba yin/ /lhag chad cho gar gyur na yang / /

bsgrubs te skyon du mi 'gyuro/ /de la ji ltar gsang ba lnga'i de nyid yin zhe na/ sems dpa' gdod ma tha ma med/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che/ /kun du bzang po kun gyi bdag /rdo rje snying po gtso bo'i gtso/ /

gdod ma tha ma med phyir yang / /dam pa'i dang po zhes 'dod do/ /'khor lo kun gyi gtso phyir ni/ /dam pa dam pa'i dbang phyug yin/ /de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das gang lags ci 'dra ba yin zhe na/ 'dod pa chen po kun gyi

mchog /yid bde bas ni 'dzum pa che/ /rtag par 'dzum pa'i bde ba des/ /dam pa bcom ldan 'gyur ba yin/ /de nas de yi zla mdog ni/ /dam pa yig 'bru grub nyid phyir/ /chos rnams thams cad dag phyir dang / /

gsang ba de nyid rnam dag phyir/ /rdo rje 'dzin de zla ba'i mdog /de nas de'i sna tshogs dmar ba'i 'od 'bar ba ni/ ci phyir bcom ldan 'dod chags che/ /'dod chags kun la rjes chags phyir/ /rdo rje sems dpa'

de nyid kyang / /sna tshogs dmar po 'bar ba'i 'od/ /de la ji ltar dbang bskur ba'i shes pa yin zhe na/ thod phreng dbu rgyan las gzhan ni/ /khams gsum la ni dbu rgyan med/ /thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan ni/ /rdo rje
sems dpa' bdag sngon bskyed/ /khams gsum las ni rin chen gzhan/ /sangs rgyas rin chen 'dra ba med/ /sangs rgyas thams cad rin chen ces/ /dbu rgyan de yis rdo rje 'dzin/ /de nas ji ltar sems dpa'i
skyil mo dkrung yin zhe na/ yan lag g.yas pas mnyam gnon pas/ /g.yon pa'i yan lag gzir nas su/ /de yi sems dpa'i skyil dkrung can/ /rdo rje snying po gtso bo'i gtso/ /de nas ji ltar
rdo rje sems dpa'i lha mo la sogs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi shes pa yin zhe na/ kun mchog shin tu 'bigs pas na/ /dngos grub thams cad bde ba'i mchog /kun mchog rnam rgyal bkra shis pas/ /thams cad dbang

phyug che ru 'phags/ /grub rnams de bzhin phun sum tshogs/ /dga' ba de bzhin gtso mo bdag /rdo rje lha mo tshogs phyag rgya/ /rdo rje sems dpa' mchog gzugs yin/ /de nas ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa thams

cad kyi gsang ba chen po'i de nyid lnga yin zhe na/ me long khrag 'thung zhes bya rnams/ /mnyam pa nyid la gar dbang mchog /so sor rtog la nyi ma ste/ /bya ba la ni rta mchog dang / /chos kyi dbyings la sangs rgyas

ni/ /thub chen rnam par snang mdzad do/ /ye shes lnga yi bdag nyid ni/ /'dod chags chen po bde ba che/ /gzugs dang sgra dang de bzhin dri/ /ro dang reg bya de bzhin yang / /rdo rje sems dpa' 'dra bar ni/ /de rnams

de bzhin nyid kyis bsnyen/ /chos kyi dbyings la 'byung ba yis/ /rgya cher dngos grub ster bar 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /de nas ji ltar phyag rgya dang phyag rgya'i yan

lag gi shes pa yin zhe na/ 'phrog byed ma dang 'dzin byed ma/ /gzung thar ma dang tshe sbyin ma/ /nam mkhar 'gro dang lha mo dag /mkha' 'gro ma drug rab tu grags/ /gang gis sgra ni bstan gyur na/ /de la dpral
ba bstan par bya/ /mig la ston pa gang yin pa/ /de la lte ba bstan par bya/ /gang gis lte ba bstan pa na/ /de la mchu ni rab tu bstan/ /gang gis ma mchu rab bstan na/ /de la so ni rab tu bstan/ /gang

gis lce ni bstan 'gyur na/ /de la gsus pa bstan par 'gyur/ /gang gis b+ha ga bstan gyur na/ /de la ling ga bstan par bya/ /gang gis rjes ngar bstan na ni/ /de la brla ni bstan par bya/ /gang gis brla ni bstan gyur na/ /de la rkang mthil

bstan par bya/ /gang gis rkang mthil bstan na ni/ /de la sen mo bstan par bya/ /gang gis mchan khung bstan gyur na/ /de la smin ma bstan par bya/ /gang gis sgra sgrogs byed gyur na/ /de la cho nges bya ba'o/ /gang

gi kha yang bstan na ni/ /de la zhags pa bstan par bya/ /gang gis gsal shing bstan gyur na/ /de la mdung thung bstan par bya/ /gang gis sen mo bstan na ni/ /de la nu ma rab tu bstan/ /gang gis khu tshur
bstan na ni/ /de la mtshams su bstan par bya/ /gang gis lce ni bstan gyur na/ /de la bshang gci bstan par bya/ /gang gis mi sdug gzugs byed na/ /de la mdzes pa'i gzugs bya'o/ /gang gis he skad byed
gyur na/ /de la lag pa bstan par bya/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /de nas ji ltar mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi mtshan ma yin zhe na/ nad pa'i mig gi 'bras 'dra ba/ /dpral bar

tri shul te mdung thung / /phyin log mig dang khro gnyer can/ /nu ma dag ni mi sdug pa/ /sna ni rnam pa gnyis yin te/ /gtsug gis bskor ba shes byas te/ /ri mo gsum gyis yongasu bskor/ /de yi khyim gyi mtshan

ma ni/ /tri shUl tshung nge me long dang / /ral gri tshul dang rgyal mtshan dang / /rtse gcig khyim gyi mtshan mar bstan/ /'gro bar gyur na mkha' 'gro ma/ /'di 'dra'i mtshan ma bstan par bya/ /glo bur mi dga' bya ba dang / /don

med par yang 'jug pa'o/ /rkang pa la yang ral gri 'gyur/ /tri shrUl la dang 'dra ba'i tshul/ /skad dang bya rog 'dra ba yi/ /de ni rtag par 'gyur ba'o/ /mtshan nyid de dag dang ldan pa/ /dam pa'i mkha' 'gro ma zhes bya/ /
zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /de la ji ltar thams cad 'gugs pa'i rgyu yin zhe na/ rtog pa thams cad gsang chen po/ /rdo rje lcags kyu dril bcas pas/ /bkug

nas de nas bya ba nas/ /dril bu rjes su dkrol ba'o/ /de la ji ltar mchod pa chen po thams cad kyi cho ga yin zhe na/ rtog pa thams cad gsang chen gyi/ /gang gis dga' nas mchod pa ni/ /rjes su mchod pa dang

gzhan yang / /dbyangs dang sil snyan gar gyi yin/ /de la ji ltar rang gis rig pa'i lha thams cad bsgrub pa chen po'i rgyu yin zhe na/ rtog pa kun las bsgrub bya kun/ /g.yo dang mi g.yo 'gyur ba ste/ /rang gi

yi dam lha sbyor nas/ /thams cad de ni 'grub par bya/ /de nas ji ltar thams cad rjes su 'grub pa'i rgyu yin zhe na/ rdo rje dril bu 'dzin 'gyur nas/ /bzlas pa'i dril bu dkrol bar bya/ /rtog pa thams cad rjes

grub pas/ /mchog gi dang po 'grub pa'o/ /de la ji ltar rjes su sbyor ba dang ldan pa'i bsgrub pa thams cad kyi rgyu yin zhe na/ o yig thig le dang ldan pa'i/ /nub las dang po yang yin te/ /shar las dang po

bzung nas su/ /lci bar i yig ldan par bya/ /rlung mtshams phyi rol pa bzung nas/ /thig le u yig sbyor bar bya/ /lho las dbu ma bzung ba la/ /tsheg drag yang dag ldan par bya/ /the tshom med par de las
'dis/ /rjes su sbyor bar ldan par 'grub/ /lho las dang po bzung nas su/ /gnyis pa la ni ldan par bya/ /nan tan gyis ni i yig sbyor/ /skad cig ma las gcod 'gyur ro/ /de nyid thig le dang ldan pas/ /
byang las dbu ma yang yin te/ /de nyid lan gnyis brjod par bya/ /rlung mtshams phyi rol pa la yang / /thig le u yig ldan par ni/ /drug par yongasu grags pa yin/ /dbus las gnyis pa gang yin pa/ /

pa/ nub las dang po yang yin te/ /de ni a med shes bya ste/ /skad cig mas ni bdud rtsi 'grub/ /o yig thig le dang ldan par/ /yi ge u yig mnyam ldan pa'i/ /dbang ldan phyi rol pa yang bya/ /me mtshams phyi rol pa

bzung nas/ /yi ge e dang mnyam ldan pa/ /shar gyi dang po ldan par bya/ /tsheg drag u yig ldan pa yi/ /dbus kyi tha ma ldan par bya/ /thams cad kyi ni sgrub byed pa/ /khrag 'thung zhes pa 'byung ba'o/ /ji ltar 'dod pa

bsgrub bya 'grub/ /de nas phyin ci 'dod par 'gyur/ /ci 'dod 'dod pa bya ba yis/ /kun bzang kun byed de bzhin te/ /langs pa 'am ni 'dug pa 'am/ /'gro ba yis sam 'greng ba 'am/ /bzhad pa dang ni smra ba la/ /gang dang de ru ci de

bzhin/ /gang gang dbang po'i las nyid pas/ /gang gang de de'i rang bzhin du/ /rang gi mnyam bzhag med sbyor bas/ /rang gis rig pa'i lha 'dren no/ /de nyid sbyor ba de yis ni/ /thams cad kho na 'grub pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kun dngos

thams cad ni/ /rtag tu mthong na rab tu 'grub/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /mkhas pa gang zhig dad pas klog /de ni nyes pa rnam grol te/ /dngos grub thams cad dbang phyug 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas thams

cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha'agro ma sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog las rjes su sbyor ba dang ldan pa sgrub pa'i rtog pa ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o// //de ltar sna tshogs rjes su chags pa'o/ /dga' ba pad+ma rnam dag che ba yis/ /gsal bar

rjes su gtsang ba dam pa rtag par sbyin pa yis/ /dam pa bde ba'i dngos pos dam tshig bdag la bde ba rjesu bsgrub/ /dam pa'i dga' ba shin tu sbyor ba skal bzangs dam pa shin tu dga'/ /rang bzhin gyis ni rang bzhin dag pa rtag tu

rjesu 'grub pa'i rang bzhin dngos/ /dam pa dga' ba la sogs sbyor ba'i skal bzangs dam pa shin tu dga' ba'i rang bzhin 'grub pa'o/ /dag pa rjesu 'grub pa'i rang bzhin kho na so so rjesu grub pa bde ba las dam pa'i gsang chen rgyud

phyi ma'i phyi ma 'di yongasu rdzogs so// //bdag gi 'di ni dang ba'i snying po mchog /bde ba chen po mchog gi mchog 'gyur mthu chen po/ /kun mchog 'byung ba'i sems can rtag pa ci yi phyir/ /kun mchog sa yi dbang po

nyid ni sbyor ba po/ /mtha' yas thob med thogs pa med pa'i phyir/ /tshul chen po yi chen po thams cad kyi/ /mkha' dang 'dra ba'i mchog gi dngos grub 'phel ba sbyin/ /gnod ma phra ma med pa gang dag gis/ /rdzogs byed

med pa nus pa ma yin no/ /sems can le lo can dang nyung tsam 'dod pa dang / /mi dad pa dang lkog smra ba dang ma dag pa/ /rtag tu rjes su chags dang chags bral dga' ba dang / /de rnams phan pa'i don tshogs pa'i don
'di yin no/ /gang gi khyim du bzung bar gang gis gyur pa dang / /bdag gis ji ltar ston pa sgrub par byed pa 'am/ /mthu yis thams cad so sor mngon du gyur pa ste/ /dngos grub mchog gis rgyas pa'i las

dag mi 'grub pa'o/ /gang gis grub pa rdo rje 'dzin zhes sogs pa dang / /gzugs sogs thams cad 'di la ji ltar mos pa bzhin/ /yi ge hU~M yang ji ltar rab tu 'dod par bris byas na/ /des ni rang 'dod dngos

grub cho ga bzhin du 'thob/ /sems can don du las dag byed pa ma yin pas/ /rgyal ba dag gis rnam par dag pa 'di la ni/ /bgegs med de bzhin du ni bdud kyang med pa ste/ /rtog pa yis kyang dngos grub 'phel

stobs byin gyis rlobs/ /gang gi rtog pa mchog chen 'di sgrub byed pa la/ /bdud nyid du ni mi 'gro mi brtan nyid kyang min/ /brten pa'i rgyu ni bdag gis ston par mi byed de/ /myur bar mchog gi mchog nyid 'grub

phyir bstan par 'gyur byed do/ /gang gis bdag gi snying pos bdag la rtag tu grub byed ni/ /mchog chen dngos grub dang ni rtag par bde chen dang / /chags dang shin tu dga' dang brtan dang rgyas pa dang / /yig chen yang
ni rtag par bdag gis 'grub par byed/ /de nas mchog skyes rgyal ba thams cad dga' nas su/ /'dzum pa chen po thams cad khyab par rnam par 'byed/ /kun bdag dbyings kyi rdul phran mchog chen gzugs
dag gis/ /kun nas de la legs pa'i sgu ni dbul bar byed/ /bdag gis dbyings kun rjes su che mchog gzugs kyis su/ /pha mchog gyur pa sangs rgyas kun gyis legs so legs/ /
mchog gi rdo rje las byung khyod ni legs so legs/ /dam pa'i chos nyid chos kyi bdag nyid legs so legs/ /dam pa'i las can mchod pa'i bdag nyid legs so legs/ /rtogs pa'i byin brlabs mdzod cig

mnyam par byin brlabs kyis/ /don yod dngos grub rtag tu yig 'bru chen po yi/ /grub pas phyi na mi 'dul ba yi dus su ni/ /de dag gi yang ji ltar dam pa'i bder 'gyur phyir/ /de ltar ngag chen zhus nas su/ /
sras bcas sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/ /rdo rje sems dpa' chen po yis/ /gsungs pa la ni mngon par bstod/ /sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba'i mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog

ces bya ba khri brgyad stong pa las rtogs pa thams cad kyi rgyal po brgya bcu bdun pa rdzogs s+ho// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po smr-i ti dz+nyA na kIr ti nyid kyis bsgyur/ yon bdag bod kyi mkhan po gzhon nu
grags pas zhus te bshad nas gtan la phab cing zhus/ /

@#/ /rgya gar skad du/ he badzra tan tra rA dzA nA ma/ bod skad du/ kye'i rdo rje zhes bya ba rgyud kyi rgyal po/ kye'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa

thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi snying po rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga rnams la bzhugs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi snying po rje btsun gsang ba las shin du ches gsang ba'ang de nas

bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ e ma'o byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying po snying rje chen po legs so legs so/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dang / sems dpa' chen po dang / dam tshig sems dpa'
chen po dang snying po kye'i rdo rje zhes bya ba nyon cig /rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ gang phyir rdo rje sems dpa' lags/ /ji ltar sems dpa' chen po lags/ /gang gis dam tshig sems dpa' lags/ /bcom
ldan 'das kyis bdag la gsungs/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /rdo rje mi phyed ces byar brjod/ /sems dpa' srid pa gsum gcig pa/ /'dis ni shes rab rigs pa yis/ /rdo rje sems dpa' zhes

byar brjod/ /ye shes chen po'i ros gang ba/ /sems dpa' chen por brjod par bya/ /rtag tu dam tshig la spyod phyir/ /dam tshig sems dpar brjod par bya/ /rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ ming bsdus pa ni ji lta

bu/ /gang zhig kye yi rdo rje lags/ /he yi rnam pas ci zhig bshad/ /badzra yis kyang de bzhin cing / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /he ni snying rje chen po nyid/ /badzra'ang shes rab brjod par bya/ /thabs

dang shes rab bdag nyid rgyud/ /de ni nga yis bshad kyis nyon/ /lta stangs dgug dang brda chen dang / /don chen rnams mang brjod pa dang / /rengs par byed dang skrod pa nyid/ /sde rengs byed dang mngon spyod dang / /ji ltar
This is a blank page without image

rigs pa rnal 'byor ma'i/ /bskyed dang gnas dang byed rgyu dang / /don byed ye shes rnam shes dang / /lha rnams ji ltar 'byung ba'o/ /he ru ka ni bskyed pa'i rgyu/ /dang por gcig ni bsgom par bya/ /rdo rje snying po snying rje che/ /

dngos po nyid kyis rnam grol zhing / /dngos po'i 'ching bas 'ching bar 'gyur/ /yongs su shes pas grol ba yin/ /dngos po med par yongs shes pas/ /dngos po bsgom 'gyur shes rab can/ /dngos po med pa yongs shes pa/ /de ltar he ru ka bsgom

bya/ /lus la ye shes chen po gnas/ /rtog pa thams cad yang dag spangs/ /dngos po kun la khyab pa po/ /lus gnas lus la ma skyes pa'o/ /rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ kye bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i lus la rtsa du lags/ bcom

ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rtsa rnams ni sum bcu rtsa gnyis te/ byang chub kyi sems sum bcu rtsa gnyis 'bab pa bde ba chen po'i gnas su 'dzag pa'o/ /de rnams kyi nang nas rtsa rnams pa gsum ni gtso mo ste/ rkyang ma dang ro ma dang /

kun 'dar ma'o/ /rkyang ma shes rab rang bzhin gyis/ /thabs kyis ro ma yang dag gnas/ /kun 'dar ma ni dbus gnas su/ /gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam par spangs/ /rkyang ma mi bskyod 'bab pa ste/ /ro ma de bzhin khrag 'bab cing / /shes

rab zla ba 'bab bshad pa/ /de ni kun 'dar ma rab grags/ /mi phyed ma dang phra gzugs ma dang rtse ba ma dang / g.yon pa ma dang thung ngu ma dang / rus sbal skyes ma dang sgom pa ma dang / dbang ma dang skyon ma dang 'jug ma dang ma mo dang / bsil sbyin

ma dang tsha ba ma dang / brkyang ma dang kun 'dar ma dang ro ma dang / gzhol ma dang rangs ma dang / shin tu gzugs can ma dang / spyi ma dang rgyu sbyin ma dang / sbyor bral ma dang sdug gu ma dang / grub ma dang 'tshe ma dang / de bzhin du yid bzangs ma dang /

gsum skor ma dang / 'dod ma dang khyim ma dang / gtum mo dang bdud bral ma'o/ /rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ kye bcom ldan 'das sum bcu rtsa gnyis po 'di rnams ji ltar lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /

srid gsum yongs gyur thams cad ni/ /gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam par spangs/ /yang na thabs ni thams cad kyis/ /dngos po'i mtshan nyid du ni brtag /sdom pa'i dbye ba'ang bshad par bya ste/ A li dang kA li ni zla ba dang / nyi ma dang /

shes rab dang thabs so/ /chos dang longs spyod rdzogs pa dang / sprul pa ni sku dang / gsung dang / thugs so/ /e ba~M ma ya ni/ e yi rnam pas lha mo spyan/ /ba~M gi rnam pas bdag mar brjod/ /ma ni lha mo gos dkar

mo/ /ya yi rnam pas sgrol mar brjod/ /sprul pa'i 'khor lo la pad+ma 'dab ma drug bcu rtsa bzhi dang / chos kyi 'khor lo la 'dab ma brgyad dang / longs spyod rdzogs pa'i 'khor lo la 'dab ma bcu drug dang / bde ba chen po'i

'khor lo la 'dab ma sum bcu rtsa gnyiso/ /'khor lo'i grangs kyi rim pas rnam par gzhag pa/ skad cig ma bzhi ni rnam pa sna tshogs dang / rnam par smin pa dang rnam par nyed pa dang / mtshan nyid dang bral ba'o/ /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi ni

sdug bsngal ba dang / kun 'byung ba dang 'gog pa dang lam mo/ /de kho na nyid bzhi ni bdag gi de kho na nyid dang sngags kyi de kho na nyid dang / lha'i de kho na nyid dang ye shes kyi de kho na nyid do/ /dga' ba bzhi ni dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba dang dga' bral

gyi dga' ba dang / lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'o/ /sde pa bzhi ni gnas brtan pa dang / thams cad yod par smra ba dang / kun gyis bkur ba dang / dge 'dun phel chen no/ /zla ba dang nyi ma dang / A li dang kA li dang / 'pho ba bcu drug dang /

dbyug gu drug bcu rtsa bzhi dang / chu tshod sum bcu rtsa gnyis dang / thun tshod bzhi ste/ de ltar thams cad bzhi bzhi'o/ /lte bar gtum mo 'bar ba yis/ /de bzhin gshegs pa lnga bsregs shing / /spyan la sogs pa yang bsregs te/ /

bsregs nas ri bong can ha~M 'dzag /rdo rje rigs kyi le'u ste dang po'o// // sngags kyi le'u bshad par bya'o/ /\u0f00 a kA ro mu khaM sar+b+ba d+har+m+mA NAM Ad+ya nuta pan na twA ta \u0f00 AHhU~M phaT swA hA/ 'byung po thams cad kyi gtor ma'i sngags so/ /

buM A~M dzrI kha~M hU~M/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sa bon no/ /\u0f00 de ba pi tsu badzra hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ kye'i rdo rje'i snying po'o/ /sngags thams cad kyi rkang pa dang por \u0f00 gyi rnam pa dang / mthar ni swA hA dang / hU~M phaT kyi rnam pa ni nang

du gzhug go/ /\u0f00 a ka tsa Ta ta pa ya sha swA hA/ grong khyer dkrug pa'i sngags so/ /a A i I u U r-i r-I l-i l-I e ai o au aM aH rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi sa bon no/ /\u0f00 trai lo kyA k+She pA ya hU~M` hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ phyag gnyis pa'i 'o/ /

\u0f00 dz+wa la dz+wa la b+h+yo hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ phyag bzhi pa'i 'o/ /\u0f00 ki Ti ki Ti badzra hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ phyag drug pa'i 'o/ /\u0f00 AHhU~M/ sku dang gsung dang thugs byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags so/ /\u0f00 rak+Sha rak+Sha hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ sa sbyang ba'i sngags

so/ /\u0f00 hU~M swA hA/ rengs par byed pa'o/ /\u0f00 aM swA hA/ dbang du byed pa'o/ /\u0f00 kham swA hA/ skrod par byed pa'i'o/ /\u0f00 dzrIM swA hA/ sdang bar byed pa'o/ /\u0f00 buM swA hA/ mngon spyod kyi'o/ /\u0f00 hU~M swA hA/ 'gugs par byed pa'o/ /

\u0f00 g+huHhA swA hA/ gsod par byed pa'i'o/ /\u0f00 ku ru kul+le hrIHswA hA/ ku ru kul+le'i sngags so/ /AHphuH'i rnam pas mtha' yas kyi gzugs brnyan byas la bdud rtsi lngas ni blugs/ me tog nag pos ni mchod/ klu 'dul bar byed pa'i

khu bas ni byug /glang po che'i chang gis ni mgo bo byugs/ kham phor kha sbyor du ni bzhag /ba nag mo'i 'o mas ni dgang / gzhon nu ma nag mos bkal ba'i skud pas ni dkri/ rlung gi phyogasu rdzing bu byas te mtha' yas der bzhag go/ /de'i

'gram du dkyil 'khor bzhings par bya ste/ dur khrod kyi sol bas ni rdul tshon nag po/ skyes pa'i rus pa'i phye mas ni rdul tshon dkar po/ ldong ros kyis ni rdul tshon ser po/ dur khrod kyi so phag gis ni rdul tshon dmar po rkun ma'i

lo ma dang / skyes pa'i rus pa'i phye ma dag gis ni rdul tshon ljang khu ste/ rdul tshon 'di rnams kyis dkyil 'khor bzhengs so/ /dur khrod kyi srad bus thig gdab cing dkyil 'khor khru gsum pa bya ste/ de'i dbus su mtha' yas

mnan pa'i kye'i rdo rje zhal brgyad pa/ zhabs bzhi pa phyag bcu drug gis brgyan pa/ spyan nyi shu rtsa bzhis phye ba/ 'jigs pa 'ang 'jigs par mdzad pa bri'o/ /de nas slob dpon gyis nang gi ma rungs pa'i sems kyis dben pa'i gnas su

sngags bzla ste/ \u0f00 g+hu ru g+hu ru g+hu Tu g+hu Tu/ ma sa ma sa g+ha Ta g+ha Ta/ g+ho Ta ya g+ho Ta ya/ a nan ta k+Sho b+ha ka rA ya nA gA d+hi pa ta ye he he ru ru ka sab+ta bA tA la/ ga tAM na n+Da ga A kar Sha ya bar Sha ya gar+dz+dza ya tar+dz+dza ya/ phuHphuHphuHphuHphuHphuH

phuHphuHhUM hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ gal te char mi 'bab na de'i tshe sngags 'di bzlog la bzlas te char 'bab bo gal te mi 'bab na de'i tshe mgo ardza ka'i dog pa ltar 'gas so/ /char 'bab pa zhes bya ba'i cho ga'o/ /sprin dral ba bshad de dur

khrod kyi ras la nye bar 'dug nas sngags bzlas shing dral te/ \u0f00 Ar+ya sma shA ni pri yA ya hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ sprin dral ba'i cho ga'o/ /pha rol gyi sde rnam par gzhig par bya ba'i phyir kha Ti kA'i bsgrub pa bshad de/ kha Ti kA dang bdud rtsi lnga dang /

ku thA ra ts+tshin na lhan cig btags la ril bu bya ste/ \u0f00 badzra karta ri he badzrA ya hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ dngos grub kyi don du bye ba bzlas shing sngon du bsnyen pa 'bum bzlas te/ de bzlas la ril ba spyi blugs kyi mgrin pa bskor nas bcag na dgra thams

cad kyi mgo med par 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje gri gug gi cho ga'o/ /lha rnams dag par 'dod pas thig le bsgrub ste tshangs pa'i sa bon rgyal la bsgrubs nas/ ku ThA ra ts+tshin na dang bsres la nyi ma gzas zin pa na mi bskyod pa dang btag cing btags

nas dgra sta bya ste/ de rkang pas mnan nas sngags bzlas te/ \u0f00 badzra ku ThA ra pA Ta ya pA Ta ya hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ bye ba bzlas la thig le byas te gang la phyag byas pa de 'gas so/ /lha dgas pa'i cho ga'o/ /tsha bas gdung bar bya bar 'dod

pas ar+k+ka'i lo ma la dug dang ske tshe dang tsi tri ka'i khu bas dgra bo'i ming bri zhing 'bras phub kyi me la gdungs te sngags khri bzlas so/ /\u0f00 he badzra dz+wa ra dz+wa ra sha trUM b+h+rUM hUM hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ tsha ba'i cho ga'o/ /khri bzlas pas 'grub bo/ /chang skyug

par bya bar 'dod pas bsgrub bya'i lte bar yaM gi rnam par bsgom zhing maM gi rnam par gyur pa las chang lto bar rnam par bsgoms te skyugs par byed par bltas na chang skyug go/ /rab tu myos ma dbang du bya bar 'dod pas mya ngan

med pa'i brgyud la mya ngan med pa'i 'og tu song ste gos dmar po bgos nas myos byed kyi 'bras bu bza' zhing / kA kA tsi kA'i khu bas thig le byas nas sngags bzlas te/ \u0f00 a mu kI me hrIH ba si b+ha ba tu swA hA/ khri

yis 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /zla ba dang nyi ma dbang du bya bar 'dod pas sA lu btags pa tsam gyis 'gyur ba la zla ba dang nyi ma byas nas rdo rje'i chu la gzhug cing sngags bzlas te/ \u0f00 badzra ar+k+ka mA tsa la mA tsa la tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha he badzrA ya hU~M

hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ bye ba phrag bdun bzlas te nyi ma dang zla ba yang dag par gnas shing nyin mtshan bye phrag med par 'gyur ro/ /zla ba dang nyi ma rnam par 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i cho ga'o/ /\u0f00 na grA na grA zhes bya ba'i sngags 'dis

dus ma yin pa'i dus su don bsgrub pa'i phyir gzhon nu ma'i mig dag la brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bsngags nas me tog la sogs pa'i mchod pa rnam pa lngas yang dag par mchod cing snyan gsan dbab bo/ /bcu bzhi pa'am brgyad

pa'i snga ba'i dus su bum pa la sogs pa gzhag cing 'bru mar dang a la k+Ta'i khu ba la sngags 'di nyid kyis lan brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bsngag so/ /de nas mngon par bsngags pa'i a la k+ta'i khu bas sngags pa'i 'the 'ong rgan po

la bskus nas 'bru mar gyis kyang blugs la gzhon nu ma la bstan te nga'i rdzas sus khyer smos de la des smras pa/ che ge mo zhes bya bas khyer ro/ /rdo rje skar ma'o be Tu yA be Tu yA zhes brjod na glang po che 'bros par 'gyur ro/ /mam+mA

mam+mA zhes brjod na stag 'bros par 'gyur ro/ /te l+li yA te l+li yA zhes brjod na bse 'bros par 'gyur ro/ /i li mi li phuHphuHzhes brjod na sbrul 'bros par 'gyur ro/ /nor skyong 'dul ba'i phyag gis lag pa rab tu bstan na khyi 'bros par 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje ma dang / dkar mo dang / chu ma dang / rdo rje mkha'

'gro ma dang / bdag med ma dang / sa spyod ma dang / mkha' spyod ma'i rnal 'byor las rengs par byed pa la sogs pa brtul zhugs can gyis byed do/ /sngags kyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // de nas lha'i le'u bshad par bya'o/ /dang por

byams pa bsgom par bya/ /gnyis par snying rje rnam bsgom zhing / /gsum par dga' ba bsgom pa dang / /kun gyi mthar ni btang snyoms so/ /yang ni stong pa'i byang chub ste/ /gnyis pa la ni sa bon bsdu/ /gsum pa la ni

gzugs brnyan rdzogs/ /bzhi pa la ni yig 'bru dgod/ /re phas nyi ma sngon du rnam bsgoms nas/ /nyi der hU~M byung sna tshogs rdo rje ste/ /rdo rje de nyid kyis ni ra ba dang / /gur bcing ba yang rnam par bsgom pa nyid/ /dang por ro ni

rnam bsgoms pa/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi bdag nyid brjod/ /de stengs rnal 'byor pa gnas nas/ /he ru ka nyid rnam par bsgom/ /rang gi snying gar re pha bsgom/ /de las byung ba'i nyi dkyil 'khor/ /der ni hU~M gi rnam pa nyid/ /thabs

dang shes rab rang bzhin can/ /hU~M las byung ba'i rdo rje ni/ /kha dog nag po 'jigs chen po/ /rdo rje lte ba'i dbus gnas par/ /yang ni hU~M gi de nyid bsgom/ /hU~M gi rnam pa gyur bltas nas/ /zhe sdang bdag nyid rnam par bsgom/ /rdo rje

skye ba nag po che/ /'dam skyes sngon po 'dra ba'i mdog /yang na sngo dang nyi ma'i mdog /dad pas nges par rnam par bsgom/ /nam mkhar rje btsun bltas nas ni/ /rdo rje skye ba snying rje che/ /rgyan rnams thams cad 'dzin pa yi/ /lha mo brgyad po

rnams kyis mchod/ /dkar mo ri dgas mtshan ma 'dzin/ /chom rkun bdud las rgyal ba'i snod/ /ro langs ma ni chu lag ma/ /g+hasma rI ni sman 'dzin cing / /puk+ka sI ni rdo rje'i lag /de bzhin ri khrod ma ro 'dzin/ /gdol pa mo ni cang te'u rdung / /

'di rnams kyis ni gtso bo mchod/ /'dod chags chen po rjes chags pas/ /g.yung mos sku la 'khyud pa nyid/ /A li zla ba kA li nyi/ /sa bon nang du son gyur pa/ /de nyid sems dpa' zhes byar brjod/ /mchog tu dga' ba'i rang bzhin can/ /

nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor khyab pa yi/ /rang gis lus mtshungs rnam par spro/ /bsdus nas snying gar dgug pa na/ /yo gi zhe sdang bdag nyid 'gyur/ /sngo dang nyi ma mtshungs pa'i mdog /ban du dmar po'i spyan dang ldan/ /skra ser

gyen du 'khyil ba dang / /phyag rgya lngas ni rnam par brgyan/ /'khor lo rna cha nor bu dang / /lag gdub dang ni ska rags nyid/ /sangs rgyas lnga ni rnam dag pa/ /'di rnams phyag rgyar rab tu grags/ /sdang mig brgyad gnyis lo yi tshul/ /g.yon

na rdo rje thod pa dang / /g.yon pa nas kyang kha T+wA~M ga /g.yas na rdo rje nag po nyid/ /hU~M gi yi ge 'don pa'i bdag /rnal 'byor ma brgyad yongs bskor nas/ /dur khrod du ni mgon po rol/ /dbugs rgyu zhes bya'i rigs pa 'dis/ /dur khrod ces ni mngon

par brjod/ /phyag bzhi ni bdud bzhi las rnam par rgyal ba rnam par dag pa ste/ gong du brjod pa'i gzugs dang / sku mdog dang hU~M las byung ba'o/ /phyag g.yon gyi dang po na skyes pa'i thod pa lha dang lha ma yin gyi khrag gis bkang ba/ de

bzhin du g.yas kyi phyag na rdo rje/ phyag lhag ma dag ni shes rab la 'khyud pa/ shes rab rdo rje phag mo ni bcom ldan 'das kyi gzugs can no/ /phyag drug pa/ zhal gsum pa/ g.yon dmar ba/ g.yas zla ba dang nyi ma lta bu dang po sngon

po/ gcer bu gong du brjod pa'i sku mdog dang gzugs can/ phyag rnams ni pha rol du phyin pa drug rnam par dag pa'o/ /phyag g.yon gyi dang po na rtse gsum pa/ phyag g.yas kyi dang po na rdo rje/ phyag g.yon gyi gnyis pa na dril bu/ phyag

g.yas kyi gnyis pa na gri gug /phyag lhag ma dag gis rdo rje lu gu rgyud ma la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / bcom ldan 'das ji lta ba de ltar shes rab ste/ g.yas pa dang g.yon pa na gri gug dang thod pa/ khams gsum gyi bdag nyid can gyi ro

mnan pa'o/ /lha'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// // de nas lha dbang bskur ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o/ /rang gi snying gar sa bon bsam mo/ /sa bon las 'od zer nag po lcags kyu'i rnam pa'i gzugs kyis phyung nas/ des khams gsum

du bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad spyan drangs la ma mo brgyad kyis yang dag par mchod nas gsol ba gdab par bya'o/ /\u0f00 a b+hi Shiny+tsaM tu mAM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta zhes sangs rgyas de rnams he ru ka'i rnam pa'i gzugs kyis de bzhin gshegs

pa lnga'i bdag nyid kyi bdud rtsi lngas gang ba'i bum pas dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /dbang bskur ba na me tog gi char 'bab par 'gyur ro/ /rnga'i sgra 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /gur gum gyi char 'bab par 'gyur ro/ /gzugs kyi rdo rje ma la sogs

pa rnams kyis mchod par bya'o/ /rdo rje'i glu spyan ma la sogs pa rnams kyis blang bar bya'o/ /dbang bskur nas spyi bor rang gi rigs kyi bdag por 'gyur ro/ /'dis ni he ru ka rdzogs pa nyid do/ /thun gsum du byin gyis

brlabs pa'i bsgom pa rnam par bsgoms nas langs te lha'i gzugs su gzhag go/ /dbang gi le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // de nas de kho na nyid kyi le'u bshad par bya'o/ /ngo bos gzugs med mthong ba po/ /sgra med thos pa

po yang med/ /dri med snom pa po yang med/ /ro med myong ba po yang med/ /reg med reg pa po yang med/ /sems med sems las byung ba yang med/ /skyed byed ma dang sring mo nyid/ /rnal 'byor rig pas rtag tu mchod/ /gar ma chos ma rdo rje ma/ /gdol

ma de bzhin bram ze mo/ /thabs dang shes rab cho ga yis/ /de nyid rig pas rtag tu mchod/ /ji ltar bye bar mi 'gyur bar/ /rab tu 'bad pas bsten pa nyid/ /ma gsang sbrul dang chom rkun dang / /sa spyod me yis sdug bsngal byed/ /rigs lnga'i

phyag rgya zhes bya ba/ /thar pa'i rgyur ni brjod par bya/ /rdo rje 'dis ni gdab pa nyid/ /des na phyag rgyar brjod par bya/ /rdo rje pad+ma de bzhin las/ /de bzhin gshegs dang rin chen nyid/ /snying rje chen po dam pa yi/ /rigs ni rnam pa

lnga ru brjod/ /rdo rje'i phyag rgya g.yung mo nyid/ /de bzhin pad ma'i gar ma nyid/ /las ni tshos mar rab tu bshad/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i bram ze mo/ /rin chen gdol mar shes par bya/ /phyag rgya lngar ni rnam par nges/ /
'di rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs/ /mdor bsdus pas ni brjod par bya/ /dpal ldan de bzhin nyid gshegs shing / /de bzhin slar yang gshegs pa nyid/ /'dis ni shes rab rigs pa

yis/ /de bzhin gshegs zhes brjod par bya/ /rigs ni rnam pa drug brjod cing / /mdor bsdus pas ni rnam pa lnga/ /sku gsung thugs kyi dbye ba yis/ /phyi nas rnam pa gsum du 'gyur/ /rigs dang 'byung ba lnga

rnams dang / /phung po lnga yi rang bzhin gyi/ /rigs dang bgrang bya 'di yis ni/ /rigs zhes mngon par brjod par bya/ /bsgom pa po med bsgom pa'ang med/ /lha med sngags kyang yod ma yin/ /spros pa med pa'i rang bzhin las/ /sngags

dang lha ni yang dag gnas/ /rnam snang mi bskyod don yod dang / /rin chen dpag med sems dpa' dang / /tshangs pa khyab 'jug zhi ba dang / /thams cad sangs rgyas de nyid brjod/ /tshangs pa sgrib bral sangs rgyas nyid/ /'jug phyir

khyab 'jug brjod par bya/ /rtag tu dge bas zhi ba nyid/ /thams cad kun gyi bdag nyid gnas/ /dam pa'i bde bas de nyid de/ /bde ba rtogs phyir rnam sangs rgyas/ /gang phyir lus las byung ba nyid/ /lha zhes mngon par brjod

par bya/ /sangs rgyas 'di la b+ha ga mnga'/ /bcom ldan 'das zhes brjod par bya/ /b+ha ga rnam pa drug tu brjod/ /dbang phyug la sogs yon tan kun/ /yang na nyon mongs la sogs bdud/ /'jom phyir bcom ldan 'das

zhes brjod/ /gang phyir skye 'gro skyed pa yis/ /shes rab ma zhes brjod par bya/ /gang phyir skal ba ston pa yis/ /shes rab sring mo zhes bya nyid/ /btso blag ma dang bu mo dang / /gar mkhan mar yang brjod par bya/ /

sems can thams cad 'tshod pa'i phyir/ /btso blag ma zhes de bzhin brjod/ /yon tan 'jo phyir shes rab ni/ /bu mo zhes ni brjod par bya/ /snying rje chen po g.yo ba'i phyir/ /shes rab gar mar brjod par bya/ /gang phyir bcom

ldan mi reg pa/ /de phyir g.yung mor brjod par bya/ /A li kA li rab brtags pas/ /brjod pa bzlas par yang dag bshad/ /rkang pa'i rjes ni dkyil 'khor nyid/ /nyid phyir dkyil 'khor brjod par bya/ /lag pa sgyur ba phyag rgya yin/ /sor mo nyid pa'ang
de bzhin no/ /gang phyir rnam sems bsam gtan ni/ /gang bsams de ni bsam gtan no/ /ji ltar ba las bde thob pa/ /de yi bde ba rang gis bza'/ /bde ba gang gis 'ching ba 'di/ /de yi bde ba bsam gtan

brjod/ /de kho na nyid kyi le'u ste lnga pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang rab bshad bya/ /spyod pa pha rol phyin mchog nyid/ /gang gis dngos grub mthar 'gro ba/ /kye yi rdo rjes dngos grub rgyus/ /bsgom pa po yis rnam 'dzin pa/ /

rna ba dag la sna cha bzang / /spyi bor 'khor lo rnam par 'dzin/ /lag pa dag la lag gdub gnyis/ /rked pa la yang ska rags nyid/ /rkang par de bzhin rkang gdub bo/ /lag pa'i rtsa bar dpung rgyan nyid/ /mgrin par rus

pa'i phreng ba ste/ /bgo ba stag gi lpags pa nyid/ /bza' ba mi 'chi bcu phyed de/ /he ru ka sbyor skyes bu ste/ /kha dog lnga la rnam par gnas/ /rigs lnga dag dang mnyam ldan pa/ /rigs ni gcig tu rnam par brtag /kha dog du

ma nyid kyis ni/ /gang phyir dbye ba mtshon mi bya/ /shing gcig dang ni dur khrod dang / /ma mo'i khyim dang mtshan mo dang / /yang na dben pa'am pas mtha' ru/ /bsgom pa bzang por brjod par bya/ /cung zad drod ni thob pa na/ /gal te spyod pa byed

'dod pas/ /gal te 'grub 'gyur 'dod yod na/ /'dis ni spyod pa bya ba nyid/ /shin du bzhin bzangs mig yangs ma/ /rang gis dbang bskur snying rje can/ /rdo rje'i bu mo 'di khyer nas/ /spyod pa bya bar rtogs par bya/ /rdo rje rigs kyi

dngos med na/ /rang 'dod lha yi rigs kyis bya/ /yang na gzhan gyi rigs byung ba/ /byang chub sa bon gdab pa dang / /sbyang ba yis ni bzung bar bya/ /gal te dga' bas glu blang ste/ /de tshe rdo rje mchog ldan no/ /gal te dga' ba skyes pa na/ /thar pa'i rgyur
ni gar bya ste/ /de tshe rdo rje rkang pas gar/ /yo gis mnyam par bzhag pas byed/ /'khor lo'i gzugs kyis mi bskyod pa/ /rna cha'i bdag nyid 'od dpag med/ /mgul gyi phreng ba rin chen bdag /lag gdub

rnam par snang mdzad brjod/ /ska rags la ni don yod gnas/ /kha T+wA~M ga gzugs shes rab ste/ /thabs kyi gzugs kyis cang te'u nyid/ /zhe sdang rnam dag rnal 'byor pa/ /glu ni rnam dag sngags su gnas/ /gar ni bsgom pa byas pa

nyid/ /de yi phyir na glu dang gar/ /yo gi rtag tu rtag tu byed/ /sman ni rnam par bza' ba ste/ /chu ni rtag par btung ba nyid/ /rga shis zil gyis mi non cing / /rtag tu bsrung bar 'gyur ba yin/ /rkun ma'i skra las cod pan byas/

de la hU~M byung sbyar bar bya/ /sangs rgyas lnga yi thod pa rnams/ /rnal 'byor spyod pas rnam par 'dzin/ /thod pa sor lnga pa yi tshad/ /byas pas cod pan 'dzin par byed/ /thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin las/ /skra yi ska rags

nyis skor nyid/ /thal ba skra yi mchod phyir thogs/ /rnal 'byor pa yi spyod pas 'dzin/ /cang te'u sgra ni bzlas pa ste/ /kha T+wA~M ga bsgom shes rab nyid/ /rdo rje thod pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /'di dag bzlas dang bsgom pa yin/ /

brkam dang rmongs dang 'jigs dang khro/ /ngo tsha'i 'bras bu rnam par spang / /bdag nyid kyi ni gnyid spangs nas/ /the tshom med par spyod pa bya/ /lus kyis sbyin pa byin nas ni/ /phyi nas spyod pa yang dag spyad/ /skal dang skal min rnam dpyad

pas/ /de phyir sbyin pa sbyin mi bya/ /bza' bca' de bzhin btung ba nyid/ /ji ltar rnyed pa rab tu bza'/ /yid 'ong mi 'ong rnam rtog phyir/ /zhen pa tsam du mi bya'o/ /bza' dang bza' min spyod pa dang / /de bzhin btung dang btung min

nyid/ /bgrod dang bgrod min sngags pa yis/ /rnam rtog nyid du mi bya'o/ /dngos grub rnyed pa'i slob ma gang / /yang dag ye shes snang ba po/ /mnar med spang ba'i rgyu yi phyir/ /grub pas bla ma mngon phyag 'tshal/ /

bslab dang dbang las rnam par grol/ /de bzhin ngo tsha'i 'bras bu nyid/ /dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin gyi/ /yo gis rnam dpyad snying rje che/ /sbyin sreg mchod sbyin dka' thub 'das/ /sngags dang bsam gtan rnam par spangs/ /dam tshig sdom

las rnam par grol/ /rnal 'byor ldan pas spyod pa byed/ /nges par sngon du lha min gang / /brgya byin lta bu yin na yang / /de la 'jigs par mi bya ste/ /seng ge'i gzugs kyis rnam par rgyu/ /sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/ /

rtag tu snying rje btung bar bya/ /rnal 'byor btung dga' rnal 'byor pa/ /gzhan gyis btung bas bzi ba med/ /spyod pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// // de nas ts+tshom+mA'i le'u bshad par bya'o/ /gang gis spun dang sring mor yang / /the tshom med

par shes par bya/ /gang zhig sor mo gcig ston dang / /gnyis kyis legs par 'ongs pa yin/ /g.yon pa'i 'the 'ong bcangs pa las/ /bsnyun gyi phyag rgyar rnam par shes/ /gang zhig srin lag ston pa lta/ /de yi 'the'u chung

rnam par sbyin/ /gang zhig gung mo ston pa la/ /de yi 'dzub mo rnam par sbyin/ /gang zhig srin lag ston pa la/ /de la mgrin pa rab tu bstan/ /gang zhig gos ni ston pa la/ /de yi rtse gsum rab tu bstan/ /gang zhig nu ma

ston pa la/ /de yi mtshams ni rab tu bstan/ /gang zhig so ni ston pa la/ /de yi kha ni rab tu bstan/ /gang zhig khro gnyer ston pa la/ /gtsug phud dgrol bar brjod par bya/ /gang zhig dpral ba ston pa la/ /de yi rgyab ni
