rab tu bstan/ /gang zhig rkang mthil ston pa la/ /lto yis rnam par rtse bar bya/ /phyag rgya phyag rgya'i lan gyis ni/ /dam tshig gis ni rnam par dbye/ /de la rnal 'byor mas smras pa/ /e ma bu ni snying rje che/ /

gal te phreng ba lag ston na/ /'du bar bya zhes smra ba yin/ /phreng ba mngon par btang byas na/ /dam tshig la mnos brtul zhugs bzang / /de la phyi rol zhes 'du ba/ /bzang po'i spyod yul la gnas pa/ /
de la 'du bar rnal 'byor mas/ /gang smras de ltar thams cad bya/ /kye bcom ldan 'das 'du ba'i gnas du lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /gnas dang nye ba'i gnas dang ni/ /zhing dang nye ba'i

zhing nyid dang / /ts+tshan do nye ba'i ts+tshan do dang / /de bzhin 'du ba nye 'du ba/ /'thung gcod nye ba'i 'thung gcod nyid/ /dur khrod nye ba'i dur khrod nyid/ /'di rnams ni bcu gnyis te/ /sa bcu'i dbang phyug mgon po nyid/ /'dis ni gzhan

gyis brjod mi bya/ /kye bcom ldan 'das gnas la sogs pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /gnas ni dzA lan+d+ha rar bshad/ /de bzhin du ni u T+yan nyid/ /gnas ni kol la gi ri nyid/ /de bzhin du ni kAm rU

nyid/ /nye gnas ma la wa zhes brjod/ /sin d+hu na ga ra nyid do/ /zhing ni mum+mu nir bshad de/ /zhing ni byed pa'i brang nyid do/ /de wi ko Ti de bzhin zhing / /zhing ni lcags pa'i brang nyid do/ /nye zhing ku la ta zhes brjod/ /

de bzhin arbu da nyid dang / /ba yi mchog sbyin kha ba'i ri/ /nye ba'i zhing ni mdor bsdus pa'o/ /ts+tshan do ha ri ke la dang / /lan tshwa rgya mtsho'i nang skyes dang / lam pa ka dang kam tsi nyid/ /de bzhin sau rASh+T+ra nyid do/ /nye ba'i ts+tshan do ka

ling ka /gser dang ldan pa'i gling dang ni/ /kong ka NA yang nye ts+tshan dor/ /mdor bsdus pas ni brjod par bya/ /'thung gcod grong khyer gyi dang yang / /'thung gcod grong gi mthar gnas pa/ /tsA ri tra dang ko sa la/ /

bin d+h+ya gzhon nu'i grong khyer ro/ /rdo rje snying po snying rje che/ /nye ba'i 'thung gcod de nye ba'o/ /dur khrod rab son dge 'dun dang / /dur khrod rgya mtsho'i 'gram nyid do/ /bskyed tshal ra ba rdzing bu'i 'gram/ /nye ba'i dur khrod

brjod par bya/ /sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/ /rnal 'byor ma rgyud kye'i rdo rje/ /rnal 'byor ma'i legs 'du ba/ /nyin par nyid kyang rab bshad bya/ /kye bcom ldan 'das nyi ma gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das

kyis bka' stsal pa/ /yid dgas zla phyed bcu bzhi dang / /de bzhin du yang brgyad pa nyid/ /rgyal mtshan dang ni mtshon bsnun nyid/ /lan bdun pa yang bza' bar bya/ /'bad pas snying rje bskyed pa yis/ /bsad par

bya bar brjod pa nyid/ /snying rje med na mi 'grub pas/ /de phyir snying rje bskyed pa nyid/ /thams cad gdug pa gzhug pa ste/ /cho ga'i gtso bos dgag par bya/ /de la 'di ltar blta ba nyid/ /nyin mo bcom ldan rdo rje

can/ /mtshan mo shes rab brtag par bya/ /mi bya cung zad yod ma yin/ /rtag tu mi bza' yod ma yin/ /'di la mi bsam yod ma yin/ /bzang ngan mi smra gang yang med/ /ji ltar bdag nyid de ltar gzhan/ /de bzhin bdag ni nga mchog nyid/ /'di ltar

sems pa'i rnal 'byor bdag /bza' dang btung ba la sogs spyad/ /yan lag ji snyed bsgyur ba dang / /tshig rnams rab tu rgyas pa nyid/ /he ru ka dpal gnas bzhugs pas/ /de snyed sngags dang phyag rgya yin/ /

shrI ni gnyis med ye shes te/ /he ni rgyu sogs stog pa nyid/ /ru ni tshogs dang bral ba nyid/ /ka ni gang du'ang mi gnas pa'o/ /rdo rje thod pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /skye bo gang dang gang rnams kyi/ /sha ni mkhas pas

bza' bar bya/ /sems can de de dbang du 'gyur/ /brda dang gnas gtan la phab pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// // de nas rnal 'byor ma'i 'khor lo bshad par bya'o/ /nam mkha'i khams su b+ha ga bsam/ /dbus su rnam par

bsgom pa ni/ /'khor lo sngon du ci rigs par/ /lha rnams ji ltar 'byung ba nyid/ /'khor lo sa dang chu ni sngo/ /ji ltar rigs par byin za dang / /lha rnams kyis ni rlung chen dang / /ji ltar bsgom pa 'byung ba yang / /chos 'byung las

skyes 'khor lo nyid/ /'phar ma gnyis dag skyon med pa/ /ze'u 'bru las ni gcig 'gyur te/ /gru gsum gyis ni phyi mar brjod/ /de dbus shi ba bcwa lnga yi/ /gdan gyi bdag nyid rnam par bsam/ /de yi steng du zla ba yin/ /zla ba'i steng du sa
bon nyid/ /phyi nas bdud las rgyal bas mnan/ /gnyis 'dus pa las bde chen po/ /A li zla ba'i gzugs kyis gnas/ /kA li'i gzugs kyis snang byed do/ /zla ba nyi ma 'dus pa las/ /dkar bo la sogs

rab tu grags/ /zla ba me long ye shes ldan/ /bdun gyi bdun pa mnyam nyid ldan/ /rang lha'i sa bon phyag mtshan ni/ /so sor rtogs par brjod par bya/ /thams cad gcig gyur nan tan nyid/ /rdzogs pa chos dbyings

dag pa ste/ /mkhas pas cho ga gsungs pa yis/ /rnam pa lnga po bsgom pa nyid/ /A li kA li mnyam sbyor bas/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i nyid kyi gdan/ /yi ge las byung gong bu la/ /hU~M phaT rnam pa'ang 'dod mi bya/ /
sems dpa'i gzugs brnyan las byung ba'i/ /dkyil 'khor bdag po rnam par bsgom/ /phyag mtshan zhal sogs gong ma bzhin/ /zla ba chu shel nor bu'i 'od/ /thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin las/ /'di ltar thams

cad rdzogs pa nyid/ /zla ba nyi ma'i rab dbye bas/ /A li shes rab kA li thabs/ /'di las dkar mo la sogs pa/ /kha dog dbye bas so so yin/ /re shig nang gi 'phar ma la/ /rnal 'byor ma lnga nges gnas pa/ /phung po lnga yi

rang bzhin gyis/ /rnal 'byor rig pas rtag tu bsgom/ /dbang por rdo rje gshin rjer dkar/ /chu bdag chu'i rnal 'byor ma/ /lus ngan rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma/ /dbus su bdag med rnal 'byor ma/ /phyi rol gyi ni 'phar ma la/ /dkar mo chom

rkun ro langs ma/ /g+hasma rI dang puk+ka sI/ /ri khrod ma dang gdol pa ma/ /brgyad pa Dom bi nI ru brjod/ /'og ldan ma dang steng ldan nyid/ /mkha' spyod ma dang sa spyod brjod/ /srid dang zhi ba'i rang bzhin gyis/ /snying rje chen po 'di dag gnas/ /

lha mo thams cad kha dog gnag /drag chen phyag rgya lnga yis brgyan/ /zhal gcig spyan ni dmar ba rnams/ /lag par gri gug thod pas khyab/ /'khor lo rna cha mgul rgyan dang / /lag par lag gdub ska rags nyid/ /sangs rgyas lnga ni rnam dag

pas/ /'di lnga phyag rgya dag pa'o/ /ji ltar bdag med rnal 'byor ma/ /de ltar thams cad par bshad/ /lag pa gcig ni thod pas brel/ /g.yas pa na ni gri gug 'dzin/ /g.yon pa kha T+wA~M ga nyid do/ /stag gi lpags pas rnam dkris

shing / /ro la zhon zhing gzi brjid 'bar/ /phyag gnyis gyen du dbu skyes ser/ /nga rgyal la sogs skyon drug rnams/ /gcod phyir gri gug rnam par gnas/ /dngos dang dngos med rnam rtog gi/ /mgo bo'i pad ma'i snod du ni/ /bdud rnams

rnam pa bzhi yi khrag /dngos grub phyir ni btung bar bya/ /sdong pa'i rnam pas kha T+wA~M ga /thabs kyis ro ni rnam par brtag /'dis ni'i 'khor lo rnam bsgoms na/ /dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur/ /dang por nag po rab tu bsgom/ /

gnyis par dmar po rnam par bsgom/ /gsum pa la ni ser po bsgom/ /bzhi par ljang khu de bzhin no/ /lnga par kha dog sngon po dang / /drug par dkar po'i lus can te/ /yan lag drug bsgom rnal 'byor pas/ /dga' bral mthar

yang de bzhin no/ /skyed pa'i rim pa nyid dang ni/ /rdzogs pa'i yang ni rim pa nyid/ /rim gnyis mnyam par gnas nas ni/ /rdo rje can gyis chos 'chad do/ /bskyed pa yi ni cha bshad do/ /nam mkha'i khams ni pad+ma la/ /b+ha ga zhes

bya ye shes brjod/ /bsgom pa zhes bya snyoms 'jug nyid/ /de yi bde ba 'khor lor brjod/ /sngon du byung ba zhu ba nyid/ rim pa ji bzhin rang rig nyid/ /lha zhes bya ba byang chub sems/ /ji ltar 'byung ba khu ba yin/ /lhan cig skyes pa

rnam pa gnyis/ /re shig btsun mo shes rab yin/ /skyes bu thabs su brjod pa nyid/ /kun rdzob don dam dbye ba las/ /phyi nas de yi rnam pa gnyis/ /re shig skyes bu rnam pa gnyis/ /de yi khu ba'ang bde ba nyid/ /skyes bu ji bzhin

shes rab la'ang / /de yi khu ba'ang bde ba nyid/ /de nyid phyir na dga' ba nyid/ /bzhi yi rab tu dbye ba yis/ /skye med rim pa'i phyogs las ni/ /'di ltar lhan cig skyes rnam bzhi/ /dga' ba dang po dpa' bo nyid/ /mchog tu dga'

ba rnal 'byor ma/ /shin tu bde dga' thams cad nges/ /de bde thabs las thams cad rig /dga' ba bde ba cung zad de/ /mchog tu dga' ba de las lhag /dga' bral dga' ba chags bral yin/ /lhag ma lhan cig skyes

dga' nyid/ /dang por rig par 'dod pa dang / /gnyis pa bde bar 'dod pa nyid/ /gsum pa 'dod chags 'jig pa nyid/ /des na bzhi pa bsgom par bya/ /mchog tu dga' ba srid par brjod/ /dga' bral las ni mya ngan 'das/ /

dbu ma dga' ba tsam nyid de/ /'dis ni lhan cig skyes pa spangs/ /'dod chags med cing chags bral med/ /dbu mar dmigs par mi 'gyur ro/ /'di la thabs dang shes rab med/ /yang dag de nyid snang ba'o/ /gzhan

gyis brjod min lhan cig skyes/ /gang du yang ni mi rnyed do/ /bla ma'i dus thabs bsten pa yis/ /bdag gis bsod nams las shes bya/ /dman pa 'bring dang mchog rnams dang / /gzhan rnams gang rnams de rnams kyang / /ro

mnyam de nyid bsgoms pa yis/ /'di kun mnyam pa nyid du blta/ /dman pa gnas ni phra ba'i don/ /mchog ni dngos por brjod par bya/ /dbu ma gnyis kyis spangs pa nyid/ /gzhan rnams zhes bya dbang po drug /gang rnams de rnams

brtan dang g.yo/ /'di kun zhes bya nga nyid de/ /mnyam nyid mtshungs par 'dod pa nyid/ /ro mnyam de nyid bsgoms pas ni/ /mnyam zhes bya ba mtshungs par brjod/ /de yi 'khor lo ro zhes brjod/ /bsgoms pa ro gcig mnyam pa nyid/ /

'dis ni don gyis brjod par bya/ /nga las 'gro ba thams cad 'byung / /nga las gnas gsum po yang 'byung / /nga yis 'di kun khyab pa ste/ /'gro ba'i rang bzhin gzhan ma mthong / /de ltar rnal 'byor pas shes na/ /shin du mnyam

gzhag gang goms pa/ /bsod nams chung ba'i mi yis kyang / /de ni grub par the tshom med/ /bza' dang btung ba blugs pa dang / /nyal dang log dang sems pa na/ /phyag rgya chen po mngon 'dod pas/ /de nas sngon du 'gro

bar 'gyur/ /gang phyir yid kyis mi bsgom par/ /'gro ba thams cad bsgom par bya/ /thams cad chos ni yongs shes na/ /bsgom pa nyid ni bsgom pa min/ /brtan dang g.yo ba'i dngos po gang / /rtswa lcug 'khri shing la sogs pa/ /

bdag gi dngos po'i rang bzhin las/ /dam pa'i de nyid nges bsgom bya/ /de rnams dam pa gcig yod min/ /rang rig bde ba chen po nyid/ /rang rig nas ni byang chub 'gyur/ /rang rig phyir na bsgom pa nyid/ /rang gis rig pa'i

'gyur ba las/ /dman pa las ni las skyes te/ /rang gis 'phrogs cing rang gis byed/ /rang rig rgyal po rang gtso bo/ /'dod chags zhe sdang phrag dog dang / /de bzhin gti mug nga rgyal nyid/ /de kun de gnas nyams dga'

bar/ /bcu drug char yang mi phod do/ /chos 'byung las skyes ye shes ni/ /mkha' mnyam lhan cig thabs dang bcas/ /thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin las/ /'jig rten gsum po de las skyes/ /khu ba'i rnam pa bcom ldan

nyid/ /de yi bde ba 'dod mar brjod/ /gcig dang du ma bral ba ste/ /skad cig gcig las mchog dga' ba/ /rang gis rig pa'i ye shes 'di/ /bdag gis lam 'das spyod yul te/ /'di ni byin brlabs rim pa'i phyir/ /kun

mkhyen ye shes de lta bu/ /sa dang chu dang rlung dang ni/ /me dang nam mkha' nyid dag ni/ /rang gzhan rig pa'i tshor ba yis/ /kun gyis skad cig mi non de/ /mtho ris mi yul rkang 'og gi/ /skad cig las ni gzugs gcig

'gyur/ /rang gzhan cha yi rnam rtog gis/ /gnon pa nyid ni nus pa min/ /thams cad rig byed grub mtha' dang / /de bzhin las rgyas la sogs pas/ /srid pa dag 'gyur dngos grub min/ /yang ni srid mthar skye bar

'gyur/ /'jig rten 'di dang pha rol du/ /de med pas kyang dngos grub med/ /gang gis mi shes kye rdo rje/ /de yi ngal ba don med 'gyur/ /chu bo'i rgyun ni rab 'bab dang / /mar me'i rtse mo rab bcings ltar/ /rtag tu de
nyid rnal 'byor gyis/ /nyin dang mtshan du rnam par gzhag /rnal 'byor ma'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba 'du ba'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// // de nas mchog tu rnam par dag pa'i le'u bshad par bya'o/ /nges par

dngos po thams cad kyi/ /dag pa de bzhin nyid du brjod/ /phyi nas re rer dbye ba yis/ /lha rnams kyis ni brjod par bya/ /phung po lnga dang dbang po drug /skye mched drug dang 'byung chen lnga/ /rang bzhin gyis ni rnam par
dag /nyon mongs shes bya'i sgrib sbyang bya/ /rang rig bdag nyid dag pa nyid/ /dag pa gzhan gyis rnam grol min/ /yul gyi dngos po dag pa'i phyir/ /rang gis rig pa'i bde ba mchog /gzugs la sogs
pa'i yul rnams dang / /gzhan yang rnal 'byor pas mthong ba/ /dngos po de kun dag pa ste/ /'di ltar 'gro ba sangs rgyas bdag /kye bcom ldan 'das rnam par ma dag pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa/ gzugs la sogs pa'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i dngos po'i phyir ro/ /rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ kye bcom ldan 'das gzung ba dang 'dzin pa gang lags/ bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /mig gis gzugs ni gzung bar bya/ /sgra ni rna bas mnyan par bya/ dri ni sna yis tshor bar bya/ /lce yis ro ni myang bar bya/ /dngos po lus kyis reg par bya/ /yid
kyis bde sogs thob pa ni/ /dag pas dug med byas nas ni/ /bsten bya 'di dag bsten pa nyid/ /gzugs phung rdo rje ma yin te/ /tshor ba la yang dkar mor brjod/ /'du shes chu yi rnal 'byor ma/ /
'du byed rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma/ /rnam shes phung po'i tshul gyis ni/ /bdag med rnal 'byor ma gnas so/ /rtag tu 'di dag rnam dag pas/ /de nyid rnal 'byor pas 'grub

'gyur/ /nang gi 'phar ma la'o/ /de nas phyi yi 'phar ma bshad/ /dbang ldan du ni puk+ka sI/ /mer ni de bzhin ri khrod ma/ /bden bral gdol pa mo gzhag cing / /rlung du g.yung mo rnam par bzhag /phyi nas lha mo dkar mo

sogs/ /dbang dkar gshin rjer chom rkun ma/ /chu bdag phyogs su ro langs ma/ /lus ngan por ni g+hasma rI/ /'og tu sa spyod ma zhes brjod/ /steng du mkha' spyod ma zhes bshad/ /bskyed pa'i rim pa nyid kyi phyogs/ /srid

dang zhi ba'i rang bzhin gyis/ /lha mo 'di gnyis rnam par gnas/ /gzugs la dkar mo rtag tu bshad/ /sgra la chom rkun ma rab grags/ /dri yi cha la ro langs ma/ /ro la g+hasma rI rab grags/ /reg la sa spyod ma zhes

bshad/ /chos kyi dbyings la mkha' spyod ma/ /rtag tu 'di dag rnam dag pas/ /de nyid rnal 'byor pas 'grub 'gyur/ /phyag gi dag pa stong pa nyid/ /bdud dag pa las zhabs rnams nyid/ /rnam thar brgyad kyis zhal

rnams nyid/ /rdo rje gsum gyis dag pa'i spyan/ /sa ni puk+ka si zhes bshad/ /chu khams rngon pa mo zhes brjod/ /me ni gtum mor shes par bya/ /rlung ni g.yung mor rab tu grags/ /zhe sdang zhes bshad rdo rje

ma/ /'dod chags chu yi rnal 'byor ma/ /phrag dog rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma/ /ser sna gsang ba'i dkar mo nyid/ /gti mug de bzhin rdo rjer bshad/ /zhe sdang la sogs rnam sbyong ba/ /bskyed pa'i rim pa'i phyogs la ni/ /

'dis ni phung po sbyang bar bya/ /gang dang gang gis 'jig rten 'ching 'gyur ba/ /de dang des ni 'ching ba las grol te/ /de nyid mi shes 'jig rten mi grol zhing / /de nyid rnams spangs dngos grub rnyed mi 'gyur/ /de phyir dri med sgra med

gzugs nyid med/ /ro dang sems kyi rnam par dag pa med/ /reg med chos med thams cad rnam par dag /rang bzhin dag pa'i 'gro la 'gro bar shes/ /rnam par dag pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// // de nas ji ltar dkyil 'khor gyi/ /

rim pa yang dag rab tu bshad/ /gang gis slob ma dbang bskur ba'i/ /cho ga rab tu bshad par bya/ /dang por lha yi bdag nyid kyi/ /rnal 'byor pas ni nor 'dzin sbyang / /'bad pas hU~M las rdo rje can/ /byas te phyi nas dkyil 'khor bri/ /

tshal dang skye bo med gnas dang / /byang chub sems dpa'i khyim dang ni/ /dkyil 'khor khang pa'i nang du yang / /dkyil 'khor dam pa rab tu bzhengs/ /rdul tshon dam pa'i tshon dang ni/ /yang na 'bring po nyid kyis te/ /rin chen lnga yi

phye ma 'am/ /yang na 'bras la sogs pas so/ /de nas dkyil 'khor khru gsum dang / /'the bong gsum ni lhag par bya/ /der ni rigs lnga las byung ba'i/ /rig ma bzang mo rnams par gzhug /yang na ji ltar gang rnyed de/ /de ltar bcu

drug lon pa nyid/ /ji srid khu ba ldan gyur pa/ /de srid phyag rgya bsten par bya/ /phyag rgya'i gdong ni bcing ba dang / /thabs kyi gdong yang de bzhin no/ /bsten pa de las gang byung ba/ /slob ma'i khar ni btung bar bya/ /ro mnyam slob ma'i

spyod yul nyid/ /de nyid la yang bya bar bya/ /rang rig ye shes nyid du 'gyur/ /rang gzhan yang dag rig pa spangs/ /mkha' mnyam rdul bral stong pa nyid/ /dngos dang dngos med bdag nyid mchog /thabs dang shes rab shin tu 'dres/ /

chags dang chags bral rnam par 'dres/ /de nyid srog chags rnams kyi srog /de nyid yi ge dam pa nyid/ /de nyid 'gro ba'i bdag nyid de/ /de nyid thams cad khyab pa po/ /thams cad lus la rnam par gnas/ /dngos dang dngos med

de las byung / /gzhan dang gang rnams de rnams dang / /rnam par shes pa kun gyi tshul/ /skyes bu sngon rabs dbang phyug dang / /bdag dang gso ba sems can dang / /dus dang gang zag nyid dang ni/ /dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin
'di/ /sgyu ma'i gzugs kyis yang dag gnas/ /dang po dga' ba tsam nyid de/ /gnyis pa'i grangs las mchog dga' nyid/ /gsum pa las ni dga' bral bshad/ /bzhi pa lhan cig skyes par brjod/ /de bzhin gshegs

pa rnams dang ni/ /rdo rje snying po la sogs kun/ /mkhas pas de skad nges thos na/ /mchog tu ngo mtshar gyur nas ni/ /brgyal zhing sa la 'gyel bar 'gyur/ /dang po dga' ba 'gro ba'i gzugs/ /de bzhin mchog dga' 'gro ba

nyid/ /dga' bral dga' ba'ang 'gro ba nyid/ /gsum pa lhan cig skyes pa med/ /bcom ldan bka' stsal kye'i rdo rje/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gcig pa/ /rdo rje snying pos rtogs bya'i phyir/ /the tshom legs par sel
ba ni/ /'dod chags med cing chags bral med/ /dbu mar dmigs par mi 'gyur ro/ /gsum po spangs pa nyid kyi phyir/ /lhan cig skyes pa byang chub brjod/ /yang na de nyid thams cad bdag /yang na kun gyis

rnam par spangs/ /de yang dga' bral dang por mtshon/ /dga' ba gsum po rnam par spangs/ /dngos po sprin dang 'dra ba yin/ /grub pa sgyu ma lta bu 'gyur/ /nyal dang log pa'i khyad par las/ /rtag tu rmi lam
'dra bar 'gyur/ /dngos grub mtshan nyid mi phyed pa'i/ /phyag rgya rnal 'byor pa yis 'grub/ /ston pas dkyil 'khor 'di skad gsungs/ /gru bzhi yang dag 'bar ba nyid/ /sgo bzhi gzi brjid chen po ste/ /

do shal do shal phyed pas brgyan/ /phreng ba sna tshogs rnga yab ldan/ /ka ba brgyad kyis nye bar brgyan/ /rdo rje srad bu mnyam par ldan/ /me tog sna tshogs nye bar brgyan/ /bdug pa mar me de bzhin dri/ /bum pa
brgyad la sogs pa ldan/ /de yang yal ka la sogs brgyan/ /mgrin pa gos kyis dgab pa dang / /rin chen lnga ni yongs su gzhug /rnam par rgyal ba shar du sbyin/ /rang 'dod lha yi gzugs kyis ni/ /sar

pa legs par bkal ba dang / /shin tu tshad ma mdzes pa yi/ /srad bus shes rab can gyis gdab/ /'khor lo'i bdag po'i bzlas pa 'bum/ /dkyil 'khor can gyi de bzhin khri/ /gong du gsungs pa'i sngags nyid kyis/ /
mkhas pas nor 'dzin rnam par sbyang / /gong gi a sogs sngags kyis ni/ /de la gtor ma rnam par sbyin/ /ji ltar bsam gtan de bzhin 'dir/ /bsrungs pa ji ltar gsungs pa nyid/ /gang zhig dbang ni
rab phye ba/ /rang gi dkyil 'khor cho gas sbyin/ /mchod dang gsol ba gdab pa nyid/ /ji ltar bshad pa de bzhin 'dir/ /'phar ma gnyis bzang rnam bris nas/ /myur du dkar mo la sogs bri/ /shar du gri gug

rnam par bri/ /lho dang nub du'ang de bzhin no/ /byang dang me yi mtshams dang ni/ /bden bral rlung du'ang de bzhin no/ /dbang ldan du ni ci gsungs pa/ /de lta de ltar 'og dang steng / /rdo rje sems dpa'i snyems byas nas/ /

rkang pa g.yas pa brkyang byas te/ /phyag gnyis kye'i rdo rje sbyor bas/ /slob dpon dkyil 'khor 'jug pa nyid/ /khrus dang gtsang sbra dri zhim lus/ /sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan/ /hU~M hU~M snyems pa byas nas ni/ /
hI hIHrnam par 'jigs byed bdag /phyi nas de nyid yang dag bshad/ /rnam dag ye shes gzugs can dang / /'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das/ /khyad par cung zad yod ma yin/ /mchog gar bsgom pa med cing sgom

pa po yang med/ /lus kyang med cing gzung ba med dang 'dzin pa'ang med/ /sha dang khrag kyang med cing bshang dang gci ba'ang med/ /skyug bro rmongs med gtsang sbra mchod phyir thogs med dang / /chags med sdang ba med dang

rmongs med phrag dog med/ /ser sna med dang nga rgyal med cing mthong bya med/ /sgom dang sgom pa po med bshes dang dgra med cing / /rlom sems med pa'i lhan cig skyes pa'i sna tshogs nyid/ /rdo rje snying pos 'di
skad gsol/ /gzod nas rang bzhin med pa yi/ /lus kyi rang bzhin dag pa ni/ /ci slad 'byung ba'i bdag nyid lags/ /de nas bcom ldan rdo rje can/ /mkha' 'gro bde ba sbyin pas gsungs/ /rlom sems
med pa'i rang bzhin bdag /thams cad lus la rnam par gnas/ /kye bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du 'byung ba chen po pa'i phung po lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /bo la kak+ko la sbyor bas/ /reg pa

sra ba'i chos kyis ni/ /sa ni de las skye bar 'gyur/ /byang sems khu ba'i rnam pa las/ /chu yi khams ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ /bskyod pa las ni drod skye ste/ /'gro bas rlung du rab tu grags/ /bde ba namakha'

nyid kyi khams/ /lnga po rnams kyis yongs su bskor/ /gang phyir 'byung ba che bde ba/ /de phyir bde ba de nyid min/ /lhan cig skyes pas gang skyes pa/ /lhan cig skyes par de brjod bya/ /rang bzhin lhan cig

skyes zhes brjod/ /rnam pa thams cad sdom pa gcig /phyag rgya rgyu dang bral ba las/ /yo gi snying rje thabs su 'gyur/ /stong nyid snying rje dbyer med pa/ /byang chub sems zhes rab tu brjod/ /sngags kyi

bzlas med dka' thub med dang sbyin bsreg med/ /dkyil 'khor can yang med cing dkyil 'khor yang ni med/ /de ni sngags bzlas de bka' thub dang de sbyin bsreg /de ni dkyil 'khor can dang de ni dkyil 'khor nyid/ /mdor

bsdus nas ni sems ni 'dus pa'i gzugs can no/ /dbang gi le'u zhes bya ste bcu pa'o// // mnyam par ma rungs dpral ba can/ /rtag tu ltung bar byed par brjod/ /dbang gi lta stangs g.yon na gnas/ /g.yon pa

nas ni gzugs brnyan gnyis/ /g.yas pa'i cha la dgug pa nyid/ /steng nas kyang ni gzugs brnyan gnyis/ /dbu ma rengs pa'i lta stangs nyid/ /sna yi rtse mo'i dbus su gnyis/ /dbyung ba nyid kyis ltung bar byed/ /

rngub pa yis ni dbang du byed/ /dgang ba yis ni dgug pa nyid/ /gzhil ba yis ni rengs par byed/ /rlon pa'i shing la ltung byed nyid/ /dbang ni me tog rab tu grags/ /rdo rje'i shing la dgug pa nyid/ /g.yo bcas rtswa la rengs byed
nyid/ /zla drug goms pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom mid/ /'di la 'khrul pa mi bya ste/ /sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul bsam mi khyab/ /lta stangs bzhi po bsgrubs nas ni/ /mkhas pas sems

can gzhug par bya/ /gsad par 'di la bya ma yin/ /dam tshig nges par nyams par 'gyur/ /sems can slu ba spangs nas ni/ /bya ba ma yin thams cad bya/ /sems can gnod pa tsam gyis ni/ /phyag rgya'i dngos grub

rnyed mi 'gyur/ /de la dam tshig bza' bya ba/ /na dang ga ha dang po dang / /mtha' yi shwa dang dang po'i shwa/ /kye'i rdo rje yi dngos grub phyir/ /bdud rtsi lnga yang de bzhin bza'/ /kye yi rdo rjes gsungs mtshan nyid/ /skye ba bdun pa de nas

mtshon/ /dga' bral dga' ba la smod pa/ /lan bdun pas ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /skad snyan mig dang ldan pa dang / /dri lus gzi brjid chen po dang / /de yi grib ma bdun du 'gyur/ /mthong nas rnal 'byor pa yis mtshon/ /de ni zos

pa tsam gyis ni/ /skad cig las ni mkha' spyod 'gyur/ /ku ru kul+le'i sgrub thabs bshad par bya ste/ gong du brtag pa bcu gnyis par/ /rgyas par gsungs pa mdo ru bsdu/ /hrIHlas byung ba'i lha mo ni/ /kha dog dmar zhing
phyag bzhi ma/ /mda' dang gzhu yi lag pa ma/ /ud pa la dang lcags kyu 'dzin/ /'di ni bsgoms pa tsam gyis ni/ /'jig rten gsum po dbang du byed/ /'bum phrag gcig gis rgyal po rnams/ /khri yis 'jig rten

phal pa nyid/ /bye bas phyugs dang gnod sbyin sogs/ /'bum phrag bdun gyis lha ma yin/ /'bum phrag gnyis kyis lha rnams nyid/ /brgya phrag gcig gis sngags pa nyid/ /kye'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dra ba'i sdom pa las

rdo rje snying po mngon par byang chub pa zhes bya ba brtag pa'i rgyal po rdzogas+ho// // rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan rdo rje snying po bdag /sangs rgyas thams cad gcig bsdus pa/ /rab gnas mtshan nyid bzang po nyid/ /

rim pa ji bzhin bshad du gsol/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /ci gsungs sbyin bsreg byas nas ni/ /dkyil 'khor dam pa bzhengs pa dang / /lnga bar sku gzugs sbyang ba dang / /sta gon la sogs byas nas ni/ /nam

mkhar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kun/ /sku gzugs snying gar rab tu gzhug /rang 'dod lha mnyam rnal 'byor pa/ /rab mthong sngags kyi pha rol son/ / \u0f00 badzra puSh+pe aHhU~M swA hA/ \u0f00 badzra d+hU pe AHhU~M swA hA/ \u0f00 badzra dI pe AH

hU~M swA hA/ \u0f00 badzra gan+d+he AHhU~M swA hA/ \u0f00 badzra nai wed+yA+e AHhU~M swA hA/ sna tshogs hU~M ni rdzogs pa dang / /me tog la sogs dbul ba nyid/ /gong ma'i rgyud kyi chog rim pas/ /mchod yon zhabs bsil gong ma bzhin/ /zhi ba'i thab khung

zlum po nyid/ /rgyas pa nyid kyi gru bzhi pa/ /gsad pa la ni gru gsum brjod/ /'di nyid la ni lhag ma bsgrub/ /khru gang dang ni khru phyed nyid/ /zhi ba'i steng dang 'og tu yin/ /khru god dang ni khru gang nyid/ /rgyas pa'i steng dang 'og tu brjod/ /

sor mo nyi shu'am de yi phyed/ /bsad pa'i steng dang 'og tu yang / /zhi bar kha dog dkar mo 'gyur/ /rgyas par ser po de bzhin no/ /bsad pa la ni kha dog gnag /dbang la dmar por rab tu grags/ /dbang la ji bzhin de ltar dgug /

bsad la ji ltar zhe sdang sogs/ /zhi la til dang rgyas la zhon/ /bsad la tsher ma de bzhin no/ /sdang la sogs pa'ang tsher mar brjod/ /dbang dang dgug la ut+pa la/ \u0f00 ag+ne ye ma hA te dzA sar+b+ba ka ma pra sA d+ha kaH kA ru N+yA kri ta sa twa ar+tha a

smin sa nin hi to b+ha baH/ me dgug pa'o/ /ma ma rin chen sna tshogs 'dzin/ /kye yi rdo rje khros mchod pa'i/ /lha mo khyod ni dbang du gyur/ /che ge bdag ni dkyil 'khor 'bri/ /swAr+thany+tsai ba pa rAR+thany+tsa sA d+hi taM gats+tsha ha bya b+hu ka A ga mi Sh+ya si

ya thA kA le sar+b+ba sid+d+hi ku ru Sh+wa me/ me dga' ba'i sngagaso/ /\u0f00 dzaHhU~M baM hoH khaM raM mchod yon gyi sngags so/ /\u0f00 nI rI ti hU~M khaMHzhabasil gyi sngagaso/ /oM d+h+waM d+h+waM lha bshos kyi sngagaso/ /kye'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dra ba'i sdom pa las
brtag pa gnyis par rab gnas kyi le'u ste dang po'o// // rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ nam mkha' lta bu'i chos kun la/ /rgya mtshor ku ba ji lta bar/ /rang 'dod lha yi gzugs las ni/ /sems can ji ltar

'grub par 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /bdag med rnal 'byor ldan pa 'am/ /yang na he ru ka dpal brtson/ /gzhan pa'i sems kyis skad cig kyang / /dngos grub 'dod pas mi gnas so/ /dang po goms
par byed dus kyi/ /gnas ni gang du bsngags pa'i sems/ /gcig tu mnyam gzhag 'grub 'gyur ba'i/ /gnas ni bzang po nges par brtag /rang gi khyim du mtshan dus su/ /bdag nyid grub pa'i sems kyis ni/ /

rnal 'byor ma bsgom shes rab can/ /yang na he ru ka dpal gzugs/ /rkang pa 'khru dang za ba dang / /'thor 'thung so rtsi za ba dang / tsan dan gyis ni lag nyid dang / /smad g.yogs kyis ni rked 'gebs dang / /'byung dang smra dang

'gro ba dang / /'dug dang khro dang rgod pa dang / /bcom ldan 'das ma bsten pa dang / /shes rab brtul zhugs can nyid kyis/ /rnal 'byor ma ni rnam par bsgom/ /gzhan gyi tshul gyis skad cig kyang / /gdug pa'i sems
ni mi rigs pas/ /dngos grub 'dod pas dngos grub phyir/ /mkhas pas 'bad pas mi gnas so/ /bsam gtan nyon mongs 'jig byed pa/ /rdo rje snying po nga yis bshad/ /brtse bas dngos grub don du yang / /
zla ba phyed du yongasu dogs/ /bsam pa thams cad yongs spangs nas/ /lha yi gzugs su sems pa yis/ /nyi ma gcig tu ma chad par/ /bsgom pas yongs su brtag par gyis/ /rang gzhan don ni rab bsgrub

phyir/ /'khor bar thabs gzhan yod ma yin/ /rig ma lhan cig goms byas pas/ /'phral du mngon du byed pa nyid/ 'jigs smyo de bzhin sdug bsngal dang / /mya ngan gdung ba 'tshe ba dang / /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug

ches/ /sgrub pa po ni nyon mi mongs/ /phan dang gnod pa'i 'bras 'byung bar/ /de ltar nges par shes nas ni/ /ji ltar de ni skad cig kyang / /rnal 'byor ma rnams ngu 'bod gnas/ /mtshams med lnga ni byed pa dang / /srog chags

gsod la dga' ba dang / /gzhan yang skye ba dman gang dang / /rmongs dang ma rungs las byed dang / /gzugs ngan yan lag ma tshang ba'ang / /bsams pas de rnams 'grub par 'gyur/ /dge ba bcu la goms pa dang / /bla ma

la gus dbang po dul/ /nga rgyal khro las rnam par grol/ /des ni re zhig nges 'grub 'gyur/ /rtag tu goms pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /mnyam par bzhag pas dngos grub 'thob/ /zla ba gcig tu gsang la spyad/ /ji

srid phyag rgya ma rnyed par/ /gnang ba rnyed gyur sngags pa la/ /rnal 'byor ma yis bstan par bya/ /phyag rgya che ge mo khyer la/ /sems can don gyis rdo rje 'dzin/ /rnyed pa de yang mig yangs ma/ /gzugs dang lang tshos rnam

par brgyan/ /si h+la ga bur yang dag ldan/ /byang chub sems kyis rnam par sbyang / /dge ba bcu las brtsams nas ni/ /de la chos ni rab tu dbye/ /lha yi gzugs kyi sems dang ni/ /dam tshig sems dang gcig pa

nyid/ /zla ba gcig gis skal ldan par/ /'gyur bar 'di la the tshom med/ /mchog thob pa yi bud med gang / /rtog pa thams cad yang dag spangs/ /yang na bdag gi nus pa yis/ /lha dang lha min mi rnams dang / /

gnod sbyin mi 'am ci las kyang / /phyag rgya bkug la rab tu brtag /de yang khyer la spyod pa spyad/ /bdag gi dal ba mngon du'i phyir/ /gang bshad 'jigs pa'i gzugs can gyi/ /spyod pa longs spyod phyir ma gsungs/ /

yid ni brtan nam g.yo 'am ci/ /rang gi sems ni so sor brtag /rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ /bdag med rnal 'byor ldan pa yis/ /phyag rgya nyid ces ji ltar brjod/ /phyag rgya phyag rgya nyid dag gis/ /phyag rgya'i
dngos grub ji ltar 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /bud med gzugs ni spangs nas ni/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi gzugs su bya/ /nu ma spangs pa po lar 'gyur/ /kak+ko la dbus yang dag
gnas/ /'gram gnyis dril bu nyid du 'gyur/ /ze 'bru bo la can du 'gyur/ /lhag ma bdag nyid chen po nyid/ /dga' chen he ru ka'i gzugs/ /he ru ka sbyor skyes bu nyid/ /'bad pa med par skyes bur 'gyur/ /

gsal bar nus pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ /de'i phyir phyag rgya'i dngos grub 'gyur/ /chags pa 'jig pa dag gis kyang / /thabs dang shes rab gnod mi 'gyur/ /gang phyir thabs ni 'byung ba nyid/ /'jig pa shes rab srid mthar
byed/ /des na rab 'jig yod ma yin/ /de nyid la ni chags pa med/ /la la 'jigs pas 'jig par 'gyur/ /'jig pa'i dngos med zad pa med/ /bskyed pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /brtul zhugs can gyis spros

pa bsgom/ /spros pa nyid ni spros med byed/ /ji ltar sgyu ma rmi lam dang / /ji ltar bar ma'i srid yin pa/ /rtag tu goms par sbyor ba las/ /dkyil 'khor nyid ni de bzhin 'dod/ /phyag rgya chen po'i dbang bskur ba/ /ji ltar

shes pa'i bde chen po/ /'di ni de yi byin brlabs yin/ /gzhan las dkyil 'khor 'byung ba med/ /bde ba gnag cing bde ba ser/ /bde ba dmar po bde ba dkar/ /bde ba ljang khu bde ba sngo/ /bde ba rgyu dang mi rgyu kun/ /bde

ba shes rab bde ba thabs/ /de bzhin kun tu ru skyes bde/ /bde ba dngos dang dngos med bde/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde bar brjod/ /rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor 'di/ /de yi bde ba bde chen
brjod/ /rdzogs pa bsgom pa med pa ste/ /bskyed pa yis ni ci zhig 'tshal/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /e ma'o byang chub sems dpa' che/ /dad pa'i shugs kyis rab tu nyams/ /lus kyi dngos

med gang las bde/ /bde ba smra bar mi nus so/ /khyab dang tsha khyab byed tshul gyis ni/ /bde bas 'gro ba khyab pa nyid/ /ji ltar me tog la gnas dri/ /me tog dngos med shes mi 'gyur/ /de bzhin gzugs sogs

dngos med pas/ /bde ba nyid kyang dngos med 'gyur/ /dngos po rtogs phyir sangs rgyas nga / /gang zhig le los bsnun pa dang / /rmongs pa gang gis nga mi shes/ /rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga ni/ /e yi rnam pa'i cha byad

gzugs/ /sangs rgyas rin chen za ma tog /bde ba can du rtag tu bzhugs/ /'chad pa po kyang chos kyang nga / /rang gi tshogs ldan nyan pa nga / /'jig rten ston pa bsgrub bya nga / /'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa nga / /

lhan cig skyes dga'i rang bzhin nga / /mchog mtha' dga' bral dang por ni/ /mun pa la ni mar me ltar/ /de bzhin bus kyang yid ches kyis/ /btsun mo'i b+ha ga bde chen du/ /ston pa sum bcu rtsa gnyis mtshan/ /gtso bo dpe byad

brgyad bcur ldan/ /khu ba zhes bya'i rnam par gnas/ /de med pas ni bde med 'gyur/ /bde ba med na de med 'gyur/ /nus pa med phyir ltos dang bcas/ /lha yi rnal 'byor las bde ba/ /de phyir sangs rgyas dngos po
min/ /de nyid dngos med tshul yang min/ /zhal phyag rnam pa'i gzugs can nyid/ /mchog tu bde bas gzugs med pa/ /de phyir 'gro kun lhan cig skyes/ /rang bzhin lhan cig skyes par brjod/ /rnam par
dag pa'i sems kyis ni/ /rang bzhin mya ngan 'das pa nyid/ /lha yi rnam pa'i gzugs kyis ni/ /bzhin lag kha dog gnas pa ni/ /skyes pa tsam gyis rnam par gnas/ /'on kyang bag chags phal pas so/ /
dug gi dum bu gang nyid kyis/ /skye bo thams cad 'chi bar 'gyur/ /dug gi de nyid shes pa des/ /dug gis dug ni 'bigs par byed/ /ji ltar rlung gis zin pa la/ /mon sran sde'u yi bza' ba sbyin/ /bzlog
pa'i sman ni brtags pa yis/ /rlung gis rlung la snun par byed/ /rnam rtog las ni rnam rtog dag /srid pa nyid kyis srid pa dag /ji ltar rna bar chu zhugs pa/ /chu gzhan dag gis 'gugs par byed/ /

de bzhin dngos po'i rnam rtog kyang / /rnam par nges pas sbyang bar bya/ /ji ltar 'tshed pas tshig pa yang / /me yis kyang ni gdung bar bya/ /de bzhin 'dod chags mes tshigs pa/ /'dod chags me yis gdung bar bya/ /
skye bo mi bzad pa'i las/ /gang dang gang gis 'ching 'gyur ba/ /thabs dang bcas na de nyid kyis/ /srid pa'i 'ching ba las grol 'gyur/ /chags pas 'jig rten 'ching 'gyur ba/ /'dod chags nyid kyis rnam

grol 'gyur/ /bzlog pa'i bsgom pa 'di nyid ni/ /sangs rgyas mu stegs kyis mi shes/ /'byung ba lnga'i rang bzhin la/ kun tu ru las lnga ru 'gyur/ /dga' ba chen po gcig nyid las/ /dbye ba lnga ru 'gro bar
'gyur/ /bo la kak+ko la sbyor bas/ /reg pa sra ba'i bags nyid/ /sra ba gti mug chos kyis phy-ir/ /gti mug rnam par snang mdzad brjod/ /gang phyir byang sems gsher ba nyid/ /gsher ba chu yi khams su

brjod/ /chu ni mi bskyod gzugs kyi phyir/ /zhe sdang 'dren pa mi bskyod pa/ /gnyis kyis bskyod pa'i sbyor ba las/ /drod ni rtag tu skye bar 'gyur/ /'dod chags dpag med rdo rje yin/ /'dod chags drod las 'byung bar 'gyur/ /

kak+ko las ni gang zhig sems/ /de ni rlung gi rang bzhin can/ /phrag dog don yod grub pa yin/ /don yod rlung las 'byung ba nyid/ /bde ba 'dod chags khrag tu 'gyur/ /dga' ba namakha'i mtshan nyid de/ /namakha' ser sna

rdo rjer 'gyur/ /ser sna namakha' las byung nyid/ /sems ni chen po gcig nyid la/ /lnga yi gzugs kyis rnam par mtshon/ /rigs ni lnga po de nyid las/ /stong phrag du ma skyes pa nyid/ /de phyir 'di dag rang bzhin

gcig /bde chen mchog tu brtag pa nyid/ /'dod chags la sogs sems lnga yi/ /dbye bas lnga ru 'gro bar 'gyur/ /gang gA klung ni bcu yi bye snyed kyis/ /rigs gcig la ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs/ /rigs kyi tshogs la rigs

ni du ma rnams/ /de rnams rigs la rigs ni rnam pa rgyal/ /de rnams la yang 'bum phrag rigs chen rnams/ /bye ba'i rigs la grangs ni med par 'gyur/ /de la rigs la grangs med rigs rnams ni/ /mchog tu dga' ba'i rigs las

byung ba rnams/ /kye'i rdo rje mkha'agro ma dra ba'i sdom pa las dngos grub gtan la phab pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // de nas rdo rje can gyi rnal 'byor ma rnams la rgyud thams cad kyi gleng gzhi zhes bya ba'i thabs bka' stsal pa/

sdom pa dang ni dbang dang yang / /de bzhin dgongs pa'i skad nyid dang / /dga' dang skad cig dbye ba dang / /gzhan yang bza' ba la sogs pa/ /de la sdom pa bka' stsal pa/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi sdom pa ni/ /e baM rnam par rab tu gnas/ /

e baM rnam pa'i bde chen po/ /dbang las yang dag shes par bya/ /de nas rnal 'byor ma rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan ston pa 'gro ba'i bla/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi

sdom pa nyid/ /e baM rnam pas ci zhes brjod/ /rim pa ji bzhin bshad du gsol/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /e yi cha byed bzang po gang / /dbus su bam gyis rnam par brgyan/ /bde ba thams cad kyi ni

gnas/ /sangs rgyas rin chen za ma tog /skad cig dbye bas phye ba nyid/ /dga' ba de las skye bar 'gyur/ /skad cig shes nas bde shes pa/ /e bam rnam par rab tu gnas/ /sna tshogs dang ni rnam smin dang / /

rnam nyed de bzhin mtshan nyid bral/ /skad cig bzhin ni rab shes pa/ /de ltar rnal 'byor pas shes 'gyur/ /'khyud dang 'o byed la sogs pa/ /sna tshogs rnam pa sna tshogs bshad/ /rnam par smin pa de las bzlog /bde

ba'i ye shes za ba nyid/ /bdag gis bde ba zos pa yi/ /gros ni rnam par nyed par brjod/ /mtshan nyid bral ba gsum las gzhan/ /chags dang chags bral rnam par spangs/ /sna tshogs dang po'i dga' ba nyid/ /rnam smin

la ni mchog dga' nyid/ /rnam nyed dga' bral dga' ba nyid/ /mtshan bral lhan cig skyes dga' nyid/ /slob dpon gsang ba shes rab dang / /bzhi pa de yang de bzhin no/ /dbang ni bzhi yi grangs kyis ni/ /dga' ba la sogs

rim shes bya/ /rgod pa dag pa slob dpon nyid/ /lta ba gsang ba de bzhin no/ /lag bcangs las ni shes rab nyid/ /gnyis gnyis 'khyud pa de yang nyid/ /sems can rnams kyi dngos grub phyir/ /dbang ni rnam pa bzhi ru bshad/ /

gtor dang blugs pa zhes bya 'dis/ /des na dbang zhes brjod par bya/ /shes rab bcu drug lon pa la/ /lag pa dag gis yang dag 'khyud/ /rdo rje dril bu mnyam sbyor bas/ /slob dpon dbang du rab tu brjod/ /shin tu bzhin bzang

mig yangs ma/ /gzugs dang lang tshos rnam par brgyan/ /'the 'ong srin lag dag gis ni/ /slob ma'i kha ru ltung bar bya/ /de nyid du ni mnyam pa'i ro/ /slob ma'i spyod yul dag du bya/ /ston pas shes rab rab tu mchod/ /rjed par

byas nas gtad par bya/ /ston pas smras pa sems dpa' che/ /phyag rgya bde ba ldan pa khyer/ /phrag dog khro ba rnam spangs pa'i/ /slob ma cher gyur shes nas ni/ /ston pas de la gnang ba sbyin/ /kun tu ru gyis rdo rje 'dzin/ /ji ltar

dbang bskur gsol btab pa'i/ /slob ma'i bya ba bshad par bya/ /bla ma phyag rgya ldan mthong nas/ /bstod dang mchod pa ji bzhin bya/ /bcom ldan zhi ba chen po kye/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor gcig bzhed pa/ /mi phyed phyag rgya sgrub pa po/ /

rdo rje rnal 'byor las byung ba/ /ji ltar khyod ni bdag nyid che/ /mnga' bdag bdag la'ang de ltar mdzod/ /'khor ba 'dam gyi tshogs nang du/ /bying ba bskyabs med bdag la skyobs/ /zhim pa'i bza' ba btung ba dang / /ba la che mchog ma da na/ /

bdug pa lha bshos phreng ba dang / /dril bu rgyal mtshan byug pa yis/ /'di rnams mchod pa rnams kyis ni/ /slob mas rdo rje 'dzin pa mchod/ /mchog tu dga' ba yang dag thob/ /sna tshogs spangs pa'i skad cig la/ /ston pas

smras pa sems dpa' che/ /bde ba chen po rnam par gzung / /ji srid byang chub bar du ni/ /sems can don gyis rdo rje 'dzin/ /slob ma snying rje can mthong nas/ /rdo rje can gyis 'di skad smras/ /'di ni ye shes chen po nyid/ /thams cad

lus la rnam par gnas/ /gnyis dang gnyis su med pa'i tshul/ /dngos dang dngos med bdag nyid gtso/ /brtan dang g.yo ba khyab nas gnas/ /sgyu ma'i gzugs can nyid du 'dod/ /dkyil 'khor 'khor lo thabs kyis ni/ /rtag tu nges par 'gro bar

'gyur/ /de nas rdo rje snyings pos rnal 'byor ma rnams la bzod par gsol nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /daskyil 'khor 'khor lo ci zhes brjod/ /sangs rgyas kun bdag grong khyer la/ /bcom ldan bdag ni 'khrul

gyur pas/ /rim pa ji ltar bshad du gsol/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /daskyil ni snying po zhes brjod de/ /byang chub sems ni bde chen po/ /len par byed pas dkyil 'khor nyid/ /'dus pa dkyil 'khor nyid du brjod/ /'khor

lo zhes bya nam mkha'i khams/ /yul la sogs pa rnam par spyod/ /bo la kak+ko la sbyor bas/ /de yi bde ba shes par 'gyur/ /rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ sdom pa zhes bya gang gis dang / /dam tshig gang gis gnas par
bgyi/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /khyod kyis srog chags bsad pa dang / /brdzun gyi tshig kyang smra ba dang / /khyod kyis ma byin par yang long / /pha rol bud med bsten par gyis/ /sems

gcig srog chags gsod pa nyid/ /gang phyir srog ni sems su brjod/ /'jig rten bsgral ba zhes bya ba/ /brdzun gyi tshig tu rab tu bsgrags/ /btsun mo'i khu ba ma byin par/ /gzhan gyi bud med rang mtshungs mdzes/ /de nas rnal 'byor ma thams cad

kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /yul de rnams kyang ci lags/ dbang po rnams ni gang lags/ skye mched ni ci lags/ phung po rnams ni gang lags/ khams rnams kyi rang bzhin ni ci lags/ bcom ldan 'das

kyis bka' stsal pa/ yul drug ni/ gzugs sgra de bzhin dri dang ni/ /ro dang de bzhin reg bya dang / /chos kyi khams kyi rang bzhin nyid/ /'di rnams yul ni drug du brjod/ dbang po rnams ni drug ste/ mig dang rna ba sna dang ni/ /

lce dang lus dang de bzhin yid/ /'di rnams dbang po drug po ni/ /gti mug rdo rje la sogs ldan/ /yul dang yul can dag gis ni/ /skye mched bcu gnyis dag tu 'gyur/ /phung po lnga ni gzugs la sogs/ /mthar ni rnam

shes snying rje che/ /dbang po dang ni yul nyid dang / /dbang po'i rnam par shes pa nyid/ /rnal 'byor ma rnams go bya'i phyir/ /khams ni bcwa brgyad rnams su bshad/ /rang bzhin gdod nas ma skyes pa/ /brdzun min bden min de bzhin

du/ /thams cad chu yi zla ba ltar/ /'dod pas rnal 'byor mas shes kyis/ /'di lta ste/ gtsub shing dang gtsub stan dang skyes bu'i lag pa'i rtsol ba las glo bur du me skye bar 'gyur ro/ /me 'di ni btsub shing la yang mi

gnas/ gtsub stan la yang mi gnas/ skyes bu'i lag pa dag la yang ma yin te/ rnam pa thams cad du yongs su btsal na gcig na'ang yod pa ma yin pas me de yang bden pa yang ma yin zhing brdzun pa yang ma yin no/ /

de ltar chos thams cad rnal 'byor mas yid la bgyis shig /de nas rnal 'byor ma bdag med ma la sogs pa rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyis bdud rtsi lnga thogs shing dam tshig gi rdzas thogs pas bcom ldan 'das

rdo rje sems dpa' la mchod par byed/ /kun tu ru'i sbyor bas rjes su chags par byed/ bdud rtsi lnga'i ro yang 'thung bar byed do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes nas rang byin gyis brlab pa bstan pa/ kye kye rdo rje

mkha' 'gro ma/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis phyag mdzad pa'i/ /de nyid bdag gis gsang mdzad pa/ /rdo rje mchod pa'i byin brlabs kyis/ /bshad kyis 'dod pas rab tu nyon/ /lha mo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur/ /rangs par

gyur te pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsug nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung nyan to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /bza' btung ji ltar snyed pa dang / /

'grod dang bgrod min mi spang zhing / /khrus dang gtsang sgra ma bya ste/ /grong gi chos ni rab tu spangs/ /blo ldan sngags nyid mi bzla zhing / /bsam gtan nyid ni dmigs mi bya/ /gnyid ni spang bar mi bya ste/ /dbang po rnams ni mi

dag go/ /ba la thams cad bza' bar bya/ /kha dog lnga la mnyam par spyad/ /dogs pa med pa'i sems kyis ni/ /btsun mo thams cad dga' bar bya/ /mdza' bo sdug par mi bya zhing / /de bzhin gdug la zhe sdang nyid/ /

rdo shing 'jim pa'i bdag nyid kyi/ /lha 'di rnams la phyag mi bya/ /g.yung mo gdol pa ko lpags mkhan/ /phyag dar mkhan sogs rig ring dang / /bram ze rgyal rigs rje'u dmangs rnams/ /bdag gi lus ltar reg pa nyid/ /

bdud rtsi lnga dang bu ram chang / /dug dang nim pa bu btsas skyes/ /skyur dang mngar dang bska la sogs/ /kha ba lan tshwa tsha ba dang / /dri nga dri zhim mchil bsnabs rnams/ /byang chub sems bsres rab tu bza'/ /gnyis

med ye shes sems kyis ni/ /mi bza' cung zad yod ma yin/ /rang byung me tog rnyed nas ni/ /pad+ma'i snod du bzhag pa dang / /lud pa dang ni snabs dag gis/ /bsres nas brtul zhugs can gyis btung / /smad g.yogs

kha dog sna tshogs dang / /ro bsregs thal bas de bzhin brgyan/ /me tog rab song gnas rnyed pas/ /mgo skyes legs par bcing bar bya/ /de nas rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ thams cad yul gyi rnam dag pa/ /bcom ldan 'das
kyis sngar gsungs na/ /nges par dbang po drug gi drangs/ /rnam par dag par ma mdzad pa/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis nges par gsungs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /mig la gti mug rdo rje ma/

sna la ser sna ma zhes bshad/ /kha la 'dod chags rdo rje ma/ /lus la phrag dog rdo rje ma/ /yid la bdag med rnal 'byor ma/ /dbang po rnams ni dag pa'i phyir/ /'dis ni go cha sems dpa' che/ /rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ dgongs

pa'i skad ni ci zhes bgyi/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis nges par gsungs/ /rnal 'byor ma yi dam tshig che/ /nyan thos la sogs mi shes pa/ /rgod dang lta ba dag gis dang / /'khyud dang de bzhin gnyis gnyis kyi/ /rgyud kyang rnam pa bzhi

rnams kyis/ /dgongs pa'i skad ni ma sgrags pa/ /bcom ldan nges par gsungs du gsol/ /dgongs pa yi ni skad chen po/ /dam tshig brda ni rgyas pa ru/ /rdo rje snying po ngas bshad kyis/ /khyod ni rtse gcig sems kyis nyon/ /

ma da na chang ba la sha /'du ba ma la ya dzar brjod/ /'gro ba khe Ta ro ni shrA ba/ /rus pa'i rgyan ni ni ra~M shu/ /'ong ba pheM kha Na ru brjod/ /cang te'u ki pi Ta ru brjod/ /skal med du d+hu ra zhes brjod/ /skal ldan kA liny+dza ra~M brjod/ /reg min Di

Na Di ma zhes brjod/ /thod pa pad+ma b+ha dza na/ /bza' ba tri b+ti ka zhes bya/ /tshod ma mA la tIn d+ha na~M/ /bshang ba tsa tuHsa mar brjod/ /gci ba kastu ri zhes brjod/ /rang byung si hAr shes par bya/ /khu ba kaR+bu ra zhes brjod/ /sha chen shA

li dza~M zhes brjod/ /dbang po gnyis sbyor kun tu ru/ /rdo rje bo la zhes brjod de/ /pad+ma kak+ko la zhes zer/ /kha dog dbye bas phye ba la/ /rigs ni rnam pa lnga ru bshad/ /'di ni gsang ba'i skad yin no/ /phyag rgya lnga ni bsdus pa

nyid/ /g.yung mo rdo rje'i rigs su bshad/ /gar ma de bzhin pad+ma'i rigs/ /rang 'tshed ma'i rin chen rigs/ /skye gnyis de bzhin gshegs par brjod/ /tshos ma las kyi rigs nyid de/ /phyag rgya 'di rnams dngos grub sbyin/ /

'di rnams khu ba rdo rjer 'gyur/ /brtul zhugs can gyis mchod nas btung / /rdo rje snying po sems dpa' che/ /gsang ba'i skad ni mtshar che ba/ /nga yis khyod la gang bshad pa/ /de rnams thams cad gus pas zung / /kye rdo rje 'dir dbang

skur gang / /gsang ba'i skad kyis mi smra ba/ /de yi dam tshig nyams par ni/ /'gyur bar 'di la the tshom med/ /'tshe ba dang ni rkun ma dang / /gdon dang rims dang dug gis kyang / /gal te sangs rgyas gsang ba'i skad/ /mi gsung na yang

'grongs par 'gyur/ /rang gi dam tshig rigs rnyed nas/ /gal te tshig 'di mi smra na/ /gnas bzhi las skyes rnal 'byor ma/ /de yi tshe na khro bar byed/ /kye'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dra ba'i sdom pa las rgyud thams cad kyi gleng gzhi dang gsang

ba'i skad ces bya ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// // de nas rdo rje snying po la sogs pa'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma thams cad the tshom du gyur/ yid gnyis su gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom

ldan the tshom bsal du gsol/ /spyod pa'i le'u las gang bshad pa/ /glu dang gar ni dngos grub sbyin/ /de la bdag ni the tshom mchis/ /glu ni ci lags gar kyang ci/ /lha yi le'u las gang gsungs pa/ /zhe sdang la sogs phyag rgya

rnams/ /de la bdag ni the tshom mchis/ /gang gi phyag rgya phyag rgya ci/ /sngags btu ba las gang gsungs pa/ /bdag med la sogs sa bon nyid/ /de la bdag ni 'khrul bar gyur/ /gang gi sa bon sa bon gang / /rigs kyi le'u

las gang bshad pa/ /bcu drug gnyis kyi bdag nyid rtsa/ /bcom ldan bdag ni 'khrul gyur pas/ /de rnams rnam dag bshad du gsol/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /kol+la i ri T+thi a bo la/ mu m+mu ni re kak+ko lA/

g+ha Na ki pI Ta ho badz+dza i ka ru Ne ki a i Na ro lA/ ta hiM ba la badz+dza i ga De m+ma a NA pidz+dza a i ha le kA lIny+dza ra pa Ni a i/ du d+hu ra badz+dzi a i/ tsa u sa ma kats+tshu si hA kap+pu ra la i a/ i/ mA la i in+d+ha Na sA li dza ta hiM b+ha ru kha i a

i/ b+h+rI kha Na khe Ta ka ran+te shud+d+hA shud+d+hA na ma Na a i/ ni rang shu a~M ga tsa DA wi ta ha~M dza sa rA ba pa Ni a i/ ma la ya rje kun ru pA Ta i/ DiN+Da ma ta hiN+Na badz+dzi a i/ dran pa mi 'phrogs rnal 'byor pas/ /he ru ka yi gzugs kyis

gar/ /chags bral mi goms sems kyis ni/ /'dod chags sems kyis bsgoms pa nyid/ /rdo rje chos dang sangs rgyas dang / /rnal 'byor ma dang ma mo yis/ /glu dang gar ni 'di dag gis/ /legs par glu blang gar kyang bya/ /'di nyid

kyis ni tshogs bsrung zhing / /de bzhin bdag kyang bsrung ba nyid/ /'dis ni 'jig rten dbang du byed/ /'dis ni sngags kyis bzlas pa nyid/ /gang du gus pas glu len dang / /gang du gus bcas gar byed pa/ /tshogs kyi bdag pos

sngar byas nas/ /de la dri ni mtshon par bya/ /sgog pa'i dri ni dang po nyid/ /de nas yang ni bya rgod dri/ /ga bur ma la ya dza~M nyid/ /ngang pa dang ni bung ba'i sgra/ /glu yi mtha' nas mnyan par bya/ /ba lang 'tshe yi sgra yang ni/ /phyi rol tshal

du mtshon bya dang / /glu yi byin brlabs mtshan nyid do/ /phyag rgya rtags dang mtshan ma ste/ /'dis ni rigs ni mtshon par bya/ /rigs 'chol bsgom pa'i sbyor ba las/ /dngos grub med cing sgrub po'ang med/ /zhe sdang phyag

rgyas bdag med ma/ /gti mug phyag rgyas rdo rje ma/ /ser sna'i phyag rgyas dkar mo nyid/ /chags pas chu ma phyag rgyas gdab/ /phrag dog phyag rgyas mkha' 'gro ma/ /zhe sdang phyag rgyas puk+ka sI/ /gti mug phyag rgyas

ri khrod ma/ /ser sna'i phyag rgyas gdol po mo/ /'dod chags phyag rgyas g.yung mo nyid/ /yang ni dkar mo zhe sdang las/ /gti mug phyag rgyas chom rkun ma/ /ser sna'i phyag rgyas ro langs ma/ /'dod chags phyag rgyas

g+hasma ri/ /gti mug phyag rgyas sa spyod ma/ /'dod chags phyag rgyas mkha' spyod ma/ /'dod pas phyag rgyar shes par bya/ /A li dang po bdag med ma/ /A li gnyis pa rdo rje ma/ /a li gsum pa dkar mo nyid/ /bzhi pa chu yi

rnal 'byor ma/ /lnga pa rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma/ /drug pa puk+ka sI zhes brjod/ /bdun pa nyid ni ri khrod ma/ /brgyad pa smre sha can du brjod/ /dgu pa yang ni g.yung mo nyid/ /yang ni lnga gnyis dkar mo nyid/ /bcu gcig chom rkun ma zhes

bshad/ /bcu gnyis ro langs ma zhes brjod/ /bcu gsum pa ni g+hasma ri/ /bcu bzhi pa ni sa spyod ma/ /bcwa lnga pa ni mkha' spyod ma/ /rnal 'byor ma yi sa bon nyid/ /rigs kyi le'u las rtsa rnams gang / /bcu drug gnyis kyi

bdag nyid gsungs/ /rtsa ni gnyis gnyis rnal 'byor ma/ /re re rnam pa rnams du brjod/ /brkyang ma ro ma kun 'dar ma/ /bdag med rnal 'byor ma zhes brjod/ /gang phyir bcu drug cha med pas/ /'bad pas kun gyi lhag ma spangs/ /

ci'i slad du zhe na/ don gyi bya ba mi byed phyir/ /bcwa lnga'i cha yi bdag nyid kyi/ /zla ba byang chub semasu 'gyur/ /bde ba chen po A li'i gzugs/ /rnal 'byor ma rnams de yi cha/ /rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ rnal 'byor ma kun

las byung ba/ /lhan cig skyes dga'i rang bzhin nyid/ /'grib med btung mchog nam mkha' nyid/ /ga bur nges par cis mi spang / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ji skad smras pa de bzhin no/ /rdo rje snying pos gsol
pa/ thabs gang gis byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i thabs dang ni/ /rang byin rlabs pa'i rims pas kyang / /kun rdzob don dang gzugs

can gyi/ /byang chub sems ni rab tu bskyed/ /kun rdzob kun da lta bu nyid/ /don dam bde ba'i gzugs can no/ /bud med kak+ko la bde ba can/ /e ba~M rnam pa'i rang bzhin du/ /bde ba can zhes rab tu bsgrags/ /sangs rgyas byang chub

sems dpa' dang / /rdo rje 'dzin pa rnams kyi gnas/ /'di nyid 'khor ba zhes bya ste/ /'di nyid mya ngan 'das pa nyid/ /'khor ba spangs nas gzhan du ni/ /mya ngan 'das pa rtogs mi 'gyur/ /'khor ba gzugs dang sgra la sogs/ /

'khor ba tshor ba la sogs pa/ /'khor ba dbang po rnam nyid do/ /'khor ba zhe sdang la sogs pa/ /'di rnams chos ni mya ngan 'das/ /rmongs phyir 'khor ba dag pa ni/ /rmongs med 'khor ba dag pa ni/ /'khor ba mya ngan 'das

par 'gyur/ /byang chub sems ni mya ngan 'das/ /kun rdzob don dam tshul can no/ /shin tu bzhin bzangs mig yangs ma/ /gzugs dang lang 'tshos rnam par brgyan/ /sngo bsangs dal la rigs bzang ma/ /si hA ga pur 'byung ba'i

gnas/ /rang gis dbang bskur kye'i rdo rje/ /skra bzang sgrub pa po la dga'/ /de la chang yang btung bar bya/ /de nas rang yang btung ba nyid/ /rang bzhin don ni rab sgrub phyir/ /phyi nas phyag rgya rjes chags bya/ /po la kak+ko lar bcug

nas/ /kun tu ru byed btul zhugs can/ /der ni sbyor ba las byung ba'i/ /ga bur mkhas pas mi spang ste/ /de ni lag tu mi blang zhing / /nya phyis dung chos nyid du min/ /nges par blo dang stobs kyi phyir/ /mi 'chi lce yis blang ba nyid/ /

ga pur nyid ni bdag nyid ma/ /bde ba bdag med tshul can nyid/ /de yi bde ba phyag rgya che/ /lte ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid du gnas/ /dang po'i dbyangs yig rang bzhin te/ /blo zhes sangs rgyas rnams kyis brtags/ /rdzogs

pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor las/ /de nyid bcom ldan shes rab ma/ /de ni ring min thung ba min/ /gru bzhi ma yin zlum po min/ /dri dang ro dang mya las 'das/ /lhan cig skyes dga' byed pa can/ /de las skyes pa'i rnal

'byor pas/ /de yi bde ba za ba nyid/ /de dang lhan cig phyag rgya che/ /bde ba sbyin pa'i dngos grub 'gyur/ /gzugs sgra de bzhin dri dang ni/ /ro dang de bzhin reg bya nyid/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin yang / /shes rab

nyid kyis dpyad par bya/ /de nyid lhan cig skyes pa'i gzugs/ /bde chen bzang po'i rnal 'byor ma/ /de nyid dkyil 'khor 'khor lo dang / /ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin can/ /de ni me long ye shes gzugs/ /mnyam nyid

ye shes dngos po can/ /yang dag gyur pa so sor rtog /de nyid bya ba nan tan te/ /chos dbyings shin tu rnam dag ma/ /de nyid daskyil 'khor bdag por / /de nyid bdag med rnal 'byor ma'o/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can/ /rdo rje snying
pos gsol pa/ 'khor lo sgom pa'i lam dang ni/ /lha rnams ji ltar 'byung ba nyid/ /thams cad bcom ldan 'das gsungs na/ /sdom pa'ang bdag la bshad du gsol/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /

rnal 'byor ma lus dbus gnas su/ /a yi rnam pa sdom pa'i gnas/ /ji ltar phyi rol de bzhin nang / /sdom pa de nyid rab tu phye/ /bo la'i bde ba phyag rgya che/ /rdo rje skye mched thabs chen nyid/ /'dis ni gsang ba'i snyoms 'jug

pas/ /phyi rol gnyis gnyis bstan du med/ /sku gsum lus kyi nang du ni/ /'khor lo'i gzugs ni brjod par bya/ /sku gsum yongs su shes pa ni/ /bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo brjod/ /chos dang longs spyod sprul pa dang / /

de bzhin du yang bde chen nyid/ /skye gnas snying mgrin mgo bor yang / /sku gsum po ni rnam par gnas/ /ma lus pa yi sems can gyi/ /skye ba gang la brjod bya ba/ /gang phyir sprul pa gnas brtan phyir/ /de las sprul pa'i sku nyid yin/ /

gang gis skyed dang sprul byed pa'i/ /sku ni sprul pa can zhes brjod/ /sems ni chos kyi rang bzhin te/ /chos kyi sku yang snying kar 'gyur/ /ro rnam drug gi gzugs can gyi/ /bza' ba nges par longs spyod brjod/ /mgrin par longs spyod

'khor lo dang / /spyi bor bde ba chen po gnas/ /e ba~M rnam par rgyu 'thun nyid/ /rnam smin chos kyi 'khor lo las/ /longs spyod skyes bu byed pa nyid/ /bde ba'i 'khor lo dri med nyid/ /rgyu 'thun sogs pas rab phye ba'i/ /

'bras bu rnam pa bzhi zhes brjod/ /las kyi rlung gis bskul ba yis/ /las la bcom ldan shes rab spyod/ /ji ltar byas pa de bzhin spyod/ /rgyu mthun zhes ni rab tu bsgrags/ /las chung 'bras bu che ba'i phyir/ /rnam par smin pa de

las zlog /rnal 'byor dag phyir dri med nyid/ /skyed pa skyes bu byed pa nyid/ /gang phyir sprul pa gnas brtan phyir/ /sprul pa'i 'khor lor gnas brtan nyid/ /chos ni smra ba 'byung ba'i phyir/ /chos kyi 'khor lor thams

cad yod/ /gang phyir mgrin par kun bkur phyir/ /longs spyod 'khor lor kun bkur nyid/ /gang phyir bde chen mgor gnas pas/ /bde ba'i 'khor lor dge 'dun che/ /sde pa zhes bya sku ru brjod/ /lto ba gnas su brjod par

bya/ /skye gnas 'dod chags bral bar 'gyur/ /mngal gyi khru ma chos gos nyid/ /de bzhin ma ni mkhan po nyid/ /mgo bor thal mo sbyar bar phyag /'gro ba'i bya ba khrims kyi gnas/ /sngags kyi bzlas pa a dang ha~M/ /skye gnas

'khor lo'i rnam pa a/ /bde chen gyi yang rnam pa ha~M/ /gcer bu skra dang kha spu bregs/ /sngags 'don skyes pa dge slong nyid/ /'di dag rkyen gyis sems can rnams/ /sangs rgyas nyid du the tshom med/ /zla ba bcu yang sa

rnams nyid/ /sems can sa bcu'i dbang phyug go/ /de nas rnal 'byor ma bdag med ma la sogs pa'i lha mo thams cad la 'di lta ste/ spyan ma dang / mA ma kI dang / gos dkar mo dang / sgrol ma dang / khro gnyer can dang / tsun dA

dang / par+N+Na ri khrod ma dang / 'og zhal ma dang / de dag la sogs pa ri rab kyi rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i rnal 'byor ma rnams kyis tshig 'di dag thos nas mchog tu ngo mtshar bar gyur cing brgyal ba dang / skrag pa dang / sa la 'gyel

ba dang / 'dar bar 'gyur ro/ /yang rdo rje can gyis lha mo de rnams thams cad la gzigs nas/ bslang ba'i phyir yang dag par bstod pa/ sa dang chu dang rlung byin za'i/ /lha mo snod can khyed nyid la/ /gang zhig sus kyang mi shes

pa/ /de nyid nga yis spro yi nyon/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung rmi lam lta bu nye bar thos nas de rnams thams cad srog rnyed par gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /sems can rnams ni sangs rgyas

nyid/ /'on kyang glo bur dri mas bsgribs/ /de nyid bsal na sangs rgyas nyid/ /lha mos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de de bzhin te/ bden yang ma mchis shing rdzun yang ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal

pa/ /gang gis mi shes 'jig rten pa/ /btsan dug zos pas brgyal bar 'gyur/ /rmongs spangs te nyid yid kyis ni/ /de yis de nyid yongs su gcod/ /de bzhin zhi ba'i thabs shes shing / /kye'i rdo rjer ngal bso

na/ /ma rig la sogs mi 'dzin cing / /gti mug la sogs 'ching bas min/ /rang dang rang gis rtogs pa las/ /sangs rgyas ma yin sems can ni/ /gcig kyang yod pa ma yin no/ /dmyal ba yi dags byol song dang / /

lha dang lha min mi rnams dang / /bshang ba'i srin bu la sogs pa/ lha dang lha ma yin gyi yang / /bde ba gang phyir mi shes pas/ /rtag tu rang bzhin bde ba can/ /'jig rten khams ni gang du yang / /sangs rgyas gzhan du rnyed

mi 'gyur/ /sems ni rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid/ /sangs rgyas gzhan du bstan du med/ /gdol pa smyig mkhan la sogs pa/ gsod pa don du sems pa po/ /de rnams kye rdo rje shes na/ /'grub 'gyur 'di la the tsom med/ /

byis pa mi shes pas bsgribs pa/ /'di'i 'gro ba mi shes pa/ /'gro ba drug gi srid pa'i mthar/ /gang zhig rmongs pa 'khor bar 'gyur/ /rdo rje snying po snying rje che/ /kye yi rdo rje'i thabs rnyed pas/ /gang zhig yul rnams rnam sbyong ba/ /

de ni bla med rnyed par 'gyur/ /rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ sa ni puk+ka sIr bshad pa/ /gang phyir gti mug sra ba nyid/ /sku ni rnam snang nyid gsungs pa/ /ji ltar mi skyod phyag rgya lags/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /sems

spangs nas ni lus kyis ni/ /mdzes pa gzhan du mi 'gyur ro/ /de phyir rnam par snang mdzad sems/ /sku la thugs kyi phyag rgyas gdab/ /rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ chu khams ri khrod mar bshad pa/ /mi bskyod khu ba'i gzugs can

nyid/ /gtso bo mi skyod phyag rgyas ni/ /ri khrod ma la phyag rgya rigs/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /lus spangs nas ni sems kyis ni/ /gnas pa gzhan du mthong mi 'gyur/ /de phyir sems ni gti mug

'gyur/ /thugs la gti mug phyag rgyas gdab/ /rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ me ni gdol pa mor bshad pa/ /'dod chags phyag rgyas gdol pa mo/ /rigs te phyag rgya gzhan min na/ /ji ltar rin chen phyag rgya lags/ /bcom ldan 'das

kyis bka' stsal pa/ /gang phyir 'dod chags khrag bshad pa/ /khrag ni rin chen 'byung ldan nyid/ /drod ni khrag gi rang bzhin phyir/ /'dod chags ser sna'i phyag rgyas gdab/ /rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ gang phyir g.yung mo rlung nyid de/ /

don yod rlung gi gzugs can nyid/ /don yod phyag rgya g.yung mo la/ /gtso bo phyag rgya rigs par 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /'dod chags ma gtogs phrag dog ni/ /gzhan du 'byung ba ma yin te/ /de phyir

'dod chags phyag rgya yis/ /mkhas pas g.yung mo phyag rgyas gdab/ /gang phyir gzugs ni sra ba nyid/ /dkar mo snang mdzad gsungs pa nyid/ /sngar gsungs nyid kyi rims pa yis/ /sems kyis bdag pos phyag rgyas gdab/ /

de nyid rim pas chom rkun ma/ /de bzhin ro langs ma nyid dang / /de yi rigs pas g+hasma rI/ /ma log pa las phyag rgya'o/ /kye'i rdo rje rdo rje 'dzin/ /snyoms 'jug gnas pa'i lha nyid la/ /sems can don phyir gtor ma che/ /de la

bdag med mas zhus pa/ /e baM rnam par bzhugs nas ni/ /bgegs dang log par 'dren pa las/ /sems can rnams kyi srog bsrung phyir/ /rdo rje sems dpas gtor ma bstan/ /\u0f00 in+da dza ma dza la dzak+Sha/ b+hu da bah+ni bA u rak+Sha

tsan+da sudz+dza mA da bap+pa ta la pA tA laM aSh+Tha sap+pa swA hA/ i dam pa ling b+huny+dzi dzi g+ha phul+la d+hup+pa mAM sa piM g+ha/ am+b+ha sap+pa kadz+dza sA da khat+ti khu Ni phe Da gA da/ \u0f00 a kA ro mu khaM sar+b+ba d+har+m+mA NAM At+ya nut+pan+na twA ta/ \u0f00 AHhU~M phaT swA hA/ gal te

'dis gtor mas 'byung po thams cad mchod par byed na rnal 'byor pa rnams legs par 'gyur te/ de rnams la bde ba dri ma med pa dang / lha mo rnams dang / 'gro ba rab tu 'byor pa rnams dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /gal te 'dis 'byung

po'i tshogs kyi phyir rtag tu gtor ma byin na dbang dang / mngon spyod dang / dgra'i sde 'jig pa dang / bskrad pa dang / bsad pa dang / dgug pa dang / zhi ba dang rgyas par 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ phyag rgya gang

gis mkha' spyod ma/ /gang gis phyag rgyas sa spyod ma/ /gtso bo bdag gis sngar ma 'tshal/ /bcom ldan ji ltar phyag rgya bgyi/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /gsang gsum 'khor lo'i dbus su ni/ /sku gsung

thugs su phye ba las/ /steng dang 'og dang dbus gnas pa'i/ /'khor lo'i dbus su rnam par gnas/ /sa spyod sku yi phyag rgya can/ /'og zhal sku yi rdo rje ma/ /mkha' spyod 'dod chags phyag rgya can/ /steng zhal gsung gi rdo rje

ma/ /thugs kyi rdo rje bdag med ma/ /sems ni bdag med tshul can nyid/ /sems ni dbus kyi gnas su ste/ /des na bdag med ma dbus skye/ /rgyas par rab tu phye ba las/ /rigs ni rnam pa drug tu brjod/ /rnam gsum

rnam pa lnga nyid kyang / /bshad kyis rnal 'byor ma nyid nyon/ /mi skyod rnam snang rin chen 'byung / /dpag med don grub rdo rje sems/ /zhe sdang gti mug ser sna dang / /'dod chags phrag dog bde ba dag /'dis ni rim pas bsgom

pa nyid/ /rdo rje sems dpa' spangs nas ni/ /phyi nas rigs ni rnam pa lnga/ /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug gis/ /de rjes rnam pa gsum du 'gyur/ /mi bskyod zhe sdang gzugs can gyi/ /thugs kyi bdag po rigs gcig nyid/ /

zhe sdang rdo rje'i byin rlabs 'di/ /rigs ni drug dang lnga ru brjod/ /kye'i rdo rje las rgyud thams cad kyi phyag rgya bsdus pa'i don zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ /gtso bo kye rdor kun sbyin

pas/ /rnam kun rang bzhin bdag nyid kyi/ /dkyil 'khor dag ni yang dag gsungs/ /rnam pa thams cad rang bzhin gyis/ /bde ba can na yang dag bzhugs/ /thugs kyi rdo rje'i sa bon gyis/ /rang gi dkyil 'khor bskyed

pa ste/ /phyag ni bcu drug zhal brgyad pa/ /zhabs bzhi pa la 'jigs pa'o/ /dpa' bo thod pa'i phreng ba can/ /bdag med mas ni mgul nas khyud/ /phyag rgya lnga ni 'dzin lha la/ /bdag med ma ni nyid kyis zhus/ /bcwa lngas

yongs su bskor ba yi/ /bdag gi 'khor lo khyod bshad na/ /khyod kyi dkyil 'khor ji ltar lags/ /gtso bo bdag gis spar ma 'tshal/ /bdag med ma la 'o mdzad nas/ /rdo rje thor par rtsal nas ni/ /lha yi nu ma mnye mdzad de/ /

dkyil 'khor yang dag rab tu dbye/ /'khor lo ji ltar sngar gsungs pa/ /dol shal do shal phyed pas brgyan/ /mtshams bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /rdo rje srad bus yang dag brgyan/ /'dod chags chen po'i rjes chags pas/ /lhan

cig skyes dga'i rang bzhin las/ /khyod dang lhan cig bzhin bzangs ma/ /de la dbus su nga yod de/ /zhal brgyad pa la zhabs bzhi pa/ /phyag ni bcu drug gis brgyan pa/ /bdud bzhi mnyam par mnan pa nyid/ /'jigs pa yang ni

'jigs pa'o/ /mgau'i 'phreng bas do shal mdzad/ /nyi mar bzhugs shing rol mor bcas/ /kha dog nag po 'jigs pa po/ /sna tshogs rdo rje spyi bor 'dzin/ /nyid kyi zhal nas hU~M spro zhing / /thal bas lus la byugs pa nyid/ /bdag

med lhan cig mnyam sbyor zhing / /dga' ba gnyis gnyis snyoms 'jug pas/ /dba' rlabs med pa'i bde ba thob/ /rloms sems med pa'i rang bzhin can/ /rtsal ba'i zhal ni nag po che/ /g.yas pa la ni kun dang mtshungs/ /

g.yon pa dmar zhing cher 'jigs pa/ /spyi bo'i zhal ni gtsigs pa can/ /spyan ni nyi shu rtsa bzhis phye/ /lhag ma'i zhal ni bung ba bzhin/ /grong khyer nyams dgar khyod dang nga / /dga' bas shin tu rol pa las/ /dkar mo dbang po'i phyogs

phyung nas/ /shar gyi sgo ru yang dag gnas/ /srub dang bsrub pa'i sbyor ba las/ /chom rkun ma yang phyung nas ni/ /phyung nas lho'i sgo ru ni/ /chom rkun ma ni sgo srungs ma/ /bo la kak+ko la sbyor bas/ /ro langs ma yang phyung nas ni/ /phyung nas nub kyi

sgo ru ni/ /bdud 'joms ma ni rnam par gnas/ /dga' ba chen po'i snyoms 'jug las/ /g+hasma rI yang phyung nas ni/ /phyung nas byang gi sgo la ni/ /'jigs pa'i gzugs can ma nyid gnas/ /gnyis kyis bskyod pa'i sbyor ba las/ /

puk+ka sI yang phyung nas ni/ /phyung nas dbang ldan mtshamasu ni/ /drag po'i gzugs can ma nyid gnas/ /yang ni srub pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /'tshed pa'i mtshamasu ri khrod ma/ /srin po'i mtshamasu gdol pa mo/ /rlung gi mtshamasu g.yung mo nyid/ /

de nas rdo rje chags chen las/ /rig mar bcas pa khu bar gyur/ /sna tshogs klu yi mchod pa las/ /de nas lha mo rnams kyis bskul/ /rje btsun snying rje'i yid bzhengs shig /puk+ka sI ni bdag la skyobs/ /stong pa'i rang bzhin nyid

spongs la/ /bdag la bde chen sbyor bzhed mdzod/ /khyod med na ni bdag 'gums pas/ /kye yi rdo rje khyod bzhengs shig /stong pa'i rang bzhin nyid spongs las/ /ri khrod ma 'bras grub par mdzod/ /dga' gtso 'jig rten 'gron

gnyer ba/ /stong pa nyid la bzhugs sam ci/ /khyod med phyogs ni mi 'tshal bas/ /gdol pa mo bdag zhu bar bgyid/ /bdag gis khyod kyis thugs 'tshal gyis/ /mig 'phrul mnga' ba khyod bzhings shig /g.yung mo bdag

nyid dran mnyam pas/ /snying rje rgyun chad ma mdzad cig /glang po rta bong glang rnga mo/ /mi dang sha ra b+ha byi la/ /g.yas pa'i thod pa brgyad rnams la/ /gnyis 'thung la sogs rim shes bya/ /sa dang chu dang rlung dang ni/ /me dang zla ba nyi

ma nyid/ /mthar byed dang ni nor sbyin nyid/ /g.yon pa'i thod pa brgyad na'o/ /sgeg cing dpa' bo mi sdug pa/ /rgod cing drag shul 'jigs rung ba/ /snying rje rngam dang zhi ba yis/ /gar dgu'i ro dang ldan pa nyid/ /\u0f00 dang hU~M gis rdo rje che/ /

khu ba'i gzugs las bzhengs nas ni/ /zhabs nams sa la brdebs pa dang / /lha dang lha min bsdigs par mdzad/ /gaM tsaM baM g+haM shaM tsaM laM DaM/ 'di yis sa bon phyung ba las/ /bdag po'i sa bon dag gis ni/ /\u0f00 hU~M sngon po 'bar

'jigs pas/ /ma mo'i 'khor lo grong nyams dgar/ /kha dog nag po 'jigs chen po/ /bdag med bde ba sbyin pa po/ /gtso bo 'di ltar bsgom pa nyid/ /dkar mo'i g.yas na gri gug ste/ /de bzhin g.yon na ro hi ta/ /chom rkun ma g.yas cang te'u ste/ /

g.yon pa'i phyag na phag pa nyid/ /ro langs ma g.yas rusbal te/ /g.yon pa yis ni pad+ma'i snod/ /g+hasma rI yi g.yas na sprul/ /g.yon pas rnal 'byor lhung bzed nyid/ /puk+ka sI g.yas seng+ge ste/ /g.yon pas dgra sta de bzhin no/ /ri khrod ma g.yas dge

slong ste/ /g.yon pas bsil byed de bzhin no/ /gdol pa mo g.yas 'khor lo ste/ /g.yon pas thod pa de bzhin no/ /g.yung mo g.yas na rdo rje nyid/ /g.yon na sdigs 'dzub de bzhin no/ /dkyil dkrung phyed pa'i gar gyis gnas/ /dkar mo la sogs phyag

gnyis brjod/ /spyan gsum skra ni gyen du ste/ /phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan/ /gau rI kha dog nag por 'gyur/ /chom rkun ma ni btsod dang mtshungs/ /ro langs ma ni gser btsos bzhin/ /g+hasma rI ni mar gad mtshungs/ /puk+ka sI ni dbang sngon mtshungs/ /

ri khrod ma ni zla nor 'od/ /gtum mo nam mkha'i sngo sangs ma/ /g.yung mo sna tshogs pa zhes brjod/ /tshangs pa dbang po nye dbang drag /gshen rje dang ni nor bdag dang / /bden bral dang ni thags bzangs ris/ /gau rI la sogs pa'i gdan/ /bo l+la bzhib

par mdzad nas ni/ /dam du mkhyud cing 'o mdzad pas/ /bcom ldan gus pas mchod nas ni/ /bdag med ma yis sngags zhus so/ /bud med rnams kyi dbang byed sngags/ /de bzhin gdug pa sdig pa dang / /klu rnams bsdig par byed pa nyid/ /lha dang

lha min rnam nyed pa/ /de ni nga yis bshad bya yis/ /lha mo bde ba sbyin pa nyon/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' la/ /bdag gis gzhan du ma bstan to/ /'di yi sngags kyis gang byung zhing / /rdo rje sems dpas gang mdzad pa/ /

lha mo shin tu 'jigs pa ste/ /ngo ma mchog pas khyod la bshad/ /'bar ba'i 'phreng ba 'khrug pa yi/ /dkyil 'khor rab tu bzhengs nas ni/ /rdo rje snying po dbang sbyin phyir/ /thig le mchog ni bkug pa nyid/ /bzlas pa khri yis gsal

ba dang / /sgra ring ba dang bzang ba yis/ /kye yi rdo rje sbyor ldan pas/ /btsun mo thams cad dgug par bya/ /bzlas pa 'bum gyis rnal 'byor bdag /kye'i rdo rje'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /dogs pa med pa'i sems kyis ni/ /'di yi las

rnams thams cad byed/ /rig byed rnams kyis dang po sbyin/ /zla phyed thig les rnam par brgyan/ /de nas aSh+TA na nA ya ping ga ur+d+ha ke sha bar+t+ma ne/ tsa turbi sha ti ne trA ya/ de'i rjesu/ Sho Da sha b+hu dzA ya/ kr-iSh+NA dzI mU ta wa puShe ka pA la ne ka d+hA ra Ne/

A d+ha mA taH krU ra tsit+tA ya ar d+hen du daMSh+Ti Ne/ \u0f00 mA ra ya mA ra ya/ kA ra ya kA ra ya/ gar+dz+dza ya gar+dz+dza ya/ tar+dz+dza ya tar+dz+dza ya/ sho Sha ya sho Sha ya/ sap+ta sA ga rA na/ b+han+d+ha ban+d+ha na gASh+Ta kA na grih+Na sha trUn/ ha hA hi hI hu hU he hai ho hau haM ha hU~M phaT swA hA/

de nas lha mo de dgyes nas/ /srub dang srub pa'i sbyor ba las/ /dam du 'khyud dang 'o byed pas/ /dkyil 'khor yid du 'ong ba zhus/ /de la ston pa che shes che/ /rdo rje pad+ma mnyam sbyar nas/ /dgyes pa'i thugs kyis mnyam gzhag

pas/ /nyid kyi dkyil 'khor bri bar mdzad/ /'phar ma gcig dang sgo bzhi pa/ /sna tshogs 'od kyis yang dag 'khrugs/ /rta babs bzhi dang yang dag ldan/ /rdo rje srad bus rnam par brgyan/ /re khA lnga dang yang dag ldan/ /

de nas bum pa brgyad po bri/ /rin chen lnga yi phye ma 'am/ /yang na 'bras la sogs pa yi/ /dur khrod kyi ni so phag gam/ /de bzhin dur khrod sol ba yis/ /de dbus pad+ma 'dab ma ni/ /brgyad pa ze bar bcas pa bri/ /snying por

skyas pa'i thod pa nyid/ /mdog dkar cha ni gsum pa bri/ /dbang ldan du ni sha ra b+ha/ /me'i mtshams su dge slong bri/ /bden bral du ni 'khor lo bri/ /rlung du rigs kyi bdag po bri/ /shar sgor de bzhin gri gug nyid/ /lho ru cang te'u

bri ba nyid/ /nub tu rus sbal bri ba nyid/ /lto 'phye byang du bzhin no/ /lha mo'i kha dog dbye ba yis/ /phyag mtshan brgyad du rab tu grags/ /dbus su thod pa dkar po yang / /sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan pa bri/ /de nas rgyal

rgyal bum pa nyid/ /yal ga'i rtse mo gos bzang can/ /lto ba rin chen lngas gang ba/ /sA lu skyes pas yongs bkang bzhag /mang du rab tu brjod pas ci/ /ji ltar de nyid bsdus pa yi/ /dkyil 'khor cho ga de bzhin bya/ /bcu gnyis

brgyad gnyis lon pa yi/ /rig ma bde chen brgyad po nyid/ /do shal rkang gdub kyis brgyan nas/ /dkyil 'khor du ni rab tu gzhug /ma dang sring mo nyid dang yang / /bu mo sring mo tsha mo dang / /de bzhin zhang po'i chung ma dang / /ma yi spun dang

sgyug mo dang / /de bzhin pha yi sring mo dang / /rigs ma brgyad du rab tu grags/ /dam du 'khyud dang 'o byed pas/ /'di rnams rnal 'byor pa yis mchod/ /de las ga pur btung ba nyid/ /des ni dkyil 'khor bsang gtor bya/ /de

rnams rnal 'byor pas btung bya/ /dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur/ /de la chang yang btung ba dang / /sha dang sA lus skyes pa bza'/ /de yang gos dang bral byas nas/ /b+ha gar 'o ni yang dag bya/ /des kyang bol+la bzhib par bya/ /

gar bya klu yang blang bar bya/ /bol+la kak+ko la sbyar nas/ /de la rtsed mo rtse bar bya/ /de nas thun tshod gnyis pa la/ /gos kyis mig ni bkab nas su/ /der ni slob ma gzhugs pa nyid/ /phyi nas daskyil 'khor rab tu bstan/ /mtshan

mo skye bo med khyim du/ /slob dpon la sogs rab phye nas/ /dbang ni ji ltar gsungs pa nyid/ /de la dbang bskur sbyin par bya/ /ji ltar mchod dang bstod bshad pa/ /slob ma bzang pos sngar shes bya/ /de la de nyid bstan par bya/ /

dga' bral dang po mchog mtha' can/ /thams cad rgyud du sbas pa ste/ /mtha' yi mtha' ru phye ba nyid/ /rdo rje mchod pa rab sbyar nas/ /de la lha mo des zhus pa/ /lha re skad cig ji ltar lags/ /gtso bo chen pos bshad du gsol/ /

bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /der ni thog ma dbus mtha' med/ /srid med mya ngan 'das pa med/ 'di ni mchog tu bde chen nyid/ /bdag med gzhan yang med pa nyid/ /longs spyod kyi ni rlabs gnyis la/ /rang gi g.yas dang

lag gzhan gyi/ /mthe bong dang ni srin lag gis/ /de ni rnal 'byor pa yis btsir/ /de nas ye shes skye bar 'gyur/ /de las ci zhig skye zhe na/ /gzhon nu'i dga' ba ji lta ba'i/ /lkugs pa'i rmi lam ji lta'o/ /mchog gi mtha' dang

dga' bral dbus/ /stong dang stong min he ru ka /kye rdo rje las kye'i rdo rje mngon par 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// // lha mo la ni dam 'khyud cing / /bol+la thod par bcug nas ni/ /dam du nu ma bzung mdzad

nas/ /skyes pa'i sna ni gzhibs nas kyang / /tshems kyis ma mchu btsir nas ni/ /mchan khung sen mos rma mdzad de/ /mnyam sbyor bde ba myang mdzad nas/ /phyag rgya lnga ni rab phye ba/ /bla ma slob dpon 'dod lta la/ /

phyag 'tshal don du 'khor lo 'dzin/ /bla ma rdo rje 'dzin pa la/ /smod tshig mi nyan pa yi phyir/ /rna ba dag tu rna cha 'dzin/ /sngags kyi bzlas pa 'gul rgyan nyid/ /gdub bu srog chags gsod pa spangs/ /phyag rgya

sten pa ska rags nyid/ /sangs rgyas lnga yi phyag rgyas ni/ /rtag tu lus la phyag rgyas gdab/ /de nas rab tu bzhad mdzad nas/ /tshems kyis ma mchu btsir nas ni/ /kyai rdo rje zhes bya ba/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i

gzugs can nyid/ /de la lha mo des zhus pa/ /gtso bo cho ga gang gis dang / /de bzhin bya ba gang gis ni/ /kye'i rdo rje'i bris sku ni/ /byed pa bde ba chen pos gsungs/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dir ni 'dri

mkhan dam tshig can/ /sgrub po'ang dam tshig can gyis ni/ /bri sku 'jigs pa bri ba nyid/ /skyes pa'i thod gnas kha dog lnga/ /ro yi sgra yi dri nyid kyi/ /bri sku bla ma bri ba nyid/ /gang gang skud pa 'khal ba dang / /gang gang ras yug

'thag pa yang / /de yang dam tshig can nges pas/ /dam tshig byin rlabs rnal 'byor pas/ /zla ba zla ba'i mar ngo yi/ /bcu bzhi pa la khyim dben par/ /phyed na ma rungs sems kyis ni/ /chang gi btung ba cung zad las/ /

lus la ni raM shu bsams nas/ /de bzhin gcer bur gyur pas kyang / /'bag pa dang ni ma dag pas/ /de nas dam tshig rab tu bza'/ /bzhin bzangs snying rje ldan pa dang / /gzugs dang lang tsho skal bzang ma/ /me tog bcas shing sgrub

por dga'/ /rang gi phyag rgya g.yon du gzhag /kye'i rdo rje las bris sku'i cho ga'i le'u ste drug pa'o// // de nas de la lha mos zhus/ /bol+la kak+ko la sbyar nas/ /tshems kyis ma mchu btsir nas ni/ /glegs bam yang ni ji ltar 'gyur/ /rdo rje pad+ma mnyam sbyar

nas/ /dgyes pas lha yis rab phye ba/ /glegs bam nga yis bshad bya yis/ /lha mo bskal pa chen mo nyon/ /sbrang chen snag tsha byas nas ni/ /mi yis rus pa'i smyu gus ni/ /glegs bam sor ni bcu gnyis pa/ /gro khar dam tshig can gyis bri/ /glegs

bam dang ni bris sku nyid/ /gal te skal med mthong na ni/ /skye ba 'dir ni dngos grub med/ /'jig rten pha rol spyod yul med/ /yang dag rab sbyin ldan pa la/ /res 'ga' tsam zhig bstan pa nyid/ /glegs bam lam gyi spyod yul du/ /skra dang mchan

khung nyid du sba/ /b+ha gar ling ga rab bzhag nas/ /yang dang yang du 'o mdzad nas/ /bde chen mnyam par myang mdzad de/ /rdo rje can gyi bza' ba bstan/ /tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor bza' ba ni/ /nyon cig lha mo mig yangs ma/ /gang du zos pas

'dod don kun/ /sgrub pa can gyi dngos grub 'gyur/ /dur khrod ri'i bya skyibs dang / /de bzhin mi med grong khyer dang / /yang na dben pa'am rgya mtsho'i mthar/ /bza' ba 'di ni rab tu bza'/ /de la gdan du rtag pa ni/ /ro yi gzugs

can dgu dang ni/ /yang na stag gi lpags pa dang / /dur khrod ras ni de bzhin no/ /dbus su kye'i rdo rje'i gzugs/ /ji ltar sngar bzhin gnas shes nas/ /phyogs dang phyogs bral dag tu yang / /de nas rnal 'byor ma

rnams dgod/ /dam tshig mA la tin+ta naM/ /stag gi lpags pa'i steng du bza'/ /'bad nas rgyal po'i sA lu yi/ /bza' ba der ni bza' ba nyid/ /der ni zos nas zos nas kyang / /der ni ma mo mchod par bya/ /sring mo bu mo sgyug mo

dang / /gal te ma sring yin na yang / /de rnams rtag tu legs mchod na/ /tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor 'grub par 'gyur/ /skyes pa'i thod chen cha cig par/ /chang ni bzang pos yongs bkang ste/ /bla ma la dbul skal chen ma/ /phyag 'tshal

nas ni rang yang btung / /pad+ma'i lag pas blangs pa dang / /de nyid kyi ni lag pas dbul/ /yang nas yang du rab 'dud pa/ /de ltar sgrub pa po yis bya/ /kye'i rdo rje las bza' ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// // de nas rnal
'byor mas zhus pa/ /phyag rgya chen po ji lta bu/ /kun rdzob rnam pa'i gzugs kyis ni/ /bde ba sbyin pas bshad du gsol/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /shin tu ring min thung ba min/ /gnag pa ma

yin dkar ba min/ /pad+ma'i 'dab ma'i rnam pa 'dra/ /de yi dbugs ni dri zhim ldan/ /rdul kyang dri zhim ldan 'gyur te/ /ri dgas lte ba'i dri dang mtshungs/ /pad+ma la yang dbang mchog dri/ /skad cig pad+ma lta bu 'byung / /

de'i ga bur sih+la dag /mkhas pas dri bzang mtshon par bya/ /ud pa la yi drir 'gyur zhing / /a ka ru ni nag po mtshungs/ /dal zhing mi g.yo ba nyid dang / /snyan par smra zhing yid 'ong ma/ /skra bzang dbus su gnyer ma
gsum/ /phal pas pad+ma can du brjod/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i gzugs can ma/ /de rnyed nas ni dngos grub 'gyur/ /de nas rnal 'byor bdag med mas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das smon lam ji ltar gdab par bgyi/

bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /rigs su skye dang dam tshig can/ /smyo med kye yi rdo rje ston/ /bla ma la gus snying rjer ldan/ /skye zhing skye bar 'gyur bar shog /lag pas rdo rje dril bu 'khrol/ /
zab mo'i chos ni klog pa dang / /btsun mo'i khu ba mnyam bzas can/ /skye zhing skye bar 'gyur bar shog /de nas lha mo de dgyes nas/ /tshig ni 'di nyid yang zhus pa/ /skal med sems can gdul dka' ba/ /

gang gis 'dul bar 'gyur ba lags/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /dang por gso sbyong len par bya/ /de rjes bslab pa'i gnas bcu nyid/ /de la bye brag smra bar bstan/ /mdo sde pa yang de bzhin no/ /

de nas rnal 'byor spyod pa nyid/ /de yi rjes la dbu ma bstan/ /sngags kyi rim pa kun shes nas/ /de rjes kye'i rdo rje brtsam/ /slob mas gus par blangs nas ni/ /'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /kye'i rdo rje

las 'dul ba'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// // de nas kha sbyar 'byed pa yi/ /mtshan nyid yang dag rab tu bshad/ /gang gis rnam par shes tsam gyis/ /sgrub pos dngos grub thob 'gyur ba/ /bsgrub bya'i lte ba'i rtsa ba la/ /brtul zhugs can gyi

lag pas gdon/ /he ru ka mnyam rnal 'byor gyis/ /nang gi ma rungs sems kyis ni/ /'di ni sgom pa tsam gyis ni/ /sangs rgyas kyang ni nges par 'jigs/ /bstan la gnod pa byed pa dang / /bla ma sangs rgyas 'jig pa ni/ /bla ma

thub pa la zhus nas/ /snying rjes bsad par bya ba nyid/ /ji ltar phyugs kyi gzugs mthong nas/ /khrag ni skyugs pa nyid dang yang / /'dar zhing mgo skyes grol ba dang / kha ni 'og tu rnam par sgom/ /de yi lam du khab

ni me'i/ /gzugs can 'jug par bsam pa ste/ /snying gar byin za'i sa bon nyid/ /dmigs nas skad cig gsod par byed/ /rgyud 'di la ni bsreg blugs med/ /phyag rgya cing dang bya ba'ang med/ /rgyud chen klags pas 'grub pa nyid/ /
bsam gtan tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur/ /rtog med dngos grub sbyin pa po/ /srid pa spyod pa nyams dga' bar/ /gsang ba mchog ni bshad bya yis/ /nyon cig lha mo bzhin bzangs ma/ /rin chen gzi brjid

'bar ba yi/ /phreng ba 'khrug pa lha mo ltos/ /ma phug pas ni sbyor bral 'gyur/ /phug pas dga' ba sbyin pa'o/ /de ltar 'khor bar 'dod pa yi/ /yon tan lnga ldan rin chen nyid/ /ma dag pas ni dug tu 'gro/ /

dag par bdud rtsi lta bur 'gyur/ /'khor ba'i rnam pa he ru ka /'gro ba sgrol ba'i gtso bo nyid/ /gang gi gzugs kyis 'gyur ba nyid/ /de ni nga yis smra yi nyon/ /snying rje'i spyan ni dmar po la/ /byams pa'i

thugs la yan lag gnas/ /bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi yis ni/ /zhabs ni rnam pa bzhi zhes brjod/ /zhal brgyad rnam par thar pa brgyad/ /phyag ni stong pa bcu drug nyid/ /gug skyed kyis ni sangs rgyas lnga/ /

gdug pa 'dul phyir khro bo nyid/ /sha ni puk+ka sI ru brjod/ /de bzhin khrag ni ri khrod ma/ /gdol pa mo ni khu bar brjod/ /g.yung mo rkang dang tshil bu dag /lpags pa byang chub yan lag bdun/ /rus pa bden
pa bzhi po nyid/ /bdag med mas gsol pa/ sngags btu ba ni ji ltar 'gyur/ /gang gi sngags kyis skye bo yi/ /las kyi dngos grub 'gyur ba nyid/ /bde ba chen pos bshad du gsol/ /bcom

ldan 'das rdo rje can chen po/ rdo rje snying po gzi brjid chen pos bka' stsal pa/ sngags ni khyod la ngas bshad kyis/ /lha mo skal pa chen mo nyon/ /dang por rnam par snang mdzad sbyin/ /uSh+mA rnams kyis bzhi pa la/ /
puk+ka sIs brgyan stong pas mnan/ /mdog dkar mthar ni swA hA sbyar/ /'dis ni bzlas pa 'bum gyis ni/ /'gro bar rtag tu rengs par byed/ /dang por yi ge'i bdag po bzhag /de rjes mkha' spyod ma de nas/ /

mthar ni swA hA sbyar byas nas/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyang dbang du byed/ /rig byed rnams kyis dang po sbyin/ /dang po yi ni gnyis pa la/ /stong bcas mtha' ni swA hA sbyar/ /sangs rgyas kyang skrod shes rab can/ /
dang por rnam par snang mdzad sbyin/ /gnyis pa yi ni gsum pa la/ /rwa dang ldan zhing chu mas brgyan/ /stong bcas swA hA yang dag ldan/ /mi rnams thams cad sdang bar byed/ /dang po yi ge'i dbang

phyug gzhag /lnga pa nyid kyi gsum pa la/ /stong pa mkha' 'gro ma dang ldan/ /mthar ni swA hA mngon spyod che/ /yang ni yi ge'i thu bo sbyin/ /hU~M ni khrag dang 'dra ba yi/ /mthar ni swA hA thig le mchog /dga'
bzang ma sogs rtag tu 'gugs/ /gti mug rigs ni dang por sbyin/ /g+hu ni yang dag rab tu sbyar/ /mthar ni swA hA yang byas na/ /lha dang mi rnams gsod par byed/ /dang por rnam par snang mdzad bzhag /

dang po nyid kyi dang po la/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dang sbyar/ /mthar gnas pa yi gnyis pa la/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dang ldan/ /yang na dang po'i rtse mo la/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dang ldan/ /mthar gnas pa yi

gsum pa la/ /yang ni de nyid yang dag ldan/ /steng du chom rkun ma yis brgyan/ /de rjes hrIHyis rnam par sbyar/ /mthar yang swA hA spyod pa nyid/ /ku ru kul+le'i sngags so/ /\u0f00 ni dang po bzhi pa yi/ /
gsum pa chom rkun ma yis brgyan/ /mthar gnas pa yi bzhi pa la/ /pi tsu badzra sbyar ba dang / /uSh+mA rnams kyi bzhi pa la/ /puk+ka sI yis rnam par brgyan/ /stong pas mnan cing sum 'gyur nyid/ /

lnga pa yi ni gnyis pa dang / /gsum pa'i dang po mthar swA hA/ /kye'i rdo rje'i snying po'o/ /snang mdzad dang por dz+wa la gnyis/ /sbyar nas lnga pa'i bzhi pa la/ /mthar gnas rnams kyi dang po ldan/ /g+hasma rIs ni

rnam par brgyan/ /uSh+mA rnams kyi bzhi pa la/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma yis brgyan/ /stong pas mnan cing sum 'gyur nyid/ /lnga pa yi ni gnyis pa dang / /gsum pa'i dang po mthar swA hA/ phyag bzhi pa'i sngags so/ /

dang por rnam snang dang po yi/ /dang po nang gi dkar mos brgyan/ /gsum pa nyid kyi dang po la/ /nang gi dkar mos rnam par brgyan/ /nyis 'gyur lnga pa'i gsum pa dang / /gnyis pa'i gsum pa me yis brgyan/ /hU~M gi rnam pa gsum
