sbyar nas/ /lnga pa nyid kyi gnyis pa dang / /gsum pa'i dang po mthar swA hA/ /phyag drug pa'i sngags so/ /dang po rnam snang bzhi pa yi/ /dang po byin za yang dag ldan/ /ro langs ma yis rnam par brgyan/ /mthar

gnas pa yi gsum pa la/ /g+hasma ri yis rnam par brgyan/ /dang po yi ni dang po la/ /mthar gnas pa yi dang po dang / /rdo rje ma yis rnam par brgyan/ /k+Sha ni chom rkun ma yis brgyan/ /lnga pa nyid kyi dang po dang / /uSh+mA rnams

kyi bzhi pa la/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma yis brgyan/ /stong pas mnan cing sum 'gyur te/ /phaT dang mthar ni swA hA nyid/ /phyag gnyis pa'i sngagaso/ /bdag med dang po'i dang po dang / /gnyis pa nyid kyi dang po dang / /

gsum pa nyid kyi dang po dang / /bzhi pa yi ni dang po dang / /lnga pa yi ni dang po dang / /mthar gnas rnams kyi dang po dang / /uSh+mA rnams kyi dang po nyid/ /dang por rnam snang mthar swA hA/ /grong khyer dkrug pa'i sngags kyi
bzlas pa ni 'bum mo/ /mthar gnas rnams kyi gnyis pa dang / /k+Sha yi rnam pa nyis 'gyur nyid/ /hU~M gi rnam pa gsum dang ldan/ /dang por rnam snang phaT nyid kyi/ /rnam pa nang bcug mthar swA hA/

sa sbyangs pa'i sngags so/ /dang por rnam snang de rjes su/ /rdo rje ma yi mthar ru hU~M/ /bza' ba dang btung ba byin gyis brlabs pa'o/ /dang por rnam par snang mdzad nyid/ /de rjes a kA ro mu kha~M/ /uSh+mA rnams kyi gsum pa

dang / /mthar gnas pa yi bzhi pa ni/ /steng du me yis rnam par brgyan/ /d+harmA NA~M de rjes rdo rje ma/ /byin la d+ya nut+pan+na twAta/ /\u0f00 AHhU~M phaT swA hA/ /'byung po thams cad kyi gtor ma'i sngags so/ /kye'i rdo rje las sngags btu ba'i
le'u ste dgu pa'o// // de nas chom rkun sdom gcig pa'i/ /rdo rje sems dpa' zhes byas gsungs/ /bdag med ma la 'o mdzad nas/ /bzlas pa'i yul ni rab tu dbye/ /shel gyis rengs pa'i bzlas pa

nyid/ /dbang la tsan dan dmar po nyid/ /lung tang gis ni mngon spyod nyid/ /ni raM shus ni sdang ba la/ /rta yi rus pas skrod pa nyid/ /bram ze'i rus pas 'gugs pa nyid/ /glang po'i rus pas char ba la/ /ma he yis

kyang bsad pa la/ /rengs pa 'o ma'i btung ba nyid/ /dbang la rang gi 'dun pas spyad/ /bsad pa la ni sih+la nyid/ /dgug pa la ni bzhi mnyam nyid/ /sdang la sA lu skyes pa brjod/ /bskrad pa nyid la gla bar brjod/ /

yang na mtha'i shwa dang / dang po'i shwa dang / na dang po dang / ga dang po dang / ha dang po nyid kyang de bzhin no/ /kye'i rdo rje las bzlas pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// // kye'i rdo rje la dam mkhyud cing / /tshems kyis ma mchu btsir nas ni/ /lus
can rnams kyi rigs kyi gzugs/ /de la bdag med mas zhus pa/ /b+ha gar ling ga gzhag nas ni/ /'khor lo'i 'dren pas 'di skad gsungs/ /lus can rang gi rigs bshad kyis/ /shes rab pha rol phyin ma nyon/ /

bud med dam ni skyes pa yi/ /gang gi srin lag rtsa ba la/ /rdo rje rtse dgu par gyur pa/ /mi skyod pa yi rigs mchog nyid/ /rnam snang mdzad kyi 'khor lor 'gyur/ /dpag med mgon gyi 'dam skyes nyid/ /rin chen

'byung ba'i rin chen nyid/ /las kyi rigs kyi ral gri nyid/ /rnal 'byor pa gang nag po che/ /de yi lha ni mi skyod pa/ /rnal 'byor pa gang dkar po che/ /de yi lha ni rnam snang mdzad/ /rnal 'byor pa gang sngo bsangs che/ /

de yi lha ni don yod nyid/ /rnal 'byor pa gang ser po che/ /rin chen bdag po rigs kyi lha/ /rnal 'byor pa gang dkar dmar nyid/ /'od dpag med pa rigs kyi lha/ /rnal 'byor pa gang dkar dang ser/ /de ni sems
dpa'i rigasu 'gyur/ /skye bo rnal 'byor mthar phyin pas/ /nga rgyal mi bcag tho mi btsam/ /kun rdzob gzugs su gnas nas ni/ /de rnams bde gshegs rigasu 'gyur/ /bud med rnams kyi mtshan nyid 'di/ /

ji ltar skyes pa de bzhin no/ /kun rdzob tha snyad tshul las ni/ /de yi rigasu'ang de 'gyur ro/ /b+ha gar ling ga'i 'o mdzad nas/ /de la rdo rje che mnyes nas/ /bdag med ma yis go mdzad pa/ /lha mo rab tu mchod pa nyon/ /tshal

dang skye bo med gnas dang / /bdag gi khyim gyi nang du yang / /gcer bu phyag rgya che byas nas/ /rnal 'byor rig pas rtag tu mchod/ /'o dang 'khyud pa byas nas ni/ /de bzhin b+ha gar reg pa nyid/ /skyes pa'i sna ni gzhib pa nyid/ /

ma mchu'i sbrang rtsi btung ba nyid/ /rtag tu myos pa'i mtshan ma las/ /bo la ldan pas lag pas bya/ /khyogs dang brla zhes bya ba dang / /de bzhin shin tu bkal ba yi/ /yang yang rdo rjes 'dod pa bya/ /steng dang 'og tu lta ba nyid/ /

dngos grub rgyas pa thob pa ste/ /sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam par 'gyur/ /de la ga pur btung bar bya/ /de la ga pur rgyu yi phyir/ /sha ni bza' ba nyid du bya/ /khyad par du ni chang nyid do/ /kye'i rdo rje las lhan cig

skyes pa'i sbyor ba don gyi le'u zhes bya ba ste bcu gcig pa'o// // de nas rdo rje can gyis dbang / /bzhi pa'i tshigs bcad bka' stsal pa/ /rdo rje rab gnas rdo rje nyid/ /che dang dril bu chen po bzung / /de ring rdo rje slob dpon

'gyur/ /slob ma bsdu ba nyid du gyis/ /ji ltar 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ /byang chub sras rnams dbang bskur ba/ /bdag gis gsang ba'i dbang gis ni/ /sems kyi rgyun gyis dbang bskur ro/ /lha mo dga' sbyin gnas

sbyin ma/ /sna tshogs gzugs can yid 'ong ma/ /khyer cig khyer cig sems dpa' che/ /khyer la mchod pa dag tu gyis/ /ye shes 'di ni chas phra zhing / /rdo rje nam mkha'i dkyil lta bu/ /rdul bral thar sbyin zhi ba nyid/ /khyod rang yang ni de yi pha/ /

rdo rje dang pad+ma byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags zha/ oM pad+ma su khA d+hA ra ma hA rA ga su khaM da da tsa tu rA nan+da b+hA ga bi shwa hU~M hU~M hU~M kAr+yaM ku ru Sh+wa me/ oM badzra ma hA dwe Sha tsa tu rA nan+da dA ya ka /kha ga mu khai ka ra so nA tha hU~M hU~M hU~M kAr+yaM ku ru Sh+wa

me/ spyi bor ni oM gyi rnam pa/ snying gar ni hU~M gi rnam pa/ ze 'bru la ni AH'i rnam pa'o/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sgyu ma'i brtag pa zhes bya ba brtag pa sum bcu rtsa gnyis las phyung ba brtag pa gnyis kyi bdag nyid kye'i rdo rje mkha'

'gro ma dra ba'i sdom pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs s+ho// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po ga ya d+ha ra'i zhal snga nas dang / bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ slar yangalo ts+tsha ba gzhon nu dpal gyis 'gyur chad

bsabs shing dag par bgyis pa'o/ / @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya DA kI nI badzra pany+dzar ma hA tan+t+ra rA dzA kalpa nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje gur zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po'i brtags pa/ kye rdo rje la phyag

'tshal lo/ /nam mkha' bems bcas dang ba dang / /go skabs med dang 'byed pa dang / /sna tshogs rdo rje'i gzhi gnas khang / /sems can khams dang yid 'ong dang / /sems can snod dang 'jig rten dang / /sa dang sa 'og bar snang dang / /

yid dang lus dang ngag dang ni/ /gcig la gnyis dang mkha' bde dang / /drug dang lnga dang drug gnyis dang / /skye 'gro rnams ni bzhi po dang / /gcig gis nyi shur 'tshang ba dang / /khams gsum ma lus pa dang ni/ /pha dang bu dang ma mo dang / /phyi rol dang ni nang

dang ngam/ /btsun mo kun dang chos dang ni/ /thams cad las dang bdag med dang / /'bras bu rgyu dang bya ba zhes/ /bsgrub bya sgrub thabs rdo rje dang / /de bzhin kun gzhi rnam shes dang / /chos kyi dbyings dang ma byung dang / /mkha' yi khams dang rang

dbyings dang / /bdag med pa dang bdag ces dang / /dngos po med dang dngos med min/ /bde ba can dang gru gsum dang / /a skyes dang ni skyon bral dang / /rdul bral dang ni sdig bcom dang / /dba' rlabs med pa'i rang bzhin dang / /

mthar ni zhi ba'i bde rig dang / /gsang ba mchog dang dgyes pa la/ /sangs rgyas kun khyab sems dpa' ni/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi rdo rje gur/ /'di ni rang byung bcom ldan 'das/ /lha'i bdag po gcig pu nyid/ /thams cad bdag

nyid rtag tu bzhugs/ /'bum phrag lnga bdag kye'i rdo rje/ /las ni dkyil 'khor lngar gsungs pa/ /rdo rje can dang phan pa dang / /de bzhin rdo rje gzi brjid nyid/ /pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug dang / /rta bdun rgyal po lnga pa'o/ /

rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i dkyil 'khor du/ /dkar mo rkun ma ro langs ma/ /g+hasma rI dang puk+ka sI/ /ri khrod gdol pa g.yung mo'o/ /rdo rje phan pa'i dkyil 'khor du/ /skam pa zhags pa ma nyid dang / /dol zlum ma dang lcags kyu

'dzin/ /me tog ma sogs mtshams kyi char/ /rdo rje nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor du/ /nyi lag ma dang mar me ma/ /rin chen sgron ma grog lag ma/ /lA s+yai la sogs mtshams char ro/ /pad+ma chos 'byung lcags sgrogs

dang / /'khyud ma gar gyi dkyil 'khor du/ /gling bu ma sogs mtshams kyi char/ /bdag nyid cha byad sbyor bas so/ /rta yi rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor du/ /rdo rje sgo lcags lde kyog ma/ /sgo ma dang ni gos 'dzin ma/ /

de bzhin mtshams su spyan la sogs/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro de rnams kun/ /rkang pa g.yon pa rkyang bas gnas/ /snying gar g.yon bcangs sdigs 'dzub ste/ /kha dog sna tshogs cher 'bar ba'o/ /shin tu zhe sdang zhe sdang
che/ /gau rI la sogs rab tu grags/ /shin du gti mug rmongs chen las/ /skam pa ma sogs cher bzung ngo / /shin tu gzi brjid cher gsal ba/ /nyi lags ma sogs rab tu grags/ /shin tu 'dod chags
chags chen las/ /pad sogs chos kyi dkyil 'khor du'o/ /phrag dog chen po sgrib chen las/ /sgo lcags ma sogs myur 'gro bdag /rgyal ba mgon po phan pa ni/ /gti mug thams cad zad par mdzad/ /

rdo rje nyi ma rgyal po che/ /rnam par rtog pa'i rab rib 'phrog /rta mgrin 'dod pa chen po ni/ /'dod chags can gyi byang chub ster/ /rdo rje 'gyogs 'gro phrag dog che/ /theg pa gzhan ni rnam par spangs/ /

rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che/ /mi skyod ye shes 'byung ba'i gnas/ /skye 'gro mi bzad mgron gnyer phyir/ /sgrib pa lnga ni 'joms pa po/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par dag pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /

zhe sdang gti mug nga rgyal dang / /'dod chags ser sna skye bo rnams/ /bsdu phyir rang gi 'khor lo la/ /rdo rje gzugs ni du ma 'dzin/ /shin tu sdug pa drag po la/ /zhi ba nye bar mi sbyar te/ /'di mkhyen rdo rje can chen ni/ /

rang gis kye'i rdo rjer 'gyur/ /shin tu stong par zhen rnams kyi/ /yod min brtul zhugs 'dzin rnams kyi/ /sangs rgyas gti mug spyod don du/ /rdo rje rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /shin tu nga rgyal gdug rnams kyi/ /

skye 'gro'i nga rgyal zad par mdzad/ /rdo rje nyi ma bdag nyid rgyal/ /nga rgyal chen po'i mun pa 'joms/ /byang chub chags bral las skyes spangs/ /sems can gang zhig bde byed pa/ /chags pas byang chub rab grub phyir/ /

pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug gyur/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i lam gnas shing / /gang zhig lam gzhan nas 'gro ba/ /de rnams byang chub rab sbyin phyir/ /rdo rje mgyogs 'gro rang gtso bo/ /dbang po gang dang gang lam nyid/ /

de dang de yi ngo bor 'gro/ /mchog tu phan pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid 'gyur/ /gang dang gang gi dngos po yis/ /skyes pa rnams kyis yid sbyor la/ /des na de yi rang bzhin 'gyur/ /
sna tshogs gzugs nor ji bzhin no/ /gang dang gang gis 'dul ba yi/ /sems can 'dul bar 'gyur ba ste/ /de dang de yi rnam pa yis/ /chos kyi bshad pa bya ba'o/ /sems kyi rdo rje las byung ba'i/ /sems

can sna tshogs rang bzhin can/ /sems ni rang gi rnam rtog gis/ /skye bo'i dri mas nag por byas/ /de bas kun tu rab 'bad pas/ /sems kyi rdo rje rnam par sbyang / /sems dag pa ni bde ba yin/ /nyon mongs dug ni thams

cad 'phrog /gal te stong pa thabs yin na/ /de tshe sangs rgyas nyid mi 'gyur/ /'bras bu rgyu las gzhan min phyir/ /thabs ni stong pa nyid ma yin/ /lta ba rnams la log rnams dang / /bdag tu lta ba tshol rnams kyis/ /bdag

zhen bsam pa bzlog pa'i phyir/ /stong par rgyal ba rnams kyis gsungs/ /de phyir dkyil 'khor 'khor lo zhes/ /thabs ni bde ba'i sdom pa ste/ /sangs rgyas nga rgyal rnal 'byor gyis/ /sangs rgyas nyid du myur bar 'gyur/ /ston pa

sum bcu rtsa gnyis mtshan/ /gtso bo dpe byad brgyad cur ldan/ /de phyir thabs kyis bsgrub bya dang / /de ni thabs kyi gzugs can no/ /thams cad kyi rnam pa mchog tu zhi ba sems can 'jug pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// // de nas

rdo rje khams gsum thob/ /rnal 'byor ma yi rdo rje gur/ /dam tshig mchod pa yid 'ong ba/ /'khor la rab tu bka' stsal pa/ /glu ni rdo rje can la 'bul/ /gar ni sangs rgyas rnams la 'bul/ /hi ra mchog la de bzhin dri/ /'jig rten

rje la bza' dang btung / /gos kyis mchod pa rta mchog la/ /'di rnams dam tshig dam pa ste/ /rdo rje mchod pa byas pa yi/ /rdo rje can kun mnyes par byed/ /a ka ru nag kye rdo rje/ /phan pa la ni tsan dan dkar/ /dmar po 'jig rten rje la dbul/ /

kha che rdo rje snang ba la/ /bdun gyi rgyal po thams cad de/ /hU~M rdo rje las byung ba'i dri/ /'di rnams dri yi rab sbyor bas/ /dam pa'i sangs rgyas nyid thob bo/ /tsha ba kha ba rdo rjer 'bul/ /mngar ba rdo rje rtag pa la/ /skyur ba rdo rje nyi ma la/ /

de bzhin lan tshwa 'jig rten rjer/ /rta'i rgyal po thams cad dam/ /bska ba rab tu brtag par bya/ /kye'i rdo rje rdor can gyis/ /me tog mdog gnag rkang 'thung byung / /mal+li kA dang mA la ti/ /kun da rtag tu sangs rgyas 'bul/ /shing gi dbang mchog dri

med mdog /snang byed la ni sbyar bar bya/ /dbang mchog dmar po chu skyes dang / /ban d+hu dmar po pa ta lar/ /pad+ma gar gyi dbang la 'bul/ /rta mchog rdo rje can la kun/ /rdo rje can gyi khru gsum ste/ /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor

khru bzhi pa/ /snang byed la ni khru lnga nyid/ /pad+ma gar dbang drug pa ste/ /lcags kyi rgyal po de bzhin bdun/ /bza' la rdo rje nyi ma yi/ /lam du lcags kyu mchog gi dang / /gnyid la sangs rgyas mgon po yi/ /shin du bde la gar dbang gi/ /

glu gar de bzhin rol mo'i sgra/ /sa gzhi yongs gzung dus su ni/ /rdo rje'i gzugs su bzhag nas ni/ /bdag gis rnal 'byor rab tu bsgrub/ /rdo rje'i dbang po sngon po ste/ /zla ba chu shel thub chen gyi/ /mkhar phyin skyes pa'i me

tog dmar/ /nor bu dmar rgyal mkha' mdzod kyi/ /pad+ma rA ga spyan ras gzigs/ /rta yi'ang ma ra ka ta ste/ /rin chen lnga yi rdul mtshon mchog /de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje can chen po mkha' 'gro ma'i rdo rje gur 'byung po

'dul ba'i ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs so/ /dam tshig yang dag rab phye ba/ /kun tu bzang po'i sa bon bdag /dbang po sngon po lta bu'i 'od/ /phyag bzhi 'jigs byed chen po ste/ /mdzes pa'i khro bo yi ni lus/ /dbang ldan

'byung po mnan pa ste/ /g.yas pas rigs kyi bdag po nyid/ /lag pa g.yon pas khyi lpags nyid/ /gnyis po dag gis phyag rgyar sbyor/ /zhabs g.yon rkyang bas yang dag gnas/ /cung zad mche bas 'jigs par byed/ /mgo bo'i phreng

ba'i rgyan mchog ste/ /mgo 'dzings phyed du bcings par ni/ /ri yi rtse mor bsgom par bya/ /'byung po 'dul bar 'grub par 'gyur/ /gnod sbyin du ma 'byung po dang / /gnod sbyin mo dang klu mo dang / /mi mo lha yi mdzes ma ni/ /sgrub pa po yis

nges par 'grub/ /sngags ni/ oM b+hU ta DA ma ra b+hU tA d+hi ba ti ak+Sho b+h+ya ki rI Ti na sar+b+ba b+hU ta pre ta pi shA tsA na sA d+ha ya hU~M phaT/ de nas rdo rje chen po rdo rje can mkha' 'gro ma'i rdo rje gur stobs po che'i ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs so/ /char chen rab tu dbab bya ste/ /

pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa bsam/ /der ni klu brgyad dgod par bya/ /stobs po che ni rab sbyor bas/ /de rnams rnga ma yang dag mnan/ /char med stobs po che las ni/ /chu yi tshogs ni dbab par bya/ /kha dog nag cing cher gsal ba/ /

'jigs pa 'ang ni 'jigs par mdzad/ /phyag brgyad zhal ni bzhi pa ste/ /skar nyi rdo rje gdan mdzad pa/ /phyag rnams kyis ni klu bdag rnams/ /phuHzhes bya ba'i sngags zlos zhing / /hU~M dag nang du chud byas te/ /phaT ni mtha' ru

sbyar bar bya/ /dang po'i zhal ni nag po ste/ /gnyis pa zla 'od bzang po nyid/ /gsum pa ser po'i mdog lta bu/ /bzhi pa dmar po nyid du brjod/ /sbrul gyi rgyan gyis yan lag yang dag brgyan/ /rdo rje sems dpas rnam par brgyan/ /

klu rnams kyis ni char dbab phyir/ /stobs po che ni rab bsgrub bya/ /de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rang bzhin 'dzin pa rdo rje gur smra ba pos sangs rgyas kyi de kho na dbye bar bya'o/ /rdo rje pad+ma 'o byas dang / /ri dgas brgyan pa

zos pa dang / /rdo rje chu 'thung nor ldan pa/ /sangs rgyas de nyid 'di rig nga / /dag pa'i gnas ni gnas chen po/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis rab gang ba/ /rdo rje rin chen kun khyab pa/ /gang gyur nga yis bshad par bya/ /phan pa'i grong khyer

yid 'ong bar/ /mkha' 'gro rdo rje lu gu rgyud/ /zhen pa chen po sangs rgyas kun/ /lcags sgrog rdo rjes bcing bar bya/ /dga' ldan du ni ldeg par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'dod pa thob/ /rgyal ba mgon po byams pa ni/ /

ye shes spyan gyis rnam par gzigs/ /rdo rje lu gu rgyud bcings pas/ /rgyal ba'i tshogs rnams bcing bar bya/ /gang zhig dngos grub mi ster na/ /sgrog gis bcings nas dgug par bya/ /rdo rje kyo ba dkar mo che/ /rdo rje zhags ma chom

rkun ma/ /rdo rje lcags sgrog ro langs ma/ /rdo rje dril bu g+hasma ri/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni dbang du byed/ /bzlas dang bsgom pa mngon dga' ba'i/ /dngos grub gal te mi ster na/ /de tshe mkha' 'gro ma bzhi yis/ /sangs rgyas rnams

ni drag shul bsgrub/ /de nas rdo rje 'dzin gyi rgyal po mkha' 'gro ma'i rdo rje gur gyi rgyud kyi nang du 'bum phrag lnga bris pa yang dag par bshad par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni dkyil 'khor 'bum/ /rdo rje can gyi de bzhin 'bum/ /

'bum gyis rdo rje nyi ma yi/ /'bum gyis rdo rje sa kyi'o/ /'bum phrag phyed kyis rdo rje ste/ /'byung po 'dul ba stong phrag lngas/ /lnga yis las ni rab rgyas pa/ /lnga yis sangs rgyas gar mkhan nyid/ /stong phrag sum bcu dag

gis ni/ /ku ru kul+le brtag pa'o/ /lhag ma stong phrag lnga yis ni/ cho ga'i rim brgyud kun gyi'o/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro kye'i rdo rje / /'bum phrag lnga ni bris pa'o/ /de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa blo dang ldan pa mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje gur

sangs rgyas kyi gar gyi ting nge 'dzin la zhugs so/ /gar dang glu la rab zhen pa'i/ /sems can rnams ni bsdu ba'i phyir/ /sangs rgyas gar mkhan rol pa mdzad/ /sangs rgyas gar mkhan rdo rje yis/ /'dod chags can gyi

byang chub bsgrub/ /de nas rdo rje can 'byung ste/ /me tog snyim pas rab sbyor bas/ /sems can kun la phan ldan pa'i/ /dam tshig der ni bshad par bya/ /sems can ji snyed pa rnams sems can du bsdu bas bsdus pa
sgo nga las skyes pa'am/ mngal las skyes pa'am/ drod gsher las skyes pa'am/ rdzus te skyes pa'am/ gzugs can rnams sam/ gzugs med rnams sam/ 'du shes can rnams sam/ 'du shes

med pa can nyid rnams sam/ 'du shes med pa pa rnams sam/ sems can de rnams thams cad bdag gis kyang phyag rgya chen po'i go 'phang la dgod par bya'o/ /dam tshig che bshad de nas ni/ /zur mig mi g.yo mngon byung ste/ /

mi bskyod ye shes brnyes ldan pa'i/ /ston pa la ni rnam par smod/ /ci khyod dam tshig hU~M zhes bya/ /thub pa chen po gzhu can yin/ /nga min snying rje'i stobs dpal ldan/ /bdag stobs bcom pa min nam ci/ /ci khyod

dam tshig zhes bya/ /khyod ni tshangs pa thub pa rnams/ /nga min rnam par snang mdzad dpal/ /khyod ni me bcom 'dod pa bral/ /ci khyod dam tshig AHzhes bya/ /mnga' bdag mkha' lding mkhyen nam ci/ /nga min pad+ma gar dbang

dpal/ /khyod ni gar mkhan nyer bzhad mkhan/ /ci khyod dam tshig trA~M zhes bya/ /khyod ni gdugs te tsha ba 'phrog /nga min rdo rje nyi ma dpal/ /gdugs kyi rnam khyod ji ltar min/ /ci khyod dam tshig kha~M zhes bya/ /khyod ni mkha'

stong rang bzhin no/ /nga min rdo rje mgyogs 'gro yin/ /khyod ni rta ste pha rol 'gro/ /ci khyod dam tshig snying rje 'chang / /e ma chang 'tshong mdzes ma'o/ /mi g.yo bdag ming mA ma kI/ /zhang po'i grong khyer 'dzin nam ci/ /

khyod ni dam tshig zhi ba nyid/ /bud med g.yo sgyu 'dzin nam ci/ /bdag ni ma yin lha mo spyan/ /spyan yin na ni g.yo dang bcas/ /ci khyod dam tshig 'dod chags che/ /smad 'tshong ma la smrar ci yod/ /bdag ming lha mo dkar ba

yin/ ji ltar dri ma dkar ba yin/ /ci khyod dam tshig dbang byed tshe/ /btsun mo'i pho nya min nam ci/ /bdag ming zur mig sgrol ma'o/ /sgrol ma mig ni bcom pa yin/ /mig g.yon bdag ni nor ldan dpal/ /de ltar ngo tsha med

pas legs/ /ngo tsha med pas sangs rgyas min/ /mthong dang mi mthun myur du smros/ /de nas rdo rje mig yon po/ /smod pa pos ni rab gsungs pa/ /rdo rje sems dpa' zhe sdang che/ /thub pa rnam par snang mdzad rmongs/

'dod la zhen pa 'jig rten bdag /ser sna rdo rje snang byed de/ /don yod skyon ni thams cad byed/ /'dren pa lnga ni skyon ldan no/ /sgong skyes mngal nas skyes pa 'am/ /drod gsher skyes dang mtha' 'khob bzhin/ /gzugs can rnams sam
gzugs med dam/ /rdzus nas skyes pa nyid dang ni/ /thams cad sangs rgyas bya'o zhes/ /khyod kyis dang po gsungs pa la/ /khyod nyid sangs rgyas gyur nas ni/ /de rnams ji ltar rgyal ma mdzad/ /de nyid
phyir na brdzun gsungs ngam/ /mnga' bdag ji ltar 'di ma gsungs/ /sems can bslus na khyod kyi gang / /sangs rgyas nyid de ngo mtshar rmad/ /'chi bdun tshe 'am mu ge 'am/ /phas kyis 'khor lo'i gnod

pa dang / /rab gnas dkyil 'khor sbyin sreg dang / /char med pa dang zhi ba la/ /sngags dang bsgom par ldan par ni/ /gang zhig bdag ni rtag rol pa/ /de yi mdun du bdag 'dug ste/ /der ni brdzun du mi 'gyur ro/ /

slob dpon lnga dang lha mo bzhi/ /mi g.yo bdag nyid smod pa'o/ /dkyil 'khor khang pa'i gnas nyid du/ /sangs rgyas gar mkhan rol pa mdzad/ /khams gsum de bzhin rtsa ba 'am/ /ma dag pa'i yang rgyan rnams kyis/ /

sangs rgyas rnams kyi gar mkhan gar/ /bde ba dga' bar byed dang bcas/ /chos 'byung grong khyer nyams dga' bar/ /rdo rje dam tshig klu yis dang / /rdo rje rkang pa'i gom pas gar/ /mthar ni rdza rnga lA s+ye sogs/ /phyag

rgya chen po rab ster ba'i/ /'di nyid 'dir ni cher gsang ngo / /rdo rje sems dpa'i bka' ji bzhin/ /rab tu 'bad pas bsrung bar bya/ /glu sna tshogs dang rol mo'i sgra dang gar dang 'dul bar 'jug pa dang char dbab pa dang mi g.yo

ba'i bdag nyid che ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rgyal po mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje gur gyi ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs te/ 'byung po'i gtor ma gsungs pa/ nam mkha'i khams kyi dbus gnas par/ /

pad+ma 'dab brgyad bsgom par bya/ /dbang po shar gyi 'dab mar bsam/ /mthar byed lhor ni dgod par bya/ /chur gdag nub kyi 'dab ma la/ /byang du nor sbyin dgod par bya/ /mer ni byin za chen po nyid/ /bden bral

mtshams skyong de bzhin no/ /rlung du gnas med bsam par bya/ /dbang ldan du ni 'byung po'i gtso/ /zla nyi tshangs pa la sogs dang / /tshangs pa'i ris ni dam pa dang / /tshangs pa'i 'dun na 'don nyid dang / /dga' ldan 'thab

bral gnas pa dang / /rgyal po chen por gyur pa dang / /gzhan 'phrul dbang sgyur nyid dang ni/ /gang zhig 'phrul dga'i gnas rnams dang / /gtsang ma'i gnas su gang gnas dang / /bde ba can du 'dug pa dang / /'og min du ni

gnas pa dang / /'od zer can gyi 'jig rten khams/ /sum bcu rtsa gsum gnas pa dang / /de kun steng du gnas par bya/ /chos 'byung nang du son pa ni/ /stobs kyi rgyu dang dung skyong dang / /de bzhin mtha' yas nor

rgyas bu/ /'jog po dang ni rigs ldan nyid/ /pad chen pad+ma bzang po can/ /lha min dmyal ba sems can rnams/ /chos kyi 'byung gnas 'og tu'o/ /oM las tshangs pa la sogs lha/ /hU~M las ma chags pa la sogs/ /
aHlas stobs kyis rgyu la sogs/ /lag gnyis gdong gcig ldan pa ste/ /steng gi lha rnams dkar po che/ /dbang po la sogs nag por mtshungs/ /stobs kyi rgyu sogs dmar po che/ /rang mtshungs rig ma lus

sprad ldan/ /rdo rje dril bus lag pa brel/ /g.yas brkyang bas ni stan la gnas/ /tshangs sogs rtag pas phyag rgyas gdab/ /mchod sbyin brgya sogs rdo rje yis/ /stobs kyis rgyu sogs gar dbang gis/ /thams cad rigs

gsum las skyes pa'o/ /dkar mos dgug par byas nas ni/ /chom rkun mas ni zhags pas bcings/ /ro langs mas ni sgrog bcings la/ /g+hasma rIs ni dril bus dbang / /de nas mchod yon zhabs bsil dbul/ /sngags ni 'di

yis bsang gtor bya/ /oM AHhU~M/ phyi nas 'thor 'thung dbul bar bya/ /sngags ni 'di yis gshegs su gsol/ /oM badzra satwa sa ma ya/ ma nu pA la ya/ badzra satwa twe no pa/ tiSh+Tha dr-i D+ho me b+ha wa/ su po Sh+yo me b+ha wa/ su to Sh+yo me b+ha

wa/ shA shwa to me b+ha wa/ a nu rak+to me b+ha wa/ sid+hA badzra sa ma ya tiSh+Tha/ sarba sid+hi miM me pra yats+tsha/ sar+b+ba kAR+Ye Shu me tsit+taM shre yaH ku ru hU~M ha ha ha ha hoH b+ha ga waM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta badzra mA me muny+dza badzrI b+ha wa ma hA sa ma ya satwa aHmuH de nas

rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rgyal po mkha' 'gro ma'i rdo rje ming gi ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs te rdo rje ming phye ba'o/ /ming gi dbang gi dus su ni/ /slob ma bdag nyid dbang bskur bya/ /rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur ba/ /

skyes pa 'dir ni sangs rgyas nyid/ /bzhad pa'i rdo rje dang / sgeg pa'i rdo rje dang / mdzes pa'i rdo rje dang / rol pa'i rdo rje dang / shin du dga' ba'i rdo rje dang / shin du dga' ba'i myu gu'i rdo rje dang / pad+mo rdo rje dang / pad+ma myu gu rdo rje dang / a la la

rdo rje dang / pad+ma lcags kyu rdo rje dang / ye shes rdo rje dang / yid bzhin nor bu rdo rje dang / yan lag med pa'i rdo rje dang shes rab myu gu'i rdo rje dang / snying rje myu gu'i rdo rje dang / dam par dga' ba'i rdo rje dang / shin du bde bar dga' ba'i rdo rje

dang / spyan ras gzigs kyi rdo rje dang / 'bebs pa'i rdo rje dang / nam mkha'i rdo rje dang / shes rab rdo rje dang / pha rol phyin pa'i rdo rje dang / 'dod chags rdo rje ni dag pa'i gnas su phyag rgya chen po grub pa rnams kyi rdo rje'i ming 'di rnams

yin no/ /bud med rnams kyi 'byung ste/ rdo rje snyems ma dang / rdo rje mtshon cha ma dang / rdo rje e ma'o bde ma dang / rdo rje bdag med ma dang / rdo rje spyan ma dang / rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dang / rdo rje dkar mo dang / rdo rje sgyu ma dang /

rdo rje 'bar ma dang / rdo rje 'khris shing dang / rdo rje mgyogs ma dang / rdo rje ro langs ma dang / rdo rje lcags kyu ma dang / rdo rje bskor ma dang / rdo rje 'phreng ba ma dang / rdo rje lA s+yai ma dang / rdo rje bzhad ma dang / rdo rje mkhyud ma dang /

rdo rje phye ma dang / rdo rje pad+ma dang / rdo rje 'byung ma dang / rdo rje chen mo dang / rdo rje 'dod chags ma dang / rdo rje sgrol ma dang / rdo rje do shal ma dang / rdo rje sgegs mo dang / rdo rje kor ka Na dang / rdo rje lA lA ma dang / rdo rje dbugs dbyung ma dang /

rdo rje rnam pa ma ni mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi'o/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi mtshan du gyur pa/ kye'i yi rdo rje rdo rje sems dpa' dang / /rnam snang chen po dang ni rang byung dang / /rdo rje arli skems pa'i khro bo dang / /

de bzhin du yang rdo rje'i khro bo nyid/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi bdud rtsi thabs sbyor dang / /he ru ka dang snying rje'i stobs nyid do/ /rtag pa dang ni gti mug rdo rje dang / /rnam par snang mdzad dang ni thams cad skyob/ /sgyu 'phrul dang ni de nas oM

mdzad dang / /sku'i rdo rje rab tu grags pa dang / /sa snying dang ni gti mug chen po dang / /gshen rje gshed dang tho ba'i dbang phyug dang / /de bzhin gshegs dang shAkya thub pa dang / /sangs rgyas zhes byar rab tu grags pa'o/ /rdo rje nyi ma de

nas rin chen bdag /de bzhin du yang rin chen rgyal po nyid/ /rdo rje gzi brjid dang ni rgyal po che/ /rdo rje bdud zil gnon dang snang byed do/ /rta 'grin dang ni 'jig rten bdag po dang / /rdo rje chos dang spyan ras gzigs dang ni/ /

pad+ma gar dbang dang ni 'dod chags dang / /'jig rten mgon por rab tu grags pa'o/ /dam pa'i rta dang rta yi rgyal po dang / /bdun kyi rgyal po de nas lcags rgyal dang / /dam tshig rdo rje dang ni rta mchog dang / /de bzhin du yang

las kyi rdo rje nyid/ /don yod dang ni don yod grub pa dang / /rdo rje mgyogs 'gror rab tu grags pa'o/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de nas rdo rje can/ /rnam par rgyal ba phyag na rdo rje dang / /dpe med ro mnyam shin du dga' ba dang / /dam pa dang

po bde ba chen po'o/ /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang / /dam tshig sems dpa' nor bu ni/ /'di rnams rigs ni drug tu brjod/ /'dod pa'i thar pa rab bsgrub pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mtshan gyi le'u ste

gsum pa'o// // rdo rje snying po mngon byang chub/ /brtag pa'i rgyal po dang po nyid/ /sgyu ma'i brtag pa gnyis pa ste/ /rdo rje gar ni gsum pa'o/ /bzhi pa sna tshogs brtag pa ste/ /rdo rje brtag pa lnga pa yi/ /brtag pa drug pa

stobs po che/ /brtag pa bdun pa mi g.yo mgon/ /brgyad pa gzungs kyi brtag pa ste/ /mkha' 'gro ku ru kul+le dgu/ /bcu pa 'dul ba'i brtag pa ste/ /rnam par snang mdzad bcu gcig la/ /dngos grub brtag pa bcu gnyis pa/ /

sgrol ma'i brtag pa bcu gsum pa/ /rdo rje phag mo bcu bzhi pa/ /bcu lnga pa ni gzi brjid che/ /bdag med brtag pa bcu drug pa/ /gshen rje gshed kyi bcu bdun pa/ /hU~M mdzad kyi ni bcwa brgyad pa/ /dbyangs

mdzad can gyi ni bcu dgu pa/ /sbyin bsreg brtag pa nyi shu pa/ /rab gnas nyi shu rtsa gcig pa/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i brtag pa ni/ /nyi shu rtsa ni gnyis su 'dod/ /gtor ma'i brtag pa nyi shu gsum/ /nyi shu bzhi pa sta gon

gnas/ /mngon par rtogs pa nyi shu lnga/ /de bzhin phyag rgya nyi shu drug /byed pa nyi shu rtsa bdun pa/ /glu ni nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa/ /gar gyi dbang phyug brtag pa ni/ /sum bcur gcig med sum bcu pa/ /brtag pa sum bcu par

ni bshad/ /stong phrag gsum bcu'i grangs kyis ni/ /mkha' 'gro mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi/ /'bum phrag lnga yi rgya mtsho che/ /kye yi rdo rje 'chang gi ni/ /rgyud ni e ma rgyas bstan pa/ /'bum phrag lnga bdag kye rdo rje/ /dag pa'i

snying po yongs su bzung / /rdo rje mkha' 'gros gsungs pa ste/ /'di ni rgyud kyis nges pa'o/ /kye yi rdo rje rnal 'byor rgyud/ /dang por rgyal ba rnams kyis bshad/ /phyi nas rnal 'byor ma rgyud ni/ /de nyid bud med bzung phyir ro/ /

bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na spros pa las bsdus pa lags/ bskal pa bzang po la byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang so so'i skye bo rnams tshe thung bar 'gyur na/ ji ltar na de rnams 'dzin par 'gyur/ ji ltar na de rnams thos par

'gyur/ ji ltar na sems par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na skye bo phal pa tshe thung bar 'gyur/ rdo rje 'dzin pas bka' stsal pa/ re shig gang dag slob dpon rnams su 'gyur ba de rnams rtsa ba'i ltung ba 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /

gang dag spyod pa po de rnams mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la spyod par 'gyur ba dang / gang dag so so'i skye bo de rnams srog chags gsod par 'gyur ba dang / gang dag bud med kyi tshogs rnams gcig tu 'dod pa la zhen par

'gyur ba ste/ de'i phyir rgyud rnams thams cad rgyas par bstan pa ma yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rdo rje gsung rdo rje thos nas mnyes par 'gyur cing dgyes pa brnyes nas tshig 'di

gsungs pa/ snying rje chen po kye'i rdo rje/ /nga ni dur khrod chu 'gram dang / /nags tshal skye bo med grong du/ /bsnyen bkur can la dngos grub ster/ /mtsho skyes rnam pa'i 'gram yid 'ong / /sku gdung zab mo'i mchod rten dang / /rkang 'thung rlon pa'i

'og tu ni/ /nga ni sangs rgyas dngos grub ster/ /tshong dus tshong rdal nyid dang ni/ /tshong dus rnam pa'i khyim du ni/ /rdo rje nyi ma bstan pa nga / /bsnyen bkur can la dngos grub ster/ /glu gar rab tu 'ching ba dang / /chang 'tshong ma yi khyim du ni/ /

'di ltar pad+ma gar mkhan nga / /bsnyen bkur can la dngos grub ster/ /rtag tu 'gro mgyogs zhon 'gyur dang / /res 'ga' lam du 'gro ba na/ /rta ni don yod bstan pa nga / /dngos grub rdo rje rnam ster ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje

can chen po mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje gur phyag rgya rnam par rgyal ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ phyag rgya dang phyag mtshan yang dag par bshad pa/ sku gsung thugs kyi brtag pa las/ /phyag rgya rnam gsum shes par bya/ /sku la

lag pa'i phyag rgya yin/ /sngags bzlas pa las ngag phyag rgya/ /sems la mtshan ma'i phyag rgya yis/ /de nyid bsam gtan dkyil 'khor la'o/ /lag pa gnas na bskam pa ste/ /g.yon na sdigs mdzub de bzhin no/ /mkha' 'gro skam pa

'jigs ma/ /gdug pa rnams kyi 'khor ba 'don/ /g.yas pa'i lag na zhags pa ste/ /gdugs pa rnams bcings rnam par dgag /da 'di zhags pa ma zhes bya/ /g.yon pas gdug pa sdigs 'dzub ma/ /g.yas na nya rgya zlum po

ste/ /gdug pa rnams ni dkri bar 'dod/ /'di ni rtag tu dol zlum bshad/ /g.yon pas sdug pa sdigs mdzub mdzad/ /lag pa g.yas par lcags kyu ste/ /gdug pa rnams ni dgug par 'dod/ /'di de rdo rje kyo mar bshad/ /g.yon

pas bdud la sdig mdzub ma/ /lag pa g.yas pas nyi ma ste/ /gti mug mun pa rnam par dral/ /g.yon pas sdig 'dzub mar ni bshad/ /de ni rdo rje nyi mar brjod/ /lag g.yas mar ma'i sdong snod de/ /de bzhin g.yon par

sdigs 'dzub bo/ /'di de rdo rje mar mer bshad/ /rnam par rtog pa'i rab rib 'joms/ /lag pa g.yas na rin po che/ /sems can rnams la sbyin pa ster/ /g.yon na sdig 'dzub 'dzin pa mo/ /rin chen sgron ma 'di rab brjod/ /glog ni lag

pa g.yas pa ste/ /rnam par rtog pa'i chu 'dzin 'joms/ /de 'di glog lag mar shes bya/ /de bzhin g.yon pas sdigs 'dzub ma/ /lag pa g.yas par pad+ma ste/ /pad+ma'i 'dod chags brjod par bya/ /g.yon pas sdig 'dzub ma nyid de/ /

'di ni mkha' 'gro'i pad+ma mar brjod/ /g.yas par b+ha ga'i pad+ma ste/ /bde ba chen po rnam par 'phel/ /g.yon na sdig 'dzub mdzad ma ste/ /'di ni chos 'byung mar ni brjod/ /g.yas pa'i lag na lcags sgrog ste/ /byang chub zhen pas

kun 'chang ba/ /g.yon na sdig 'dzub 'dzin ma ste/ /'di ni rdo rje sgrog mer brjod/ /sangs rgyas rjes chags 'ching ba yis/ /bdag nyid 'khyud par 'dod pa ste/ /byang chub chags pas rab bsgrub ma/ /de 'di rdo rje 'dud mar bshad/ /

g.yas pa'i lag na sgo lcags te/ /ye shes kun gyi bsrung ba mo/ /g.yon na sdigs 'dzub 'dzin pa mo/ /'di de rdo rje sgo lcags brjod/ /g.yas pa'i lag tu lde kyog ste/ /ye shes blangs nas gcod pa mo/ /g.yon na sdigs 'dzub

'dzin pa mo/ /'di de rdo rje lde kyog brjod/ /g.yas pa'i lag tu sgo mo ni/ /ye shes skyes pa ma spangs pa/ /g.yon na sdig 'dzub 'dzin pa mo/ /'di ni rdo rje sgo mar brjod/ /lag pa g.yas par yol ba ni/ /rang mtshungs btsun mo bsrung ba

nyid/ /g.yon na sdigs 'dzub 'dzin pa mo/ /rdo rje yol ba mar ni brjod/ /de 'di sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /mkha' 'gro ma ni dam pa'i tshogs/ /mkha' 'gro lnga ni rab bsgrub phyir/ /mkha' 'gro ma'i rgyud gsungs so/ /de nas byang chub

sems dpa' de rnams thams cad mkha' 'gro ma'i rdo rje'i gsung thos nas ngo mtshar skyes par gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das phyag rgya 'phrog pa 'di ci nyi tshe ba'i dam tshig phyag rgya gsungs pa lags sam/ de nas bcom ldan 'das

kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ 'od zer can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams na rdo rje nges par brjod pa zhes bya ba'i lung bstan pa yod de 'di ni de'i

yin te/ Dai bai ha ya sa ga ma ne'i skad kyi dbyings 'dir rnam par brtags pa ste/ thams cad kun du nam mkha' spyod par grub pas 'di ni mkha'i 'gro mar rab tu grags so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' de rnams thams cad tshig 'di thos nas

dga' dang mgu ba nye bar skyes par 'gyur ba dang tshig 'di gsol pa/ e ma mkha' 'gro ma'i rgyud/ /rgyud kun las ni phyi ma dang / /rtogs sla rtogs par dka' ba dang / /rig dang mi rig pa nyid pa'o/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pa la sogs pa rdo rje de

bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems bskul ba'i phyir 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' thams cad 'di la rdo rje gur rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po 'dir ji ltar rnal 'byor ma rnams dang / mkha' 'gro

ma rnams kyis bsdu ba yin/ byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis gsol pa/ sgo nga las skyes pa la sogs pa mtha' yas pa ngas srid pa las bsgral bar bya'o zhes smon lam sngon du 'gro ba'i byang chub gong du rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs na/ ci'i phyir na srog

chags rnams gsad pa dang / gcig tu 'dod pa'i btsun mo rnams spangs lags/ lta ba rnams las log rnams dang / /btsun mo rnams ni bsdu ba'i phyir/ /mkha' 'gro ma'i rgyud bshad do/ /bde ba'i thabs ni mdor bsdus pa/ /gzhung

nyung don ni rgyas pa ste/ /blo dman rab tu sad byed pa/ /rgyud kun gyi ni snying por nges/ /sngags rnams kyi ni khyad par du'o/ /rdo rje nges par brjod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /'di ni bshad pa tsam gyis ni/ /bdag med rnal 'byor ma

nyid kyis/ /sngon du gar gyis mchod byas nas/ /rang gi 'khor lo 'di gsungs pa/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje sems dpa' dang / /gal te rdo rje chos dang ni/ /rta mchog rdo rje nyi ma yang / /bdag gis spangs na mi 'grub ste/ /nga nyid sangs rgyas thams

cad kyi/ /yum gyi gzugs kyis bskyed par byed/ /de rnams kyi ni mdzes ma nga / /de la nga ni dngos grub ster/ /mig sman dang ni rkang byug dang / /ral gri sa 'og bsgrub pa dang / /ri lu mkha' la spyod pa dang / /mi snang ba dang bcud kyis len/ /rig 'dzin 'khor

los bsgyur nyid dang / /bu mo dam pa dgug pa ni/ /bdag mnyes pas ni bsgrub pa pos/ /dngos grub rdo rje rnams 'thob bo/ /spros pa rnam pa mang por ni/ /smras pas 'dir ni ci zhig bya/ /bdag spangs nges par mi 'grub cing / /byang chub med

cing bsgom pa med/ /gang zhig rtag tu bdag dran zhing / /rtag tu klog cing sems pa dang / /sngags kyi phreng ba bzlas pa dang / /nga yi sku ni bsgom byed pa/ /gal te sgyu ma'i tshul gyis sam/ /gal te rmi lam 'dra bar blta/ /shin du bsgom pa'i

rim pa las/ /mngon gsum du ni mthong bar 'gyur/ /gzugs brnyan rab tu sbyor ba las/ /de yi dngos grub sbyin par bya/ /rdo rje pad+ma rab sbyor bas/ /shin du bde chen sbyor ba las/ /gang zhig bdag la 'dod ster ba/ /lus can de la smos ci

dgos/ /gang zhig nyi ma gcig bsgom pa/ /rdo rje mchod pa'i sbyor ba las/ /shes rab pha rol phyin dngos grub/ /ster de 'di la the tshom med/ /bdag nyid he ru kar byas shing / /rang gi btsun mo rang bsgoms nas/ /gang zhig rnal 'byor cher

'dod pa/ /de rnams la ni nga mnyes 'gyur/ /'dod pa'i yon tan lnga ldan zhing / /spro ba dga' bar ldan pa dang / /glu dang rol sgra'i rnam pa dang / /'dod kun bde ba spro ba dang / /sna tshogs sgeg par ldan pa dang / /sna tshogs ro yi btung ba dang / /

sna tshogs gos ni ri mo can/ /sna tshogs dri yi byug pa yis/ /gang zhig bdag dang rtag nyal ba/ /de yi dngos grub ster ba nga / /phyag rgya chen po'i gnas na 'dug /de yi 'dod pa mar gyur to/ /oM a A i I u U r-i r-I l-i l-I e ai

o au swA hA/ gang zhig 'dis nga bskul bar byed pa'i rgyal ba'i sras de rnams kyi lag tu bud med kyi sgyu ma'i bde ba yang dag par gnas kyis 'dug go/ /rdo rje ma ni shar du sbyin par bya'o/ /lho phyogs su ni dkar mo'i gzugs can ma'o/ /nub phyogs

su ni chu'i mkha' 'gro ma'o/ /byang du ni rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'o/ /nga dbus su bzhag ste snying po dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor du gang zhig bsam par byed pa de'i bdag mdzes ma ste/ phyag gnyis ma zhal gcig ma'o/ /gri gug dang skyes pa'i

thod pas brel ba/ stag gi lpags pa bgos pa/ spyan gsum pa/ skra gyen du brdzes pa/ phyag rgya lngas rnam par brgyan pa/ shar gyi sgor ni dkar mo chen mo'o/ /lhor ni chom rkun ma'o/ /nub phyogs kyi sgor ni chu ma'o/ /de bzhin du

byang du ni g+hasma rI'o/ /dbang ldan du ni puk+ka sI'o/ /'tshed ma'i mtshams su ni ri khrod ma'o/ /srin po'i phyogs su ni gdol pa mo'o/ /rtag tu 'gro bar ni g.yung mo'o/ /'di rnams ni mtshams dang mtshams bral du sbyin no/ /gang zhig

bdag rab tu bsgom par byed pa de'i lag mthil du phyin pa'i dpal sus kyang dbrog par mi nus so/ /thams cad kyang kha dog nag por mtshungs pa rab tu son pa'i steng du gar dang bcas pa khro mo chen mo dpa' mo/ g.yon kha T+wA~M ga

'dzin pa'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje can mkha' 'gro ma'i rdo rje gur mchog tu dga' ba'i ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs te/ rig ma'i dbang yang dag par bshad pa/ rang gi rig ma skyes bu'i chus/ /bum pa brgyad po thams

cad kyis/ /rdo rje thugs ni rab bsgoms pas/ /rdo rje can bsam dbang bskur bya/ /rdo rje nyi ma rab bsgoms pa/ /der ni u rgyan sbyin par bya/ /thams cad sngon sbyin des bsams rnams/ /rdo rje'i tshigs bcad sbyor ba las/ /

rdo rje chen po rtse dgu pa/ /snying gar rang gi lag pas bya/ /slob ma 'jig rten dbang phyug byas/ /rdo rje sems dpas dbang bskur bya/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje'i dbang gis ni/ /de ring khyod ni dbang bskur 'gyur/ /'di de sangs rgyas

thams cad nyid/ /bzang bsgrub phyir ni rdo rje bzung / /slob ma lcags mchog lha mo ni/ /sgrol mas 'khyud par bsam par bya/ /lag pas rdo rje dril 'khrol zhing / /rdo rje bdag pos dbang bskur bya/ /oM badzrA d+hi pa ti twa

ma b+hi Shany+tsA mi tiSh+Tha badzra sa ma ya s+t+wa~M/ slob ma rnam snang byas nas ni/ /ming gis kyang ni dbang bskur bya/ /oM badzra satwa twam b+hi Shiny+tsA mi badzra nA mA b+hi She ka ta/ kye che ge mo rdo rje/ gang gang kun gyi rang gtsor gyur/ /de de bdag nyid he ru ka /

sangs rgyas ye shes 'byung ba'i phyir/ /chos kyi rang bzhin dag pa'o/ /'di de sangs rgyas thams cad nyid/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag na gnas/ /rdo rje snying po brtul zhugs brtan/ /khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu zung / /oM sarba ta thA ga tha

ta sid badzra sa ma ya tiSh+Tha e Sho s+t+wa~M d+ha ra yA mi hA hi hi hi hi hi hU~M/ kun kyang cho ga gcig pa yis/ /rtag tu bla med mchod pas ni/ /slob ma rdo rje brtul zhugs sbyin/ /phyis ni rdo rje lag nas lag /sems dpa' thog ma tha ma med/ /

rdo rje sems dpa' dga' chen po/ /kun du bzang po kun gyi bdag yang na de ring dril bu sbyin/ /shes rab pha rol phyin skyes pa'i/ /rdo rje dril bu zhes bya ba/ /sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/ /'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /shes rab dbyangs kyi

rjes 'gror brjod/ /rgyal bas byang chub mchog brjod pa/ /khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bzung / /dbugs 'byin thams cad byin nas ni/ /shAkya thub par rang gyur pas/ /slob ma chen po lung bstan to/ /sangs rgyas nyid du the tshom med/ /khyod

ni 'chi 'jigs mya ngan med/ /de bzhin nad dang tsha ba med/ /bde chen theg pa chen po ni/ /'di las nga yis lung bstan bu/ /oM e Sha/ ha~M byA ka ro mi tA~M badzra satwa sta thA ga tA/ srid pa'i ngan 'gro las bsgral te/ /shin tu srid pa'i

dngos grub phyir/ /kye 'grub 'gyur de bzhin gshegs pa yi/ /ming ni rdo rje zhes byar 'gyur/ /de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis rig ma chen mo'i dbang gi dam tshig bka' stsal to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chen po ting nge 'dzin

rdo rje ston pa pos/ dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba gton te/ tshig 'di skad bka' stsal pa/ bla ma rdo rje dam mchod cing / /bdun pa rnam par dag par bya/ /byang chub sems ni bskyed nasu/ /chos kyi 'byung gnas rnam par bsgom/ /de la sangs rgyas

gnas bsams nas/ /rnam pa lnga ni bsgom par bya/ /dang po skyes bu bsam de nas/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi 'khor lo spro/ /dri za mnyam par zhugs pa ni/ /khu bar rjes su dran par bya/ /'tshams kyi lha mos bskul bar bya/ /'khor lo'i

'dron pa bskul nas ni/ /mig la sogs pa gti mug sogs/ /rdo rje gsum ni gnas gsum dgod/ /phyi nas rjes chags rdo rje ste/ /ye shes rnam par gzhug pa dang / /dbang ni rig ma brgyad rnams kyi/ /yang ni bdud rtsi myang ba dang / /

lha mo brgyad kyis mchod pa nyid/ /'khor lo'i 'dren pa bstod pa'o/ /rang byin brlab pas byin brlabs te/ /de la yan lag drug bsgom bya/ /phyi nas yang ni dam tshig gi/ /cho ga'i go rim rim pa yis/ /mtshan ma yang dag mtshon par bya/ /

dang po sprin gyi rnam pa ste/ /gnyis pa du ba 'dra ba yin/ /gsum pa me khyer rnam pa yin/ /bzhi pa mir me nyer 'bar ba/ /lnga pa rtag tu snang ba ste/ /sprin med nam mkha' 'dra ba nyid/ /de ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i rgyud/ /dngos grub

nya bar 'gyur ba yin/ /phyi nas sgyu ma'i rnam pa ltar/ /rmi lam rnam par skad cig 'gyur/ /khams gsum rgyu dang mi rgyu ba'i/ /ma lus lus pa med pa 'grub/ /'jig rten khams ni thams cad du/ /ji srid rdo rje'i lus

can rnams/ /ye shes phung po'i blo ldan pa/ /de yi rjes su thams cad 'brang / /ji srid skye gnas las byung ba/ /khams gsum la ni nyams dga' bar/ /phyag rgya chen po rab sbyar bas/ /de rnams thams cad bza' bar bya/ /byang

chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /tshig gi rdo rje rnam thos nas/ /dga' zhing rangs par gyur nas ni/ /smra ba'i rdo rje mdzad par ldan/ /rig ma chen mo bdag med dang / /rdo rje rnam snang mnga' bdag dang / /rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal chen dang / /rta mchog thub

pa chen po dang / /rdo rje nyi ma gzi brjid che/ /rta 'grin mnga' bdag chen po ni/ /sku gsung thugs ni nyid dang yang / /lus kyi gong bu 'gul bar 'gyur/ /lan cig rgyal po ston pa yis/ /'phral du mngon sum byed pa po/ /de nas

rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rgyal po sku gsum mchog gi rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po mnyam pa nyid kyi rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs te tshig 'di gsungs so/ /ma mo'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs pa/ /zhal brgyad pa la stobs po che/ /phyag ni bcu drug rnams

dang ldan/ /dbang po sngon po mtshungs pa'i 'od/ /gzi brjid chen po zhabs bzhi pa/ /sgeg cing khro ba'i gzugs can te/ /dkyil dkrung phyed pa'i gar gyis gnas/ /rus pa'i rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan/ /dang po'i zhal ni nag po ste/ /dkar po

dmar pos rnam par brgyan/ /lhag ma'i zhal ni bung ba bzhin/ /bdud bzhi mnyam par mnan pa ste/ /spyi bor rdo rje 'dzin pa mchog /der ni rdo rje mdog nag po/ /'od zer chen po'ang bsgom par bya/ /dbang bskur ba'i gnas nyid du/ /sangs rgyas

lngas ni rnam par brgyan/ /glang po rta bong glang nga mo/ /mi dang sa ra b+ha byi la/ /g.yas pa'i thod pa brgyad du ni/ /gnyis 'thung la sogs rim shes bya/ /sa dang chu dang rlung dang ni/ /drod dang zla ba nyi ma nyid/ /mthar byed dang ni nor sbyin nyid/ /g.yon pa'i

thod pa brgyad na'o/ /skyes bu chen po bzhengs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /gti mug rdo rje mig la dgod/ /zhe sdang rdo rje rna ba la/ /ser sna 'dod chags de bzhin du/ /reg dang bdag med bsgom par bya/ /phyag gnyis zhal ni gcig

pa yin/ /sna tshogs gzugs ma btsun mo nyid/ /lag pa gri gug thod pas brel/ /srog song du ni yang dag gnas/ /sa spyod mkha' spyod ma nyid dang / /de bzhin rkang 'og gnas pa mo/ /'di nyid kyi ni cho ga yis/ /gnas gsum du ni

gnas par bsgom/ /oM mdzad rgyal po chen po ni/ /sku yi rdo rje rnam par brgyan/ /thugs kyi rdo rje rgyal po che/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas na bzhugs/ /a ni mchog gi de nyid de/ /ngag gi lam ni gsal byed brjod/ /sku gsung thugs

kyi rdo rje yin/ /chos can las ni rigs gsum 'byung / /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /dkar mo gzugs can bsgom par bya/ /lcags kyu sdigs 'dzub 'dzin pa mo/ /kha dog dkar mo 'od chen mo/ /dkar mo rdo rje

can zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /dmar po'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /chom rkun ma yi gzugs can bsgom/ /btso ma gser gyi mdog 'dra ba/ /rdo rje zhag pa mtshon chen mo/ /rdo rje dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /ro

langs ma ni khrag dang mtshungs/ /rdo rje lcags sgrogs nga rgyal byed/ /byang chub 'ching bar mdzad pa mo/ /'od kyi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /de nas g+hasma ri bsgom bya/ /rdo rje bri bus lag pa brel/ /mar gad ud pal 'dra ba'o/ /

rdo rje sgo skyong ma rdo rje brtson ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /mtshams su lha mo bzhi rnams ni/ /cho ga'i sbyor bas bsgom par bya/ /byang sems bum pa ri rab dang / /ma yi thab khung rgyal mtshan che/ /phyi bcas gnyis med rnal 'byor

pas/ /mgon po de ltar bsgom par bya/ /'dod chags chen po rjes chags pas/ /dba' rlabs med pa'i bde ba 'thob/ /'byung ba bzhi'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rgyal po theg pa gsum gyi dam pa ston pa

po/ thams cad kyi rnam pa'i ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs te/ dbyangs 'di gsungs pa/ hU~M las byung ba'i khro bo ni/ /rtag tu zhe sdang ldan pa'o/ /nang du ma rungs sems kyis ni/ /rab tu 'bad pas bsgrub par bya/ /na maHsa man+ta

b+h+yo/ na mo badzra mung+ga ra hasta ya tsaN+Da lA k+She pa ka rA ya hU~M phaT/ de nas 'dir khro bo chen po bshad pa tsam gyis sangs rgyas thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'jigs shing 'dar bar gyur nas mnga' bdag rdo rje 'dzin

pa dran par byed do/ /skyes pa'i pad+ma gas chags med/ /srubs gcig pa dang srubs gnyis pa/ /rig ma bzhi yi rab sbyor bas/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis rab tu dgang / /rkang rjes rdul gyi sbyor ba yis/ /rkang pas gnan cing bsdigs

par bya/ /sku gsum bskyed pa'i bsgom pa yis/ /bu mo chen mo dgug par bya/ /gshen rje gshed rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /na maHsa man+tA bud d+he b+h+yo/ ma hA daN+Da d+ha ra bi bi d+ha su rA mar+d+ha na b+hUn+nir+m+ma tha hU~M phaT/ de nas khro bo

chen po gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i stobs po che bshad pa las byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / de bzhin du gzhan rnams kyang 'dar bar gyur cing de dran par byed do/ /'byung po yi dags sha za nyid/ /mkha' 'gro grul bum zin pa la/ /

hU~M gis dregs byas phyag rgyas gdab/ /rdo rje btsir bas bde ba nyid/ /gzhan gyis mi thub pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+he b+h+yo/ hu lu hu lu/ ma hA pad+ma a mri tI ku ru ma hA bi ShA na AH btsan dug chen

po dgug par bya'o/ /brgyal ba bslang ba de bzhin no/ /pad+ma'i drag po'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /na maH sa man+ta bud d+he b+h+yo/ na mo badzra kro d+hA ya ma hA da~MSh+To t+ka Ta b+hai ra wA ya/ badzra san+do ha daR+bA ya oM a mr-i ta kuN+Da lI hU~M phaT/

de nas khro bo chen po bgegs 'joms rdo rje bshad pas sangs rgyas thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams yid mi dga' bar gyur to/ /rlung gis bteg pa po dang / rkang rjes kyi rdul blangs nas bsgrub bya de'i ming byang bzung ste/ tshogs kyi

bdag po'i rkang pa'i 'og tu dgod cing hU~M phaT ces bya ste/ hU~M gi nga rgyal byas nas rdo rje bdud rtsi'i ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa/ khro bo'i sngags kyis rab tu sbyor bas sangs rgyas rnams kyang skrod par byed do/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /

shin tu legs par gsang bar ni/ /bya ba 'di ni rab bskul bar/ /ye shes rdo rjes bya ba ste/ /nyi ma bdun gyis 'grub par 'gyur/ /na maHsa man+ta b+h+yo/ oM ya ma daN+DA ya nI lA ya/ nI la daN+DA ya tu ru tu ru mu ru mu ru sar+b+ba duSh+TA na mA ra ya

mA ra ya hU~M phaT/ de nas khro bo chen po dbyug pa sngon po skyes bu chen po bshad pas sems can thams cad dang / sangs rgyas rnams srog la the them du gyur to/ /brgya phrag brgyad bzlas pa tsam gyis kyang shin du bsgom pas sbyor

ba'i cho gas bskul ba las gdug pa thams cad 'ching bar 'gyur ro/ /dbyig pas gnan pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+he b+h+yo/ na mo ma hA ba la ya/ u ts+tshush+ma kro d+ha rA dzA ya sarbA na gA na~M hrI da ya~M tA

Da ya hU~M phaT/ de nas gtum po chen po bshad pas dug gis gdong 'jigs shing stobs dang bral ba dang / skrag cing 'dar bar gyur te/ stobs po che dran par 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje stobs kyi spyan ras gzigs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /na maH sa man+ta bud

bud d+ha b+h+yo/ na mo a tsa la ka Na tseT+Ta tu moT+Ta moT+Ta tuT+Ta/ g+ha g+ha g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya hU~M phaT/ de nas khro bo chen mo mi g.yo ba skyes bu chen po bshad pas lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin chen po brgyal te sa la 'gyel to/ /'dis ni khro bo'i rgyal po yis/ /

seng ge zhon pa'i cho ga yis/ /rdo rje dkyil 'khor rnal 'byer las/ /skyes pa dang ni lha rnams khug /oM sum+b+ha ni sum+b+ha hU~M/ gr-ih+Na gr-Ih+Na hU~M/ grih+nA pa ya grih+nA pa ya hUM~M/ a na ya ho b+ha ga wan bid+yA rA dza hU~M phaT/ rdo rje sa 'og gnas pa yis/ /khro bo

chen po bshad pa yis/ /lha min bu mo klu mor bcas/ /nu ma 'dar zhing nar ba 'am/ /rdo rje zhags pas nges bcings te/ /lcags kyu yis ni dril nas ni/ /sku gsung thugs ni bsgoms pa yis/ /bu mo thams cad dgug par bya'o/ /'jig

rten gsum dgug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /rdo rje chos ni char sprin che/ /rdo rje sems dpa' char mchog ste/ /rdo rje nyi ma dge 'dun che/ /rta mchog tshogs ni chen po dang / /phan pa'i yang ni char sprin gyi/ /zhags pa lcags kyu'i bsgom

pa yis/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyang dgugs brjod na/ /so so skye bo smos ci dgos/ /rang gi rig ma skyes bu bsams/ /sku gsum rdo rjes rnam par brgyan/ /lcags kyu la sogs sbyor ba yis/ /bu mo bkug la bza' bar bya/ /de nas bcom

ldan 'das kyis rdo rje chen pos dgug pa'i dam tshig bka' stsal to/ /namaHsa man+tA bud d+he b+h+yo/ oM Tak+ki hU~M dzaH kha ta dang ni btsag la yang / /rdo rje lcags kyu'i sbyor ba las/ /zla ba nye bar chags dus su/ /khar bcug nas ni

bsgrub par bya/ /ming ni bris pa tsam gyis kyang / /brgya ni gsal bar bzlas pa yis/ /sgra ldan gnas med dbang po drag /chung mar bcas pa dgug par bya/ /dam tshig lcags kyu'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /

bsam gtan sngags dang ting 'dzin gnas/ /rang gi rig ma skyes bu bdag /dgug pa'i gnas su bzung bar bya/ /thub pa gzhan du mi 'gyur ro/ /na maHsa man+tA bud d+hA nA~M/ na ma sa man+ta d+har+m+mA NA~M/ na maHsa man+tA sa~M g+hA nA~M/ oM

si tA ta pa tra/ oM bi ma la/ oM sha~M ka ra/ oM bra t+ya~M gi ra/ oM badzra uSh+NI Sha tsakra wa sar+b+ba yan+t+rA man+t+ra mU la kar+m+ma man+d+ha na tA Da na kI la na~M bA ma ma kr-i te ye na ke na tsi da kr-i ti ta t+ta sar+b+ba na ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da b+hin+da b+hin+da/ tsi ri tsi ri/ gi ra gi ra/

ma ra ma ra/ hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M/ phaT phaT phaT/ bdag nyid bsrung ba'i sbyor ba la/ /sbyor ba rgyud sogs bzhig pa la/ /dpang bar rig pa gdags byas na/ /'jig rten gsum gyis 'da' mi nus/ /khro bo chen

po 'khor lo rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /dben pa'i nags tshal nyid du yang / /yid gnyis thams cad rnam spangs la/ /rnal 'byor mchog ni 'di bsgrubs na/ /thub pa gzhan du mi 'gyur ro/ /khro bo chen po 'khor

lo'i snying po'i sngags la 'jug pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan rdo rje can/ /sems can kun gyi snying la zhugs/ /kun mkhyen ye shes las byung ba/ /yang dag nges par rab

tu dbye/ /sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan rab bsgoms te/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rab bsgom bya/ /sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan rab bsgom bya/ /sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan rab bsgoms nas/ /rdo rje rnam snang dran par bya/ /
sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan rab bsgoms te/ /rdo rje nyi ma rab bsgom bya/ /sangs rgyas gzugs par bsgoms nas/ /'dod chags rdo rje rnam par bsgom/ /sems can gzugs brnyan rnam bsgoms te/ /rta yi don

yod rab bsgom bya/ /sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan las byung ba'i/ /dkyil 'khor rnams ni rtag bsgom bya/ /thams cad rnams kyi sngags 'di yis/ /snying kar ye shes gnas su dgod/ /ye shes sems dpar rab sbyor bas/ /

sangs rgyas byang chub thob par 'gyur/ /rang sngags yi ge rdzogs pa dang / /phyag rgya dang ni phyag mtshan brtag /spro dang bsdu ba byas pa ni/ /dkyil 'khor rnams kyi 'byung gnas nyid/ /sgra la rnam gsum shes byas nas/ /lha rnams la ni dbul bar

bya/ /de nyid bcom ldan rdo rje can/ /rdo rje sems dpa' grags chen po/ /gzugs la rnam gsum shes byas nas/ /lha rnams la yang dbul bar bya/ /de nyid bcom ldan rgyal po ni/ /rdo rje rnam snang mnga' bdag nyid/ /dri la rnam

gsum rnam shes nas/ /lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya/ /de nyid bcom ldan sangs rgyas ni/ /rin chen phung po rab tu grags/ /ro la rnam gsum rnam shes nas/ /lha rnams la yang dbul bar bya/ /de nyid bcom ldan 'dod

chags nyid/ /rdo rje chos ni de bzhin gshegs/ /reg la rnam gsum rnam shes nas/ /lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya/ /de nyid bcom ldan sna tshogs pa/ /don yod 'bras bu ster ba po/ /bsrung ba'i dam tshig dbus

gnas pa'i/ /dkyil 'khor lnga ni bsgom par bya/ /lnga lnga'i bdag nyid rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /ye shes lnga ni rnam par bsgom/ /'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang ldan/ /'od zer sna tshogs kun tu khyab/ /sna tshogs las ni

byed par brjod/ /thams cad bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor ni/ /nyi shu rtsa lnga'i dbye ba yis/ /rdul tshon gyis kyang bri bar bya/ /sangs rgyas lnga yi rang bzhin gyis/ /phung po lngar ni rab tu grags/ /sangs rgyas mgon po'i

dkyil 'khor ni/ /shar gyi char ni rab tu grags/ /g.yas su rdo rje nyi ma yi/ /nub tu 'dod chags rdo rje yi/ /byang du rta yi rgyal po yi/ /dbus su rdo rje sems dpa' yi/ /shar du dkar po chen po ste/ /lhor ni ser po yang dag ldan/ /dmar po nub kyi cha nyid du/ /

btsod ni byang du yang dag ldan/ /mtshams kyi char ni thams cad dang / /sgo yi logs dang ya phubs su/ /rdo rje chen po rnams kyis brgyan/ /sna tshogs snang ba rnams kyis mdzes/ /sangs rgyas mgon po gang nyid

kyi/ /dkyil 'khor dbus su 'gyur ba ni/ /de nyid kyi ni dkyil 'khor brjod/ /snying po yongs bzung dkyil 'khor te/ /dkyil 'khor re re bsgom pa 'am/ /yang na bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /brgyad brgyad dbus su gnas pa 'am/ /yang na

nyi shu rtsa lnga ru/ /gang tshe dkyil 'khor bsdus pa yi/ /sgor ni lcags kyu zhags pa dang / /lcags sgrogs de bzhin rdo rje nyid/ /'jug pa'i sgo srungs dgod par bya/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bsdus pa chen po'i dam tshig 'di skad

ces bka' stsal to/ /don dang bya rgod de bzhin bse/ /snyug glang ba men dang ni stag nyid dang / /spre'u dang sna 'thung ba blang 'tshe/ /rdo rje chos kyi g.yas na'o/ /khwa 'ug chu skyar seng ge dang / /mtshor gnas de bzhin ra dang ni/ /ri dgas phag dang yang dag

ldan/ /g.yas min par ni rtag tu gnas/ /rma bya ma he chu srin dang / /nya yi rgyal po rus sbal dang / /'og gi rlung dang ngang skya dang / /ri bong phan pa'i g.yas pa na'o/ /sbal ba thu bo sprin shugs kyi/ /kha chu mig sman mtshungs byi ba/ /g.yag dang dri ldan de bzhin

bshad/ /g.yon pa'i thod pa brgyad na'o/ /ka raN+Da dang 'khor lo dag /lug dang tsa ko ra dang ni/ /bye khra hor khra 'ol ba dang / /ku rar nyi ma'i g.yas na'o/ /stobs kyi rgyu dang dung skyong dang / /rigs ldan pad+ma pad bzang dang / /'jog po nor rgyas mtha' yas ni/ /

rin chen rgyal po'i g.yon na'o/ /gza' lag phur bu mjug rings dang / /sgra gcan mig dmar pa ba sangs/ /spen pa khyab 'jug rta rgyal nyid/ /g.yas pa nyid du rab tu grags/ /dbang po tshangs pa de bzhin drag /'dod lha de bzhin thod pa can/ /

gcer bu dang ni thags bzangs ris/ /stobs ldan zhes bya g.yon na'o/ /glo dang dbugs dang de bzhin 'bog /khong skam mdze dang rkang shu dang / /mchin pa mcher pa'i rang bzhin yang / /glang po la sogs rab tu grags/ /lcags stegs dang ni rjed byed dang / /khrag rdo

gcong nad rgyal po dang / /gzhang 'brum skran dang bkres nad dang / /mig ser dom la sogs pa'o/ /rdze ma byi dang so nad dang / /mkhris pa khrag dang de bzhin rlung / /bad kan 'dzag dang lus skam dang / /skya rbab 'bras ni rma bya sogs/ /rkang

'bab tshil nad rlig skrangs dang / /rgyu ma 'phel dang gsung ba dang / /tshad pa rims dang rab gas ni/ ka raN Da sogs rab tu grags/ /rlung mkhris de bzhin ma zhu ba/ /sgrib g.yogs rab rib gcan sri ba/ /gzhog phyed na dang skog 'bras

dang / /rlung rgyas gza' lag la sogs pa'o/ /mi yi 'gro ba dam pa ni/ /rab mchog de lta bu 'gro ba/ /thams cad nad kyis khyab mthong nas/ /sangs rgyas lngar ni cher grags pa/ /bdag gi lus la gzhug par bya/ /sems can rnams

la gdungs ma gyur/ /nad rnams zhi phyir sangs rgyas ni/ /glang po la sogs nad 'dzin to/ /de ltar bsgom par gyur pa la/ /nad med ru dza trang grum med/ /'chi med nges par byi ta med/ /nga rgyal med cing gti mug med/ /bkres pa med cing skom pa med/ /

sdug bsngal ngan 'gro de bzhin med/ /lha dang lha min mi rnams sam/ /gang gis kyang ni nad byed min/ /nad thams cad rab tu zhi ba dbugs dbyung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// // de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rgyal po lus thams cad

'dzin pa po mkha' 'gro ma'i yid 'phrog pas tshig 'di bka' stsal pa/ sems kyi rjes dran dmigs nas ni/ /sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom/ /sems kyi rin chen bsams nas ni/ /chos ni rjes su dran pa bsgom/ /las

rjes dran pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ /'khor lo chen po rab bsgom bya/ /rnal 'byor 'di ni mchog rab ste/ /ma byung 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rnam bsgoms nas/ /phyag rgya bzhi yis phyag rgyas gdab/ /rdo rje rnam

snang bsams nas ni/ /phyag rgya bsgoms pas phyag rgyas gdab/ /rdo rje'i phyag rgya'i sbyor ba yis/ /rin chen phung po rab bsgom bya/ /chos kyi phyag rgya rab sbyor bas/ /las kyi rdo rje phyag rgyas gdab/ /zhe sdang rgyal po rgyal po che/ /skyon

rnams thams cad zad par mdzad/ /spro zhing bsdu bar bsgom par bya/ /bsdu ba yang ni yang dag bshad/ /sangs rgyas mgon po rab bsgoms na/ /sangs rgyas sprin gyis kun tu khyab/ /spro dang bsdu ba'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /

sangs rgyas byang chub rab bsgom bya/ /sems ni rin chen rin po ches/ /bdud kyi skyon rnams zad par mdzad/ /sems kyi char sprin sbyor ba yis/ /yang ni bsdu ba bstan par bya/ /chos kyi rgyal po gti mug che/ /spro dang bsdu ba'i gzugs

can de/ /thun tshod bzhir ni byin brlabs pa/ /bsgoms na myur du 'grub par 'gyur/ /sems ni 'gro mgyogs ltar bsams nas/ /gzhal med 'bras bu stsol ba'o/ /rta mchog char sprin chen po yis/ /bsdu ba yang ni bsgom par

bya/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis spro ba dang bsdu ba'i dam tshig chen po de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /sems kyis rnam par bsgom par bya/ /rnyog med dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /sku yi yi ge
rnam par bsgom/ /khrag gi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /sems kyi rin chen yi ge dgod/ /chos kyi 'khor lo dbus gnas par/ /gsung gi yi ge rnam par sgom/ /las kyi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /don yod yi

ge'i gzugs can te/ /sku gsum mi phyed bsgom pa yis/ /ye shes rdo rje bsgom par bya/ /rdo rje sems dpa' mi phyed pa'i/ /chos kyi 'khor lo rnam snang la/ /rin chen sems kyi rin po che/ /pad ma bzang po 'dab ma dmar/ /shes

rab ral gri don yod kyi/ /shes rab rnon po'i rang bzhin gyi/ /rnam rtog ri bo bcad nas ni/ /phyag rgya chen po ldan par 'gyur/ /dpag tshad bye ba rgyas par ni/ /rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ /phan pa'i dkyil 'khor nyid dang yang / /

rin chen phung po 'od chen dang / /chos kyi phung po mgon chen dang / /de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje las/ /sna tshogs 'od zer cher 'bar ba/ /sangs rgyas sprin gyis rnam par brgyan/ /nam mkha'i khams kyi dbus gnas par/ /

ye shes dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ /'dod pa'i yon tan lnga yis gang / /thams cad du ni sna tshogs gzugs/ /mchod pa kun gyis mchod par bya/ /mtshams kyi lha mo'i sbyor ba yis/ /ye shes rgya mtsho rab bsgrub bya/ /dam tshig

'khor lo bcug pa yi/ /ye shes rdo rje chen po 'bar/ /sangs rgyas kun mnyam rnal 'byor pas/ /skad cig la ni gnyis med 'gyur/ /ru drA k+sha dang dung bse ru/ /bu yi 'tsho ba pad 'bras dang / /mu tig la sogs byi ru sogs/ /bsam

gtan ldan pas sngags bzlas bya/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang / /mkha' 'gro ma dang rang btsun mo/ /mngon sum du ni bya ba'i phyir/ /sngags ni snyan gsan 'bebs par brjod/ /dper na skyes chen la la zhig /skad kyi

nga ros bos pa na/ /thos pa tsam gyis 'ongs 'gyur ba/ /de ltar skad cig sangs rgyas gshegs/ /'jig rten khams ni stong phrag dang / /nam mkha'i khams kyi mkha' grong du/ /phyag rgya chen po'i bde gnas kyi/ /mkha' dang mnyam pa'i

sangs rgyas bzhugs/ /de rnams sngags rig drung na gshegs/ /rdo rje can gyis rnam par gzigs/ /gang gis sngags kyi rim thob pa/ /e ma de yis byang chub 'thob/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yang / /sngags kyi

spyod pa dang por 'dzin/ /rdo rje sngags ni rab sbyor bas/ /mtshungs pa med pa'i ye shes 'thob/ /de ltar shes pa'i sangs rgyas te/ /sngags kyi spyod pa'i rim gnas pa/ /'bras bu nyid la mi gzigs te/ /de ni sangs rgyas mnyam

par brjod/ /sangs rgyas nga rgyal dmigs nas ni/ /chos kyi dbyings ni 'od gsal ba/ /gang zhig bsgom pa de bas na/ /sems can sangs rgyas mnyam par gyur/ /'jig rten ji ltar sangs rgyas te/ /ji ltar chos ni
rnyog med pa/ /sems can khams ni de ltar bshad/ /nam mkha' lta bur dri ma med/ /ngan par brtags pa'i rnam rtog gis/ /rin chen sems ni dri can byas/ /sems dag pas ni dag par 'gyur/ /ji ltar nam
mkha' mi 'jig pa/ /nam mkha' ji bzhin de bzhin sems/ /sems kyi rin chen bskul ba las/ /sems nyid bsgom pa sangs rgyas te/ /skye bar sangs rgyas dam pa nyid/ /rin chen sems las phyir gyur

pa'i/ /sangs rgyas med cing gang zag med/ /rnam par shes pa'i gnas don nas/ /phyi rol gyur pa cung zad med/ /yid kyis sangs rgyas thams cad nyid/ /khams gsum dbang phyug chen po ste/ /'jig rten gsum gyi

rgyal po che/ /sems gcig gis ni thob par 'gyur/ /gzugs dang sgra dang de bzhin dri/ /ro dang reg bya'i rang bzhin te/ /chos kyi dbyings ni mchog tu zhi/ /'di ni rin chen sems su brjod/ /gzugs dang tshor ba 'du

shes dang / /'du byed dang ni rnam shes nyid/ /'di dag thams cad sems las skyes/ /thub pa 'di ni gzhan mi 'gyur/ /yid bzhin nor bu rin po che/ /'dod yon 'bras bu rab ster ba/ /sems kyi de nyid rang bzhin dag /sangs rgyas byang

chub 'bras bu ster/ /de nyid phyir na sngags rgyal gyis/ /sems kyi rdo rje bskul ba yi/ /zab mo'i rnam pa nges ldan pa'i/ /phyed par dga' ba'i dngos grub ster/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i snying po snang ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o// //

de nas rdo rje chen po rdo rje can mkha' 'gro ma'i gur bskyed pa'i rnal 'byor gyi ting nge 'dzin la zhugs te/ bdag nyid kyi rnal 'byor gsungs pa/ sangs rgyas gnas ni rab rdzogs dang / /rnam pa lnga po bsgom pa dang / /kun tu bzang po'i rang

bzhin dang / /rang gi lhag pa'i lhar bsgrub dang / /dkyil 'khor rnams kyi dgod pa dang / /mchod bstod bdud rtsi la sogs pa/ /rim pas rjes su bsgoms par bya/ /rnal 'byor yan lag drug tu 'dod/ /oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta a b+hi She ka ta badzra swa b+hA ba

At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pas de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta a mr-i ta swA da badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag tu med pas de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /

oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta stu te badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog gis de skad ces bka' s+cal to/ /oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta pu dzA badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ba

rdo rje rta mchog gis de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta a nu rA ga Na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pas de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /spros pa dang ni bsdus pa'i sku/ /

rgyal chen rnam par snang mdzad che/ /chos dbyings yi ge las bskyed pa/ /de ni sangs rgyas gnas bkod bya/ /oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta a ni la ya badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/ rnam par snang mdzad rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /nam

mkha'i khams kyi dbus gnas par/ /'byung bzhi'i bdag nyid dkyil 'khor nyid/ /de yi steng du sangs rgyas bsam/ /spros nas gzhal yas gnas dgod bya/ /rdo rje lta bu mi phyed phyir/ /des na mi bskyod bsgom par bya/ /ma

skyes rjes su dran pa las/ /rnam par snang mdzad phan pa nyid/ /rin chen rnams kyi mchog gi mchog /'di ni rin chen sems su bshad/ /rdo rje chos ni rgyal po che/ /'dod chags mtshan nyid 'dzin pa las/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i

gnas 'dug pa'i/ /sems ni 'dod chags zhes byar bshad/ /gang phyir 'bras bral mi 'grub ste/ /de phyir don yod rab tu grags/ /rig ma mdzes ma rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /bum pa'i dbang ni dang po ste/ /

gnyis pa la ni gsang ba'i dbang / /gsum pa shes rab ye shes te/ /ji ltar lus ni de bzhin gshegs/ /dkyil 'khor dam pa bris nas ni/ /dam tshig khu ba'i cho ga yis/ /ha~M dang bsam gtan bskyed byas nas/ /de tshe dbugs dbyung sbyin par bya/ /

mkha' 'gro lnga dang ldan pa dang / /dam tshig lnga yis bkang ba dang / /mkha' 'gro ma yi tshogs ldan pas/ /slob ma rdo rje can la skur/ /rdo rje sa bon rab sbyor bas/ /rang gi lhag pa'i lhar byas nas/ /slob ma rtag par nges bsams te/ /rgyun

gyi rigs kyi ming gis ni/ /slob ma rdo rje can dbang bskur/ /sbyin dang bdag ma sgrol ma dang / /dkar mo la sogs bdag gzugs kyi/ /rdo rje btsun mo rab sbyor bas/ /rdo rje bla med bshad par bya/ /bla na med pa'i de nyid 'di/ /gnyis su med

cing yi ge med/ /chos kyi dbyings ni 'od gsal byed/ /bde ba bzang po'i ro myang gis/ /sgrib pa med pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /ga dang ha zhes bya ba dang / /dang po mthar yang shwa ldan pa'i/ /rab tu gsal ba dam pa nyid/ /dngos grub

thams cad rab ster ba/ /cho gas rdo rje bdud rtsi myang / /'di dag zos pa tsam gyis ni/ /sangs rgyas kun mnyam rnal 'byor pa/ /rdo rje dang ni mnyam par 'gyur/ /nad rnams thams cad rab tu zhi/ /de ni gzi brjid lus chen po/ /'jig rten kun

gyi yid 'phrog pa/ /phas kyi rgol ba kun las rgyal/ /'jig rten kun gyi bdag pos brgyan/ /lha rnams kyis ni 'dren par brjod/ /mkha' 'gro lnga yi bdag nyid 'gyur/ /chos kyi zas ni za ba po/ /dam tshig chen po'i bsam gtun

zos pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /mi bskyod brten pa'i rnal 'byor pa/ /nad rnams thams cad rnam par spangs/ /rtag pas mdangs ni chen por ldan/ /rdo rje nyi mas rgas pa med/ /rdo rje chos ni bsten pa yis/ /bud med

kun la longs spyod do/ /don yod rgyal po chen po ni/ /rdo rje srog gi yan lag 'byung / /don kun sgrub cing dpal dang ldan/ /des ni rnal 'byor par ni brjod/ /mi bskyod btung ba'i sbyor ba las/ /stong phrag lbas ni 'tsho bar 'gyur/ /phan pa

yis ni khri ru brjod/ /rdo rje nyi mas rdo rje'i 'bum/ /tshe dpag med kyis dpag med dang / /bdun gyis nam mkha' ji srid bshad/ /rdo rje nyi ma dpag med dag /'khor ba'i sgrub thabs rtsa ba nyid/ /'di dag bsten pas rnal 'byor pa/ /kun du bzang

po 'dra bar 'gyur/ /shes rab pha rol phyin ye shes/ /'di ni rdo rje nyi mar brjod/ /chos rnams thams cad kyi ni gnas/ /de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje can nyid ste/ /thabs dang shes rab 'phel mdzad pa/ /khams gsum dag ni thams cad du/ /

sa dang sa 'og bar snang la/ /khrag dang khu bas khyab pa'i lus/ /rigs kyi dbang phyug gis 'di gsungs/ /sen mo ba spu de bzhin gshegs/ /khams dang khu ba snang mtha' yas/ /lpags dang khrag la gzi brjid che/ /tshil dang rkang la rdo rje

'dzin/ /thams cad mgon po rnam snang mdzad/ /rtsa dang sha la bdun rgyal po/ /'di rnams la ni sangs rgyas lngar/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gros rnam par bshad/ /sa yi khams ni rnam dag pa/ /spyin ni 'khor lo mdzes ma nyid/ /rdo rje btsun mo dang ba

ste/ /pad ma'i bu mo tsha ba nyid/ /sgrol ma rlung ni rnam dag pa/ /rdo rje btsun mo bzhi rnams ni/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro zhes bya'o/ /gur gyis de rnams bka' stsal to/ /sngags thams cad rnam par dag par bdud rtsi lnga mchog tu byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge

'dzin te le'u bdun pa'o// // khyod ni zhe sdang rdo rje yongs skyong ba/ /thugs dang chos ni shin tu rnam dag pas/ /lha yi lus ni yang dag brgyan mdzad pa/ /puk+ka sI ni bdag la myur du gzigs/ /rnam par 'dren pa 'jig rten don gyi phyir/ /stong pa nyid spangs skye

ba bzhes par mdzod/ /khyod ni gti mug rdo rje yongs skyong ba/ /sku yi bdag po chos kyi gzugs brnyan gyis/ /lha yi lus ni yang dag brgyan mdzad pa/ /mgon po ri khrod ma la myur du gzigs/ /rnam par 'dren pa 'jig rten sman slad du/ /stong pa nyid spangs

skye ba bzhes par mdzod/ /khyod ni 'dod chags rdo rje yongs skyong ba/ /gsung dag legs par so sor rtogs pa yis/ /lha yi lus ni yang dag brgyan mdzad pa/ /gtum par ldan pa bdag la gzigs par mdzod/ /rnam par 'dren pa 'jig rten sman

slad du/ /stong pa nyid spangs skye ba bzhes par mdzod/ /khyod ni sangs rgyas thams cad yongs skyong ba/ /gzugs kun nan tan thams cad mnyam nyid kyis/ /lha yi lus ni yang dag brgyan mdzad pa/ /Dom bi bdag la mgon po myur du gzigs/ /rnam par 'dren pa

'jig rten sman slad du/ /stong pa nyid spangs skye ba bzhes par mdzod/ /thams cad bzhengs par mdzad pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /'khor lo can rnams thams cad kyi/ /'dis ni bskyed par 'gyur bar na/ /ye shes rdo rje can gyis bya/ /dkyil 'khor bdag po 'di

skad gsungs/ /oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta khe tsa rA badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta b+hu tsa ra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta pA tA la wA si nI badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/ sku gsung thugs kyi chos rnams

kyi/ /byin brlabs gnas su brtag par ni/ /ye shes rdo rje can gyis bya/ /'di ni byang chub rim bstan pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi bdag pos de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /phyag rgya chen por rab sbyor

bas/ /sku yi rin chen sbyang bar bya/ /bsam gtan rdo rje bsams nas ni/ /sems kyi rin chen rab sgrub byed/ /rdo rje bzlas pa'i khyad par gyis/ /ngag gi rdo rje dri ma med/ /gti mug rdo rje rab sbyor bas/ /mig gi rnam par shes pa

sbyang / /zhe sdang rdo rje bsam pa yis/ /sgra yi sgor ni bsam pa'o/ /sna ni ser sna rdo rje yis/ /ro drug 'dod chags rdo rje yis/ /lus ni phrag dog rdo rje yis/ /yid ni kun du bzang po yis/ /de nyid mkha' 'gro bdag med ma/ /'di rnams kyis ni

rnam par sbyang / /gal te 'gal ba yod pa ma yin yang / /de tshe rgyal ba'i dngos po sbyang ba yod/ /kun rdzob bden par yang dag gnas nas ni/ /'khor lo gzugs kyi chos tsam rnam par bsgom/ /chos kyi dngos po ma byung spyad pa las/ /gang

zag thams cad rnam spangs 'jig rten pa/ /'jig rten 'gro bar bsam par mi nus te/ /chos kyi tshul gyis thams cad rnam par dag /tshig pa rnams kyi gdung dang dug khyab pa'i/ /lus kyi sman ni bzhin gyi dug nyid de/ /ji ltar chu ni rna bar zhugs pa la/ /

yang ni chu ni thabs su 'gyur ba nyid/ /ji ltar rlung gis dkrugs pa'i sems rnams kyi/ /de bzhin mkhas pas mon sran gre'u bzhin/ /'dod chags kyis kyang rmongs pa yi/ /skye bo 'dod chags me yis gdung / /'dod chags kyis bskyed 'jig rten pa/ /

'dod chags med pas zad par 'gyur/ /'dod chags rdo rje yongs shes pas/ /yid ni rdo rje sems dpar 'gyur/ /'dod chags zhags pas 'ching ba yis/ /'jig rten chags pas khyab par brjod/ /'dod chags bral ba'i mngon byang chub/ /

'dod chags mthar phyin rnams mi 'dod/ /de nas rdo rje sgrol ma yi/ /sgrub thabs sbyin sregs las kyi ni/ /cho gas 'dod don thams cad ni/ /sgrub thabs yang dag rab bshad bya/ /de la 'di rnams ni sngags kyi rkang pa yin te/ na mo rat+na

tra yA ya/ oM na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi sa twA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM tA re sarba duSh+Tan+ma ma kr-i te dzaM b+ha ya stam+b+ha ya/ mo ha ya/ ban+d+ha ya/ hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT phaT phaT/ sarba duSh+Ta stam+b+ha ni tA rA ya swA hA/

ma mo dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /lha mo sgrol ma bsgom par bya/ /phyag brgyad zhal ni bzhi pa ste/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan/ /gser gyi kha dog 'dra bar bsgom/ /gzhon nu ma yi mtshan nyid 'bar/ /rdo rje nyi mas

dbang bskur ma/ /sangs rgyas bzhi yi dbu rgyan can/ /lang tsho la ni bab pa'i lus/ /g.yo ba gser gyi rna cha ma/ /sna tshogs pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs/ /'od zer dmar pos rnam par brgyan/ /rdo rje zhags pa de bzhin dung / /
g.yas pas mda' ni 'gengs pa'o/ /rdo rje lcags kyu uta pa la/ /sdigs 'dzub g.yon pas 'dzin pa mo/ /rdo rje dkyil dkrung sbyor ba yis/ /gnas gsum pa ni bsgrub par bya/ /shar du me tog sgrol ma ste/ /

kha dog dkar zhing yid 'ong ma/ /yi ge oM las skyes pa'o/ /me tog phreng bas lag pa khyab/ /phyag gnyis zhal ni gcig ma nyid/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan/ /g.yas su bdug spos sgrol ma ste/ /mdog gnag mdzes pa'i

gzugs can ma/ /spos dang dung gis lag pa brel/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan/ /nub tu mar me sgrol ma ste/ /dmar mo sdong bus lag pa khyab/ /mdog ser rnam par rgyan chen po/ /g.yo ba gser gyi rna cha ma/ /

byang du dri yi sgrol ma ste/ /dri yi dung gis lag khyab pa/ /khrag gi mdog ltar lha mo ni/ /dkyil 'khor snying po bsgom par bya/ /lcags kyu la sogs rab dbye bas/ /der ni sgo yi srungs ma bsam/ /steng du gtsug tor rnam rgyal ma/ /

'og tu gnod mdzes ma rab bsgom/ /'khor lo klu zhags bsnams nas ni/ /spro zhing sngags ni bzla bar bya/ /oM tA re tut+tA re tu re swA hA/ yi ge bcu yis lha mo bcu/ /pha rol phyin bcu la gnas ma/ /'bras bu thams

cad rab bsgrub phyir/ /rab tu 'bad pas bsgom par bya/ /sngags ni mchog dang phul du phyin/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis phyag mdzad ma/ /klags pas 'gyur byed drag po ste/ /rdo rje gur gyis bshad pa'o/ /sngags 'dis gos kyi

thu bar bdun/ /mngon par bsngags pa bya ba ste/ /mdud pas bcings te nags tshal du/ /'gro na'ang sus kyang mi 'khyer te/ /stag dang chom rkun dang chu srin snang 'thungs dang seng ge dang sbrul dang mche ba can dang ma he dang / dom dang snyug glang la sogs

dran pa tsam gyis nyams shing yib bo/ /sngags 'dis ud pa la la sbyin sreg ji srid du/ lan brgya rtsa brgyad ji tsam gyis bsku bar bya ste/ oM tA re tut+tA re tu re a mu ka~M me wa sha ma ma na ya swA hA/ yang sngags de nyid kyis khwa'i

sgro la lan sum bcu rtsa gnyis yongs su bzlas te/ dgra'i khyim du sbas na/ nyi ma bdun gyis skrod par byed/ oM tA re tut+tA re tu re tsa la pra tsa la shI g+h+raM gA mi ni de wa dat+taM uts+tsha TA ya hU~M phaT/ de nas gzhan yang sbyor bar 'gyur ba/ oM tA re tut+tA re tu re

a mu kA b+hi d+hA nAM ka mA ri ma h+ya mud+bA he ne ta s+yAH pi tA pra yats+tsha tu me swA hA/ spra tshil dang gtum pa'i sa bon dang / myos byed dang a sho ka'i lo ma dang / me tog bsreg blugs bya zhing / mar dang sbrang rtsi bu ram du bcas pa stong phrag

lnga'i sbyin sreg ni bu mo'i dngos grub la rab tu bsngags te/ nyi ma bdun gyis de'i tshe rnal 'byor pas rang 'dod pa'i bu mo thob bo/ /de nas gzhan yang rab tu sbyor bar 'gyur ba/ oM tA re tut+tA re tu re a mu kA b+hi d+ha ni swas+thA

na ta A kar Sha ya man+ti ke dzaH sngags 'dis pa da ra'i tsher ma stong phrag lnga rang byung gi me tog dang sbrags te bsreg blugs bya bar brjod pa 'di byas pas skyes bu skyong ba rnams kyi bu mo yang 'gugs par byed do/ /de nas

gzhan yang sbyor bar 'gyur ba zla mtshan 'dzag pa'i ras la bcom ldan 'das ma phyag gnyis ma/ zhal gcig lag pa lcags kyu dang / ut+pa la dang zhags par bcas pa rnam par bris te/ de'i mdun du mchod pa byas te/

me tog 'di rnams bzang zhing dge/ zhes bya ba la sogs pas mchod nas phyi nas bsgom pa dang ldan par sngags bzlas so/ /oM tA re tut+tA re tu re a mu kI ma me pa si ta~M swa paM na ka tha ya hU~M phaT/ stong phrag lngas 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /

zhags pas mgrin par bcings te/ lcags kyur drangs nas bsgrub bya rkang pa'i 'og tu bsams te/ khol mo'i tshul gyis spyad par bya'o/ /de nas gzhan yang sbyor bar 'gyur ba sgrol ma'i gzungs bdun mngon par

bsngags par bya ste/ bdag gi mig gnyis mig sman gyis bsku bar bya zhing rgyal po'i rigs kyi drung du 'jug par bya'o/ /de nas rgyal po slob ma dang 'dra bar gus par byed cing 'gal bar mi byed pa dang / bka' drin stsol zhing snyan par

brjod par byed pa dang / bran du yang dag par 'gro zhing khros pa yang dbang du 'gyur ba ste/ 'di ni mngon sum du mthong ba dang ngo mtshar dang bcas pa'o/ /de nas gzhan yang sbyor bar 'gyur ba sgrol ma'i gzungs lan brgya

rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ kha gnyis pa'i so dug thal bar byas la/ ba kha dog dmar mo'i mar dang / arka'i shing bal las sdong bu rab tu sbar mig sman bsdu bar bya'o/ /mig sman rdo rje nyi ma dang / rdo rje chos dag

mnyes la rdo rje rta mchog gis bdug par bya'o/ /thal ba dang lhan cig mig la bsku bar bya ste/ rdo rje mig gis gang bltas pa de/ gal te pad ma gar gyi dbang phyug mi 'bab na de'i tshe bdag sgrol ma lags te/ bdag gis

sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dkrongs pa lagaso/ /de nas gzhan yang rab tu sbyor bar 'gyur ba byis pa so med pa'i lce blangs la/ sgrol ma'i gzungs bdun mngon par bsngags pa byas nas bung ba'i rgyal po'i rtsa ba dang /

ba lang gi gi wang lhan cig byas pas dpral bar thig le yongs su bzung ste/ gang bltas pa de dbang du byed do/ /de nas gzhan yang sbyor bar 'gyur ba lto ba'i srin bu la gzungs bdun mngon par bsngags pa bya ste/

rdo rje dang lhan cig so rtsis byas la byin te/ sbyor ba mchog zos pa na mi spong ba dang / gzhan du mi dga' ba dang / gzhan du mi 'gro ba dang / rang gi bdag po yang spong ngo / /de nas gzhan yang sbyor bar 'gyur/ /ba mar khu ba

chen pos nye bar byugs la/ sgrol ma'i gzungs bzlas la de bsgom par bya'o/ /bzlas pa'i mthar sA lu btags pas 'dag gu'i dri ma la khu ba byas te/ gang la byin pa de lnga bor yang mi spong ngo / /de nas gzhan yang sbyor

bar 'gyur ba zla ba la nye bar chags pa'i dus su sgrol ma'i gzungs zlos shing bsnyen pa byas la de las byung ba'i 'jig rten dbang phyug blangs te/ dung gi thal ba dang mnye bar bya zhing rab tu grags ma nyid la sbyar te/ ji srid du lnga bor

yang rjes su 'brang ngo / /de nas gzhan yang sbyor bar 'gyur ba sgrol ma'i gzungs kyis ma da na pha la lan brgya rtsa brgyad yongasu bzlas te/ 'dod pa'i 'bras bu des rta mgrin dang / lhan cig pas bskus na dbang du 'gyur

ro/ /oM tA re tut+tA re tu re a mu ka s+ya ban+d+ha na k+ta ma ku nu muHswA hA/ zhes bya ba'i sngags 'di arka'i lo ma la bsgrub bya'i ming nang du bcug par bris la ne'u le'i khung bur sbas na bcings pa las grol bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas shes

rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'byung gnas yang dag par rab tu bshad par bya'o/ /gang gis bsgom pa tsam gyis phas kyi rgol ba thams cad tshar gcod par 'gyur ro/ /lha mo phyag gnyis ma/ zhal gcig ma/ sku mdog dkar ba yid 'phrog

ma/ skra phyed du li ba/ chu skyes shin du dkar ba la yang dag par gnas ma/ lag pa g.yas par pad ma mdog dkar ba yang dag par bsgoms shing / g.yon na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ rdo rje skyil dkrungs su gnas pa/

rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ lte ba'i dkyil 'khor du bsgom par bya'o/ /oM las skyes ma/ mchog tu dga' bar byed ma/ dam tshig sems dpa' bskyed nas ye shes sems dpa' bsgom par bya zhing rnal 'byor zla ba

drug du goms pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par 'gyur ro/ /mtshan mo bdun du sbyor bas bstan bcos thams cad shes par byed do/ /'bum bzlas pa'i sbyor bas nyi ma re re la tshigs bcad brgya brgya byed par 'gyur ro/ /rab tu

'bad pa med par gzhung brgya yang 'dzin par byed do/ /de la sngags kyi rkang par gyur pa/ oM pi tsu pi tsu pradz+nyA bar+d+ha ni/ dz+wa la dz+wa la me d+hA bar+d+ha ni/ d+hi ri d+hi ri bud+d+ha bar+d+ha ni swA hA/ khwa mi zer ba na/ sngags 'dis bdun du mngon par

bsngags par byas te/ ma bslangs pa'i sings po skyur po ji srid zla ba drug du gang 'thung ba de shes rab chen por 'gyur ro/ /de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyi/ /mtshan nyid yang dag rab bshad bya/ /de yis nye bar bsten pa'i sngags/ /
sgrub pa po yis nges par 'grub/ /dal zhing zab mo'i chos dang ldan/ /rig pa kun la mkhas dang bcas/ /sbyin bsreg dkyil 'khor sngags shes shing / /rab gnas gtor ma'i pha rol son/ /de nyid bcu ni rnam

par rig /nyan thos spyod pa bsrung ba po/ /sngags spyod rim pa gus pa dang / /gzugs ldan mthong na dga' ba dang / /dkyil 'khor 'dri zhing bzlas par ldan/ /rtsa ba'i ltung ba 'joms pa po/ /sngags dang lus skyob

sbyor ba yis/ /'jig rten rnams ni bde bar byed/ /de ldan bla mas bcas nas ni/ /gang gis kyang ni smad mi bya/ /skye bo bla ma smod pa dang / /dmyal ba chen por 'tshed par 'gyur/ /ji ltar rdo rje 'dzin rgyal ni/ /sangs rgyas kun

gyis dang por mchod/ /rdo rje gur gyis 'gro ba yis/ /de ltar bla ma'i nan tan bya/ /bla ma'i grib ma bud med dang / /lham dang stan dang mal stan rnams/ /rmongs chen gang zhig 'gong byed na/ /skyes pa de ni spu grir ltung / /

legs par dbang bskur slob ma gang / /bla ma'i bka' las 'da' byed pa/ /'jig rten 'dir ni 'on par 'gyur/ /'jig rten pha rol dmyal bar gnas/ /g.yo dang sgyu yi sbyor ba yis/ /brdzun gyis mi nus smra ba las/ /

khong skam mdze nad chen po can/ /dmyal ba la sogs skye bar 'gyur/ /de ltar shes pa'i slob ma yis/ /bla ma'i bsnyen bkur pha rol phyin/ /bla ma'i bka' ni rab bsrungs na/ /dngos grub rgyas pa 'grub par 'gyur/ /

tshogs kyi zas ni rtag tu bya/ /zhi ba la sogs rab tu bskul/ /snga bar dge 'dun chos ston bya/ /bla ma sangs rgyas yang mnyes bya/ /bla ma la ni yon dbul zhing / /de yi rjes su tshogs kun la'o/ /bdag gi las ni
