brtsams nas ni/ /cho ga 'dis ni bsgrub par bya/ /yan lag rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan/ /rdo rje rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan/ /rdo rje dril bu blangs nas ni/ /lam gyi bzhi mdor gtor ma dang / /me tog bdug spos mar me dang / /de bzhin dri yi dung

sogs g.yas/ /g.yon du sngags kyi mchod yon snod/ /mdun du bzed snod bzhag par bya/ /zhabs bsil gong ma'i cho ga yis/ /me tog spos sogs rim pa bzhin/ /lA s+yai la sogs mchod pa yis/ /mchod par byas na bzang por

sbyin/ /me tog sgyur ba'i tshul gyis dang / /dri ni 'thor ba'i tshul las dang / /sdong pas mar me'i mchod pa dang / /byug pa'i lus kyis rjes su dris/ /lA s+yai'i lag pa lA s+yai ste/ /phreng bas phreng ba'i mkha' 'gro ma/ /glu yis hU~M

gi dam tshig glu/ /brla bskums pas ni gar nyid de/ /mchod pa 'di rnams bla na med/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes par byed/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni mchod pas mchod/ /'dod pa'i dngos grub byed par 'gyur/ /

bzlas dang bsgom pa mngon dga' zhing / /rtag tu 'khor ba'i pha rol 'gro/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i bka' ji bzhin/ /'di rnams bla med mchod pa'o/ /me tog spos sogs mngon sum du/ /'jig rten spyod par gnas pa yis/ /
sna tshogs mchod pa mchog nyid min/ /de nyid byang chub yan lag min/ /dkar po zhi bar byed par brjod/ /ser po rgyas pa'i sgrub thabs la/ /dbang dang dgug par dmar po ste/ /tha ma'i las la nag po'o/ /

zhi ba la ni me tog dkar/ /ser po rgyas pa'i rdo rje la/ /me tog nag po tha ma la/ /dbang dang dgug la dmar po bzang / /rnal 'byor pa gang dbang bskur med/ /dkyil 'khor du ni ma zhugs dang / /gang zhig

rab gnas ma mthong dang / /gang zhig sbyin sreg ma byas pa/ /'jig rten 'di dang pha rol du/ /de'i dngos grub mchog nyid med/ /gang gis slob dpon gsol ma btab/ /'dir ni rigasu skye ba med/ /sangs rgyas

thams cad bsgom par bya/ /gang gis byang chub ma thob na'ang / /'khor los bsgyur ba'i gnas su de'i/ /skye zhing skye bar skye bar 'gyur/ /yang na sa yi bdag po nyid/ /dag pa'i gnas su mngon par 'gro/ /bde ba

can dang mkha' 'gro dang / /dga' ldan du ni blo ldan skye/ /'jig rten 'dir ni gar 'grub pa/ /sangs rgyas de ni ci zhig smos/ /khams gsum bdag po chen po nyid/ /'chi med rgas pas khyab pa med/ /tshangs pa

brgya byin de bzhin drag /sgra can me dang rlung dang ni/ /'dod pa'i lha dang thong ldan nyid/ /'di rnams de yi 'khor du 'gyur/ /lha klu de bzhin gnod sbyin dang / /dri za lha ma yin dang mi/ /mi 'am ci dang mkha' spyod gang / /de rnams

'khor 'gyur the tsom med/ /'di ni rang byung bcom ldan 'das/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / /'khrungs dang byang chub byed pa dang / /de bzhin du ni lhar gshegs dang / /khyim nas 'byung bar byed pa dang / /rab tu byung ba 'dzin pa dang / /skye ba

yongs su len pa dang / /yongasu mya ngan 'das pa ston/ /'dul ba'i 'jig rten mthong nas ni/ /'di ni gzugs ni du ma byed/ /sangs rgyas sems can skyabs bzhed pas/ /sangs rgyas gar ni rol pa mdzad/ /ri bong stag dang seng ge dang / /glang po rnams kyi rigs

su yang / /snying rjes phan pa'i sems kyi ni/ /phyag rgyas grub pa skye bar 'gyur/ /bud med sgyu ma'i spros pa yis/ /'dod chags can la chos gsung ngo / /bud med sgyu ma sangs rgyas nyid/ /sgyu ma thams cad sel

bar byed/ /shes rab pha rol phyin gzugs su/ /bud med rtag tu yang dag gnas/ /sgyu ma chen mo gnas 'dug nas/ /sangs rgyas byang chub rab tu ster/ /g.yo zhing dad chen ngo tsha med/ /rtag tu 'dod chags pha rol 'gro/ /

dngos grub kyang ni rab tu ster/ /gzugs dang yon tan nor la yang / /'dod pa gang yang btsun mo med/ /rdo rje 'dod chags yid 'dod pas/ /rang gi bde ba myang bar ldan/ /skyes bu tshul khrims ldan pa dang / /bde gshegs bka'

mi 'da' zhing / /bla ma bsnyen bkur snying rje can/ /kye yi rdo rje rab phye ba'o/ /de nas rnal 'byor ma bdag med ma gtso mo dang / mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyis bstod pa'i rgyal po 'dis gsol ba btab pa/ zhe sdang rdo rje phyag 'tshal bstod/ /

gti mug rdo rje phyag 'tshal bstod/ /ser sna rdo rjes bdag la skyobs/ /'dod chags rdo rjes bdag la stsol/ /yid dang phrag dog chen po dang / /rdo rje kun gyis dam tshig mgon/ /las rnams thams cad sgrub pa po/ /rdo rje can kun

dgyes par mdzod/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi dam tshig la gnas te/ dbyangs 'di gsungs pa/ thig skud sar pa mdzes par ldan/ /shin du tshad ma gtsang ma yis/ /he zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor

gyi/ /shes rab can gyis thig gdab bya/ /de la 'di ni slob ma chen po'i gsol ba gdab pa'i dam tshig go/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad zhi/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas/ /rdo rje sems dpa' las byung

ba'i/ /dkyil 'khor 'dren pas bshad du gsol/ /dkyil 'khor gyi rdo rje la gsol ba gdab pa rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /nga ni snying rje stobs dpal ldan/ /bsrung ba'i 'khor lo sbyar ba po/ /rdo rje yis ni

gsal ba'i lus/ /sku gsum las ni skyes pa spro/ /gal te la la 'da' byed na/ /'jig par 'di la the tsom med/ /lus spral po dang kha cig gang / /bde chen ye shes 'byung ba dang / /rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin skyes/ /zur gcig

bgegs ni chen po rnams/ /'khor lo yi ni brgyad nyid kyi/ /cha yis sgo ni rab tu grags/ /sgo khang lha yi snam bu ni/ /sgo yi tshad kyi tshad du bya/ /sgo yi phyed kyi cha ru ni/ /ya phubs dang ni 'gram nyid do/ /rig byed nyid kyang de bzhin bya/ /

dra ba'i snam bu rig byed phyed/ /dang por tshangs pa'i thig dang ni/ /gnyis par mtshams kyi thig dang yang / /gsum par ngos bzhi yi ni bzhi/ /thig ni rab tu gdab par bya/ /tshangs thig cha gnyis bor nas ni/ /cha drug du ni gdab par

bya/ /de nas sgo yi tshad bor nas/ /dgu yi char ni rab tu gdab/ /de la 'di ni sa sbyang ba'i dam tshig go/ /a~M kha~M hU~M bu~M/ de la 'di ni ye shes spyan drang ba ste/ oM me di ni badzri b+ha ba badzra ban+d+ha hU~M/ /de la 'di ni thig gdab pa'i dam tshig ste/

oM sa ma ya su tra mA ti kra ma hU~M/ de la 'di ni rdul tshon bri ba'i dam tshig ste/ 'di ni chos dbyings dag pa ste/ /sems can khams ni thar bar byed/ /kye yis rdo rje rgyal po ches/ /dkyil 'khor dam pa bzhengs par bya/ /

dbang ldan du ni sha ra~M b+ha/ /mi yi mtshams su dge slong bris/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bden bral du/ /rlung du rdo rje bri bar bya/ /lcags kyu shar du bri bar bya/ /lho yi sgor ni zhags pa nyid/ /nub sgor de bzhin lcags sgrog ste/ /byang du rdo rje

dril bu'o/ /dbus su thod pa dkar po ni/ /sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan pa bris/ /de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rgyal pos sbyin bsreg gi grong khyer rab tu phye ba/ rdo rje thab khung sbyor ba yis/ /rdo rje'i bsreg rdzas sbyor ba las/ /zlum po zhi bar

byed par brjod/ /rgyas par ba'i rdzing bu'i gzugs/ /dbang ni zla ba phyed pa 'dra/ /dgug pa la ni lcags kyu'i dbyibs/ /gsad dang zhe sdang las la ni/ /namakha'i khams dang mtshungs pa'o/ /de bzhin skrod byed skal ngan dang / /yan lag nyams

pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /tsan dan a ka ru shing dang / /gzhan yang dri yi rkang 'thung gis/ /sbyin bsreg yan lag me sbyar nas/ /phyis ni yang ni dgug par bya/ / oM e h+ye hi ma hA b+hU ta de ba r-i Shi dwi dza sat+ta ma gr-i hI twA a hu ti

ma hA smi nas n+ni hi to b+ha wa/ lcags skyu nyid kyis dgug par bya/ /zhags pa nyid kyis gzhug bya zhing / /lcags sgrog gis ni zhabs dag bcing / /dril bu 'khrol bas dbang du bya/ /lA s+yai la sogs mchod pa brgyad/ /

mchod yon cho ga byas nas ni/ /mar la sogs pa'i sbyor ba las/ /yang ni me ni mnyes par bya/ /de la 'di ni rdo rje mchod yon gyi dam tshig ste/ oM pra wa ra sat+kA ra pra tIts+tsha swA hA/ de la 'di ni zhabs bsil gyi dam tshig ste/ oM sarbA

pA pa da ha na badzra ya badzra satwa s+ya sarba pA pa~M da ha swA hA/ de la 'di ni bsreg rdzas thams cad 'chu ba'i dam tshig gi sngags te/ oM badzrA na la ma hA b+hU ta dz+wa la ya/ sar+b+ba b+ha ku ru sarba duSh+TA na hU~M phaT/ dra~M sh+ya dzaHhU~M ba~M hoH sa ma ya s+t+wa ma ha~M/ phyi nas

rang 'dod pa'i lha spyan drang ba ste/ oM e h+ye hi b+ha ga wAn+na hi b+hak+t+ya nus ma ye na tsa a g+han+tu sa~M pra tIts+tshe da~M pU dzA~M tsA d+ya pra sI d+ha me/ de la 'di ni dgyes pa'i dam tshig ste/ oM kr-i to paH sar+b+ba sa twAR+thaH sid+d+hiR+di ta tA ya thA nu gA gats+tsha d+hA~M bud+ha ba shi ya~M pu

na rA ga ma nA ya muH bzhengs pa dang las sna tshogs kyi sbyor ba dang sbyin bsreg gi le'u ste brgyad pa'o// // de nas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal gyis/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i rab gnas ni/ /'jig rten tha snyad la gnas te/ /mdor bsdus nas ni

bstan par bya/ /dang por re zhig rig ma 'dzin/ /dril bu 'khrol bar 'dod pa dang / /rkang g.yas brkyang ba'i sbyor ba las/ /g.yas par rdo rje gsor ba dang / /srod thun skad ni chag pa na/ /gos kyis mgrin pa bcings pa dang / /

rin chen sman gyis yongs gang ba'i/ /bum pa sta gon gnas par bya/ /oM de wa pi tsu badzra a d+hi tiSh+Tha/ oM mo ha ra ti a d+hi tiSh+Tha/ oM dwe Sha ra ti a d+hi tiSh+Tha/ oM badzra ra a d+hi tiSh+Tha/ oM badzra gau rI A kaR+Sha ya dzaH oM badzra tsau rI pra be

sha ya hU~M/ oM badzra bet+t+wa lI ban+d+ha ya ba~M/ oM badzra g+hasma rI wa shi ku ru hoH/ 'di ni ye shes dgug pa'i cho ga'o/ /shun pa lnga dang ba byung lnga/ /khyad par du yang dri lnga dang / /lus bshal ched du blugs par bya/ /mchod yon la sogs

sngar bzhin bya/ /yang na de nyid sbyor bar bya/ /snga bar blugs shing byin gyis brlab/ /mig la sogs par gti mug sogs/ /rdo rje gsum ni gnas gsum dgod/ /dbang ni rang gi rigs nyid kyis/ /mchod pa la sogs rim
pas brtsam/ /rang gi snying nas ye shes bsam/ /sangs rgyas bzhugs par bsang gtor bya/ /ye shes bdud rtsi'i sbyor ba yis/ /rim pas mchod pa'i lha mo spro/ /byang chub sems mchog bsams nas ni/ /

sangs rgyas bstod pa yang dag brtsam/ /dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin gyis/ /stong pa snying rje tha dad med/ /khyod ni rnal 'byor ma tshogs yongs su bskor/ /khyod ni nyid kyi thugs kyis mchog brnyes pa/ /khyod kyis rgyu dang mi

rgyu'i 'gro ba kun bsgrubs shing / /snying rje'i thugs kyis sems can sad mdzad pa/ /sgyu ma'i spros pas rdo rje 'phen mdzad pa/ /he ru ka dpal rdo rje yid kyis dgyes/ /rdo rje se gol sbyor ba yis/ /rdo rje bsgom pas

bsgom par bya/ /rdo rje yi ge blangs nas ni/ /rdo rje dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ /rdo rje dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /rdo rje phung po rnam par bsgom/ /de nas rdo rje 'tshed pa bsam/ /rdo rje lce yi sbyor ba las/ /sangs rgyas

rdo rje'i rjes bcug nyid/ /rdo rje'i sngags kyis bsang gtor bya/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje'i bdud rtsi'i ro myang ba'i rdo rje de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /nam mkha'i khams kyi dbus son par/ /rtse mo lnga pa bris pa yis/ /

sangs rgyas dngos grub 'dod pa yis/ /stobs kyis sangs rgyas phur bus gdab/ /chos 'byung grong khyer yid 'ong bar/ /rdo rje 'dzub mo'i sbyor ba las/ /gal te dngos grub mi ster na/ /rdo rje sems dpa' gsad par bya/ /

oM du ru du ru/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da/ hU~M hU~M/ bcom ldan 'das kyis phur bus gdab pa chen po rdo rje de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /ma mo'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /rta mgrin rnam par bsgom par bya/ /dbu rgyan la

ni rdo rje chos/ /phyag rgya chen por sbyor ba las/ /pad ma dmar po spyi bor 'dzin/ /sku mdog dmar po stobs po che/ /gos dkar gnyis med sbyor ba las/ /bcu drug phyag gis rnam par brgyan/ /g.yas pa'i zhal

ni nag po ste/ /g.yon pa zla mdzes dri ma med/ /dang po dmar po shes par bya/ /lhag ma'i zhal ni bung ba mtshungs/ /zhal brgyad pa la zhabs bzhi pa/ /rdo rje chos ni gzi brjid che/ /'dod chags chen po'i rjes chags
pas/ /bdud bzhi mnyam par mnan pa'o/ /ma mo'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /rdo rje rnam snang dran par bya/ /dbu rgyan rdo rje 'dzin pa bsam/ /sku mdog dkar po gzi brjid che/ /phyag ni bcu drug zhal
brgyad pa/ /zhabs bzhi pa ste 'jigs pa po/ /chos kyi 'khor lo spyi bor 'dzin/ /'dod chags chen po'i rjes chags pa/ /spyan dang gnyis med sbyor ba yis/ /'jigs pa yang ni 'jigs par mdzad/ /dang po'i
zhal ni dkar po ste/ /nag po dmar pos rnam par brgyan/ /lhag ma'i zhal ni bung ba mtshungs/ /ma mo'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /rdo rje nyi ma rnam par bsgom/ /cod pan rin chen 'dzin par bsam/ /

rdo rje gzi brjid 'od po che/ /phyag ni bcu drug zhal brgyad pa/ /zhabs bzhi pa ste 'jigs pa po/ /sems kyi rin chen spyi bor 'dzin/ /btso ma gser ltar gzi brjid che/ /dang po'i zhal ni ser po ste/ /g.yas pa sngon

po 'dra ba'o/ /g.yon pa zla 'od bzang po ste/ /lhag ma'i zhal ni bung ba mtshungs/ /ma mo'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /rta mchog rnam par bsgom par bya/ /dbu rgyan ral gri 'dzin par bsam/ /mar kad ut+pal mtshungs pa'o/ /

zhal brgyad pa la zhabs bzhi pa/ /bcu drug phyag gis rnam par brgyan/ /dang po'i zhal ni sngo bsangs te/ /rta yi gzugs te 'jigs pa po/ /g.yas pa kha dog nag po ste/ /g.yon pa zla mdzes dri ma med/ /ral gri dngos grub spyi

bor 'dzin/ /lhag ma'i zhal ni bung ba mtshungs/ /rdo rje nyi ma rta nyid kyi/ /phyag rgya 'di ni sgrol ma'i gzugs/ /lha mo rnams kyi phyag gnyis brjod/ /gri gug dang ni thod pa 'dzin/ /kye rdo rje la dkyil 'khor mchog /phan par me long

de bzhin no/ /rta mgrin la ni gos bzang ste/ /rdo rje nyi ma la ni gser/ /rta mchog la ni 'gro mgyogs te/ /mchog tu phan pa nyid kyi yon/ /sangs rgyas 'bras bu 'dod pa yis/ /bla ma la rtag rgyun du 'bul/ /skal bzang rdo rje

sems dpa' bdag /skal bzang thub pa rnam snang mdzad/ /skal bzang dpal ldan 'jig rten dbang / /skal bzang nyi ma bdun rgyal po/ /de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rgyal po sku gsum mchog gi rdo rje 'dzin pa pos mnga' bdag rdo rje

'dzin pa'i dam tshig mchog gsungs pa/ / oM d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hA ra ya d+hA ra ya/ marda marda/ badzra d+h+rIka phaT swA hA/ de nas sngags chen bshad pa na/ /rdo rje skye ba snying rje che/ /'jigs shing skrag par gyur nas ni/ /rdo rje'i dngos grub rab tu

stsol/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chos kyi rnam pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rta mgrin gyi sngags 'di gsungs pa/ oM badzra d+har+m+ma sa ma ya s+t+wa~M/ hu lu hu lu/ oM A ro lig phaT / / de nas 'di ni bshad tsam

na/ /rdo rje chos ni grags chen po/ /'jigs shing skrag par gyur nas ni/ /chos kyi dngos grub rab tu stsol/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ phan pa'i sngags

'di gsungs pa/ oM shA shA ta~M pa ra ma shA shwa tra e h+yi hi dzi na dzika phaT swA hA/ de nas 'di ni bshad tsam gyis/ /sangs rgyas kun dang de bzhin gshegs/ /brgyal zhing 'jigs par gyur nas ni/ /de rnams sangs rgyas dngos grub stsol/ /

de nas bcom ldan 'das rin chen nyi ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rdo rje gzi brjid kyi sngags 'di gsungs pa/ oM badzra sUr+ya ta mo bi d+ha ma na sa ma yang s+t+wa ma ha~M rat+na d+h-ika phaT swA hA/ de nas 'di

ni bshad tsam gyis/ /rdo rje gzi brjid 'od po che/ /'jigs shing brgyal bar gyur nas ni/ /nyi ma'i dngos grub rab tu stsol/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das don yod rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs te/ rta mchog rdo rje'i sngags

'di gsungs so/ /phuHphuHphuHhi hi hi pradz+nyA d+h+r-ika phaT swA hA/ de nas 'di ni bshad tsam gyis/ /rdo rje don yod rigs byung ba/ /'jigs shing brgyal bar gyur nas ni/ /de rnams don yod dngos grub stsol/ /sangs rgyas

dkyil 'khor zlum po ste/ /rdo rje can gyi zla phyed mtshungs/ /rdo rje chos kyi pad+ma 'dra/ /nyi ma'i yid bzhin nor bu bzhin/ /rta mchog ces bya de yi ni/ /thams cad du ni gru gsum mo/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya che/ /phan pa'i

phyag rgya nyid dang ni/ /rdo rje chos kyi phyag rgya che/ /rin chen tog gi 'od byed ma/ /don yod grub pa'i phyag rgya che/ /rus pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan par ldan/ /stag gi lpags pa mnabs pa dang / /dbu skra thod pa phyed pa ste/ /mchod par

brtson pa'i sems dpa' yis/ /chags pas mig dmar 'thang nas ni/ /phyag rgya chen po'i sbyor ba las/ /chags pa'i sbyor bas bsgom par bya/ /las sna tshogs bsgrub pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// // de nas rdo rje 'dzin

rgyal gyis/ /spyod pa'i mtshan nyid bshad par bya/ /rdo rje spyod pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /rdo rje phyag rgya yang dag brtsam/ /me tog 'bras sogs kyis brgyan pa/ /nags chen po yi mtha' nyid du/ /sems dpa' chen po 'gro bar bya/ /

nags tshal du ni slongs mos rgyu/ /zas ni bzang pos brgyan pa nyid/ /de rnams 'jigs shing skrags nas ster/ /nags tshal bdag po'i rigs kun ni/ /rdo rje can te 'khor du 'gyur/ /skyes pa dang ni skye ba kun/ /skye bo gang zhig

skye 'gyur ba/ /gti mug rdo rje'i sbyor ba las/ /rdo rje'i mig gis mthong bar 'gyur/ /khams gsum la ni nyams dga' bar/ /sgra ni gang zhig rab grags pa/ /rna ba'i drung du gnas pa bzhin/ /zhe sdang rdo rje'i sbyor ba las/ /drang srong

mngon par shes pas thos/ /sems can kun gyi sems chen po/ /mtshon dka' lta bu'i mtshan nyid ni/ /lag mthil skyu ru ra bzhag bzhin/ /rdo rje'i sems kyis shes par 'gyur/ /skye ba bye ba stong phrag tu/ /rang gi rigs ni stong phrag

gcig /rdo rje sbyor bas dran 'gyur te/ /nyi gsum lon bzhin dran par 'gyur/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba du ma yis/ /'dis ni snang bar byed par 'gyur/ /mngon shes lnga yi sbyor ba yis/ /sangs rgyas mngon shes thob par 'gyur/ /rdo rje skye mched

rnam par dag pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// // phan pa nyid kyis zhi ba ste/ /rdo rje nyi mas rgyas pa'o/ /rdo rje chos kyis dbang zhes bya/ /rdo rje sems dpas gsad par bya/ /zhi ba'i sems kyis zhi ba ste/ /dbang ni yang dag brtsam par bya/ /

rgyas pa'i sems kyis rgyas pa ste/ /rin chen char sprin rab bsgom bya/ /rjes su chags pa'i sems kyis ni/ /bu mo bkug nas spyad par bya/ /me yi char sprin 'bab pa dang / /gdug pa'i sems kyis gsad par bya/ /'phrog pa

las ni dkar mo ste/ /skye gnyis pa las tshangs ma nyid/ /dpal mo sred med bu las kyang / /ma bcag pa las ram+b+ha nyid/ /dga' ma chu srin rgyal mtshan las/ /phyag rgya chen po'i sbyor ba yis/ /de rnams thams cad nya

bar spyad/ /shin du dga' ba'i sems kyis rtse/ /'dod pas gos par mi 'gyur ro/ /mthar ni swA hAs zhi ba ste/ /rgyas pa'i dus su bau Sha Ta/ /mthar ni hU~M phaT bsad pa la/ /dbang dang dgug la dzaHdang hrIH las thams

cad pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// // de nas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal ni/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi rdo rje gur/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro rab bsgrub phyir/ /thub pas tshig 'di bka' stsal to/ /me tog 'bras bus brgyan byas pa'i/ /
ri khrod dang ni sman ljongs su/ /rdo rje dkyil dkrungs bcas nas ni/ /bla ma sangs rgyas mchod par bya/ /dkon mchog gsum la bdag skyabs mchi/ /sdig pa thams cad so sor bshags/ /'gro ba'i dge

la rjes yi rang / /sangs rgyas byang chub yid kyis bzung / /sangs rgyas chos dang tshogs mchog la/ /byang chub bar du skyabs su mchi/ /rang gzhan don ni rab bsgrub phyir/ /byang chub sems ni bskyed par bgyi/ /byang chub

mchog gi sems ni bgyis nas/ /sems can thams cad bdag gi mgon du gnyer/ /byang chub spyod mchog yid 'ong spyad par bgyi/ /'gro la phan phyir sangs rgyas 'grub par shog /tshangs pa'i gnas ni bzhi po yis/ /

sems kyi ngal ni bso bar bya/ /phyin nas byang chub sems gnas te/ /rdo rje bsrung ba'i dam tshig go/ /bden dang brdzun par spyad pa yi/ /rtag pas nye bar mi gos te/ /ma skyes pa yi sbyor ba yis/ /skye ba 'dir ni rab tu brjod/ /

oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko ha~M/ nam mkha'i khams kyi dbus gnas par/ /sna tshogs rdo rje bsgom par bya/ /hU~M ni bcu yi sbyor ba yis/ /khro bo bcu ni rim pas dgod/ /gshen rje mthar byed shes rab mthar/ /pad+ma

mthar byed bgegs mthar byed/ /Tak+ki khro bo dbyug pa sngon/ /mi g.yo ba dang stobs chen dang / /gtsug tor gdugs ni dkar po dang / /rdo rje zhabs 'og gnas pa ni/ /bdud rtsi sbyor bas thams cad du/ /khro bo'i bsgom

pas bsgom par bya/ /dpag tshad brgyar ni khyab pa ru/ /bsams nas bgegs ni bskrad par bya/ /nam mkha'i khams kyi dbus gnas par/ /rdo rje dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ /rdo rje dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /

'od kyi dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ /me yi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /yang ni chu ni bsgom par bya/ /chu yi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /brtul zhugs can gyis dbang chen bsgom/ /dbang chen dkyil 'khor steng du ni/ /

bdag nyid kyang ni bsgom par bya/ /b+h+ru~M las gnas ni bsams nas su/ /rdo rje dkyil 'khor de brtag bya/ /rnam pa lnga ni rab brtag bya/ /ye shes lnga las byung ba yi/ /sems dpa'i gzug brnyan bsgom par bya/ /rdo rje sems dpa'

las byung ba'i/ /rig ma'i skyes bu bsgom par bya/ /oM d+har+m+ma d+hA tu badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/ rdo rje bzhengs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /mig la sogs par gti mug sogs/ /rdo rje gsum ni gnas gsum dgod/ /thugs

kyi rdo rje mkha' spyod ma/ /gsung gi rdo rje sa spyod ma/ /sku la zhabs 'og gnas ma ste/ /hU~M AHoM las byung ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi snying por bya/ /rdo rje dkar mo chu bdag ma/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro bdag med ma/ /zhe sdang rdo rje'i

gnas mnan cing / /dkyil 'khor snying por bsgom par bya/ /dkar mo chom rkun ro langs ma/ /g+hasma rI ni sgo bsrungs ma/ /puk+ka sI dang ri khrod ma/ /gdol pa g.yung mo mtshams su dgod/ /steng du mkha' spyod ma zhes bshad/ /

'og tu de bzhin sa spyod ma/ /dbus su bdag med mkha' 'gro ma/ /mkha' 'gro dkyil 'khor nyid du bsgom/ /byang chub rdo rjes sangs rgyas la/ /ji ltar mchod pa che stsal ba/ /bdag kyang rab tu bskyab pa'i phyir/ /namakha'i

rdo rje bdag la stsol/ /dbang bskur rdo rje chen po ni/ /khams gsum gyis ni phyag byas pa/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang gsum gyi/ /gnas las byung ba stsol bar mdzad/ /ye shes kyi dbang la gsol ba gdab pa rdo rje zhes bya

ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /rig pa'i skyes bu dbang chen la/ /cod pan rang gi lhag pa'i lha/ /des ni dkyil 'khor dbang dang ni/ /bstod dang mchod pa la sogs bya/ /ye shes gzhug pa de bzhin yang / /lce yis rdo rje bdud rtsi myang / /
nang du brjod pa'i sbyor ba las/ /brtul zhugs can gyis sngags bzlas bya/ /rnal 'byor ma 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// // de nas byams pa la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams

kyis rang rang gi rnam par rtog pa skyes par gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud ces spyad par bgyi/ rdo rje 'dzin pas bka' stsal pa/ /shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i thabs/ /rnal 'byor ma zhes

mngon par brjod/ /phyag rgya chen po'i sbyor ba las/ /gang phyir de nyid bsten pa yi/ /rnal 'byor ma yi rdo rje gur/ /rnal 'byor ma yi rgyud ces bshad/ /pha rol phyin pa kun gyi thabs/ /bsam gtan tsam gyis

'grub par 'gyur/ /dga' mdzes mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mtsho/ /mkha' dang gser gyi char pa dang / /dga' chen ma dang g+hasma rI/ /shin du dgyes rol gsang yid 'phrog /rdo rje mkha' 'gro phan rgyud brgyad/ /kye'i rdo rje dkyil

'khor sangs rgyas kun/ /gsang mdzod rdo rje bdud rtsi 'byung ba dang / /'khor lo sdom pa gur dang 'byung gnas ni/ /rnal 'byor ma rgyud drug tu rab tu grags/ /skyes bu rnams ni gdul ba'i phyir/ /rnal 'byor rgyud ni yang dag bshad/ /

btsun mo rnams ni bsdu ba'i phyir/ /rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud bshad do/ /dman pa rnams la bya ba'i rgyud/ /bya min rnal 'byor de ltag la/ /sems can mchog la rnal 'byor mchog /rnal 'byor gong med de lhag la/ /de nas
byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ re zhig bdag cag gis spyod yul rnams ni 'tshal na'ang / sems can gzhan rnams kyis ji ltar sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa 'tshal ba lags/ bcom

ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ stong pa snying rje tha dad med/ /gang du sems ni rab bsgoms pa/ /'di ni sangs rgyas chos dang ni/ /dge 'dun gyi yang bstan pa'o/ /mu stegs can dbyung ba dang / rgol ba tshar gcod

pa dang / rang gi sde'i gzhung brjod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /bdag gi byang chub thob phyir dang / /gang phyir gzhan bsgral ba'i phyir/ /des na sangs rgyas chos dang ni/ /dge 'dun gyi yang bstan pa'o/ /bdag 'dzin zhen

pa bzlog pa'i phyir/ /chos dbyings bdag nyid sgrub thabs ni/ /thabs dang shes rab 'dus pa yis/ /des ni sangs rgyas bstan pa'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / rgyal ba'i sras po rnams bcom ldan 'das

kyi gsung 'di thos nas dga' bar gyur te/ tshig 'di skad smras pa/ e ma kun du bzang po yi/ /bstan pa nam mkha' las byung ba/ /nam mkha'i dbus su sbyor ba yis/ /ye shes rgya mtsho nyan par 'gyur/ /de nas

rdo rje 'dzin rgyal ni/ /bde ba chen po rnam 'phel bas/ /dam tshig thams cad bshad par bya/ /sangs rgyas 'bras bu 'dod pa yis/ /bde dang rangs shing gar dang ni/ /glu dang rol mo'i sgra byed pas/ /dri dang phreng ba
byug pa yis/ /rig pa'i rgyal po rab tu 'grub/ /ji ltar bde bar bde bzung nas/ /ji ltar 'dod par spyad par bya/ /ji ltar gnas su gnas nas kyang / /yi ge dam pa 'grub par 'gyur/ /bza' dang btung

ba'i sbyor ba dang / /bzang po'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa yis/ /nyi ma gcig tu bskul ba yis/ /dam pa'i de nyid 'grub par 'gyur/ /rtag tu rang gi dam tshig myang / /rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa mchod/ /rtag tu

bla ma la yang dbul/ /bla ma sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam/ /ji ltar mgon po rnam snang mdzad/ /rdo rje 'dzin bzhin bla ma nyid/ /ji ltar nam mkha' mdzod chen po/ /ji ltar thub pa rdo rje chos/ /ji ltar mgon po

bdun rgyal po/ /de ltar rdo rje slob dpon brjod/ /de bas 'bad pa thams cad kyis/ /rdo rje slob dpon bla ma che/ /dge ba mchog tu gsal ba po/ /nam yang smad par mi bya'o/ /rdo rje sdom pa zhes bya ba'i le'u
ste bcu gsum pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chen po rdo rje gsor bar bzhed pa la/ /mkha' 'gro ma bdag med mas 'khyud pas bzang po spyod pa dbye bar bya'o/ /rdo rje'i gzugs

su bzhag nas ni/ /ji ltar 'dod par 'dod pa yis/ /rig 'dzin 'khor los bsgyur ba nyid/ /dogs pa med par 'grub par 'gyur/ /dri lnga yang dag blangs nas su/ /rdzas lnga dang ni bsre bar bya/ /lcags gsum gyis ni

dkris nas ni/ /mgon po'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur/ /gur gum a ka ru ldan pa/ /nyi ma 'char ka'i mdog 'dra ba'i/ /ri lu kha ru bcug byas nas/ /nyi ma'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur/ /sha lnga dang ni ldan par ru/ /lcags

gsum gyis ni dkris nas ni/ /rdo rje nyi ma rab sbyor bas/ /nyi ma gcig gis 'grub par 'gyur/ /tsan+dan dmar po kha che dang / /dga' ba sbas par sbyar ba ni/ /lcags gsum gyis ni dkri byas pa/ /rta yi rig pa 'dzin par

'gyur/ /'jig rten mgon po rnams bsgoms nas/ /tsa na'i rus pa'i tshad tsam las/ /gu gul lcags kyis dkris pa ni/ /mgon po'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur/ /ri lu sgrub thabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /klu yi

rgyal po'i mgo bsregs nas/ /rang byung khrag gis bsgo bar bya/ /rdo rje phan pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /mig sman rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur/ /bla ma'i sa bon ldan pa dang / /stag gi lpags pa'i tshil bus mnye/ /sku yi

rdo rje'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /rkang pa'i byug pa 'grub par 'gyur/ /yan lag med pa'i dkyil 'khor dbus/ /dbang po'i brag phug 'gram du ni/ /rdo rje rkang 'og rnal 'byor gyis/ /lha yi bu mor rab bsgrub bya/ /o D+yan

yul du nye ba na/ /a mra 'bras chen po yi ni/ /rdo rje gnod mdzes sbyor ba yis/ /rkang 'og rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che/ /yang nas yang du bskul bar bya/ /de nyid dngos grub
thams cad kyi/ /yid bzhin nor bu lta bur mtshungs/ /rdo rje gnod mdzes sku chen po/ /phyag gnyis zhal ni gcig pa can/ /sdigs 'dzub klu yi zhags pa dang / /kha dog nag por bsgom par bya/ /rdo rje hU~M

mdzad blangs nas ni/ /rnam pa thams cad bsgom par bya/ /mi bskyod pa yi yang dag mnan/ /phuHzhes bya ba'i sngags brjod do/ /rab tu byug pa dang mig sman rdo rje sa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de nas de
bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung thos nas/ dga' zhing mgu ba skyes par gyur te tshig 'di skad smras so/ /e ma'o rdo rje e rdo rje/ /e ma rdo rje'i bsten pa ni/ /chos rnams thams

cad stong pa la/ /gang phyir dngos grub rab gnas pa/ /snying po med pa'i chu shing la/ /ji ltar snying po'i 'bras zhim pa/ /de ltar snying po med lus la/ /dngos grub 'bras zhim de bzhin no/ /nam mkha' 'byung po
thams cad dang / /chos rnams kun gyi gnas yin te/ /sems ni nam mkha' lta bur dag /dag pa'i sems ni mchog tu bde/ /don dam dbang po'i rang bzhin gyis/ /sems las phyi rol gyur pa med/ /gzugs
sogs so sor 'dod pa yis/ /sems nyid du ni 'dod par bya/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ji ltar sems stong la/
sems las phyi rol gyi don sems mi stong pa rab tu 'byung zhes bgyi/ de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal pa/ /thog med srid pa'i bag chags kyis/ /phyi rol don ni rnam par brtags/ /sems kyis thams

cad rnam par brtags/ /sems ni kun tu 'gro bar brjod/ /byang chub sems rab tu 'byung ba bstan pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /shin tu bzhin mdzes mig yangs ma/ /si h+la ga bur 'byung ba'i gnas/ /

pang du bzhag par byas nas ni/ /skra nas bzung bar yang dag brtsam/ /rdo rje 'o yis 'o byas shing / /rdo rje nyed pas mnye bar bya/ /rdo rje 'khyud pas yang dag blang / /rdo rje ma mchu rab btsir bya/ /rdo rje 'dzub mo'i sbyor ba yis/ /

rdo rje gnas ni rab bskul bya/ /rdo rje sems ni phyung ba yis/ /rdo rje lce'i yang dag bza'/ /phyin nas de'i bde can du/ /rdo rje sems dpa' gzhug par bya/ /rdo rje 'chi ba'i sbyor ba yis/ /rdo rje mchod pa yang dag

brtsam/ /rdo rje sems dpa' 'byung ba la/ /sems ni brtul zhugs can gyi dbrog /pad+ma me tog ldan pa yi/ /pad+ma dmar pos mchod par bya/ /pad+mas mnyes pa'i rdo rje can/ /pad+ma dmar pos khyad par du'o/ /

dri lnga'i rab tu sbyor ba yis/ /rgyal mtshan ga bur mchod pa ni/ /'di ni brtson 'grus bde chen dang / /stobs dang rgyas par 'gyur ba dang / /mthong ba nyid kyis bskul ba yis/ /'jig rten 'di ni dbang du byed/ /gang
gis dkon mchog gsum bsad dang / /gang gis sems can bsad byas dang / /gang gis slob dpon smod pa dang / /sangs rgyas lam la 'phya ba rnams/ /lcags kyu yis ni yang dag dgug /lcags sgrog gis ni
rkang pa bcing / /zhags pas mgrin pa dam par bcing / /rdo rje bdag gis dgug par bya/ /mkha' 'gro sangs rgyas bsams nas ni/ /de rnams dbang por gsol bar bya/ /'dis ni sangs rgyas dpa' bo dang / /

rdo rje sems dpa' bkrongs pa ste/ /'di de sdig pa chen po can/ /mnar med 'gro ba'i bdag nyid de/ /'di ni dmyal ba chen por ltung / /de ltar bsams nas gsad par bya/ /rdo rje'i gzugs ni bsams nas su/ /nam mkha'i
dbyings ni bsgom par bya/ /rdo rje dbyug pas brdungs byas nas/ /rdo rje can gyi gnas su skye/ /lcags kyu la sogs mi nus na/ /zan gyis kyang ni 'du bya zhing / /de nyid kyis ni gzugs bsams nas/ /rdo

rje dkyil 'khor nyid du gzhag /Tak+ki'i rgyal po lcags kyu ste/ /dbyug sngon can la rang gi ming / /stobs kyi rgyal po rtse gsum pa/ rnam par rtog pa chen po gsod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de nas rdo rje
'dzin rgyal na/ /thams cad dbugs dbyung rab gsol bas/ /dam tshig rdo rje srung don du/ /sbas pa'i spyod yul 'di gsungs pa/ /rdo rje khro bo'i skyes bu che/ /thams cad zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ /

snying gar g.yon pa'i khu tshur 'dzug /g.yas na rang gi mtshon cha 'phyar/ /gshen rje gsod pa'i dbyug to can/ /gzhan gyis mi thub rdo rje dbyug /rta mgrin la ni dbang mchog dmar/ /mi phyed bdud rtsi'i thabs sbyor las/ /

Tak+ki'i rgyal po lcags kyu ste/ /dbyug sngon can la rang gi ming / /stobs kyi rgyal po rtse gsum pa/ /mi g.yo yi ge'i dkyil 'khor rtse/ /tsha skyabs dkar po rgyal po la/ /chos kyi 'khor lo rnam par bsgom/ /gtun shing

rdo rje rkang 'og la/ /zhabs g.yon brkyang bas gnas pa'o/ /dbang po sngon po'i rnam pa ltar/ /mthar byed rnam par bsgom par bya/ /gzhan gyis mi thub rdo rje ni/ /'jigs byed zla ba'i nor bu 'dra/ /pad+ma'i khro bo dmar

po che/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi'i bdag nyid nag /mtshams kyi khro bo cher nag cing / /spyi bor rdo rje 'dzin pa mtshan/ /gshen rje rnam snang nyid kyis te/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dbyug pa can/ /pad+ma'i khro bo rnam gzigs rjes/ /rdo rje sems

dpa' thabs sbyor la/ /rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /rdo rje nyi ma bsgom par bya/ /'og tu pad+ma'i gdan bsams nas/ /khro bo bcu rnams rab bsgom bya/ /ye shes rdo rje rang dngos su/ /bcu phyed dkyil 'khor

bdag nyid de/ /bdud rnams zhabs kyi 'og bsams nas/ /dkyil 'khor lnga po bsgom par bya/ /bsrung ba'i 'khor lo gzi brjid che/ /bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar ba ste/ /'khor zhing rab tu mi g.yo bar/ /dpag tshad lnga brgya'i
tshad tsam mo/ /bsrung ba'i dam tshig stobs kyis rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das chen po/ /rang gis byin brlabs rim gnas te/ /rang gis
byin brlabs rnal 'byor gyis/ /de nyid las ni bshad par bya/ /snying gi dbus su zla bar 'gyur/ /gzugs brnyan zla bar ma bcos pa/ /sna tshogs 'od kyis yang dag khyab/ /de las rdo rje bsgom par bya/ /

rdo rje bdag med mkha' 'gro ma/ /cho gas bskul bas bsgom par bya/ /mkha' 'gro sna yi mthar gnas pa/ /yungs kar tsam du rnam par bsgom/ /yungs kar la ni 'gro ba kun/ /khams gsum rgyu dang mi rgyu ba/ /

de ltar sgom par byed pa yi/ /rang gi byin brlabs rab tu 'grub/ /gzugs sgra de bzhin dri dang ni/ /ro dang reg bya mngon 'dod pa/ /der ni rnal 'byor nyid kyis ni/ /mi 'dzin de phyir bdag gzhan med/ /ji ltar rdor pad las

byung ba/ /zhi ba'i bde ba'i rnam par 'dod/ /dba' rlabs med cing snang ba med/ /rnam rtog med cing yi ger med/ /myos byed cung zad rab 'thungs pa'i/ /bdag gis bdag nyid mi rig go/ /dga' bral dga' ba dag gi

mthar/ /rtog pa'i dra ba rnam par spangs/ /'gyur med 'khrul pa la 'das shing / /kye yi rdo rje rnam par gsal/ /bems min rnam pa he ru ka / rnam pa rnams kyis yongs su bskor/ /rang nyid mgon po he ru ka / de yis

bdag nyid mi rig cing / /de yi dus na thams cad rig /'byung po 'gro dang 'ong ba ni/ /rang gis kun mkhyen lta bur gzigs/ /sangs rgyas sangs rgyas sras po dang / /yan lag kun dang bu ga kun/ /mgo bo dra ba'i skud par

bcas/ /lus ni yod min ltar gzigs shing / /skad cig kye'i rdo rje'i gzugs 'dzin/ /ji ltar nam mkha' mi dmigs shing / /mtshan ma med cing ma byung dang / /gos pa med cing 'khrul pa med/ /sgrib pa lnga ni rnam par

spangs/ /ji ltar me long gzugs brnyan ni/ /rtogs nas bde ba rnam spangs pa/ /de bzhin bdag nyid he ru ka'i/ /rnam pa lta bur gsal bar mthong / /de nyid don dang dbang po dang / /phung po namakha' lta bur yod/ /lus ni

bde ba nyid brjod cing / /'du byed rnams kyis zil mi gnon/ /gzugs ni mig gis mi 'dzin te/ /sgra ni thos pa po yis min/ /lce yis ro ni mi tshor te/ /dri ni sna yis kyang ma yin/ /reg bya lus kyi gong bus min/ /'on kyang

bde chen tshul las ni/ /bud med bzang mo mthong bas bde/ /rna bas glu yi bde bas bzang / /snom pas dri'i bde ba che/ /skye gnas reg pa'i bde chen dang / /ro yi btung ba'i sbyor ba las/ /gang gis bde ba 'gog par

byed/ /bde ba chen pos 'gro ba khyab/ /bde ba ma gtogs mi shes so/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' la/ /mkha' 'gro ma dang btsun mo bzang / /sangs rgyas lnga dang du ma ni/ /bde bar phyin cing rnam par sad/ /

de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyi bde ba chen po'i tshig thos nas tshig 'di skad smras pa/ phal pa'i rnam par gzhom pa'i phyir/ /bsgom pa yang dag rab tu grags/ /phal pa'i gnas

skabs gzhom pa'i phyir/ /bsgom pa yang ni sgom pa min/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rtogs pa de bzhin te/ 'on kyang mi gtsang ba'i tshad mnyam par sbyang ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs bsgom par bya'o/ /
phyag na rdo rjes gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das lus can bsgom pa'i thabs kyi dgos pa nyid de ci lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba'i bdag po dgos pa yod do/ /bcom ldan 'das ming ci lags/

rdo rje 'dzin pas bka' stsal pa/ sangs rgyas nyid do/ /sangs rgyas nyid ci lags/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /de ci lags/ lus can 'di ni bden pa'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ rdo rje 'dzin pas bka'

stsal pa/ 'di ltar nga ni mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis dang ldan zhing dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcus brgyan pa'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ mi 'dra ba'i phyir bsgrub pa yin no/ /phyag na rdo rjes gsol pa/ ci bcom ldan 'das
bems po lags sam/ rdo rje 'dzin pas bka' stsal pa/ nga nyid me long lta bu'i ye shes so/ /me long lta bu'i ye shes de ci lags/ rdo rje 'dzin pas bka' stsal pa/ bden pa ma yin pa dang / brdzun pa

ma yin pa dang / rgyu ma yin pa dang / skye ba ma yin pa ste/ de ltar nga nyid mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / nga nyid so sor rtog pa'i ye shes dang / nga nyid bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes dang / de ltar chos kyi dbyings shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/ /

de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnam pa dang bral ba'i byang chub de skad ma smra shig /nga nyid dngos dang dngos med dang / /dang po'i de bzhin gshegs par brjod/ /gzugs dang gzugs med ldan pa'i mchog /zab mo

zhi ba'i chos dang ldan/ /sems dpa' chen po he ru ka /bdag med lhan cig mnyam sbyor nga / /bde chen las ni bems min nga / /'jig rten kun rdzob bems po nga / /skyes pa bud med ma ning dang / /'gro ba nga yis yang

dag khyab/ /de phyir 'dus pa zhes bya nyid/ /rgyal ba rgya mtsho bdag gis bshad/ /rdo rje can dang byang sems rnams/ /ma ning gnas su yang dag 'grub/ /gang zhig lha mo bdag med de/ /rang bzhin gyi ni btsun mo min/ /

sangs rgyas he ru ka nga yin/ /de nyid phyir na ma ning ste/ /'gro ba'i dngos po gnyis mthong nas/ /thabs dang shes rab bdag nyid dang / /shin du mnyam sbyor rnal 'byor gyis/ /mi skyod med cing bdag mnga' med/ /dam pa'i rang bzhin bde

ba chen po'i gnas rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dpa' bo chen po rdo rje 'dod pa bde ba chen po rdo rje yan lag med pa shin du dga' ba chen pos tshig 'di dag bka' stsal pa/ phyag drug pa dang sgeg par bcas/ /

zhal gcig ral pa 'dzin pa dang / /brgyad gnyis lo lon sor mo ni/ /rdo rje yan lag med pa 'grub/ /dpa' bo'i g.yas par mda' nyid de/ /lag pa gnyis par ral gri nyid/ /gsum par me long rig par bya/ /lag pa g.yon

par gzhu nyid de/ /gnyis pa la ni dbang mchog nyid/ /ka~M ke l+la yi yal ga ste/ /phyag drug nyid du bsgom par bya/ /zhabs g.yon brkyang pas gnas par ni/ /bu mo'i snying gar bsams nas ni/ /rdo rje btsub mo 'grub par 'gyur/ /

mda'i yis 'o ma 'dzin pa 'bigs/ /a sho ka yis snying gar brab/ /ral gris skyes ma bsdig par bya/ /de nas me long bstan par bya/ /gzhu yis rkang pa bcings nas ni/ /ut+pal zhags pas dgug par bya/ /skra grol 'ong bar 'dod

pa dang / /snyan pa'i skad ni rab tu smra/ /ha dang si ni byed pa mo/ /dngas shing yan lag tshes mas brgyan/ /kha ni so rtsis gang ba dang / /'dod pa stobs dang bral ba bsam/ /rdo rje mchod pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /mi 'gyur sems kyis rjes chags

bya/ /'dod pa'i sngags ni ma bcos pas/ /de yi snying ni bskul bar bya/ /oM a mu kA mA kar Sha ya many+dzu g+ho Sha hrIHdzaH de ltar bsgom par byas pa yis/ /'jam pa'i mgon po'i btsun mo ni/ /bsgrub pa po la 'dod pa dang / /dbang

du byed cing 'ong bar 'gyur/ /zla ba phyed kyi sbyor ba yis/ /bzlas pa khri'i sbyor ba las/ /g.yo ba gser gyi rna cha ma/ /shin tu dga' ba'i sems kyis bsgrub/ /ha~M gi sa bon las skyes pa/ /thams cad rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan/ /

chang gi btung ba'i rab sbyor bas/ /rdo rje yan lag med pa bsgrub/ /ma bcos mchog gi sa bon ni/ /bde dang sdug bsngal rang bzhin can/ /bde ba chen po mchog tu zhi/ /sems can thams cad dga' bar byed/ /'di ni srog ni chen

po ste/ /mchog tu dga' ba mdzes ma nyid/ /bde dang sdug bsngal rtag tu de'i/ /dran pa de ltar rab tu grags/ /mya ngan 'dod chags de bzhin gdungs/ /dga' dang dga' bral de bzhin no/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che/ /de nyid

dbyangs yig drug par brjod/ /zla ba phyed pas yang dag ldan/ /thig les mgo bo nyid du mchod/ /sems can gyi ni kun gzhi ste/ /rgyud rnams kyi ni khyad par du'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub kyi sems chen po'i rdo rje sa bon gyi yi ge thos nas sems bsgrub pa gsal ba nye bar gyur nas tshig 'di dag gsungs pa/ sems dpa' med cing sgom pa med/ /sngags

med lha yang med pa ste/ /sems kyi rdo rje las byung ba/ /'di ni byang chub rim bstan pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dam tsh-ig gis de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /bsod nams med cing sdig pa'ang med/ /byang chub med cing sangs rgyas

med/ /ye shes lnga ni sbyor ba yis/ /byang chub sems ni brtan pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'khor lo'i dam tshig gis de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /sngags med bzlas pa'ang yod ma yin/ /'gro ba gsum po thams cad med/ /

chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyis/ /bsgom pa dang ni bsgom pa med/ /bcom ldan 'das rin po che'i dam tshig gis de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kun rdzob 'jig rten pa yang yod/ /dpyad na gang du 'jig rten pa/ /rtag tu

'jig rten pa nyid 'khor/ /'di ni byang chub rim brtan pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das pad+ma'i dam tshig gis de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /ma skyes pa dang mi dmigs pa/ /mi phyed nam mkha' lta bu ste/ /zab cing zhi ba'i rang

bzhin ni/ /'di ni byang chub rim bstan pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das ral gri'i dam tshig gis de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /sgyu ma ji ltar me long ltar/ /nam mkha' ji ltar bde ji ltar/ /ji ltar dngos po yongs shes pa/ /'di ni byang

chub rim bstan pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das mkha' 'gro ma bdag med mas de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /stong nyid dri med dam pa'i gnas/ /rmi lam sgyu ma'i rang bzhin nyid/ /ji srid ma zhig bar du ni/ /sems kyi rang bzhin

bsgom par gyis/ /mA ma kI'o/ /srid med mya ngan 'das pa med/ /'di de bde chen rdo rje ste/ /gang zhig yid kyi bsgom pas bsgom/ /de ni mchog gi bsgom pas bsgom/ /spyan gyi'o/ /sngags dang yi ge rnam par spangs/ /'di ni

sems med thig le med/ /'di de dam pa'i bde chen te/ /bri ba med cing gang ba med/ /gos dkar mo'i'o/ /gzugs brnyan rang bzhin ji lta bar/ /de ltar dngos po bsgom par bya/ /stong nyid dri med mchog gi gnas/ /de ni bsod nams

sdigs pa med/ /sgrol ma'i'o/ /ji ltar chu nang zla ba de/ /bden min brdzun pa min pa ltar/ /de ltar dkyil 'khor 'khor lo yi/ /lus kyi rang bzhin rnyog pa med/ /'khor thams cad kyis de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /de nas bcom

ldan 'das sna tshogs byed pa rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ mda' gzhu char 'di nyid kyis sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /muHts+tsha Di dang ser rna yis/ /chang gzungs khu tshur bzung

ba yis/ /g.yon ni 'dod pa'i khu tshur gyis/ /bsdams pas dgra rnams bsdigs par bya/ /yan lag kos kor bzung nas ni/ /mtshon pa'i khu tshur bzung nas ni/ /hU~M gis mda' ni gtang bya zhing / /bdud kyi dkyil 'khor

bsdigs par bya/ /brla ni bskum par byas na ni/ /lus ni dbugs kyis dgang bar bya/ /lus la khu tshur bzung nas ni/ /brang ni rgyas pa nyid du bya/ /sems dang dmigs ni 'ben la bya/ /hU~M gis kha ni dgang ba dang / /g.yas

brkyang la sogs sbyor ba yis/ /gshen rje srin po gsad par bya/ /'dir mang brjod pas ci zhig bya/ /kun rdzob tu ni bsdus pa tsam/ /gzhu yi rig byed rtsa ba gang / /de ni rdo rje 'dzin spyod do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje

rol mo'i sgra zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rol mo'i sgra'i sgeg pa 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las byung ngo / /tha hiM thaM hiM/ tha ka tha ka / thu ka thu ka / tho ho tho ho/ ba hi ba hi/ di D+haM di D+haM/ kra ka

kra ka / tha ka tha ka / Di hi Di hi/ ta Da wa ta Da wa/ cha lang dang ni rnga dang yang / /rdza rnga kha cig pi wang rgyas/ /mngar ba can dang gling bu dang / /rgyud gsum ka ra ta ka ni/ /rnam gsum brdung bas brdung bar bya/ /chung ngur brdungs pas rgyal ba

ste/ /dkyil 'khor gsol gdab la sogs pa/ /mchod pa 'di ni bla na med/ /rang gi tshigs bcad mang po ni/ /bstan pa 'dis ni ci zhig bya/ /ji snyed rol mo'i bstan bcos su/ /de ni rdo rje rol mo'i sgra/ /de nas bcom

ldan 'das dri bzang po'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ bdug spos kyi mchod pa 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /tsan dan nyid dang gur gum dang / /brag zhun de bzhin 'dod ma ni/ /

'di rnams rdzas ni bdug spos che/ /he ru ka la rab tu dbul/ /ka tso ra dang rkun ma nyid/ /de bzhin du yang skra sgra nyid/ /gdug byed snying po 'di rnams ni/ /phan pa la ni sbyar bar bya/ /kun tu ru dang bo la ka /ri dgas lte ba sen mo

ni/ /rin chen rgyal po'i bdug pa 'di/ /kun la mi 'jigs gur gum dang / /shi trA yi ni sha thI dang / /sha li dzi dang shi la ka / 'jig rten mgon gyi bdug pa 'di/ /rtag tu rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs/ /sna tshogs dri ni khyad par du/ /

sna tshogs rdo rje mchod pa las/ /bdun gyi rgyal po mchod pa 'di/ /kun tu stobs kyis bsgrubs pa ste/ /ji snyed dri yi bstan bcos su/ /gong bu'i dum bu'i bdug pa mchog /de kun phyag na rdo rje yi/ /rdo rje'i

mchod par rab tu grags/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gom pa rnam par dgod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rdo rje gar 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /gus bcas dang

por sgeg par ldan/ /dang po brtse bcas rjes rgyu bas/ /rkang stabs brgyad du cho ga yis/ /rdo rje gom pas rol pa bya/ /me tog snyim pa'i sbyor ba dang / /spos kyi yal ga'i sbyor ba dang / /mar me sdong bu'i lag tshul dang / /yang

ni byug pa'i lus dang ni/ /mig lag de bzhin brla nang dang / /rkang pa'i ngos su bskor ba ni/ /brdung ba'i sbyor bas rol pa bya/ /de bzhin du yang g.yon pas so/ /de nas rgyun gyi gar byas nas/ /g.yon pas yang ni gar

bya zhing / /myur du brdungs pas de bzhin gang / /byas nas 'khor lo lta bur bskor/ /phyi nas gru bzhi gang bar bya/ /phyi nas 'dod pa'i lag pas bskor/ /sa la pus ni gnyis btsugs nas/ /lag pas mchod rten legs

par bya/ /ji snyed gar gyi bstan bcos su/ /byed pa'i cha lugs brjod pa ni/ /de snyed rdo rje sems dpa' yi/ /sgeg pas byang chub sgrub pa'i thabs/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dam tshig rdo rje mnyes par byed pa zhes

bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ tshogs kyi 'khor lo 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsungs dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /rang gi lhag pa'i lhar dmigs nas/ /bzang po'i rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan/ /thams cad
'byor pa'am dmigs nas ni/ /bems po'i gnas su bsregs par bya/ /shar lho byang dang nub phyogs su/ /phyogs gnas rnams ni dga' bar bya/ /phyogs bral rnams su lha mo rnams/ /dam pa'i tshe yis
mchod par bya/ /yid kyis mar khu bsams pa dang / /'bras so chags med 'bras dang ni/ /'bru dang zho yi zan dang ni/ /til dang de bzhin mnyam pa'i shing / /dUr ba rab tu gzhon pa nyid/ /bsam gtan

rdo rje sbyin bsreg bya/ /de la 'di ni sngags kyi rkang pa yin te/ oM ag na ye swA hA/ mar gyi'o/ /oM sar+b+ba pA pa pa da ha na badzrA ya badzra sa twa s+ya sar+b+ba pA paM da ha nA ya swA hA/ til nag po'i'o/ /oM badzra puSh+Ta ye swA hA/

'bras ma chags pa'i'o/ /oM sar+b+ba saM pa de swA hA/ zho dang zan dam pa'i'o/ /oM badzra bi dzA ya swA hA/ 'bras so ba'i'o/ /oM ma hA be gA ya swA hA/ nas kyi'o/ /oM ma hA ba lA ya swA hA/ mo sran gre'u 'i'o/ /oM badzra g+hasma rI swA hA/

gro'i'o/ /oM badzra A yu She swA hA/ dur ba gzhon nu'i'o/ /oM badzrA pra ti ha ta badzrA ya swA hA/ ku sha'i 'o/ /oM badzra ya dz+nyA ya swA hA/ u dum bA ra'i'o/ /oM bo d+hi br-i k+ShA ya swA hA/ byang chub kyi shing gi'o/ /oM badzra la tA ya swA hA/

pA ma k+sha'i'o/ /oM badzra ku be rA swA hA/ n+ya gro d+ha'i'o/ /oM ha sa kA ra ya swA hA/ a mra'i'o/ /tsam pa a sho ka ya klu/ /ka dam pa dang srid sgrub nyid/ /ji ltar rnyed pa bzlas byas nas/ /me tog 'dis ni sbyin bsreg bya/ /

rgun 'brum a mra sbrul 'jig dang / /kha 'dzag skyes ma brtse ma ni/ /'khor lo lnga yi mchog rim pas/ /'bras bu rnams kyi sbyin bsreg bya/ /sha lnga dang ni bdud rtsi nyid/ /dkyil 'khor lnga yi bsgoms pa yis/ /'dis

ni rdo rje mnyes par 'gyur/ /ye shes me ni rab dgyes bya/ /rgyal ba phan pa mnyes pa dang / /gser gyi mnga' bdag mnyes pa dang / /pad ma gar dbang mnyes pa dang / /lcags sgrog bdag po mnyes pa dang / /tshangs

pa brgya byin dbang chen dang / /khyab 'jug rlung dang me chen dang / /thong ldan nyid dang 'dod lha dang / /zla ba nyi ma gdon gzhan dang / /sa ni zhags pa 'dzin pa dang / /lus ngan de bzhin mtshams skyong dang / /chos rgyal dang

ni klu dang ni/ /dri za lha min mi 'am ci/ /sum bcu rtsa gsum gnas pa'i lha/ /'og min du ni gnas pa dang / /gang zhig rgyal chen gnas pa dang / /gzhan 'phrul dbang bsgyur nyid dang ni/ /'phrul dga' yi ni lha rnams dang / /
gang zhig dag pa'i gnas son dang / /'od zer 'jig rten khams gnas dang / /mi mjed khams su gnas pa dang / /gling bzhir gnas pa'i sems can dang / /gang zhig khams gsum gnas pa dang / /snod sngan

sems can 'jig rten dang / /lcug ma'i tshogs dang rtswa sogs dang / /gang zhig rab dga'i sar gnas dang / /pha rol dri med gang phyin dang / /'od 'phro can du gnas pa dang / /mi g.yo'i gnas su byas pa dang / /gang

zhig chos sprin rjes song dang / /gang zhig sbyang dka' son pa dang / /gang zhig ring song thob ba dang / /'od byed du ni gnas pa ste/ /sa bcu'i dbang phyug mgon po dang / /'phags pa'i gang zag brgyad po dang / /rdzogs sangs rgyas

dang nyan thos nyan/ /rwa ni ral gri'i gzugs can dang / /rang gi lhag pa'i lhar sbyor bdag /shAkya seng ge mnyes byas nas/ /dmyal ba yi dags byol song dang / /lha dang lha min mi rnams ni/ /sbyin bsreg chogs ni dgyis

pa nyid/ /de nyid tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor ro/ /bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi tshogs chen po rgya mtshor rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rjes su chags pa rdo rje zhes

bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ dam tshig la gsol ba gdab pa gsungs so/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bskyed pa ni/ /rdo rje pad+ma'i bsgom pa ste/ /de yi mgo bo'i sna rtse la/ /phyag 'tshal yid bzhin nor bu

ste/ /sbu gu'i nang du phaT kyis ni/ /ye shes ma lhung yang dag gnas/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis dgyes par mdzod/ /'di ni phyag rgya'i cho ga las/ /rang gi lhag pa'i lhar sbyor bas/ /rdo rje sems dpa' snyems
byas nas/ /gnas ni thams cad bsgrub par bya/ /phyag rgya chen po'i gnas 'dug nas/ /rang gi lhag pa'i lhar sbyor bdag /shAkya seng ge snyems byas nas/ /rgyal po thams cad thob par 'gyur/ /las

kyi phyag rgya'i gnas 'dug nas/ /rang gi lhag pa'i lhar sbyor bdag /kun gyi rgyal po thob par 'gyur/ /rdo rje gzi brjid ldan ting 'dzin ldan/ /dam tshig phyag rgya sbyor ba yis/ /gnas gsum po yang bsgrub

par bya/ /rang gi lhag pa'i lhar sbyor bas/ /pad ma gar gyi dbang phyug bdag /chos kyi phyag rgya'i ting 'dzin gnas/ /rdo rje chos ni bsgom par bya/ /rang gi lhag pa'i lhar sbyor bas/ /rta mchog rim pas

gnas nas ni/ /dam tshig phyag rgyar sbyor ba yis/ /sgrol ma'i dngos grub rab bsgrub bya/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gar 'dod pa byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rdo rje

gar mdzad pa nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /g.yon pa brkyang ba dang / g.yas pa brkyang ba dang / mnyam pa'i rkang stabs dang / rdo rje'i rkang stabs dang / dkyil 'khor dang / sna tshogs

thams cad dang / rus sbal gyi rkang stabs dang / bung ba'i dra ba dang / rgya mtsho'i bskyod pa dang / ri bo'i mchog dang mdzes pa'i gom pa dang khro bo'i gom pa ste/ rkang stabs kyi dgod pa'o/ /ral gri'i lugs dang /

'khor lo'i tshul dang / rin po che'i tshul dang / pad ma'i lag pa dang / ral gri'i tshul dang / mdung gi tshul dang gzhu'i tshul dang / dbyug pa'i tshul dang / dbyug to'i tshul dang / gtun shing gi tshul dang / rdo rje rtse

gcig pa'i sems dang kha bcu pa'i tshul dang ral gri bu mo'-i tshul dang / sna tshogs dbyug pa'i tshul dang / mdung thung gi tshul dang gong bu skyong ba'i tshul dang 'phan gnyis pa dang / 'phan lce gsum pa dang / me tog gi tshul dang bdug

spos kyi tshul dang / mar me'i tshul dang / dri'i tshul dang / lA s+yai'i lags pa dang phreng ba'i lag pa dang glu'i lag pa dang / gar gyi lag pa dang gling bu'i lag pa dang pi wang gi lag pa dang / rdza rnga'i lag pa dang / ku mu Na Da'i

lag pa ste/ lag pa'i dgod pa'o/ /rdo rje skyil dkrung dang / pad+ma'i skyil dkrung dang pad+ma'i 'dug stangs dang bzang po'i 'dug stangs dang / skyil dkrung phyed pa dang / bkra shis kyi 'dug stangs kyi dgod pa'o/ /sgeg

pa'i nga ro dang dpa' bo'i nga ro dang / mi sdug pa'i nga ro dang / dgod pa'i nga ro dang drag po'i nga ro dang 'jigs su rung ba'i nga ro dang / zhi ba'i nga ro dang rngam pa'i nga ro dang snying rje'i nga ro dang / drug gi rjes su skyes pa'i glu dang drang

srong gi rjes kyi glu dang / dri za'i rjes kyi glu dang bar ma'i rjes kyi glu dang / lnga pa'i rjes kyi glu dang / blo gsal gyi rjes kyi glu dang / 'khor nyan pa'i glu'o/ /nyung ngu'i dbye ba dang sgrol ma'i dbye ba dang / 'jigs pa'i dbye ba dang gang ba dang / phyed

phyi ba dang / rnam par 'dre ba dang / 'dod chags gnyis mtshungs par byed pa dang / 'dod chags gsum mtshungs par byed pa dang / lkog ma nyed pa dang / rkan nyed pa dang lce nyed pa dang so nyed pa ste glu dgod pa'o/ /sa gzhi yongasu

bzung dus su ni/ /dam tshig 'di ni rab bskul ba/ /ye shes rdo rje can gyis bya/ /'di ni dam tshig rim pa'i mchog /me tog 'di rnams bzang zhing dge/ /dag pa'i skye gnas las dag pa/ /bdag gis dad pas 'bul lags
kyis/ /bzhes nas bdag la dgyes par mdzod/ /tshal dag ro yi phan pa dang / /gang zhig dri dang bdug spos mchog /bdag gis dad pas 'bul lags kyis/ /bzhes nas bdag la dgyes par mdzod/ /
srin po 'joms shing dag byed pa/ /dge zhing mun pa rnam sel ba/ /bdag gis dad pas 'bul lags kyis/ /bzhes nas bdag la dgyes par mdzod/ /'di ni dri bzang dge ba ste/ /dag pa'i skye gnas las dag
pa/ /bdag gis dad pas 'bul lags kyis/ /bzhes nas bdag la dgyes par mdzod/ /oM badzra g+haN+De aH dril bu blang ba'i sngags so/ /oM ma hA badzre hU~M/ rdo rje bzung ba'i sngags so/ /dngos po
sna tshogs rnam par phye ba'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// // de nas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po/ /rnal 'byor ma yi rdo rje gur/ /sangs rgyas kun dang sangs rgyas la/ /tshig ni

'di dag bka' stsal pa/ /phyag gnyis pa la zhal gcig pa/ /rdo rje las skyes rang bzhin can/ /lag par thod pa kha T+wA~M gaH /bsam nas spro zhing bzlas pa'o/ /phyag bzhi pa ni nyid dang yang / /zhal gsum rdo rje

las byung ba/ /dkar po dmar po de bzhin sngo/ /phag mo lhan cig mnyam sbyor ba'o/ /phyag drug pa la kha dog gnag /lcags sgrogs ma dang lhan cig sbyor/ /sangs rgyas lnga yi thod pa can/ /zhal gsum nyid
du sbyor bar bya/ /mdog dmar phyag ni bzhi pa dang / /zhal gcig ma dang dbang byed ma/ /rdo rje chos kyi gnas mnan ma/ /'di ni ku ru kul+ler brjod/ /'di ni sngags brjod pa'o/ /btsun mo chos la gnas
pa ni/ /khyod kyi spyan sngar bdag gis ni/ /dus gcig pa'i dus su ni/ /bdag nyid kyis ni 'di thos nas/ /rgyas pa nyid du rab tu dbye/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa ste/ /dus gcig dus ni gcig na'o/ /bdag

gis bcom ldan spyan sngar te/ /btsun mo'i chos su rnam rgyas pas/ /lta stangs dgug dang brda chen dang / /don byed dus dang char sogs dang / /lam gyi de nyid las skyes pa/ /thub pa chen po 'jig rten mgon/ /

phyag gnyis pa la zhal gcig pa/ /mchog sbyin dang ni pad mas brgyan/ /pad ma'i gdan la yang dag gnas/ /dbu rgyan rdo rje chos dang ldan/ /ma~M gyi de nyid las skyes pa/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs ni ser po ste/ /

yan lag mchog sbyin ud pal brgyan/ /mi bskyod rdo rje spyi bor 'dzin/ /hU~M gi ye shes las byung ba/ /lag pa ral gri sdigs 'dzub nyid/ /ma he chen po'i rgyab tu ni/ /dpa' bo g.yon brkyang ba yis gnas/ /

khro bo'i gzugs can 'jigs byed pa/ /kha sbyar mdun du mi bskyod 'dzin/ /hU~M gi ye shes las byung ba/ /rdo rje hU~M mdzad rdo rje can/ /rdo rje dril bu'i sbyor ba yis/ /lag pa gnyis kyis phyag rgya bcing / /rkang pa

g.yon nyid brkyang ba yis/ /'jigs byed mnan pa yi ni lus/ /spyi bor rdo rje'i rigs bsams nas/ /'jig rten gsum rgyal dran par bya/ /tA~M gi yi ge las byung ba/ /mchog sbyin dbang mchog mtshon cha ste/ /

lha mo ljang gu lta bu nyid/ /rtag tu bzang po'i 'dug stangs gnas/ /sna tshogs pad+mar yang dag bzhugs/ /spyi bor don yod 'dzin pa po/ /sgeg mo chen mo skal bzang ma/ /sgrol ma'i gzugs can bsgom par bya/ /

ma~M gyi yi ge las byung ba/ /mchog sbyin a she ka 'dzin ma/ /nyi ma shar ba lta bu ste/ /rnam snang dpal ni spyi bor skyes/ /g.yon brkyang ba yi sbyor ba yis/ /'gro mgyogs bdun gyi shing rta mnan/ /yan lag sgeg pa'i ro y-is

brgyan/ /'od zer can ni bsgom par bya/ /tsu~M gi yi ge las byung ba'i/ /ston ka'i zla ba lta bu'i 'od/ /snying gar rin chen snyim par gnas/ /mdzes pa'i tshul gyis yang dag bzhugs/ /lha mo sna tshogs pad gdan can/ /

phan pas mgo bo mnan pa ste/ /byang chub sems ni 'dzag 'bab pa'i/ /lha mo stobs dang bral ba bsgom/ /ba~M gyi yi ge las byung ba/ /nor 'dzin shin du kha dog ser/ /lag pa mchog sbyin 'bras snye ma/ /rdo rje skyil

dkrung sbyor ba las/ /yan lag rin chen 'byung gnas brgyan/ /spyan ni shin tu sgeg par ni/ /gnod sbyin rgyal mo bsgom par bya/ /nor gyi bdag po mtshungs par 'gyur/ /dza~M gi yi ge las byung ba/ /namakha' mdzod

ces bya ba bsgom/ /kha dog ser zhing g.yas pa na/ /mchog sbyin rin chen ne'u le ste/ /rin chen 'byung gnas rdo rje yis/ /spyi bor dkyil 'khor rnam par brgyan/ /rin chen char ni bsam par bya/ /skyor gang rdo rje chur gzhug bya/ /

pra~M gyi yi ge las skyes pa/ /lus ni dkar zhing yid 'ong ma/ /lha mo ral gri'i 'khor lo 'dzin/ /spyi bor phan pas mnan pa'o/ /rang gi ming po'i dus lta bur/ /dkyil 'khor gnas su yang dag 'dug /namakha'i gnas nas 'jam

pa'i dbyangs/ /'byung bar rnam par bsam par bya/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po sngags sna tshogs nang du chud pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ sngags kyi tshig 'di dag gsal bar mdzad

pa| oM ma Ni pad+me hU~M phaTaHswA hA/ oM many+dzu badzrA ya muHswA hA/ oM hU~MHSh+TIHwi kri tA na na hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/ oM hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM tA re tut+tA re tu re swA hA/ oM mA ri ts+yai ma~M swA hA/ oM tsa le tsu le tsun de swA hA/ oM bA su d+hA re ma hA

bA su brISh+Ti lA ha ni bA su swA hA/ oM dza~M b+ha la dza len drA ya swA hA/ oM ma Ni d+ha ri badzri ni ma hA pra ti sa re hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/ 'jig rten mgon gyis nad rnams zhi/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis blo gros bzang / /

gshen rje gshed kyis yi dags bsrung / /lha dang lha min hU~M mdzad kyis/ /sgrol mas 'jig rten dbang du byed/ /'od zer can gyis chom rkun 'jig /tsun de sems can thams cad ni/ /dgug pa yi ni cho gar brjod/ /dzam+b+ha la

dang nor sbyin bdag /nor gyi sgrub pa'i thabs su 'dod/ /bud med gang zhig bu shi bas/ /so sor 'brang ma rtag dran bya/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gros gsungs pa'o/ /sngags kyi rkang pas thams cad 'grub/ /bzlas pa 'bum gyi sbyor

ba yis/ /las rnams thams cad rab tu 'grub/ /snying gi bde ba bskul ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje nag po chen po'i thabs 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /hU~M gi yi ge

las skyes pa/ /phyag gnyis pa dang zhal gcig ldan/ /kha dog nag cing cher 'bar ba/ /gri gug thod pa 'dzin pa'o/ /mgo bo'i phreng bas do shal byas/ /mche ba chen pos 'jigs par byed/ /gzugs thung gzi brjid chen po

nyid/ /kha nas khrag ni 'jig pa ste/ /slob dpon la rtag gang sdang dang / /gang zhig dkon mchog gsum khro dang / /sems can du ma gsod byed pa/ /nag po chen pos za bar byed/ /rang gi lag g.yas sha gcod byed/ /khrag gi

rgyun ni mthung bar byed/ /de nas spyi bor 'di 'dug nas/ /de ni til tsam gcod par byed/ /mon sran gre dang dza~M bu Ti/ /me tog bdug pa byug pa chang / /sha lnga nyid dang bdud rtsi yis/ /nag po che la gtor ma sbyin/ /sngags ni/

oM ma hA kA la ya shA sa no pa kA ri Ni a pa sh+tsi ma kA lo ya mi da~M tad rat+na tra yA pa ka ri Na ya di pra ti dz+nyA~M sma ra si ta dA i da~M du Sh+Ta kha kha khA hi khA hi mA ra mA ra gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ ha na ha na da ha da ha pa tsa pa tsa di na me me ke na hU~M phaT/ tsha ba

gsum gyis gzugs brnyan ni/ /byas nas lus la tsher mas dgang / /dug dang ske tshe yis bris nas/ /de ni gang gi ming gis ni/ /de nas me la gdung bar bya/ /de yi dus na mi snang 'gyur/ /de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa/ /phyag rgya'i

dngos grub bsgom pa nyid/ /phyag rgya'i dngos grub dngos grub che/ /dngos grub kun gyi spyod yul min/ /de dus de yi lus 'thob cing / /skad cig na ni de 'khor ldan/ /bsgom pa dang ni sngags nyid dang / /skad cig sangs rgyas rnam snang

mdzad/ /spyan gyis 'phrag nas 'khyud pa'o/ /skad cig la ni gnyis med ldan/ /dga' ba chen po mchog tu dga'/ /rdo rje 'dzin rgyal skad cig gis/ /mA ma kI dang bde ba sdom/ /rdo rje pad+ma'i rtse mchod pas/ /skad cig gis ni

gnyis med ldan/ /rdo rje pad+ma rab sbyar bas/ /rdo rje gus pa'i pha rol son/ /rdo rje pad+ma mchod bya zhing / /pad+ma'i 'dod pa spang bar bya/ /bdag nyid rang bdag bsams nas ni/ /rdo rje pad+ma rab sbyor bas/ /rdo rje bu mo cher grags

pa/ /rdo rje nag po lta bu mchod/ /rang rig skyes bu bsams nas ni/ /rdo rje pad+ma'i rtse mchod pas/ /bu mo de bzhin gshegs ma mchog /phyag rgya'i dngos grub don du mchod/ /rang gi rig ma skyes bu bsam/ /rdo rje pad+ma'i

rtse mchod pas/ /gdol pa chen po las byung ba/ /phyag rgya'i dngos grub don du mchod/ /phyag rgya chen po rab bsgrub pa/ /rnam par rgyal ba'i stobs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /nyi ma gcig gis 'grub par 'gyur/ /

nyi ma gnyis kyi cho ga dang / /nyi ma gsum gyi sbyor ba dang / /de bzhin du ni nyi ma bzhi/ /nyi ma lnga pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /me tog la sogs mchod byas nas/ /bsam gtan gnas su 'dug

pa dang / /phyag rgya lhan cig zhugs nas ni/ /rdo rje sbyor ba yang dag brtsam/ /rdo rje nyi ma nub pa na/ /sbyor ba 'di ni yang dag brtsam/ /nyi ma shar ba'i dus su ni/ /'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /'dod chags chen pos rjes

chags pas/ /'dod chags chen po'i rang bzhin las/ /chags chen ting 'dzin gnas nas ni/ /phyag rgya chen po rab bsgrub bya/ /shin tu dga' ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /pad+mar rdo rje can bcug nas rang gi

rig ma bdag mar byas/ /de dang lhan cig 'grub par 'gyur/ /'di ni phyag rgya chen por brjod/ /mi yi phyag rgya blangs nas ni/ /de la 'khor rab tu dbye/ /dri dang me tog 'thun byas nas/ /'khor lo goms par yang dag

brtsam/ /spyan dang bdag ma sgrol ma dang / /dkar mo shin du yid 'phrog ma/ /me tog dri yis 'thun byas nas/ /rdo rje mchod pa yang dag brtsam/ /sngags pas phan pa 'grub 'gyur zhing / /phyag na rdo rje 'grub pa dang / /rdo rje

nyi ma 'grub pa dang / /dam pa'i yi ge 'grub pa dang / /bdun pa'i rgyal po 'grub pa dang / /thams cad 'dren pa 'grub par 'gyur/ /chu yi dbang ni dang po ste/ /cod pan dbang la gnyis pa'o/ /rdo rje dbang gis gsum pa

ste/ /rang gi bdag po bzhi pa nyid/ /ming gi dbang bskur lnga pa ste/ /drug pa rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid/ /bdun pa bum pa dbang gis te/ /gsang ba'i dbang gis brgyad pa'o/ /shes rab dbang las dgu pa ste/ /

de nyid rdo rje'i sbyor ba yis/ /kun gyi de nyid brtul zhugs brjod/ /ston pa rang gis lung bstan te/ /de 'dir dbang gi cho ga'o/ /slob dpon smad par mi bya ste/ /bde gshegs bka' las 'da' mi bya/ /spun la smad pa nyid

mi bya/ /sems can rnams la gdug byams dang / /byang chub sems ni spang mi bya/ /bdag gzhan chos la smad mi bya/ /skal med de nyid gtam mi bya/ /skal ldan sems can smad mi bya/ /bdag gi lus la'ang smad

mi bya/ /chos la yid gnyis mi bya zhing / /gdug la byams pa nyid mi bya/ /chos nyid tshad ni bzung mi bya/ /dam tshig rtag tu skyang ba dang / /gzhan gyi chos la smad mi bya/ /bud med nyid la'ang smad mi bya/ /rtsa ba'i ltung ba rab tu spang

ba mdor bstan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /ji srid byang chub snying po'i bar/ /dkon mchog gsum ni spang mi bya/ /rtag tu dam tshig bsrung bar bya/ /rdo rje dril bu'ang gzung bar bya/ /gtsug tor rtag tu gzung bar

bya/ /rtag tu sbyin bsreg dgang bar bya/ /rtag tu dkyil 'khor bzhengs par bya/ /rtag tu bde gshegs rab gnas bya/ /'byung po che la gtor ma sbyin/ /phyag rgya bcing ba rnam spang zhing / /mchod rten las ni mi bya ste/ /

rdo rje gsum mchog phyag mi bya/ /dkyil 'khor la sogs lus kyi las/ /rmi lam du yang mi bya zhing / /slob dpon gzhan la phyag mi bya/ /bla ma'i rgan rabs phyag 'tshal lo/ /rtag par rgyun du sngags bzla zhing / /

bsam gtan nyid kyang 'bral mi bya/ /rtag tu slob ma bsdu bya zhing / /rtag pa ru ni bshad par gyis/ /rtag tu sems can bskyang bar bya/ /rtag tu sangs rgyas cher mnyes bya/ /dzam b+ha la la chu sbyin zhing / /las

rnams thams cad yang dag spyad/ /bye ma'i mchod rten las la yang / /mkhas pas cho ga bzhin du bya/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang pho nya po thams cad dang de bzhin gshegs pa

thams cad rdo rje nges par brjod pa 'di thos nas tshig 'di dag gsungs pa/ sems can kun gyi thams cad khyod/ /sdig pa thams cad rnam sbyong ba/ /chos rnams thams cad yongasu rtogs/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro phyag
'tshal bstod/ /sdang bas mnan pa'i 'gro gzigs nas/ /gti mug thams cad zad bya'i phyir/ /rgyal ba mgon po rnam snang mdzad/ /gti mug rdo rje phyag 'tshal bstod/ /'gro ba bud med 'dul gzigs nas/ /

bdag med rnal 'byor mar gyur gang / /phyag 'tshal pha rol phyin thub pa/ /sgyu ma'i phyag rgya phyag 'tshal bstod/ /gti mug mnan pa'i 'gro gzigs nas/ /gti mug thams cad zad mdzad pa/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po

che/ /zhe sdang rdo rje phyag 'tshal bstod/ /nga rgyal mnan pa'i 'gro gzigs nas/ /nga rgyal thams cad zad mdzad pa'i/ /rdo rje nyi ma rgyal po che/ /'dod chags rdo rje phyag 'tshal bstod/ /chags pas mnan pa'i 'gro

gzigs nas/ /'dod chags thams cad zad mdzad pa/ /rta mgrin rgyal po chen po ste/ /ser sna rdo rje phyag 'tshal bstod/ /'gro ba phrag dog mnan gzigs nas/ /phrag dog thams cad zad mdzad pa/ /bdun gyi rgyal po
rgyal po che/ /thams cad gzugs la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams

cad dpal kye'i rdo rje'i dbang bskur ba'i slob dpon ji ltar blta bar bgyi/ de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal pa/ /slob dpon ston par 'gyur ba ni/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis phyag mdzad pa/ /bdag cag rnams kyi pha dang

ma/ /'di nyid yid la bsam par bya/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal pa/ /rdo rje sems dpa' sangs rgyas dang / /rdo rje chos dang gzi brjid dang / /bdun gyi rgyal po'i dngos grub rnams/ /gang phyir de yis

dka' ba med/ /mig sman dang ni rkang byug dang / /ral gri rkang 'og bsgrub pa dang / /ril bu dang ni mkha' spyod pa dang / /mi snang ba dang bcud kyis len/ /gang phyir ye shes rdo rje ni/ /mnyes pas myur du thob par 'gyur/ /
de phyir slob dpon drung gshegs te/ /de bzhin gshegs rnams phyag mdzad do/ /rdo rje sems dpa' ji lta ba/ /de ltar slob dpon gzugs 'dzin to/ /sems can rjes su gzung dmigs nas/ /phal pa'i gzugs

su gnas pa'o/ /slob dpon gyis ni mthar dus su/ /shi ba 'jig rten mi gnas pa/ /skyes pa glen zhing rmongs pa gang / /de 'di shi zhes smra bar byed/ /'chi ba zhes bya ba'i rnam rtog gis/ /dag pa'i gnas su khyer bar byed/ /

yang na bde ba can du nges/ /'dod pa'i rigasu skye bar 'gyur/ /me tog sna tshogs lag thogs shing / /sna tshogs rgyal mtshan byug pa dang / /glu yi mchod pa sna tshogs kyis/ /sangs rgyas sra dang rdo rjer bcas/ /sna tshogs

sgra dang sil snyan che/ /bkra shis tshigs bcad sna tshogs dang / /dbang gi gnas rnams nyid kyis ni/ /lus las lus gzhan 'gro bar 'gyur/ /rdo rje dril bu lag byin te/ /mgo bo'i gtsug tor mnan nas ni/ /rdo rje'i
sdom pa byin nas su/ /bum pa'i dbang ni bskur nas ni/ /mig la sogs par gti mug sogs/ /rdo rje gsum ni gnas gsum dgod/ /rdo rje thab khung rab sbyor bas/ /sbyang bar yang dag bstan pa'o/ /nyi ma

dag ni gsum la ni/ /rus pa'i phreng ba bsdu bar bya/ /'o ma dri bzang bsang gtor nas/ /de yi mchod rten yang dag brtsam/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang lha

dang mi dang lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga'o/ /'phags pa mkha' 'gro ma dra ba'i rdo rje gur rgyud kyi rgyal po'i brtag pa'o/ /rdzogs s+ho// //rgya gar gyi

mkhan po ga ya d+ha ra dang / lo ts+tsha ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyi bsgyur ba'o/ / @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ shrI ma hA mu drA ti la ka~M nA ma ma hA yo gi nI tan tra rA dza a d+hi pa ti/ bod skad du/ dpal phyag rgya chen po'i thig le zhes

bya ba rnal 'byor ma chen mo'i rgyud kyi rgyal po'i mnga' bdag /dpal phyag rgya chen po'i thig le la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan mkha' 'gro ye shes nyid/ /gsang pad snying po'i kha 'byed pa/ /gsang pad lte ba'i nang na bzhugs/ /

bdag gis zhu ba khyod gson cig /ye shes rgya mtsho'i kye rdo rje/ /'bum lnga yi ni bdag nyid rgyud/ /gang zhig khyod kyis de nyid gsungs/ /sbyor drug rnal 'byor ma yi gzhung / /thams cad mkhyen pa dbang phyug mchog /de ni dpa'

bo bdag gis shes/ /don dam pa ni ji lta bu/ /de ru bdag ni the tshom skyes/ /char dang thig le tshul dang ni/ /tshul tsam mchog gi mchog gzhan yin/ /sbyor ba drug gis rnam par shes/ /de ni gnas na gang na yod/ /srog ni gang nas 'byung ba yin/ /

rdo rje 'dzin pa gang du rlag /rdo rje mtshan mo gang yin ci/ /mtshams gang shar ba gang zhig lags/ /gang du nub pa'i dus dang rtsa/ /mchog gi dbang phyug du tsam mchis/ /dus kyi mtshan nyid gang lags gsungs/ /de yi dus kyis

don ci byed/ /A li kA li bya ba dang / /mnga' bdag gang nas 'byung ba lags/ /ro yi bye brag du zhig bstan/ /dga' ba yang ni de bzhin no/ /gang gi dus kyi dga' ba rnams/ /rdo rje dbang phyug 'byung ba gsungs/ /chos kyi

dbyings ni ji ltar bshad/ /rdo rje yang ni ji ltar bstan/ /bdag gi sgra ni ji ltar gsungs/ /gsang ba zhes bgyi ji ltar lags/ /mchog ces bgyi ba ji ltar bshad/ /dgyes pa'i don ni gsal bar mdzod/ /rigs kyi bu bye brag

du tsam bstan/ /phung po la sogs skye mched cing / /tshangs dang khyab 'jug drag po dang / /dbang phyug rtag tu zhu ba dang / /gang nas 'byung zhing gang du gnas/ /chen po'i chen po de ji ltar/ /phyag rgya'i bye brag du zhig bshad/ /phyag rgya

chen po ji ltar lags/ /mgon po mchod pa'i bye brag ci/ /de ru me tog ji ltar yin/ /mgon po chen po mchod sbyin ni/ /ji lta bu zhig 'tshal ba lags/ /mchog gi dngos po'i dkyil 'khor ni/ /bcom ldan 'das de ji lta

bu/ /de ru lha mo ci 'dra ba/ /lha mo bgyi ba gang la gsungs/ /bcom ldan dur khrod du zhig mchis/ /de ru shing ni ji ltar bshad/ /dur khrod dang ni shing rnams ni/ /rgyal ba'i dbang phyug de dag gsungs/ /mgon po nang gi sbyin

bsreg dang / /bdud rtsi lnga yi cho ga dang / /rnal 'byor ma yi 'dus gnas dang / /de ru skad ni ji lta bu/ /bdag nyid kyi ni rang ngo bo/ /mgon po chen po khyod kyis gsungs/ /dpal phyag rgya chen po thig le las rgyud thams cad

kyi rgyu zhes bya ba'i le'u ste dang po'o// // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /dris pa yang dag gting dpag dka'/ /snying po gang yin snying po mchog /sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang chen po/ /mchog las mchog gi yang

dag mchog /lha chen po ni la sogs pa/ /bzang mo de ru byol song yin/ /don dam de ni khyod gcig pu/ /zhal bzang mo yi snod yin no/ /gsang ba'i gsang ba yang dag rab/ /nyon cig yang dag bdag gis bshad/ /

dang po re shig slob ma la/ /dbang rnams lan cig bskur ba yis/ /de tshe gsang chen bshad pa yi/ /nges par snod du gyur pa'o/ /dbang med na ni dngos grub med/ /bye ma btsir yang mar med ltar/ /gang zhig rgyud lung nga rgyal

gyis/ /dbang bskur med la gsal byed pa/ /slob dpon slob ma shi ma thag /dngos grub thob kyang dmyal bar 'gro/ /de bas 'bad pa thams cad kyis/ /bla ma la ni dbang don zhu/ /dbang bskur yod dang de nyid shes/ /ye shes

shes dang thugs rje che/ /yang dag rlabs che dpa' bo dang / /ser sna med dang rang bzhin bzang / /skal ldan mtshan nyid thams cad rdzogs/ /phrag dog yul ni rnam par spangs/ /rtag tu dga' ba'i yid ldan pa/ /'dod chags

chen po gcig pu'i yid/ /sdom pa de ni shes pa na/ /bla ma de lta bu la bya/ /de lta bu yi bla ma yis/ /'bad pas slob ma brtag par bya/ /ji ltar bsregs la sogs pas gser/ /ji ltar mkhas pas rin po che/ /ji ltar

bde ldan bu mo ni/ /de ltar slob ma brtag par bya/ /de bas thams cad rab 'bad de/ /phan tshun so sor brtag par bya/ /de lta min na skyon du 'gyur/ /nam yang dgos grub thob mi 'gyur/ /ji ltar dug la rab sngags kyis/ /

dag pa byas na bdud rtsir 'gyur/ /de bzhin slob ma dbang sogs kyis/ /lus ni dri ma med par 'gyur/ /gang zhig dbang bskur sbyin byed pa/ /de ni rdor sems lta bur blta/ /bla ma sbrul rgyal lta bur blta/ /

dpal ldan bla ma me 'drar blta/ /bla ma ston pa bas lhag blta/ /yid bzhin rin chen mnyam par blta/ /ji ltar rab sbyor dang sngags kyis/ /sbrul gyi rgyal po'i spyi bo las/ /tshad med pa yi rin chen rnyed/ /

dbul ba thams cad med par byed/ /rab sbyor log dang sngags log gis/ /dga' mo nges par tshig par byed/ /de lta bu yi cho ga yis/ /khrims la sogs pa'i spyod pa yis/ /dpal zhal de nyid rin dbang phyug /tshe 'di nyid

kyis rnyed par 'gyur/ /de ltar min te ma gus na/ /gsung gi me yis nges tshig byed/ /ji ltar me yis shing tshig pa/ /skad cig gis ni thal bar byed/ /gal te de bzhin dpal bla ma/ /mnyes na skad cig gis sdig tshig /

rgyud 'di la ni mchog gi ni/ /bcom ldan dbang bskur du zhig mchis/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /dbang bskur bzhi yi rim pa la/ /'bras bu yis ni gsum du bstan/ /dang por slob dpon dbang dang gcig /gnyis

pa gsang ba'i dbang ni mchog /gsum pa shes rab ye shes dbang / /de ltar de bzhin bzhi pa'o/ /slob dpon dbang la bcu gcig dbye/ /gsang ba'i dbang dang bcu gnyis mchog /shes rab ye shes bcu gsum pa/ /de ltar de

bzhin bcu bzhi'o/ /dbang re la ni sa re ste/ /de rnams sa yi dbang phyug bdag /rgyu rtsa gsum gyis shes par bya/ /de yi 'bras bu bzhi pa'o/ /yang na 'bras bu gsum dang bral/ /yang na bdag nyid gsum po yin/ /dga'

ba'i bye brag shes par bya/ /'khor rnams kyi rim pas so/ /yar ngo yin ni gsum pa'i tshe/ /slob ma rab la dbang bskur bya/ /bzhin bzangs mig gi dkyus ring ba/ /gzugs bzang lang tshos brgyan pa yis/ /bcu

gnyis yang na bcu drug gam/ /ma rnyed nyi shu lon pa'ang rung / /nyi shu yan chag phyag rgya gzhan/ /des ni dngos grub thag ring byed/ /sring mo yang na bu mo 'am/ /chung ma bla ma la dbul bya/ /de nas sna tshogs rdzas kyis ni/ /

bla ma dad pas mchod par bya/ /sna tshogs ras ni brgya sogs dang / /rin chen sna tshogs rgyal mtshan mchog /mu tig phreng ba rin thang med/ /grangs med gser gyis mchod bya'o/ /de ring phan chad bdag ni 'bangs/ /

chen po'i chen po mchod pa bzhis/ /de ltar bu yi cho ga yis/ /'bad de bla ma mchod par bya/ /bla ma'i gzugs ni bdag rang yin/ /bdag mchod byas na dngos grub 'thob/ /de yis skad cig phyag rgya che/ /mchod pa

byas nas bsnyen par bya/ /bsnyen pa las ni gang zhig 'byung / /slob ma'i kha ru dbab par bya/ /sbom po mtha' ltag sbyar ba yis/ /longs spyod nang du gzhug par bya/ /de tshe yang dag ye shes skye/ /bu mo'i

bde ba ci lta bu/ /srog dang rtsol ba mnyam byas nas/ /shin tu legs dgyes kyis mchod bya/ /rin chen kha la hU~M phaT sngags/ /bkod nas mda' la bskyon par bya/ /de yi dus su dga' skad cig /ci ltar rang

bzhin skye bar 'gyur/ /de ltar phyag rgya la bshad bya/ /'di ni dga' ba'i mtshan nyid do/ /de nas slob ma'i lag tu ni/ /byin nas 'di skad smra bar bya/ /nga yi bka' lung rtog med pas/ /pad+ma'i don la ji bzhin

gyis/ /pad+ma'i snying po'i dbus na ni/ /rdor dbyings dbang phyug ma ni bzhugs/ /de ma rnyed pa'i bar du ni/ /thabs gzhan la ni byang chub med/ /de ni rang bzhin dga' ba'i gzugs/ /phra mo'i phra mo yang dag mchod/ /

dpal phyag rgya chen po'i thig le las slob dpon dang slob ma brtag pa dang / yon dbul ba dang / dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // de nas gsang ba bshad par bya/ /mchog dang rab mchog
mchog gi mchog /phung po lnga yi bdag nyid sku/ /legs dgyes dbang po'i 'khor lo drug /zla phyed byed gzugs char yang ni/ /rlung gi 'khor lo'i nang na bzhugs/ /phyed min gang ba yang ma yin/ /chu yi

zla ba bzhin du mthong / /sgyu 'phrul chen po 'gro ba'i ma/ /char yang grangs med bsten pa yin/ /de ni mchog dang gzhan mchog phra/ /skye med gnyis med bsam du med/ /rlung gi 'khor lo skyed byed ma/ /sangs

rgyas kyis kyang rnyed dka' ba'o/ /ma yi 'khor lo'i nang na ni/ /thig le gcig pa yi ge med/ /thams cad nang yod yig kun yin/ thams cad khyab dang bde ba 'byung / /bde ba 'phel bar byed pa'o/ /dbyangs dang dpe byed

dang bral lo/ /grangs med pa yi khams gsum ni/ /rgyu dang skye bar byed pa'o/ /tshul ni glo bur ba yi gnas/ /rnam pa thams cad dang bral ba/ /dngos po sbrul lce 'dra ba yin/ /mtho ris sa ni skyed pa'o/ /yi ge ma yin khams

kyang med/ /zla tshes thig le rgyan dang bral/ /skye med grangs med mi zad pa/ /de ni don dam tshul yin no/ /sprul pa yi ni 'khor lo'i gnas/ /lte ba'i snyoms pa zhes su grags/ /chos kyi 'khor lo'i tshul tsam ni/ /dri ma

med pa sprul mig 'dra/ /dri med ma bcos pa yi gnas/ /gnas med rnam pa med pa'o/ /g.yo ba med dang brjod du med/ /dbugs kyi rgyu ba med pa'o/ /mchog gi ye shes tshul can ni/ /bcu gsum dbang phyug gis mi
shes/ /mchog gi longs spyod 'khor lor gnas/ /mchog gi rnam pa bdud rtsi mchog /theg pa mchog gi mtha' na yod/ /ji ltar chang gi mthu bzhin no/ /thams cad bdag nyid byad gzugs bral/ /gzugs med bdag

nyid kyis bzhugs so/ /gzhan mchog bde chen 'khor lo la/ /thams cad mtha' yi mtha' na bzhugs/ /lta bar byed dang blta bya med/ /mtshan ngan thams cad med pa'o/ /brjod med mi zad zhi ba ste/ /rang dga' nyams

myong rnam pa'o/ /bla ma yi ni bka' drin gyis/ /legs dgyes dbang po rnyed par 'gyur/ /de lta bu yi ye shes che/ /rnam par shes drug rang bzhin can/ /'khor lo drug gi dbus su ni/ /don dam par ni bshad pa'o/ /

steng dang 'og gi sbyor ba yis/ /ba sbyar byad gzugs kyis ni yod/ /bcu gnyis phyed dang drug gi phyed/ /drug bcu rtsa bzhi de bzhi brgyad/ /brgyad gnyis dang ni brgyad bzhi ni/ /'di ni 'khor lo chu skyes drug /dpal phyag rgya

chen po'i thig le las sbyor ba drug gi mtshan nyid dang 'khor lo drug gi rang gi ngo bo zhes bya ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// // nyon cig lha mo skal chen mo/ /rtsa yi 'khor lo 'byung ba mchog /stong phrag bdun bcu rtsa

gnyis te/ /rtsa rnams kyi ni rigs bshad do/ /rigs chen po yi rgyud chen por/ /rgyas par gdag gis gsal bar byas/ /'di ru 'khor lo drug gi grangs/ /mdor bsdus pa ni bshad par bya/ /rlung gi 'khor lo'i rtsa

drug ni/ /g.yo ba namakha' me dang sbubs/ /rab bskor dang ni 'jigs chen po/ /rtsa de rlung gi 'khor lo'i gnas/ /'dzin ma dang ni ro ma dang / /rtog med ma ni gru gsum gnas/ /me yi 'khor lo'i nang du ni/ /rtsa yi dbang po lngar

shes bya/ /mgyogs ma dang ni yang dag mgyogs/ /shin du bzang dang bzang 'gro dang / /stobs chen ma dang 'jigs chen ma/ /nga rgyal che dang 'jigs byed che/ /mthus myur ma dang mthu yi / /mthu yi chu dang mthu dri dang / /

mthu ma dang ni mthus 'bab ma/ /gtsub dang nur dang mthu du ma/ /rngam pa za ba nam mkhar 'gro/ /bya yi yan lag bya 'gro ma/ /phyug mo 'jigs ma nga ro dang / /brtul ma mchod ma nyid dang ni / /sgra ma sgra 'byung sdig can ma/ /

pad+ma'i sdong bu ma sngon mo/ /zil pa zil 'byung skra ma dang / /phyin phyogs kha dang dbyug pa dang / /dbyug pa'i nga rgyal dang po ma/ /tshe'u lto ma dang tshe'u dri ma/ /tshe'u bdun ma dang brtson 'grus ma/ /tshe'u khyim ma dang tshe'u kham/ /tshe'u 'od ma

dang tshe'u lug /'bud ma bdag ma 'od ma dang / /dri med dang ni dri sreg dang / /thag lto ma dang thag dga' ma/ /thag mo dang ni thag dus ma/ /phug ron phum skye phra ma dang / /lo ma dang ni tsher lo dang / /gos gyon ma dang gsal byed ma/ /

rtsa 'di brgyad po brgyad du dran/ /drug bcu rtsa bzhi'i chu skyes ni/ /lte ba'i sprul pa'i 'khor lor gnas/ /rin chen ma dang pad chen ma/ /gshe chen ma dang stobs chen ma/ /mgo chen ma dang myos chen ma/ /dga' chen ma

dang mi dga' che/ /de brgyad chos 'khor 'dam skyes ni/ /zhal bzang snying ga'i rgya mtshor ro/ /chags ma longs spyod longs spyod min/ /nyi 'od 'od ma b+ha ga dang / /lu ma dang ni thal gdong ma/ /bza' ster rang za ltogs ma dang / /

ra sa ya na ro skyur ma/ /ro 'dzag dang ni ro ma dang / /sgur ma longs spyod 'khor lo'i gnas/ /brgyad gnyis 'dam skyes 'dab ma ni/ /mgrin pa yi ni rim pa'i rigs/ /'dod ma 'dod spyod tshe'u lus ma/ /zla 'thung zla lto mdzod ma dang / /

skad snyan lkugs ma dur ba ma/ /lce spyang brgya ma skams pa ma/ /me ma rngon ma zla ba ma/ /gang ba gnyid ma gnyid skyes ma/ /chang 'tshong chang ster bdud rtsi ma/ /dung ma dang ni dung rna ma/ /dung mig ma dang dung sna ma/ /mthus phyug ma dang mthu

ser ma/ /mthu rmongs ma dang mthu rngam ma/ /'gying ma dang ni ri rten ma/ /sum bcu rtsa gnyis thod pa'i gnas/ /bde chen 'khor lo'i rgyal po 'di/ /des ni 'khor lo rnams la khyab/ /thams cad phra mo regs bya med/ /gzung dang

'dzin pa rnam par spangs/ /bde chen bde ba'i rnam pa can/ /bde chen la sogs sbyin par byed/ /de yi rtsa ba'i 'byung ba yi/ /yang dag thar 'dod pas shes bya/ /lha mo rtsa byung med gyur na/ /phung po'i 'byung ba ji ltar 'gyur/ /phung po

med na ye shes che/ /rnal 'byor rnams kyis ji ltar rnyed/ /phung po lnga ni bdag nyid sku/ /mkha' 'gro lngar ni rab tu grags/ /mkha' 'gro lnga ni ye shes lnga/ /'byung ba lnga yi rang bzhin can/ /rtsa nyid 'byung ba med 'gyur na/ /phung po rnams ni

'byung ba med/ /phung po med na dngos grub ni/ /de bas 'bad pa thams cad kyis/ /rtsa yi 'khor lo btsal bar bya/ /ji ltar sprin gyi char gyis ni/ /rtag par de ni che bar 'phel/ /'bras bu mang zhing mtha' yas ni/ /the tshom med par sbyin

par byed/ /de ltar phung po'i shing zhes bya/ /rtsa yi chu yis che bar 'phel/ /cher gyur 'bras bu thar pa ni/ /the tshom med par sbyin par byed/ /lha mo'i dngos po gzugs su ni/ /rtsa yi byad gzugs yin par 'gyur/ /reg khams rgyal

mtshan sbyor ba yis/ /me 'khor nang du chu skyes ni/ /gang tshe rdo rjes bskyod par byed/ /de tshe me ni khong du chud/ /'khor tshus lo skyes thams cad ni/ /je gsal je gsal kha 'byer 'gyur/ /de nas rtsa kun 'dzag 'gyur te/ /snod 'dzag

pa yi chu thigs bzhin/ /de nas sprul pa'i 'khor lor ni/ /'dus nas gcig tu gyur pa'o/ /rtsa gnyis kha yi rtse mo las/ /zla ba dang ni nyi ma 'dzag /mngal gyi dbus na rtsa gnas pa/ /thag pa'i rnam pa'i gzugs su yod/ /de ni

gcig tu rgyu zhes bya/ /'bras bu'i bye brag gnyis su 'gyur/ /g.yon nas khu ba 'byung ba dang / /g.yas nas khrag ni 'byung ba'o/ /gang tshe g.yas phyogs nyi ma ni/ /de tshe bde ba dmar por 'gyur/ /g.yon nas zla ba

'byung ba'i phyir/ /de ni bde ba dkar por 'gyur/ /de gnyis nang na me gnas pa/ /sgong skyes gnyis log ji bzhin no/ /sngon gyi las rlung rnam shes ni/ /gang tshe 'khor bar gyur pa na/ /de yi tshe na b+ha ga'i nang / /'dod chags

chen pos yid 'gyur ro/ /gang tshe ma yi zla mtshan 'byung / /me dang nyi ma gsal bar 'byung / /de tshe 'dod chags chen po'i yid/ /reg bya 'dun pa mchog tu 'gyur/ /bol+la kak+ko la zhugs nas/ /ji ltar chu la chu bzhag bzhin/ /

de tshe sa bon 'byung ba yin/ /sa bon las ni gong bu 'byung / /lha mo de las rtsa rnams 'byung / /'bras bu nges par 'byung ba'o/ /dpal phyag rgya chen po'i thig le las 'khor lo drug gi rtsa 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// //
